[A:i-1]gsal gsal/rab byung dang po'i chu glang lor (1073)'khon dkon cog rgyal pos gtsang dpon po'i ri la sgo rum gzim spyil dkar po btab nas bzung dpal ldan sa skya zhes pa'i
grub rab byung dang mtha' 'di byung pa red/sa skya ni phyis byon gyi grub mtha' mang po zhig gi rtsa ba yin te/ nya dbon nas brgyud pa la dol bu pa'i lugs dang/ red mda'
ba nas brgyud pa rje tsong kha pa yab sras kyi lugs/ gzhan yang ngor pa dang tshar pa'i lugs sogs tshang ma sa skya'i yan lag dang nying lag gi tshul du byung ba sha stag
yin/dpal ldan sa skya'i gdan sa ni/ yang srid kyis brgyud 'dzin byed pa min par/ gdung rabs kyis brgyud 'dzin byed pa red/ de'i phyir rab byung bcu drug pa'i sa phag
lo'i bar lo brgyad brgya brgyad cu gya drug ring (1073 nas 1959)mu mthud de

[A: i-2]gnas yod pas/ gdung rabs kyi yig cha de dag tu dngos sam brgyud pa'i sgo nas bod kyi rig gnas dang/ chab srid/ chos lugs bcas kyi lo rgyus dang/ yon rgyal rabs nas
go min tang gi bar bod dang mes rgyal nang khul gyi 'brel ba bcas gsal bar 'khod yod/ de'i phyir gdung rabs kyi yig cha 'di dag ni dpyad gzhi'i yig cha gal gnad shin tu che
ba sha stag yin/sa skya'i gdung rabs rgyas bsdus sna tshogs yod kyang/ gtso bo a mes zhabs kyi 《gdung rabs ngo mtshar bang mdzod》nang 'khon dkon mchog rgyal po nas a mes
bar (1073 nas 1651)bkod pa dang/ kun dga' blo gros kyi 《gdung rabs rin chen 'dzad med srid zhi'i yon tan lhun grub》nang rtse gdong gdung rabs nas mthu stobs dbang phyug
gzhon nu'i bar(1651 nas 1729)bkod/《gdung rabs ngo mtshar rin chen kun 'phel》'di'i rtsom pa po ni/ sa skya kun dga' snying po la sras bzhi dang/ sran mo gnyis yod pa'i nang
gi che shos drag shul 'phrin las rin chen yin la/ rab byung bco lnga pa'i lcags mo lug(1871)la 'khrungs/

[A: i-3]rab byung bco lnga pa'i shin yos nas rab byung bcu drug pa'i chu sprel bar lo bco brgyad(1915 nas 1932)gdan sar bzhugs/ sa skya'i khri thog so bzhi pa yin/ khong gis
brtsams pa'i gdung rabs 'di ni kun dga' blo gros kyi 《gdung rabs yon tan lhun grub》kyi zhal skong du brtsams pa zhig yin la/ 'di'i nang dus mchod bla brang gi gdung rabs
kun dga' blo gros nas/ ngag dbang rdo rje rin chen bar gdung rabs brgyad dang/ phun tshogs pho brang gi gdung rabs/ rje btsun ma rta mgrin dbang mo nas 'jam dpal dngos
grub rgya mtsho'i bar lnga/ sgrol ma pho brang gi gdung rabs bkra shis rin chen nas/ drag shul 'phrin las rin chen bar bdun bcas khyon sdom gdung rabs nyi shu tham pa'i rnam
thar 'khod yod cing / 1729 lo nas 1932 lo'i bar gyi sa skya'i lo rgyus gsal bar 'khod yod/ gdung rabs 'di'i ma phyi ni pe cin mi rigs rig gnas pho brang du bzhugs pa'i

/ /dpal skya pa'i gdung rabs rin po che byon tshul 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa dang/ sa chen bla ma rdo rje 'chang kun dga' blo gros kyis mdzad pa bcas kyi zhal skong

shog stong /

thog mar/ /mchod par brjod cing brtsam par dam bca' ba/ /oM swa sti/ / rgyal kun mkhyen brtse nus pa'i rnam rol pa/ /rdo rje rnon po 'phags mchog 'jig rten dbang / /mthu stobs
dbang phyug dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /sgo gsum mi phyed dwang bas phyag bgyi'o/ /zhes mchod tshig gi me tog 'thor ba sngon du song nas/ 'dir dpal ldan sa skya'i gdung

dgongs 'grel rdzogs nas/ de rjes

kha skong phyis byon rtse gdong bla brang pa'i gdung rabs byung tshul dang / dpa' ldan sa skya nyid du gdung rabs rgyun ma chad par byon tshul gnyis sngags 'chang bla ma de

/ sa skya'i gdung rabs sngags 'chang bla ma rang nyid kyi rnam thar mdor bsdus bcas bkod par mdzad/ de rjes dpal sa skya'i gdung rabs rin po che byon tshul zhal skong ngo

ba bzhes pa/ sngags 'chang bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa ngag dbang kun dga' blo gros sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes mtshan snyan ri bo'i khong seng
du rgyu ba 'di nyid kyis mdzad pa/ sa skya bskor dpon ma Ni bar gnang ba'i gdung rabs tshigs bcad 'gro don bzang po dang / rtsa 'grel gyi tshul du mdzad de gong 'phros rtse

par 'khod kyang de man mdzad

de yi/ /bde stong ye shes 'grub rten phyag rgya ru/ /ru thog rgyal po'i sras mo mched gnyis las/ /skal bzang bde skyid bu khrid zhes bya'i sras/ /gcen po 'gro mgon dbang

/ gzi khra'i go ba phul ba bzhes tshul bstan pa dang / de tsam nas bzung mi rnams kyis 'di bya 'di byed dang / so so'i lad mo dang

dbyibs rnam 'gyur sogs la dpag pas nang gi de nyid rnams kyang mkhyen pas mtshon/ chos 'jig rten bya ba phal cher thugs kyi bang mdzod du bzhugs pa'i sgo dang po'ang 'di tsam
nas dod de/ de dus kyi mi rnams kyis 'di 'dra'i dgu dran gyi bla ma zhig ang / zhes gleng ba byung / rtse chen lha khang nyams gso'i skabs/ yab sras nas grub mtshan ston
par bzhed de/ rje nyid kyi sku dkyil phal cher shu bas gang ba na/ yab rje'i gsungs las/ ar po byed bzhin pa 'di yi rtsig sked na rdo sgam 'dra ba la gnas pa'i sa bdag
gis gnod pas/ de phob la dkyil khang du klu mkhar bzos pa'i nang du chug gsungs pa bzhin bgyis pas rim dwangs su gyur/ de skabs byugs sman spyi dang khyad par dres thag
mer sbyangs kyi thal sman byugs pas bzod glags med pa'i tsha zug 'khrungs kyang / phyag zhabs zing tsam las gsung ye ma shor ba'i dam bca' mdzad gsungs/ lo 'di'i rim sgrub

bka' drin che yang / skyed ma bzhes pa'i tshul gyis/ nyin gcig yab yum sku 'khor 'ga' dang bcas bzhugs mur dar gcig ljags dbugs kyi rgyu ba chad cing / spyan yang btsum

la mnga' brnyes pa'i brda ni 'di lta bu'o/ zhes ston pa mdzad pa dang / i ri ri zhes pa'i sgra de yab rje mchog nas tshe gzungs ljags bzlas kyi chab snyan khung du blugs
pa dang / khra gsal gyis gzigs dus thugs dran gsos pa yin 'dug ces phyis su yang yang bka' bstsal/ rim gyis snyun las grol tshul bzhes te yab rje mchog nas/ yongs rdzogs

legs par

'chang nyid kyis sngar gyi 'phros nas mjug gi sbyar byang bar tshang la ma nor ba/ kun gyi yid 'phrog pa/ gsung 'jam zhing snyan la dag cing gsal ba nye ring med pa tshangs

pa/ skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa la mang ja gdan non sbyin 'gyed gya nom pa stob pa sogs dang / gdan sa chen po'i rten khyad mtshar rnams la mchod pa snyan shal spyan
gzigs/ gzhan yang zur 'bul gyi rnam bzhag dgos pa rnams kyang de bzhin bcas mdzad cing / rgyal dpon nas mol gtam phul grub rjes yab rje chos kyi rgyal pos/ gang

gi rigs sras dam pa sku mched zung khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por mnga' gsol ba'i legs tshogs kyis mtshon/ bdag gzhan gyi dus gsum du bsags pa'i dge rtsa rnams chab mi 'tshal
ba'i phyir yongs bsngo'i rgyas btab rjes yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched kyi mdun du bzhengs nas/ rgyal srid sna bdun bkra shis rdzas brgyad sogs kyi mnga' 'bul smin rgyas
dpon slob lhan rgyas nas gnang ba'i shis brjod ban tshang dbu byed che bas byang drangs/ tshogs pa byings bcas nas 'brug stong dus gcig tu ldir ba lta bu'i gsung gdangs
kyis brgyan par mdzad/ 'jam mgon sku mched gang gi rgyal tshab tu mnga' gsol legs byas kyi rten 'brel dge bas mtshon/ 'dzam gling na 'gran zla dang bral bar mkhas grub
gzur gnas du mas bsngags pa'i rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs rin po che srid mtha'i bar du byon nas gser khri rin po cher mnga' gsol gyi rten 'brel 'bad med lhun gyis
grub pa'i dge mtshan srid na gsal ba ni/ nam mkha'i khams shin tu dwangs shing / nyi 'od gsal ba/ 'ja' dang 'od kyi gur khang 'khyil ba/ dkar phyogs lha rnams me tog gi

dga' ston chen mo'i thog rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid la yab sras zung gis mtshon gzhis byes ser skya drag zhan rnams nas legs so'i sgo brgya rnam par dbye ba'i skabs so/ /de lta

pa'i lung / 'phags pa rin po ches mdzad pa'i ri khrod ma'i byabs khrus lung bcas/ nar paN yig steng nas jo lugs sme brtsegs ljang nag gi rjes gnang / ngag chos

pa rnams

rin po che nas mdzad pa'i spyi bshags tshigs lhug gi mthar tshigs bcad kha dmar dang / bstod pa sangs rgyas bstan srung ma bsdus par grags pa/ gtor rdzong lha'i tshogs rnams
ma/ rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis nas byung ba'i rdo rje'i glu mdo rgyud nas byung ba'i bkra shis smon lam/ spyi skabs phrin bcol srid zhi'i dpal 'byor ma rnams yig rnying mjug
chog gi rnam bzhag bcas/ phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs par mdzad pa gtor bsngo chen mor grags pa'i lung / yang des mdzad pa'i gtor ma brgya rtsa dang phur pa'i gtor bsngo gnyis
kyi lung / kun dga' bkra shis kyi 'khrungs rabs gsol 'debs/ de'i sku bstod yin bzhin nor bu spyi bshags bla ma dam pa sogs kyi lung / yab rje bsod nams rin chen zhabs
brtan rgyal kun mkhyen brtse ma/ bco brgyad mkhyen brtse rab brtan gyi gong ma mkhyen rab byams pa'i rnam sprul du ngos 'dzin zhabs brtan tshe yi dngos

grub ma/ me bya lo bsam yas chos skyong thog bab dus phul ba'i dus gsum rgyal ba ma/ yang zhal gnyis rnams dang / 'jam mgon kun blo'i zhabs brtan mdzod pa bka' bzhi pas rtsom
pa rten 'brel ma 'ongs lung bstan 'dra zhes ma dang / sa chen kun blos mdzad pa'i yab rgyas gsol 'debs skyabs gnas bslu med ma/ rje btsun grags rgyan dang / bdag nyid
chen mo bzang po dpal gnyis la gdung rabs myur byon gsol 'debs/ sgar chen dang sku 'bring sku bstod 'jam mgon kun blos gdung rgyud dbang gi mtshan can sku mched kyi zhabs
brtan/ spyi zhabs phan bde gangga'i chu rgyun bkra shis 'gyur med g.yung drung / dpal ldan rab dkar sogs kyi lung / sngags 'chang rgya gar ba'i bsangs yig chen mo la/ 'phags
pas gsungs par grags pa'i dgra lha dpang bstod/ gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa'i sde brgyad cha snyoms zhu ngag ma/ a mes zhabs kyi rtsi dmar dang bse khrab
kyi bskang ba/ kyai rdor sgrub thabs ma nor don tshang / ri khud sprul sku'i bzhed skong bla ma rgyang 'bod/ gur lcam dral/ las mkhan pho mo'i 'bod rbad bsad gsum/ slob
dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad dpang gzugs gur mgon pho nya bskul ba dam pas mdzad pa/ 'phags pas mdzad pa'i bdud rtsi lnga mchod/ zor lam dbye ba/ gur lcam dral bskul bram
ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa/ chos

skyong spyi'i drag bskul sngags 'chang kun bkras kyis mdzad pa/ 'dod khams dbang mo'i drag bskul bdag chen blo gros rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i dgos bskang las byung ba/ zhal
dang pu tra'i drag bskul bdag chen rgya gar bas mdzad pa/ bskang ba nag po mchod rten 'bring por grags pa dang / chos nyid ma/ lha zhal pu tra dkar bdud rnams kyi dgos
skong rnams dam pa kun grags bdag chen blo gros rgyal mtshan/ sngags 'chang rgya gar ba sogs kyis mdzad pa dang / gtum chen ma sa chen sku dang gsung thugs ma mal lo dang
/ dmag zor ma dang / dur bdag bskang ba/ dkar bdud bskang ba bsdus pa rnams a mes zhabs gdung rabs myur byon bskang phrin kun bkras sogs kyis mdzad pa dang / stod snying
sri mngon gang gsum sangs rgyas bstan srung rgyas pa bstod gsar ma skyes hU~M yig rngam 'bar rnams gdan sa 'di nyid kyi gsungs rgyun bzhin gyi lung / lha chen chos spyod
rab gsal lha pod shog brgya dang dgu byams chos sde lnga/ sa skya bka' 'bum dpe khang phyag dpe bris ma pod gnyis bcu drug pa pod rjes ma'i nang sngags 'chang grags blo'i
gsan yig yod pa'i steng 'phags pod rjes ma'i gnas bstod yan gsan pa bcas/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas gsan pa'i skor dang / rje btsun bskal bzang dbang mo kun dga' bstan
pa'i nyi ma'i drung nas gsan pa'i skor la/ dzAe ta ri'i lugs kyi tshe dpag lha dgu'i dbang rgyud yab rje bzhin/ nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i byin

rlabs kun bsod yig steng nas brgyud pa kun bkras yan dkyil chog bzhin la kun dga' bstan nyi des pod lung skor la/ kun bsod kyis mdzad pa'i rnam bshad/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg thun
mong ma yin pa'i man ngag gi nyams len mkha' spyod bgrod pa'i lam thun mong ma yin pa/ mkha' spyod sgrub pa'i gser chos chig brgyud ma sogs zhal shes khag che ba 'ga'
zhig sa lo chen po'i phyag dpe las logs su bkol ba/ des mdzad pa'i mkha' spyod ma'i nyams len snying po don bsdus/ lam rim gsol 'debs/ rnal 'byor ma'i man ngag zab mo/ gser
chos chig brgyud ma/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub dkyil 'gro kun mkha' spyod bgrod pa'i nye lam/ 'pho ba'i chig brgyud ma'i dris lan dogs gcod rnams
a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa dang / mus chen sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i mkha' spyod ma'i bskyed rdzogs rnam bshad kyi lung / sngags 'chang yig steng nas sgrol
dkar bka' bab dgu ldan gyi rjes gnang / sngags 'chang yig steng nas/ gur lha brgyad/ zhal bzhi bsnyen dus/ nor skyong yab yum/ pur tra'i zur bka'/ pu tra'i ming sring
gsum/ bran bdud gshin rje nag po yab yum rnams kyi rjes gnang yig lung bcas brgyud pa kun bkras nas rje btsun bstan nyi'i ngag chos yig steng nas gur mgon khro bcu rjes
gnang gi yig lung dang / kun bsod khro bcu'i rjes gnang gi yig lung / yig steng gong 'dra nas dmag zor rgyal mo'i rjes

gnang brgyud pa kun bkras nas/ byams pa lha dbang rig 'dzin rje btsun kun bstan des so/ /sngags 'chang yig steng nas dkar bdud rjes gnang brgyud pa kun bkras/ yab rje bsod
rin rje btsun kun bstan no//sngags 'chang yig steng nas tshe dbang grub rgyal ma/ kun bkras yig steng nas bla ma zhi khro/ tshe dbang lcags sdong ma rnams kun bkras yan yab
rje bzhin/ lung gi skor la/ 'phags pa rin po che'i rnam thar/ ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa/ 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i 'khor ba 'khor tshe ma/ sa los mdzad
pa'i mgon po drug cu pa'i gtor bzlog sngags 'chang chen pos mdzad pa/ yang bdag med dgu'i sgrub thabs/ de'i dkyil chog gur mgon brag rdzong ma'i rgyun khyer/ kyai rdor
man ngag lugs kyi dbang gi mtshams sbyor rnams kyi lung / sngags 'chang chen po'i rnam thar ngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i nying khu kun bsod kyis mdzad pa/ yang des mdzad pa'i
bsod nams dbang po dang / grags blo'i rnam thar/ a mes zhabs kyi rnam thar khro phu dus zhabs pas mdzad pa/ bsod nams dbang phyug pa'i mdzad pa rnam thar sngags 'chang
kun bkras kyis mdzad pa/ kun bkras rnam thar mdzod pa nam bsam pas mdzad pa/ a mes kyis mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i sgrub dkyil dbang gi mtshams sbyor gyi lung / sa los mdzad
pa'i spros med dang sbyor drug brgyud 'debs/ bla ma dam pas mdzad pa'i zab lam rdo rje rnal 'byor khrid yig ngo sprod dang bcas pa'i brgyud 'debs/

mchog dang dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi bde bar gshegs pa zhes pa skad gnyis shan sbyar 'di brtag gnyis kyi 'grel pa rdo rje rin chen gsum phreng zhes bya ba'i dpe e hU~M na
bzhugs pa rdo rje'i tshig kha shas/ kun rig phur pa/ gur drag mi 'khrugs pa bcas kyi brgyud 'debs/ rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa bklags pas don 'grub/ bde kyai
sogs kyi brgyud 'debs/ yongs 'dzin/ mus chen 'jam dbyangs pa/ glo bo mkhan chen/ zhwa lu lo chen rnams kyi sku bstod/ sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya 'gyur bcos/ dus 'khor maNDal/
rdo rje phur pa'i gtor bzlog gnam lcags rdo rje'i dbal/ phur srung bskul bzlog 'khor lo rtsibs bcu/ ltas ngan brgyad cu'i bzlog pa/ bdag shwo sa gsum gyi bskul/ a mes zhabs
kyi phur dkyil/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'phrin las lhun grub/ birWa pa'i bstod pa 'phags mchog ma sku yi rnam 'gyur drug gi bstod pa/ kun mkhyen gam pa'i bstod pa dad pa
rgya mtsho'i rlabs phreng rnams a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ bdag chen rgya gar ba'i gur drag phrin gzhung dang / las mtha' gsal byed/ grub mchog bsod nams dbang po'i slob
dpon padma'i bla ma rnal 'byor dang / sgrol dkar sgrub thabs/ sngags 'chang kun bkras kyi zhal gyi gtor bzlog bsam don kun 'grub/ chag med gsum gyi rgyun khyer nyung ngu/
lam zab byin rlabs nyams len/ birWa pa'i sgrub thabs bir srung thun mong ba'i byin rlabs/ lam zab nang gi

nyams len/ gu ru'i rnam thar ri med nyang gis mdzad pa/ rdo ring pas mdzad pa'i zhal gyi gtor bzlog kun rig brtag gnyis rnam dag ma/ dpal mchog ma/ lam zab dus 'khor/ bde mchog
gur mgon/ phur pa/ drag dmar rnams kyi brgyud 'debs kha skong / kun rig lhan thabs/ a mes zhabs kyi mgon po'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg rnams kyi lung / tshar chen lam glu/
ni gu'i brgyud 'debs/ tshe dpag med kyi brgyud 'debs/ a mes zhabs kyi 'khrungs rabs/ rje nyid kyi zhal gsung ma rnams kyi lung / mus chen sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog rgyal
mtshan gyi bka' 'bum gyi lung sogs gsan/ thar rtse rdo rje 'chang nam mkha' bsam 'grub kun dga' mtshan dpe'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po las/ mdo sngags gnyis la/ dang
po la 'phags pa brgyad stong pa/ tog gzungs/ grwa lnga rnams kyi lung / gnyis pa sngags la/ bya rgyud tshe dpag lha dgu'i dbang / 'chi med rnga sgra lha dgu'i dbang / rjes
gnang skor la/ mi tra lugs kyi tshe dpag med dkar po/ bcu gcig zhal dpal mo lugs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug sengge sgra/ sgrol dkar bka' bab dgu ldan rnams kyi rjes gnang
dang / tshar lugs sgrol dkar 'od zer drug sbrags kyi nyams khrid lung bcas/ tshe sgrub zhag bdun ma'i lung khrid/ gnyan sgrol yan lag drug pa/ ri khrod ma ser mo gnyis kyi
rjes gnang / lha mo sha ba Na'i sgrub thabs lung dang dmigs khrid bcas/ rta mgrin grub rgyal lugs/ sman bla

mched bdun/ klu dbang lha lnga/ thub dbang gnas bcu/ 'jam dbyangs smra seng / mi g.yo ba dkar sngon/ don zhags lha lnga/ rnam rgyal lha dgu gza' yum/ dbyangs can dkar mo/ sme
brtsegs ljang nag/ bka' gdams lha bzhi rnams kyi rjes gnang / bya rgyud rigs gsum spyi dbang / gser chos seng gdong sngon mo/ dzam ser nag nor rgyun ma rnams kyi rjes
gnang / dbyu gu mched gsum gyi sgrub skor lung / mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i rjes gnang sgrub skor lung bcas/ spyod rgyud 'jam dbyangs a ra pa tsa na lha lnga'i dbang /
mi 'khrugs pa lha dgu'i dbang nub gnyis ma/ rnal 'byor rgyud sbyong rgyud dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang / phyag rdor 'chi bdag 'joms pa lha bcu gsum ma/ kun rig rtsa ba'i
dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbang / rgyud sde bzhi'i yi dam gyi lha tshogs kyi skor la/ 'phags yul gyi slob dpon a bhyas bkral ba'i rdo rje phreng ba dkyil 'khor zhe gnyis dang
/ kri ya sa mutstsha nas gsung pa'i dge legs su byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum bsnan pa'i dkyil 'khor zhe lnga'i dbang chen bla med pha rgyud la/ 'jigs byed rwa lugs ro langs
brgyad skor gyi dbang / 'jigs byed dmar po mda' bkang ma'i dug dbang / gshin rje dgra nag gi dbang / dbus pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa'i rtog bdun gyi zhal shes sogs
las tshogs 'ga' zhig gi lung / las gshin rigs gsum gyi rjes gnang / gnyis

med rgyud gur nas gsungs pa'i sor 'phreng dkar mo/ dus 'khor nas gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i shugs/ sna tshogs yum rnams kyi rjes gnang / thun min skor kyai rdor rgyu lam gyi dbang
/ bka' babs bzhi gras dges rdor nag po lugs kyi dbang chen/ gur mgon gri gug lha lnga sindhu ra/ rgya gzhung gnyis/ lha brgyad/ lha bcu gnyis kyi ljang lugs/ lha btsun
ma ste bka' babs bzhir grags pa'i dbang chen bcas gsan/ dges rdor bskyed rim rnam bshad chos rje dpal ldan bkra shis kyis mdzad pa'i bklags pas kun shes kyi lung / mgon
pod me 'bar ma'i chos skor cha tshang gi lung / gser chos mkha' spyod skor gsum gyi byin rlabs/ gser chos dmar mo skor gsum ngor lugs kyi rjes gnang gser chos dmar chung
skor gsum/ gser chos tshe dpag med sprul sku/ gser chos rdo rje khyung khra rnams kyi rjes gnang / rdzong chung lugs sngags 'chang gzungs dpal bas bsgrigs pa'i khyung pod
kyi lung / mdo sngags sna tshogs pa'i gzungs 'dus kyi lung /rnying ma'i skor la/ tshe rta zung 'brel gyi dbang / gra mngon dzam dmar/ phyag rdor gtum po khyung lnga myur
lugs gur drag/ rta mgrin gsang sgrub rnams kyi rjes gnang / tshe dbang lcags sdong ma dang padma bka' thang gi lung / thar rtse paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang gi bka' 'bum
rnams kyi lung sogs mang du gsan/ gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang kun

dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas theg mchog bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po las/thog mar rgyu'i theg pa'i skor la/ 'dul ba'i las chog dang zhar byung khyim pa la phan gdags
pa dang bcas bu ston gyis mdzad pa dang / so thar sdom rgyun brgyud 'debs gong sa lnga pas mdzad pa rnams kyi lung / tshad mdo dang rnam nges tshad ma kun las btus pa slob
dpon phyogs glang gis mdzad pa/ tshad ma rnam 'grel chos grags kyis mdzad pa/ tshad ma rigs gter rtsa 'grel sa paN gyi gsung / so thar/ mdo rtsa ba yon tan 'od kyis mdzad
pa/ slob dpon shAkya 'od kyi 'dul ba sum brgya pa/ de'i rang 'grel 'od ldan/ dge 'dun bzang po'i ka ri ka lnga bcu pa/ dgra bcom pa sa ga lhas byas pa'i 'dul ba me tog
phreng rgyud mgon po byams pas gsungs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos sde lnga / 'phags pa klu sgrub yab sras kyi dbu ma rtsa 'jug bzhi gsum/ rig pa drug cu pa/ rgyal sras
zhi ba lha'i spyod 'jug sa skya panDi ta'i sde snod rgyud sde'i nges gsang sdom gsum rab dbye ste sngon dus su grags pa'i pu ti grags chen bco brgyad kyi lung / mdo rgyan
gnyis lta ba'i sa/ bslab spyod spyod pa'i sa/ skyes tshoms dad pa'i sa ste bka' gdams gzhung drug dang / 'phags yul gyi chos rgyal dge dbang gis mdzad pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'i skyes rabs dpag bsam 'khri shing / de'i sras zla ba'i dbang pos mdzad pa'i kha skong dang bcas pa

rnams kyi lung / rmor chen yig steng nas dbu ma lugs kyi sems bskyed/ yangs can mkhan po byams pa ngag dbang rnam rgyal gyi yig steng nas sems tsam lugs kyi sems bskyed/ rgyal
sras thogs med bzang po dpal gyi blo sbyong gsung bgros mar grags pa'i lung / sum pa lo tsA ba'i blo sbyong snyan rgyud kyi khung khrid/ sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu rgyal
mchog dang / mus chen sems dpa' chen po gnyis kyis bsgrigs pa'i blo sbyong glegs bam gyi lung / gzhon nu rgyal mchog pa'i blo sbyong legs bshad kun 'dus/ lce sgom gyis
phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa bka' gdams thor bur grags pa rnams dang / po to ba'i dpe chos rin spungs 'gro mgon dpal ye'i gtam rgyud rin phreng / lce sgom shes rab rdo rje'i
man ngag rin spungs rnams kyi lung / sa skya pa chen pos 'jam dbyangs la dngos su gsan pa'i blo sbyong zhen pa bzhi bral gyi gdams khrid dang / yig skor rnams kyi lung dang
bcas pa/ sa 'jam sbags sgrub kyi byin rlabs dang / de'i sgrub skor rnams kyi yig lung / jo bo'i chos 'byung brgya rtsar grags pa rnams glegs bam yongs rdzogs kyi lung
/ gcod nam mkha' sgo 'byed kyi byin rlabs dmigs khrid dang bcas pa/ dam pas mdzad pa'i 'khyud gcod dkar nag khra gsum tshang ma'i lung /gnyis pa 'bras bu'i theg pa'i skor
gsar rnying gnyis las/ thog mar gsang sngags gsar ma bya rgyud la sman bla mched bdun gyi rjes gnang / gong

sa lnga pas mdzad pa'i sman bla'i mdo chog yid bzhin dbang rgyal gyi lung / klu dbang lha lnga'i rjes gnang de'i sgrub skor rgya gzhung rnams kyi lung / thub dbang gnas bcu'i
rjes gnang lung bcas/ gang blo ma'i rig gtad/ 'jam dkar ma ti lugs kyi rjes gnang sgrub skor lung dang bcas pa/ 'jam dpal shes rab 'khor lo'i rjes gnang sgrub lung bcas/
'jam dbyangs smra seng rjes gnang sgrub skor lung bcas/ 'od zer can gtso rkyang gi rjes gnang bod gzhung 'ga' zhig gi lung / rmor chen gyi gdugs dkar byad grol lung /
legs ldan mched gsum rjes gnang / gtsug tor dri med lha lnga'i dbang / de'i mchod rten 'debs chog dang / 'od zer dri med kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs chog mkhyen mdzad rnams kyi
lung / gdugs dkar mdos chog slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa/ shAkya dpa' ba'i dbang chog dang lhan thabs sogs khyab bdag zhwa lus pas mdzad pa/ mkhan chen zhwa lu pas
mdzad pa'i gtsug tor dri med kyi sgrub chog gtsug tor dri med lha lnga'i dkyil chog dri med rnam gnyis kyi srog shing 'dzugs chog rmor chen gyis mdzad pa/ satstsha'i sgrub
dkyil 'bring po'i thig rtsa gnas gsar rje nyid kyis mdzad pa/ gtsug tor dri med kyi gzungs bcas kyi lung / gtsug tor rnam rgyal lha dgu'i rjes gnang dang / stong mchod
lung bcas/ gtsug tor 'bar ba dang / gza' yum/ ba ri lugs rnam 'joms/ mi g.yo ba dkar sngon/ dbyangs can dkar mo/ bram

ze phur bu/ sa manta shri'i lugs gnyis/ yang bo dong pa'i lugs rnams kyi rjes gnang / rgya bod kyi gzhung rnams kyi lung / 'od zer dri med lha bcu bdun gyi dbang / de'i lhan
thabs kha skong sogs mkhan chen zhwa lu pas mdzad pa rnams kyi lung / bka' gdams lha bzhi'i rjes gnang khrid lung dang bcas/ phyag rdor gos sngon can/ phyag rdor u tsya/
gtum po khyung lnga/ sme brtsegs ljang dud/ khro mo sme brtsegs rnams kyi rjes gnang dang sgrub skor lung / dzAe ta ri lugs tshe dpag lha dgu'i dbang / a mes zhabs kyi
sgrub dkyil dbang gi mtshams sbyor gyi lung / grub chen mi tra lugs kyi tshe dpag med dkar po'i rjes gnang / lus srung ba'i man ngag gi lung / dpal mo lugs kyi bcu gcig zhal
lha lnga dang gtso rkyang jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang lung bcas dang / rmor mdzad sgrol chog jag ching ra ru ma'i lung / sgrol dkar 'od zer drug bsgrags
kyi rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa/ de'i sgrub skor rgya bod kyi gzhung gi lung / sgrol ma'i man ngag rmi lam brtag pa lha mo shra ma na'i sgrub lung rgya'i khrid bcas/ sgrol
dkar bka' babs dgu ldan gyi rjes gnang ngor mdzad yig skor sogs kyi lung / gnyan sgrol yan lag drug pa/ rta nag lcags ral can/ rta mgrin shwa na bzhi skor/ rta mgrin
khyung gshog can/ rta mgrin pad dbyug can/ ri khrod ma ser mo/ dzam ser nag dzeA lugs dzam dkar rnams kyi rjes gnang dang / sgrub lung bcas/ rnam sras zhi

drag gi be'u bum a mes zhabs kyi dkar chag bzhin gyi lung / rnam sras lnga phrag gsum gyi rjes gnang gi yi ge nor 'dzin dpal mo'i rgyan phreng gi lung / bka' 'gyur ba mgon
po bsod nams mchog ldan gyi rnam sras lnga phrag gsum gyi rjes gnang dngos grub 'dod 'jo/ a mes rnam sras zhi drag gi chos skor dkar chag stag lung ngag dbang rnam rgyal
gyi rnam sras rigs chen brgyad kyi rjes gnang gi chog khrid bstod pa bcas/ des mdzad pa'i a pa ra dzi ta'i rjes gnang gi yi ge dang bcas pa gsan/ ngor chen dkon lhun gyi
yig steng nas rnam sras ser can lha dgu'i rjes gnang yig lung / rmor chen yig steng nas rnam sras snyan grags sgrub dang / a pa ra tsi ta gnyis kyi rjes gnang yig lung bcas/
spyod rgyud la/ sa lo'i yig steng nas 'jam dbyangs dmar ser rjes gnang / de'i yig cha rje btsun ngor chen mus chen sangs rin sa los mdzad pa rnams kyi lung / gong gi
bya spyod dbang sogs kyi rgyab rten du bsam gtan phyi ma/ dpung bzang / legs grub/ gsang ba spyi rgyud de bya spyod rgyud chen bzhi'i lung / rje ngor chen gyi bya rgyud spyi
don gyi lung sogs gsan/ rnal 'byor rgyud la/ kun mkhyen gung ru'i gzhan phan mtha' yas zur 'debs zin bris/ yang des mdzad pa'i zin bris mun sel sgron me rgyas bsdus/
bstod pa'i phyag chen ngor chen gsung la zin bris rnams kyi lung / gzhan phan mtha' yas kyii rnam bshad paN chen nam dbang ba'i

gsung la/ rjes chos dbang / zhe dgon pa chos rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis zin bris su mdzad pa'i rnam bshad dpag bsam ljon pa/ a mes zhabs kyi yo ga chos 'byung bstan pa'i sgo 'byed/
kun bkras kyi kun rig brgyud 'debs rnams kyi lung / bla med pha rgyud la gsang 'dus rgya gzhung mdor byas/ mdo sres/ dkyil chog nyi shu ba/ zung 'jug gsal ba/ spyod
bsdus sgron me/ 'grel pa don gsal rnams kyi lung / bu ston gyi gsang 'dus rgyud 'grel gsang ba'i sgo 'byed/ gzhan yang ngor chen yab sras kun mkhyen rin po che sogs kyis
mdzad pa'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i skor gyi lung sogs gsan/ rgyud sde gong 'og sna tshogs kyi sgrub thabs mang po yar lung grags rgyal kyis phyogs cig tu bsdus pa sgrub thabs
phyed dang nyis brgya'am/ sgrub thabs rgya mtshor grags pa thar paN yig steng nas rjes gnang brgya dang sum cu rtsa brgyad dang / rgya gzhung sgrub thabs nyis brgya zhe
lnga'i lung / nam dpal gyis mdzad pa'i don 'grel ljon shing rin chen snye ma'i lung / ba ri brgya rtsa'am/ sgrub thabs brgya rtsar grags pa'i rjes gnang gong yab rjer gsan
pa'i rgya gzhung sgrub thabs go gnyis kyi lung / phreng ba skor gsum gyi rgya gzhung gi lung bcas gsan/ pha rgyud zhe sdang can gtso bor 'dul ba gshed skor la/ ngor chen
gyi sgrub dkyil dkon lhun lhan thabs/ thar paN gyi mtshams sbyor can gyi steng nas bka' babs gsum ldan gshed dmar lha lnga'i dbang chen/ rdzogs rim shin tu spros med kyi

nyams khrid/ birWa pas mdzad pa'i rgya gzhung rnams dang / glo bo lo tsA ba'i khrid yig spros med rnal 'byor/ rnam rtog 'od gsal gyi khrid yig sems bskyed thabs/ ngor chen
gyi spros med mdzes rgyan/ dkon lhun gyi rgyud 'debs/ rgyun 'khyer kun mkhyen gyi nyams len/ gshed dmar rgyud le'u bcu dgu pa rnams kyi lung / rwa lo'i mngon rtogs dbang
chu/ tshar chen gyi lhan thabs/ mkhyen brtse dbang phyug ngag 'don nag 'gros/ dgon gsar ba'i dbang gi mtshams sbyor rnams la brten nas rdo rje 'jigs byed rwa lugs lha bcu
gsum gyi dbang / gnas gsar ba mkhyen brtse'i khrid yig dang / dbang rab kyi sngon 'gro'i lo rgyus sbyar ba dang bcas te/ rwa khrid mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud kyi nyams khrid/
lo tsA ba ma Ni ka shri dznyA na'i yig steng nas 'jigs byed rnal 'byor bzhi rim gyi nyams khrid/ mkhyen brtse yig steng nas 'jigs byed dpa' gcig rjes gnang / rje shar
khang pa'i yig steng nas dug dbang rma bya dgyes pa/ dkon lhun yig steng nas dam can chos rgyal lha bcu gsum/ tshar chen yab sras yig steng nas las gshin dpa' gcig bse bya
bzhi skor/ khrag mdog yab yum ste rigs gsum gyi rjes gnang / rwa pod dkar chag gi zin pa dang / ma zin pa'i skor/ dpal 'dzin pod bcas kyi lung gsan/ ma rgyud skor la/ grub
chen lo hi pa'i lugs kyi 'khor lo bde mchog mngon rtogs sogs smad lngar grags pa'i rgya gzhung / grub chen de nyid kyis mdzad pa/

grub chen spyod pa bas mdzad pa'i 'khor lo bde mchog gi rgya gzhung nag po gzhung drug tu grags pa dang / rje btsun gyi nag po dkyil chog gi lhan thabs zhwa lugs sangs rgyas
dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i lhan thabs dang / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gnyis / lu hi pa'i mngon rtogs gsal byed thar paN gyis mdzad pa/ des mdzad pa'i nag po lugs kyi mngon rtogs
nag 'gros ma/ dril bu lugs kyi sgrub dkyil/ zhwa lugs pa mkhyen rab rin chen mchog grub rdzogs rim zab mo dmigs gcig pa/ bzang dpal gyi nag po ba'i bskyed rim rnam bshad/
a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i bde mchog lu nag dril gsum gyi bskyed rim rnam bshad/ rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i bstan pa rgyas pa'i nyin byed/ bsnyen thabs rgyas 'bring bsdus
gsum/ mkhas grub ngag chos kyi lu nag dril gsum gyi khog phub/ bsnyen thabs rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum/ nag po lugs kyi bskyed rim rnam bshad 'bring po/ yang rnam bshad
zin bris bde chen theg phreng / a mes zhabs kyi bde mchog sgrub dkyil/ ngag chos kyi dril bu rim lnga'i byin rlabs dang / khrid yig rgyal dbang skal bzang rgya mtshos mdzad
pa'i tshogs mchod kyi lung bcas gsan/ kha che paN chen gyi thugs dam bzhi'i nang tshan bde mchog dkar po'i byin rlabs/ dpyal sa mo gha dang / dbang chen rab/ mus chen
sangs rgyas rin chen rnams kyi khrid yig gi lung / phag dkar shes rab gsal byed kyi byin rlabs/ dpal don jo nang kun dga' grol mchog

rnams kyi yig cha'i lung / ngag chos yig steng nas dpyal lugs phag mo skor byin rlabs yig lung bcas/ tshar chen dang mus chen sangs rin/ byams pa ngag grub rnams kyi yig steng
nas tshe dbang grub rgyal ma yig lung bcas/ 'ba' ra ba rgyal mtshan dpal bzang / mkhyen rab chos rje/ gnas gsar ba mkhyen mdzad rnams kyi zin bris steng nas bskyed rdzogs
la brten pa'i tshe khrid zab mo/ tshar mdzad tshe sgrub zhag bdun ma'i nyams len brgyud 'debs rnams kyi lung dang / dmigs khrid/ gnyis med rgyud skor la/ dkon lhun yig
steng nas 'byung 'dul rjes gnang lung bcas/ kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa'i yig steng nas 'byung 'dul sems dpa' sum brtsegs kyi rjes gnang lung/ dkon lhun yig steng nas sor
phreng dkar mo'i rjes gnang lung bcas/ dbyu gu mched gsum gyi rgya gzhung rnams dang / bod gzhung a mes zhabs kyis mdzad skor rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa gsan/ dus 'khor
skor la/ bu ston rin po che nas mdzad pa'i rgyud kyi bshad thabs/ sgrub thabs 'bring po/ sbyin sreg rgyud 'debs sgrub dkyil sogs dang / rigs ldan rnam rgyal grags bzang
gis mdzad pa'i dus 'khor sgrub thabs/ des mdzad pa'i bdag 'jug rnams kyi lung / bu ston yig steng nas de'i las rgyas lha gsum las sna tshogs yum gyi rjes gnang dang yig
lung / 'phags mdzad rdo rje khyung khra'i rjes gnang bkru byabs gsum dang bcas pa/ mnyam med bzang po rgyal mtshan gyi dkar

chag bzhin khyung pod kyi lung gsan/ lo pa spyan snga kun dga' don grub kyi yig steng nas khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs kyi rjes gnang yig lung gsan/gnyis pa thun mong ma
yin pa'i skor la/ thog mar gsung ngag slob bshad gsan pa'i tshul la tshad ma snyan rgyud bzhi'i sgo nas nges dgos pa las/ dang po bla ma tshad ma'i skor la/ tshar chen
gyis mdzad pa'i bla ma mchod pa'i cho ga dngos grub rin chen bang mdzod/ de'i lhan thabs lta bur rmor chen gyis mdzad pa'i bla mchod bsod nams rgyas byed/ rje btsun gyis
mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs bla ma rdor 'dzin ma kha skong dang bcas pa/ 'phags pas mdzad pa phyag mchod sangs rgyas kun dngos ma/ brag phug pas mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs dang
/ ngor chen gyis mdzad pa'i rnam dag dkyil 'khor ma/ tshar chen dang mang thos klu sgrub rgya mtsho rnams kyis mdzad pa'i brgyud 'debs rnams kha skong dang bcas pa/ bir bstod
a la la ste ma/ sa chen gyis tshangs dbang ma dang / dad pa'i chu rgyun ma/ rje btsun gyi bstod pa srid bral ma sa paN gyis mdzad pa/ sa paN gyi sku bstod yar klungs
pa byang chub rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa/ 'phags bstod gtsang nags phug pas mdzad pa/ ngor bstod rab dkar ma rong ston gyis mdzad pa/ ngor bstod sde snod ma mus chen sems
dpa' chen pos mdzad pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i bstod pa bdag chen chu mig pas mdzad pa/ bdag chen rdo rje

'chang sku bstod rab dkar blo gros ma/ rdo ring pa'i bstod pa mtha' yas ma/ de'i bstod pa bdud dpung phye 'thag ma/ bdag bstod blo gsal mang thos ma/ 'khrungs rab gsol 'debs
rnams tshar chen gyis mdzad pa/ tshar chen rdo rje 'chang gi bstod pa bkra shis mtshan bzang ma 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang phyug gis mdzad pa/ mkhyen brtse'i bstod
pa rab yangs ma tshar chen gyis mdzad pa/ dbang rab bstod pa dus gsum rgyal ba rang nyid kyis mdzad pa/ bla ma rgya bod kyi rnam thar rje btsun gyis mdzad pa/ sa chen gyi
rnam thar dang / slob dpon rtse mo'i rnam thar gsol 'debs khyod nyid ma dang / tshangs spyod ma bcas rje btsun gyis mdzad pa/ yang rtse mo'i rnam thar tshar chen gyis mdzad
pa/ rje btsun gyi rnam thar thun mong ba sa paN gyis mdzad pa/ rnam thar mnal lam ma/ sna ro bande gshin rje grags kyis mdzad pa/ sa paN gyi rnam thar 'phags pas mdzad
pa/ 'phags pa'i rnam thar shar chen ye rgyal bas mdzad pa/ tshogs sgom pa'i rnam thar gnyag snying po rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa/ gnyan chen po'i rnam thar dkar grag pa
rin chen sengges mdzad pa/ dkar brag pa'i rnam thar rang nyid kyis mdzad pa/ zhang dkon mchog dpal ba'i rnam thar dpal tshul bas mdzad pa/ rgyal ba brag phug pa'i rnam
thar blo gros bstan pas mdzad pa/ chos rje bla ma dam pa'i rnam thar dpal tshul bas mdzad pa/ blo gros bstan pa'i rnam thar dpal tshul bas mdzad pa/ dpal

ldan tshul khrims kyi rnam thar bungngha shrIs mdzad pa/ bungngha shrI'i rnam thar ngor chen gyis mdzad pa/ ngor chen rdo rje 'chang dgung lo don bzhi yan dang / mya ngan 'das
byung bcas mus chen gyis mdzad pa/ yang ngor chen gyi rnam thar rgyas pa mkhas grub sangs rgyas phun tshogs kyis mdzad pa/ mus chen sems dpa' chen po'i rnam thar gung
ru shes rab bzang pos mdzad pa/ bdag chen rdo rje 'chang / rje btsun rdo ring pa gnyis kyi rnam thar tshar chen gyis mdzad pa/ sgo rum pa'i rnam thar gnas gsar ba mkhyen
brtse dbang phyug gis mdzad pa/ tshar chen gyi rnam thar gong sa lnga pas mdzad pa/ rje tshar pa'i lam glu/ mang thos klu sgrub rgya mtsho/ gnas gsar ba 'jam dbyangs mkhyen
brtse dbang phyug gsum gyi rnam thar so sos mdzad pa/ mkhan chen bslab gsum rgyal mtshan gyi rnam thar dbang rab kyis mdzad pa/ sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel gyi
rnam thar rang nyid kyis mdzad pa/ dbang rab/ mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan mkhan chen zhwa lu ba gsum gyi rnam thar gong sa lnga pa rin po che nas mdzad pa/ bod khar ba'i
rnam thar spyan snga chos kyi rgya mtshos mdzad pa / gzhon nu blo gros kyi rnam thar slob bu blo rgyan gyis mdzad pa/ mkhan chen ngag chos pa'i rnam thar rgyal ba byams
pa ngag dbang rnam rgyal gyis mdzad pa/ yang de'i rnam thar bsdus pa rgyal rtse bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa/ mkhyen rab bstan 'dzin bzang po/ mkhyen rab byams pa
ngag dbang lhun grub/ rmor chen rdo rje 'chang

gsum gyi rnam thar so so'i zhal gsung ma/ bla ma dam pa'i brgyud rim rnam thar ngo mtshar snang ba/ bar ston gyis mdzad pa'i brgyud pa'i rnam thar zhib mo rdo rje/ rje btsun
rin chen nas mdzad pa'i bka' drin mtshungs med ma/ tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i gsung ngag brgyud pa'i bkra shis rdo rje 'chang dbang rnams kyi lung /gnyis pa nyams myong
tshad ma'i skor la/ gzhung ji lta ba bzhin bkrol ba'i nyams khrid kyi dgongs don tshar chen rdo rje 'chang gi gsung ji lta ba bzhin 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses zin bris su
mdzad pa'i khrid yig gsang chen bstan pa rgyas byed kha'u brag rdzong pa'i bzhed pa ma nor ba la gzhir byas/ bum dbang gi rmi lam man 'phror lus pa/ gong sa lnga pa rin
po che nas mdzad pa ltar dang / de la gsung bshad dgos pa rnams ni/ mang thos klu sgrub rgya mtsho'i snang rgyud kyi khrid yig sogs nas rgyas par kha bskangs/ sgro 'dogs
gcod pa'i skabs/ 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsung ngag byung tshul zin bris kyi steng nas bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam thar rgyas pa gsung ngag dbang gi chu bo ma nub pa sogs
bzhi po 'di tshogs slob gnyis char ma dgos shing / slob bshad par 'chad tshul thun mong ma yin pa yang yod cing / snyan brgyud dang po ni rgyu 'bras gsum gyi dbang gi chu
bo ma nub pa/ gnyis pa ni rdo rje 'chang nas rtsa ba'i bla ma'i bar du byin rlabs kyi brgyud pa ma nyams pa/ gsum pa ni sarga zhes pa rgyud dang man ngag giman gyi go
rim ma

'chol ba/ bzhi pa ni bsam pa tshim pas rtogs pa rgyud la skyes pa/ lha dang bla ma gdams ngag bcas par gzhan rkyen gyis 'phrog mi nus pa'i mos gus rgyud la skyes pa ste bzhi
yin zhing / de yang snyan rgyud gsum pa'i go rim ma 'chol ba zhes par/ 'brel ma brtags par dbang mi bskur/ dbang (ma)bskur bar gdams ngag mi 'chad/ de ma bshad par gzhung
mi sbyin/ de ma sbyin par sgrub pa'i lung dang gsang ba bcu gnyis rgyas mi gdab pa/ 'khrul zad gong ma rnams kyi phyag len rnam par dag pa yin la/ khrid tshul yang rgyud
dang man ngag gi dgongs pa mthun par/ lam thun mong bas rgyud sbyangs nas sngags lam la 'jug pa'i thog mar bdag chen rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yi ge ltar brgyud pa'i khyad
par gnyis ldan gyi sems bskyed/ de nas gong ma'i phyag len ltar slob ma rjes 'dzin bsags sbyang gi dmigs khrid bcas phab nas/ slob dpon gyi kha gso'i ljags bsnyen ring
thun bzhir bcad pa'i bsags sbyangs dang / de grol phral smin grol gnyis kyi dang po bcom ldan 'das dges pa rdo rje lha dgu'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor chen por mus chen
sems dpa' chen po'i mngon dkyil bya bral mar/ tshar chen rin po che'i lhan thabs sbyar ba'i zhal shes phyag len gyis brgyan te/ slob bshad pa'i khyad chos gzhan dang ma
'dres pa/ slob ma re re nas dbang stegs rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag pa nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba sogs mtha' shin tu chod pa 'di skabs sbyang gzhi
sbyong

byed ngo sprod tshul sogs slob bshad kyi khyad chos rnams sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel gyi 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma'i dbang bshad bzhin dang / 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i
zin tho bzhin aShTA'i bzlas lung dang bcas pa gsan/ de nas dbang dus su thob pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa mi nyams shing srung tshul ston pa rje btsun rin po che rtsa ltung
'khrul spong glegs bam pod ser ma'i dkar chag gi zin pa dang / bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gi 'khrul spong rab gsal rnams la gsung bshad rgyas pa sa gzhung spel ba'i lung
dang bcas pa/ dam tshig skor la dogs pa bcad pa/ paN chen shaka mchog gis mdzad pa'i steng nas mtha' dpyad rgyas par stsol ba gsan/ rgyun du bza' ba'i bdud rtsi ril bu
sgrub tshul rje btsun gyis mdzad pa'i gsal byed bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis badzad pa/ khyad par gyi za ba'i dam tshig tshogs 'khor 'bring po rje btsun gyis mdzad pa/ rtsod
spong sa paN gyis mdzad pa/ 'phags pas mdzad pa tshogs 'khor bdud rtsi bum pa/ khyab bdag bka' 'gyur bas mdzad pa'i tshogs 'khor chog khrig ma/ rje btsun gyi he ru ka'i
chas drug gi yi ge slob dpon bsod nams rtse mos mdzad pa'i chos la 'jug pa'i sgo sogs chos nyan pa'i kun spyod ston pa/ mngon rtogs yan lag bzhi ba rtse mos mdzad pa/
mngon rtogs 'bring po yan lag drug pa rje btsun gyis mdzad pa'i tshig sna ring thung gnyis yod pa las thung ba/ des mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i mngon rtogs/

slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo'i dbang chu chen mo/ des mdzad pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhib tu bstan cing rnam gzhag mdor bsdus pa/ de las 'phros pa'i las bzhi'i sbyin
sreg cho ga mdor bstan cing rnam gzhag rgyas pa rje btsun gyis mdzad pa/ des mdzad pa'i dus mtha'i cho ga slob dpon bsod nams rtse mos mdzad pa'i rab gnas bzang po drug
pa/ rje btsun rin po che nas mdzad pa'i rab gnas don gsal rnams kyi lung / dbang gi ye shes la log rtog 'gag cing 'og nas 'byung ba'i lam thams cad skyon med du sgrub slad/
kun gzhi rgyu rgyud la 'khor 'das dbyer med lta ba'i khrid sa gzhung spel ba'i bshad pa/ lam tsam ma yin pa/ 'khor 'das dbyer med rtsa 'grel dang bdag chen rdo rje 'chang
gi khrid yig dang bcas pa'i steng / sems tshol sogs slob bshad thun mong ma yin pa'i lugs ltar rig thog tu brdar sha bcad ma/ thabs rgyud dbang bzhi dang rje 'brel
lam gyi thog ma rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma'i dbang bzhi yongs rdzogs bzlas lung bcas/ gong du thar rtse rje dang 'og sarga bcu gsum par sengge rgyal mtshan las gsan/ bum
dbang dang 'brel ba phyi bskyed rim sems 'dzin gyi nyams khrid shin tu smin pa gsal snang ma thob par sgom par mdzad cing / de'i rgyab rten du chos rje bla ma dam pas
mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa/ mus chen gyi mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa bya bral mar grags pa/ des mdzad pa'i dbang chu gsal ba'i me long / des

mdzad pa'i sta gon gyi so shing sogs kyi dgos pa bshad pa/ tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i lhan thabs nor bu'i phreng ba/ ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i kyai rdor sgrub
thabs rnam bshad bskyed rim gnad kyi zla zer/ tshar chen gyi bskyed rim rnam bshad nyi ma'i 'od zer/ gnas gsar ba mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i bsnyen chen gyi yi ge dpyid kyi
dga' ston/ des mdzad pa'i bsnyen pa'i kha skong sbyin sreg rnams kyi rang gzhan gyi don gang bsgrubs kyang phyin ci ma log par shes pa'i rdo rje slob dpon du bsgrubs nas
phyi rol tu zhen pa'i gdon gnyen por nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi don dam lus kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gi yig steng nas lam dus kyi dbang gi chu bo ma
nub pa/ bla ma dam pa'i lus dkyil gyi dbang 'og na tho tsam yod pa'i steng nas lam dus 'bring bsdus kyi dbang / yi ge brgya pa'i bzlas lung dang bcas pa gsan nas/ phyi nang
bskyed rim gyi dus bsgom bya'i don la thos bsam gyis sgro 'dogs gcod pa tshar chen chos rje'i legs bshad nyi zer dang / skal bzang snying gi padmo bzhed pa bcas pa'i bshad
pa gsung ngag nas shin tu rgyas pa/ de thun dkyil chog rab gnas sbyin sreg ro sreg thams cad la zin thun gyi mtheb 'dzugs sprad pa'i gsung bshad bcas sgro 'dogs bcad
pa/ dpyad don nyams su len pa sems 'dzin gyi nyams khrid smin rgyas lam dus su nyams len rje mus chen gyis mdzad pa/ lam dbang bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa bcas

kyi lung / gsang dbang gi lam gyi thog mar bdag med ma'i byin rlabs mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyi yig steng nas dang / bdag byin rlabs khams 'dus pa dang po gtum mo'i
dmigs rkang bco brgyad kyi rim pa'i nyams khrid/ khams 'dus pa bar ba pho nyid lam mam dkyil 'khor lo dga' bzhi lugs 'byung ldog gi nyams khrid khams 'dus pa tha ma skyon
med gnyug ma ye shes kyi lam mam rdo rje'i rba rlabs kyi khrid/ re re la'ang lam lta ba grub mtha'/ 'da' kha ma bar do rmi lam/ sgyu lus dang bcas pa'i dbang po rab 'bring
tha ma'i lam cha tshang ba re slob bshad thun mong ma yin pa ltar shin tu smin pa bshad lung tsam ma yin par bsgom bya'i don la thos bsam sgro 'dogs legs par chod pa
gsan/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug dngos kyis sa skya pa chen po kun dga' snying po la dngos su bstsal ba'i man ngag sa skya'i lcags ri las mi 'da' ba bzhi'i nang tshan lam zab
phyi nang gnyis/ bir srung thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa rnams kyi byin rlabs ngag chos yig steng nas dang/ de'i nyams len sa paN/ mus chen bdag chen rdo rje 'chang
sogs kyis mdzad pa/ ngor chen gyis mdzad pa'i bir srung gi byin rlabs/ srung ba'i dmigs rim/ sngon chad zhal shes kho nar bzhugs pa'i bir srung gsar pa'i dmigs khrid gnas
gsar pa mkhyen mdzad yig steng nas/ bla ma rin 'byung gi byin rlabs dang / de'i nyams len tshar mdzad kyi lung / mkhyen mdzad yig steng nas tshar gsum

khug pa dang / brda don gsal ba'i byin rlabs/ ngag chos yig steng nas lam sbas bshad kyi byin rlabs 'og mus chen bsod nams dpal bzang las gsan pa ltar dang / man ngag gces
bsdus kyi rten 'brel srung ba'i byin rlabs/ kun mkhyen bsod nams sengge'ie yi ge ltar rnam 'joms bir lugs byin rlabs/ man ngag rnam rdzogs pa'i mthar brda chig brgyud/ sgrub
pa lung byin/ gsang bcu'i rgyas gdab pa'i byin rlabs/ mkhyen brtse'i zin bris steng nas gsan/ bstan pa gtad cing bka' bsgo ba mgon rkyang gi rjes gnang khyab bdag bka'
'gyur pa'i reg gzigs steng nas legs par gsan/ gzhung bshad mnyag mar sa gzhung spel ba'i bshad pa dang / lung sbyor bzhi dang sbyar ba'i rgyud rkyang man ngag gi bshad
pa rnams legs pa gsan/ de rnams kyi rgyab rten du bstan bcos tshad ma dang 'brel ba'i lung thob pa'i skor la/ gsung ngag rin po che glegs bam na bza' gyi mtshan las pod ser
mar grags pa rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi dkar chag bzhin yongs su rdzogs pa'i lung dang / rje sa skya pa chen pos zhu ba so so'i ngor gsungs pa'i rnam
'dren bcu drug tsam mdzad pa las rigs sras slob dpon rin po che sku mched gnyis kyi don du mdzad pa rnam 'grel sras don mar grags rdo'i gsung byin rlabs shin tu che ba/
'on kyang de skabs 'di'i ljags lung dngos su ma gsan gsungs/ dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i na bza'i

mtshan las glegs bam pod nag mar grags pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs la/ bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam thar ngo mtshar snang ba/ phyi dkyil gyi mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa/ lam dbang
bskur ba'i tshul zab las ches zab pa/ yang lam dbang gi nyams len dge bshes kun rgyan gyi ngor mdzad pa/ lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor yar klung seng rgyal gyi ngor mdzad
pa/ yang lam zab kyi yan lag mdo stod pa chos rgyal 'od zer gyi ngor mdzad pa/ lam 'bras kyi gzhung ji lta ba bzhin gyi khrid yig sbas don gsal ba/ gnad bcu gcig dang / gnad
drug/ dbang po rab 'bring gsum gyi sgo nas bkri tshul gyi khrid yig re re/ gzhung bshad man ngag gi mdzod rnams so/ /gsung ngag glegs bam na bza'i ming la po ti dmar
chung du grags pa rgyal tshab kun dga' dbang phyug gi dkar chag bzhin yongs rdzogs kyi lung / gzhan yang ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i
bshad thabs kyi gdams ngag gsang ba'i sgo 'byed/ rgyud gsum lam rim bsdus don/ lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor/ rgyu dus kyi dbang gi rtogs bskyed/ bir srung gi man ngag bar
chad kun sel/ sku'i rnam 'gyur drug gi dbye ba/ bir srung thun mong ma yin pa'i byin rlabs bya tshul tshigs bcad ma/ de nyid nyams su blangs tshul/ lus dkyil rtsod spong
/ lta ba ngan sel gnyis tshogs 'khor rnam bzhag gsang ba kun rgyan dang kun bzang rnam rol gnyis/ phyi bskyed rim gyi rnam bshad zla zer/

sa chog mdor bsdus/ rgyud gsum gnod 'joms/ gtor chog phrin las rgyas byed/ phyi nang bskyed rim dang lam dus nyams su len tshul tshigs bcad ma/ mngon rtogs tshul bcu bzhi'i
sdom/ bstod pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa/ dkar chag tu mi gsal ba/ des mdzad pa'i bir srung gsar ma srung zlog gi gdams pa khyad par can rnams so/ /mus chen sems dpa' chen pos
mdzad skor la/ lam zab nyams len/ bskyed rim grub mtha'i shan 'byed/ lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gnad kyi gsung sgros zin bris/ gsung ngag rin po che'i dmigs rim gyi yi
ge lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi byin rlabs dang / nyams su len tshul dang bcas pa rnams so/ /bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad skor la/ lam dbang bskur tshul/ lam zab
thun mong ba'i nyams len/ bdud rtsi ril bu sgrub tshul/ rdo dril rnam bshad/ dam tshig rnam bshad 'khrul spong rab gsal/ 'khor 'das dbyer med kyi lta ba'i khrid yig/ lam
sbas bshad kyi zin bris rnams dang tshar chen gyi gsung bzhin rje mkhyen brtse'i zin bris su mdzad pa'i lam 'bras slob bshad kyi khrid yig gsang chen bstan pa rgyas byed/
kha'u brag rdzong pa'i bzhed pa ma nor ba'i skor la/ khob thub rnam bshad las gsung ngag byung tshul zin bris/ 'byung ba'i chos la bshad sgrub bya tshul zin bris ni/
snang rgyud phyi nang bskyed rim rnams kyi khrid yig bum dbang gi rmi lam man gyi khrid yig gong sa lnga pa rin po che nas

mdzad pa dang / kun mkhyen mkhas pa'i dbang pos mdzad skor la/ bskyed rim man ngag rnam bshad/ lus kyi rnam bshad/ lam dbang kun bsod/ bir srung thun mong ma yin pa'i byin
rlabs/ dbang chu bde chen rgya mtsho/ snang gsum gsal byed/ gzhung ji lta ba bzhin bkri ba'i gtor ma'i rnam bshad/ dbang chu chen mo'i sa chog gi gsal byed/ sam bu Ta'i bsdus
don/ gzhung bshad a seng ma'i 'grel pa/ gsung ngag chos 'byung gi kha skong bstan pa rgyas pa'i nyin byed gnad kyi zla zer la rtsod spong / rab gnas dge legs rgya mtsho
rgyud kyi tshig don gyi dogs gcod/ lam 'bras bla ma brgyud pa la yan lag bdun pa 'bul zhing gsol 'debs/ lam rim phun tshogs dge legs ma/ bde can smon lam mi mjed ma/
rnam 'joms bir lugs kyi byin rlabs/ rten snying sa spo ba'i ar chog gson pa'i skra sen sreg chog tsha chog rnams so/ /mus chen sangs rgyas rin chen gyi gsung ngag rin po
che khrid yig dngos grub kun 'byung gter/ des mdzad pa'i kun mkhyen rnam thar/ bdud rtsi ril bu sgrub pa'i phyag len gyi yi ge rnams dpal sa skya pa kun dga' bkra shis kyis
mdzad pa'i bdud rtsi ril bu'i sman tho/ mkhas grub sangs rgyas phun tshogs kyis mdzad pa'i gsung ngag 'chad tho gnad kyi lde mig dang/ e waM gdan rabs nor bu'i phreng
ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa klu sgrub rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i skor la / gsung ngag slob bshad brgyud lam rim byin rlabs kyi pho nya/ spyi don khog

phub kyi legs bshad/ snang gsum gsal byed zla ba bdud rtsi'i thig phreng / sngags lam khrid yig nyi gzhon gsar pa'i thig phreng / skal bzang utpal gzhon nu'i kha 'byed la nang
gses/ lta khrid phyi nang bskyed rim/ nyams myong lta ba phyag chen ngo sprod bogs 'byin spyod pa dang bcas pa/ bum dbang gi 'da' kha ma/ bar do/ rmi lam/ sgyu lus kyi
khrid/ lam gtum mo tsaNDa li khams 'dus pa dang po'i khrid/ thig le bde stong gi nyams khrid khams 'dus pa bar ma'i khrid/ skyon med gnyug ma'i ye shes la brten nas khams
'dus pa mtha' ma'i khrid kyi lung dang bcas pa/ brda don gsal ba'i byin rlabs kyi yi ge dang bcas pa rnams so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dkon mchog lhun grub kyi mdzad skor
la/ snang gsum khrid yig mdzes rgyan/ mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa mdzes rgyan/ lus kyi mdzes rgyan/ gtor chog mdzes rgyan/ dbang chu mdzes rgyan/ sa chog gsal byed/ thig
mchog byin rlabs/ rdul tshon chu bo spyan 'dren tshul/ brgyud pa'i khyad par gnyis ldan gyi sems bskyed cho ga man ngag lugs kyi slob ma rjes 'dzin bya tshul/ dbang bshad
rgyas pa lung dang man ngag gi gter mdzod/ bsdus pa lung dang man ngag gi snying po bsdus pa/ lam zab thun mong ma yin pa'i nyams len tshigs bcad ma/ tshar gsum khug pa'i
nyams len/ bdag med ma'i sgrub dkyil tho yig gsung ngag rin po che dmigs rim dang mthun pa'i gsol 'debs zab don snying po/ gsung ngag rin po che'i

lam gyi smon lam bdud rtsi thigs pa/ man ngag gi brda 'grol zab don snang ba/ gzhung ji lta ba bzhin dkri ba'i khrid yig tshigs bcad ma/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi lag len gsal
ba'i me long / de la ltos pa'i las bzhi sbyin sreg gi tho/ rdo rje tshig rkang gi bsdus don/ brgyud pa'i khyad par gsol 'debs kun khyab rnams so/ /mkhyen rab nas brgyud
pa slob dpon bdag chen rdo rje 'chang nas rje bla ma'i bar kha skong dang bcas pa/ gsung ngag chos 'byung 'phro can/ 'dren mchog chos kyi rgyal po ratna waradha'i rnam thar/
sa lo 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bsod nams kyi rnam thar/ dpal kyai rdo rje'i bzlas pa dmigs lam sogs nyi shu'i sdom/ zhal ngo tshig brgyud kyi gsung rgyun zhal gyi drod ldan
rdo rje 'chang dbang rab kyis mdzad pa/ gsung ngag rin po che'i skabs kyi slob ma rjes su 'dzin tshul kha'u brag rdzong ba'i phyag len tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po'i
gsung rgyun ji lta ba/ gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i skabs su nye bar mkho ba'i zin bris rnams so/ /paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i yi
ge'i skor la/ slob ma rjes 'dzin gyi phyag len nyams su blang bde ba/ aShTA'i bzlas lung byed tshul lugs gnyis/ brgyud pa'i khyad par gnyis ldan gyi sems bskyed kyi cho ga
dam pa'i bzhed srol sems nyid ngal gso'i bdud rtsi/ tshar gsum khug pa'i byin rlabs bya tshul gsang chen chos kyi rnga chen/ lam dbang gi mtha' dpyod zur 'debs kyi gnad/
rdo rje bdag med ma'i byin rlabs

bya tshul legs byas gtam gyi bdud rtsi/ lam zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor gyi byin rlabs bya tshul mkhas la nye bar mkho ba/ bla ma rin 'byung gi nyams len byin rlabs dang bcas
pa'i 'dod dgu'i dpal 'byor ma lus pa 'byung ba'i gnas legs byas kyi rnga bo che/ lam zab nang gi rnal 'byor gyi byin rlabs mkhas la nye bar mkho ba/ bir srung thun mong

bya tshul/ gnyis las gsum byung gi go don dang bcas pa/ lam sbas bshad dang brda tshig brgyud kyi byin rlabs bya tshul gnyis go bde bklag chog tu bkod pa/ sgrub pa lung

snying po'i legs bshad/ rgyuud gsum snying po'i legs bshad/ yang des mdzad pa'i gsung ngag rin po che'i lo rgyus dang / dmigs pa'i gnad cung zad bshad pa kha'u brag rdzong
pa'i bzhed pa nas 'thor ba dang bcas pa rnams so/ /thar rtse paN chen nam mkha' dpal bzang gis mdzad skor la/ dus mtha'i cho ga gzhan phan mtha' yas/ rgyas dbang drag gsum
gyi sbyin sreg bya tshul/ bir srung thun mong ba/ brda don gsal ba/ brda tshig brgyud sgrub pa lung sbyin dang bcas pa'i bya tshul yi ge rnams so/ /a mes

zhabs kyi sngags 'chang chen po'i rnam thar 'bring po/ rab gnas don lhun ma/ thub bstan mkhan chen bstan pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa'i kyai rdo rje'i bsnyen pa bya tshul gsang don
rab gsal/ yang des mdzad pa'i gsung ngag khrid yig sngags 'chang kun bkras kyis mdzad pa'i lam zab nang gi byin rlabs bya tshul/ yang des mdzad pa'i khro bcu'i srung 'khor
mdzad byang med pa/ de'u lo tsA bas mdzad pa'i rnam 'joms bir lugs kyi byin rlabs bya tshul/ yang des mdzad pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dus mtha'i cho ga dang bcas pa/
e waM sgrub khang pa dpal don gyis mdzad pa'i las bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi rnam bshad shin tu rgyas pa ye shes me dpung / 'jam dbyangs kun dga' legs grub kyis mdzad pa'i rje
btsun rdo rje bdag med ma'i lha mo bco lnga'i mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa byin rlabs 'byung ba/ de'i lus dkyil sgom tshul dang byin rlabs bya tshul gnyis/ rje sangs rgyas
dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i mngon dkyil lhan thabs/ mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan gyis mdzad pa'i gsung ngag gnang tshul gyi zin bris 'gor sgrub pa'i bsnyen pa
la gzhan phal cher snga ma dang 'dra ba yod pa/ mtha' mdor bsdus pa de tsam gyi don ma tshang ba med pa yin zhing / res yod pa'i shooog gcig la rmor chen ngag dbang kun

gis mdzad pa/ yang des mdzad pa'i rab gnas kyi cho ga 'phrin las rab tu rgyas byed rnams so/ /gsung ngag dang rjes 'brel lam skor phyi ma brgyad du grags pa slob dpon tog tse
pa'i bsam mi khyab/ klu sgrub kyi mchod rten drung thob/ nag po spyod pa'i gtum mo lam rdzogs/ nag po 'chi ba med pa'i dpyid kyi thig le/ inDa bho dhi'i phyag rgya bzhi

po/ phag mo zhal gnyis ma'i rgya gzhung gong rmor chen rje'i dkar chag nang bzhin gyi lung gsan/ dmar mo skor gsum las sgyu 'phrul drwa ba chen mo ral pa gyen brdzes kyi

pa'i rjes gnang / mkhan chen ngag dbang

padma Da ki 'e be'u bum gnad kyi lde mig bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das ma ku ru ku lle be'u bum dkar chag gi zin pa dang / ma zin pa sa ngor tshar gsum gyi phyis byon dam
