/ dbang phyug rab brtan gyi gcig shes kun grol/ rje tshar chen gyi gtor chog pho nya myur 'gyogs kyi lha brgyad mkha' 'gro thun mong ba'i rjes gnang / yar klungs ba'i yi
ge dang / thar paN yig steng nas lha bcu gnyis thun mong ba'i rjes gnang / tshar chen gyi gtor chog myur 'gyogs dang / mkhyen brtse'i tho yig steng nas dus gcig la chig brgyud
las mi gnang ba'i lha brgyad thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / 'jam dbyangs grags pa'i sgrub thabs bdud las rnam rgyal dang / mkhyen brtse'i zhabs kyi tho yig dbang
rab kyi gcig shes kun grol rnams kyi steng nas/ dus gcig la chig brgyud kho nar gnang ba'i mgon po lha bcu gnyis thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / dbang rab yig steng
nas gur lha brgyad steng du zangs gri can bsnan pa'i lha dgu'i rjes gnang bka' rgya shin tu dam pa/ rje tshar chen gyi tho yig paN chen ngag dbang chos grags kyis mdzad pa'i
yi ge dbang rab kyi gcig shes kun grol rnams la rten mgon po khro bcu thun mong min pa'i rjes gnang / bka' rgya shin tu dam pa/ mus chen sangs rgyas rin chen gyi yi ge
ltar

lha mo dud sol ma'i phyi sgrub thun mong min pa'i rjes gnang / rngon ston bsod nams bstan 'dzin gyis mdzad pa'i yi ge ltar/ dpal ldan lha mo dud pa'i sol ba can gyi gsang sgrub
thun mong min pa'i rjes gnang nan chags mar grags pa bka' rgya shin tu dam pa lung bcas/ tshar chen gyi zin tho dang brgyud pa'i gsung sgros ltar ber nag zangs gri can
gyi rjes gnang / yar lung pa'i yi ge dang gcig shes kun grol la brten nas pu tra ming sring gi rjes gnang chig brgyud bka' rgya bcas rdo ring pas mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs
dang / 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i yi ge dang brgyud pa'i gsung bgros rgya na bran bdud gshin rje nag po'i rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa/ mngon rtogs gang bzhin la/ tshar
chen chos kyi rgyal po'i yi ge ltar bran bdud thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / snyan rgyud gnyis pa gdams pa'i skor la rje btsun rdo ring pa'i khrid yig dang / de'i
lhan thabs kyi tshul du mkhyen brtse dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i yi ge dang / zhwa lu pa gsum gyis yi ge mdzad pa la brgyud pa'i zhal shes sogs kyis brgyan zhing / chos 'byung
khog dbub sogs kyi gsung bshad rgyas pa dang bcas phyi khrid srung 'khor rdo rje'i brag rdzong ma'i nyams khrid zab mo sngon 'gro thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa/
dngos gzhi zab pa'i gnad lnga dang / khyad par gyi man ngag sde 'degs pa'i sgo drug nas srung ba/ spyi dngabye brag khyad par gyi bzlog pa bcas/ khyad par thun mong ma
yin pa'i man ngag rdo kha

nang tshan/ dam tshig 'khor lo gsang ba'i brag rdzong ma sems nyid ye shes kyi rtsa don pa 'khor lo gser chung du grags pa chig brgyud ma/ gong gi sa bcad kyi ma zin pa'i nang
gi brag rdzong ma/ drag po sngags rgod kyi man ngag gi khrid sogs gdung rgyud rim par chig brgyud du byon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i nyams khrid rdo rje nag po chen
po'i nang khrid dam gsang khrid du grags pa 'di ni nang rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga dang / gsang ba sems kyi gnad la brten nas sgrub pas gsab sgrub tu grags shing / tshe gcig
zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang 'thob par byed pa rje btsun pas sam/ mkhas grub ngag dbang chos grags dang thams cad mkhyen pa mkhyen brtse dbang phyug gi khrid
yig yid bzhin nor bu la gzhir byas/ yig chung zhal shes sogs kyis brgyan te sngon 'gro skyabs sems yi ge brgya pa/ bla ma'i rnal 'byor dngos gzhi'i rten bskyed rim/ brten
pa rdzogs rim rdo rje lus la gnad du bsnun pa/ rlung sngags rdor bzlas kyi sgo nas sgrub pa'am 'bad pa/ las sbyor thun mong ma yin pas spyi dgra dang / rnal 'byor dgos dgra
sgrol ba/ 'khor lo bzhi la brten pa'i las sbyor sogs gdung rgyud kho na la chig brgyud du bzhugs pa rnams legs par gsan nas/ snyan brgyud gsum pa'am rgyab rten lung gi
skor/ thog mar mgon pod me 'bar mar grags pa bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gi dkar chag bzhin dang / der ma 'dus pa rnams kha skong glegs bam du grags pa tshar chen chos kyi
rgyal po'i

dkar chag bzhin dang / snyan brgyud thun min skor tshar chen rdo rje 'chang gi phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa'i glegs bam de nyid dkar chag bzhin dang / der ma 'dus pa phyis byon
bla ma dam pa rnams kyis mdzad skor rnams phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs par mdzad pa nas snyan brgyud yang glegs bam du grags pa rmor chen chos kyi rgyal po'i dkar chag bzhin
dang / lo tsA ba gyi ljang dbu dkar ba nas brgyud pa rnams tshar chen chos rje'i dkar chag bzhin dang / lha mo dud sol ma'i pod tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po'i dkar chag bzhin
yongs su rdzogs pa'i lung gsan pa sogs snyan brgyud bzhi shugs las byung ngo / /gzhan yang brgyud rim sogs zhib tu rtogs par 'dod na gsan yig chen mo ltar ro/ /dpal
sa skya pa'i mgon po che chung gnyis su grags pa gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa rgyud las gsal bar bstan cing / 'phags pa'i yul du slob dpon klu sgrub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
srung ba/ ri sul gyi rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa rnams la bka' bab cing bstan pa srung ba/ gangs ljongs 'dir bla ma gnyan lo tsA bas spyan drangs te gnam kha'u pa brgyud nas
sa chen bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras rnams la bka' bab pa'i bstan srung dbang po mgon po zhal bzhi pa'i skor la/ snyan brgyud dang po gser gyi maNDal
dang bcas rten 'brel bsgrigs nas snyan brgyud gnyis pa'i skor la rjes gnang dang / gdams pa'i dngos

gzhi gnyis/ dang po la thar paN yig steng nas sam/ gnyan lo'i gnad yig dang / dga' ldan pa kun bsod kyi yi ge tshar chen chos kyi rgyal po'i rjes gnang gi yi ge dngos grub
rgya mtsho dang brgyud pa'i phyag len la brten nas bsnyen dus kyi mgon po'i rjes gnang / pho nya myur mgyogs dang rjes gnang gi yi ge gong ma rnams la brten nas sgrub dus
thun mong ba'i rjes gnang yi ge de gnyis dang / tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i bka' rgya ma la brten nas sgrub dus thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / rjes gnang gi yi ge gong
ma dang mthong brgyud kyi phyag len 'bri snon ltar 'bum phrag gsum pa'i gdangs snyan gyi dngos grub rgya mtsho dang / gsang ba thun mong rjes gnang gi yi ge la brten nas
phyag len gsung rgyun ltar gsang khrid kyi rjes gnang / las bzhi'i rjes gnang la/ ngag chos kyis mdzad pa'am mkhyen brtses mdzad pa la brten nas/ dkar po tshe 'phel thun
mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / dkar chag na bzhugs pa'i las bzhi'i mngon rtogs rjes gnang gi yig chung / dngos grub rgya mtsho'i gsung rgyun phyag len ltar dkar po tshe
'phel thun mong ba/ ser po rgyas byed lha dgu/ ser po rgyas byed lha lnga/ dmar po dbang sdud/ drag po dgra bgegs sgrol ba rnams kyi rjes gnang / dngos grub rgya mtsho dang
mthong rgyud phyag len bri snon la brten nas shi sa bstan pa'i rjes gnang / yig cha dngos gzhi dang tshar chen gyi zin tho la brten nas gnad dbab kyi mgon po'i rjes gnang
/ rje

mkhyen brtse'i zin tho ltar khyung zhal can nam dmag dpon mgon po'i rjes gnang / rje tshar chen gyi zin tho la brten nas mgon po che chung sogs slob bshad gdams pa phal cher
rdzogs mthar bstan pa gtad pa'i tshul gyi bram ze sngags gtad kyi rjes gnang rnams gsan nas/ snyan brgyud gsum pa gdams ngag dngos la man ngag gser 'gyur gyi rtsi lta bu'i
nyams khrid/ lung gnyis las dang po la/ rje tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i srung 'khor tshe sgrub dang bcas pa'i rgyun gyi nyams len mar grags pa'i yi ge zhal shes la brten
zhing / sngon 'gro gsang khrid nas kha bskangs te phyi nang gi srung 'khor 'chi med sgrub pa zhar byung bzlog pa dang bcas pa'i phyi'i nyams khrid zam mo tshar mdzad khrid
yig gzhir byas/ dbang rab kyis mdzad pa'i lhan thabs yig chung zhal shes kyis brgyan te sngon 'gro rnams dang / dngos gzhi 'khor lo gzhi ldan gyi bsnyen sgrub thun mong
dang thun mong ma yin pa'i las sbyor/ zhar byung ma grub na snyogs choog dang bcas pa/ tshe 'di nyid la gzung 'dzin gyi rtsa mdud grol te gdod ma'i rgyal sar khrid par
byed pa'i gsang khrid kyi nyams len khrid zab mo dang / zhing skyong dbang po 'khor bcas byang chub snying po'i bar du snying dbus su 'bral med du bzhugs nas mchog thun
dngos grub thams cad 'bad med du stsol ba'i dmar khrid dpal ldan sa skya pa'i gdung rgyud kho na la chig brgyud du bzhugs pa'i nyams khrid rnams legs par gsan nas/ gnyis
pa rgyab rten lung dang phyag bzhes man ngag dang

bcas pa'i skor la dkar chag gi zin pa dang / ma zin pa'i skor la/ dang po tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i chos skor dkar chag gsung rgyun padma ra ga'i srad bur brgyus
pa'i zab don nor bu'i do shal bzhin yongs rdzogs kyi lung / gnyis pa dkar chag gi ma zin pa'i rigs dang / snying thig ha la nag po'i skor bcas tshang ma phyag khrid
du gsan pa dang / brgyud rim bcas zhib tu rtogs 'dod na gsan yig chen mo bzhin no/ /gnod sbyin beg rtse 'khor mang dang / lcam sring gi rjes gnang gsan nas/ beg pod bka'
gter gnyis las/ dang po la spyi dang bye brag gnyis/ dang po la/ lo rgyus/ rjes gnang rgyud/ sgrub skor nyer mkho/ ru tshon gzungs 'dzugs/ bstod bsgo/ las tshogs dang brgyad/
gter ma gnubs nyang gnyis bcas be'u bum gyi tshang ma'i lung / khyung nag rjes gnang / sgrub skor rnams kyi lung dur bdag rjes gnang / rgyud gsang ba snying gi 'khor
lo sogs/ bkras stobs pa'i mdzad skor sogs be'u bum yongs rdzogs kyi lung / dbang gi sgrol ma dmar mo'i rjes gnang / seng gdong dmar mo'i rjes gnang lung bcas/ rdo rje nag
po chen po phyag bzhi pa lha mang gi rjes gnang lung dang / mkhas grub khyung po'i bka' srung mgon po phyag drug pa dgos bka' bcu gsum gyi rjes gnang / mgon po snying zhugs
thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu'i rjes gnang / rgyab rten lung skor mkhas grub ngor chen sangs

rgyas phun tshogs phyogs gcig tu sgrub skor man ngag rnams kyi lung / rmor chen yig steng nas dmag zor ma'i rjes gnang lung bcas/ zhwa lugs bstan srung lha mo rdo rje rab brtan
ma'i rjes gnang sgrub skor gyi lung / legs ldan nag po stag zhon lha lnga'i rjes gnang lung / bu lugs mgon po seng dmar gyi gtso 'khor gnyis kyi rjes gnang lung / phyag
rdor khang brtsegs dang / zhang blon rdo rje bdud 'dul gyi rjes gnang / tshe ring mched lnga'i rjes gnang yig lung bcas/mkhas grub khyung po'i zab chos ni gu chos drug
gsan skor la/ dang po smin byed la sgyu lus dbang mo che'am/ rgyud sde lnga rtsa bsdus kyi dbang / chos drug dgos bka' drug/ phyag chen bka' lnga/ gsang sgrub skor lnga/
mkha' spyod skor gsum/ mkha' 'gro ma su kha siddhi'i byin rlabs rnams dang / 'jag zam rnam gnyis kyi khrid yig steng nas rtsa ba ni gu chos drug yal ga lam khyer rnam gsum/
'bras bu lus sems 'chi med/ sdong po phyag chen ga'u ma'i khrid yig rnams brgyud pa'i phyag bzhes kyis brgyan pa dang / gong rnams 'chad thabs kyi yi ge'i rigs sogs
dang / rgyab rten gzhung pod bcas kyi lung bka' srung mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu dang / phyag drug mgon po lha mang gi rjes gnang bar chad kun sel bcas gsan no//gnyis pa
gsang sngags snga 'gyur skor la/ mnyam med bsam gtan

gling pa'i yang phur gtso bo gyur pa'i a ti chos skor yongs rdzogs kyi lung / gong sa lnga pa'i dkar chag bzhin/ rta mgrin yang gsang lha dgu'i dbang chen/ 'chi med tshe'i
rdzogs chung gi dbang / gyi lnga gza' gdong srog gtad/ rta pod yongs rdzogs kyi lung / rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi byin rlabs dang/ sgrub skor yongs su rdzogs pa'i lung / chos
rgyal srong btsan sgam po'i ma Ni bka' 'bum du grags pa gsan skor la/ 'dod bum nas byung ba'i thugs rje chen po 'gro 'dul phyag bzhi pa'i dbang zab khrid rgyab rten lung
la/ grub thob dngos grub gyi gter thon chos skor tshang ma'i lung / thun mong gi las tshogs dang / mnga' bdag nyang gi gter ma zhal gdams rnams dang / sprul sku shAkya
'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i skor rnams kyang zhib par gsan/ nyang gter thugs rje chen po mig 'byed gdams pa'i lung sogs gsan/ smin gling sgrub thabs 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang
yongs rdzogs/ bla ma zhi drag tshe lha/ rta phag bstan srung / nor lha'i skor sogs tshang ma'i dbang rjes gnang / yig lung bcas gsan/ byang gter thugs sgrub drag po rtsal
rgyas 'bring gsum dbang dang byin rlabs tshe dbang lcags sdong ma bcas dang / rgyab rten lung la/ thugs sgrub chos tshan gyi dkar chag rje blo bzang don grub kyis mdzad
pa bzhin gyi lung / thugs sgrub rnam gsum tshes bcu'i chog sgrigs dbang rab kyis mdzad pa'i lung / kun bkras kyi thang rgyal chos sgrub kyi lung / 'ja' tshon snying

po'i dkon mchog spyi 'dus kyi dbang lung / kha thor sna tshogs pa'i skor la/ rta mgrin skyer sgang bsnyen yig 'jam dbyangs grags pas mdzad pa/ gter ston nyi zla sangs rgyas
kyi 'pho ba 'ja' zug ma/ rig 'dzin srog grub las padma dra ba'i gling gi smon lam/ rtse le sprul sku'i ri chos res mdzad pa'i dkon mchog spyi 'dus dang / bla ma drag po/
rtsa gsum dbang chog rgyas pa rnams kyi lung / padma phrin las dbang phyug gi gsung rgyun tshe sgrub drag seng gnyis kyi dmigs rim rnams kyi lung / dkon mchog spyi 'dus
zhi drag seng gsum las tshe sgrub bcas rgyan chos skyid gdams pa'i lung / zhal gdams gser gyi phreng ba'i lung / sprul sku rgya zhang khrom gyi gter ma/ ban bon gyi byad
bzlog hrI dmar gshin rje yang snying gi sgrub skor rnams kyi lung / rigs 'dzin gter bdag gling pa'i mda' o dkar brag nas spyan drangs pa'i/ bla ma drag po'i dbang bzhi/ gtor
dbang dregs pa'i srog dbang sgrub skor lung / yang des brag dmar g.ya' ma lung nas spyan drangs pa'i/ zab chos rig 'dzin thugs thig gi dbang bzhi gtor dbang tshe dbang
/ de'i skor gter chos tshang ma'i lung / yang des ngom shod gnam lcags brag gi zab don gter theg dgu'i yang rtse/ rdor sems thugs kyi sgrub pa'i dbang / rig pa'i rtsal
dbang / btags grol rgyud drug gi byin rlabs/ lung la rdzogs chen a ti zab don snying po'i skor tshang ma gsan/ btags grol gyi dbang chog gong sa lnga pas mdzad pa dang /

rgyud gsang ba snying po'i lung / rdzogs pa chen po sems nyid ngal pod le'u bcu gsum pa/ de'i 'grel pa shing rta chen po/ spyi don ngal gso skor gsum gyi lung / rdo rje phur
pa bka' ma'i 'grel pa 'bum nag gi lung / sprul pa'i lo tsA ba'i rnam thar 'dra 'bag tu grags pa'i lung / gter kha 'og ma'i kha 'bar ma dkar mo la brten nas 'chi ba bslu
ba/ kha 'bar ma nag mo la brten nas ltas ngan sri dang byad kha bzlog pa/ kha 'bar ma khra bo la brten nas kha smras bzlog pa rnams kyi lung / gter chen bzang po grags kyis
rgyang yon po lung nas spyan drangs pa'i gsol 'debs le'u bdun ma'i lung / gter bdag gling pa'i gsang ba'i rnam thar gyi lung / o rgyan gling pa'i padma'i rnam thar rgyas
pa padma bka' thang grags pa dang / thang yig sde lnga'i lung / grub dbang thang stong rgyal po'i rnam thar lnga bsdus lo chen gyis mdzad pa'i lung / rgya gar nub phyogs
kyi dzo ki karma na bas mkhyen brtse dbang phyug la phul ba'i gu ru mtsho skyes rdo rje sku gsum sgrub thabs kyi lung / rdor brag pad phrin gsung nor chog skor dang /
byang grol gser sde'i chog sgrigs sogs kyi lung / gnyis pa de thams cad kyi rgyab rten lung la gnyis/ mkhas grub rnams kyi bstan bcos dang / bdag cag gi ston pa'i bka' gnyis
las/ dang po 'jam mgon kun dga' grol mchog zhabs kyis bstan pa'i khur bzhes te/ ris med

gang yod nang nas zab khrid brgya rtsa phyogs gcig tu bsgrig pa'i jo nang khrid brgyad (brgyar)grags pa/ thog mar sa skya pa'i zhen pa bzhi bral nas dang mtsho ras pa'i sems
khrid yid bzhin nor bu'i bar la brgya dang bdun/ brgya dang brgyad par khrid brgya'i mtshan tho/ lo rgyus/ spyi chings brgyud 'debs bcas pa ste gong gsal rnams kyi lung
khrid dang / de byings rnams kyi lung gsan/ kha che paN chen gyi sangs rgyas stong bstod skal bzang rgyan phreng gi lung / bka' gdams glegs bam du grags pa yig sna nga drug
gi lung / khro phu lo tsA ba'i man ngag brgya rtsar grags pa'i glegs bam gyi lung / bu ston gyis mdzad pa'i bstan pa chos 'byung dang / a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i sa
skya pa'i gdung rabs chen mo'i lung / g.ya' bzang ba'i phyag rdor nyi ma gdung gang ma'i sgrub skor rnams kyi lung / dpal sa skya'i chos spyod rab gsal shog grangs brgya
dang dgu'i lung / sngags 'chang chen pos mdzad pa'i srung 'khor brag rdzong ma/ sa los mdzad pa'i mgon po drug cu ma'i gtor bzlog yan lag rnams dang / a mes zhabs kyi bde
mchog chos 'byung / rab gnas don lhun ma/ sngags 'chang chen mo'i gtor bsngo chen mo rnams kyi lung / rong ston gyis yum la gnang ba'i 'pho dmigs/ mkhyen rab byams lhun
gyi bya tshul dang bcas pa'i lung / thub bstan mkhan chen ngag dbang bstan rdor gyis mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen po la brten/ spros bcas spros med kyi 'pho ba gdab tshul/
rgyud 'debs

bcas kyi lung / rje dge 'dun rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i dpal ldan dmag zor ma'i gtor ma la brten pa'i zhi rgyas dbang gsum/ drag las rim gsum dang bcas phyogs gcig tu bsdebs pa/
gtor chog bskang bstod dang bcas pa'i lung / nyi sbas lugs kyi sgrol bstod rnam dag gtsug nor ma'i lung / des mdzad thugs rje chen po'i dmar khrid bsdus pa/ dpal chen rga
los mdzad pa'i klu gtor/ rje btsun grags pa'i sil gtor brgya rtsa/ de'i gdams tshig kha skong dang bcas pa thar paN gyis mdzad pa/ yang des mdzad pa'i chab gtor/ klu gtor/
a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i rtsi dmar dang bse khrab gsol mchod phan bde kun 'byung / rtsi dmar gsol kha thub bstan kun khyab ma/ sngags 'chang bstod pa byin rlabs char
'bebs ma/ kun mkhyen bu ston rin po ches mdzad pa'i spyi yi chos 'byung / chos spyod rnam mkhyen bgrod lam/ dus 'khor gsang 'dus bde mchog rnal 'byor rgyud 'du ba rnams
kyi chos 'byung lung gsan/ gu ge paNDi ta grags rgyan bde mchog sogs zhal gyi mngon dkyil lung / kha rag sgom chung bas ang yig bdun cu pa'i lung / rgyal rtse ngag dbang
rgyal mtshan gyi mkha' spyod ma'i bsnyen yig mnga' ris pa tshul 'od kyi rigs gsum spyi'i dkyil chog gnyis kyi lung / ngag dbang kun dga' legs 'byung gis mdzad skor la/
rdor sems bsgom bzlas bya tshul/ rnam 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs tshigs bcad/ rig byed ma'i dbang dang byin rlabs/

bka' bsgo byed tshul/ gnod sbyin beg rtse dang / dkar bdud bstod pa/ sgrol dkar dang khyung khra'i sgrub thabs/ rnam sras kyi bskang ba bsdus pa rnasas kyi lung / rje btsun
mi la'i rnam mgur yongs rdzogs/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam thar dge slong rnam snang btsun pa skal bzang chos kyi rgya mtsho bsod nams dbang po sdes mdzad pa/ rgyun
du gsungs pa'i smon lam lan gtam rong ston chen pos mdzad pa/ kun rig gi zin bris yid kyi mun sel shes bzang gis mdzad pa/ sa phun bla ma sgrub bsnyen/ a mes zhabs kun
rig sgrub dkyil dbang sogs le las rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdebs pa gzhan phan lhub grub kyi gsung / mkhyen rab byams pa ngag lhun gyis mdzad pa rdo rje rab brtan ma'i gsol
kha/ byams pa rdo rje dbang rgyal gyis mdzad pa'i gtor chog bcas kyi lung / phyi nang rig gnas skor gsan tshul/ sgra mdo pa Ni gzhung 'grel ba dang bcas/ yang de'i 'grel
ba legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta phun gling par ma nang bzhin phyag bris sogs gsan/ gso rig rgyud bzhi'i lung gsan pa bcas gong gsal rnams kyi brgyud yig rnam
grangs sogs zhib pa gsan yig gzhan las rtogs par bya'o/ /sa skya pa'i bstan 'dzin bu slob 'gran bral 'khrul zad rnams kyi bka' 'bum sogs kyi lung gsan skor la/ thog mar
rgyal ba'i lung gis zin pa'i skyes bu chen po ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gi bka' 'bum pod bzhi yi

lung / mus chen sems dpa' chen po'i bka' 'bum lung tshang ma/ kun mkhyen go ram pa'i sngags 'bum pod bzhi/ mus chen sangs rgyas rin chen gyi gsung gi lung / tshar chen rdo
rje 'chang bka' 'bum phal cher gyi lung / gong sa lnga pa'i gsan yig nang bzhin dang / 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang phyug gi gsung 'bum phal cher ba'i lung / gong sa lnga
pa'i gsan yig bzhin bris pa/ gong sa lnga pa'i gsung 'bum nang nas dmar po skor gsum/ gur zhal rnams kyi man ngag dang / 'khor lo'i gsal byed rnams dang / nA ro mkha'
spyod kyi khrid 'chad thabs/ lam 'bras slob bshad kyi khrid kyi kha skong sa lugs skor pod gnyis kyi lung / ngor chen sangs rgyas phun tshogs bka' 'bum pod bzhi dang / rmor
chen rdo rje 'chang gi bka' 'bum cha tshang dang/ gong gsal de thams cad kyi rgyab rten du rgyal ba'i bka' gangs can du 'gyur ro cog gi lung dag gsal snyan gsum gyi sgo
nas gsan pa 'di sprul pa'i gandho la bzhugs pa'i rgyal yum dam pa/ chos rje bco brgyad mas sa bstan rin po che thebs su bskrun pa gser chos 'di thog nas dngos rjes gsum
tshang ba gsan pa/ rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi bka' las mi lus tsam po thob pa gcig la don yod par song zhes yang yang bka' bstsal pa sogs de rnams gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang
las gsan skor rnams song / brag rtsal rdo rje 'changablo gsal bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho dpal bzang po las/ dbu ma lugs kyi sems bskyed/ blo

sbyong don bdun ma'i khrid/ jo lugs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal nyer gcig gi rjes gnang / sgrol chog lung sgrol dkar thun mong ba dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i 'od zer drug sbrags
dkar nag gi rjes gnang / man ngag lung sogs bcas tshang ma/ phyag drug mgon po bka' bcu gsum/ mgon po snying bzhugs rnams kyi rjes gnang lung bcas dang / a ra pa ra tsi
ta/ rnam sras drag sgrub/ mgon po phyag bzhi lha mang / stag zhon lha mo/ rdo rje rab brtan ma/ dmag zor ma'i las gsum rnam bzhag g.ya' bzang ba'i gza' bcos/ phyag rdor nyi
ma gdung gang ma'i skor/ jo nang lugs kyi khrid brgya/ lung bskor/ bu ston mkhas grub dge legs dpal bzang sogs kyi gsung thor bu/ mar ma'i rnam mgur sogs kyi lung / khro
phu brgya rtsa las yig sna brgya re gnyis tsam dang / rong ston gyis yum la gnang ba'i 'pho dmigs/ kha rag sgom chung ba'i ang yig bdun bcu pa/ jo nang ta ra na tha'i
sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brgya nyer lnga pa/ rje dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i thugs chen sems nyid ngal gso dang / tshems bu lugs kyi dmar khrid sogs rab tu mang ba dang / rnying
ma'i skor la/ smin gling 'dod 'jo bum bzang gi dbang lung tshang ma/ byang gter byin rlabs thugs dbang / thugs sgrub chos 'khor pod gnyis kyi lung / gter bdag gling pa'i
zab gter tshe sgrub/ yang snying kun bsdus kyi dbang khrid/ chos skor pod kyi lung / yang de'i zab gter gras smin gling rdor sems kyi

dbang dang chos skor gyi lung / gter ston 'ja' tshon snying po'i yang zab/ dkon mchog spyi 'dus kyi dbang lung khrid gsum/ tshe sgrub lcags kyi ri bo'i dbang la sogs pa snga
phyir chos bka' rgya cher gsan pa de dag gi nang nas kyang sngon dus gdung brgyud rim par/ chig brgyud dang / dus phyis kha'u brag rdzong pa'i lugs sam/ tshar lugs su grags
pa'i gsung ngag slob bshad/ nA ro mkha' spyod dmar po skor gsum/ mgon po che chung rnams bdag chen rdo rje 'chang sogs gong ma de rnams slar yang dngos phebs pa lta
bus ljags bshad phyag len zhib rgyas dang bcas bstsal/ de thams cad kyi rgyab rten lha chen gandho la'i dri gtsang khang na bzhugs pa'i gser chos chen mo'i steng nas rgyal
gsung bka' 'gyur rin po che yongs rdzogs kyi ljags lung dag gsal snyan gsum gyi sgo nas gsan/ brag rtsal rdo rje 'chang blo gsal bstan 'dzin rgya mtsho dpal bzang po las/
dbu ma lugs kyi sems bskyed/ blo sbyong don bdun ma'i khrid/ jo lugs sgrol ma phyag 'tshal nyer gcig gi rjes gnang / sgrol chog lung / sgrol dkar thun mong ba dang / thun
mong ma yin pa 'od zer drug sbrags kyi rjes gnang rnams khrid lung skor bcas pa/ sa 'jam sbags sgrub byin rlabs/ gshed dmar lha lnga'i dbang / nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i
byin rlabs tshar lugs dang chos nyid dngos bstan gyi byin rlabs/ sngon 'gro mkha' spyod ma'i nyams khrid/ be'u bum gyi lung dang / slob bshad lugs

kyi dges rdor lam dbang / gur mgon gyi srung 'khor/ brag rdzong ma'i phyi khrid/ rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga la brten pa'i gsang khrid/ mgon dkar tshe khrid/ bran bdud/ gtsir bu/
zhal sgrub dus dur bdag rnams kyi rjes gnang / rgyud pod kyi lung sogs gsan/ 'di rnams gnas gsar rjer ma gsan 'dra snyam/ tshe dbang lcags sdong ma/ tshe rta zung 'brel/
rta mgrin skyer sgang lugs/ gser chos dzam dmar/ beg rtse lcam sring / rnam sras rigs can bco lnga rnams kyi rjes gnang / rnam sras be'u bum pod gnyis kyi lung / rgyal
sras thogs med bzang po dpal gyi gsung 'bum gyi lung dang / gong dkar ba rje bsod rnams blo gros la bde mchog dril bu lugs phyi dkyil dang / yab chos dpal chen yang dag
lha dgu'i dbang / kyai rdor DoMmbhi lugs kyi dbang / stod bum zhal stegs ma nas/ gur mgon lha bcu gnyis dang / lha gsum/ dpal mgon rtse zhal can rnams kyi rjes gnang / brda
don gsal ba dang sgrub pa lung sbyin gyi byin rlabs sogs gsan/ngor e waM chen po 'jam mgon sangs rgyas ye shes las/ bya rgyud tshe dpag med lha dgu'i dbang dang / rnam
'joms ba ri lugs/ snar thang brgya rtsa'i rjes gnang / sgrub skor gyi lung / bla med sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang / sgrol ma btsun ma'i dbang / grub chen brgyad cu'i
byin rlabs lung bcas/ 'jigs byed sa lugs/ gsang 'dus

'jam pa'i rdo rje/ bde mchog lu hi pa/ bde mchog bong zhal can/ mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor/ spyan ras gzigs padma drwa ba rnams kyi dbang chen/ tshe dbang
grub rgyal ma/ che sgrub zhag bdun ma'i lung / dges rdor bka' babs bzhi yi dbang chen/ 'jam nag dang tshe dpag med sprul sku'i rjes gnang / sgrub dkyil rnams kyi lung
/ rnal 'byor rgyud rdor dbyings kyi dbang chen/ grub thob tshe dbang / sde dge par steng nas sa skya bka' 'bum yongs rdzogs kyi lung dang / ngor chen dkon mchog lhun grub/
sgrub khang pa dpal ldan don grub/ mkhan chen bkra shis lhun grub gsum gyi gsung 'bum gyi lung gsan/ gong dkar rnam mkhyen grong pa chos dbang rgya mtsho las gzungs grwa
lnga lha lnga bcu rtsa bdun gyi dbang chen/ sgrol dkar bka' bab dgu ldan gong lugs rjes gnang / tshe khrid bcas/ bya rgyud gza' yum lha bcu bzhi/ gdugs dkar lha nyer bdun/
rnal 'byor rgyud rdo rje rtse mo dang / dpal mchog gnyis kyi dbang chen/ gong gsal de rnams kyi sgrub dkyil/ kun rig gzhan phan mtha' yas/ rnam thar dpag bsam rin chen
gter mdzod/ rdo rje phur pa'i mngon dkyil sogs thor bu mang po'i lung / bla med la/ gur rigs 'dus lha bzhi bcu zhe lnga/ rnam 'joms bir lugs lha bdun cu don lnga/ 'jigs
byed ro langs brgyad skor/ 'jigs chen skyo lugs lha zhe dgu ma gong lugs lha bcu gsum ma rnams kyi dbang chen/ bla ma

dam pa'i yig steng nas dus 'khor byis 'jug gong ma gong chen bdag po chen po bcas kyi dbang chen sogs gsan/khyab bdag zhwa lu pa ye shes grags pa dpal bzang po las/ spyod rgyud
rnam snang mngon byang 'chi med rnga sgra lha dgu rnams kyi dbang chen/ dus 'khor rtsa rgyud/ 'grel chen dri med 'od dang / dus 'khor gyi sgrub dkyil bu ston/ sbyor
drug brgyud 'debs/ khrid yig rdo rje rnal 'byor gsal ba/ gcer mthong ngo shes dbang mdor bstan gyi TI ka dri med 'od kyi TI ka/ bshad thabs nges don snyem/ las brgyad/ brgyad
pa'i las chog rtsa brgyud las gsungs pa'i phan gnod drug cu pa'i sbyor ba/ 'dod pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'i lde mig lnga bsdus gza' lnga/ gza' lnga'i myur rtsis/ go la rnam
bzhag dus sbyor gyi dris lan rnams kyi lung bcas gsan/ ngor chen dpal ldan chos skyong las/ bya rgyud dzAe ta ri'i lugs kyi tshe dpag lha dgu'i dbang / rjes gnang skor
la/ grub chen mi trA dzo ki nas brgyud pa'i tshe dpag med dkar po/ ba ri lugs kyi rnam 'joms/ mi g.yo ba dkar sngon/ klu dbang lha lnga/ rnam rgyal lha dgu seng ldeng nags
sgrol gtso rkyang / phyag 'tshal nyer gcig gras zhi ba chen po/ sgrol dkar bka' bab dgu ldan/ sme brtsegs ljang dud gnyis/ sengge sgra rnams kyi rjes gnang / rnal 'byor
rgyud la/ phyag rdor 'chi bdag 'joms pa lha bcu gsum gyi dbang / bla med skor la/ phyag rdor

utsya/ 'byung 'dul/ seng gdong sngon dmar gnyis/ khyung nag khyung khra gser chos dang / man ngag lugs gnyis rnams kyi rjes gnang / tshe dbang grub rgyal ma/ tshe rta zung

rjes gnang / mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu dang / phyag drug nag po/ bran bdud/ zhal bzhes bsnyen dus/ mgon po trakshad lcam dral/ legs ldan stag zhon 'khor mang / beg rtse
lcam sreng / dur bdag las gshin lha bcu gsum rnams kyi rjes gnang gsan/ yongs 'dzin gong dkar ba bsam gling bkra shis don grub las/ gdugs dkar lha nyer bdun ma'i dbang chen/

bcas pa/ chos kyi rgyal po tsong kha pa chen po la 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis dngos su gnang ba'i 'jam dbyangs chos skor gyi nang 'jam dbyangs dpa' gcig 'jam dbyangs lus dkyil/

dag phal che ba zhig ni sgom pas thugs nyams su bstar zhing / de las gzhan rnams kyang nyung mthar lan re gnyis 'chad spel ma mdzad pa med par/ de la brten nas spyi bye brag
