sku mchog brnyes su zin pa'i rje rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kyang kun rdzob ltar snang dang bstun par mdzad de/ snyun babs lci bar bzhes rung / spyi bye brag gi bsod nams
kyi mchod sdong chen por 'gyur med rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin du mdzad pa'i sku drin yang bskal par gzhal ba'i go skabs dang bral/ de lo'i gro bzhin badzra kI la pa'i sgrub
mched dbu rtse rnying mar tshul shing rtsa 'chams nang du mdzad nas grub mtshams sa tshogs su mdzad chog dang nad thag phal cher khrums zla'i nang chod nas sgo rum steng
'og sogs su gtang rag mdzad de/ zla sked tsam la zhal ngo zhabs phyi rags bsdus bcas kha'u zhes pa pi cing gi skad du bzang po zhes pa dang / spo khu'u zhes pa ngan
pa zer ba'i brda ste gong bzang po'i yul grur bdud rtsi sman chab la phebs te/ dbyug zla nas lam 'bras kyi 'gro rgyu dbang nas bzung bstsal ba dang / rjes 'brel rtsa rgyud
brtag gnyis sogs gdan sa chen po 'di nyid na chos spyod bskang skor bcas mang du gsan pa sogs/ zla gsum tsam gyi ring chos char bdud rtsi'i zil dngar 'bebs par mdzad pa'i
rgyu lam dbang gi bka' sgrub sogs kyi skabs rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyis kyang zhal rgyas mdzad pa lags/ de skabs kyi bar seng rnams la yab rje mchog dang/ dbu byed ye
shes rgyal mtshan/

brtson 'grus ye shes sogs las bde kyai gsang gsum sogs gdan sa chen por bzhugs pa'i phyag len dbyangs rol sogs gsan sbyongs mtha' chod pa bka' drin bskyangs/ smin zla tsam
la nad 'khrun yongs rdzogs chod nas/ mgo zla'i bde mchog sgrub mchod dang dus mdos sogs rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs 'gan bzhes shing / dus mdos kyi nyer gsum nyin gang
gi yab rje dam pa nyid 'tshams sku rnams la snyan shal 'bul bar phebs nas/ gral gsham du tshogs phyag mdzad pa'i tshe/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhugs khri'i steng mi
tshud pa lta bu'i 'tsher nyams byung zhes bka' stsal to//dgung grangs bcu gsum du phebs pa lcags bya rta zla'i nang tsam nas/ gang gi yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid snyigs ma'i
snang tshul la thugs skyo ba'i bka' kho na bstsal to/ /ring min chab bsags kyi snyung tshul bzhes/ yum sras rnams nas zhabs brtan rgya cher 'bad sgrub mdzad kyang / phyogs
dgon ris med du gshegs rdzong dgongs rdzogs rgya cher gnang tshul/ mi ring bar thugs dgongs rdzogs thabs rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i gdung rten da lta rigs
'dzin lha khang na bzhugs pa 'di dang / lo zla dus kyi mchod sprin rgyun 'dzugs mdzad pa rnams/ gdung rabs rnam thar zhal skong du ji ltar gsung pa bzhin dang / zla ba de'i
tshes 'gor mgon khang khag bzhir phrin 'chol/ sngon 'gro'i yab rje'i bsti gnas phun tshogs 'chi med rdo rje'i gur khang du/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid dpal kyai rdo rje'i

gzhi bsnyen la bzhugs stan 'jags pa ste/ 'di ni gzhi bsnyen thog ma'i skabs so/ /smin zla'i nang thar rtse rdo rje 'chang gis tshoms dmar du spu zhu mdzad pa'i nub mo rje rdo
rje 'chang nyid la bla mas rjes bzung gi mtshan ma 'di ltar 'khrungs te/ gser khang steng gi nam mkha' nyin zla'i 'og tsam nas/ 'ja' sprin dmar po'i dbus su yab rje de
nyid sku mdangs dmar zhing sngags chas sku bem dmar po dang sa zhu bzhes shing g.yon skyabs sbyin/ g.yas gos dmar la lam zab bir srung sogs kyi phyag dpe yin dgongs pa zhig
dril nas/ sku 'khris kyi nye gnas brgyud rje rdo rje 'chang nyid la bstsal nyams can bzhugs pa la/ bzhugs g.yab g.yam skyor shar 'khris na'ang yab rje de nyid bzhengs
nas nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i yab rje rang gi sku la bshad pa mdzad pa zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ dus phyis rje rdo rje 'chang nyid rje btsun sa skya pa'i gser chos kyi mtshon snyigs
ma'i dus 'dir yongs rdzogs bstan pa rin po che'i mnga' bdag mdzad pa la 'gran zlas dben par 'byung zhing / skyabs gnas kun 'dus yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyis rnam
kun rjes su 'dzin pa'i brda yang dag par gdon mi za zhing / de dus spur sgam nas gdung rus phran bu zhig rje nyid la byon pa ni/ phyis su gdung 'dzin gyi go sar bzhugs dgos
kyi brdar ngos 'dzin mdzad cing / de nas rje nyid kyi gdan sa chen po'i sbyin bdag 'ga' zhig grub thob dang grub rgyal gyi tshe dbang tshar kha shas yang dag par stsol
ba'i dus su tshe chang phyogs

kun tu lud par gyur to//dgung grangs bcu bzhir phebs pa chu khyi lor/ thar rtse rdo rje 'chang nam mkha' bsam 'grub kun dga' mtshan dpe'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i drung
du dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa yang dag pa bzhes/ de'i dus su mtshan 'bul rgyu'i tho rengs thar rtse ba chen por bud med sngon mo pi wang sgyur bzhin pa zhig gis ngag gi dbang
phyug kun dga' blo gros bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes lung bstan pa bzhin du mtshan gyi mnga' gsol pas/ rjes su rje nyid kyi gsung las/ kho bo la sngags 'chang
gos dkar can du dgos pa'i brda de dus nas byung zhes yang yang gsungs/ de nas mi ring bar mkhan po dbang phyug phun tshogs/ kun dga' zla 'od/ nam mkha' sangs rgyas grags
pa/ kun dga' sangs rgyas sogs las slar yang thub pa 'od zer 'gyed spyan 'dren gyis mdo las khyim pa rnams ni me 'obs na gnas pa lta bu'o/ /rab tu byung ba rnams ni bsil
khang na gnas pa lta bu'o/ /zhes dang / klu sgrub kyis/ khrims ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sa bzhin du/ /yon tan kun gyi gzhi rten lags par gsungs/ /zhes dang / sum brgya
par/ nyon mongs dgra yul rgyal byed tshul khrims te/ /dge tshul brtul zhugs chu lon rtsig pa dang / /'chi ba'i mche ba 'byin par byed pa'i thabs/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub
dpal nod dbang bskur yin/ /zhes sogs gsungs pa rnams thugs mtshor bskyil nas rab tu byung bar

mdzad do/ /sngar gyi mtshan gyi steng du sangs rgyas bsnan pas/ de nas bzung ngag dbang kun dga' blo gros sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes snyan grags
don ldan khor yug ri bo'i khongs su'ang rgyu ba de nyid yongs su grags par gyur cing / de lo gdan sa chen po'i phur sgrub kyi tshogs dpon 'gan bzhes mdzad pa nas bzung skabs
'ga' ma gtogs lo khams nang du 'khod min la ma ltos par rnam pa kun tu'o/ /dbyug zla'i nang rje btsun sa skya pa'i yab chos bcon ldan 'das snying po kyai rdo rje man
ngag lugs kyi smin byed kyi dbang cha lnga zhal ngo rnams dang / las tshan khag chos grwa nyi zla zung gi dge 'dun bcas la bstsal ba de ni smin byed kyi dbang gi dkyil 'khor
du zhal slob rjes su bzung ba'i sgo dang po dang mgo zla'i dus mdos chen mo'i tshogs dpon gyi thugs khur yang bzhes shing / brag rtsa rdo rje 'chang blo gsal bstan 'dzin
rgya mtsho'i sku drung du gong du bstan pa'i rjes gnang / lung sogs mang du gsan/ de nas sde dge dpon bsod nams mgon po chibs bskyod kyis nyer bdun nyin gdan sar 'byor
nas dus mdos ma grol bar gang 'tsham gyi bdag rkyen yang dag pa bka' gsang gis gdams so//dgung grangs bco lngar phebs pa chu phag rgyal zla'i 'gor gong gi mdo smad sa
skyong chen po nas zhal rgyas kyi dga' ston dngos 'bul rmugs 'dzin dbang po'i gan mdzod zhal dbye ba lta bu sngon 'gro'i legs skyes gya

nom pa stob par mdzad / skabs 'dir zhu 'os 'di dag kyang gleng ste/ rje rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid ni/ bla ma gong ma rnams kyi rnam thar la zang zing gi dngos 'bul 'di
dang 'di brjod nyog can du so sor mang du smos pa dang / don yod med la ma ltos par skye bo phal pa mang po'i ming bkod pa dang / brjod don bla ma de de'i ngo mtshar med
pa'i rjod byed mdzes mtshon can dang / ngo mtshar che chung ji ltar yang yin lugs drang po mi bkod par a pha'i gsol zhal gtsang ma'i dpe bzhin/ sgro btags mang du bsnyad
pa rnams la ni rnam pa kun tu mi dgyes pa mdzad tshul rnam thar chen mo las gsungs 'dug pa ni kun gyi tsittar bcangs dgos/ de nas khong dpon g.yog sogs la kyai rdo rje man
ngag lugs kyi dbang chen 'ga' dang grub thob dang ras chung ba'i tshe dbang / sku dngos rnams la sgo rum ye shes mgon po'i sku drung du/ gur lha brgyad kyi rjes gnang
dang sbrags bka' bsgo sogs thugs 'dod kyi re ba yongs su chos kyi sgo gnas khengs par mdzad/ de nas dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan po dang ldan na mthong thos dran reg kun don ldan
du 'gyur ba'i dri gtsang khang rnams su mchod 'bul/ gnas gzigs/ bsngo smon sogs yang dag pas mtshams sbyor rnams mdzad / gdan sa nas 'thon nye'i phebs phyag sogs lugs
gnyis kyi bdag rkyen yang dag pa bstsal nas/ bla ma gong ma rnams kyi phyag len phra mo tshun chad mi nyams dar rgyas su mdzad pa'i dam bca' thugs kyi dpal

ber dam du bzung ste/ bde kyai gsang gsum/ bdag med ma/ mkha' spyod ma sogs gdan sa chen po'i tshugs sgrub mchod rnams kyi rdo rje slob dpon nar mar bka' drin che ba'i bar
'tshams rnams su dbang bskur/ rjes gnang / lung sogs chos 'chad kyis dus 'da' bzhin gnas/ sa zla stobs kyi mgon po rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi dus chen dang bstun rgyun gyi
bza' ba'i dam tshig bdud rtsi ril bu sgrub pa'i sngon du kyai rdo rje'i ljags bsnyen kha gso bdun phrag dang / chig sgrub thog mar gnang skabs phye ma dang de nas ril bu
'phel che ba/ mdog legs pa ro bro ba sogs myong grol bdud rtsi ril bu zhes mtshan snyan dang ldan pa bskrun te kun ngo mtshar gyi dpal la 'god pa mdzad/ dbyug zla'i tshes
dge bar mgon khang khag bzhi sogs 'phrin bcol sngon 'gro mi ring ba rje rdo rje 'chang nyid sku 'khor bcas pa dbus ljongs dag pa'i zhing khams su/ jo zhal rnam gnyis sogs
la mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang / bstan 'gro'i phan bde dar ba'i thugs smon mtshams sbyor/ gong sa phyag na padmo'i rnam 'phrul rgyal ba'i dbang po mchog sogs la mjal phyag
legs skyes bstar ba sogs kyi ched du gdan sa nas dbyug zla'i yar tshes dge bar chibs kyi kha lo bsgyur te bkra shis dar rgyas kyi maNDal du gsol tshal/ dgon rgyas su
bzhugs zhag nas bzung / bar lam 'gro ba rnams smin grol la 'god bzhin par gzhis rtser bla brang mchog nas/ thab bsu ja zhus/ gzhis rdzong ngo ma bcas nas chibs

bsu/ bla brang nas zur bsos rgya dpangs che ba/ paN chen rin po che blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes kyi sku mdun du mjal dar rtse sprod/ 'bul nor phan tshun 'dren pa bzhin mdzad
thog dri gtsang khang rnams su mchod 'bul ris med bstan pa rgyas pa'i thugs smon gyis mtshams sbyor/ dge 'dun sum stong tsam la bsnyen bkur sogs grub nas chibs skyel dang
/ ser phreng gi gdan 'dren bcas/ ser can dgon du 'gro don la gzhol ba'i tshe zur khang sde pas yab chos dmar po skor gyi be'u bum pusti ka gsum phul ba phyis su'ang /
rje nyid kyi gsung las/ ngo 'grul thog ma'i skabs 'byor ba'i be'u bum 'di dag sa skya pa'i bstan srid la rten 'brel gyi la nye shin tu bzang ba byung tshul bka' phebs/ de
nas rim bzhin rong brgyud chibs bsgyur gyis sa dgon so sor nas ser phreng sogs kyis chibs bsu skyel/ dkar phyogs legs 'bul/ gnas rten rnams la mchod 'bul/ 'dus tshogs la
bsnyen bkur/ skya ser bgrang yas rnams la khrom dbang sogs 'gro don 'byams klas la thugs gzhol bzhin par phebs te lha ldan dang nye bar skyid tshal klu ldings su/ gong sa
mchog nas bstsal ba'i chibs bsu rtse mgron sogs bcu gnyis tsam dang / shod nas kyang de bzhin gyis sngon bsu mjal gur du phebs thog mi rje mchog gis 'tshams zhu mgul dar
sogs bstar bzhes dang / 'chi med dga' tshal bzhugs sgar du phebs 'phral yang dga' ldan khang gsar nas mgron

gnyer ched mngags kyis rtse shod du mtshams zhu'i lha dar sogs dang / bkur gsos bdag rkyen bla na med pa spyi sgos nas mchod yon bstan la dgongs pa'i gzigs skyong bka' drin
che zhing / smin zla'i tshes gsum nyin gzim chung nyi 'od 'khyil bar rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen gzigs mchog gi mjal phyag la rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyis phyag 'bul dang
bstun rgyal ba'i dbang po mchog kyang gser khrir sku bzhengs kyis phyag lan/ mjal dar phan tshun 'bul gnang / dbu thug sogs kyi dbugs dbyung gzengs bstod dang / gsol ja'i
skabs phan tshun mnyes gshin pa'i bka' gsang rmad du byung bas dus 'das rjes/ mgron khang du dkar spro'i thog rtse drung thugs dad can rnams kyi re skong dang / tshes
dgur legs skyes rten 'byung bstar ba mdzad pa'i sngon du 'gro ba maNDal gyi tshom bu/ mi shigs rdo rje'i re khA can gyi bzhugs stan/ sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams dang
bcas gang gi spyan sngar 'khod de maNDal 'bul ba/ 'gro la bde skyid ma sogs kyi gsol 'debs/ zhal bzhes zhu ba rnams bka' drin che 'phral/ 'bul tshan bcu phrag lnga dang nyag
ma lngas lhag pas gtsos nyer gcig de phyin gtsos med rnams mchod yon zhal rgyas kyi legs lam bslu med rten 'brel gyi bdog pa brda mtshon tsam du phul bar/ rnam kun don
yod kyi rjes 'dzin mkhyen pa'i mtha' 'doms dang bcas mdzad sbyor gyi thog lha ldan gyi yul gru mtha' dag 'ja' dang smug pas gang zhing / dgung g.ya'

dag pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer mngon par 'bar ba/ bar snang thams cad du me tog gi char pa bu yug tu 'tshub pa 'dug ces lha ldan skye dgu phal cher nas gleng mor bsgrags par gyur
to/ /gnas de'i jo shAka rnam gnyis kyi dbus 'phrul snang gandho la chen po'i rten ji snyed pa'i spyan sngar/ stong mchod rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum deb gnang bzhin gyi 'bring
po'i mchod 'bul snyan shal/ rgyal bstan de 'dzin ris su ma phyed pa dar rgyas yun brtan thugs smon gyi mtshams sbyor sogs dang / bcu gnyis la mi'i dbang por legs 'bul
gyi snga rol du mi dbang yab sras/ dA las yab sras sogs drag bsdus rnams la bla ma zhi khro'i tshe dbang sogs thugs 'dod bzhin bstsal rjes/ legs skyes rnams brim zhing /
de skabs gdan sa chen po rtse gdong rten brten par bcas/ rje rdo rje 'changanyid kyi phyag tu nor bdag po'i tshul gyis son par gyur to/ /de nas ra mo cher mchod 'bul sogs
gong bzhin dang / bcu gsum la ri bo gru 'dzin du chibs bskyod de/ jo bo lo ke shA ra/ gser gdung chen po rnam gnyis kyi dbus rten ji snyed par mchod 'bul dang / bcu drug
la rnam gser brgyud gsang ne'u thog tshong khang gsar bzhengs la phyag nas/ sgrol ma rtsod rgyal/ rnam snang gangs chen/ gdung rten nga long ma sogs la mchod 'bul rgya che/
'dus sder bsnyen bkur/ rnam gser du khrom dbang / 'jam dbyangs dmar ser dang 'byung 'dul rjes gnang sogs stsalstsol zhing /

de skabs kyang gong lha sa'i ltas dang mtshungs pa byung / zhes bla grwa kun ngom bzhin du gleng mo 'khrol bar byung / de nas lha ldan dang drung 'ga' zhig la sgrol dkar spyan
bdun ma'i rjes gnang tshe dbang sogs dang / spyi sger gyi re ba mtha' dag nye bar skong bar mdzad/ de skabs gong ma'i tA shing bcas jun gar pa'i dge rtsa ba 'byor bas
tA shing tA las rtsang jun sogs la'ang legs skyes bstar bar mdzod pa bkas mngags shing / rim gyis gong sa mchog sa skyong yab sras sogs nas phebs phyag bdag rkyen bla med
du bstsal te/ nyer bdun la rtse shod phebs skyel ba rnams dang bcas lha ldan nas chibs bsgyur gyis yer pa dang yer la brgyud na lendra zhes rgyun gyi dbang por 'bod pa'i
gnas su phebs te/ rten ji snyed par mchod 'bul sogs dang / skya ser 'dus tshogs la khrom dbang / bco brgyad du tshe rta sbags sgrub dang 'jam dbyangs dmar ser rjes gnang
/ dpal ldan rtse'i bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gi thugs dam ma zhal bzhi rdo sku'i drung ban tshang pa'i 'khor tshogs dang bcas nas gsung bskang 'phrin 'chol/ de skabs so
sos legs 'bul zhabs brtan gya nom pa dgyes bzhes kyis bod lo gsar pa'i dga' ston kyang gnas der mdzad de/ rgya zhol/ la mo tshogs pa/ 'bum stod du gsung bskang dang / bde
chen chos sde/ shing tshang / dgon kha'am rgod 'khal la brgyud bsam yas su shar sgo zur khang du bzhugs te/ bsam yas 'chims phu dang bcas pa'i gnas rten

rnams la mchod 'bul snyan shal thugs smon rab tu gnas pa'i me tog 'thor gnang bcas dang/ chos skyong chen por dbu 'ching khrab gdan mdung ral gri zhags pa rnams dgyes rdzas
su bstsal bas/ rnam bzhi'i 'phrin las sgrub pa'i zhal bzhes kyang phul/ de dus gong sa rdo rje 'chang lnga pa chen po rin chen mi thod brgya dang brgyad las grub pa/ rin
chen sna bdun 'bur dod khyad mtshar can gong ma de nyid kyi sku tshe ril por phyag bcangs gnang zhing / bar skabs lum pa bar dad rten du 'byor bas des rmor chen rdo rje
'chang la phul pa rim gyis bsam yas sku rten par byung ba de/ rje rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag tu yar lam thar rtse rdo rje 'chang la phul ba da lta thar rtse'i nang rten
gras su bzhugs par thos lags/ gang ltar rab grwa 'dus spyi sger so so/ sku brten pa/ rdzong dpon sogs kyis dngos 'byor zad mi shes pa dang chabs cig zhabs pad yun brtan
gyi tha tshig zhu ba dang / tshes bcu'i gar 'cham gzigs 'bul/ skya ser bgrang yas la khrom dbang / a ra pa tsa na'i rjes gnang / gzhan yang phur chung gtor bsngo sogs kyi
ljags lung bstsal ba sogs bstan 'gro'i mdzad sgo rnams grub nas/ rim gyi phebs pa'i tshe rtse thang 'bras gling dang nye skor gyi rdo zhig la blo gros chos kyi rgyal mtshan
zhes pa'i yi ge rang byon du byung ba bzhin/ de la kun gyi rje rdo rje 'chang nyid la mtshan de bzhin du gsol ba dang / rab 'byams pa mdo sngags chos 'phel gyis

brtsams pa'i rje nyid kyi brtan bzhugs nang na'ang de bzhin 'khod lags/ mgo zla'i nyi shur khra 'brug dang / nyer gcig snga dror gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang chen po chibs bsur
byon dus nas bzung rje nyid kyi rigs bdag de nyid rnyed par gnang ba yin te/ de yang / 'jam mgon mkhyen brtse dbang phyug rang lugs snyan brgyud bstan pa rin po che'i mnga'
bdag yin pa dang / rdo rje 'chang dbang phyug rab brtan 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyis dbu blar mdzad pa dang / gnas gsar stong dpon sa skya'i sku nye yin pa sogs sgo du
ma nas 'brel lam che ba bcas de dus rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs dgongs la/ yab rje de nyid kyi gsung sgros kyi zur la yar klungs dpon rin po che zhes dgyes nyams mdzad
pa dang / gzhan yang phyogs lhung gi gtam yang du ma gsan pa bcas/ dpon rin po che de bzang ngan ji 'dra yin nam dgongs pa las mtha' gcig tu nges pa'i bzang ngan ma 'khrungs
shing / de gong gdan sa nas chibs ma bsgyur gong du thar rtse rdo rje 'chang nam mkha'i mtshan can gyis/ yum mchog dang mdzod 'dzin pa bcas la/ yar klungs zhabs drung
sku rus sku yon sogs gang sa nas dbu blar bzhes thub pa byung na legs tshul dang / rjes su phyag bris kyi brda sbyar ba la brten mdzod 'dzin nas de rtsis kyi snyan sgron
zhu rtsi bcas/ gang ltar khra 'brug tu zhal 'dzoms thog bla ma sku lta bas chog mi shes shing gsung 'jam zhing snyan pa gzigs pa tsam gyis thugs dad dbang med du

'khrungs pa zhig rje rdo rje 'chang nyid zhal gzigs phyogs kyi rten 'brel gyi sarga'ang ma log par byang gzigs la zhabs drung nyid lho gzigs su thog mar zhal rgyas/ rim gyis
gtam snyan bzhugs khrir chos sde'i thab bsu'i thog chos rje khu dbon gyi lo rgyus sogs zhib rgyas su phul/ bod kyi mkhar chags pa'i thog mar grags pa yum bu bla mkhar gtsug
lag khang du mchod 'bul sogs kyi skabs/ rgyal rabs chos 'byung lo rgyus kyi bshad pa chu 'bab pa ltar gnang bas thugs yid 'phrog ste/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang / thar rtse
rdo rje 'chang / brag rtsa ba chen po rnams nges shes gting nas rnyed pa'i bla ma dam pa rang yin yang / da lta'i sku gsung thugs kyi mdzad spyod 'di la dpags na bla
ma 'di de bas lhag pa zhig med kyang mi zhan nges par 'dug dgongs pa'i thugs mos dang / bla brang gi sgo spe mkhan chen gzhon nu blo gros kyi gzim chung du gdan 'jags/ sang
nyin sgrol dkar gyi gsung chog rgyas pa sngon 'gro'i zhabs brtan gyi tshe/ sku gsung thugs rten/ manDal/ zhal dkar stegs bcas/ gding ba gos kyi bla bre sogs rten 'brel
gyi rdzas gya nom pa dang / spyi gso nas kyang dngos 'bul bla med bcas mdzad sbyor gyi mthar/ sku gsung thugs 'gyur med rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin du bzhugs te/ chos kyi
'khor lo rgya cher bskor ba sogs mdo rgyud dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa nas drangs pa'i lung rigs kyi legs bshad bstsal ba/ thugs kyi dpa' ber sim pa sogs kyi rkyen gyis/
da cha

bla ma 'di'i zhabs pad bsnyen nas gsung gi bdud rtsi ngom med du gsol ba zhig byung na ci ma rung dgongs pa'i dad mos lhag par yang 'khrungs pa ni/ rgyal sras shAnta de bas/
da ni bdag gis ci nas kyang / /rigs dang mthun pa'i las brtsams te/ /skyon med btsun pa'i rigs 'di la/ /rnyog par mi 'gyur de ltar bya/ /zhes byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
pa bla na med pa'o/ /de tshe mdzod 'dzin gyis/ yab rje mchog sogs bla ma dam pa 'ga' zhig la rje nyid nas zab chos gsan tshul/ da lta gsan mus bcas des rnam 'dren dam pa
nyid kyang dbu blar phebs dgos tshul zhib rgyas zhus par/ da lam chos 'brel zhig phul te 'gyangs min phebs pa'i zhal bzhes bstsal/ sang nyin bka' chos bstsal rgyu'i do
nub rje nyid thugs spro dga' bde stong gi ngang du 'das shing / de nub zhabs drung gi mnal lam du yab rje bsod nams rin chen de nyid kyi zhabs drung nyid la sbyangs khrus
rgyas pa zhig bstsal ba 'khrungs pa'i sang nyin sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo'i rjes gnang thun mong ma yin pa gsung bshad shin tu rgyas pa dang bcas gnang bas/ gang gi
thugs rje dang rje nyid kyis byin rlabs 'phral du bzhugs te ston dang bstan pa gzhan nas mi 'tshol ba'i dad mos dang / yongs rdzogs snyan brgyud bstan pa rin po che'i mnga'
bdag tu 'gyur ba'i rten 'brel gyi sarga 'bad med lhun grub tu 'grig par gyur to/ /gnas der khrom dbang dang 'dus tshogs su 'jam dbyangs dmar ser gyi rjes gnang /

gnas gzigs skabs gnas bshad kyang zhabs drung mchog nas bstsal/ 'du khang steng gi tshar chen rnam thar gyang ris ma'i 'dar gdong 'khrugs pa'i zhing bkod kyi thad du/ 'di ci
'dra lags gsungs pas 'di 'dar gdong 'khrugs nas phan tshun 'thab mo byed cing / tshar chen rin po ches mchod g.yog la thog kha nas mi rkang bus gsungs pa dang ser ba babs
shing / ma chen rdo bkras tshar chen la mthu mdzad dgos zhus pas/ zhal gyis ma bzhes par ngo nag thug ger bsdad pa sogs kyi zhing bkod yin 'dug gsungs/ de skabs thugs
rtog ci yang ma 'khrungs kyang rjes su gnas tshul de 'dra ngan can gyis zhus pa min nam snyam pa'i dgongs pa tshom dogs 'khrungs kyang / sgo gang sa nas zhib 'jug mdzad pa
ci yang tshom gzhi ma byung bas thugs bag phebs/ sri gcod 'bum par thab skyel skabs de skor tshong dpon dang ne tso'i lo rgyus zhib par dang mchod rten la bskor ba mdzad
na sri las thar tshul/ bya sa lha khang skor gyi rten bshad rnams bka' drin che ba sogs legs lam mchog tu dge ba'i sgo dang po dod par gyur to/ /de nas rim phebs kyis rnam
sras mon mkhar ring mo dang / byes tshogs su paN chen gyi rdza sku dang khyung po'i thugs rten sogs la mchod 'bul thugs smon/ khrom dbang 'dus tshogs rnams la rjes gnang
sogs bstsal/ chos skyong chen pos bka' bzhin 'phrin las sgrub pa'i tha tshig rkyang phul lo/ /dgung grangs bcu drug tu phebs pa shing bya'i rgyal po lo gsar gyi lha

bsangs rgyas pa'ang der mdzad de chibs bskyod kyis gra thang du gur gyi mchod gar dang / pu tra ru 'dren bcas kyi 'cham gzigs 'bul/ 'dus tshogs la a ra pa tsa na'i rjes gnang
tshe dbang gong ma lnga bstod kyi ljags lung / byings la khrom dbang / byams gling gnas gzigs sogs mdzad nas/ bdun phud chos 'khor du khrom dbang dang / rta mgrin gsang
sgrub rjes gnang / 'ga' zhig la mgon po khro bcu'i rjes gnang sogs spyi sgos kyi re ba rnams bskangs te rim gyis ra ba smad rnam pa dang / gong dkar rdo rje gdan du 'jam
dkar dmar ser dzam dmar srog sgrub lha brgyad rjes gnang rnams dang / rta zla'i tshes gcig lha bsangs/ de nas yob la brgyud gzim phug stag khu sbe skye tshal 'og sogs thams
cad du khrom dbang / stag khu sper 'jam dbyangs dang 'byung 'dul/ sbos skyed du 'jam dbyangs dang mi g.yo ba dkar po'i rjes gnang rnams kyis so so'i blo kha rdzogs pa
mdzad/ gam la brgyud thar gling rgyal rtse sogs su rang rang gi 'dod sbyar dang bstun pa'i mjal phyag dngos 'bul brtan bzhugs spyi sger nas bstar ba rnams zab bzhes dang
/ thar gling 'dus tshogs la 'jam dbyangs dang mi g.yo ba'i rjes gnang / skya ser mang por khrom dbang / rgyal rtser yang de bzhin gyis gur dang 'jam dbyangs dmar ser sa
paN bla ma'i rnal 'byor 'byung 'dul bla ma mchod chog rnams dang / rkyang 'dur bde can dang ngor e waM chos ldan du'ang de bzhin/ dge sdings

gzhis khar khrom dbang sogs mdzad de rta zla'i nang chibs bsu sogs sngar rgyun bzhin gyis gdan sa chen po dpal ldan sa skyar phyag legs par phebs te dga' ston gtang rag sogs
kyis dus 'da' ba'i skabs so//de nas hor zla gnyis gsum gang rigs kyi bdun phrag gcig ring sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo dang tshe rta sbags sgrubs kyi ljags bsnyen sgrol
dkar gyi sbyin sreg bcas bka' drin che zhing / sa ga'i mjug nas zla gcig ring khyad 'phags mgon khang du gur gyi mgon po'i ljags bsnyen yi ge bcu gnyis ma 'bru 'bum sbyin
sreg bcas mdzad pa ni ljags bsnyen dang po'i skabs so/ /chu stod zla ba'i tshes 'gor rje btsun reg byed lha mo'i ljags bsnyen zhag bdun sbyin sreg bcas gnang skabs rnams
la dngos nyams kyi ltas ya mtshan yod tshul rnams zin bris ma mchis shing / 'on kyang rig byed ma'i ljags bsnyen grol 'phral tsandan dmar po'i phreng ba phyag 'byor sogs
gzhung nas bshad pa'i sgrubs rtags 'khrul med byung zhes bka' phebs/ de lo'i badzra kI la ya'i sgrub mchod kyi rdo rje slob dpon mdzad de skal ldan gyi slob bu brgya dang
nyer lnga de'i dkyil 'khor du smin grol la 'god pa mdzad pa'i rgyun lo yun ring po'i bar du mang nyung ci rigs re dang / de lo gser mdog dpon por kyai rdo rje'i rgyu
dbang dang / tshe dbang gdan sa'i las chen pa sogs mtshams pa'i rigs rnams la lam dbang / gong ma'i rnal 'byor ma dang bstun mkha' spyod rdo rje btsun mo'i

byin rlabs tshar lnga bstsal zhing / de'i zla mjug la 'jam mgon gnas gsar pa chen po gdan sar phebs te/ bod lo gsar pa'i yar tshes la dge ba nas bzung kha'u brag rdzong pa'i
lugs sam tshar lugs su'ang grags pa/ tshe thung dbang po yang rab tshe gcig la sangs rgyas pa'i thabs thun mong ma yin pa yongs rdzogs bstan pa rin po che'i nyams len gyi
gdams pa gsung ngag zab mo slob bshad ces grags pa 'di nyid ni/ kun mkhyen klu sgrub rgya mtshos/ tshogs par bshad pa'i drang don za zi'i gtam/ /rnam par spangs te slob
bu mchog dag la/ /gces par bskyangs pa'i nges don snying po'i bcud/ /zab mo slob bshad 'khyongs pa byin gyis rlobs/ /zhes gsungs pa'i gsung ngag lugs gnyis kyi 'chad tshul
yang 'di lta ste/ mus chen 'khor lo sdom pa yan la tshogs slob kyi tha snyad mi snang yang mgon des bdag chen rdo rje 'chang la zab gnad 'ga' zhig zur du bstsal ba nas
de ltar du grags pa'i gdams ngag zab mo dbang gi byin rlabs nyams khrid lung lus sbyong 'khrul 'khor/ 'phrin las so gnyis rnams kyi phyag len sogs zhib cing mtha' chod
pa gong du bstan pa bzhin dang / gzhan yang gong bshad rnams kyi nang nas/ rjes gnang zur bka'i rigs rnams dang / bka' 'gyur rin po che'i ljags lung bcas snron zla'i bar
tsam gnas gsar rje bzhugs te/ gsan bsam mdzad do//dgung grangs bcu bdun du phebs pa shing glang lor rnam thar bsdus

pa las/ gsar bskrun nyams gso bstan pa byi dor dang / /gan mdzod phyur dang dbul phongs sbyin gtong dang / /tshul khrims dri zhim bzod sran mgo me lta'i/ brtson 'grus mtha'
ru phyin la gsol ba 'debs/ /bskyed rdzogs mnyam bzhag nyin mtshan dus 'da' zhing / /ma 'dres so sor dpyod pa'i shes rab bkra/ /rnam bzhi'i sbyin pa snyan smras 'khor 'dus
nas/ /don spyod don mthun 'gro rnams skyong la 'dud/ /ces gsungs pa ltar lo 'dir mdzod 'dzin grwa tshang ba/ rgyal mtshan rin chen gyis bskul ma zhus don bzhin/ 'dzam gling
mdzes pa'irgyan mchog sprul pa'i gandho la chen po 'di'i shar nub byang gsum gyi spen bad gsar spod dang sbrags go 'phang cher bstod cing / lho mar kha sgron bcas gtsug
lag khang mdzes pa'i zhabs tog rgya cher bskrun pa'i gsung gsang lhug par grol ba'i tha tshig rdo rje'i ri mo spyi bo'i rgyan du bkod de/ 'go bzo 'ul mi bcas nas sla
bcos bab col du ma song bar rgyu 'bras kyi blang dor snying khongs su bcangs te bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal po'i rnam thar du/ gdan sa chen
po 'di nyid kyi khang phran re la zhig gso byas na yang mchod rten re bzhengs pa'i phan yon dang 'dra bar bla ma gong ma rnams kyi gsung las 'byung ba thugs la zhog gsungs
pas na/ de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ las mi rnams spyi sger nas ja chang rtsam sha sogs 'du long phun sum tshogs pa de

dus las bzang ba ma dran/ zhes da lta'ang ngag rgyun du chags shing 'di lo khal kha 'ga' zhig dang / bla ma chu bzang pa/ gong gi rigs bdag gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang / rtse
gdong sprul sku sogs phur dbang smad las sgrol dbang sogs dang / dza sag bla ma bstan chos kyi mi sna kha shas la bzang spyod kyi lung sogs 'dod chos kyi tshim par mdzad
do//dgung grangs bco brgyad du phebs pa me stag lo bkra shis lha khang gi zam sner/ chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po che'i zhal gzigs pa'i tshul 'bum thang ldeb bris las
gsal ba bzhin dang / rta zla'i yar tshes la mgon khang khag bzhir 'phrin 'chol sngon 'gro'i nyer dgur gdan sa chen po rtse gdong gi phyogs su chibs kyi kha lo bsgyur te
rim gyis thub bstan gser mdog can gyi chos grwa chen por byon thog tshe dpag med sprul sku'i rjes gnang zhig bstsal te/ dbo zla'i tshes drug la gdan sa rtse gdong du phyag
phebs nas bstan rgyun mi nyams srid mthar spel ba'i chos sbyin rgya cher mdzad tshul ni 'di lta lags/ gong ma lnga'i sku bstod kyi ljags lung gis chos sgo phye ste/ rim
gyis 'jam dkar ma ti lugs/ sgrol dkar bka' babs bdun ldan/ tshe dpag med chag lugs rnams kyi rjes gnang lung bcas dang / bcom ldan 'das snying po kyai rdo rje/ dpal chen
yang dag phur pa/ gsang 'dus mi bskyod rdo rje rnams kyi smin byed kyi dbang rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor steng nas dang / dkar bdud lcam dral

gyi rjes gnang / rang lugs kyi dbang rjes gnang chos spyod bskang ba'i lung / mkha' spyod skor dang 'jigs byed chos skor gur mgon yang ci rigs sogs khrom dbang rgya cher bstsal/
chos sbyin mtha' yas pa zhig gis 'dir ma zad/ sku tshe ril por 'da' bar mdzad pa rnams kyang / dbyig gnyen gyis/ chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas/ /mdo sogs ji bzhin
yang dag ston ces dang / bslab btus las/ chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med/ /bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu yin no/ zhes gsungs pa ltar gyi sgo nas legs par 'doms pa sogs gdan
sa de'i 'gro don rnams mdzad zin nas/ rje btsun sgrol mas lung bstan pa'i gnas ngor e waM chos ldan gyi chos grwa chen por dbang rjes gnang sogs kyis skal ldan rnams chos
char gyis tshim par mdzad nas 'og min stug po bkod pa'i zhing dang mtshungs par rje btsun rin po che sogs gong ma mang po rjes 'brang bcas pas bsngags brjod kyi me tog
'thor ba mdzad pa'i gnas gdan sa chen po dpal ldan sa skyar phebs te/ sa ga'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug birWa pa sa drug gi rtogs pa rnams nyin re bzhin rim gyis brnyes pa'i
dus chen dang bstun myong grol bdud rtsi ril bu'i sgrub pa rnams grol rjes/ khal kha chos rje ngag dbang lhun grub dar rgyas sgyi chu bla ma khal kha tshe brtan rgyal mtshan/
zhwa lu ba dang grangs chen dpon slob bcu phrag gnyis rgal ba sogs la/ gser chos dmar chen skor gsum/ dmar chung skor gsum/ mgon

dkar/ mkha' spyod ma rnams kyi rjes gnang / zhwa lu ba tshor mkha' spyod rdo rje btsun mo'i byin rlabs gnang ba'i tshe nang mchod kyi dkyil du baM yig rang byon 'khrungs pa
kun gyi mig gi bdud rtsir bstsal ba'i ngo mtshar gyi mdzad pa dang sbrags tshar mdzad sgrub dkyil ljags lung rnams kyi sgo nas las can dag pa'i gdul bya mang po rjes su
bzung bar mdzad do//dgung grangs bcu dgur phebs pa me yos gro bzhin zla nang chos sde nyi zla zung sogs la sgrub thabs brgya rgyam gyis mtshon chos char mtha' yas pa zhig
dang / gzhan yang grang chen dbu byed spor ra bla ma/ grags chen slob tshab sbyin pa rnams la sogs par las gshin bcu gsum ma'i rjes gnang sogs dang / gdan sa'i zor las pa
sogs la bstan srung so so'i rjes gnang sogs/ gzhan yang chos char rgya cher 'bebs par mdzad do// de mtshams nas gung 'gyur med tshe brtan dpon g.yog rnams phebs pa'i tshe
rje rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyis/ bla brang phun tshogs gling du mjal phyag sogs lugs gnyis kyi bdag rkyen phun sum tshogs pas khong dpon g.yog rnams dga' spro 'dzum
mdangs kyi dpal la sbyor ba mdzad skabs/ gcung po 'jam mgon mthu stobs dbang phyug nyid dges rdor gzhi bsnyen mdzad skabs rnams so//dgung grangs nyi shur phebs pa sa 'brug
lor rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched zhal rgyas nas dpal gur gyi mgon po'i ljags bsnyen zla gang ma zhig

mdzad pa 'di ni rje nyid kyi gur gyi ljags bsnyen gnyis pa'i skabs dang / de nas 'jam mgon sangs rgyas ye shes la gong du bstan pa'i grub chen brgyad cu/ nyi sbas sgrol ma/
snar thar brgya rtsa/ sa skya bka' 'bum gyi ljags lung rnams zhal rgyas rgyas nas gsan skabs 'jam mgon mthu stobs kyi mtshan can gang la sku khrag brtas pa lta bu'i snyun
gzhi lci ba zhig bzhes skabs/ ngor pa dpon slob rnams kyis 'jigs byed drug cu pa/ rnam rgyal stong mchod sogs dang / chos grwa lho byang nas kyang sku rim rgya che/ lhag
par rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyis tshe sgrub rnams la thugs brtson lhur bzhes mdzad pas/ re zhig nas sku lus las 'bu mtho gang tsam zhig mngon sum du thon pas 'phral du
snyun gzhi las grol ba'ang rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi sku drin du yang dag par 'khums lags/ rta zla'i nang 'dren mchog sangs rgyas ye shes nyid la grangs chen bco brgyad
kyi ljags lung sogs chos bka' rgya cher bstsal ba rnams de nyid gsan yig bzhin dang / gzhan yang yul chen ban tshang pa/ ngor gyi grwa rgyun kha shas sku drung sku skye/
klu lding zhabs drung / gdong dga' chos sde ba/ spyi shing bla ma sogs la dbang chos rgya cher stsol skabs mdzod 'dzin pa bro tshal gyi mu dang / de mtshams nas rje rdo
rje 'chang nyid gzhis rtse rin rtse sogs la phebs skabs te/ rje nyid kyi gsung las/ de lo ngas ni gzhis rtse rin rtse sogs la'ang srid pa bar do'i rnam thar zhig bskyangs/
zhes gsungs so/ /de'i

tshe gdan sa'i lugs zung gi thugs khur rnams gang dang zhal mi gnyis pa'i 'jam mgon mthu stobs dbang phyug nyid kyis bzhes shing / rje nyid dbang phyogs su chigs bsgyur gyis
skyer kha tshal zhes par bzhugs stan 'jags te/ ngo mtshar mkhas grub kyi mdzad par gzhan dring mi 'jog pas dus 'da' bar mdzad do/ /de lo gzhis rtser char dkon po zhig byung
ba'i rkyen dang bsnyad kyis 'tshol ba'i yang phyir ste rje nyid la char 'bebs dgos tshul gsol ba bzhin/ mdzad ma thag lung pa chus gang ba'i drag char zhig 'bebs par
mdzad pas 'dod rgyal gyi sgrar bshos kyi ming la pag tu 'bod pa bzhin skye bo kun gyis da gzod sa skya bdag chen rin po ches pag byin song zhes gleng ba dang lhan cig dad
mos dang dga' mgu lhag par che ba'i dpal la 'god par mdzad/ de nas rin rtser phebs skabs tshe dbang zhig dang gur khro bcu'i rjes gnang zhig dbang dA la nas zhus bstsal
mdzad/ gnas der pha bong chen mo zhig mchis pa de med pa mdzad dgos tshul gsol ba bzhin/ mtshan gang zhig la pha bong de lhag ma tsam las mi snang ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'ga'
zhig ston par mdzad ces rgan thog 'ga' zhig gis gleng ba thos/ dgos gal che dus rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod par rdugs pa'i gras ni de nyid nam yang min pas rje rdo rje 'chang nyid
kyi gsung las kyang / kho bo ni bla ma gong ma rdo rje 'chang zhal mi gnyis pa mang pos rjes su bzung / bsnyen sgrub las gsum mtha' dag rang yid ches nges bgyis pa'i

mthu las las bzhi ci sgrub kyang yi dam chos srung gi byin rlabs 'jug nges par rang yod rung / drag las sogs ni cher ma mgyis shing / gal te rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud sde nas
bshad pa nyams su len dgos pa zhig yin na'ang mthar rdugs pa'i gras ni min no/ /zhes yang yang gsung las thos par grags so/ /gzhis rtse phyogs nas ngor du chibs bsgyur gyi
skabs dpa' rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal phyag yongs su rdzogs pa zhig gzigs shing / thar rtse phebs 'phral thar rtse rdo rje 'chang gi gsung las/ de ring sku zhabs rin po che
la las gshin gsum gyi rjes gnang sbrel nas 'bul dgos su 'dug pas bka' sgrub da ci nas tshar zin pas/ gsol ston grol 'phral 'bul lo/ /zhes bstsal ba'i ngo mtshar phan tshun
'gran res ni sngon gyi dus su rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan dang kha che paN chen shAkya shri sogs 'khrul zad gong ma'i rnam thar dang mtshungs shing /
gzhan du de skabs rnams su sku gegs kyi rnam pa nyam nga ba de dag khro rgyal ma he'i zhal can gyi sgo nas ngal ba 'bras med du mdzad pa ni gor ma chag go /lo de'i gro bzhin
grang chen sku rim pa rnams la khro bcu'i rjes gnang dang gtor bzlog gi ljags lung bcas dang / gsang 'dus sgrub mchod dang bstun dbang tshar kha shas skal ldan rnams
la stsol/ mdzod 'dzin rgyal mtshan rin chen dus las yol bar byang bu lam ston gyis mtshon rjes 'dzin gyi bgyi ba rnams yang dag par mdzad/ mi ring bar mdzod 'dzin shes rab

phun tshogs las 'khur du bka' yis mngags so//dgung grangs nyer gcig tu phebs pa sbrul lo rgyal zlar spang shar bla mar rdo rje phur pa'i dbang dang grub rgyal lugs kyi tshe
dbang / de'i gnam gang nas bzung bdun phrag gsum gyi bar lha chen sprul pa'i gandho la'i steng gi sngags 'chang bdud kyi stobs 'phrog ngag dbang kun dga' rin chen gyi gzim
spyil ta la smon gnas yid 'ong tshal du/ gur gyi mgon po'i phyi khrid brag rdzong thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rtsal 'don bcas mdzad pa ni/ dbyig gnyen gyis/ tshul
gnas thos dang bsam ldan pas/ /bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor/ /zhes gsungs pa bzhin/ thos pas phyi'i sgro 'dogs bcad/ de bsam byung gi dpyad pas dag par mdzad de ji bzhin
sgom pa'i ngang la thugs gzhol zhing / tshar chen rin po ches/ rten gyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dam rdzas dang / /rab zab bsad dang bskyed pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang / /zab
gsal ting 'dzin ma nor gsang ba'i sngags/ /rtse gcig 'bad pas bsnyen sgrub mthar phyin shig /ces gsungs pa'i 'bras bu mngon gyur gyi grub rtags kyang gsal bar 'khrungs/
zhes thos lags/ khrid 'di nyid rje bla ma gnas gsar pa'i drung du gsan skabs mnal lam 'od gsal gyi ngang du bka' rtsom 'di ltar mdzad de/ kha'u brag rdzong nag po'i ri khrod
du/ /zab don du ma'i 'byung gnas chos kyi rje/ /sa lo 'jam pa'i rdo rje rdo ring par/ /snying nas gsol ba

'debs so byin gyis rlobs/ /zhes gsungs pa 'di 'dra'i rigs gzhan yang rje nyid la mang du 'khrungs kyang gsang 'os 'ga' zhig ni 'od gsal de las bzhengs nas thugs dran cher mi
gsal ba'i tshul mdzad lags/ rta zla'i nang sa ngor bstan pa'i sbyin bdag chen po mdo smad sa yi thig le sde bzhi dge bcu'i dpal mngon par 'bar ba'i rgyal khab nas/ sa skyong
blo gros rgyal mtshan sku 'khor rnams gdan sa chen por chibs bskyod thog rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dpal gyi mgur nas zab rgyas chos kyi bdud rtsis grol bar mdzad pa
ni 'di lta mthong ste/ tshe dpag med kyai rdor rgyud lam gyi dbang / dpal chen yang dag rdo rje phur pa/ 'jigs byed/ bde mchog bong zhal/ ku ru kulle lha lnga rnams rdul
tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur mdzad cing / sgo rum ye shes mgon po'i drung sogs su gur lha brgyad/ rtsa turmu kha bsnyen dus/ dur bdag pu tra'i zur bka'/ dkar bdud
gur lha brgyad thun mong ma yin pa/ khro bcu/ dbang lha/ dmar po skor gsum/ dmag zor ma/ rnam sras ser can lha dgu rnams kyi rjes gnang / rdo rje phur pa'i smad las sgrol
dbang / rtsa turmu kha dkar po tshe 'phel/ yab chos 'jam dpal dpa' gcig sgrol ma tshe sbyin ma rnams kyi rjes gnang sogs zab rgyas gdams pa'i bsil ser gyi bdud rtsis sa
spyod thugs kyi kunda dkar gsal bzhin ras kyi me tog phyogs kyi bu mor ngoms pa'i dga' ston du bkod pa'i mthu la brten nas/

sa bstan nor 'dzin dpal mo'i ljongs 'dir dar zhing rgyas la yun ring gnas pa'i thugs smon rgyal sras mchog spyod pas dus 'da' bar mdzad pa sa zla'i nang rags rdzong dgon lag
bcas par kyai rdo rje'i rgyud dbang dang mkha' spyod rdo rje btsun mo'i byin rlabs kyang stsol bar mdzad/ snron zla nas 'jam mgon mthu stobs dbang phyug nyid bstan srung
rgya mtsho'i bsti gnas bdud las rnam rgyal dpal mgon dga' ba'i tshal du brag rdzong ma'i ljags bsnyen sbyin sreg bcas mdzad skabs nas bzung / rje nyid kyis phur sgrub chen
mor gsung bshad kyi dga' ston stsol gnang gi sngon 'gro phyag dpe 'dzin sbyong phrin bcol sogs mdzad rjes/ gro bzhin badzra kI la ya sgrub mchod dus 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i
dbus su legs bshad kyi dga' ston lhug par grol ba dang / mdos chung dang sku rim chen mo'i zor 'dzin gyi rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin che rgyu'i ljags bsnyen rnams mu
sbrel gyi thugs brel rnams 'byung 'gyur dang / dbyug zla'i nang spyi sger bstan 'gro'i nyer 'tshe zhi phyir rje nyid kyi bka' gsang rmad du byung bas 'doms te/ gang gi gcung
'jam mgon mchog nas sgo rum bla ma lha khang du bzhugs yul gyi bse 'bag nag po 'phur shes kyi sku drung du/ zhag 'ga' bskang phrin la thugs brtson/ deng skabs mkha' 'gro
'du ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas dam can mon bu pu tra'i thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang rten gnyis gsar bskrun gyis/ chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa rin po
che'i

bla brang dbang khang mdar bskang phrin la thugs gzhol ba'i sgo nas srod chen thog gnang ba'i nub mo/ 'gag pa rab brtan gyi rmi ltas su/ bzhi thog rtse'i thog kha'i sgor sgo
lcags byed rgyu yin bsam pa la mi mgo rlon pa khrag 'dzag 'gel bzhin 'dug pas 'jigs snang cher shar ba dang / sgo rum 'khor tshoms su sdir chom du mas tshig gsal ba la
g.ya' g.ya' zer ba dang / don chen zer ba de bla ma lha khang mdar nyal ma nus par gzhan du bros pa sogs kyi tshul 'di'ang sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal po la bstan dgra ma
rungs pas 'tshe ba'i skabs shig byas 'gyur rdo rje brag rdzong na slob dpon 'gas mgon po drug cu pa'i gtor bzlog sgrub gnang mur kye bos kyi bskul tshugs pa dang bstun/
nub phyogs kyi nam mkhar mi nag dug long can gnyis gros byed pa'i tshul gyis/ nged rang tsho thog ma rin spungs la phyin/ de nas lha sa rdzong la phyin pa drag zer ba zhabs
'bring pa gnyis kyis mngon gsum du mthong ba dang tshul mtshungs pas/ zhing bcu tshang ba'i bstan dgra zhig gi rnam shes mi bskyod pa'i zhing du 'dren par mdzad pa ni
gor ma chag de nas dum tsam zhig nas mkhar rnga sor mo bsnun pa lta bu'i sgra zhig byung nas sdier chom rnams yar 'ongs te/ dbu rtse rnying ma'i gser phib steng song ba
'dra mo zhig byung ba'i sang nyin dbu rtse'i gser phib mkhar yang khrag rlon 'thor re ba dang / 'khor tshoms lho 'gram la che ba rta dang chung ba ra lug gi rmig rjes 'dra
mo gdan sa la mang

du byung ba sogs ni kun gyi dgongs gsal ltar lags/ de nas chu 'bum/ pha sgar/ go 'jo sogs kyi bla gnyer tshong dpon rnams bcas la tshe dpag med/ kun rig gur drag rnams kyi
dbang bstsal zin 'phral/ 'di yin med cing don gyis stong pa'i thugs sun 'o brgyal can zhig thugs rgyud 'khrugs bzhin du/ drug cu pa'i zor 'dzin sngon 'gro ljags bsnyen skabs
dngos nyams kyi mtshan ltas du ma 'khrungs tshul dang / dongs gzhi zor 'dzin gyi dus nyin gnyis gsum lingga 'phar zhing lingga'i steng la 'ja' tshon gyi mdangs chags
pa sogs lha dbye 'bungs che dgos pa'i mtshan ma 'khrungs shing de mtshams nas bod dpon sku mched dus zir je gsal gyis thams cad ya nga bya thabs kyis dben pa'i 'jigs zhum
zla sbrel byung tshul gsungs pa ni 'di skabs wang dA las bod kyi srid skyong bgyis te gong sa thams cad mkhyen pa sogs kyi bka' brtsi 'jog med par skrun ched mnga' ris gung
tshe nor g.yo thabs kyis bsad pa sogs ngan spyod kho na'i dus 'das skabs yin 'dug pa sogs 'di skor rnams gdung rabs kyi rnam thar gyi 'jam mgon gcung rin po che'i rnam
thar skabs na gsal ba bzhin dang / mgo zla'i bde mchog sgrub mchod grol 'phral khal kha bstan dar bla mar kyai rdor rgyud dbang dang / rje btsun sa skya pa'i gser chos
bcu gsum nyin gnyis la rdzogs pa khyad 'phags mgon khang du lha brgyad kyi rjes gnang de skabs tho rengs snga ba nas bzung sgrub mchod yan la rdo rje gzhon nu'i bsnyen

mtshams sngon 'gro'i stod las rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub gnang gis dbyangs nyis rdzogs sum rdzogs kyis gtor bsngo yan chad/ bde mchog sgrub mchod grol nas khal khar chos
'chad sa ma rub bar dang / de nas snga 'phros bskang gso bcas srod chen zin tsam la grol bar mdzad pa sogs/ so skye'i blo yul las brgal ba 'phags chen byang chub sems
dpa'i bdag bas gzhan gces kyi rnam thar lhur bzhes 'di 'dra ni rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid la snga phyi rnam pa kun tu mang du mchis kyang 'dis mtshon par bya'o//nyer gsum
nyin phur bsnyen la bzhugs gdan 'jags rgyu'i snga dro dkar bdud kyi rjes gnang zhig bstsal te/ lha mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i bsnyen mtshams la thugs gzhol ba'i tshe dkar
bdud phur srung rnams dgyes pa'i rnam 'gyur du ma dang bcas zhal yang yang bstan pa'i rkyen gyis bstod pa rgyas pa 'di'ang de dus mdzad cing / tho rengs kyi cha 'ga' zhig
tu srung ma de dag gis mchod pa kha gso ba dang / mchod med spar par rje nyid bzhengs par bskul ba sogs bstan srung mngon sum du bran du 'khol ba'i ngo mtshar mdzad pas
dus 'da' ba'i skabs so//dgung grangs nyer gnyis su phebs pa lcags rta lo phur pa'i ljags bsnyen skabs dbo zla'i tshes dgu'i tho rengs 'jam mgon gnas gsar ba chen po nyid
zas gtsang sras por dngos su gzigs grol 'phral chos sde nyi zla zung gis dge 'dun rags bsdus rnams la bka' chos kyi bang mdzod

rgya cher 'jo bar mdzad nas/ nag zla'i nang 'jam dbyangs gzi 'od 'bar ba'i zhabs mthil la ljags ldag mdzad pa'i mur sku'i g.yon 'khris de na 'phags pa klu sgrub dang / zhi
ba lha'i snam sbyar brtsegs pa zhig gzigs pa dang / 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyis lan gsum gyi bar du zhal bstan te rjes su bzung / snron zlar chos rje dpa' ldan chos skyong
gi dbon por tshe dbang grub rgyal ma dang / lcags khu rin gling bla ma/ thub bstan mkhan zur bcas la tshe rta zung 'brel gyi dbang bstsal zhing / zla mjug nas chu stod tshes
'go bar yang bskyar gzhis rtse chibs bsgyur thengs gnyis pa'i skabs bkra shis bde legs su bzhugs sgar gyi tshe'ang / sgo du ma nas 'jigs shing nyam nga ba zhig mchis
na'ang / bslu med las 'bras kyi rten 'brel dang / rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs rjes thugs bskyed phrin las las shar ba'i mthun 'gyur gyi rol mo 'khrol ba sogs gsungs
pa ni 'di skabs gong nas am ban gnyis la bka' phebs te wang dA las rkyen lam du btang ste/ ring min gong sa thams cad mkhyen pa mchog nas chos srid gnyis char 'gan bzhes
kyis/ bka' blon du rdo ring gung paNDi ta dang / mdo mkhar zhabs drung tshe ring dbang rgyal/ thon pa srid gcod tshe brtan/ dza sag bla ma nyi ma rgyal mtshan bcas gsar
bskos kyis zhabs pad bzhir grags pa'i thog ma byung ba bcas/ bod 'bangs tshang ma bde skyid la spyod skabs kyi dus de yin 'dug rim gyis gdan sa chen por legs par

phebs te phyi nang gsang ba'i 'gal rkyen zhi phyir lha khang rtse mgon khang du gsung nyin gsum ma zhig mdzad rjes/ 'char 'phar gyi bstan don mdzad sgo rnams rje btsun gong
ma rnams kyi thugs bskyed las mi 'gong bar mdzad de/ dbyug zlar gur grwa brgyad la rta mgrin yang gsang gi dbang dang / lha brgyad/ zhal/ dur bdag pu tra bran bdud/ dkar
bdud khro bcu rnams kyi rjes gnang dang lung 'ga' zhig bcas legs par bstsal nas/ mgo zla'i nyer dgur gtor bzlog grub 'phral dbu rtse rnying mar bdun phrag gcig bla ma gong
ma rnams kyi phyag bzhes dang mthun par thugs sgrub mdzad de/ mgo zla'i phyi ma'i yar tshes brgyad la sgo rum gzim spyil dkar po'i mgon khang steng 'dzugs chog rgyas pa
gnang ba'i mgo gzungs zhugs gshom tshul nas mjug 'dzugs chog gi bar tshang ma rje btsun gong ma'i yig cha gung bsgrigs kyi thog yang dag pa'i lam nas 'dren par mdzad skabs
bstan srung dgyes pa'i mtshan ma'ang gsal bar 'khrungs shing / bcu drug nas bdun phrag gcig ljags bsnyen sngon 'gro'i bcom ldan 'das snying po kyai rdo rje man ngag lugs
rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i sgrub mchod mdzad pa'i bar rnams su ban tshang pa 'ga' zhig la zhal dkar po tshe 'phel dang / gang gi a lce drung la bcu gcig
zhal gyi rjes gnang dang 'brel par rje nyid kyi gsung rtsom bsnyen yig gi lung dang / ngor pa 'ga' zhig la sgra mi snyan gyi tshe dbang rnams gnang /

nyer drug nas bcom ldan 'das snying po kyai rdo rje'i gzhi bsnyen zla drug gi bar du bka' drin che skabs lhag pa'i lha'i zhal gzigs pa'i rtags 'khrungs tshul gyi gsung yang
snang ba bcas 'di ni/ rje rdo rje 'chang nas kyai rdor gzhi bsnyen gnyis pa'i skabs dang / de'i tshe de'i dus su gdan sa'i lugs zung gi mdzad sgo rnams 'jam mgon mthu stobs
kyi mtshan mchog can nas gang gis khur bzod par mdzad cing / de lo mes srong sde pa kun phan dam chos rgyal mtshan la gnang rgyu'i gur gyi bris thang thun mong ma yin
pa zhal bkod gnang skabs sngar gyi gur lha brgyad steng / dmag zor rgyal mo be con thod khrag lte ba'i thad kar mgo sprod du bzung ba zhig 'khrungs pa'i khrod nas dbu mdzad
dbang phyug chos 'byor yin snyam pa zhig gis byang sems dkar po ka pA la gang rje nyid la phul ba dang / gzhan yang gnyan mgon zhal bzhi pa'i skor la gzigs snang ngo
mtshar can mang dag yod gsungs pa las/ chos skyong bka' gnyan pas re zhig gsung mgur las kyang ma grol/ 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje phur khang gi sgo tshad dang mnyam pa
zhig kyang bka' gnyan pa'i tshul gyi gzigs so//dgung grangs nyer gsum pa lcags lug snron zla'i nang kyai rdo rje'i ljags bsnyen grol la khad rigs bdag thar rtse ba nyid phebs
pas/ rje rdo rje 'chang thugs dges pa'i gsung las/ bla ma dang yi dam dbyer med du 'grub pa 'di rten 'brel shin tu legs gsungs shing las bzhi'i sbyin

sreg sogs grub nas zhal rgyas/ chu stod zla nang 'jam mgon gcung rin po che/ rigs bdag thar rtse zung dang khrums zla'i gsang 'dus sgrub mchod dang bstun de'i dbang bka' sogs
mang du gnang nas/ dbyug zla'i tshes gnyis nas lam gtor dang / drug la gdan sa 'og rtse gdong gi phyogs la chibs bskyod de bcu gcig la rtse gdong du phebs nas zhag gnyis
lcang can mgon khang du phrin 'chol zab rgyas kyis bcu bzhi pa mchod thog gdan sa de nyid du phur pa sgrub mchod gsar 'dzugs mdzad/ gza' skar sogs gzigs yul du ma gyur
kyang 'grub sbyor rang 'grig grol nyin nyer bdun la'ang 'grub sbyor rang 'grig bcas rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs bskyed dang / yul phyogs de'i bde skyid bla nar 'phel
ba'i bslu med rten 'brel gyi 'jug sgo bzang por grub cing / de'i tshe nyid nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi khur bzhes thog grwa sum cu skor gyis sbyor dngos rjes gtsang thag
pa khur blangs su mdzad pa'i rgyun da lta'ang kun gyi spyod yul du gyur pa 'di bzhin dang / 'cham chas sogs mkho dgu'i yo byad/ mchod pa bsnyen bkur/ 'dzugs ston sogs gya
nom pa rgya che mu med du mdzad nas/ zla mjug dus gtor dang / tshes gcig la gye re mdo mchod gzhis kar gtor spod rdzong ri gnas gzigs sogs dang / bzhi'i snga dro dor 'bul
sdud bla rnying sogs la mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs dang / lcang can mgon khang nyams gso gsar bskrun ltar du mdzad/ drug la bdud 'dul mgon khang

gtor spod dang chabs cig zhal bzhi yum chen sring mo bzhi dang bcas dngos su bzhugs pa'i sprul pa'i g.yag rwa lnga sogs mgon khang steng du gdan 'dren gyis mtshan yang bsil
tshal mgon khang du mnga' gsol/ de dang lhun rtse'i gtor spod sogs grol nas/ rang phyogs bu chen pa dang bsnyen gnas ma chos sde pa bcas la/ dbang rjes gnang lung la sogs
pa'i chos bka' rgya che ba bstsal te/ de nas rim phebs kyis ngor e waM chos ldan 'dus tshogs/ bla khag zhabs drung / rigs bdag thar rtse khu dbon/ rje sangs rgyas ye shes
dpon sku mched sogs la'ang mkha' spyod byin rlabs dbang lung du ma bstsal zhing / de skabs thar rtse rdo rje 'chang nas sngon du gcen lung la phebs skabs/ thams cad mkhyen
pa dpal mchog rgyal mtshan gyi yab gzhis mkhas snga lho pa zer ba zhig gi nang du bzhugs dus rje de'i phyag rol gur mgon 'di nyid gzigs pas/ de dus thar rtse rjes phyag
rol de gdan sar phyag 'byor yong ba'i phrin 'chol mdzad pa dus su smin te/ mkhas snga lho pas thar rtse khyer te 'di spus bsgyur mdzad dgos zhus pa bzhin/ thar rtse rdo
rje 'chang dges pa'i gsung gis gong gi lo rgyus dang bcas rje rdo rje 'chang nyid la phul ba da lta'ang dpal ldan sa skya'i phyag rol drag gras gur mgon lha dgar grags
pa 'di lags/ gzhan yang rje de nyid kyi phyag babs sgra dbyangs snyan grags sogs rol cha mang dag mchis so/ /de'i tshe bla brang so so nas legs 'bul dag spyi bye'i blo khams

dang 'tshams pa'i mdzad pa rnams grub rjes gdan sa chen po dpal ldan sa skyar phebs gdong rten 'brel phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo 'phar gcig tu phye ste/ 'phags chen gong ma'i
spyod tshul mtha' dag bdag gir bzhes pa bla ma zhi ba lha nyid thugs bskyed kun bzang smon lam can gyis nye bar drangs te/ dngos 'bul gyi bdog pa gya nom pa dang bcas zhabs
pad ga la bar bsnyegs pa'i dge mtshan gser zhal la longs spyod pa'i skabs thugs bzhed kyi chos sgo dbye bar mdzad pa la gtso bo rdo rje phur pa'i stod las kyi/ smad las
drag po sgrol dbang de dang 'brel ba'i rgyud rgya gzhung sgrub dkyil bod gzhung rje nyid dang bla ma gong mas mdzad skor/ gsung ngag rdo rje'i tshig rkang sogs zhal slob
mchog gi thugs kyi bum bzang re ba'i bcud kyis gtams par gyur cing / de'i zla mjug zhal gyi bsnyen mtshams sngon 'gro'i gtor bzlog zor 'dzin mdzad dus kyang dngos nyams
gyi mtshan ma bzang po 'khrungs shing / de nas nyi shar ba/ na ri rdzong chung ba/ dpal ldan chos skyong gi dbon po/ rgya dpon/ rab gling bla ma/ mes srong rgan gzhon/ zhwa
lu nyi shar bla ma rnams la rim bzhin so sor 'dod chos rgya cher bstsal ba sogs te mdor na bstan pa'i bya ba thos bsam sgom gsum dang / mkhas pa'i bya ba 'chad rtsod
rtsom gsum gyis rnam pa thams cad du dus 'da' bar mdzad pas/ dgung grangs bcu gnyis nas nyer gsum 'di'i bar du'ang kyai rdor rgyu dbang tshar lnga bcu nga grangs/ lam

dbang nyi shu lhag tsam/ bde mchog nag po pa'i dbang bcu lhag gsang 'dus mi bskyod pa bdun tsam/ bdag med ma drug phur pa'i stod las bcu/ smad las bzhi/ mkha' spyod ma'i byin
rlabs nyi shur nye ba/ kun rig dang tshe dpag med nga drug dang / rjes gnang ljags lung sogs ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig bka' drin che/ gong lo khams so sor 'khod pa
ltar dang / gzhan yang rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs nyams su nyin zhag phrug rer sgom sgrub chag med kyang nyi shu rtsa bdun tsam re bzhes par mdzad pa ste/ de dag
kyang rje nyid kyi gsung las/ snang srid sgyu mar shes pa'i kun blo yis/ zhes gsungs pa bzhin snang srid sgyu mar rtogs te spang gnyen ro gcig khyab bdag sku bzhi ye shes
lnga ldan gyi go 'phang brnyes su zin kyang / gdul bya rnams la don 'di dag legs par gdams te bstan mkhas kyi bgyi ba la dus rtag tu gzhol ba'i bdag nyid chen por lhun gyis
grub bo//dgung grangs nyer bzhi pa chu sprel gsar 'phral bzhugs thabs lhor spos gnang dang / de lo mus chen bsod nams dpal bzang dang / zhal dkar ngag dbang lags la bka'
'doms bzhin gur gyi mgon po'i las sbyor thun mong ma yin pa dang / tshogs bdag 'gab 'dre bse gdong can yang gnon par mdzad/ nag zla'i nang rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched
nas brag rdzong ma'i las tshogs shwa bzlog rgya cher sgrub par mdzad nas/ sa gar thar

rtse rje'i sku rim du drug cu pa zhig gnang skabs gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang yang sa skyar byon zhing 'di lo gnas gsar rjer gong du bstan pa bzhin gsang sngags gsar rnying gi
chos skor gyi gtso bo dmar po skor gsum dang / gur mgon gyi phyi nang gsang gi nyams khrid rjes gnang lung sogs gsan skabs gnal lam 'od gsal gyi ngang du bka' rtsom 'di
ltar yang mdzad do/ /kha'u brag rdzong nag po'i ri khrod du/ /zab don du ma'i 'byung gnas chos kyi rje/ /sa lo 'jam pa'i rdo rje rdo ring par/ /snying nas gsol ba 'debs so
byin gyi rlobs/ /zhes gsungs pa 'di 'dra'i rigs gzhan yang rje nyid la mang du 'khrungs kyang gsang 'os 'ga' zhig ni 'od gsal de las bzhengs nas thugs dran cher mi gsal
ba'i tshul mdzad lags/ de mtshams nas gzhi tshoms dmar steng 'og dngos grub gling sogs kyi nyams gso gsar bskrun lta bu dang sngags dus kyi 'bur sku rnams gzungs zhugs su
mdzad de/ dkar bdud lcam dral gyi snang brnyan byin rlabs kyi gzi brgya 'bar pa 'di dag gsar bskrun mdzad skabs dang / de'i tshe 'jam mgon gnas gsar bar sger pa'i sras
mo gang gi gcung dam pa'i rig mar 'os tshul mdzad pa bzhin/ mdzod pa sogs tshang ma bka' gros mthun par thag chod/ de'i sngon dang chu stod zla nang sogs la rjes gnas gsar
ba/ mus chen bsod nams dpal bzang sogs la a mes zhabs khu dpon gyi rnam thar ljags lung / phur sgrub dang bstun phur dbang tshar gnyis/

gzhan dad ldan mang por gsang 'dus lugs gnyis dbang sogs mang du gnang / dbyug zla'i nang gong sku rnams la rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched nas rab gnas 'bring po dang / rgyal
ba rdo rje phur pa'i sgo nas mdzad gong du a Ni drung sku khams nyog mur yang yang sku gam du phebs te bka' mol zhib gleng mdzad rje sku mched gur drag kyi ljags bsnyen
la bdun gcig bzhugs skabs nyer dgu a Ni drung kun dga' bstan pa'i nyi ma zhing brjes pa zhabs rjes rnams bka' sdom mthil phyin bstsal te/ gur drag sbyin sreg dang smin zla'i
tshes mgor bdag mo bsu ba'i sngon 'gro phrin 'chol skabs skyed lhas su rtag gtor 'dzugs gnang gis rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rgyud rin po che chad med myur byon gyi
ched du zhag shas phrin 'chol la gzhol/ tho rengs zhig la rje nyid kyi zhabs spyod khung la shor ba'i rkyen gyis zhabs lham yu ba sgrog bcas g.yam rnon gyis thal bubs te/
zhabs pus g.yas kyi 'og tsam du sku rus mthong tshod kyi rma byung yang zhag shas nas rang skam la song ba ni ngo mtshar gyi mdzad pa 'phyang mo nyug dang bral ba'o/ /de'i
tshe 'od gsal du slar 'byung gi mtshan ma 'di ltar 'khrungs te/ mgon khang de sngar las rgya che zhing bla bre yol ba sogs bkod pa phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa'i nang
kha'u pa'i sku 'di na bza' dar tshon gzab ma bcas bzhugs khyim nas phyir cung zad 'thon pa'i zhal 'dzum gsung 'byon la khad yod pa'i drung / bud med rgan mo zhig gis lcags
phur gser tshags

ma dar tshon gyis brgyan pa zhig rje nyid la phyag 'tshal sngon 'gro'i sgo nas phul ba'i mur/ ka gdong gi gtor sgom de zhal byang la bstan nas gtor ma bzhengs rgyu yin dgongs
pa zhig dang / yang skabs shig gser gyi rdo rje gnyis phyag tu 'bul mkhan zhig 'khrungs pa rnams kyi 'bras bu mngon gyur kun gyis spyod yul du gyur pa 'di bzhin dang /
smin zla'i bcu gsum la bdag mo phebs pa'i ston mo gzhas sogs gzab 'chor dang / khyad par gong sa rin po ches gzim 'gag 'od 'jo sku tshab tu ched mngags kyis legs po tshad
med bstsal pa sogs gzhis byes mtha' dag nas rten 'brel gyi sgo brgya phye bar mdzad skabs cung zad 'tshubs nyams kyi rtags 'ga' zhig kyang byung / de nas gzhung zhabs mchog
nas zhol khang chos mdzad ched mngags kyis zhag shas gsung bsnyad nyin gang tshoms chen du mdzad pa'i dbu dang / mdos chung mdos chen sogs gang gi bka' yis 'jam mgon
gcung dam par legs par 'doms so//dgung grangs nyer lngar phebs pa chu bya rta zla'i tshes gcig la rlung chen tshad med byung ba bal yul nas gzhan la med 'jug byas par gleng
zhing de nas mang mkhar gnas gsar bas 'cham gzigs 'bul dang / tshes drug nas bzung yongs rdzogs bstan pa rin che'i nyams len gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas
pa'i gdams ngag 'jigs bral stobs kyi mgon po dpal ldan birWa pa nyid la ye shes kyi mkha' 'gros dngos su

stsalstsol ba'i man ngag mkha' 'gro'i zhal rlangs can thog mar 'chad pa'i sgo dbye bar mdzad do/ /zhal slob gyi gtso bo 'jam mgon mthu stobs dbang phyug gi dbu g.yas skal ldan
rnams la zla gsum gyi ring stsol bar mdzad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ni/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi ljags rtsom gdung rabs rin po che'i zhal skong nang gsal bzhin dang
/ snron zla'i tshes lnga nas 'bum thang gtsug lag khang rten brten pa bcas nyams gso sa 'bum dngul gdung du bskrun pa ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyur bur bkang / sa rgyan
gnam rgyan mchod dpyad gdan rabs sogs ngo mtshar gyi bkod 'doms bla na med pa'i mgo tshugs par mdzad/ de mtshams nas gsol thabs lhor spo gnang gis chu stod zla nang rje btsun
rig byed lha mo'i char 'bebs la thugs gzhol ba'i skabs/ shing rdo rje phug na 'jam mgon mthu stobs dbang phyug nyid de sngon nas sku snyun pa'i 'phrod bzhes gnang mur/
rje nyid la 'phral du phebs brda zhig byung bar rtab rtab por byon pas/ sku rlung gi rnam pa 'dra mos dran med du bzhugs 'dug pa la rje nyid nas thabs sna tshogs kyi 'du
ci yang zhig mdzad pas / dar tsam nas ljags dbugs kyi rgyu ba slebs tsam byung zhing de skabs thar rtse dang gnas gsar rje gnyis char bzhugs pa la skyabs 'jug ljags gul
gsung brtag bcas zhu gnang la/ gnyis ka'i gsung la 'phral 'tshub las skyon mi yong gsung ba bzhin/ phyi dro nas thugs dam mdzad khul dang / mi ngo cher mi mkhyen cing gsung

yang mi mdzad pa bcas rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas bcar bzhugs kyis nyin gang 'khyol/ mtshanamo zhabs 'bring pa rnams sku drung du bkas mngags te rje nyid gzim phug gi mdar
bzhugs pas/ nam phyed tsam nas mnal bde mor khugs pa'i gnas tshul snyan du gson/ sang nyin nam langs 'phral sku 'khris su phebs pas zhal 'don gnang thub tsam 'dug pas thugs
bde/ de nyin 'jam mgon gnas gsar ba nas tshe dbang sogs bstsal ba nas rim dwangs kyis phur sgrub sogs la phebs/ de'i tshe thar rtse dang gnas gsar rje gnyis char nas bdag
mor rten 'byung dngos po'i gnang cha dang legs slob zhal ta stsol bar btsun mor sku dngos phebs/ ston mgor thar rtse rdo rje 'chang ngor phebs gong gsung las/ rje rdo
rje 'chang de nyid mkhyen rab la sa skya paN chen dang / mnga' thang phrin las la 'phags chen blo gros rgyal mtshan dang mthu stobs nus rtsal sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal
po dang mtshungs pa yong nges rang lags/ zhes lkog gyur rjen gsal gyi lung bstan thog tu 'khel ba stsol rjes rig 'dzin pho brang gi sgo sgrigs sogs shin tu 'grig par mdzad
de/ phebs skyel zhu mi rnams la da ni gzim chung ya gir yang de tsam mo/ /zhes 'gyangs min nas zhing brje ba'i gsung dang / ston nas dgun 'go'i bar gnas gsar rdo rje
'chang nas gsar rnying du ma'i chos bka' dang lhag par mgon po zhal bzhi pa'i chos skor rjes gnang nyams khrid lung sogs yongs rjogs bstsal zhing phar yang / 'jam mgon

gcung gnas gsar zhal dkar rje drung chos sde nyi zla zung gi dge 'dun kha shas la 'khor lo bde mchog lu nag dril bu gsum gyi dbang chen sogs 'ga' zhig la sgrub thabs rgya mtsho
grags pa'i rjes gnang tshang ma lung sogs chos bka' rgya cher 'jo bar mdzad/ de'i sngon sog po ching cung gi mi sna sogs sngar bla med dbang gi smin pa rnams la dpal
sa skya'i gser chos bcu gsum sogs rgya cher bstsal te mthar 'jam mgon gnas gsar ba nyid dbus phyogs la chibs bsgyur skabs rje rdo rje 'chang nyid thugs 'phreng yang byung
tshul gsungs pa ni gnas gsar ba nyid gdan sa 'dir rjes phebs kyi skabs so//dgung grangs nyer drug tu phebs pa shing khyi'i dpyid kyi chos grwa lha byang sogs skal ldan
mang po gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas thengs gnyis pa stsol skabs gsung ngag sngon mar ma gnang ba'i dbang lung rjes gnang sogs mdzad pa'i rnam grangs rnam
thar chen mo bzhin/ gzhan yang rnam thar 'di stod smad bar gsum du gsungs pa'i dbang lung khrid gsum snang tshul rnams mdor bsdus las zhib par rtogs par 'dod na rnam thar
chen mo las shes par bya'o/ /de nas gong smos bzhin 'bum thang gtsug lag khang phyi nang gcong zom can la bla ma gong ma du mas nyams gso nyen ka sogs rgyun chags su mdzad
kyang gtan brling khel ba ma byung ba'i stabs/ rten brten par bcas yongs rjogs gsar bskrun gyis/ rnying

pa gyar zegs phran bu tsam yang med pa lta bur bkas 'doms zin pa/ gnam sa bar gsum mdzes byed mchod tshogs kyis phyur bur bkang ba rnams kyi char gzhi ha lam grub dus gang
gi yum mchog dam pa nyid snyun bzhes kyi mu dang / sa ga'i gsang 'dus sgrub mchod thog gser can grwa skor ba bcu lhag dang / de'i bla ma dpon g.yog sogs la 'dod 'bras bzhin
gsang 'dus mi bskyod pa'i dbang dang / khams pa grwa rgyun bsnyen mtshams pa bdun tsam la lha brgyad rjes gnang / snron zla'i nang sgrub mchod thog chos grwa lho'i dbyar
chos pa rnams dang / gser can grwa skor ba/ mus pa bcas la 'khor lo sdom pa nag po pa'i dbang tshar gsum dang / yab rje'i dgongs rjogs kyeai rdor sgrub mchod thog gdong
dga' chos sde ba sogs skal ldan gyi skye pho mo mang po dang / sa stod gzhis gnyer/ g.yang chos rgyal sras/ gnya' nang pa dpon g.yog sogs mi grangs brgya dang brgya phyed
la kyai rdo rje'i rgyu dus kyi dbang tshar drug dang/ yang gdong dga' ba phal cher dang chos sde byang pa 'ga' zhig bcas bdun re khro bcu'i rjes gnang tshar gsum/ gro
bzhin phur sgrub thog pho brang na bzhugs shing / phur sgrub skabs snga phyi sna tshogs su 'bum thang gzungs zhugs 'od zer dri med de'i dkyil chog grangs gsog gi sgrub par
mdzad pa dang / skabs 'gar bzhi thog tu phebs te rgyal yum dam pa'i rkyen sel la rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched nas thugs gzhol ba'i skabs/ yum gyi gsung las/ do nub

bzhi thog tu bzhugs la sang nyin tshogs dung byung bstun byon cig gsungs pa bzhin mdzad nas sang nyin phebs khar yum gyi sku drung du byon gsungs pa ltar phebs par/ yum gyi
gsung las/ da lam bdag nad 'di'i kha nas thar ba zhig mi yong bas/ des na nyid rang ni sku na dar bab lugs gnyis la mkhyen rlabs rgyas pa sogs blo kyog ma dgos/ 'on kyang
bstan 'gro'i mdzad par thugs brtson che gshis sku 'khrugs ma byung bar mdzod/ gcung po 'di thugs sems chung la sku gcong che zhing zhabs 'debs ma thugs gyong ba sogs 'o
brgyal rang byung dogs dang / sku tshe'ang ha cang ring ba zhig ma byung dogs pas/ nam bzhugs bar sku mched da lta bzhin thugs mthun pa dang dbu 'don yang dag mdzod/ gzhan
yang rje btsun drung rnams dang zhabs phyi sogs la zhal mngag du ma mdzad mthar/ rgan mo nga 'das shul gang mdzad na'ang nyid rang nas mkhyen pas des ma 'thus pa gang
yang zhu rgyu med gsung ma thag rje nyid kyi thugs la lta ba bka' rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi gsal 'debs lta bur 'khrungs pa'i mur dar tsam mnyam par bzhag rjes/ gsung lan
du/ da dung sku rim 'phrod bzhes sogs yang dag zhu bas yar skyed bzhes thub tsam e yong / ci ste ji gsung bzhin thog bab shar tshe gang ci'i zhal chems 'gyod med zhu/ gsungs
pas yum mchog nyid thugs dgyes pa rab kyi rtser son/ de nas phur sgrub ring dang khrums zla'i bcu gsum bar res 'jog gis de nyin dbang khang na dpal

gsang ba 'dus pa 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub mchod gnang skabs glo bur du da ni gshegs par nye bas re zhig yar byon nas gsol ba bzhin mdzad pas mi'ang mi mkhyen cing / spyan
phan tshun du gzigs thub tsam mchis pas de ma thag rje rdo rje 'chang chen pos bdud rtsi ril bu khrus chur sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phel gdung rin po che rnams gnang bas
dar tsam nas thugs dran gsal zhing / bcu bzhi'i shar gyi skya res shar tsam la sgrub mchod kyi tshogs dung gsan ma thag yum nyid phyag thal mo sbyor bzhin pa'i mur dgongs
pa chos dbyings su zhugs 'phral/ gang gi zhal chems bzhin gzim 'od la nas mkha' spyod ma'i 'pho ba gsal 'debs sogs dgongs zab rjogs thabs kyi mdzad sgo mtha' dag rje rdo
rje 'dzin nyid kyi gsung gis legs par 'doms nas/ dgun dus kyi tshe 'jam mgon dpal ldan chos skyong dang zhal rgyas mgo zla'i nang tsha rong sde pa/ chos sde lho byang
/ gling tshang bla ma dgun chos pa bsnyen mtshams pa sogs 'ga' zhig 'dod chos dbang sogs bstsal/ de mtshams nas khams phyogs hor khang gsar dpon g.yog brgya skor rje rdo
rje 'chang nyid kyi snyan grags sgra 'dzin gyi bu gar lhung bas dad pa'i yid kyi khye'u dbang med du khugs te dngos 'bul rgya che ba dang bcas mjal phyag la bcar ba gzhung
sne shan bcas la'ang lugs zung gi bdag rkyen spyi dang bye brag bla ma zhi khro'i tshe dbang bskur ba bcas legs par bstsal to//

dgung grangs nyer bdun du phebs pa shing phag rgyal zla'i bcu gnyis la rje rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs bdag dam pa lugs zung gnyis char nas sku drin gzhal bar dka' ba thar
rtse rdo rje 'chang nam mkha' bsam grub kun dga' mtshan dpe'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhing 'di'i gdul bya re zhig rdzogs pa'i dgongs rjogs kyi rim pa spyi dang bye
brag rje rdo rje 'chang nas dngos dang brgyud nas mdzad dgos rnams yang dag par bka' drin che mthar/ bsam yas mkhan gsar/ 'dam thog bla ma/ lcags la mgron gnyer/ gzhung sne
shan pa/ rtse gdong 'bul sdud bla ma 'brug bla sprul sku sogs skal ldan mang la 'dod chos dbang byin rlabs rjes gnang yang dag bstsal zhing / sde dge mkhan rin po che
dpal ldan chos skyong sogs brgya phrag brgal bar rta mgrin rjes gnang dang tshe dbang / rdzong gsar bla ma sogs la phur dbang / lho byang bsnyen mtshams sar lha brgyad sogs
kyi rjes gnang / tsho sgo skor chen pa mnga' zhabs dan khrod pa pho mo drug brgya skor grub rgyal tshe dbang tshar gnyis sogs bstsal/ gzhan yang rta zla'i nang ngor thar
rtse'i 'bul sdud pa dang spras bla ma/ ka leb bla gsar/ dbo zla'i nang sde dge gnyer pa/ nag zla'i nang dbon lha rgyal sogs mang por so sor 'dod chos kyi re ba skong bar
mdzad/ de'i tshe bco brgyad tho rengs sgo rum bla ma lha khang du 'jam mgon sa skya paNDi ta sku gzi brjid dang ldan zhing zhal 'dzum pa bcas dngos su gzigs pa nas bzung
sku

bstod shes bya thams cad ma sogs shlau ka gcig phreng 'khor re chag med du mdzad/ gzhan yang 'gro mgon 'phags pa rin po che thengs gsum tsam gzigs pa'i gcig 'bum thang ldeb
bris la yod pa 'di bzhin dang / rgya gar shar phyogs za hor gyi rgyal khams de dpal sa skya nas brtsams pa'i lho nub na yod par nam mkha' 'ja' tshon gyis gang ba dang /
skabs shig mus kyi spang steng zhig na bla ma rab byung bgres po sku bem drag chem me ba zhig gsol nas chos 'chad mdzad rgyu yin dgongs pa dang / yang mus kyi 'du khang ka
bzhi ma kha lhor bstan zhig na/ bla ma bgres po de ga bzhugs nas rdo rje snying 'grel gyi bshad pa mdzad pa dang / yang dpal chen pho brang rnying dus yongs rdzogs 'khrungs
pa'i g.yab kha nub bstan zhig tu gung tshigs mdzad kyin bzhugs pa dang / zhwa lu'i ldeb bris la mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bshad pa gnang mu nas bden bzhi'i chos 'khor bskor
ba bshad pa'i tshe gos ser gyi snam sbyar bzhes nas gnang ba sogs sngon gnas rjes dran lta bu ya mtshan mtshar du che ba de rnams kyang 'khrungs shing / nag zla'i nang
nas chu stod zla sked bar kun rdzob ltar snang du rdo rje'i sku brnyes/ rje rdo rje 'dzin chen po nyid la sku khrag brtas pa'i snyun gzhi bstud mar bzhes tshul gyi skabs
'jam mgon dpal ldan chos skyong nas sku rim gyi zhal bkod dang nyid nas kyang sku gegs sel thabs sgo gang zab mdzad cing / lhag don rje nyid kyi thugs dam tshe sgrub rnams
la brtson par mdzad pas rim gyis snyun

gzhi dbyings su dengs/ lo de'i ril sgrub gang gi gcung dam pa nyid kyis thugs 'gan bzhes shing / de'i tshe rje btsun gong ma'i bdud rtsi ril bu'i rta rnams mang du spel bar
mdzad/ de nas chu stod zla mjug tsam nas thub bstan mkhan po bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan/ ri khud sprul sku bsod nams dbang phyug sde dge smad shod bla ma yon tan rgya mtsho
sogs skal ldan rnams la slar yang zab rgyas kyi bdud rtsi 'di ltar grol bar mdzad do/ /snar thang brgya rtsa rnams kyi rjes gnang yi dam chos srung sogs kyi rjes gnang
zur bka' drug cu brgal tsam sbyong rgyud dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang / bde mchog nag po lugs sogs dbang chen zur bka' bcu drug jo lugs dang / nyi sbas sgrol ma nyer gcig
gi rjes gnang gro bzhin phur sgrub thog phur dbang bcas te dus gnas thams cad du zang zing dang bral zhing / bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba chos sbyin 'ba' zhig
gis dus 'da' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che nam langs nyi shar lta bu zhig byung na ci ma rung dgongs pa'i thugs bskyed gzhar yang mi bskyud pa 'di ni/
klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las chos kyi sbyin pas ni zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /zhes dang / rin chen phreng bar/ chos kyi
ched dang de bzhin du/ /gzhung gi don dag dran pa dang / /chos kyi sbyin pa dri med pas/ /tshe rabs dran pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sogs mang du gsungs

pa'i don yang thugs la 'dogs par mdzad do/ /de nas mgon khang khag bzhir phrin 'chol sogs sngon 'gro'i dbyug zla'i nyer lnga'i nyin/ rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched rin po che
zhal rnam pa gnyis sku 'khor ba rnams dang bcas dbus su chibs kyi kha lo bskyod par mdzad pa de ni rje nyid kyi dbus phyogs su phebs thengs gnyis pa ste/ maNDal du gsol
tshigs dgon rgyas su bzhugs zhag de nas rim bzhin lcang gshongs dang rgya mdud/ srad rgod dang lcags ri snar thang dang gzhis rtser zhag gsum sogs rong chen brgyud/ rim phebs
kyi bar lam dgon khag rnams su dbang rjes gnang skye bo'i tshogs mtha' yas par khrom dbang sogs gang la gang 'dul gyi gdul bya rnams smin grol la 'god bzhin par/ de'i
tshe gong sa rin po che cung zad sku ltem tshul bzhes skabs yin gshis mjal phyag sogs ji ltar yong ngam gsung mu dang / rong sner phebs dus rgyal rtser 'brum dogs sogs
gang sa yid gnyis kyi khyogs la 'chang bzhin par phebs kyang / rgyal ba yab sras bka'i dgung blon rnams sogs che btsan tshang mas gzigs bskyangs phun sum tshogs pa bstar/
'di nyid kyi yig tshangs bka' khongs na bzhugs pa'i ma khongs tshang mar phyi khral sne sel tsam las gzhan rtsa chag gi gtan tshigs 'byed khra chen mor grags pa'i shel bam
sbug dam rin po che dgyes rtsal sogs drag zhan mtha' dag nas zhabs kyi padmor 'dud cing phu dud che ba sogs te/ ji skad du/ dam pa rgyang na gnas na yang / /'khor

'dab phan pas ring nas skyong / /zhes dang / rgyal po rang yul che ba tsam/ /dam pa gang du phyin sar bkur/ /zhes rten 'brel gyi chos nyid du mchis lags pa dang / lhag par
gru 'dzin pho brang chen po nas kun gzigs bdun pa chen pos bdag rkyen dbu 'don gyi mdzad pas spyir bag dro zhing / yang sgos de sngon gzhan nas mjal phyag zhus pas nyer blangs
sku khams la gnod pa 'dra yang byung tshod mchis kyang rje rdo rje 'chang zhal rnam pa gnyis la phyag gnang ba'i nub mo mtshan gzim 'jam pa dang / zhabs brtan phul
ba nas sku la yar skyed bzhes pa sogs gong sa de nyid kyi rnam thar lcang skya rdo rje 'chang gi gsung rtsom de na'ang bsngags brjod bcas 'khod par gnang 'dug pa bzhin/ rje
rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid ni/ dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du grub mtha' ris su ma phyed pa'i mkhas grub la gus shing / de dag gi gsung gi bdud rtsi bzhes pa'i dbu
bla yang gong gsal ltar dang / khyad par rgyal ba yab sras 'di rnams snyigs dus bstan 'gro'i mgon du bsam bzhin phebs pa yin dgongs pa'i thugs dad rang byung bcos min

skye 'gro kun gyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa dang / yang sgos bod kha ba can pa'i bsod nams kyi bgo skal du rnyed pa jo bo rin po che'i sku drung du rab gnas chig sgrub

mdzad pa'i tshe/ gang zhig gcung rin po ches gzim chung khams gsum du sme brtsegs kyi sku khrus dang / gzhan yang shU aM ban/ bka' mda' rtsis gsum sogs la dges rdor rgyud dbang
tshar gnyis/ mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs lan gnyis tsam rjes gnang zur bka'i gras bcu phrag gcig tshe dbang mi 'dra ba lnga sogs so so'i zhus ngor 'dod chos de rnams
bstsal te/ gsang phu dang shel grong du khrom dbang sogs gdul bya rnams smin grol gyi go 'phang la reg par mdzad cing / gdan sa nas phebs gong du 'jam mgon gcung rin po
che'i gsung las/ da lam nga'am mthu stobs gang rung zhig gis phung po dbus su bzhag 'gro gsungs pa'ang lkog gyur rjen gsal gyi lung bstan 'khrul med du byung ba dang / gang
ltar gnas de'i mdzad sgo rnams grub ste rim phebs kyis/ brag yer pa/ 'brom stod 'phan yul 'da' bskor chibs bsgyur te/ na lendrar bdun gcig bzhugs te/ dbang rjes gnang
mang pos skal ldan smin par mdzad rjes/ lcags ri khra mo dngastag rtse/ rgya mda' sgrub rnying / rgya ma khri khang / de nas la mo dang / gtsang thog dge ldan gnas gzigs/
sa sgang dang / bde chen spus mgo dang skyid gshongs/ g.ya' ma lung dang bsam yas su bzhugs zhag nyer gnyis mdzad/ shing phag lo mjug der sku rten 'phrin las par chos skyong
zhal mi gzigs pa zhig byung ba ni/ 'gyangs min nas 'dzam gling bstan 'gro'i mgon po gong sa rin po che dang 'jam mgon mthu stobs

dbang phyug gang nyid sku zhi ba'i dbyings su phebs pa'i ltas dang / de'i dus su sku phebs thog rje rdo rje 'chang nyid la chos skyong gis dbu btsugs nas bka' bsgo dam bzhag
mdzad dgos zhus pa bzhin gnang ba nas bzung / yang yang sku phebs par grags lags/ gong gsal bzhugs gnas rnams dang bsam yas bcas par dbang rjes gnang lung gar phebs su

gnyis/ mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs gsum/ gzhan yang lha brgyad rjes gnang ljags lung 'ga' zhig dang / 'jam mgon gcung rin po che nas kyang kyai rdor rgyud dbang tshar
drug rta mgrin skyer sgang rjes gnang bcas bstsal bar mdzad/ de dus dbu rtse rigs gsum gling bzhi gling phran gtsug lag khang rnams la rab gnas cho ga'i sgo nas me tog 'thor
bar mdzad dus/ thal rlung cher g.yo ba sogs 'tshub nyams 'ga' zhig byung bas/ gter ston chen po kun bzang bde chen rgyal por gang ci'i brtag zhu mdzad pas/ 'jam mgon
gcung rin po che nyid khong gi chos bdag tu gter lung las/ nub nas sa skya'i gdung rgyud byang chub sems/ zhes lung zin de yin tshul dang / sku tshe'i tshad ma nges gsungs
pa'ang mngon gyur du go zhing / rje rdo rje 'chang nyid las/ so bdun zhe lnga 'phrang la tshe sgrub dang / /tshe dpag med sku stong rtsa bzhengs shing

mchod/ /phyeng sgrol drug cu re dgu sku tshe'i tshad/ /gsungs pa byung yang skye 'gro'i bsod nams ngan pa'i snod du seng dkar gyi 'o ma bzhin de bas so/ /mgo zla'i nyer gnyis
la sa skyar 'chi med bu khrid dam/ chos mtshan 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma 'di nyid sku bltams pa'i tshul gnyer dpon bgres pos bsam yas su yi ge'i brda sbyar ro//dgungs
grangs nyer brgyad du phebs pa me byi shar 'phral brag kha rdzong du bdun dang rtse thang 'bras gling du bzhugs zhag gnyis/ der khrom dbang ljags lung sogs bstsal/ de skabs
rtse thang 'bras gling nas grwa pa zhig la dregs byed yin khul khog tu brlams tshul la/ rje nyid kyi gsungs las/ de skabs nged kyis sngar med kyi srol gsar mi dgos byas
pas/ kho pa tshig za'i zhe nag gis nged kyi nu bo de 'das kyang gnod 'khyol tshul ngo so byed pa dang / gzhan yang 'bras gling bar mi shes pa gang byung yang kho pas yin
tshul dang / rtse thang lung spyir yang char pa bsrung tshul sogs byas shing / lus g.yar kho rang nas kyang grwa tshang dkrugs shing kho na byed pa sogs zhing bcu tshang
ba'i las la mthu rtsal yin pa'i kha so bton skad 'dug pas/ dgra bgegs ngo mtshar can shAkya'i bstan la rgyab kyis phyogs pa zhig yin pa la ni the tshom mi 'dug bzang ngan
gang yin na'ang yin du chug rang rang gi thog tu rnam smin khur nas 'gro dgos yin 'dug go zhes thugs 'ur nyams dang bcas gsungs/ de nas khra 'brug dang sang

nyin gtam snyan bzhugs khri'i mdun gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang nyid slob tshogs dang bcas chibs bsu'i ja gral thog dbus lho byang gi gnas tshul las 'phros pa'i don yod kyi dpal
mgur grol bas gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang nyid thugs dgyes rab kyi rtser son zhing / bkra shis chog mang skabs mdzad pa'i gar 'cham sogs gzigs phul/ mgon khang chen mor zla
mjug dus gtor mdzad skabs bla ma dang mgon po dbyer med nam mkha'i khams khyab pa zhig gzigs shing / rjes su bzung ba'i brda yang dag pa 'khrungs pa dang chabs cig snyan
brgyud kyi bstan pa dar ba'i 'phrin bcol gnad smin du bka' drin che/ 'jam mgon gnas gsar ba chen por rje nyid kyi gsung rtsom 'ga' zhig gi ljags lung 'bul gnang dang /
rkyen sel du grub thob tshe dbang zhig zhu bar mdzad pa ni dus 'dir phan tshun bka' 'brel rjes mar nges shing / de nas gong gi gter ston la lung zhu'i gras su/ bsam yas chos
skyong sku phebs min gyi skor mchis pa bzhin/ de lta'i tshig rigs shig la/ 'di la lha mi gnyis kas bskang bshags bya/ zhes gsungs 'dug pa la 'jam mgon gnas gsar ba chen
po nas/ lhas mi la bskang bshags ji ltar byed/ ces nyams ldan gyi gsung bcas bzhad/ chos sde nas phebs nyer/ phyi nang gsang ba'i bka' 'doms rnams zhib rgyas su bstsal
nas sri gcod 'bum par phebs skyel bka' drin che ste/ sku gsung thugs dgyes pa'i rnam rol du bzhugs shing / kha btags kyi g.yab

mo sogs mdzad pa ni rtsa ba'i bla ma rdo rje 'chang chen de nyid dngos mjal gyi tha mal rang yin lags/ de nas sger par grub thob tshe dbang zhig bstsal ba de'i tshe sger yum
'das pa'i zhe dgu 'dzin skabs bcas gshegs bzhugs tshang mar babs 'brel yang dag dang / de nas phebs skabs thal rlung kho na dang sger pa'i yab la shangs khrag byung ba
sogs 'tshub nyams shar ba ni slar 'byung gi mtshan ma dang / de nas rim bzhin chibs bsgyur te/ byed tshogs par rgyud dbang tshar gnyis/ smin gling du tshe dpag med lha dgu'i
dbang / grwa thang du rgyud dbang sogs dang khrom dbang / 'gar tshang dang bdun phud/ bdun phud chos 'khor kun rig dbang tshar bzhi sogs dang / gzhan yang zur mkhar/
rdor brag rig 'dzin chen po skal bzang dbang phyug de'i grwa tshang dang rmor dgon/ ra ba smad/ rnam rab/ gong dkar rdo rje gdan zhe re skye tshal/ yang rtse legs gling pa/
dpa' de'u/ yar 'brog thar gling / dga' ldan sprul sku/ 'om thang gong dang / ra lung / klu mo gdong dang stod thub/ dpe ston dang / nas lung bde skyid 'od 'bar/ rlogs
dang mdo lcang khar/ de nas a drung skyed tshal 'og pa nam klu lding / pad tshal khyung ram khyung rgyab/ rgyan gong zhwa lu ri sbug rnams su chibs bsgyur te/ sa dgon rnams
su kyai rdor rgyud dbang / phur dbang / kun rig rnams kyi dbang lan grangs du ma/ gur lha brgyad sogs chos srung dang / rjes gnang zur bka'i gras

du ma/ bskang ba chos spyod rigs rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi gsung rtsom mang po'i ljags lung gnas mchod/ bsnyen bkur mang 'gyed gya nom pa stob pa skye bo'i bgrangs yas la grub
rgyal ma sogs kyi khrom dbang / ris med kyi bla grwa rdzong dpon sogs la tshe dbang / rta mgrin sogs kyi rjes gnang sogs skal ldan gyi gdul bya du ma yang dag lam la 'god
bzhin par/ lcags dang ngor e waM chos ldan du khrom dbang / tshogs chen la rnam rgyal rjes gnang / thar rtse khang gsar/ klu lding sogs la/ mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs
sogs bstsal nas/ de skabs 'gro mgon 'phags pa rin po che'i thugs dam rten thub pa'i dbang po'i dngul sku mthong ba don ldan 'di nyid phyag tu son tshul ni/ rje nyid kyi
gsung las/ 'gro ba'i mgon po chos rgyal 'phags pa rin po che'i thugs dam rten dngul sku khyad 'phags 'di me byi zla ba bzhi pa sngon ma'i tshes bdun rgyal phur gyi 'grub
sbyor nyin yon tan rin po che du ma'i 'byung gnas dpal e waM chos ldan gyi rten brten par bcas spyi dang / khyad par thar rtse rdo rje 'chang chen po'i nang rten dngul gdung
rin po che la kyai rdo rje'i rab gnas 'bring po phul ba'i cho ga grub nas gling khang du 'jam mgon dpal ldan chos skyong gis kho bo mched 'khor bcas la/ dga' ston rgya
cher stsol ba'i thog/ sku 'dra rin po che 'di lo rgyus dang bcas gsol ras su gnang ba dang / thar rtser slebs skabs dpon rin po che dpon g.yog rnams nas sgrol dkar gyi
brtan bzhugs gnang ba

sogs mdor na rab gnas la shis pa'i rten 'brel mtha' dag ma bsgrigs lhun grub tu 'grig pa'i rten khyad par can 'di sa skya ngag dbang kun dga' blo gros sangs rgyas bstan pa'i
rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal ldan sa skya'i sde bstan pa gdung rgyud dang bcas pa'i 'thas su/ khyad 'phags gtsug lag khang gi rten gras su bzhugs su gsol ba 'di bzhin
ji srid bstan pa rin po che nam gnas kyi bar de srid du bzhugs pa'i 'phrin las mgon po che chung lcam dral 'khor dang bcas pas mdzod/ ces gsungs pa de bzhin/ da lta yab
rje padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gi gdung rten nang gzungs su bzhugs skad dang / yang de lo tshe sgrub slob dpon tsha bo blo bzang don ldan gyis phul ba'i chos kyi rgyal
po 'phags pa rin po che'i phyag cha'i gras ljon dmar las grub pa'i gar blugs kyang gtsug lag khang der sbyor bar mdzad lags/ de nas byed spe/ gangs can srad rgod khro bu/
dge sdings/ rdzi lung sngon mo rdzong bdun/ rdo rje gdan pa/ bya gshong bo dong e pa sogs dgon pa rnams su gnas gzigs dbang lung sogs gong bzhin/ spyi dang bye brag gi
