gdul bya rnams rnam grol thar pa'i khang bzang du 'dren par mdzad cing / gzhan ma rje de'i mdzad pa ni nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam na de dus kyi mdzad pa ji snyed pa brjod
pa yang de dang 'dra ba ste 'di yang gnad don du shes dgos shing / de nas sle'u dang ra ma se lung / bkra shis dar rgyas nas gdan sa chen po dpal ldan sa

skyar chibs kyi kha lo bsgyur te bkra shis dang dge legs kyi dga' ston gtang rag sogs kyis dus 'da' ba'i skabs so/ /sa ga zla nang rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs bskyed
rlabs po ches ji srid bskal pa'i bar du zhal gyi dam tshig bskang gso gsar 'dzugs mdzad de/ de'i tshogs dbur rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched zhal rgyas su phebs shing / tshugs
gong gtso gtor bdun rgyab bye nas bzhag cing gtor dar mchod me'i khar lhung grabs kyis me nyen che tsam byung ba sogs ni/ lo de'i ston bdag mos dbus la phebs pa dang phyi
lo 'jam mgon mthu stobs dbang phyug nyid zhal mi bzhugs pa'i snga ltas su ngos 'dzin mdzad/ snron zla'i mjug nas chu stod zla mjug bar rje nyid tshe dpag med lha dgu'i
ljags bsnyen sbyin sreg bcas bka' drin che skabs 'jam mgon gcung dam pa nyid tshogs dbur phebs mu yin pa bzhin/ bde mchog sgrub mchod dus de gras kyi grwa gzhon zhig phyogs
la 'khyar ba sogs ngan ltas bstud mar byung tshul gsungs pa dang / de tsam nas gong dkar rnam grol chos dbang rgya mtshor gdan sar phebs nas bka' chos 'go tshugs pa
dang / gro bzhin tsam nas bzung bdag mos dbus la phebs rtsis mdzad mu dang / phur sgrub thog phur dbang tshar 'ga' zhig bstsal rjes khrums zla nas klu lding zhabs drung mi
'gyur rgyal mtshan/ rje drung ngag dbang / yon tan rgya mtsho sogs la sgrub thabs rgya mtsho jo lugs dang nyi sbas sgrol ma nyer gcig rnam sras rigs chen bco lnga rnams

kyi rjes gnang dang / sman bla klu dbang lha lnga sogs rjes gnang zur bka' zhe lnga tsam sbyong dkyil rigs gsum bcu gnyis spyi dang tshe dpag med lha dgu sogs dbang chen zur
ba bdun/ nA ro mkha' spyod sogs byin rlabs rigs lnga phrag rnams so sor rgya gzhung bod gzhung sgrub thabs rnams kyi lung sogs chos bka' rgya cher bstsal/ de mtshams gong
dkar rjer gong du bstan pa bzhin/ dpal rtse sogs yog dkyil chen mo rnams gsan bzhes mdzad rjes/ khrums zla'i nyer gsum nas 'jam mgon mthu stobs dbang phyug nyid kyai rdo
rje'i gzhi bsnyen la 'jug par mdzad cing / dbyug zla'i tshes 'gor bdag mos dbus la phebs pa dang stabs mtshungs su 'jam mgon gcung rin po che nyid thog mar sku rlung 'dra
bas rim gyis snyun lci tsam bzhes tshul dang / de dus mdzod 'dzin pa'ang dbus su phebs/ rje nyid kyis dam pa rnams kyi ngo mtshar rnam thar gtso bor gyur pa chos 'chad
sogs 'char 'phar gyi bstan mkhas bgyi ba rnams dang / gang ci'i rim gro'i zhal bkod bcas tshar phyin mdzad/ smin zla'i nang a Ni drung dang gong gi yum mchog dam pa de
nyid kyi nang rten dngul gdung rin po che gsar bskrun mdzad rgyu'i nang gzungs gdung tsha rnams la phyag nas dang / mgo zla'i nang khang gsar dpon chos skyong bzang po/ or
du su blo bzang tshogs gnyis/ tshe ring pi pi sogs la kyai rdor rgyud dbang dang / dmar po skor gsum gyi rjes gnang sogs 'dod chos kyi bdud rtsis blo gros bum pa 'gengs
par

mdzad rjes su mdos 'phrin 'chol nang so grub nas rta mgrin yang gsang gi sgrub pa mdzad pa'i skabs/ sa skya tshogs kyi dar chen la rlung gnon sgrog thag 'dogs mi thang du lhung
nas tshe'i dus byas par tshang ma ya nga zhing rnam rtog za ba zhig byung ba de bzhin rjes su dgongs tshe/ me glang lo'i dpyid rgyal dbang rin po che dang dbyar 'jam
mgon gcung dam pa nyid zhing brje ba'i ltas su ngos 'dzin mdzad pa bzhin don la'ang de ltar du 'khums so//dgung grangs nyer dgu phebs pa me glang rgyal zla'i nang rje rdo
rje 'chang sku mched kyi rgyun tsha rnams la/ zhal dkar ngag dbang lags nas dbu rtser rab gnas brgya tshar mdzad skabs/ nyin gcig 'jam dbyangs gzi 'od 'bar ba'i spyan gnyis
nas chab zegs ma zhig byung zhing / rta zla'i nang ngor pas 'jigs byed drug cu pa dang / gong dkar dpon slob rin po che nas kyang gtor bzlog mang du gnang mu'i dbo zla'i
tshes bzhir gong sa rgyal ba rin po che chos dbyings su thim tshul gyi dgongs rdzogs 'bul bar mdzod 'dzin lha sar phebs shing / rje nyid nas dgongs rdzogs su bde kyai
gsang gsum sogs kyi sgrub mchod gnang / de'i tshe klu lding zhabs drung rin po che zhabs 'bam gyi snyun lci mos ngor du khyogs la gdan 'dren mdzad rjes/ gza' skar legs
'dzoms nas mus chen sems pa chen po'i thugs dam ma ras bris tshe dkyil zhal phye nas tshe dpag lha dgu'i sgrub mchod brgya tshar gyi dbu tshugs mdzad/ de dus zla sked tsam
la/ gang

nas 'ong med pa'i bud med sprul gzugs 'dra ba lung pa du ma'i mi nor ngo shes ba zhig byung ba ni dus rtags lta bu yin 'dra gsungs/ mdzod 'dzin gdan sar 'byon nyer 'jam mgon
gcung dam pa nyid la chab bsags kyi 'goo zug dang dbye tshogs sku rten pa'ang 'byor/ de sngon nas bla ma dam pa du ma dang chos skyong 'ga' zhig gi lung / gzhan yang mo
rtsis sogs la babs pa'i tshe dbang rje gnang sogs tshang ma rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas mdzad pa dang / mnyam du tshe chog gtor ma/ bka' bstan gsung sgrogs/ mdos gtor bzlog/
bskang ba/ sbyin sreg satstsha sogs sku rim sgrub 'os kun chos sde nyi zla zung / ngor chos lhun/ zha lu sogs su mdzad cing / gzhan yang rtsis bon nas 'byung ba'i gto
bcos sogs gang 'tsham mdzad skabs shig rje nyid lha khang rtser phebs te byes tshogs sku rten par sku gsol thog lung zhu nan tan mdzad pa lung don rbod gtong gi cho 'phrul
yin tshul dang / 'jam mgon dpal ldan chos skyong gi gsung bzhin bgyis pa 'thus tshul dang / phad bur lcags slang sogs bcug pa zhig zhags pas bcings te/ brag chung gi
rir gnon la de'i khar mchod rten byin can zhog ces dang / yang nam mkhar yul gyis gzigs te lam gyi bzhi mdor lha babs mchod rten bzhengs/ ma 'ongs pa mkhyen pa'i lha babs
mchod rten bzhengs dgos dang / gzim chung gtso bo'i shar lho rgyal mtshan dkar po 'dzugs dgos sogs dang rje rdo rje 'chang rang nyid

gdung spel gnang dgos sogs lung bstan gsal ba dang / de nas ring min 'jam mgon gcung dam pa'i sku mtshams grol kyang sbyin sreg gnang ma thub cing de'i tshes bcu drug nyin
g.ya' lung 'jag gshongs kyi 'khon sku la nyams gso gsar bskrun nang gzungs bcas legs par mdzad/ de dus lan cig rje rdo rje 'dzin gyi 'od gsal du/ sgo rum bse mgon chen po
yin dgongs pa'i mgon po'i zhal 'bag sngo thal char lhags kyis gdungs pa 'dra ba zhig ltag sgo rdo skas 'gor gzhan la 'gro tshul gyis byung bas thugs khral 'khrungs pa zhig
dang / de mtshams nas 'jam mgon gcung rin po che dgongs pa gzhan don du gtad pa'i rje rdo rje 'chang nyid la 'od gsal du mtshan ma bstud mar 'khrungs tshul dang / ngor
chen dpal ldan chos skyong spyan drangs te thugs nyams 'od gsal du 'khrungs pa'i mtshan ma ngan pa zhi phyir zhabs rim rgya cher mdzad kyang sku gegs bzlog med lta bus 'jam
mgon gcung dam pa mthu stobs dbang phyug nyid lo de'i chu stod zla ba'i tshes bzhi la/ zhing 'dir mdzad pa re zhig rdzogs te dgongs pa chos dbyings su mnal tshul dang
/ zhabs 'jug dgongs rdzogs rgya cher sgrub par mdzad pa rnams gdung rabs rin po che'i rnam thar zhal skong chen mor rnam thar bcas pa bka' bstsal ba bzhin dang / khrums
zla'i 'gor gdung tshwa rnams grub pas rje nyid lha khang rtse'i smon gnas yid 'ong tshal du bzhugs 'jags kyis phyag nas grangs gsog dang sbrags/ sku gshegs kyi zhal chems
bzhin

dri med rnam gnyis mi 'khrugs lha dgu rnams rdul dkyil thog nas ci rigs dang / phyi dro'i tshe mgon khang du slad kyi phrin 'chol sogs kyi thugs brtson mdzad/ de nas rje rdo
rje 'chang gi thugs dgongs la sku gshegs de'i zhe dgu zla mchod sogs la dge ba rgya cher ni mdzad zin/ lo mchod kun rig ni btsugs/ gzhan dge rgyun rang ma byung yang chog
da ko gdan sa mdzes rgyan dngul gdung khyad 'phags shig byung na sku gshegs kyi dgongs pa rdzogs thabs kyang de bas lhag pa med pa dang / khyad par gdan sa chen po 'di
la zhabs tog tu dgongs te thog mar dus mchod gtsug lag khang bkod legs mdzad rjes der bzhugs yul bgyid 'khrungs par/ sku mdog che skabs zhig gso mi rung ba'i rgyu mtshan
sogs snyan sgron bzhin lha mthil sprul pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por sku gsung gi rten khyad mtshar bzhugs kyang thugs rten khyad thon ma bzhugs par dgongs/ mchod sdong
'dzam gling 'od gsal 'di nyid bzhengs rgyu'i thig rtsa thar rtse paN chen gsung la sangs rgyas phun tshogs kyis mchan gnang bzhin mdzad rjes byang chub mchod rten gyi shing
bkod sogs bka' yis 'doms/ dbyug zla'i nang chos grwa lho byang pa/ yul chen pa/ nyi shar ba/ chos lhun pa sogs brgya skor la gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas
pa'i smin grol bsdus tsam zhig mdzad pa ni 'di nyid 'chad thengs gsum pa'i skabs so/ /

de mtshams nas 'dzam gling na blo ldan gzur gnas kun gyis bsngags brjod kyi me tog 'thor zhing 'dud pa'i yul du gyur pa mtshan mchog gsum ldan gyi gdung rabs rin po che 'jig
rten na phan bde'i btsas su che ba 'di nyid spel ba'i phyir/ sdom brtson ngur smig gi brtul zhugs las slar ldog ste sngags 'chang gos dkar lcang los mdzes pa'i skur bzhengs
su gsol bar/ lcang skya rdo rje 'chang / gnas sar rdo rje 'chang / 'jam mgon dpal ldan chos skyong / gzhung zhabs rin po che'i dgung blon chen po rnams dang bcas/ sde
dge sa skyong / zhu chen rin po che rnams kyis thog drangs/ mdor na rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan pa rin po che thugs la bcangs so cog nas gdung rgyud rin po che'i sku che
ba'i lo rgyus zhib gleng gis sna drangs te/ gdung 'dzin gyi go sa rin po cher phebs dgos pa'i gsol 'debs nan tan chen po mdzad pa'i rkyen dang / rje rdo rje 'chang nyid
kyang snyigs dus kyi bstan pa'i me ro gso ba la sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal po dang 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi rnam thar lhur bzhes don thog tu 'gyur pa'i thugs bskyed
dang / skye 'gro'i bsod nams mi dman pa sogs sgo du ma nas rten 'brel 'grig ste sngon bzhes pa'i dge bsnyen dang dge tshul gyi bslab sdom rnams gdul bya tshur mthong rnams
kyi snang ngor/ de skabs mkhan po rnams myang 'das kyis mi bzhugs par brten/ sngon du gtsug phud phul ba'i rten thub dbang 'od zer 'gyed spyan drangs pa'i

drung du bslab sdom las nyams pa dang / slar blang du med pa sogs nyes pa mi 'byung ba'i ched du/ sngags 'chang chen po dang / 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa ji lta ba
bzhin dam chos 'dul ba nas bshad pa ltar bslab pa 'bul chog tshul bzhin du mdzad nas ston mjug gza' skar legs 'dzoms thog chos lung rgyal po'i sras mo bzhon pa phun tshogs
tshe ring de nyid gsang rgya 'dzol med du padma 'dam na gnas kyang 'dam gyis ma gos pa bzhin du khab bzhes mdzad/ mgo zla nas bzung rje nyid kyi rje btsun sa skya pa'i
gdung rabs myur 'byon sku rim du/ gdugs dkar nyer bdun ma'i sgrub mchod brgya tshar grangs gsog dang / bdag mor rgyu dbang dang tshe dpag lha dgu'i dbang / sgrol ma nyer
gcig sogs rjes gnang kha shas/ khyad par so so 'brang ma'i rjes gnang brgya tshar rnams mdzad pa nas bzung rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rgyud rin po che ma 'ongs srid mtha'i
bar du 'byon pa'i ched kho nar gnang ba'i mdzad pa gcig pur bltas kyang sku tshe hril po 'khyol ba dang 'dra ba lags so//dgung grangs sum cur phebs pa sa stag dpyid
'go la gong bzhin gyis bla ma yi dam sogs kyi sku par rnams dang / rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas sku par stong du nye ba/ mchod brgya mchod dgu sdom nyis brgya skor 'debs par
mdzad/ rta zla nas mchod sdong gi zangs dngul gser phra rgyan sogs bzo grwa'i bka' 'doms mdzad pa'i zangs dngul gser phra rgyan

skor rje nyid kyi zhal sgo las byon pa'i gdung rabs zhal skong bzhin dang / de'i tshe gzhung zhabs rin po che/ sde dge sa skyong drag zhan du ma/ zhal ngo so so/ chos sde nyi
zla zung sogs dgon sde mang po/ phyag gnyer drung gras/ bla gnyer chos gzhis mi ser sogs kyis phra rgyan gser dngul zangs sogs mang po'i zhabs 'degs phul/ nag zla nas
bzung rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid kyis rnam rgyal stong mchod ji song ba gsog gnang skabs/ gter ston rig 'dzin tshe dbang bkra shis kyis/ de'i gter chos zhig gi lung bstan las/
sa skya bo'i nang gi kun dga' mingaH rkyen bar chad dam sel dogs zon zabaH lha phur pa bsgrubs na mchog tu shisaH rkyen de grol bod khams phan bde spelaH zhes sogs kyi
lung dang o rgyan padma'i tshe chu ngo ma lo rgyus bcas stsol ba bzhes shing / de dang chabs cig rnam rgyal gyi sku gzungs 'bum ther bzhugs pa'i rnam rgyal mchod rten bzhi
bzhengs dgos tshul bzhin/ ngo mtshar rten bzhi'i gras rnam rgyal sku 'bum gyi byang ngos mchod rten 'di bzhi bzhengs gnang dang / brgya dpon bkra shis 'od zer nas rab gnas
brgya tshar mdzad/ chu stod zla nang nas bzung rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs myur byon ched du gzungs grwa lnga'i sgrub mchod brgya tshar mdzad pa'i cho ga rer gtso
mo'i sngags nyis brgya nyer gcig dang lha mo bzhi'i sngags zhe gnyis re/ 'khor sngags nyer gcig re bcas bstun bdag mor dbang bskur brgya tshar mdzad mu'i zla nang der/
ri khrod ma'i bum

chog ljags rtsom gsar sgrig steng nas thog mar gnang ste/ sgo rum du gsung bskang dang sbrags gsang rgya'ang grol zhing phun tshogs gling du phebs/ mi ring bar rje nyid kha'ur
sman chab la chibs bskyod skabs grwa lnga'i sgrub mchod chag med mdzad rgyu'i chas rnams 'gel khal dre'u phyir log pa sogs 'tshub nyams 'ga' zhig byung ba ni/ bdag mo
de yun ring mi bzhugs pa'i ltas dang / gro bzhin phur sgrub grol nas mkhan chen gsar bsko dang bcas bca' yig le tshan du ma 'di rnams ljags sgrig mdzad/ dbyug zla'i nang
de mtshams nas 'jam mgon gcung dam pa'i nang rten du bshad pa ltar/ lha chen 'khyam stod du mchod sdong 'dzam gling 'od gsal gser dngul sogs rin chen du ma las nang bzhugs
sogs sgrub tshul gdung rabs rnam thar lo rgyus dang rnam thar chen mo zhib gsal mdzad pa bzhin dang / 'di nyid kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs chog dang rab gnas bsdus pa du ma/
rgyas pa kyai rdor dkyil chog dang 'brel ba zhi rgyas sbyin sreg bcas mdzad dus/ shangs 'ba' ra sprul skus bum pa bcud ldan kha rgyan can gyi thog drangs/ dngos 'bul gya
nom pa'ang mchod sdong gi drung du bzhes shing / da'u dpon don yod nas gser srang brgya phrag gi 'bul ba'ang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg thog 'byor ba sogs ma bsgrigs lhun grub
kyis la nye phun sum tshogs shing / bum pa ni da lta tshogs chen rnam rgyal sogs la mdzad pa 'di dang / gser de las 'og nas 'byung ba'i bum sgo'i gser sku rdo rje 'chang
bskrun par mdzad/

tshul 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa mnyam med shAkya'i rgyal pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshe lha'i gtso bo zung nas gser gyi 'khor lo dang dung dkar po phul ba sogs dang
mtshungs par sems shing / de'i tshe dpon la dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa phog ste kun dga' rgyal mtshan du ming 'dogs mdzad/ dpon des zhabs brtan gsung rtsom zhus par/ byon dang
'byon 'gyur gyi zhabs brtan gsol 'debs bkra shis 'gyur med g.yung drung gnang nas re zhig tshogs 'don ma mdzad par slar chu lug nas gnang chog byung ba'ang ma 'ongs mngon
mkhyen gyi rten 'brel bla med du sgrig par mdzad par gor ma chag de nas gser dngul sogs kyi g.yogs ma grub pa'i shing 'bum de nyid la/ thub bstan lha chen gyi mkhan rabs
nyer bzhi pa brtson 'grus ye shes kyis kyai rdor rab gnas 'bring po brgya kha yar dang / mgo zla nas rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid kyis gshed dmar sgrub mchod brgya tshar gyi
dbu tshugs par mdzad do/ /dgung grangs so gcig tu phebs pa sa yos dpyid/ gser sku rdo rje 'chang gi bzo grwa dang rim gyis gser zangs g.yogs rnams mdzad mu'i dbo zla nas/
gong gi gshed dmar sgrub mchod 'phro sa ga tsam la grol bar mdzad pa'i dngos chog brgyad dang dgu la gtso bo'i nye snying 'bum chig khri bdun stong chig brgya nga gnyis/
gtso bo'i snying po rtsa sngags yum dang 'khor sngags rnams chig khri sum stong chig brgya nga gnyis re rnams ljags

bzlas su bstar zhing / rta zla sngon ma'i bcu bdun la sde dger dpal ldan chos skyong dang / phyi ma'i bco brgyad la tshe 'dzin dpal skyed bu khrid dam tshul khrims dpal rgyas
dbang mo'i yum phun tshogs tshe ring ma gshegs pas/ snga ma'i nyi dros tsam la sa skya'i nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad sprin kha dog lnga ldan sngar mthong ma myong bas
gang ba zhig byung dus/ 'jam mgon de zhing brjes pa nyid kyis mkhyen pa dang bcas rje de'i dgongs rdzogs su lo ltar dus dran gyi thog byams chos sde lnga klog 'don yang
mdzad/ dbo zla'i nang phun tshogs tshe ring ma'i dgongs rdzogs su 'jam dbyangs kyi sman sku ngo mtshar can 'di'i sku rgyu rten 'dam dpe bral mar grags pa sogs byin rlabs
phan che ba dang / rin po che dang sman sna'i tshogs kyi phye ma 'jim par bsres nas rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi nang rten 'jam dbyangs gzi 'od 'bar ba'i
sku dbyibs 'dra gang lon mdzad nas ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyur bur bkang / rab tu gnas pa'i byin rlabs kyi gzi byin g.yos te bzhugs su gsol ba dang / yang a Ni'i drung
kun dga' bstan pa'i nyi ma dang rje nyid kyi yum mchog bsod nams dpal gyi dbang mo zung gi nang rten dngul gdung rin po che byang chub mchod rten phyag tshad can dbu zhabs
bar gsum gyi gzungs ring bsrel/ sku gshegs zung gi gdung 'dam la satstsha bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems chos srung nor lha'i sku par grangs mang bskrun pa sogs kyis
gtams te/ phra rgyan mchod

rdzas dang bcas ngo mtshar 'phrul gyi bka' 'doms tshar phyin mdzad rjes/ dam ye dbyer med du byin gyis brlabs te lus can bsod nams gsog pa'i zhing mchog dam par mig gi spyod
yul du gsal ba 'di dang / gang gi dbu bla thar rtse rdo rje 'chang nam mkha' bsam 'grub kun dga' mtshan dpe'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i snang brnyan sman 'dam las grub
pa ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi dang bye brag gis phyur bur mdzad/ mi bskyod rdo rje'i phyag can du bzhugs pa de nyid 'dus tshogs nas rab tu gnas pa'i me tog tshar kha shas
dang / rje nyid kyis kyai rdo rje la brten pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i me tog gnad smin phul dus kyi gsung las/ ye shes sems dpa' phebs pa'i rtags kyang shar bas/ dgos 'dod
re skong 'di nyid la rje de rang gi dbu zhwa/ gos ber zhal dkar stegs bcas/ spyi blugs/ 'thor snod/ rdor dril/ nang mchod/ thod TA/ bum pa sogs bsod nams kyi zhing mchog
der phul ba yin cing / rje de'i sku drin ni nam du yang khyer mtha' ma mchis so/ /rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir zhe na/ yab rdo rje 'chang de nyid zhi bar gshegs dus rang nyid byis
pa na phra/ lugs gnyis kyi blang dor la rmongs pa'i dus/ chos 'jig rten gyi mgo 'don tshang ma dam pa 'di'i sku drin gyis bskyangs pa'o/ /zhes gsungs/ gong sku gshegs
zung gi nang rten 'jam dbyangs snang brnyan dang / dngul gdung phra rgyan can/ thar rtse rdo rje 'chang gi sman sku bcas/ de skabs bla brang shar na bzhugs pa

'di rnams lags/ de mtshams nas dbus kyi chos skyong khag gi lung bstan las/ ru mtshon mang po dgos tshul bzhin nang so dus mchod dga' ldan smug chung rnams kyi nang dang /
bsam gling mgon khang steng bcas su so so'i thugs chog gsar sgrig ltar 'dzugs pa mdzad/ yang spyan ltas shig la rtag 'tsher gangs mchod dgos tshul 'khrungs pa yang de bzhin
gsar sgrig mdzad thog snron zla'i nang rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs rin po che 'phel rgyas 'byung phyir dus mchod du/ zang tsha bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang bzang
po dpal zung gi sman sku ring bsrel rnam bzhi'i gang bur bskrun te ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs bar du rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs rin po che rgyun mi 'chad par 'byon
pa'i thugs bskyed bla na med pa dang bcas bla brang go bzhi las/ gdung rabs rin po che'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa dus mchod 'di nyid du bzhugs su gsol/ zla nang der mgon
khang khag bzhi dang dngos grub gling rnams su rje nyid nas bdun phrag re'i ring snga dro sgrol dkar yid bzhin 'khor lo'i bdag mdun bum bzlas rnams dang / de'i rgyas pa'i
sbyin sreg phyi dro chos skyong so so'i bskang phrin bcas dpal gyi zhal zas re 'dod don rnams 'grub par gta' ma bzung gnang gis/ skyed lhas su bdag nyid chen po bzang po
dpal gyi sku bstod gsar bsgrig mdzad pa dang bstun/ kun dga' tshe ring sogs kha shas sku 'bum rnam rgyal la mchod 'bul gyi sgro btags te/ slar yang gsang rgya'i thog chos

lung du rgyal yum sku drin can ma de nyid spyan 'dren par mngags te/ chu stod zla nang gsang khog nas gdan sar phebs par bcom ldan 'das dpal gsang ba 'dus pa mi bskyod rdo
rje'i rdul dkyil du smin par mdzad de rjes su gnang ba du ma dang / lha sku bde stong dbyer med don dam pa'i gshis las ma g.yos kyang ltar snang mthun sdeb kyi la nye shar
ba'i rim gro rnams rim bzhin mdzad/ gro bzhin phur sgrub dang bstun phun gling du tho rengs snga bar phebs skabs shig rje nyid kyi 'od gsal du rgyal yum nyid dang lhan
du brtse chen lha khang du phebs song bar/ gzim chung gi sgo 'gag de na rnal 'byor pa rus pa'i rgyan can bag dro ba zhig bzhugs 'dug pa des sna drangs/ brtse chen lha khang
sa chen sku 'dra rin po cher yab yum nas phyag gnang ste yab kyis yum la rten bshad gnang rtsis kyis/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ zhes sogs bkra shis
kyi tshigs bcad gsum sngon 'gro'i rten bshad mdzad skabs sku 'dra rin po che gzhan las gsal zhing dgyes nyams che ba zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ yab yum sku drin can las gdung
rgyud rin po che zhal rnam pa gnyis 'byon pa'i slar 'byung gi rten 'brel bla na med par yid gnyis dang bral/ khrums zla'i stod la gong gi gser sku rdo rje 'chang yang
tshar phyin nas/ nang gzungs kyi gtso bo gu ru rin po che'i sku tshab gter lnga'i nang tshan bye ma a krong gi sku gu ru yab yum gyi byang sems dkar dmar 'dres shing phyag
nas ma/ ring bsrel

'byon bzhin pa sde srid gtsang pa'i nang rten gras 'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang po'i phyag babs de dang / gnyan phu chung ba gtsug tor rgyal pos zhong bar mdzad pa'i sa 'jam
zhal sprod sa chen gyi phyag nas brgya tshar dang / rje btsun sku mched kyi phyag nas dang thugs dam rten byin can/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phel gdung lnga rnams kyis thog drangs
ring bsrel rnam bzhi grangs mang nyung tsam ma gtogs mchod sdong nyid dang cha 'dra bzhugs par/ gza' skar dge ba nas thor nas sgrub par mdzad/ rje nyid kyi slob dpon
dang / mkhan po 'dus tshogs bcas nas kyai rdo rje'i dkyil chog dang rjes 'brel rab gnas zhag bdun ma rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg 'o thug sgrub pa/ gzhan yang gtsug lag khang rnams
su sna lnga'i mchod pa/ dge 'dun bsnyen bkur/ mchod phreng bstar ba/ phyi skor la me tog 'thor ba/ 'phan sku zhal dbye/ ston mo'i thog spyi sger legs skyes bzhes pa/
'go bzo bar gnang cha/ mnga' zhabs la 'bru 'gyed/ gzhas sogs cha lag tshang ba'i tshul gyis mdzad cing / gser sku rdo rje 'chang la na bza' sogs dang / sku gshegs kyi rgyun
bzhes 'dren chas/ dkar yol dang shel spyad ngo mtshar can du ma/ dngul srang lnga bcu ma'i ting bcu gcig dang / mi ring bar rje nyid kyi 'phrin las zur sbug pha sgar sogs
nas sbyin bdag dad can rnams kyis phul gras dkar shel gyi mchod spyad/ rgyu tshogs las grub pa'i me tog phon bcas phyag tu son pa bzhin slob dpon rin po che

bsod nams rtse mo dang / chos rje khu dbon/ a mes zhabs sogs kyi dus chen mgo zla ba'i tshes bcu gnyis zhabs bskor la phebs/ gdong mchod sdong gi drung du phul zhing thugs
smon rgyal sras kun tu bzang po'i rjes 'gro'i mtshams sbyor yang mdzad/ de nas bzhi thog tu gsang rgya 'dzol med du phebs nas gzim phug sprul sku/ lcang skya'i sku tsha/
zhwa lu mkhan po/ skyo mda' bla ma 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bstan 'dzin bzang po bcas par gsang 'dus 'jam rdor/ nwa ro mkha' spyod bcas dang / yang gzim sprul/ sde dge bla ma
sangs rgyas bzang po/ bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ 'dam bla ma bstan yar/ sangs rgyas dbang phyug sde dge chog dpon kun dga' 'phrin las/ skyong mda' bla ma rnams la gdugs dkar
gnyis/ dri med rnam gnyis sogs dbang chen bcu phrag lnga dang / mkha' spyod skor gsum byin rlabs/ dmar po skor gsum dang / rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i rjes gnang / chos
srung rjes gnang / zur bka' bcu gcig 'jigs byed rwa lugs bcu gsum ma'i dbang khrid las gshin skor gyi rjes gnang bcas chos skor tshang ma ljags lung skor yang bstsal/
gshed dmar lha lnga'i dbang lung bcas/ gnas gsar rje nas sde dge chog dbon la chos bka' rgya cher bstsal dgos kyi bka' bzhin du/ las can gyi zhal slob gzhan dag kyang rjes
su bzung / 'jigs byed rwa 'khrid dus ngo mtshar 'di ltar mthong ste/ de'i 'bras bu rdor 'dzin gyi

sems 'dzin gyi dbu tshugs nyin/ skyid grong gnas po gsung rab kyis/ ral gri yu ba la rdo rje pha lam gyi rgyan ldan zhig khyer nas glo bur du byung ba la/ rje rdo rje 'chang
gi gsung las/ gsung rab dang ral gri dang / rdo rje pha lam gsum gyi ming bkra las bzang ngan ci yin shes ldan dag gis rtogs nus gsungs te zhal byang 'byar ba dang bcas
da lta'ang dbang rdzas khang gi 'jigs byed phyag cha'i gras su bzhugs su gsol ba lags/ yang de lo gdan sa'i gtsug lag khang g.yu thog sogs khag bcu bdun tsam du bla re/
thang ka ting phor bdun tshar/ rnga/ dung / 'khar rnga/ 'thor snod/ DA ma ru/ nang mchod/ rol mo/ sil snyan/ phud phor/ pad sder/ sgo lcags sogs sbyor 'jags mang du mdzad
pa 'di rnams kyang / gdan sa chen po dpal ldan sa skya 'dir ngo mtshar ba'i gtsug lag khang gi rten gzhi/ sprul pa'i lha khang chen mo rnams kyis thog drangs gtsug lag khang
ji snyed bzhugs pa las/ bar skabs su si tu byang rgyal lha sa rdzong pa sogs bstan dgra gdug pa can rnams kyis nyams chag du ma btang bar sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal
pos nyams gso mdzad pa nas bzung / gong ma rim can gyis gces spras su mdzad pa'i rgyun bzang po mi nub pa'i ched dang / lhag par rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs rin po
che 'dzam gling bstan 'gro'i dpal du myur bar phebs pa'i ched du dgongs par mdzad do//dgung grangs so gnyis su phebs pa lcags 'brug lo nas bzung /

gong smos bzhin chag med bzhis mtshon nyin zhag phrugs re'i sgom sgrub nyer bdun tsam mdzad pa rnams je rgyas su gtong bar mdzad pa dang / de lo mgon po'i chos skor mkhan chen
chos bkra shis sogs zhal slob 'ga' zhig la stsol ba'i tshe/ khyab bdag dgon gsar ba chen po sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel gyis rje nyid la dbugs dbyung gzegs bstod
dang bcas pa sa skya ba'i gdung rabs 'byon par lung bstan pa dang / slob dpon bram ze mchog sred kyis sba sder la lcags dkrol ra ma lug gi rgyan btab pa zhig tu gsol ja
dron mo bstsal ba dang / mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags mnal lam du 'khrungs tshe mgon des mdzad pa'i pod chen drug gi 'grel par ljags lung zhu 'dod kyis glegs bam rnams
myur po bzhes skabs mkhan chen de gar phebs mi snang ba zhig 'khrungs shing / sa gar mi 'khugs pa'i dbang grub phral gsang rgya grol legs 'bul dang / mi ring bar sman
chab la phebs skabs ma mo chu gyong ba'i khar/ nyin gcig chab steng du sbrul zhig la snying rje kun nas bslangs te ljags phu mdzad pa'i rkyen gyis zhabs mtheb la zug gzer
'khrungs bas bla sman rgyal tshe ring nas drag yin tshul zhus/ je lod kyis mar lam skyed lhas mgon khang la phebs ma bde/ sgang ma khar yum mchog nas dbu mthing bzhes skabs
chibs bshol ba'i tshe/ zhabs nad sang dengs su gyur pas zhabs phyi kun de gar ha las/ skye pho mo glu gzhas kyis mdun bsus/ gdan sar phebs pas zhabs skyon

ci yang ma byung / 'phral du 'tshub kyang 'gyangs min nas thugs 'dod 'grub pa'i la nye bzang bar ma zad/ dbu mthing bzhes 'phral snyun las grol tshul de bzhin rje nyid 'byung
bzhi la rang dbang thob pa'i dgongs gzhi khyad par can no/ /de'i sang nas yang sngar bzhin snyun gzhi des zla phyed tsam skyed ma bzhes tshul gyis thugs nyams 'ur te/
sman bcos rnams chab la bskyur nas/ sngar nas 'od gsal du 'khrungs shing phyis su rjes gnang yang gsan pa 'jam dpal nA ga rakSha'i bsgom bzlas bsrung skud bcas mdzad pas/
zhag shas nas klu mang po zhig shi ba'i mtshan ma 'khrungs te snyun las grol ba'i tshul mdzad/ snron zla'i mjug nas zla gcig ring rnam 'dren dam pa de nyid/ gnas gsar rdo
rje 'chang chen po'i sku drin gsob ched dang / rje btsun sa skya pa'i sde bstan pa gdung rgyud dang bcas pa'i sku rim du/ rwa tshar thun mong ma yin pa'i lugs 'jigs byed
bcu gsum ma'i sgrub mchod brgya tshar grangs gsog mdzad skabs kyi chu stod zla ba'i tshes bcu gcig nyin gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang zhi bar gshegs pas dgongs rdzogs kyi go
chod byung ba sogs/ lkog gyur rjen gsal gyi thugs mkhyen yin pa la bsnyon du med cing / dgung zhag nam rdzogs bar mkha' spyod ma'i sin dkyil sgrub mchod chag med kyi sngags
sdom oM gsum ma nyi khri dgu stong bzhi brgya tham pa/ sku stod lnga stong nyis brgya go gnyis/ mchog sprul myur 'byon zhe dgu rnams mdzad cing / de lo ga ya dha ra'i
bu chu'i snod

gas pa dang / bsam brling lha mchod dus gur kar chag pa rnams ni dbu bla 'di zhing khams brje ba'i rtags/ rje de nyid ni rnam kun nyin mtshan khor yug tu bstan 'gro'i don 'ba'
zhig gis dus 'da' ba las rnam g.yeng le lo'i dri ma phra mo tsam gyis ma gos/ 'jam mgon gnas gsar ba chen po de nyid gshegs pa nas bzung srod tho rengs nyin bar gung
tshigs skabs sogs yud tsam re bzhugs skabs/ thugs la skyo shas dang / khyad par da ni rje btsun gong ma'i thugs dam chag med kyi rim pa kha gso ba rnams kyang / zhu yul shin
tu dkon pa 'dug dgongs pa'i thugs 'dun du dung dung lhang lhang bcas nges 'byung gting nas 'khrungs pa'i zhal 'don dge sbyor la/ dus rgyun las kyang thugs brtson gyis
rtsa ba'i bla ma dam pa rnams kyis dgongs rdzogs dang / skye 'gro sems can thams cad kyi don du smin rgyas su mdzad/ rje de'i dgongs rdzogs dang bstun lo re bzhin 'jigs
byed bcu gsum ma'i rdul dkyil sgrub mchod gshom rgyas pa dang bcas zhag bzhi'i khongs su/ ya ma rA dza bzhi stong brgal tsam dang / gsol 'debs bzhi brgya lhag tsam re mdzad
cing / phyi lo dus chen nyin dpal sa skya'i lha chen thigs g.yab gtsug lag khang du/ de nyid kyi 'dra sku rin po che gsar bskrun ring bsrel rnam bzhi phyur por mdzad/
rab tu gnas pa'i me tog gis mnga' gsol bar/ dbu zhwa/ na bza'/ phyag phreng / phyag cha/ mchod pa'i yo byad bcas de nyid kyi nyer spyad ngo mas spras te bzhugs

drung sna lnga'i mchod pa 'bul gnang dang / gzhan yang gsung gi bdud rtsi bzhes pa rnams bstan 'gro'i ched so so'i skal ba dang mthun par spel gnang dang / rje btsun sa skya
pa'i bstan pa'i rtsa ba 'khon rigs dri ma med pa'i gdung rabs spel bar bka' bstsal sogs ngal ba lhur len gyis dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i dgongs rdzogs su stobs pa dang /
sngon du dgung grangs nyer gnyis thog gi spyan ltas ngo mtshar can de bzhin dang / de lo khrums zla'i tshes gsum tho rengs gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang dpon g.yog tshang ma
sa skya'i bla brang phun tshogs gling gi dbang khang du mjal bar/ ga ya dha ra'i bum chu'i snod la skyon tshul de zhu gnang la/ skyon med 'gro gsungs shing / rje de la dgongs
rdzogs 'bul rten yin dgongs pa'i khyad mtshar gyi gos phon chen 'bul nyams dang / zhabs gras sbyin rgyam yin snyam pa zhig gis/ yig brgya mtshal dam ma zhig phul nas
rje bla ma snyun skabs pad dkar sprul sku'i lung bstan de 'di yin zer ba kha phyed nas gzigs pa tshigs bcad kha shas byung ba thugs dran mi gsal ba'i tshul mdzad/ yang skabs
shig gnas der gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhugs te maNDal tshom bu du ma zhig gi mthar mchod gtor bshams nas phur pa'i dbang sngar gsan ma myong ba zhig bstsal ba
dang / gzhan yang rnam 'dren de yang yang phebs te rje btsun sa skya pa'i zab chos kha shas la bskyar chos mdzad pa dang / sku'i rnam 'gyur zhi khro du ma'i sgo nas lugs
gnyis kyi blang dor

stsol ba sogs mtha' yas pa zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ 'khrul zad rje btsun gong ma rnams kyi rnam thar kho na ste/ sa skya pa chen por 'jam pa'i dbyangs gtso 'khor/ rnam 'byor dbang
phyug zhang ston chos 'bar sogs dang / 'jam mgon bla mar/ srid pa kun tu legs par sbyangs pas na/ /rmi lam na yang chos kyi sgo rnams kun/ /dge ba'i bshes kyis dngos
su 'doms par mdzad/ /ces sogs mang du gsungs pa bzhin dam pa'i khyad chos sha stag go /de nas dbyug zla'i tshes bcur 'bum thang sa paN phyi rten nyams gso gsar skrun lta
bu mdzad nas rje nyid kyi rgyun gyi phyag tsha lnga stong bzhi brgya don bdun sogs nang gzungs grangs mang bcas byin rlabs kyi gzi byin 'phro bar mdzad/ mgo zla'i bde mchog
sgrub mchod thog tshogs yongs la DA ma ru/ nang mchod/ thod snod gsar bskrun rnams sbyor 'jags kyis sgrub mchod dang dus mdos sogs kyi tshogs dbur phebs pa'i skabs so//dgung
grangs so gsum du phebs pa lcags sbrul rgyal zla'i tshes gnyis nas bzung 'di yin med pa'i snyun gzhi thu ba zhig bzhes pa la/ nub gcig gzim shar gyi gnam sa bar gsum
li khrir gzigs pas/ da rang sku tshe 'pho rgyu yin 'dra dgongs pa'ang 'khrungs mod/ sman bcos rim gro dang thugs dam zab mo'i mthu la brten rta zla'i mjug nas rim dengs
kyi tshul bzhes mur/ gzim shar mgon khang du zhal gyi dam tshig bskang gso mdzad pas sku lus sor chud/ de nas rdor brag rig 'dzin chen pos lung

bstan gdung rabs myur 'byon sku rim du/ gra lnga dang dmar po skor gsum gyi sku par grangs mang dang / de dag gi sku gang legs bzhengs dgos babs pa bzhin/ gra lnga lugs sku
rnams sde dger yon sbyar gyis zhus/ gong gi sku par grangs mang de dag gdung rabs myur 'byon ched dmar po skor gsum bzhengs rgyu'i bca' sgrigs la rten 'brel rang 'grig lta
bur/ de dag gis mtshon sku par mang po de sngon nas gsar blugs grub 'phral yin pa bzhin/ brgya stong sogs phyag btab grangs mang dang / sku rgyur byin rlabs rten 'dam
mtshal sogs dbang rdzas dmar po sna 'dzom 'jim gtsang la byin rlabs mdzad pa dang bsres te/ tshom bar mgon khang du tshul khrims bkra shis sogs nas shin tu gsang bar bzhengs
te/ thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs bcas snron zla'i 'gor grub 'phral rje nyid kyis phyag nas tshar gcig dang / chos las pa bstan 'dzin rin chen gyis brgya
tshar mdzad/ gzhan yang gdung rabs myur 'byon ched mkhar thub bstan dge 'phel du lho byang dge 'dun brgyad grwas/ rje btsun rin po che'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'phrin
bcol sogs zla gcig gi ring bgyis/ zla mjug tu brtse chen lha khang rgya cher bskrun par mdzad pa dang / chu stod zla nang phur sgrub 'phrin 'chol gang tsam la ri nag rtser/
bye ma ngu ba'i kha gnon gyi rigs gsum mchod rten gsar bskrun dang / skyed lhas phrin 'chol la yum gyi gnas gzigs ched/ yab yum lhan du phebs te

byes 'gyur du nub gcig bzhugs/ gnas gzigs grub nas mar lam lha 'phreng lta bu'i rgyu ma lam gyi sked tsam phebs dus/ rbab rgyugs shig byung yang ma skyon/ bsam brling du'ang
zhag gcig dang mar lam ri nag rtser mchod rten rnams la phyag nas 'bring po mdzad rjes/ ri bya sder ma'i ltag tsam du phebs dus/ nam mkha' dbyings shin tu dwangs par dbon
po ri'i thad du sprin dum zhig 'dus te zim char 'bab pa dang / brag chung nas bde gling lcags ri'i bar 'ja' tshon 'od skor lta bu zhig kyang shar bas thugs la ya mtshan
che ba zhig 'khrungs/ gro bzhin phur sgrub grol nas slar yang grwa lnga sgrub mchod drug cur nye bar gsog gnang gis/ yum la dbang grangs gsog mdzad/ de sngon nas sde dge
zhu chen rin po ches gzim chung 'phrod min yang brtag ngos gdung rgyud myur 'byon gang ci'i mtshams la thugs bsam cher bskyed dgos tshul gnang ba bzhin/ yab rje rdo rje
'chang gi gzim chung 'chi med rdo rje'i gur khang rgya bskyed de/ rten 'brel khyad zhag bcu skor la tshar phyin par mdzad/ mtshan yang 'dzam gling phun tshogs dpal 'bar
du gsol te/ gu ru drag dmar sgrub mchod kyis thog mar byin gyis rlabs/ de rjes rdo rje phur pa'i ras dkyil sgrub mchod kyang mdzad pas byin chags shing thugs bag phebs pa
byung gsungs/ khrums zla'i nyer gcig la dpal sa skya'i rgyab ri sengge'i gdong can gyi mig g.yon mtshon byed brag 'bur thad nas glo bur du zhig ral byung bar kun thugs

dogs za ba'i skabs/ rje nyid kyi 'od gsal du/ 'jam dbyangs 'od 'bar ba'i sku drung na rje nyid bzhugs par/ rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi zhabs gras yin dgongs pa'i grwa
pa zhig dang gsung gleng mur/ brag ri zhig tshul de gsungs/ grwa pa de na re/ 'di rje btsun rin po che zhing khams brje skabs kyang byung bas chos rje pas rje'i dgongs
rdzogs dang gdan sa'i sku rim gnyis char la dmigs nas 'jam dbyangs gzi 'od 'bar ba'i sku 'di bzhengs pas skyon ma byung / da lta'i 'di'ang dpal sa skya pa'i bstan srid la
gnod pa'i lcags glang zhig 'thon nyer yod pas zer mur/ rje nyid kyi thugs snang la/ thang sku zhig gi ldebs la ri sngon po gnyis phan tshun rgyugs pa'i sne mtshams nas/
glang sngon po mig khra hrig ge pa zhig rwa nyug ge 'thon nyams byed pa 'khrungs pas/ grwa ba des sngar gyi 'phros las/ da lam yang 'jam dbyangs gzi 'od 'bar ba'i sku tshad
dang mnyam pa'i 'jam dbyangs kyi sku zhig bzhengs na ngo che zhing / de mtshungs nyin gcig nang yum rgyas pa tshar gsum bklags pas phan nam zer ba zhig 'khrungs pa bzhin/
smin zla'i bcu dgu la thigs g.yab lhor dbu rtse 'jam dbyangs gzi 'od 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i rje btsun 'jam dpal dbyangs sman 'dam las grub pa'i byin rlabs kyi gzi 'bar
grang gser leb byugs can sku rgyan na bza' mchod cha sogs dang / gzungs zhugs thugs kar gzhug rgyu'i 'jam dpal gyi sku zhig thigs g.yab rten gras nas 'tshol bar mdzad

pas/ mangga'i mtshan can phyag babs li sku mkhyid gang tsam zhig phyag tu thebs pa'i gsham yig la sbyin bdag gi ming / bsam 'grub phun tshogs kyis bzhengs zer ba'i tshig sgra
legs pa de bzhin/ ma bsgrigs lhun grub kyi rten 'brel lta bur byung bas bstan srid lar rgya la nges par phan pa zhig yin no/ /gsungs pa'i sku 'dra rin po che 'di la dbu
zhabs bar gsum gyi gzungs ring bsrel dang bcas pas phyur por gtams shing / khyad par ri bkra ngan pa bzlog pa'i 'dod gsol bcas 'bul gnang gis/ kyai rdo rje la brten pa'i
rab gnas 'bring po dang / gzhan tshar 'ga' zhig bcas dam ye dbyer med du byin gyis rlobs par mdzad do/ /de lo gzhan zhabs rin po che nas sku rim thugs brtson 'ga' zhig
gnang dgos byung ba ltar/ 'di yang smin zla'i nang rdo rje 'chang nas bdud 'dul phug tu bskang phrin gnad smin la zhag shas thugs gzhol/ de nas mdos chung gi tshogs dbur
phebs kyang de dus mtshan 'grul bsrung dgos stabs gtor rgyag la ma phebs/ dus mdos thog sde dge gnyer pa sngo ye sogs dang / hor kre bo dpon sde dge sras mo bcas dang / gnas
gsar rje'i phyag mdzod sogs kyang 'byor pas/ so so'i blo dang 'tsham pa'i lugs zung gi bdag rkyen dang / phyag mdzod nas bo dhI tsitta'i phyag phreng rgyan ldan zhig
phul/ de nas lha chen mkhan po chos bkra shis sogs zhal slob 'gar mtshan nyid kyi yig cha rgya bod mang pos mdzad pa'i ljags lung phon chen yang stsol bar

mdzad do//dgung grangs so bzhir byon pa chu rta dbo zla'i nang gdung rabs myur 'byon ched du rje nyid nas khyad byang mgon khang du/ gtor bsngo chen mo'i nang gi chos skyong
tshang mar gtor brgya rtsa gsog gnang dus/ gong gi phyag phreng de mdzad chog byung bas/ phyag mdzod 'jam dpal gyis phul yang don la gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi
gdung rabs myur byon rten 'brel bsgrigs sam snyam gsungs/ gzhan yang gdung rabs rin po che myur phebs ched smin grol gleng rta nag thub bstan mkhan po bstan 'dzin rgyal
mtshan/ dza lung pa 'gyur med gsang sngags bstan 'dzin sogs kyis 'khor lo/ za yig rim gro'i zhal bkod sogs tshang ma chos sde rnam gnyis/ ngor/ bkra shis chos sde/ gong
dkar/ sde dge lhun grub steng sogs gtsang dbus khams kyi dgon sde rnams kyis thog drangs sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ris med grub mtha' dang / rtsis bon nas sgrub dgos sogs
tshang ma dang / jo zhal rnam gnyis/ mtha' 'dul yang 'dul/ ru gnon gyi gtsug lag khang / rgyang dang rgyang 'bum mo che sogs sngon gyi gnas rnying du mar zhabs tog dgos tshul
bzhin rtsad gcod mdzad pas/ mtshal ris ye shes sgrol ma rten brten pa bcas deng sang gar bzhugs su la yang zhu rgyu ma byung / 'dan klong thang sgrol ma'ang sku chung
ngu zhig las med skad bcas/ tshang mar mchod 'bul rgya che nas sne 'brel bar ci smin mdzad/ de nas

zhal dkar sman ram par bskul ma mdzad pa bzhin srid 'bebs sman dang zas spyod tshang ma yig lam nas phul ba dang bcas/ gong sar snyan zhu 'dzol med zhus pas phyis su'ang 'di
la thugs 'dogs lhag par che/ gang ltar snga phyi bar mtshams kun tu rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs myur 'byon kho nar thugs brtson 'di nyid gcig pu'i sku drin yang bskal
pa rgya mtshor 'khyer mtha' mchis min blo ldan gzur gnas dag gis dpyod par zhu/ nag zla'i yar tshes la rgyal yum/ lha chen mkhan po/ mus chen/ zur 'char grub dbang sogs
la/ dbang lha dmar chen dang dmar chung skor gsum sogs gnang skabs shig spyan ltas su/ dpon po ri'i rtse nas lha rgyal 'then pa'i skad gsal por gsan pa dang / bzhi thog
ltag gi bskor lam du mi zhig gis tsandan dmar po'i khur po shin tu che ba zhig 'khyer yong ba dang / yang lha khang rtse'i mdzod nag nang khug ma ser po zhig na TaM ka
nyung ngu las mi snang bar/ mi zhig nas da 'di TaM kas myur du khengs yong rgyu yin zer ba 'khrungs pa 'di la ni/ phyi ltar na slar 'byung 'og tu sa khyi lo'i mdzad skabs
gsal ba bzhin dang / nang ltar na khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i gdung rgyud rin po che myur du zhal gzigs kyi brdar gor ma chag de lo gong sa rin po che blo bzang bstan
pa'i dbang phyug 'jam dpal rgya mtsho dpal bzang po gru 'dzin gser khri rin po cher mnga' gsol skabs rje nyid phebs bzhed thun mong ma yin pa mchis rung /

gdung rabs rin po che nyag phra bas bcad rgya dang / zhabs dreg zhabs 'bam sogs sgo du ma nas phebs ma bde bas mdzod 'dzin shes rab phun tshogs la bka' 'doms bzhin phebs/ de
nas chos grwa lho byang gi spyi chen bzod rgyan gyis gzhis rtse bkra shis sogs bkug nas/ thub bstan lha chen gyi rung khang ngam g.yos khang dpal 'byor rgya mtshor khro
chen gsar blugs skabs/ der shis brjod dang khro chen gyi mtshan ljags sgrigs mdzad pa dang mnyam du/ dbyar chos chen po'i tshogs dung dkar po rgyang grags gsung bskul dus
gcig 'dzom pa'i rten 'brel bzang por lhun gyis grub ste/ mtshan yang 'dod dgu rgya mtshor gsol zhing rje nyid nas sgrub gnang gis tshogs bdag thab 'khor yang 'jug par mdzad/
snron zla'i tshes bcu phun sum tshogs sbyor nyin rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas lo gnang dus kyis bcud bum gter 'char can sgrub gras kyi gsung chog de grub 'phral gung
tshigs dang bstun/ chos lung nas rgyal po bsod nams don grub sras 'khor rags bsdus bcas 'byon pa'i gnas tshul gyis thog mar/ mthong smon na da ltar bzhugs yod zer ba gsan
pas/ smon pa'i sgra de bum sgrub kyi tshig sgrar legs shing / de nyid rgyal yum mchog dbu bsil grub nas sku rgyan bzhes skabs sang nyin mjal 'dzom thog ma dang rang 'grig
lung srol gyi sos bskor zhes gos rgyan gzab 'chor skra khru bza' btung 'byor pa dang bcas rten mjal bskor ba glu gzhas rkang bro sogs skyid nyams byed srol nas/ chu

zam sogs zhabs phyi rnying gras thog drangs sde nub pas dga' gzhas byed pa dang 'grig pa sogs ni/ 'jam mgon bla mas/ gang na thod dang skra gsar dang / /gar dang rol mo'i sgra
yod pa/ /de na mya ngan yod min pas/ /des na rol mo bsngags pa yin/ /ces gsungs pa'i don lags/ de nas rgyal po dpon g.yog nas 'jal phyag dngos gzhi dang / phar legs gsol
gnang rgyu tshes bcu bzhir mdzad rgyur de sngon ma bsgrigs kyang / sa skya'i g.yas g.yon mdun gsum na dar 'dzugs dang / chu mig rdzing kha nas bu mo byi lo ma lo bdun
lon pa gsum gyis/ rigs lnga dar dpyangs DA dril bum pa me long thogs nas khrus kyi stangs ka byas te chu khyer dgos bzhin la/ dkar po rnam gsum gyi phyi rten thog nas byon
pa'i 'jam chur grags pa 'di nas bum pa gang khyer ba de'ang mjal gong slebs pa dang / phan tshun legs so khyer mi rnams kyang gos rgyan gzab ma dang / lhag par phar gnang
rgyu'i thog ci'i lo rgyus legs bshad kyi gsung shog rgyas pa ljags rtsom ma de mgron gnyer rgyal tshing nas rim bsher gyis stobs par mdzad pas/ khong dpon g.yog rnams
dgyes pa rab kyi rtser son/ de'i tshe gzim chung gi rtser rgyal po yab sras la tshe dbang mdzad skabs char zim bur bab cing / chos dung dkar po rgyang grags kyi mjal kha
rten bshad bcas rje nyid nas bstsal/ gzhan yang byad 'grol sogs thugs 'dod kyi chos bka' dang / mchod 'bul thog lha chen khyams stod du gsol ston

rgyas pa/ 'phel rgyas bzhugs 'tsher du'ang khrung bzhes sogs go babs dang bstun pa'i bdag rkyen yang dag bka' drin che nas/ chu stod tshes gsum la rgyal po dpon g.yog 'thon
pa sogs rten 'brel khyad par can de 'dra'ang / ring po mi thogs par gdung rgyud rin po che phebs pa'i la nye shin tu bzang bar ngos 'dzin mdzad/ zla nang de phun gling du
phebs te mo lung bzhin/ rje nyid nas brtse chen lha khang du phur bzlog shin tu rgyas pa nyin bzhi'i ring nam langs sa rub lta bur sgrub gnang gis lho chen steng nas nub
tu 'phen par mdzad/ gro bzhin zla nang tsam la spyan ltas su/ pu trar 'phrin 'chol dmigs phug mdzad tshe chu lug nang gdung rgyud rin po che 'byon par lung bstan pa dang
dus mtshungs/ 'dar grang mkhan chen ngag dbang shes rab nas kyang dge 'phel du/ gdung rabs myur 'byon gyi gsol 'debs nan tan mdzad pa'i mnal lam du/ 'jam dbyangs kyi bris
sku zhig gi gras la byis pa chung ngu dar dang rin po ches brgyan pa zhig byung ba bzhin/ gdung rgyud phebs ngo shin tu che ba 'khrungs shing / gzhan yang gra bzhin nang
rje nyid nas nang sor 'phrin 'chol zhag gcig ma dang / khrums zla'i bcu bzhi nas bzung gta' gtor zur brgyad pa 'dzugs gnang dang chabs cig 'phrin 'chol zhag gsum ma mdzad
de rgyal zla'i bcu bzhi'i bar dus gtor chag med bzung nas/ gtor ma spo bar mdzad de/ chu lug rta zla nas chu stod kyi bar la gtor 'dzugs mdzad pa'i dam bca'

gnang zhing / de khongs su gdung rgyud nges par 'byon pa dang / de yang chu lug nag zla'i tshes mgor nga la nges par 'byon pa'i 'phrin 'chol gnad bsnun mdzad pa'i dus gtor
bzung ba gnang / mdos thog mtsho kha nas gu shrI rgyal rgyud jun wang bsod nams bstan 'dzin yab sras/ btsun mo/ sku tsha 'khor rags bsdus bcas rgyal bstan spyi bye brag la
mi phyed pa'i thugs dad brtan pos byon par/ gong ma bdag po chen pos wang gi cho lo bstsal bas khyad par du che zhing / spyir yang rgyas rigs go sa mtho ba dang / yang
sgos chos rgyal lugs zung mkhyen spyan yangs pa bcas sgo du ma nas bkur bzos gang che mdzad cing / rgyal po nas kyang dngul bre chen nyer gsum gyis mtshon 'bul nor spam mtho
ba dang bcas/ zhabs brtan rdo rje'i re khA can gyi rten 'brel mdzad pa/ dus mdos kyi zhabs tog nyin gang ma 'gan bzhes sogs ngo mtshar gyi mdzad pa dang / khong rang
gi thugs bzhed rnams kyang ji lta ba bzhin bka' drin che bas dpon yab sras 'khor bcas dgyes pa'i dpal la 'khod/ dus mdos skabs nye 'gyangs gnas gzigs rnams dang / 'thon phyag
stsal/ nyer dgur tshogs chen mor dpon nas dar 'gyed dang / de nyin gnam gshis shin tu rtsub cing thal rlung nyin 'khyongs ma byung bar dpon thugs dad can gyi gsung 'phros
su/ thal rlung de gtor ma'i gdong ma 'gag par g.yas g.yon du yol nas 'gro ba de 'dra ngo mtshar chen po yin 'dug ces sngags brjod kyi me tog 'thor

bar mdzad pa'ang don la'ang de bzhin byung gsung ngo //dgung grangs so lnga phebs pa chu lug rgyal po lo gsar nyin gong gi dpon la tshe dpag med lha dgu'i dbang dang / gsol
sman/ mgul bsrung / rdo sku'i kha sar pa Ni khyad mtshar/ rje nyid kyi rgyun bzhes zhal dkar 'bras sil gyis gang ba sogs bstsal nas nang sbyar bka' mchid tshang ma snyan
du lhong nges dang / tshoms chen du bla bre yol ba sogs gzab mas mdzes shing / go babs dang bstun pa'i bzhugs stan sder kha sogs kyi thog legs bshad rigs lung gi bgro gleng
bcas gra 'grig mdzad mthar dpon yab sras 'khor bcas kyis rje nyid la mgul dar sgron pa dang bstun/ skyabs 'jug gi rjes 'dzin zhu ba dang / gang ci'i legs lam mtshams
la lha mi ngo 'phrod lta bu'i 'phros yong tshul zhus shing / rje rdo rje 'chang nas kyang lugs zung gi zhal ta mtha' 'doms bcas gnang bas/ khong thugs 'phreng bas 'bral mi
phod pa lta bu'i spyan chab dang / thugs smon yang dag mdzad pa dang / mnyam du sras chung ngu des kyang sku mdun gyi gsol lcog brkos ma nas bzung ste/ smon lam mdzad pa
sogs yab sras gnyis ka thugs tshim pa'i go 'phang la 'god par mdzad do/ /de dus 'di phyogs kha tar/ da lo dpon khag stobs chen sras btsun mo bcas shis par phebs shing /
mdos chen lo gsar bcas gzab lugs 'di'i sang lo 'u bu cag la mdos chen gzab spras byed rgyu yong zer ba'ang don la gnas/ de nas

gtor spod sogs 'char 'phar ci rigs mdzad mur tshoms dmar gnam yangs la 'grems rgyu'i bzang gos khra bsgrigs kyi nor bu'i do shal gsar bskrun gyi bka' 'doms dang / sku rim chen
mo dang nye bar mnga' ris 'phel rgyas gling gi grwa pa rnams la mjal phyag gnang pa'i nub mo 'od gsal du/ sa chen gyi sku zhal byang gzigs shin tu dgyes nyams can 'dzum
zhing gsung 'byon la khad lta bu zhig 'khrungs pa rjes su dgongs tshe/ zla ba phyi mar gdung rgyud rin po che zhal gzigs pa'i ltas dang / nag zla'i tshes brgyad rgyal
phur 'dzom pas rig byed ma dang tshogs bdag nyin thang gsar bskrun dang / gdung rabs myur 'byon sku rim la gal che ba'i tshogs bdag bskang gso ljags sgrigs nyams su blang
bde bar mdzad pa 'di'i gshom dbyangs rol dang bcas 'phags pa rin po che blo gros rgyal mtshan zhes rgya bod khams gsum dbang sdud de'i bzhugs khri padma can gyi steng gnang
rgyu'i tho rengs/ tshogs bdag yus pa lta bus glo bur du yum mchod nyid la sku khrag lta bu'i snyun thu mos ci mdzad gtol med du gyur kyang / rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid kyis
thugs dam zab mo dang / gsol sman rim gro sogs kyis myur dengs dang / de nyin mang sbyin gras su dam sel can gyi mi rgan zhig rgyab khur khyer bzhin du mjal phyag la byung
bas/ des rkyen byas sam dgongs pa'i thugs dogs bcas/ gang ltar gdung rgyud rin po che tshes brgyad rgyal phur nyin 'byon rgyur zhag gcig 'gyang yang / dngos gzhi rten

'brel shin tu legs pa ni/ sngar nas ma bsgrigs rang 'grig nor bu'i do shal 'di'i thog drangs spyan gzigs du ma dang / 'phags pa rin po che'i dbang ting dzhiM kShim mar mchod
bshoms kyis tshogs bdag gi bskang ba thog ma de tshugs par mdzad pa'i spyan 'dren dang bstun/ kha'u phyogs nas kha ba bu yug 'tshubs sogs lha 'go ba'i rtags dang bcas/
gsung bskang yongs rdzogs nyin khongs su grub par mdzad/ de dus yum yang snyun gzhi las grol bas yab yum zhal gyes te dmar po skor gsum gyi sku par 'debs gnang / tshes dgu
dang bcur yang tshogs bdag bskang gso gnang mu'i dgu'i srod 'khor tsam nas bzung / kha ba cung zad 'bab mur sku gdung rin po che bltams ran pas/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid
thugs lhag par spro ba'i ngang nas rgyal tshing sogs de skabs kyi zhabs phyi rnams la srung 'khor/ srid pa ho'i tsakli bcas 'dogs par mdzad/ gang la gang dgos sngags dang
rtsis sman nas bshad pa'i nyer 'kho mtha' dag bsdu mdzad cing / yum la'ang gang ci'i bka' 'doms lhu 'thing zhib lhug stsol rjes rtsa ba'i bla ma dam pa dang dbyer med rje
btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan dang / sangs rgyas sman bla/ rje btsun sgrol ma rnams la thugs smon gsol 'debs rtse gcig tu mdzad kyin bzhugs pas/ sngar gyi kha
ba char du gyur nas ches cher nyil ba dang chabs cig sku gdung yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yum la gnod pa med par bde bar sku bltams

pa'i gtam bzang snyan du gsan ma thag rje rdo rje 'chang nyid dga' mgu yus pa'i rnam pa dang ldan bzhin du/ na bza'i khrod nas dbu zhwa gang thebs shig bsnams pas kha gsar
spus legs shig phyag tu son pa de bzhes/ de dus gnas bcur kha btags mang po skya nyog ge mchis pa'i khrod nas rje btsun rin po che'i snang brnyan gsar bzhengs dang / lung
bstan sgrol ma zung la snyan shal dang / yum sras la bstsal rgyu'i kha btags mdzod rnying spus legs 'ba' zhig phyag thebs rnams bsnams nas byon pas/ sngon gyi bla ma gong
ma rnams dang cha 'dra bar gsung 'byon la khad lta bur spyan gnyis rje nyid la dwangs gsal sgrib med du gzigs shugs che bar bzhugs pas/ rje nyid kyi thugs dgongs la sngar
rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan pa'i rtsa ba gdung rabs rin po che 'byon dka' ba de tsam gyi thugs khur bzod par mdzad nas/ gang ci'i thad la 'on seng 'gyod med mdzad pa
phyag thog tu 'khel ba 'di'ang bla ma dkon mchog gi thugs rje nyag cig tu 'khum pas bslu med rten 'brel gyi chos nyid la slar yang thugs spro ba'i ngang du dar gcig 'byams
par gyur/ de nas rten zung la snyan shal dang / sras yum zhal rgyas la'ang mgul dar 'bras dkar gyi me tog nyil bzhin par phar phyin drug gi bkra shis kyi mnga' gsol yang
bka' drin che/ de nub rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid ha cang thugs spro ches pas 'od gsal yer ba lta bu zhig 'khrungs kyang / sang nyin sku gzugs rgyun las kyang bde zhing /

thugs gsal la zhal bkod rnams 'khrungs bde ba sogs grub mtshan mngon sum du ston pa nas/ nam langs ma thag gzim chung rtser lha bsangs dang rgyun gyi zhal 'don nyams bzhes
sum cur nye bar grub 'phral/ sku rten birWa pa'i snang brnyan sdig mdzub ka li can khyad mtshar/ gsung rten rigs gter rig gnas du ma 'dus pa'i yig cha/ lam zab dang bir srung
phyi nang sogs sa skya pa'i yab chos du ma 'dus pa'i dpe/ thugs rten lcags kyi rdo rje rtse dgu'i thog drangs rten 'byung dngos skyes bzang dgu bcas bstsal te/ phan
bde 'byung ba sogs dge legs tshigs bcad kha shas bcas pa'i legs so dang / yum mchog la'ang byas shes drin gzo dam pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gnang cha dang / zhabs 'bring pa
rnams la'ang de bzhin bcas mdzad cing / chos bka'i thog mar rje btsun sa skya pa'i yab chos skyob pa 'chi med dbang po lha dgu'i dka' dbang gi sna bdun rdzas brgyad rnams
gdung rgyud rin po che'i sku pang dang bzhugs gdan khar 'jog par mdzad pas/ de'i tshe gzhan las 'dra chags pa zhig byung gsungs/ de nas gu ru drag dmar gyi dbang phul grub
'phral rje nyid kyi dbu skra bsil/ gang na thod dang skra gsar dang / zhes sogs kyi lung dang 'byor/ de nas dbang khang du phur mchod gtor gzab gshom ngos snga mgyogs
kyis gtang rag dang / rgyun ring bar nyin ltar sku'i rkyen sel mtha' yas pa zhig mdzad par grags/ sku bltams nas zhag bcu zla bcu lo bcu rnams la

sku rim gzab dgos mchis pa bzhin/ zhag bcu pa'i sku rim la/ chos grwa nyi zla zung gi dge 'dun rnams nas gzab spros bcas tshe chog gsung sgrog mgon khang khag bzhir lha bsangs
bskang gso bcas dang / rje nyid nas nang sor snga mgyogs gtang rag dang / gzhan yang gsang khog tu mchis pa'i rje btsun drung rnam dang / mkhan phyag gnyer gsum sogs
nas skabs babs kyi legs 'bul dang / gza' skar dge ba'i thog mtshan byang dar dkar la mtshal gyis dpal ldan chos skyong ngam dbang sdud snying por gsol ba ni/ rje sa chen
gyi sprul gzhi de dang 'khrungs skabs lha dbang tshogs bdag gi bskang gso tshugs pa na dbang sdud dang / sa chen gyi mtshan mthar snying por gsol bar bcas 'dri ba'i dbu tshugs
pa dang tshogs dung gsung bskul stabs 'grigs kyang byung zhing / de nyid gsang yum sngon ma'i sras mo dgung grangs lnga ma tshe 'dzin dpal skyed bu khrid ces thugs
rig grung po de rang gi thugs tsha nye mkho nyung ngu'i khrod nas sder chung phyur por bkang ste dkar sngon chung ngu 'bras bus gang ba dang / mgron bu kha shas/ dngul gyi
thur chung kha btags bcas gang gi ming po gdung rgyud rin po cher phul nas/ thugs mnyes pa'i rnam 'gyur ci yang mdzad pas/ rje nyid spyir yang sras mo der byams rtsis che
ba dang / sgos su chung ngu des rnam dpyod dod po de 'dra mdzad pas lhag par brtse skyong bcas/ de skabs kyi gro mgron mtshan byang rnams rten sgam du gzhug par

mdzad/ zla mjug der khyad byang du gtang rag gtor bsngos brgya tshar dang / dus gtor chen mo lhan du gnang zhing / sa ga'i mgor bde mchog rje btsun rnam gsum nas legs skyes
dang / zla mjug sman chab la phebs skabs gnyer bgres sogs nas/ da lo 'u cag 'di 'dra'i sku jus 'gro ba zhes sogs mi rgan bsam pa rdzogs tshul gyi 'phros zhus dang / de dus
chos grwa lho byang 'dus tshogs la bden tshig bkra shis 'gyur med g.yung drung thug 'dzin du bstsal/ snron zla'i tshes dgur nyi ma me bzhi'i 'grub sbyor nyin lha mo gsol
mchod mdzad rgyu'i shar mda' btang tsam la gnas bcu'i rtse nas chos dung rin po che gsung bskul te/ mdung pa sogs kyis sngun bsus sgo rum rtser bzhugs khri 'dren chas/
byings la gdan thog dkar yol ja 'dren dngul tib bcas lha bsangs grol nas/ mkhan phyag ban tshang pa sogs tshoms dmar du ja mgron thog mdzod 'dzin nas/ gdung rgyud rin po
che zhal gzigs pa'i zhabs brtan 'dzugs rgyu/ legs 'bul sogs kyi brda 'grem dang de nas lha mchod grub nas mar phebs gdong / ser khang rtse nas chos dung gsung bskul/ dar
'phyar/ dung chen/ cha zhabs kham drung bsam brling du gzhas pa rnams nas bya khra ma'i byang gi gsing gshongs su bsu ba'i zhal bkod bcas sngon du btang nas/ lha khang chen
mor g.yas bskor gyis shogs che bar tshoms dmar du nor bu'i do shal bkram pa dang / so so'i gdan bkod bcas mchis par shar mar phebs

te/ bzhugs khri padma can gyi steng nas legs skyes rnams thugs spro ba'i shog rags dang bcas bzhes pas/ skya ser kun shes pa 'ur zhing sing khrog khrog 'dzum nyams can rkyang
pa rim bzhin byung / zhes gsungs/ de nas tshogs chen dbu byed bzod pas zhabs brtan bden tshig bskul/ slar yang chos dung gsung bskul bgyis/ tshoms dmar du zhabs brtan
sku rim dang rje nyid nas sgo rum gtang rag zhag bdun ma'i dbu tshugs tsam gyis nyi gong du grol bar mdzad/ de skabs 'di ga'i lha mi'i sde tshang ma nas gtam snyan dar 'phyar
gyi brdab shog bo dong sogs gzhan rnams nas bgyis pas/ dud chung sogs mdung dang mda' dar med pa rnams dbyug pa rang bzhin gyi rtser dar ras gang 'byor 'phyar ba sogs
kyi gnas tshul bya gshongs mkhan rnying nas snyan du phul/ rten 'brel des de nub nas bzung char drag po yul phyogs kun tu babs pas ri klung gi rtswa 'bru rnams 'byor pa
phun sum tshogs pas phal cher de kho nas dga' mgu yi rang du gyur cing / sang de nas bzung sgo rum du gur lcam dral la gtor bsngo bskang ba brgya tshar sogs mdzad skabs
gong gi bya gshongs mkhan rnying nas/ bla ma lha khang du sku'i rnam 'gyur ha re ho re'i ngang nas legs so phul bas gzhan las thugs la 'bab pa byung gsungs/ zhag shas nas
khong la 'thon phyag skabs gong gi gnas tshul rnams rim bzhin gsungs pas/ khong bzhugs gdan kha nas phrug phrug gsig gsig gi rnam 'gyur mdzad par gleng / de

nas mdung dar snyan shal spyan gzigs rnams dang bcas skyed lhas su chibs bskyod kyis zhal 'bring re gnyis ma gtogs mdzod 'dzin sogs tshang ma sa skyar mngags/ de lo thams cad
la dga' nyams kyis rta zhon nas brel por 'gro ba la dpe med mnyes 'gro ba zhig yod gsungs/ de nub 'phags pa phug tu gsung bskang bsdus tsam dang / sang de nas dam tshig
bskang gso dang / rje nyid nas skyed lhas rtse dang sgrub sde ba rnams 'phral nas phyogs bzhi'i ri rtser bsangs/ de'i tshe sa skya sras yum nas gnas tshul gyi gsung bris
tshigs bcad ma phul ba'i bka' lan yang tshigs bcad ngo mtshar can du mdzad de/ thugs dgyes pa'i ngang nas bstsal/ de dus spyan ltas su dngul bum g.yu khra can sogs chos
skyong dgyes pa'i mtshan ma mang tsam 'khrungs kyang chos skyong bka' gnyan pa'i stabs de tsam las zin bris ma mdzad/ grol nyin lho'i spang steng du gtor 'bul sogs mdzad
nas khang gsar mkhan chen bsod nams bzang po'i phyag phreng mi thod ma rje nyid nas gur gyi yi ge bdun ma 'bru 'bum bzla gnang de'i rgyan mdo 'dzin bcu bshad bcas brag sgo'i
bug nang du 'bul gnang ni/ phyis shing 'brug lo khang gsar zhabs drung nas 'jam mgon sku mched la zhal pod dang mgon pod kha shas kyi lung bstsal ba sogs ma 'ongs mngon
mkhyen gyis rten 'brel bzang po sgrig par mdzad rjes/ mdung dar gsum sngon 'gro'i glu gzhas kyis bsu ba bcas bsam brling du phebs/ de nub kyang mdzod 'dzin

'khor bcas sa skyar byon dus mun 'thibs nas 'ga' zhig lam du mgo 'khor ba'ang / gad mo'i gnas su bgyid pa las ngal ba'i rnam pa gtan nas mi byed pa'ang byung gsungs/ bzhugs
ring bsangs/ gangs mchod/ rab gnas/ dmag zor ma'i gtor bsngo brgya rtsa/ bskang ba gsol kha/ mnga' gsol sogs bka' drin che zhing / glu gzhas par ja mar sha chang kha btags
sogs bstsal/ snga dgong zhal 'don gyi gsang la pu tra'i mnga' gsol dang rtag gtor bca' sgrig 'phros/ sa skyar phebs skabs kyi zhal bkod phyag bris rnams dang / grol nyin
shar gyi spang steng du gtor 'bul mdzad rjes chibs bskyod de sgrol ma lha khang du mdung dar gsum sngon 'gro'i rgyal yum gnyer bgres sogs nas gzab bzhes kyis chibs bsus/
rje nyid nas maNDal bzhi pa'i gsung chog grub 'phral lha chen bskor nas phebs skabs/ sos bskor ba dang snron zla'i nyer brgyad ser 'du grol ba'i mi mang gyes thog 'ga'
zhig 'khur po mgo steng khyer bzhin du gus 'dud dang bcas 'gro bar rten 'brel dge bar gzigs/ de nas nang so'i rtag gtor gzungs zhugs dang / gtor sgam nang gzhug rgyu'i las
mgon bye brag gi drug ldan rten tshogs rnams la gzigs rtog dang / ma 'thus pa bzo rgyu'i bka' 'doms rnams mdzad cing / sang de nas nang sor gtang rag thog rtag gtor bdud
rtsir sgrub gnang dang lhar sgrub kyi ljags bzlas grangs ni gtor sgam gsham yig na gsal ba bzhin dang/ gnam gang tho rengs

pu tra chen po mi zhig la babs nas dar dkar gyi thod dang phyu pa dkar po bzhes shing / phyag nas bkra shis kha btags 'dom 'khor ma zhig rje nyid la phul ba dang bstun/ gsungs
las/ 'dre la drug ldan rten tshogs 'di 'dra sku drin che byung / zhes de ma thag sku sangs pa'i rnam pa byung yang don du pu tra chen po'i zhal mngon sum du bstan cing
/ de nas rje nyid kyis rten pa yin rgyu'i mi de la 'ju bar mdzad de/ las mgon chen po zhes bos nas lung bstan yod re gnang mur mngal sad pas shin tu phangs pa zhig 'khrungs
pa'i tshul 'di ni 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse la mkha' spyod ma dang / a mes zhabs la mkha' 'gro ma zhig gis dbang gi brda mdzad pa sogs kyi mur mnal sad pas thugs phangs
pa dang mtshungs pas rje btsun gong ma 'khrul zad rnams kyi rnam thar sha stag go /de'i tshe thugs shin tu spro bas yang bskyar gu ru rin po che'i bzhes snod mtshan ldan
ka pA lar/ bdud rtsi ril bu khri stong brgya bcu rnams kyi rdog dang sil bu phon ches bkang zhing / gser zangs kyi tshe bum kyi tshe rdzas kyis phyur ba dang / gzhan
yang snod zangs kha shas su zas sna gang ba bcas chu stod tshes gcig snga dro rje nyid nas nang so'i bla mtshor ka li'i bdud rtsis rnams phul nas/ ka lir ma da na bzang pos
bkang / tshe bum rtag gtor sgam nang dang zas sna bdun du bshams nas sgrub bzhin pa'i gtang rag mdzad/ gung tshigs la phebs dus mus gnyer dge phun gzab 'tshor gyis legs
'bul

thog tsan dmar las grub pa'i tshe dpag med kyi sku che legs phul ba'i rten 'brel dge bar gzigs te sku gdung rin po cher bstsal ba da lta'ang gzim chung rten gras la bzhugs/
de dus khal kha'i mi sna a yu She zer ba ngo g.yog gdong paNDi ta blo bzang sogs mtha' mi 'ga'i thum bu rten chas gras/ tshe mdo dang nor rgyun ma'i mdo bod yig rgya nag
par ma kha gsar phyag 'byor rnams kyang nang so'i rtag gtor sgam nang du bzhugs shing/ khal kha rnams blo kha rdzogs pa'i mdzad sgo yang dag dang / tho rengs zhig tu gzim
chung 'dzam gling phun tshogs dpal 'bar gyi sgo kyog nang gi byang shar na/ stegs kyi khar nang so'i zangs chen bkra shis 'od 'bar phyi nag cing snum pa/ nang zangs dmar
gyi kha gsar g.ya' dang bral bar shar gyi gyang ldeb de nas shing sho wa chu lta bu zhig las chu dwangs gsal zangs nang du 'bab pa'i sgra khrong khrong zhes snyan por 'byin
mur mnal sad pas/ snyan khung na khrong khrong gi sgra de lhang nge mchis pa zhig 'khrungs pa dang / yang nang so'i mgon khang mda'i g.yab der rgyal tshing snyan shal
la phrin byang 'bri skabs rje nyid nas rang bzhin gyi gsung gleng du/ mgon khang de rgya dpangs bskyed na legs tshul gsungs pa dang mnyam du de'i sa dpyad 'dra mo rnam
pa mdzad par gsol dpon bkras rgyan dang rgyal tshing zung nas bzo bab legs po yong ba'i snyan zhu bzhin/ ma 'ongs pa'i la nye de 'dra yang bla ma dkon mchog gi rgyud bskul
lta bu yin 'dra

gsungs/ grol nyin gsung bskang mnga' gsol sogs kyi skabs rgyal yum nyid mchod mjal dang sbrags snyan shal/ phyi nang gi mchod pa/ spyan gzigs na bza' yon gos sogs 'bul gnang
/ gtor dang chabs cig sngar gyi ru mtshon chung ngu de'ang steng lha spe gsar bskrun gyi thug chog dang mnga' gsol mdzad/ mgon khang du phebs te rtag gtor la rten bzhugs
thod pa nyi zla kha sbyor gyi srung dmigs bcas gtor sgam la sgo rgya mdzad nas rjes chog bkra shis rgyas pa rnams bka' drin che ba dang / sngar gyi 'phrin 'chol 'dzugs
gtor ma mdzes rgyan mda' dar dkar po kha tshar ma nyams pa de la tshe mdud kyis spras te tshogs rdzas dang bcas sku gdung rin po cher bstsal ba zhal byang can mgul bsrung
gras su bzhugs/ sang nyin nas dngos grub gling du dpal chen yang dag gi phrin gzhung bdag bskyed/ gtor bsngo bskang ba spyi 'gro'i khog phub/ nor skyong yab yum la gsang
ba rnying rgyud nas gsungs pa'i bskang ba yig cha gzhan dang sdeb sgrigs lugs dang / dkar bdud phur srung bstan ma bcu gnyis bcas la de skabs ljags sgrigs kyi gsol kha mnga'
gsol bcas zhag bdun mthar gtor 'bul bstan skyong can dang / de nas dus mchod gtang rag thug 'dzugs sogs mdzad pa dang mnyam du dga' ldan smug chung la'ang de bzhin gzhan
la'ang bka' gsang gis 'doms shing / zla ba de'i gza' tshes dge bar tshang ma gzab spros bcas gsol thab lhor phebs thog/ rje rdo rje 'dzin nas drag dmar

bsgom bzlas kyi lha'i nga rgyal brtan pos thog mar/ oM A ka ni sogs dang / gtsug 'bar/ rig 'bar/ rigs gsum mgon po/ de nas gur drag rnams kyi ljags sngags bzla bzhin par bum
chu du ma 'thor bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas byang sems sogs kyi sku zhi drag mang po rten sgom rnams dang bcas sku gdung rin po che phebs byams la gdan 'dren zhu mi
mgron gnyer rgyal tshing dang tshe bsam nas 'gan blangs/ lha chen rgyal sgo'i nang du phebs pa nas bzung / rje nyid rgyal ba tshe mtha' yas pa'i ngo bor bzhengs te/ tshe
gzungs oM gsum ma ljags bzlas mdzad mur mthong smon bla brang phun tshogs gling gi gzim spyil gsar pa rje nyid kyis gsar bskrun ngo mtshar dpal 'dren du phebs 'phral/ phar
phyin drug gi shis brjod byabs khrus sogs mdzad mur char chen po zhig babs pas/ rje nyid kyi thugs la rten 'brel la sgrig mi dgos zer ba 'di yin dgongs pa 'khrungs shing
/ gzim chung rtser lha bsangs dang / de nas rnam 'joms khrus sbyangs tshe chog lo gtor gsar 'dzugs rnams mdzad cing / rig 'dzin pho brang dang lha chen rtser byang pa
tshogs yongs nas lha bsangs bskang gso sogs zhal bkod bzhin dang / gnas de dag gi rtse nas nyin gang dar 'phyar dung 'bud/ gzhan yang kong gzhas bcas dang / rim gyis phur
sgrub phrin 'chol sngon 'gro'i dngos gzhi'i mchod gtor rnams sngar bas ldab 'phar dang / bcu bzhi bcu dgu nyer lnga sogs la dkyil 'khor zangs dra'i sgrom rtser gdugs

rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs 'phyar zhing / nyer dgu'i nyin tshogs rdzas rgya cher bshams pa sogs deng sang phur sgrub gzab res su grags pa'i rgyun 'di byung / phur sgrub skabs
gzhis byas nas zhabs brtan legs 'bul 'char 'phar mang du bzhes/ khrums zla'i nang pho brang bzhi thog tu phebs skabs kyi bca' sgrigs kyang gong bzhin la phebs byams brtse
chen lha khang du gra sgrigs mdzad de/ sa chen snang brnyan rin po che snyan shal mchod 'bul bcas gnang ba 'di ni 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can nyid kyis gtsug lag khang
du phyag phebs pa'i sgo dang po dang / de nas gtang rag sman chab sogs lugs 'gro bka' drin chen nas/ khrums zla'i gza' tshes dge bar sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal po'i gsung
rab las mkhan ru 'dren dang bcas pa'i 'tshams dpe dpang por gnang / rje nyid dang brgya dpon bkra shis 'od zer/ zur 'chad grub dbang dam pa rin chen rgyal mtshan rnams
zhal rgyas te/ snga thog gi slob rgyun la dag ma dag gi dpyad pa nan tan mdzad nas ru 'dren sde bzhi dang pu tra mtshams pa dgu tshan bdun gyi 'go par bslab sbyangs dang
/ zla nang der dbu rtser lo rim la ched du dgongs pa'i mgon po lcam dral gyi 'bur sku gsar bskrun gyi mgon po'i zhal khyim ni bdag nyid chen po'i 'tshom sku sor bzhag
lta bu dang / lha mo yang mgon po'i zhal khyim sor bzhag la zhal rgyan dang rgya mtshon byed me ris med pa/ thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs bcas bka' drin che zhing / gzhan

yang de lo khyad 'phags 'phags pa'i thugs dam rten hor bzlog lcam dral dang / tshoms bar mkhas btsun phyag bzo byang 'dul mgon po rnams gsar bskrun lta bur nyams gso mdzad
de/ ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi dang khyad par gyis phyur bar rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyis phyag nas dang / 'dar mkhan po ngag dbang shes rab kyis mgon po thun mong ma yin
pa'i rab gnas zhag bdun mdzad pa sogs zhib par khang zung gi deb tu gsal bzhin dang / gzhan yang gdung rgyud rin po che gegs med du phebs pa'i gtang rag tu ched dmigs mdzod
'dzin pa shes rab phun tshogs la bka' 'doms kyis/ lha chen zur lcog lcags ri dang bcas pa'i spang bad spen bar du bsgyur bar mdzad/ dbyug zla'i sa mchod chen mo'i bde
kyai gsang gsum la so so'i rab gnas 'bring po sbyor gnang gis bde mchog rab gnas rje btsun sgrol ma'i gser sku gsar bskrun ngo mtshar can 'di dang / sa chen gyi bris sku
byin can gyis mtshon bris 'bur gyi sku du ma/ kyai rdo la lam 'bras bla brgyud bris ma sogs dang / gsang 'dus la de'i bla brgyud bris thang sogs zhal dbye zhing mchod tshogs
rgyas pa dang bcas/ bcu bzhi'i nyin sa skor dang sbrags thog mar tshoms dmar nas rgya dkar nag mkha' spyod/ dngul gdung khyad 'phags steng 'og tshoms bar sogs rim bzhin
bzhi thog shar brgyud tshogs chen mo'i phyi mtha' nas khro khang steng 'og sa tshogs shar sgo nas bya khra ma'i shar brgyud lha chen sogs nas phyi bskor la

rab gnas kyi me tog dang / grol nas mtshams kyi 'go pa rnams mdzod du bsgrigs nas bka' tho bkram zhing zhal bkod mdzad/ sang nyin bco lngar gza' 'dzin la gzhan dag thugs rtog
cher mdzad/ rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid ni/ gsang ba spyi rgyud las/ nyi ma zla ba gzas zin dang / /ya mtshan che rtags byung ba dang / /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla ba la/ /bsgrims
te dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /zhes dang / bdag cag gi ston pas/ sang bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i do nub zla bar sgra gcan zhugs/ grags 'dzin mar rgyal po don grub kyi sras bltams
pa'i mtshan sgra gcan 'dzin du grags pa rnams kyi rgyu mtshan des na ya mtshan lhag par che bar dgongs pa bzhin don la grub pa 'di'o/ /zla mjug la dus mdos gzab ma'i
sku rim dmar chen gtor bzlog skabs kyang spyir rtags bzang zhing / lhag par gtor bzlog grub nas 'cham/ sku bzhi thog tu gdong bzhugs gding khyad pa'i a tsa ra des rkang
g.yas kho na btegs te shar rgyag rgyugs song bar khrom la dgod sgra chen po byung bas rten 'brel legs/ smin drug zla nang nas 'cham rgyugs rim bzhes 'char 'phar gyi mdzad
sgo dang / dus mdos dkyus gzab kyi dbye ba mchis pa'i bka' tho dang / phyag len 'ga' zhig la skyon 'don bcas dang / mgo zla'i nang phur khang du zhal 'bag zhwa phod ka khrab
sogs chas rnams tshang mar rje nyid nas kyai rdo rab gnas 'bring po mdzad rjes pho brang du phebs skabs/ bla brang zam pa'i g.yas g.yon

la a li chos rjes khams pa nyi shu rtsa grangs shig mkhar rnga dar tshon sogs dngos po du ma khyer nas mchis pas/ bkra rtags shin tu legs pa'i bka' grol/ de dag kyang rnam
thar bsdus pa las/ dngos rnams 'od gsal gzigs snang dang bstun nas/ /gdul bya'i khams dang bsam pa bag yod rnams/ /rgyu tshod ji bzhin mkhyen pa'i mngon shes kyis/ /dus gsum
shes bya gzigs la gsol ba 'debs/ /ces gsungs pa kho nar nges shing / zla 'di'i tshes nyer gsum nas dus mdo chen mo zab res mdzad tshul rnams rje rdo rje 'chang nyid bka'
tho ji snyed mchis pa da lta bka' 'bum sogs su bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par mdzad pa dang / de skabs nyer dgu'i nyin tshoms chen du tshogs 'gyed mdzod deb nang
bzhin dang / 'phar bcas kyang bstsal to/ /bka' gnyan gyi 'cham 'di lta bu mdzad pa'i tshul la/ rje rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gsungs las/ sngar gyi phyag srol la 'cham bka'
gnyan 'di 'dra mdzad srol 'dug par 'ga' zhig gi sems la/ spyir gsang sgrogs kyi nyes pa dang / khyad par chos skyong gi 'khu ldog la 'dzem med rang 'dra yin snyam pa'i
dogs pa 'byung mod/ spyir shin tu bden yang lugs 'di la de 'dra'i dogs pa gtan nas mi dgos pa ni/ 'khon klu dbang nas shes rab tshul khrims yan gsang sngags rnying ma'i rig
'dzin snod bcud dag pa rab 'byams su gzigs shing / dam can rgya mtsho bran du 'khol ba sha stag byon pa'i gdung dang / dkon mchog rgyal po nas

gsang sngags gsar ma mdzad pa'i 'byung khungs kyang bstan pa phyi dar gyi lo chen rtsod bral grub pa'i sar bzhugs bla chen 'brog mi las rgyud sde'i nying khu dpal kyai rdo
rje'i bshad bka' gsan/ de'i man ngag 'dzin pa rnams kyi nang nas 'gran bral se ston las man ngag yongs rdzogs bstan pa rin po che nyams len gsan te grub pa mchog gi go 'phang
mthon por byon pas yon tan tshad bzung med cing / spyir btang la'ang da lta'i bar du sku pur ma nyams par bzhugs pas gdung rgyud mi nyams shing / klu'i gnod pa che rigs
kyang mi 'byung ba sogs grub pa'i rtags mtshan yod pa de dang / yang sgos 'phags pa rigs gsum mgon po'i rnam sprul rje sa chen yab sras dbon rgyud rim byon rnams zab
don rdo rje theg pa'i mnga' bdag kho nar ma zad thog mar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag nas rgyud sde rgya mtsho'i bstan srung thun mong ma yin pa gur gyi mgon po'i snang
brnyan bse 'bag yid bzhin nor bu sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las rten man ngag mkha' 'gro'i thugs rgyud dang bcas pa zhal gzigs pa nas bzung mkhas grub dam can las
'khol sha stag byon pa'i rjes 'jug dbang gis smin cing / dus grangs kyi bsnyen pa mthar phyin pa 'don pa lag len byang chub mang zhing / 'ga' zhig ni de'i khar gdams ngag
yongs rdzogs thob cing / nyams khrid bskyangs pas bskyed rdzogs kyi go myong yang yod pa rim can du byung bas na/ 'gro ba thams cad kyai rdo rje'i rang bzhin du rnam par
dag pa lta ba sogs gsang

sgrogs kyi nyes pa yong don med cing bse mgon yid bzhin nor bu lta bu 'cham stabs kyis spyan 'dren mdzad pa nas bzung bka' gnyan gyi gar 'cham du mar mnga' brnyes pas 'di bzhin
'cham par nyes pa med pa'i gtan tshigs yang dag pa yod pa bzhin/ mnyes chas dang dngos gzhi'i gtor bzlog rnams gzab spros kyis mig gang gi ltad mo lta bur 'cham dus/
gnam gshis shin tu 'jam zhing gra 'grig byung / 'on kyang 'cham ra dog cing do dam pa rnams kyis gtong ma mkhas pas khrom rnams 'dod pa rdzogs pa rang ni ji 'dra byung yod
dam/ bud med gcig mi nyog gis brdzis pa byung bas/ khrims pa tshos zhabs phyi go ma chod pa de rigs la slad nas kyang sgrim dgos/ zhes gsungs/ bskang gso brgya tshar grol
nas tshogs su mi khrom rnams nub sgo nas yong / shar sgor 'thon pa'i bka' 'doms bcas mi 'khrugs pa dang sgrib sel gyi gzungs ljags bzlas dang / bdag gzhan brje ba'i byang
chub sems kyi gtong len dang / mdor na mthong thos dran reg thams cad la so so'i gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi don yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i spyan dmigs dang chabs cig
phyag dbang bstsal ba ste 'di lta bu'i thugs bskyed dang spyan dmigs ni rnam pa kun tu mnga' ba'ang 'dis mtshon nus pa bcas tshe sems yo byad las skye ba mos pa smon lam
sogs la dbang brnyes pas na/ skye dgu rnams kyi re 'bras yid bzhin du 'grub par gdon mi za'o/ /

dgung grangs so drug tu phebs pa shing sprel rgyal zla'i tshes gcig lo gsar la 'phyar dar tshang ma dkar po dang / tshogs pas gos ber gyon pa sogs sngar srol med kyang khyad
mtshar mdzad pa dang / tshoms chen gnam yangs la nor bu'i do shal thog mar 'grems gnang gi skabs dang / bzhugs gral thog ngor gyi zhabs drung yas mas/ sde dge sku tshab
rnams kyis thog drangs/ gzhis byes kyi sku mgron rnams tshogs dus sde dge nas gzungs grwa lnga'i sku sgros gtsang rnams phul/ de nas gtor spod rnams mdzad mur mnga' zhabs
tshang ma dang / gzhan yang 'ga' zhig nas bro gzhas nyams dga'i rtsed 'jo yang phul/ nub gcig rje rdo rje 'chang chen po tsha ba'i snyun che tsam phebs kyang sang de gar
song cha med du dengs pa'i tshul mdzad/ zla ba de sku gdung rin po che zhal gzigs nas bcu pa sku mdog tshul de yin pa bzhin/ rje nyid nas grub rgyal ma dang lcags sdong
/ rta mgrin skyer sgang / bla ma zhi khro/ lcags sdong lha mang bstsal bas sku gegs dbyings su yal/ rta zla'i tshes gcig nas dgung skeg snga bsu'i mtshon phyi skyel bcas
zhi ched/ sku tshe tshe chog lo gsum ma bcu tshigs rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bcas tshugs pa'i snga dro dam tshig phyag dril theg chen ma khyad mtshar re skyon can du gyur pas
nyin gang thugs grang stong nge byung gsungs/ lo gsum ring theg chen gan dril gzhan zhig gnang ba yang mi ring bar gas 'dzer du song ba dang / phyis kyi dam tshig phyag
dril 'di ni 'jam mgon mthu stobs

dbang phyug gi phyag dril de yin gsungs pa bzhin no/ /so bdun skeg 'di gong gi gter ston gyi lung bzhin shin tu 'tshub dus de yin gshis/ sngon 'tshub des kyang sku gegs rmeg
med du gzhom par mdzad pa yin/ dbo zla tsam nas sgrol sku gser ljang ma dang grwa lnga'i lugs skur phyag nas brgya tshar dang / nag zla'i tshes 'go nas 'cham dpe snang
ba 'gyur thub dpang por bzung bar mdzad de/ rje rdo rje 'chang / brgya dpon/ zur 'chad grub dbang bcas zhal rgyas nas phur 'cham la zhus dag bka' drin bskyangs te/ de nyid
dang rje nyid kyi gsung rtsom kha shas/ gsung ngag skor sogs mang po zhig dus phyis par la 'khod par mdzad/ snron zla'i gza' tshes dge ba'i thog zhal dro lha khang gi sa
chog la phebs pas/ rdo skas ring mo'i 'gor dbang ldan bar tsho ba'i gnyer ba dpal ldan sgos skyes zer ba 'bul cha dang bcas byung ba/ ming bkra sogs gang sa nas lam bkra
legs pa dang / kho rang la'ang de sngon nas mi thod klad pa bcas rnyed pa sogs gtsug lag khang 'dir dge ba'i mtshan gsal bcas/ sa phyogs der 'bru'i char dang / dbal gyi
zas mchog 'grims pa sogs sa chog spyi bye brag skabs sa khrod nas yungs dkar mngon sum du 'thon pa sogs rnyed legs pa'ang byung gsungs/ rim gyis gtsug lag khang gsar bskrun
gyi dbu tshugs/ de'i bcu bzhi nas me phag nag zla'i bcu gnyis bar la rnying lugs 'khor lo 'bar ba sgros bcas mdzad pa'i bzlas grangs chig 'bum khri drug stong lnga

brgya lnga bcu tham pa bzla bar mdzad/ de lo phur sgrub phrin 'chol gzab ma dang / dngos grub gling du rgyun bskang 'dzugs gnang gis chu stod zla nang lhor spos nas lha chen
khyams stod mda' g.yab steng du rje nyid/ brgya dpon/ dbu byed gsum/ mchod dpon sogs nas 'cham rgyugs bzhes/ gro bzhin tsam nas yum mchog gi 'o 'dzin g.yon bsnyun pa rim
gyis je lod du gyur par ljags chu dang / sman bla mched bdun/ klu dbang / sengge sgra sogs kyi rjes gnang grangs mang bstsal/ phur sgrub thog sgro lung pa chen po'i nye
gnas dbang phyug rab brtan nas/ rje de'i dung chos khyad 'phags shig phul bas rje nyid nas de ma thag 'o 'di nga'i dung chos yin gsungs shing / dbyug zla'i nang 'dzam gling
phun tshogs dpal 'bar du da lta'i rten khri brkos ma bzo khyad par can 'di gsar bskrun gyis sgrig par mdzad/ de skabs shig sde dge sman pa bla mas 'bul chen thog gser
thig bug can zhig phul ba dang / stabs mtshungs gong gi sgro lung pa'i dung chos la gser rdog gser dngul gyi gzungs thag mu tig sogs kyi spel bcas sgron gnang gis tshe chog
gnang ba bcas gser thig kyang de gras su 'grig pas legs par bka' bstsal/ de lo'i dpyid dbyar ston sogs 'di khul la rims nad yong mur gdung rgyud rin po che yang bag phebs
ge bzhes pas mgul mi bde ba 'khrungs 'phral rje nyid nas ri khrod ma/ ljags chu sku rims rnams nar mar gnang bas myur du snyun las grol bar mdzad/ rje rdo rje

'chang nyid thugs spro ba'i ngang nas sgo rum nang so sogs su phebs te/ sngar sku bltams dus gtang rag la phul ba'i lha mdung la dar yug ring mo re gsol bar mdzad nas skyed
lhas bsam brling gnyis la gtor spod gras su phyag legs par phebs so/ /mgo zla'i tshes drug gi tho rengs 'od gsal du/ si tu grongs pa'i rkyen byas te sde dge blo gros rgyal
mtshan nyid shin tu mya ngan che nyams kyis nang mun ne ba zhig gi ka drung na zhal byang gzigs su bzhugs te/ si tus bka' 'gyur rin po che zhu dag mdzad pa sogs sde dger
sku drin che tshul du ma gsungs shing / rta rkyang pa'ang brgyad cu tsam byin pa yin gsungs pa zhig 'khrungs so//dgung grangs so bdun du phebs pa shing bya rta zla'i tshes
gcig nas rnam sras bskang ba zla gang ma mdzad/ dbo zla nas mkhan chen tshos bkra shis sogs la sa skya bka' 'bum gyi ljags lung yang tshugs shing / rgyal yum zhabs 'bam
gyis snyun par sman chab la phebs pas ngo je gsal du song nas bcos rnams mdzad mur/ zhal dro'i 'jim sku rnams bzhengs zin nas rab gnas brgya tshar tshugs dus snga dro
zhig sa skya'i nub phyogs su 'ja' tshon ya mtshan can zhig shar bas rab gnas la dge ltas su gzigs/ de nas sde dge sman bla dkon mchog grags pa sogs la dbang bka' rjes gnang
'thon phyag sogs rim bzhin gnang nas/ snron zla'i nang mdzod 'dzin dbus phebs shig dang bstun shab chu rags la zlos skor gyi 'go zug

rab gnas grol nyin sbyin bdag bsgo bar sku gdung rin po che byon thog rten gtso rnams kyi dbu thog gdugs dang / sku mdun du mchod pa'i bye brag bla bre/ 'phan/ mar me/ zhal
zas/ rnga zlum/ 'khar rnga/ dung sogs gtsug lag khang gi nyer spyad rnams phyag tu bstar tsam re mdzad nas/ sku rnams kyi drung du phul te bzhugs khri la phebs pa'i thog
ma rang de 'grig pas rdzas brgyad mnga' gsol shugs 'byung du byung ba'ang sngar 'dra 'dra 'grig 'grig mdzad pa ma yin par/ rang 'grig de ring rnam pa kun tu mang du byung
ba rnams ni yab sras yum bcas kyi ngo mtshar ba'i mdzad pa sha stag go /de bstun grwa tshang nas kyang rab gnas gnang ba'i phyi bskor dang bstun sku rnams gtsug lag khang
du phebs rgyu'i zhal bkod kyis/ tshoms dmar du gzim 'od dang / zhal dror drung yig kun phun gyis do dam zhing / gtsug lag khang gi rtse nas chos dung rin po che'i gsung
bskul te/ bzhi thog nang nas ltag sgo'i rdo skas bar btsun chung mchod rdzas can kha shas nas gdung rabs myur 'byon smon tshig brjod cing / rdo skas 'go nas zhal dra'i
bar byis pa lang tsho bcu drug lon pa kha shas mdung 'dzin pa dang / phye mar/ snod 'brus gang ba/ mchod rdzas sogs kyis sna drangs sku rnams rim bzhin skya ser gzab mchor
can nas spyan 'dren skabs rje rdo rje 'chang sras yum rnams rtse nas gzigs rtog gi tshe/ rje nyid kyi thugs la bstan pa'i rtsa ba gdung rabs rin po che 'byon dka' ba de
tsam byung

yang / ngal ba khyad bsad kyis thabs du mar 'bad pa'i 'bras bur mngon du gyur te da ni zhal gzigs/ zhal dro'i gtsug lag khang khyad par can 'di yang rten 'brel bzang po dang
bcas ha lam tshags su tshud pas thugs bde dgongs pa'i mur/ bde stong gi nyams khyad par can zhig 'khrungs byung zhes bka' bstsal/ zhal dro phebs skyel grub nas rab gnas
zhabs bskor 'khor ba dus mtshungs dang / kun rang byis pa rnams kyis lha rgyal/ ser khang rtse nas chos dung rin po che gsung bskul mdzad pa sogs thugs gra gang 'grig gnang
nyin gnam gshis kyang bzang / lhag par me tog gi char ni sngar dran ma myong ba lta bu 'bab pa 'dug ces mtha' dag nas gleng ba'ang don ldan bzhin dang / mi ring bar gsol
thabs lhor phebs dang chabs cig rgyal yum nyid sman chab skabs kyang / sku gdung rin po che bde mu'i mtshan gzim thog 'gar/ bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa zhes sogs mtshan
brjod kyi tshig 'ga' gsung mur mnal sad pa dang / yum la sman chab des phan ngo cher gyur te rim gyis snyun las grol/ phur sgrub skabs mdzod 'dzin yang 'byor zhing zhal
dro'i skor tshang ma grub nas/ khrums zlar rab ston gnang dus rje rdo rje 'chang ban tshang 'khor tshogs bcas gtsug lag khang 'og ma dang / mkhan chen bsnyen song rnams
