steng du 'du bar mdzad de/ kyai rdor rab gnas 'bring po bcas phyi bskor la me tog gi char nyil ba'i zhar la/ lha chen rung khang nyams gso khro chen

gsar blugs bcas la'ang shis brjod kyi me char phab ste chu kha ma nas drung gzhas kyis sngun bsus/ zhal dror rje chog rnams dang / tshoms chen du dga' ston bzhugs gral gyi
tshe gsung bshad mtshams sbyor la/ rje btsun sa skya par gdung rabs rin po che dgos gal che tshul thog mar gnam kha'u pa nyid kyi gsung bzhin gdung 'dzin gyi go sar bzhugs
na ma 'ongs par phan pa'i lung bstan/ bdag nyid chen po bzang po dpal la rgya nag gong ma chen po dang sa skya dpon chen bu slob rnams kyis gsol ba btab tshul/ sngags 'chang
chen po dang a mes zhabs rab byung las slar gdung 'dzin mdzad tshul sogs las 'phros te/ grags blo bas a mes zhabs la zhal ta nan tan gnang tshul bzhin de dus rje rdo
rje 'dzin nyid la'ang gnas tshul de ltar shar tshul/ gdung rabs rin po che myur du phebs ched gong gi sgrub mchod brgya tshar rnams dang / grwa lnga lugs sku/ sgrol ma
gser ljang ma/ rgyal yum nas dngul gyi sgrol dkar gsar bzhengs/ gzhan yang 'jim sku ldeb bris bcas bzhugs pa'i zhal dro lha khang rten brten par bcas pa'i rab gnas yin tshul
sogs kyis 'doms par mdzad dus/ grags blo ba'i zhal ta lo rgyus rnams gsan pas dbu byed dka' bcu pa spyan chab dbang med nyil zhing / de nas legs skyes kyi bdog pa rnams
bzhes nas/ bzo pa rnams la gnang sbyin gya nom pa brims par mdzad/ dgun thog mdzod 'dzin bla brang mchog tu gtan tshigs zhu bar phebs pa dang / drung yig kun phun

gdong sna ba'i kha mchu'i ngo len la 'thon/ rje nyid nas gong dkar 'or sbug rin rtse rdzong dpon/ sde dge a 'gro sogs kyi re skong dang / 'byung 'gyur sku gdung rin po che
gegs med du phebs thub pa dang / sde dger rgyal sras 'byung ba sogs kyi ched du mgon khang khag bzhir dpal gyi zhal zas 'dzugs gnang gis 'phrin 'chol gnad smin mdzad pa'i
skabs so//dgung grangs so brgyad du phebs pa me khyi rta zla'i bcu bzhi nyi ma rgyal 'dzom nyin gdung rgyud sku bltams zin pa dang / mi 'gyangs par bltam rgyu bcas kyi sku
gegs sel phyir/ gdugs dkar nyer bdun ma'i dbang ras dkyil steng nas mdzad dus phun khang dpon nas byams sku'i rgyab yol gyi bzo gdan sar dbu 'don mthar phyin legs po'i
gras la dngul gyi maNDal che legs shig phul ba sta gon nyin tshom bu bkod chog dang / bco lnga dbang gi dngos gzhi'i nyin me tog ser po kha gsar 'bul mi byung ba sogs rten
'brel gyi la nye shin tu shis/ bco brgyad dang bcu dgur gshed dmar ras dkyil thog nas sta gon mdzad de sku gdung rin po che dgung grangs bzhi pa dang / yum sogs la dbang
bskur mdzad pas gnas dang dbang rdzas sogs phal cher gdung rgyud rin po che'i mkhyen mtshor zhugs pas rje nyid thugs dgyes/ sku chung ba ni de dus yum gyi lhums na mchis
pas rje nyid nas slob ma sta gon dang dngos gzhi thams cad la spyan dmigs yang dag mdzad pas bka' dbang de gsan pa'i go chod pa tsam yod gsungs/

de skabs yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid rje nyid kyi 'od gsal du yang yang du dgyes nyams can du phebs te/ dbugs dbyung gzengs bstod kyang bstsal zhing / dus rtags dang bstun
bsam yas su rgyal po sku lnga dang ya ba skya bdun gyi rten mdos kyang 'dzugs par mdzad/ de nas 'char 'phar gyi bstan mkhas bgyi bas dus 'da' bzhin par/ sa ga'i tshes
gnyis gsum skabs ri bo che nas grub chen thang stong rgyal po'i rnam thar snga bsgrigs su grags pa par ma zhig phyag tu son pa ljags klog gi mu dang / tshes gsum nyin ban
tshang par rje nyid nas gsar btsugs mgon mdos dang / dam tshig bskang ba'i phyag char sbyor 'jags kyi sder dril theg chen 'dra cog dngos gtsang 'ga' zhig sgrig gnang de'i
sang shar ma skya tsam zla lag chu nang 'phrad pa bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thog sku gdung rin po che bltams ran pas gang ci'i bca' sgrigs chu lug bzhin mdzad de/ bde bar bltams
pas legs so bkra shis kyi mnga' gsol sogs gnang / nyi shar thog gzim chung rtser rje nyid nas lha bsangs mdzad rjes tshe dpag med kyi sku/ rnam rgyal sgrub thabs rjes
gnang / dza bir/ sdom rig rig gnas skor/ rdo dril sogs sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi rten/ bdog pa'i dngos po dang bcas thugs dgyes bzhin du bstsal te shis brjod
kyi me tog dang / rim bzhin tshe dpag med kyi bka' dbang sogs gnang / de nyin mdzod 'dzin nas zhal dro lha khang gi mchod kong gser ljang ma 'bras bus phyur te

gzigs 'bul skabs/ da nang yang gdung rgyud zhig 'khrungs tshul las 'phros pa'i bka' gsang mang du grol zhing / de mtshams nas rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi dgongs par 'khrungs
pa zhal las byon pa rags tsam brjod na/ gdung sku mched 'khrungs skabs rtags bzang zhing rje rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid so bdun dgung skeg thu mo las thar zhing spyi dgos
nas re ba che tshul/ de yang mchog gsum spyi dang bye brag yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyis thugs rje kho nas yin tshul rje rdo rje 'chang nyid dgung na phra bar gdan
sa'i 'gan khur bzhes par/ gdan sa chen po 'thus shor nyen thar rtse rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyis dngos brgyud nas/ legs slob nyes bcos sogs bka' drin bskyangs tshul gang
gi yab rje nyid dgung lo bdun par gdan sa'i khur bzhes la jun gar dmag dus sogs la yang pha rol gyi nyer 'tshe gang yang med khar skyabs zhus sogs 'dun bral skyes chen
de nyid kyi rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi ring 'tsho'i rten bzhugs der/ byams bstan ma shar bar du zhabs brtan pa'i/ /'phrin las srung ma'i tshogs gyis 'grub par mdzod/ /ces
byams bstan sogs ma 'ongs 'byung rgyu yin la/ sku mched sngon la gshegs nas/ ma 'ongs pa rdo rje 'chang nyid cung mdzad dka' ba 'ong yang 'phrin las bstan srung gi sgrub
pa yod hur thag thongs gsung rgyu yin 'dug pa'i tshul sogs mang du bka' phebs pa ni/ 'jam dbyangs sa paN gyi lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor du/ rang gi dbang nod pa'i bla
ma sangs

rgyas dngos su mthong na/ de dang mthun pa'i byin rlabs 'jug par gsungs pas na/ dam pa'i spyod tshul kho na dang rgyas par rnam thar chen mor gsungs pa bzhin no/ /de nas rim
bzhin ril sgrub 'phrin 'chol sogs dang / gong gi rten 'brel rnams dang bstun dar dkar la mtshan gyi mnga' gsol 'dri bar mdzad pa ni/ phan bde rgya mtsho'am e waM bzang
por gsol ba'i rgyu mtshan sku mched gnyis byon pa dang / 'khrungs dus rdor dril mang du sgrig par mdzad pas na e waM/ brtson 'grus bzang po'i mtshan mtha' bzang por gsol
bar mdzad lags/ ril sgrub skabs bsam yas su gnang rgyu'i dbu 'ching / rgyal mtshan jus dkar sogs bka' 'doms dang / de dus rje nyid dang rgyal sras gcung dam pa cung zad snyun
tshul yang srung 'khor ljags sngags sogs rim gro'i rigs nan cher mdzad ma thag yab sras sku dkyil gsal bas ril sgrub gtang rag dang / chu lug gnang bzhin lha mo gsol
mchod gzab gshom legs 'bul rim gro rnams mdzad dus tshogs chen dbu chen bsod nams bstan 'dzin 'khod 'phral dang / snron tshes drug nas zla gcig ring mgon khang yod do cog
tu bstan 'gro'i bde thabs la ched dmigs gsung bskang thog snyan shal 'dod gsol can rnams bstar zhing / tshes drug la phun gling rtser gser zangs kyi rgyal mtshan zung gsar
'dzugs dang sbrags gzim chung steng thug gsum gnas spo'i thug 'dzugs gnang ba'ang gung ma lcam dral/ nub ma zhal gtso 'khor/ shar ma las

mkhan lngar bskyed chog gnang / de nas rje nyid kyis mgon khang bzhir gdung rgyud gegs med phebs pa'i gtang rag thog 'dzugs gtor 'bul gnang gis skyed lhas lho'i spang steng
du gtor 'bul dus dpal bshos de mgon khang du lus pas slar yang 'phrin 'chol rgyun mthud na dge mtshan 'khrungs/ bsam brling lho ri rdo gdugs 'di gcung dam pa'i bla ri dang
sa 'dzin yang rtser mnga' gsol mdzad de/ slar yang skyed lhas su dam rdzas rgyan ldan gyi gtor chen 'dzugs gnang gis gtor bsngo dang bskang ba brgya rtsa dang / de nas
lha khang mkhan chen la lo gang ltar gtor bsngo dang bskang ba brgya rtsa chag med mdzad dgos 'doms par mdzad de phur sgrub 'phrin 'chol sogs dang / lhor spo gnang gis phebs
'phral shis brjod sbyangs khrus tshe chog lha bsangs gtor spod sogs mdzad/ de nub rdo rje phug nas sras mo dpal lags 'jigs snang zhig gi rkyen gyis mtshan langs byung
ba ma 'gyangs par zhing brje ba'i ltas dang / zla nang der sras mo sku chos mdzad pa'i mtshan tshul khrims dpal rgyas dbang mor gsol/ phur sgrub skor chu lug bzhin mdzad
rjes bzhi thog pho brang du phebs/ gzhi nas rje rdo rje 'chang nas sgrub mchod sogs la phebs/ dbang bskur bgrang yas mdzad pa sogs sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal po dang
'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi mdzad sgo sha stag las kyang brgal ba gnang zhing / de nas me khyi'i bar lo dgu tsam gyi ring phur sgrub mdos gtor spod sogs gal che rigs ma gtogs

phal cher la phebs ma thub kyang / 'di nas bzung chos sde nyi zla rnam gnyis kyi sgrigs la rtag par phebs pa'ang rje nyid kyi tshogs gsog sgrib sbyong nyi skyel lta bu ma yin
par thugs kyi mthil la 'di ltar 'khrungs te/ sngon gyi bla ma gong ma phal cher sgrigs rgyugs rang mdzad cing / khyad par sngags 'chang yab sras dang a mes zhabs yab sras
rnams nas tshogs 'don gsung bskul dang rol dpon sogs rtag par mdzad/ dbyar dgun gyi gzhis len gsung chos rnams la chag med ltar phebs srol yod pa ni dam pa de dag gi
rnam thar na gsal zhing / bye brag sngags 'chang chen po zhing brje kha mar zla ba snga ma'i phur sgrub rol dpon mdzad/ a mes zhabs dgung grangs re grangs tsam na gsung las/
tshogs 'gro mi thub pa'i lus 'di brjes na dga'/ zhes sogs kyi gnas tshul dpags la na/ thos bsam sgom pa 'chad rtsod rtsom pa sogs mdzad pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa spyi
byer 'phel rgyas 'byung gi gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ri rab khang khyim sogs snod kyi gzugs dang / mi la sogs pa bcud kyi gzugs ni min pas de bzhin du shes dgos
pas na/ sngon gyi rje btsun gong ma bzhin mkhas grub grags pa can byung na mchog dang / gzhan du mkhas pa dang bstan pa'i bya ba rnams dang ya rabs bzang po'i ngang tshul
ni gzhar yang mi bskyud pa sngar bas kyang lhag pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i ched du sgrigs rgyug gi 'khur 'di bzod par bya'o dgongs pa'i dam bca' thugs la bkod pa yin
gsungs/ khrums

zla'i gsang 'dus la phebs skabs shig dpal lags de glo bur du snyun bab lci ba gzigs pas 'phrod bzhes rim gro sogs yang dag mdzad kyang bzlog med kyi re zhig nas sku mi 'tsho
bar mkhyen te/ sor 'brang 'khor lo sgron pa bdud rtsi stsol ba sogs mdzad de nyer bzhi'i tho rengs dag zhing du phebs 'phral rje nyid nas mi 'khrugs pa/ kun rig sman bla
sogs kyi gzungs sngags bsngo smon gyis mtshams sbyor bcas dang / sras yum gyi sku'i rim gror bzlog pa'i rigs mang du mdzad rjes/ dgongs rdzogs rnams brgya dpon la bka'
'doms bcas/ rus chog spur sbyangs satstsha sogs dang / mchod 'bul bsnyen bkur rje nyid nas byang bu lam ston sogs mdzad/ de'i tshe gcung dam pa 'khrungs pa'i dga' ston du
yul chen ban tshang bas las mkhan ru 'dren bcas kyi 'cham gzigs 'bum mkhan yod kyang phugs kyi rten 'brel la dgongs te bkag med gnang / dbyug zla'i sa mchod sogs ston dgun
sgrub mchod/ gtor bzlog dgun chos sogs tshang mar phebs mu'i smin zla'i tshes dgur lho phyogs kyis mtshon/ lung pa du mar thugs dran mi gsal pa'i gangs chen po babs pa
dang / gong ma'i rnal 'byor ma'i dus tshoms chen 'gag tu gang nas 'ong med pa'i 'ug phrug byung ba'i ngan ltas bzlog ched sogs la thugs gzhol ba'i skabs so//dgung grangs
so dgur phebs pa me phag rta zlar mgon nub gtor spod dang bstun thug rnams nyams gso dang / 'dzugs chog ban tshang

bcas nas mdzad/ rgyud bla mchod sogs la phebs rtag gi mur dbo zla nyis brtsegs la gzhung pa'i sku rim bektse'i gtor bzlog dang 'char can phur bzlog la'ang phebs shing / zla
'di nas bzung ji srid bskal pa'i bar sdom gsum tshes mchod gzhung skyor zla rer lan gsum re chag med kyi rgyun bzang 'di nyid gsar 'dzugs bka' drin che ste tshogs dbur byon/
nag zla'i nang kha skong tshes mchod kyang sdom gsum dang 'dra bar gsar 'dzugs dang / de nas dam tshig bskang gsor phebs gong tsam du chos lung nas sku zhang rgyal po
rnams dang / sras yum sras mo dpon g.yog byon pas sngar bzhin gang sar bdag rkyen yang dag dang / tshe dbang ston mo sogs zab rgyas su bstar ba mdzad pas khong dpon g.yog
kyang dga' mgu yi rang ste slar ldog sa ga'i gsang 'dus mgon mdos snron zla'i lha mo mchod/ bde kyai sgrub mchod sogs la phebs mu dang / lhag par rje nyid nas sngar phan
mus chen mchod 'bul la ma phebs kyang de lo nas bzung phebs te 'jam mgon a mes zhabs yab sras kyi sku thog bzhin chos spyod bar gdangs sogs deb sgrigs kyis da lta'i nyin
'khyongs ma'i rgyun bzang 'di mdzad cing / chu stod sgrub mchod dang lo bcol sogs la'ang byon/ dus gtor chen mo dgung grangs nyer gnyis nas bzung chag med mdzad kyang
ban tshang pa dang lhan cig sgrub mchod gtor bzlog skabs ma gtogs mgon khang so sor ma gnang yang / de dus lha khang rtser phebs pa nas bzung phal cher lhan du

mdzad cing / gsol thab lhor mi phebs tsam la mdzod 'dzin shes rab phun tshogs bzhi thog lho'i shar nub mtho dma' mnyam na legs tshul snyan sgron bzhin/ nang so tshoms chen
g.yab chen sogs la brling lta dgos pa'i bka' 'doms bcas phyag len du btab pa mthar phyin 'phral/ rje nyid ban tshang pa'i 'khor tshogs bcas nas rgyal mtshan 'dzugs chog thug
chog sogs yang dag bstsal/ de lo nas bzung khrums zla'i rigs char yang tshogs phebs rtag po dang / de'i nyer bzhir stod la dwags rgyal po mdzad pa mi legs pa'i sbir gtam
gyi rkyen gyis/ la dwags rgyal blon la rgyu 'bras kyi bka' tshig sngon du gtong bar mdzad/ gna' bo'i chos rgyal gyi lugs bzhin bskyangs na gang sar dge ba'i bka' 'doms
dang / de lo spyan ltas shig tu/ rje rdo rje 'chang bal yul na mchis pa/ mchod rten bya rung kha shor gzi 'od 'bar zhing byang phyogs na spyan gzigs kyi lha khang 'o brgyal
ba zhig dang / bal po'i grong khyer kun mi nor zad pa 'dra ba mi tho re ba las med pa'i mur/ lho nub nas nyi ma shar byung gleng zhing thams cad skyid nyams byed pa
zhig 'khrungs pa ni kun gyis dgongs sla zhing / 'di la da dung spyan ltas dang dril bu phul ba sogs 'og lo khams gang yin du gsal ba dang / gzhan yang 'char 'phar gyi thugs
brel don yod rnams rim mdzad kyi skabs so/ /dgung grangs bzhi bcur phebs pa sa byi rta zla'i mjug tsam la mdzod

'dzin chu tshan la phebs/ dbo 'go nas rtsa 'chus sogs mi bde ba'i mur de'i nyer gcig snga dro steng grib byung tshul gsan 'phral rje nyid nas khrus sna tshogs brtse skyong
dang mnyam du sman rim gro'i bka' 'doms rnams tshar phyin mdzad nas rnal 'byor mar phebs/ gung seng sngon mar je lod mchis tshul gsan 'phral byas pa shes shing drin du gzo
ba dam pa'i rnam thar gyis dza lung dpon slob gdan 'dren 'phral gnang bzhin nyer gnyis sa rub thog byon tsam la mdzod 'dzin gshegs/ nag zla'i 'gor kun rig sgrub mchod tshogs
dbur phebs te/ gshegs por dgongs pa'i cho ga thugs rus kyis gsung shugs dang bcas 'don par mdzad pas/ sku 'khrugs kyi rnam pas mgur cham bzhes tshul dang / de nas sngar
gyi glo tshad 'phar nyams kyis zla phyed tsam mgul thugs sun can tsam bzhes tshul yang dam tshig bskang gso'i skabs rim gyis snyun las grol/ de nas gnas bcur spyan gzigs
mchod gtor gzab pa bcas tshogs bdag bskang ba zla gang ma'i thog gzhung zhabs su mdzod gsar lcam grwa'i drung yig kun phun lha sar dos rta'u la snga bzhin 'khri med
zhu don gyi skabs dang / gdan sar 'byor 'phral sa ga'i gnas bcu lha khang du mdzod 'dzin 'khur bzhes kyi bka' 'doms dang / snron zlar rje nyid nas mdzod khang du tshe dpag
med lha dgu'i dbang bskur dang sbrags las zhwa lde khres gtong yong gtan tshigs kyi deb sgam/ gzhung zhabs skor yig dbang lha'i rjes gnang thog sku par dang tsandan gyi
phreng ba

sogs gnang cha dang bcas las khungs su mnga' gsol te snga phyi bar gsum gyi bka' lung chu 'bab lta bur mtha' 'doms dang bcas bstsal/ tshogs bdag skong gso dang / de nas lha
mo mchod/ dbyar chos/ sgrub mchod sogs la thugs gzhol skabs nas mdzod 'dzin rgyal mtshan mthon por phebs nyin char drag po zhig gis bde gling lcags ri'i shar phyogs chu
chen 'grims pa kun mkhyen bzhugs khrir skyon med g.yas phyogs su 'bab pa rje nyid kyi dgongs par gzhan las ngo mtshar ba zhig 'khrungs tshul ni phul gyi rten 'brel zhig yin
'dra/ de'i sang mus chen thog mang ja bzhi'i rgyun 'dzugs dang / ba ri stag tshang pa'i gdung ba ri lo tsA ba'i dpon rgyud du 'khrul nas bdag rkyen yang dag pa mdzad par
grags shing / mi ring bar mdzod 'dzin yang 'byor nas phur sgrub dang / rigs cha'i skabs tshoms chen lho rgyud nyen ches stabs zhig gso'i gnas tshul shar zhing / sman chab
thog sku tshab rnams la zhib lta'i bka' bstsal ltar/ lho skya gog po byin rlabs dang rdzu 'phrul gyis bzung ba lta bu min pa 'gyel zhig mi yong ka med la sleb thog mgyogs
rkyen spen bad spar ba'i lcid ma theg pas yin tshul phul ba bcas/ gang ltar nang so mgon khang zhig gso ran pas thugs rgyud bskul bar gdon mi za bas rdo rje 'chang chen
gyi gsung las/ nged rang nas gzhon dus yab chos phal cher gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang dang brag rtsa rje las thob cing / yab rje rdo rje 'chang sogs yongs 'dzin kha shas
las

yab chos 'ga' re dang gzhan thob rgya mi dman tsam dang / rang nas kyang kyai rdor phur pa gur zhal sogs yi dam chos srung kha shas kyi dus grangs kyi bsnyen pa yid ches song
gshis/ rgyun du'ang bsgom bzlas mchod gtor bgyid mu dang na tshod kyang dar yol du slebs/ gdung sku mched gegs med du byon/ gdan sa'i 'khur rgyun ring bas gang yang rgyus
yod/ bod khams dus bde zhod 'jags rang yin pa bcas mkhar las bgyid dus skabs babs rang yin/ gong bshad 'od gsal la pu tras gnang ba stsol ba'i dus thog de yin pa dgongs
pa bzhin du re zhig tshoms chen lho skya las gzhan bka' ma stsol zhing / je zhig nas mdzod 'dzin pas nang so ma bsgul na phugs skyon che ru 'gro tshul gsol bas de bzhin
mdzad rgyu'i cha gzhir/ sku dang zangs chen gdan 'dren dka' zhing 'tshub lhongs kyang byung dogs/ phal cher rtab rtab por gyur kyang rje nyid kyi thugs rje kho nas skyon
ye ma byung ste/ lha bzo ba zla 'od sogs la bka' 'doms bzhin sku'i sgron dar rnams gyen brdzes kyis bltas pas/ nyams tshod ha lam longs nas 'dren par thugs thag chod de
nyid nas nang sor gsung bskang dang / 'dzugs gtor rnams phul skabs dar phon gyen brdzes kyis zhabs gnyis phebs la khad dbu dud dud mdzad pa lta bu'i tshul du gzigs pas/
zhabs 'bring pa tshos da lam ji gsung bzhin pu tra rang yang phebs pa la mnyes po 'dra 'dug ces zhus/ de nas rje nyid kyis smug chung zhal 'bag dang / a mes zhabs

sogs kyi bzhes 'bag skur sgron pa'i phyag mtshan dar phon rnams bcas phal cher bsdu bar mdzad/ rtag gtor gyis mtshon gtor sgam rnams nang so'i thog nas tshoms chen du gdan
'dren dang / gtor sgam che ba spyan gzigs sogs rim bzhin bsdu ba'i bka' 'doms stsol rjes/ ban tshang lha bris bsnyen song gnyis sogs kha ras lag bkru/ sngags 'chang chen
po'i bdud rtsi ngo ma bzos rjes/ sku sa 'byar ma bsgul bas thog mar lcid che ba sogs rgyu mtshan du mas dka' bar gyur dus/ mdzod 'dzin yang yang du sku mdun du phebs te gang
ci'i snyan 'bul dang / dar tsam zhig nas rje nyid gnas bcu nas 'dzam gling phun tshogs dpal 'bar du zhabs g.yas kyi tshigs 'khrol bas 'theng bzhin du phebs 'phral/ mdzod
'dzin nas sgo sgrigs steng du spyan 'dren thub cing / zhabs g.yas la phrum cung zad ma gtogs skyon med kyi gnas tshul rnams phul bas shin tu dgyes te/ zangs 'khor che
chung sna tshogs sogs chu snod gtsang ma thogs med 'du mdzad de/ mgon khang rgyab kyi nang de'i lho dang thog la sgo phug steng du 'gro yul skas dang / mgon khang chen mo'i
sgo glegs gnyis kyang phud chog gis sku dang zangs chen sogs bzhugs yul rnams lhus things mdzad rjes/ sang snga bar rje rdo rje 'dzin 'khor tshogs gang 'tsham dang bcas
rnam 'joms rgyun sgrub gnang mu'i bum pa dang chu snod sogs la byugs rdzas dri bzang byin phye sbyar ba/ de skor la gnang rgyu'i sngags 'chang chen po'i bdud rtsi ngo
ma rnams sngon 'gro'i

bka' 'doms mdzad nas/ rje nyid kyi rnam 'joms kyis gzungs bzla zhing bum chu 'thor bzhin pas sna drangs te spyan 'dren skabs/ lcid med ltar bde bar yer gyis mgon khang chen
mor phebs/ zhabs la nyams gso'i skabs rje nyid sku 'khor rags bsdus kyis nang so 'phags pa rin po che'i phyag nas gur mgon lcam dral/ smug chung zhal 'bag sogs rim bzhin
spyan 'dren dang / de nas yig brgya ljags bzlas su mdzad bzhin par zangs chen bla mtsho nas zangs shu gang chu tshags la 'dren par gnang / de nas gsol gzim gnyis kyis bcus
te ban tshang pas bkye skabs kyang nyog thams cad ras tshags su bzung zhing rdzogs dus med pa lta bu byung zhes gsungs/ sngon sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal pos mgon khang
de'i shar nas zangs chen nub tu gdan drangs pa nas bzung rje rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid dgung grangs so dgu nas bzhi bcu pa 'di'i bar du sgul bskyod ye ma mdzad pas/
lo yun ring po'i bar gyi bdud rtsi ril 'dam dang chu drag sogs nyog gtsang rnams phyogs gcig tu bzlums par mdzad/ se mo'i ro sa bre gang gi tshod tsam la gzhan phal cher
se ro rang du ngos 'dzin gnang / rje nyid kyi thugs la ni bla mtsho'i mtshan la khrag mtsho bkra shis 'od 'bar du zhu bas na/ rnam pa gdug can khrag rgyun 'khyil ba la ngo
bo ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho dam can 'du ba'i chu klung chen por ngos 'dzin dgos pas na/ dgra bgegs kyi ro rang yin dgongs pa don ldan du 'khrungs/ chu phal cher

drangs grub nas ban tshang pa brgyad kyis zangs chen spyan 'dren gdong rje nyid nas gong bzhin bum chus sna 'dren gyis mgon khang chen mor spyan drangs te chus bkangs/ 'phags
pa dang sa lo'i thugs dam ma lcam dral/ pu tra/ smug chung / a mes zhabs kyis bzhes 'bag bris sku phyag mtshan sogs byin rlabs che gras rnams gnas der bzhugs shing / gzhan
ma sku tshab rnams la bka' 'doms te gdan nas btu ba'i skabs/ mgon khang rnying ma de'i steng 'og bar gsum grum chen 'gro mi nus pa lta bu kun gyis gsal bar mthong zhing
/ gting rgyugs khang thog gi cham gdung spyi dang / khyad par pu tra'i bzhugs thad de'i gdung la nyes chen po yod pa sogs dus gsum sgrib med gzigs pa'i nyams gso dus
babs dang / sang nyin zangs chen sogs spyan 'dren gyi do nub 'cham khang gzhung sogs khang nye 'brel mtshungs su sdod mi phal cher gyi thog steng la sdir chom dang / gnyer
drung rdo rgyal gyi nang du mi 'ong ba lta bu'i shab shib mang po'i mur nang de'i ka drung nas langs pa 'dra ba'i mi dkar nag gnyis mthong ba dang / gzhi thog kun nang
yang thug chom sogs byung tshul gleng ba bcas de ltar gnyan cing byin rlabs che ba'i skor rnams skyel bzhugs grub 'phral rje nyid nas rnam 'joms khrus/ rab gnas 'bring po/
mchod gtor gzab 'dzugs kyis gtor bsngo brgya rtsa bskang ba brgya rtsa sogs dang / zla re bzhin dus gtor chag med rnams bka' drin che nas chos grags pas rgyun bskang skabs/

zangs chen gyi rgyu long sgra 'byin pa'ang byung zhing / de nas ar zug gi zhal bkod phal cher grub nas mdzod 'dzin gzhung phyag la byon/ de nas khyad 'phags lho'i thog dang
tshoms chen g.yab gsar thog mu mnyam dang / a mes zhabs kyi zhal 'bag pu tra'i zhal brnyan la sku gzugs kyi zhal bkod dang sa mchod sogs mdzad mu dang / nang so mgon khang
skor/ mnga' gsol g.yab kyi tshon rtsi/ pu tra'i lder sku thun mong ma yin pa sogs myur du grub skabs rje rdo rje 'chang thugs dges pa'i gsung las/ bzo pa dang 'ul mi'i
brtson 'grus las byung ba 'di nged rang gi rdzu 'phrul yin/ zhes nyams ldan gyi gsung gleng dang / yang bsam yas ma bzhengs lhun grub kyang 'di 'dra ka yin yong gsungs/
sku 'khor ba dang bcas bzhad rgyangs dang / mnga' gsol g.yab dang pu tra'i lder skur phyag nas phul phyin grub nas smin zla'i gtor bzlog skabs mdzod 'dzin yang 'byor zhing
/ zangs chen dang sku gsar rnying gi gzungs sgrigs dang rje nyid kyis phyag bstar gyi smug chung zhal 'bag nyams gso gzungs 'bul sogs gnang skabs/ lha mi'i dri bzang gis
mtshon mi nus pa'i dri'i khyad par dpag med 'thul zhing / phyag rogs gsol gzim gnyis nas mdzad pas nub gnyis kar khong zung la mon phrug gnyis mngon sum du 'ongs te gri
khyer nas khyod gsod rgyu yin zer ba la/ gcig la mon phrug gis rag dung rna rtsar 'bud pa sogs 'tshub nyams dang 'jigs snang chen po byung ba sogs ni/ zhal 'bag bka'

gnyan pa'i che bar 'khums/ mgo zla'i nang so'i mgon khang gsar par sbyangs khrus dang / gur lha brgyad zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi spyan 'dren mchod bstod sogs la 'brel mtshungs
rnga rol dbyangs sogs mdzad pas/ gzhan las babs chags pa byung bar gsungs shing me bkra'ang shis/ lha bzo zla 'od kyis zangs chen la nyams gso zhu rgyu'i thog mar g.ya'
rnams phyi bdar skabs zangs brdungs gcig ma 'dra ba'i bzo khyad la kun ha las shing ngo mtshar du 'dzin/ de'i zhal bkod rnams grub nas yar lam mdo khams a li chos rje'i sprul
sku ngag dbang chos grags sogs dpon g.yog stobs chen nas/ dka' spyad rta sogs kyi 'bul chen dang bcas mjal phyag thog yar lam bzos bde'i gnas tshul sngon 'gro'i khong
tsho'i yul grur sa lug mdo sngags bstan pa dar ngo yod tshul gyis/ 'di nas bla ma gnang dgos zhus pa bzhin zhal gyis bzhes/ de'i tshe a mes zhabs kyi dgongs rdzogs bde
mchog tshugs mu bzhin dus chen tshes bcur bsu gnang dang / bcu gnyis gza' tshes dge bar nang so'i sku 'dra gsar rnying zangs chen sogs gdan 'dren dus lder sku rnying pa shin
tu yang zhing bla mtsho'ang de ma khad bkyed sla ba byung / zhes rgyus yod kun ha las las byed mur gleng ba dang / de nas kyai rdo rje la brten pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i
me tog nyin gsum 'thor ba sbyin sreg bcas dang / rab ston nyin gos sku zhal 'byed sogs ngo mtshar byin rlabs dang bcas pa'i bkod pas dus 'da' bar mdzad nas/ bcu

bzhi'i sdom gsum grol 'phral a li chos rje can du phebs rgyu'i bla ma rnams gsum bsko bzhag dang / mi ring bar a li chos rje dpon g.yog la 'thon phyag thog rnam kun don yod
kyi bka' lung 'di ltar bstsal te/ spyir chos 'jig rten gang byed kyang lugs legs dgos tshul/ khyad par chos lugs grub mtha' gang byed kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang
mthun pa'i bshad sgrub byed dgos kyang / dus snyigs pas de bzhin dkon zhing / khyed rnams nas bstan pa spyi dang bye brag la dwangs dad de bzhin rjes su yi rang gi gnas
yin 'dug mdo sngags bstan pa spel ba'i bla 'phral bkod bgyis yod cing / 'dir 'byor thog kyang nang so'i nyams gso grub nas rten rnams phebs pa dang 'grig pas rten 'brel legs
shing / sprul sku rang yang lo gzhon nu la mkhyen sgo yangs pas mdo sngags thos bsam sgom pa sogs hur thag mdzad pa dang / sbyin bdag rnams kyang dad zhen che ngo bcas
gang sar legs lam che zhing / ma gir yang rnam dkar gyi bgyi ba yang dag ldan dgos lugs rnams bka' bstsal bas/ sprul sku ni bcos min dad gus kyis dbang med spyan chab nyil
bzhin du/ gang ci'i mtshams la de bzhin dang gnas skabs kun tu skyabs 'jug gis rjes 'dzin zhu ba sogs dang dad shugs kyis gdungs ba'i rnam 'gyur ci yang g.yo ba'i skabs
so//dgung grangs zhe gcig tu phebs pa sa glang rgyal zla'i tshes lngar bka'

khra rin po che'i dgongs don ltar/ mtha' dbus bde thabs ched bsam gling du gsung bskang rgyas pa dang / nyer bdun la nang sor gser zangs kyi rgyal mtshan zung dang srid zhi
dpal 'khyil du gser zangs kyi gambhi ra/ rgyal mtshan/ maNDal sogs gzungs ldan du sgron par mdzad/ rta zla'i mjug sde dge khams tshogs 'ga' nas/ bse mgon mjal zhus kyi rkyen
pas zhal mdong nang gi gseng 'thag rnams dang ljags bcas zhal nas phyir phyung te sku stod 'og tsi na phan tshun gzings shing brkyangs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu 'jigs
pa zhig byung ba rdo rje 'chang nyid nas/ zhal nang du gseng theg mdud sdom dang / sku rgyab gyang zer la gtod pa sogs gang dgos mdzad pas nyes skyon ma byung yang skyed
ston rtsis pa sogs kyi mo lung la babs pa sogs zhabs rim tshar phyin mdzad/ sde dge zhal ngo bstud mar gshegs pa dang sku tshab dmag 'gro du ma byas pa'i grib rkyen du ngos
'dzin mdzad/ gzhan yang sgo rum skor la sngon du yab rje mchog nas bse mgon la nyams gso mdzad dgos yod 'gro bstsal ba mngon du gyur gsungs/ gzhan yang gzigs snang mang
du 'khrungs tshul yang mchis/ de mtshams nas bde mchog nas gang gi a lce drung mchog gsum snyun gyis thebs pa gam du phebs pa nges 'byung lhag par 'khrungs pa dang bcas
sman rim mang du bcad nas sku mi 'tsho ba mkhyen 'phral zhabs mjug dge rtsa bka' 'khor gyi bsdom/ sku gdung rin po che zung la tshe chog dang sbrags tshe dbang yang

bstsal/ de skabs gzhung sa'i sku rim do dam par mes srong rje drung yang mchis shing / nyer drug nas mgon mdos bskul bar mdzad dus nang sos ar brdung gi mu ste gnyer drung
sogs la 'tshub nyams kyis 'jigs snang ci yang byung ba dang / de nyin phyed yol tsam la btsun ma sogs 'ul mi rnams la bza' btung thog 'ga' zhig shar lho'i g.yab steng nas
gzhan du 'gro 'dod kyis phor ba bza' btung gis gang bzhin du 'gro mur/ shar lho'i thad de yom yom byed pa dang mnyam du glo bur du rdib gzhom gyis shin tu ya nga zhing /
snying rje la thugs thabs kyis dben pa zhig byung ba'i rkyen gyis thugs kyang 'khrugs gzhi shin tu che ba'i bka' stsal dang bka' lan/ thugs gso sogs so so nas dgongs dbyings
dwangs pa'i rim pa rnams ci yang phul mthar/ sa rdo'i khrod dang de'i skyon gyis rkyen lam du song ba rnams la thugs par yang brtse ba'i rjes su 'dzin pa'i zhal bzhes
dang / de rnams la byang bu lam ston 'phral gnang dang / de nas bzung nar mar zhal 'don gyi skyabs 'og tu chud cing / thugs smon gyis mtshams sbyor dang / gzhan yang mang
ja sogs dge rtsa rgya che/ nad pa rnams la mthun 'gyur gyi rkyen sogs de dus su ma zad rnam pa kun tu yang bdag gzigs tshe spyan chab g.yo ba tsam gyi snying rje'i kun
slong dang bcas/ rlabs chen byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mdzad pa kho nas dus 'da' ba 'di dag ni/ ji skad du/ phan par bsam pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas mchod las
khyad 'phags

na/ /sems can ma lus thams can kyi/ /bde don brtson pa smos ci dgos/ /zhes dang / bkur ba 'os par legs 'khur zhing / /mgon med rnams la lhag par byams/ /byas la drin lan mi
brjed pa/ /dam pa rnams kyi mdzad spyod yin/ /ces gsungs pa ltar ro/ /de nas sngon dus 'jam mgon a mes zhabs dang yab rje ratna'i mtshan can gyi sku thog sogs la dpa' bo
dang dpa' mor rdo legs sogs khog zhugs kyis ngan gtad 'don srol 'dug pa de bzhin gyi bka' gsang mdzod 'dzin sogs la grol nas/ bdun phrag gcig ring rje nyid sku tshe'i sgrub
par bcad rgya mdzad pa dang / 'jam mgon rigs kyi myu gu bgres pa sku yon gsan sbyong gnang rgyu'i thog ma yon tan gzhi ma yig klog 'dzin chos bcas 'bul bar mdzad tshul
rnams 'go 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can gong gi rnam thar lo rgyus skabs gsal ba bzhin dang / de dus gsan bzhes skabs dang bstan rim du bde gling tshogs yongs nas phyi
skor la me tog 'thor gnang dang chabs cig sku gsung thugs rten 'ga' zhig kyang spyan 'dren gras la'ang 'jam dbyangs rtsod rgyal ma phebs pas gsan sbyong dbu tshugs pa dang
stabs sgrig sku byin can gnas 'di'i phyi nang du byon pa ni gzhan las rten 'brel dge bar gsungs so/ /gong gsal bzhin rta nag nas dpa' chen yid ches gsang khog nas/ khog
zhugs snga phyir bsam yas chos skyong gi ru dpon ga byang yin zer ba zhig gis gtad 'don nges 'brangs yod pas/ dus tshes

che ge mor rdzas dang yo byad che ge mo dgos tshul gleng ba dang bstun/ mgon po khro bcu dang zhal gyi gtor bzlog nyer dgu'i dgongs 'phen te/ sa sros nas bzung pho brang gi
phyogs bzhir uShNI Sha'i sgom bzlas dang / drag po mdo bzhi klog pa sogs mdzad nas/ sku tshab zung sbrel dang bcas dpal chen gyis gtad bton tshul ni/ lha 'dre'i rdzu 'phrul
gyis thag ring na mnan pa byas pa'ang khog zhugs rang gi mdun du bkug rtsis bzhin/ phyogs der dong brus nang nas glang rwa kha 'phur can zhig dang / gnad che ba de da
dung lus song zer rtsod rgyus dong nang rum dus chu dkrugs pa'i skad lta bu lobs lobs zer zhing khrag kyang phran bu 'thon/ dar tsam zhig ci yang ma byung bas/ klu bdud
kho de da thongs shig zer mur g.yag ru kha 'phur can bton nas/ yi ge dang rdzas sogs phyung pa sku tshab nas klog rtsis byas pas/ ma byed zer zhing / bstan pa'i bdag por
'di 'dra'i log sgrub tsam pa zhes gleng nas thams cad gtubs te dong der dor nas/ lo gsum ring ci yang mi skyon/ de nas brtag dgos tshul zer ba sogs byung ba bzhin dpa' chen
la'ang bdag rkyen yang dag gis phyir mngags nas/ lung gsal gyi rim gro rnams tshar phyin mdzad do/ /chu stod zla nang a tsa ra spre'u khyer ba zhig gzhi thog ltag sgor
dar tsam bsdad nas thal gyis byung ba/ mgon po'i bskul rnams na ltas ngan du bshad pa bzhin de 'phral bzlog pa 'bum ther mdzad/ yang de lo'i lhums zhugs dus ston nyin bzhi
thog tu

a tsa ra gnyis 'ong nas/ sbrul 'jigs su rung ba bya sogs mig 'phrul 'ga' zhig bstan pa la mdzod 'dzin nas rje nyid la de bzhin gyi gnas tshul phul bas/ de la skyon med/ sngar
spre'u khyer ba la ni bzlog pa mdzad zin/ rgya gar ba mig 'phrul ston mkhan mang po 'byung skad 'dug pas ci yang mi skyon zhes bka' bstsal/ phur sgrub skabs skar ma mjug
ring zhig rgyal khams su shar/ gro bzhin tshes brgyad nas bla chen 'phags pa rin po che'i rnam thar thang ka ngo mtshar can 'di dbu tshugs/ khrums zla tshes gcig phur
sgrub snga bar grol te/ nang so'i rtse nas chos dung rin po che gsung bskul gyis kyai rdo rje la brten pa'i rab gnas nyin gsum ma zhib rgyas kyi sbyin sreg sogs mdzad/ sbyin
bdag bsgo bar sku gdung rin po che'i dbu zhal ngo rnams dang phyag gnyer bcas te/ de'i tshe 'jam mgon gzhon nu'i phyag tu/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs bskyed kyis
bskrun pa'i sa le sbram gyi khams las grub pa'i bum pa cha/ phud dam phud phor/ 'dren chas cha tshang gsum sogs gser spyad mang du mchis pa'i nang nas gser gyi phud phor
g.yu khra'i rtags brgyad can phye mar gyis phyur ba dang / rje btsun drung rnams kyis sna bdun sna lnga rdzas brgyad sogs kyi tsakli/ yum mchog nas gser dam zhos gang
ba/ phyag gnyer sogs tshang mas zhi drag gi mchod pa bag dro ba bsnams nas rim bzhin phul te/ sbyin bdag bsgo ba/ bgegs sprod rdzas brgyad me long dur bil dung sogs kyi snod
pang tshang ma rje nyid kyi thugs rje las

byung ba/ 'bum thang mchod rdzas sogs su bzhugs pa de rnams bcud so sos bkang ba rim bzhin bstar te rten drung 'bul ba sogs phyag len rnam dag gi sgo nas mdzad cing / mchod
bstod grub nas phyi bskor la me tog gi char snyil bar yab rje ratna'i mtshan can gyi sku thog gi mchod phreng gcig dang / rje nyid kyi thugs bskyed kyis bskrun pa gnyis
rnams bzhi thog nang la sgrigs/ nang sor phun sum tshogs pa'i bkra shis sngon 'gro'i dril gsil/ rnga rol dung sogs kyi sgra sgrogs bzhin du nang so'i phyi bskor/ yar lam
tshogs chen du rab ston gyi bzhugs khri sogs bka' 'doms sngon grub la shis brjod kyi me tog dang / tshoms chen steng / srid zhi dpal 'khyil kun ra skyed phreng sogs nas rim
pas lha chen glo 'bur la 'phan nag zhal phye'i drung / sna lnga'i mchod gshom rgyas pa'i mthar mchod phreng gis mdzes par bskor te/ skyabs sems nas bzung shis brjod bar
mdzad rjes/ mchod phreng sogs tshang ma 'phan nag sku rgyab nas lha chen nang gi zhal chen lho/ phur khang / khyams stod sku gsung thugs rten rnams kyi spyan snga brgyud/
lha khang byang zhal chen byang sogs nas mthil skor du phebs te/ mchod phreng gi sngon du kong gzhas pa bcas rim bzhin phyi bskor 'khor 'phral/ nang sor gsung bsngo'i
thog mar rab gnas kyi bshad pa dang / khyad par nang so'i rten gsar rnying gi lo rgyus gang gi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma/ gong ma lnga/ sngags 'chang chen po/ a mes zhabs
rnams gtso bor smos

te mchod bsngo yang dag dang / mjug chog rnams grub nas/ mgul la bkra shis pa'i lha reg gis spras shing / rdo dril rnam rgyal bum pa sogs bsnams nas tshoms chen du rab ston
la phebs thog zhal ngo sogs rim bzhin legs 'bul gyi skabs 'jam mgon gzhon nus phyag dbang thog ma gnang ba'i dus/ rab ston nyin gang ma grol 'phral sa rub tsam la kha skong
sbyin sreg tshugs te srod chen la grol bar mdzad pa ste/ rab 'byams rgyal ba kun gyi drag po'i 'phrin las gcig bsdus dpal 'phrin las kyi mgon po dam can mon bu pu tra
chen po'i snang brnyan ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi bye brag gi bdag nyid rab tu gnas pa thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas ye shes sems dpa' sgrub par mdzad pa dang
/ bzhugs gnas nang so pu tra khang nyams gso gsar bzhengs drag po'i gzhal yas khang tshad dang mtshan nyid can du bskrun pa dang / gu ru rin po che'i phyag bzo zhal 'bag
dang / bla chen 'phags pa'i thugs dam ma gur dang / sa lo'i thugs dam pu tra'i sku sogs la nyams gso ngo mtshar can dang / khrag mtsho'i snod zangs chen bkra shis 'od
'bar la nyams gso bzhugs yul bkod legs/ yi dam chos skyong spyi dang bye brag las mkhan dbang po'i rnam drug rten dang gtor ma gsum la sogs pa rje btsun sa skya pa'i sde
bstan pa gdung rgyud dang bcas pa'i 'thas su yang dag par mdzad do/ /chog mang skabs su nub gcig gzigs snang du bud med mchor mo dang hrul mo mang po kun rang gzhas byed

mu nas/ hrul mo rnams pho brang rtser rgyug shar byed pa zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ nad ngor ngos 'dzin mdzad cing / de dang skar ma ngan pa/ rong khog kha shas la nyi ma bdun dang
gsum sogs mthong snang sna tshogs byung ba sogs bstan 'gro spyi sger gyi rim gror ched du dgongs te/ gur mgon gtor ma'i las tshogs rje btsun gong ma'i phyag bzhes/ ngor
chen rdo rje 'chang dang bdag chen rdo rje 'chang sogs kyi gsung rab nas 'byung ba'i dmar chen gtor bzlog rgyas pa rje nyid nas bskul gnang gis sgrub skabs/ nub gcig zor
las lnga'i mgyogs gtor dang bstun bsam brling nas byung ba 'dra ba'i gtso zhig shar phyogs su mched/ nyer brgyad nyin kha ba 'tshub pa dang bcas bal yul nas gorSha'i blon
po sogs mi sna mang po dang / spang shing phun sogs skyid grong pa re gnyis bcas 'byor phyag pu tra'i bstod bskul dang mnyam du byung bas/ mon bu dngos su 'ong ba lta
bu'i thugs nyams 'khrungs gor rgyal nas gsung bris rten bcas dang / mi sna rgan pa des rdo nag gi phor pa gu yus bkang ba sogs spyi sger nas 'bul ba dang / sku sang dus mi
sna lo tsA bcas la rgyal po'i sku khams las 'phros pa'i gsung zhib gleng mdzad pas/ kho na re/ sngar nas bal yul rgyal khag mang pos rgyal ba yab sras sogs che gnyan du
ma'i phyag mdzad dngul min gyis bkang zhing / tshogs 'dus rnams kyang ma rungs par byas/ bal yul du'ang g.yul kho nas thugs bsun rang byung yang / da cha gorSha nas bal
yul yongs rdzogs dbang

zhing / bod dang sngar nas lugs mthun rang yin pa bzhin/ slad nas kyang de bzhin bcas Tam gsar 'ja' 'u dngul tshad lhad med 'di bzhin 'don rgyu/ bod nas kyang gser thang brgyad
ma sogs dang / rgyal ba yab sras/ rgyal tshab dam pa/ bka'i dgung blon rnams bcas la rgyu mtshan zhu rgyu bcas/ 'di nas kyang char pa chu grogs dang / gzhan la'ang bka'
'doms dgos tshul rgyal po'i bka' shog la'ang yod cing / ngag lam nas kyang zhu dgos bzhin bla ma khyod kyis phan 'gyur byed dgos zhes gleng bar/ rje rdo rje 'chang gi
gsung las/ phyag mdzod so so dang tshong 'dus sogs gang sar phan bzhed de bzhin rjes su yi rang / rang ni gdan sa go mtho ba las rgyal khams la bkod pa thub pa zhig min
yang / snyan 'bul zhu 'os tshad mar khyed rgyal blon gyi dgongs pa bzhin sne 'byor yang dag zhu/ sngar nas g.yul kho nas 'o brgyal byung 'dug pas/ da cha lung pa des mtshon
sems can rnams la byams skyong mdzad na don thams cad 'grub pas/ rgyal por de bzhin zhu grogs gyis/ zhes pa'i rdo rje tha tshig des khong rnams thal mo sbyor zhing mgo
dud pa bcas dga' mgu yi rang la 'khod cing / zur gsos sogs gnang cha yang dag mdzad/ nyer dgu'i nyin bskul dang bstun phyogs bzhir ru 'dren dang / las mgon/ gur lcam dral
gyi 'cham sku byin can rnams 'cham par mdzad pas/ chu kha mar dus gsum rgyal ba'i drag bskul dus/ mkhas btsun chen po'i thugs dam

ma khyer mis ma theg pas nyen bslangs/ zor 'phen phyogs su zhal bubs la khad kyi nyams dang / rlung phyogs kyang legs shing / bya khra mar mdun gyi shul 'dren mtshon pa'i bu
mo rnams nas zhing steng du mda' dar drang por btsugs pas/ rje nyid kyi gsungs las/ mi 'gyur tshe yi ka ba tshugs rtags su 'dug gsungs/ smin zla sngon mar nang so mgon
khang du/ rten mdos/ rtag gtor sogs 'dzugs gnang skabs mdos gzhung dam pas mdzad pa'i mgon mdos rgyas pa dang / pu tra'i sger mdos/ bskang gso/ mdos kyi phyag tshad yi ge
rnams gung bsgrigs/ gshom dang 'don 'grigs dbyangs rol bcas rje nyid nas zhag 'ga' gnang bas ngo mtshar ba'i rtags kyang mang du 'khrungs shing / de mtshams nas rje rdo
rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs bskyed rmad du byung bas/ gdan sa chen po 'dir rig gnas kyi slob grwa 'dzugs bzhed ring mo zhig nas 'khrungs pa de nyid phyag tu son te/ mkhas dbang
zhe chen drung yig 'byor zhing chos grwa lho nas grangs bcu drug thog mar slob grwar bkas mngags te 'phags chen mchog gi spyod par thugs gzhol ba'i skabs so/ /dgung
grangs zhe gnyis su phebs pa lcags stag dbo zla'i nang / sog yul ha la shan nas dwags po sprul sku 'byor bar sdom gsum rab dbye'i ljags lung zhig bstsal/ nag zlar mdzod 'dzin
par rang re'i lha khang chen mo 'di byang shambha la'i rigs ldan gyi pho brang rtser 'gran zlar mchis na ma

gtogs 'dzam gling na med pa yongs grags 'di la/ sngags 'chang chen po'i rten brten par bcas la zhabs tog bla med mdzad cing / ngos rang gi thog la yang phyi nang gi span bad
nyams gso gsar bzhengs thugs rten mchod rten 'dzam gling 'od gsal gsar bskrun bcas bgyis shing / da lam gtsug lag khang gi rtser bgrod pa'i skas ring ngo mtshar can kun
gyi blor mi shong ba lta bu zhig dang / mdo sngags chos kyi sgra dbyangs gnas mchog 'di nas sgrog par mtshon pa'i rnga bo che gsar bskrun sogs dgos rgyu'i bka' phebs bzhin
gza' tshes dge ba nas dbu tshugs te rim gyis 'grub nyer/ chos tshigs mar ngo sngon 'gro'i don chos pa rnams dka' spyad sngon la btang nas lung rtogs yon tan phyi nas 'phel
ba mtshon phyir/ snron zla'i nyer gsum la skas 'dzugs dang / 'jig rten pa rnams yar ngo sngon 'gro'i don bde skyid 'phel yang 'khor ba'i chos las ma 'das so/ /zhes pas
na/ 'dir bde skyid 'phel phyir chu stod tshes bzhir dge tsha shol nas zhal dro mdzad dgos kyi bka' bzhin/ rdo skas gsum dang shing skas sna zhe gcig sngar yod sgo them
the ba'i zhe lnga mchis pa ste/ de lta'i skas ring ngo mtshar cad de thag pa dang rgyu bzo'i 'phrul sogs kyis 'dzugs skabs kyang rje nyid kyi thugs bskyed kho nas rgyun
ring ma 'gor bar dka' tshegs dang bral bzhin du gzengs kyis 'bad med lhun gyis grub/ tshes gsum srod char thog mar dro bzhon gyis rdul bcags/ zil char gyis sa gzhi snum por

byas/ 'brug skad snyan par sgrogs pa sogs sngon 'phags chen de nyid kyis chu mig chos 'khor gyi rnam thar las 'byung ba de slar yang shar ba'i ngo mtshar dang / tshes bzhir
gsol thab spo gnang chabs cig rje rdo rje 'chang gis dbus zhal ngo rnams dang / chos grwa rnam gnyis/ drung 'khor lto zan/ shar nub kyi mi sde/ zhe drung sogs kha 'thor
bar rags bsdus bcas gangs nyi shar tsam la gong 'khod tshang ma gzab bzhes kyis rim 'dus dang bcas/ skas zhabs su chos dung rin po che rje nyid kyi phyag tu bzhes/ 'jam mgon
sku mched la tshe dpag med dang bkra shis rdzas rtags kyi tsakli phul/ zhal ngo gzhan rnams nas phyag cha gang 'os/ mkhan pos thub dbang gi sku/ phyag gnyer nas 'dod
'jo mtshon phyir bum pa nyer lnga'i rdzas kyis bkang ba kha rgyan mgul chings can/ drung 'khor nas phyag cha gang 'os/ chos grwa byang pas rdo dril bum pa sogs/ lho nas bka'
bstan glegs bam/ gzhan byings nas rang rang gi blos dpyad kyi lag cha bcas/ chos dung rin po che'i gsung gis thams cad bskul bar mdzad nas/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid thog
mar phebs shing / sngon la bye'u chung ngu zhig gyen 'gro'i tshul gyis byung ba ni/ gtsug lag khang chen po'i srung mas bsu ba mdzad pa'i brda dang / de tshe rje nyid
kyis 'phags pa rin po che'i gsung tshe dpag med kyi bkra shis shlau ka bcu dang / gtsug tor dri med kyi dkyil chog nas 'byung ba'i rmi ngan 'jig dang zhes pa nas/ nor

dang bkra shis rnam par 'phel/ zhes pa'i bar shlau ka so bzhi rje nyid kyi gsung dpal ldan sa skya pa'i chos srid la dge legs 'byung ba'i shlau ka gcig ste skas them gyi grangs
dang mthun par mdzad dgongs pa ni bkra shis kyi tshigs bcad de dag so sor gsal ba dang rgyas pa rnam thar chen mo bzhin dang / skas 'go'i sgo nang du rje nyid khri'u
shing la chos dung rin po che bsnams bzhin par bzhugs te/ yar 'gro tshang mar phyag dbang rdzogs nas/ rtser lha bsangs skabs bya rog snum bag can gsum 'ongs te dbus ma'i
mchu yas mar gyis dkar po byas te/ gsum ga rje'i zhal dkyil la blta bzhin du skad snyan sgrogs par byed do/ /de dus zhal ngo byings rnams theg chen pho brang du bzhugs shing
/ bka' rams nas thigs g.yab shar gyi byang du tshe chog bsgrigs pa yan gyis de'i lhor 'dul lung sde bzhi/ 'bum sde lnga sogs gsung sgrogs/ btsun chung rin sgang rnams
nas chos spyod/ byings rnams mkhar thog khud yangs su bsdad/ dga' ston gyi spro zas sogs bstsal te rim gyis lha khang byang gi skas la btang / de nas theg chen pho brang
du phyag nas dang / mdzod nag gtor spod/ phyi dro sde yangs su kong gzhas sogs legs lam dpag med mdzad pa de'i tshe lha chen steng gi rten grags che ba rnams dang / chos
dung rin po che sogs la snyan shal 'dod gsol can re 'bul bar mdzad/ de'i sang dge tsha dang / de mtshams nas mdzod 'dzin bla brang mchog tu gtan tshigs zhu bar phebs

pas mgo 'dren bdag rkyen gyi brtse 'dzin yang dag gnang / de nas zhal gro'i lhums zhugs dus ston gyi tho rengs mnal lam du/ phun gling dbang nub byang gi ka ba 'gyur nas gzim
chung yongs rdzogs skyon yong la khad mchis pas rje nyid kyi sku gzan sne mos ka ba de brdungs shing bgegs skrod dang / phun sum tshogs pa'i shis brjod mdzad song bas/
mi zhig nas da skyon yong ba med zer mur mnal sad/ de skabs mdzod 'dzin par yang lam rta dre'u'i gdang 'ur gyis 'ga' zhig gi rkang lag la skyon pa sogs 'tshub nyams de dag
zhi ba'i bka' 'doms dang / phur sgrub skabs gong gi rnga bo che gsar bzhengs la shing rtsi/ nang gzungs/ rnga lpags/ dbyug gu khri bzhugs yul sogs phal cher grub ste/
gsung bskul gyi thog mar 'dar grangs mkhan chen ngag dbang gis mdzad/ de lo bsam yas chos skyong gi lung bstan du/ spre'u'i mgo tog gi rgyal mtshan sogs dgos gsungs pa bzhin
bstsal/ khrums zla'i sgrub mchod thog stod sgar dpon shag byang er khi thA ji 'bul chen dang bcas pas gang ci'i gsung gleng zhib cha dang byabs khrus bcas bstsal/ dbyug
zla'i chog mang bde kyai gsang gsum thog rab tu gnas pa'i sbyor gnang gi 'phags pa rin po che'i rnam thar zhal thang gsar bskrun ngo mtshar can dang / gdung rabs rin po
che'i zhal thang gsar bskrun/ gzhan yang phur khang du gsar bzhengs mang po/ lha khang byang du 'jam rdor bla brgyud bris rnying dang / grub brgya khams thang sogs zhal

phye nas cho ga rnams chu lug lo bzhin mdzad dus/ sta gon nyin khang gsar dpon bgres gzhon la 'thon phyag thog rje nyid kyi mgul la mdzod rnying khyad mtshar sgron pa dang
/ lcang skya rdo rje 'chang nas gsung shog rten spam mtho bcas pa'i chibs zam brgyud phebs pa sogs rten 'brel legs shing / de dus khyams stod dkar po rnam gsum/ a mes zhabs
rnams kyi 'dra sku sa zhu/ na bza' bcas 'bul bar gnang / sa bskor nyin tho rengs snga mor rje nyid nas sgo rngar phyag nas dus gsar bzhengs thang ka sogs dmigs gsal 'ga'
'dren gnang gi cho ga dngos kyai rdo rje la sbyar ba'i rab gnas 'bring po'i lugs la/ sgo rnga 'od dpag med du bskyed de rgyal chen rnams la rdo rje phur pa'i rgyal chen
tho 'dzugs la gzhi mdzad sgos chos ma 'dres par sbyor gnang dang / stag 'dzin gtor bsngo sbags sgrub skabs gur lcam dral las mched pa'i gnod sbyin yab yum las/ pu tra ming
sring spro ba'i pu tra dang lhan cig bskyed de mchod gtor bstod phrin gyis/ gtsug lag khang / dge 'dun sde/ sgo rnga sogs srung skyobs kyi gnyer dam dang / sbyin bdag
bsgo bar sras yum rnams phebs thog drung skya ser gyis legs so bcas shar mda' btang tsam la grol zhing / chog mang bde mchog rab gnas kyi sbyin bdag bsgo bar yang gong bzhin
sras yum dang kyai rdor gsang 'dus gnyis la sbyin bdag phyag gnyer nas mdzad de/ lha chen steng 'og sogs nas rim brgyud phyi bskor la me char nyil dus/ nam mkha' sprin

gyis gang zhing rlung yang ldang ba bcas cung zad 'tshub nyams dang / 'jam mgon gcung rin po che sku rgyab tu gdan 'dren gyis mnal thog brdal la sgang bzhugs khrir phebs tshe
thugs nyams spos kyis mnal sad pa ni/ mdo sde rnams las/ de bde bar gnyid kyis log cing / bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs pa bzhin dang / phyi skor 'khor nas rje
nyid kyis mchod bsngo rgyas pa dang / bstan bstan 'dzin spyi bye brag snod bcud bcas la gnas skabs mthar thug gi bsngo smon bkra shis kyis mtha' brgyan pa bcas stsol nyin
nyi ma'ang gzhan las ring bar byung zhing / de tshe rje rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'dzin par mdzad ces gleng bar gyur to/ /de mtshams rtse sku yon khang dang / gsol thab
yas mas rnams gsar bskrun gyi zhal gro ji ltar mdzad pa dang / der gdung sras sku mched nas sku yon gsan sbyong ji ltar gnang ba sogs 'og tu 'gro mgon dbang sdud snying po'i
rnam thar du byung ba bzhin dang / de sngon tsam nas bla brang rtse shod dbus phebs skabs sku tshab zhig legs skyes 'bul bar mngags/ tshes dgu'i nyin skyed lha me 'bar
gyi mgon khang gi g.yas g.yon ri nas shag ma cher nyil ba dang / de sngon snron dang gro bzhin nang la'ang zhal gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs byung ba rnams zhi phyir/ rje
rdo rje 'dzin nyid chibs bskyod kyis skyed lhas lho ri'i spang steng du lha bsangs/ phyag nas bcas dang / mgon khang du gtor bsngo bskang ba so so nas brgya tshar sogs spyi
bye'i bstan pa thugs kyi dpal

ber dam du bzung ba'i rlabs chen rgyal sras mchog gi mdzad pas zhag 'ga' zhig 'das rjes su/ skyed lha'i lho ri de na rje nyid gtor 'bul mdzad kyin yod dgongs par/ mgon khang
mdun gyi ri gsham de nas gzugs mi mthong ba'i DA ma ru skad sbam po brgya tsam zhig bsgrigs nas dkrol ba zil chen zhig 'khrungs/ mgo zla'i nang khal kha dge slong 'tsho
byed chu nad can zhig sku'i gam du bcar bar sman bla'i mdo lung sogs mdzad/ khong rang gi lung par dge lugs chos dang gtsug lag khang sogs gsar 'dzugs bgyis par bzhugs rgyu'i
rten dang / dgon ming sogs zhus 'bras thub dbang gnas bcu'i zhal thang / sman bla'i mdo dung dkar sogs bstsal te dgon ming theg chen dbang rgyal gling du 'dogs par
mdzad/ dge slong gi lus kyang bde bar gyur te mi phyed dad pa'i sa la bkod/ zla ba de nas badzra kI la ya'i sgrub mchod skabs kyi zhal 'bag gsar bskrun du mar rab gnas kyi
me tog brgya tshar bstsal te byin rlabs kyi gzi 'od 'bar ba mdzad pa'i skabs so//dgung grangs zhe gsum du phebs pa lcags yos rgyal zla'i mjug tsam gyi gzigs snang du/ rje
nyid bal yul du phebs par sngar bas bag dro zhing / mchod rten bya rung kha shor shin tu 'drongs la gdugs chos 'khor gser shog gis phral byugs lta bu'i dbyibs can zhig
gzigs mur/ mi 'ga' zhig nas 'di la khyod rang dril bu zhig phul na thams cad la phan thogs yod

zer ba zhig 'khrungs pa bzhin/ rje nyid kyi gsung las/ bden min ci ltar yang phan du re nas dril bu gsung bskul rlung g.yab/ zhal byang smon lam bde skyid dpal ster bcas ngo
mtshar du phul ba yin gsungs/ de'i sbyar byang du/ ces ma 'ongs lung byang rnams las/ lnga brgya tha ma'i dus 'dir bal bod mi rtag sgyu ma'i snang tshul ston par gsungs
pa'i dus der slebs pa lta bu'i gangs ri'i ljongs 'dir mchod yon du ma zhig la 'pho 'gyur rim can byung ba dang / nged rang dran nas rang lo bcu bzhi lon pa nas bzung bzhi
bcu zhe skor lon pa'i bar bal yul du dus 'khrugs che chung sna tshogs rgyun ma chad cing / mthar rgya gar sogs yul gru gzhan la'ang brdab zings langs pa lta bu shar skabs
bstan 'gro bde skyid brtas phyir phul ba yin/ gsungs pa'i skabs su/ ngo mtshar gyi rnam thar 'di ltar gleng ste/ de'i tshe gnya' nang sho pa zung gi yi ge las/ 'di nas
bang mi bal yul la 'gro skabs yo mo'i chu sogs 'bab pa'i chu chen zhig la/ rong phyogs kyi gru shing gzhong lta bu zhig rgyag dgos 'dug pas gru de rdo la thug pa lta bu'i
rkyen gyis chag nas bang mi gru mkhan sogs chur shor 'dug rung / skyabs mgon khyed rang gi thugs rjes chu chung sa zhig tu bang mi gru mkhan chag sogs dang de ga nas gnang
ba'i dril bu bka' tham sogs la skyon med byung ngo / /dril bu mchod rten chen po'i shar phyogs su chos 'khor bcu gsum gyi gsham du bzhugs pas gsung sogs 'gran bral du
'dug

tshul bris nas phul ba bzhin/ rje rgyal sras mchog gi thugs bskyed smon lam gyi dbang gis phyi rol 'byung ba'i rkyen gyis kyang brdzi bar mi nus pa de ltar lags so/ /zla mjug
tu glo bur du paN chen thams cad mkhyen pa gtsang chibs bsgyur gyi gleng ba dang / chibs zam brgyud lha sar khams nas 'brum bu'i nad dogs kyis thugs bsun pas bstan 'gro'i
bde thabs gang la ci 'tshams zhu dgos/ rgyal tshab dam pa/ bka'i gung blon lhan rgyas bcas nas bstsal ba bzhin/ de 'phral ljags chu/ srung skud/ sku khrus sogs 'bul gnang
dang chabs gcig gang ci'i snyan 'bul tshang ma mchod yon bstan la dgongs pa'i thugs bskyed cher mdzad pas 'phral du nad thag chod pa sogs/ rgyal khams kun tu rje yi
thugs rje las byung ba'i rnam thar sgrogs pa la gcig tu gzhol bar gyur to/ /de nas rta zla'i nang gi gtor spod le tshan nyin gnyis/ nyin gcig la bka' drin che ste/ zhag lnga'i
ring rje rdo rje 'chang nas skul mkhan dang rdo rje 'chang slob dpon gnyis char gyi 'gan bzhes kyis bde gling phun tshogs yongs nas ri khrod ma'i bum chog rgyas pa
tshoms chen du mdzad/ 'phags pa rin po che'i rnam thar thang sku zhal gsar bzhengs zhal phye zhing mchod gtor sogs rgyas pa dang / khyad par nye skor mi phyug tshang ma'i
bza' btung gi lhag ma nad bdag gtor rdzas su bsdu gnang thog cho ga smin grub mdzad de/ nad bdag dkar dmar la dga' ba'i gtor rdzong dus/ gong gi rdzas rnams gtor ma dang
chabs cig ting

'dzin sngags rgyas bsngo gnang / de dus kyi nad bdag grwa pa lus stod shu bas gang ba zhig dang / bud med 'o zo khyer ba gnyis rje nyid kyis dngos su gzigs te/ bka' las nad
rims dang byang 'brog khrod la phyugs kha mi gtsang ba 'di gnyis kyi cho 'phrul yin 'dug pas da skyon yong ba med gsungs/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i phyi rol bde ba can gyi
zhing gi shar tsam du/ ri lung khang bzang zas nor so so'i 'dod pa bzhin dgos dgu 'byung ba zhig tu rdzong gnang gi spyan dmigs brtan po dang / nyin re bzhin lha chen rtse
nas phyogs bzhir sbyangs khrus mdzad pas/ yul ngan gyis dpon slob kun 'dar bun grang 'bur can du gyur kyang / bdag bas gzhan gces byang chub sems dpa'i rnam thar gyi ngang
nas thugs rus mdzad cing rje nyid kyi thugs bskyed kyi ri khrod ma'i thog ri bya sder ma sogs phyi skor thang 'ga' zhig kyang snga phyir gnang / de nas bzung rgyal khams
su 'go nad mi 'byung ba'i thabs mu sbrel du mdzad/ dbo zla nang 'dod khams dbang mo rje khol gyi mdos chog bstan 'gro spyi sger gyi rim gror ched dmigs dang / nag zla
nang sa skyar mi rtsis shig byung skabs rje rdo rje 'chang yab sras nas mgul cham zhig kyang bzhes/ snron zla'i mdo sde lha mchod thog bsam yas chos skyong gi lung yin tshul
gyis/ rab grwa zha ser du bsgyur dgos kyi mgo zug la rje rdo rje 'chang nas mdo rgyud dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa'i lung dang sbyar te rang rang gi lugs bzhin gyis bstan
pa phan sleb che ba'i mtha'

'doms mang du bstsal yang ldog par ma gyur cing / chu stod zla nang zhig 'od gsal gyi ngang du gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang de nyid yang yang phebs nas/ zhig drag gi bka' 'doms
du ma mdzad mu las thugs dgyes nyams kyis chos 'phro rnams bstud mar ma tshang med par gnang ba zhig 'khrungs pas/ sngar ma gsan pa'i chos bka' zab khyad can mang po zhig
de dus 'od gsal du gsan zhing / smin zla'i nang rje nyid nas khrus sngags kyi chu dang rdzas srung sogs nye skor kun la bkye gnang dang bstun/ sangs rgyas pa/ ri khrod
ma'i bum chog bcas mdzad nas phyogs bzhir sbyangs khrus/ srung ma spyi dang lha mo rje khol la 'phrin 'chol bcas nyin gsum sngon 'gro'i zla ba kha shas de bzhin nar mar mdzad/
mgo zla'i nang gser khar 'brum dogs kyi gleng je gsal gyis gzhis rtse sogs su 'o brgyal gyi gnas dang / lam sdems kyang shin tu dam pa dang / de'i tshe 'brum srung
dang yor srung spyan gsal 'chang ba tsam gyis nus pa 'thon pa byung ba snang zhing / der ma zad rgyun gyi zhal 'don gzhung skong ba gtor bzlog sogs mdor na mdzad 'phrin thams
cad bstan 'gro spyi dgos kyi phan bde sgrub pa'i ched kho nar smin par mdzad do//dgung grangs zhe bzhir phebs pa chu 'brug rgyal zla nas rta zla'i bar la bstan 'gro'i
don du sku dngos phebs kyi/ rgyal khams kun tu nad mug zhi phyir mgon khang khag tu bskang 'phrin dbo zla nas nag zla'i bcu bzhi bar

lha bsangs / ri khrod ma'i bum chog phyogs bzhir sbyangs khrus res mos parNa sha ba ri'i mdo sogs mdo phran bco lnga tsam/ ljags klog sgrol bzlog rnam rgyal ma'i gzungs stong
'dod gsol bkra shis rnams dang / de nas lha mo rje khol gyi mdos bskang la bdag bskyed phur chung bcas bcu bzhi'i nyin grwa grangs nyi shu skor gyis glud rdzong rnams
dang / ma mo spyi gtor/ rje khol gyi bskang gtor/ mdos bcas bsam gling du spyan drangs shing / de'i tshe dbang khang du mdos sgrig rgyu'i snga dro bud med dpal mo zer ba
zhig gis dkar yol che legs zung dang chung ba gcig bcas 'bras dkar gyis phyur por bkang ste phul ba dang / mdos tshugs pa'i zhag shas nas gdan sa dan khrod kyi bu mo 'ga'
zhig gi rtse dga'i do rar rdo 'jim la bcos pa'i lus rgyan 'chor mor bgyis te lhan 'tshog gis gtsug lag khang gi 'gag dang sde gseb rnams su rgyu ba sogs/ ma mo mkha' 'gro'i
cho 'phrul 'khor nyams ci yang byung zhing grol nas zhag gsum pa'i tho rengs 'od gsal du/ mi pho mo mang pos rje nyid la dad 'dun lhag par che ba dang / bud med gcig
'chor gnyis 'chor bdun brgyad cig 'ongs nas pad skor sogs lus kyi rnam 'gyur dod nyams dang / skad sbom phra snyoms shing bzang bas/ tshe dbang zhu la phebs zhes glu dbyangs
blangs te khrom lta bu zhig la brda gtong ba'i ltas 'khrungs pa ni/ spyir rgyal khams nad dogs myur du zhi ba dang / lhag par yul gru 'di nyid du bde 'jags 'byung ba
dang yang sgos

rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi sku 'phrang 'tshub ma zhi ba'i rtags su gor ma chag go /de lta'i skabs rgyal khams su rje nyid kyi ljags chu rims srung sogs kyis phal cher khyab
cing / gong gsal gyi thugs bskyed de dag bcas nyid kyi sku drin gyis bskyangs so zhes pa'i sgra sgrogs pas brel ba bzhin don la'ang gnas so/ /sa zla'i mjug thas se tA la
sbo shog thu'i gsung mngags zhib cha bcas/ bla ma sangs rgyas don grub dpon g.yog 'byor ba rje nyid ril sgrub bcad rgya 'grig pas zhag 'ga' sgug thog nas/ rten 'brel rab
la sgrig mi dgos par 'grig pa ni/ snron zla'i tshes gnyis la 'jam mgon khams gsum dbang sdud nyid kyai rdo rje'i rgyud 'don la thog mar phebs dus bla ma dpon g.yog la 'byor
phyag thog khong tshos mgul la bkra shis pa'i lha dar phul ba dang / tshes gsum nyin sprul pa'i lha khang chen mor zab pa'i yang rtse bla ma'i rnal 'byor nyams bzhes
pa mdo sngags tshogs yongs kyi dbur rje yab sras byon thog dam tshig 'gyur med bas se phyag rdor skyabs kyi gsung shog rten gya nom pas thog drangs/ maNDal gyis gtsos dngul
bre chen mang po'i 'bul chen mdzad pa sogs dge legs rten 'brel bzang po rab 'byams rgyal ba'i zhing khams su'ang khyab cing grub par gyur to/ /de nang chu stod dge tsha
dang / bco lngar zhal dro lha khang du rje nyid kyis deb sgrigs bzhin bstan don rgya cher mdzad pa ni rnam pa kun tu'o/ /gro bzhin phur sgrub nyer gcig mus chen mchod
bsngor dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi rnam sprul yin pa'i bsngags

brjod mdzad pas/ de'i tho rengs kyi 'od gsal du/ rje nyid khyad 'phags lho'i mgon khang na bzhugs mur/ dar tsam nas sras yum gnyis kyang phebs byung ba la/ rje nyid nas rten
bshad gnang rgyu yin dgongs par rten khri'i steng na bde mchog lhan skyes kyi sku yum phag mo'ang sngon mos 'khyud pa 'jim sku khru gang tsam zhig gi bzhugs gdan nyi dkyil
de la/ gser yig dbu chen gyis/ ka lingka'i tshogs dpon gyis phul/ sa skyar gdung byon yong / gegs chags lan tshan gsum mchis pa'i gnyis mnyel tshul dang / gsum pa shar
lho'i dmar grib la 'dzem zer ba zhig bris 'dug pa dang / rten khri gzhan zhig na kha che paN chen gyi thugs dam bde mchog lhan skyes kyi gser zangs kyi sku mkhyid gang
tsam zhig bcas gzigs snang du 'khrungs pa 'di la/ rje rdo rje 'chang gi bka' las/ ka lingga 'di bde mchog gsung 'khor gyi gras lus kyi kha nang mnye ma'i khams sbyong byed
dang / phyi shar lho'i rtsibs na rab tu bzang po dang shyA ma de ba bcas yin pas brda tshig gang yin ni dbye dka' gsungs pa 'di la gnad khyad par ba zhig yod snyam yang
re zhig btang snyoms su bzhag de'i tshe 'jam mgon dbang sdud snying po nyid phur sgrub tshogs phebs thog ma'i skabs dang / khrums zla'i tshes gsum la lha chen nas sangs
rgyas don 'grub chos khrims mdzad gong gsung brtag zhus pa'i tho rengs 'od gsal du/ rje nyid lho byang dge 'dun rnams dang lhan du bzhugs thog sku sang zhig mdzad par/ mkhan
rin po

che nas/ sngar yang lha khang bla brang du thub sku khyad can zhig 'byor zhing / da dung 'byor rgyu zhig gzhan nas gdan sar zhus tshod 'dug kyang lan ma gnang bas ma 'byor
gsungs pa la/ rje nyid kyi dgongs par yang / sngar nas thub sku zhig ser phreng sogs kyis drangs pa yin/ da dung 'byor tshe de bzhin gyi dgongs mur thub sku de 'bul mi yin
rgyu'i mus phyogs nas dge slong bud med kyi chas can zhig 'dug par/ bka' las spyir dge slong gi skya chas dang / bye brag bud med kyi chas 'di 'dra glang dar ma'i dge slong
yin 'dra gsungs pas/ nged la dgos gal zhig byung nas byas pa yin zer bar/ 'don pa ci shes dri bar mdzad lan/ ma Ni las mi shes zer bas rdzun yin dgongs nas/ khyed rang
mtshan brjod/ bzang spyod ltung bshags rnams spyir 'don pa dang / bye brag rang re'i lugs la gong ma lnga bstod med na mi rung bas thon gsungs pas/ rtsod pa bgyid rtsis
kyis gong ma lnga ci yin zer/ dkar po rnam gsum dang chos rje khu dbon yin gsungs pas mgo gug gug byed mur 'od gsal 'byams pa zhig 'khrungs pas/ bka' las/ da lta'i mkhan
po dang / slad nas 'byon 'gyur zhig kyang khyad mtshar yod ngor/ gdan sa rang nas 'grig min byung dogs bcas ma 'ongs lung bstan 'dra zhing / bud med kyi chas bgyis pa gab
tshig bzang ngan dbye dka' gsungs/ yang tshes bdun gyi tho rengs sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal pos byas 'gyur nas gsung chen po'i sgo nas gsung

mgur zhig mdzad byung ba la/ de'i gsung lan rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyis sa skya nas 'bul gnang gis phar gsan tshur gsan shin tu gsal bar 'khrungs kyang tshig don ji bzhin
ma nges/ zhes gsungs pa 'di dag ni/ nye ring kun la snyoms pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ zhes gsung gi gsang bar mnga' brnyes pa'i brda'o/ /sngon sngags 'chang nyid la sa lo tswa
ba 'od gsal du byon nas lung bstan phul du byung bar bstsal ba bzhin/ rje nyid la'ang sngags 'chang chos kyi rgyal po zhal gzigs kyi dka' gsang rmad du byung ba grol
ba ni gor ma chag kyang / de dus su ma zad/ dus gnas dang bstun par mdzad de gnad che bar 'ga' zhig gi tshe rnam pa kun tu ma nges pa'i zol mdzad cing / gzhan du bsnyel ba
mi mnga' ba'i ngang tshul bzang po rje nyid la mnga' ba ni ma bcos lhun grub bo/ /tshes brgyad nas phun gling dbang khang du sras yum rnams la/ kyai rdo rje'i rgyud dbang
rdul dkyil steng nas dang / aShTa'i bzlas lung bcas rgyas par bstsal ba de ni/ 'jam mgon gcung rin po che gong gsal gyi lhums zhugs thog go chod par zhal gyis bzhes pa'i
dbang de dang / sku bltams nas 'di nyid smin byed kyi thog ma rang yin par nges la/ de dang mu sbrel zhu dbon ngag dbang dge legs dang / mkhas dbang zhe drung slob grwa
dge rgan bcas la'ang bstsal zhing / rigs cha rtsa rgyud sdom gsum rnam gsum rnam gnyis bcas kyi tshogs dbu dang / chos lhun mkhan gsar la mnga' gsol sbyangs khrus/ 'jam

mgon sku mched/ rje btsun drung zung rgyal yum bcas la kun rig dbang rdul dkyil steng nas dang / bsnyen thabs kyi ljags lung bcas bstsal/ bkra shis zla ba de'i nang lha chen
khyams stod gser khri rin po che gsar bskrun mdzad rgyu'i bka' 'doms bzhin/ mdzod 'dzin nas lha bzo zla 'od sogs la bka' mngags te ha lam gyi tsag par zla ba de'i tshes
dge bar spyan bdar dus/ zhal dkar 'bras sil gyis gtams pa phul ba dang / stabs 'grig byung bas la nye bzang ba'i sgo dang po dang / dbyug zla'i nang lha bzo zla 'od nas
ngor thar rtse gur zhal lha mo stag zhon rnams dang / rje dpal ldan chos skyong gi dgongs rdzogs rten rnams bskrun par bkas mngags shing / gzungs 'dod gsol sogs cha rkyen
bcas legs par gdams/ de nas zhu dbon dang sde dge'i hor 'dra bcas la spyan gzigs gtso 'khor gsum gyi rjes gnang dang / lung phon che ba bcas bstsal/ mkhas dbang zhe drung
la 'thon phyag thog rig gnas bskor las pa'i bka' bstsal zhib rgyas mdzad pas khong dgyes dgur son cing gnang cha'ang gya nom par stob par mdzad/ smin zla'i nang rje nyid
dang zhabs 'bring pa chen po gzim 'od bcas nas sdom gsum kha skong bdud rtsi nying khu/ gdung rabs gsol 'debs kha skong bcas dang / phun tshogs dge legs ma/ gtor ma brgya
rtsa/ dkar cha bzhi/ de dag gi gsal byed bcas ljags zhus dag par mdzad de chos sbyin mi zad par du bskrun pa'i bka' 'doms dang / tshes

bcu dgur dar mdo pha sgar dang chu 'bum bla ma gnyis kyi 'bul bzhes la tshogs dbur phebs shing / 'dis mtshon snga phyi kun tu 'bul bzhes tshogs phebs mdzad pa mang ngo / /dgung
grangs zhe lngar phebs pa chu sbrul lor sku 'phrang shin tu 'tshub pa yod thog bod lo gsar ba nas bzung lo gang phyir phebs spangs te/ sku tshe'i cho ga tshugs 'phral
zhig tu/ ze'u lha khang 'dra mo zhig nas tshe dpag med kyi sku che chung sna tshogs shig rnyed pa 'khrungs pa dang mnyam du/ 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can gang la'ang gtsug
tor rnam rgyal gyi sku zhig dang / yang rgyal zla'i nang zhig la sku par mang po zhig gi khrod nas tshe dpag med kyi sku par gsal ba rnams rnyed pa 'khrungs pa ni/ sku
tshe'i 'phrang las grol nas bstan 'gro'i dpal mgon du yun ring 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i brdar nem nur dang / yang dbo zla'i tshes gcig tho rengs gangs ri chen po'i khrod
nas 'bras dkar khal du ma zhig rnyed pa gnang mur/ lho rang gi lam yin dgongs pa zhig shar ba ni/ de dus bstan gsol gnang mus yin pa bzhin/ jo mo lha ri'i cho 'phrul zhig
yin 'dra gsungs/ de nas bzung rgyun ring bar ljongs 'dis mtshon 'dzam gling snod bcud spyi dang / bye brag bstan 'dzin skyes chen dam pa rnams zhabs pad brtan phyir bstan
srungargya mtshor 'phrin 'chol dang / de dag dpal dang gzi 'bar du bskyed de lha bsangs/ bstan gsol/ 'go lha/ dgra lha/ sde brgyad cha

snyoms bcas chag med mdzad skabs shig rgyal tshab mchog nas mgon khang rnams su 'phrin gsol snyan shal sogs bstsal ba bzhin rje nyid kyi thugs smon dang bcas ji bzhin bka'
yis 'doms/ yang tshes gnyis kyi tho rengs chos lhun dbu byed byams pa yin snyam pa zhig nas/ byams pa mched lnga'i ya gyal chos lhun byams sku'i lo rgyus rje rdo rje 'chang
la zhu mur/ rab gnas dus byams pa dge slong rnam pas lhung bzed chus gang ba bsnams pa zhig thim zer ba dang / shog dril lo rgyus kyi yi ge yod pa zhig na/ de mar pa mi
la zhal gzigs/ brgyud pa'i rtsa ba sa ra ha/ tai lo pa rnams kyang gzigs shing khyad par 'gro mgon 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa las thar zer ba zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ zhe lnga'i
sku 'phrang 'tshub ma las grol zhing / sku zhi bar thim dus kyi lung bstan zhib gsal du gor ma chag de lo rgyal tshab de mo rin po che ngag dbang 'jam dpal dge legs rgya
mtshos/ zan yang mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i ganngho la chen por zhig gsos kyis mtshon/ spyi sgos bstan 'gro'i bde thabs la ched du dgongs pa'i rim gro'i thebs su dngos
'byor gya nom pa bstsal ba bzhin/ chos dung rin po che gsung bskul gyis mtshon mdzad sgo kun gang 'tshams ye shes gzigs pas gnad smin gnang / sa ga'i nang dgongs nyul zhig
rje nyid thugs dam la bzhugs mur/ rgyu mtshan med par sku shin tu nyog nyams kyis thugs snang nub pa lta bu grub 'phral/ gzhung zhabs nas bsam yas sku rten skor gyi chibs
zam

'byor bas/ dam sel sbyongs thabs sogs rim gro rnams gab sbas med par bstsal/ snron zla'i mdo sde lha mchod thog sku rten 'phrin las sam skal ldan 'os shar su zhig la zhal gzigs
kyang dam bsgrags 'phrin 'chol sogs mdzad dgos kyi gsung mchid rgyal tshab mchog tu zhib lhongs dang / rje nyid nas kyang bzhi thog rtser lha bsangs rgyas pa bstsal
rgyu'i tho rengs/ thugs nyams dang 'od gsal 'dres pa'i mur/ bande gzugs bzang gzi brjid can zhig kha btags thog nas gleng mo byed la khad yal ba zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ dpal
ldan pu tra dmar po nyid kyis 'phrin las g.yel ba med pa'i brda dang / chu stod tshes bcu nas nyin gsum ring snod bcud spyi dang bye brag gi bcud 'phel phyir nor mchog sde
dge zhu chen rin chen gsung rab las rje rdo rje 'chang nyid dbyangs rol sogs kyi deb sbyar te thog mar gnang skabs/ gnang nyin kho nar sde dge nas zhu shog rten gseer
dngul dar gos rdo dril DA ru phreng ba sogs spam mtho ba 'bul 'byor tshang ma phywa rten gras su phyag rtags 'bur ba dang / phywa sgo dbye ba'i skabs/ 'jam mgon sku mched
yum mchog bcas la phywa rdzas bstar zhing zhal 'don gyi tshe rgyu mtshan med par chos dung dkar po rgyang grags kyi gsung rgyun ma chad par rje nyid kyi snyan khung du gsan
cing / phywa 'gugs grub nas gong gi sde dge'i rten rnams rgya bkrol nas dmar po skor gsum gyi sngags bzla bar mdzad de/ rdo dril/ DA ru'i gsung bskul zhing phreng ba
ni byang dar dmar pos dril nas

'dug pa rten 'brel shin tu legs par bstsal/ bco lnga'i tho rengs khyad 'phags bla ma lha khang gi ring bsrel las ring bsrel gyi char babs pa 'khrungs pa dang / bco brgyad tho
rengs nas g.yab 'khor gos yol can na mi mang po bdud rtsi ril bur sgril bar/ nyi ma zhud la khad shar bas/ de nyin 'brug chos 'khor bsod nams pho brang gi nang rten rnams
la ring bsrel gtso gyur gyi gzungs zhugs dgos tshul gsungs pa bzhin/ de lta'i lo rgyus dang bcas stsol bar mdzad pa'ang ring min nas 'brug phyogs me skyon gyis rten mang
po dmigs med du song ba sogs dus gsum sgrib med gzigs pa zer ba de 'di 'dra'i rigs la gsung ngam snyam/ gzhan yang zla nang der sa ngor sde gsum gyi sku gegs sel phyir
chos srung rgya mtshor 'phrin 'chol la thugs gzhol ba dang / gong gi gser khri rin po che'i shing brkos yongs rdzogs grub nas/ sngon thub pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor
lo bskor ba'i dus chen zla ba'i nyer drug sngon ma sa nang 'phrod thog rje nyid kyi dbu skyes kyi phon po gsar pa bskrun skabs/ rdor brag padma 'phrin las kyi rnam thar kha
pa ljags klog mur/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dga' ston la longs spyod do/ /gsung ba dang mdzod 'dzin nas spyan bdar phul ba dus 'grig cing 'o thud bzhes mu dang / glo bur
char zim wa chu 'thon tsam nyil nas de 'phral nyi 'od gsal ba sogs rten 'brel dge ba'i mtshan ma gnyis pa dang lo de'i gro bzhin phur sgrub rje rdo rje 'chang yab sras lha
khang mkhan chen

bcas nas gnas bcu lha khang du phur cha sogs khyad byang nas bzhes te mdzad/ rgyun gyi phur cha rnams la nyams gso rtsi gso yang legs par gnang / ma 'gyangs par a li chos rje
dpon g.yog rnams 'byor zhing / gdan sa nas phebs mi bla ma nas gsung brtag zhu rgyu'i tho rengs 'od gsal du/ a li chos rje'i bla ma rnams la rje nyid nas dung zhig gan
rgyu yin dgongs te/ dung dngul shog la skyon cung zad yod pa zhig gzhi thog pho brang gi rtse nas rje nyid kyis 'bud par mdzad pas/ de'i skad kyis sa skya'i lung pa thams
cad gang ba dang / kun dga' sangs rgyas yin zer ba'i mchod me shin tu gsal ba zhig mchis par/ gzhan gyis gnod pa byed 'dug pas rje nyid nas legs par bcol gnang gis slar
gsal po yong ba yod dgongs pa 'khrungs pa'i 'bras bu'ang da gzod mngon du gyur cing / dbyug zla'i tshes bcur a li bla ma sbyin bdag ngo g.yog rnams gsung gsang 'di ltar
grol te/ a li chos rje sbyin bdag bcas rnams rang gzhan gnas skabs mthar thug phan bde bsam ste/ sde snod bshad grwa bzang po'i rgyun rje btsun sa skya pa'i bzhed pa dang
mthun par 'dzugs 'dun gyis 'di nas bla ma dgos tshul byung ba bzhin gyi re 'bras don smin spyi sgos bstan pa rin po cher bya ba lhag par yang byas pa 'di ni/ rang cag rnams
kyis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed pa sogs/ sngon gyi rgyal blon lo pan byang sems rnams dang / rje btsun sa skya pa'i gong ma'i bzhed srol dang mthun pa'i

legs byas ngo mtshar rgya mtsho yin 'dug bla slob sbyin bdag kun la rjes su yid rang zhing / gong ma bdag po chen po/ skyabs mgon rgyal ba yab sras kyi mtshan don la phan nges
kyi bya ba yin 'dug pas dga' spro rgya cher mdzod/ ces gsung gis dbugs dbyung bar mdzad do/ /smin zla'i nyer lnga lha chen gser khri rin po che gsar bskrun gyi zhal gro
mgo zla'i tshes bzhir yin tshul gyi brda 'grems mdzad rgyu'i snga dro/ rgyal tshab mchog nas bsam yas sku rten pa phral rdzong gnang ba'i snga dron gyi gsung shog dngul
gyi maNDal/ sa snying srang / lha gos sogs gser khri rin po cher dge ba'i la nye gsum par 'khums/ mgo zla'i tshes bzhi'i shar mda' btang tsam la rje rdo rje 'chang nyid
kyi thugs bskyed 'phrin las kyis/ gcig tu lha chen sprul pa'i gandho la chen po mdzes pa'i rgyan gcig gser khri rin po che gsar bkod sgrig rgyu'i do dam du mdzod 'dzin par
bkas mngags pa bzhin legs par bsgrigs 'phral/ dung mkhan gyis chos dung rin po che gsung bskul dang bstun/ lha khang chen mo'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams la nyi ma shar
ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang mnyam du/ gang na thod dang skra gsar dang / /gar dang rol mo'i sgra yod pa/ /zhes dga' ston gyi ngang tshul bzang po dang ldan pa'i kong gzhas
pa rnams kyi sngun bsus/ a li dpon g.yog spu nag bla gnyer/ stod tshong dar rgyas sogs 'bul sdud pa rnams dang / phye mar gyis bkang ba'i dngul gzhong gsum khyer mi/
rgya gling pa/ mgron gnyer spos

phor pa/ sbyangs chas/ gtor teb gsum du mtheb kyu kha phyi bstan sum cu brtsegs steng gyen bstan gsum sgrol ma gcig la lhag gcig bcas brgya tshar/ snod 'bras bus bkang steng
rigs lnga'i rtse phran dar dpyangs bcas gsum bkod mthar/ dngul grub bkris rdzas brgyad/ rgyal srid sna bdun/ tsakli tshar re thogs pa'i ban tshang gsum/ dngul bum rdzas
ldan mgul 'ching kha rgyan bcas thogs pa yang gsum/ mdo sngags rig gnas dang bcas pa'i dpe tshan khyer mi gsum/ dam pa gong ma'i phyag dril smyon du grags pa che chung/
klu dbang gi phyag dril/ thod rnga / 'thor nas/ kA pA la bdud rtsi/ ting shags bcas yod pa'i ban tshang gsum/ snam sbyar phrag par gzar zhing lhung bzed spyi blugs thogs
pa gcig gsol dpon/ spos sna ba/ yum mchog sogs zhal ngo byings phyag 'degs bcas dang/ de nas skyabs mchog 'jig rten sgron me nges don gyi rdo rje 'dzin nyid kyi sku 'khor
rnams dang bcas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa chos 'khor la 'du ba bzhin cha lugs dang spyod lam bzang zhing dul ba'i sgo nas phebs shing/ sprul pa'i
gandho la chen po'i khyams stod du sbyangs khrus/ bgegs spyod sogs dang/ de nas rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid kyis oM na mo bhruM AH yurdznyan hrIHa ro li ka hU~M hrIHces ma
'ongs srid mtha'i bar du 'byor 'gyur dang bcas pa'i gdung rgyud rin po che gser khri 'dir mnga' gsol ji snyed gyi sku tshe bde ldan mgon po'i ngo bor byin gyis

brlabs te/ 'bru dkar gyi char nyil bzhin par rtag brtan gzhom bral gyi khri 'phangs su skyabs mchog yab sras rnams sku gsung thugs lham me lhang nge / lhan ner bzhugs grub
pa dang dbu mdzad chen pos/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa nas/ /mjug bkra shis kyi bar rim bzhin bskul zhing/ spyi sgos nas mang ja bsnyen bkur 'bul
chas gzab pa'i thog dngos 'bul dngos thog tu phabs pa bsdoms dngul srang lnga stong sum brgya dang bzhi/ zho phyed bdun du longs pa bcas mdor na de nyin srid zhi'i dpal
'byor yod dgu cog sprul pa'i mchod sdong chen po'i gser khri rin po che ngo mtshar gsar du bzhad pa'i drung du/ ma 'ongs srid mtha'i bar gyi rten 'brel legs lam bzang
po bcas 'phos pas/ bde skyid rdzogs ldan gzhon nu'i dga' ston la longs spyod pa'i skabs so//dgung grangs zhe drug phebs pa shing rta lor 'gro mgon bstan pa sangs rgyas dang/
rje nyid kyi zhabs 'bring pa chen po bsod nams 'od zer gnyis 'das pas/ so so'i rjes sgrub gu ru rin po che dang 'jam dbyangs sogs kyi zhal bkod sogs 'char 'phar gyi brtan
mkhas mdzad sgo rnams la thugs gzhol ba'i mur/ gro bzhin tshes lnga'i tho rengs 'od gsal du/ sde dge mkhan chen shar chen zhabs drung 'khor bcas la phag mo zhal gnyis
ma'i byin rlabs phul zhing/ de'i sku snang la rang bzhin med pa zil chen zhig gzigs pa'i mod du dar cig mnyam bzhag la 'byams par gyur/ de nas

gzhan yang chos bka' 'dra 'bul rgyu yin dgongs pa zhig 'khrungs so/ /zla nang der 'brug sde srid rnying pa bsod lhun bod la bros nas rgyal rtser mchis dus/ dam pa'i rang bzhin
'gog med kyi gzigs pas gnang cha gya nom pa bstsal bas/ khong pa shin tu mgu zhing slad nas zhabs phyi yang dag zhu rgyu'i tha tshig phul zhing/ 'di 'dra'i rigs kyi thugs
bskyed gzhan yang mang du mchis pa'ang 'dis mtshon nus so/ /khrums zla'i tshes gsum tho rengs zhal dkar ngag dbang lags rig 'dzin pho brang na thugs dam gnang mur/ mnal
du song ba'i rmi lam du/ rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid 'grul la phebs zer rgya gling gtang byung ba'i mod gzigs pas/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid ma gzigs par thugs skyo lhang byung/
de ma thag rje nyid kyi gsung las/ bstan ma khyod ni mya ngan ma byed cig /nga ni da dung 'bum tsam 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /gsung ba gsan cing/ dbyug zla'i bcu bzhir sa chen
yab sras gnyis ka'i dus chen dngos dang/ gzhan yang tshes mchod bzung ba sogs kyi dbang du byas na/ chos rje sa paN/ rong ston thams cad mkhyen pa/ sngags 'chang chos
kyi rgyal po rnams kyi dus chen nyin/ gdan sa chen po'i dri gtsang khang rnams su sna lnga'i mchod stong/ lha chen 'dus tshogs su bsnyen bkur gya nom pa'i thog rgyal bstan
rin po che spyi bye brag dar brtan gyi thugs smon dang chabs cig sngon du mdo sa skyong blo gros rgyal mtshan yab sras la chos sbyin mi zad par par gyi 'phrul 'khor bkas
dbang

bskur ba bzhin phyag thog tu son te/ phur pa bla ma'i 'bul skyes gdong/ bod kyi rdo rje gdan dpal ldan sa skyar phebs pa bzhin/ de nyin rigs gter gsal byed/ phar phyin dka'
'grel/ sdom gsum kha skong/ bdud rtsi nying khu rnams kyi par phud 'dus tshogs su bstsal/ mgo zla'i nyer drug chad pa'i nyer lnga gza' tshes dge bar/ rje rdo rje 'chang
nyid kyi thugs bskyed rlabs po ches dpal sa skyar dpal ldan chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa rgyas pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam 'grel gzhung skyor tshes mchod thog mar tshugs
skabs/ ma bsgrigs rang 'grig gi ngo mtshar du/ or du su dza sag bas se tA las tshe chen tshor thur bkra shis tshe ring gi gsung bris rten gos dar dngul sogs spam mtho ba
dang/ de sras thA ji mgon po rdo rje byon pas dngul gyi maNDal/ dngul bre chen mang ba/ zhang po me rin bde mchog gis kyang de bzhin bcas 'byor pa sogs gzhung skyor gyi
la nye bzang zhing / de nyid rje rdo rje 'chang yab sras nas gnas bcu lha khang rten drung mchod tshogs gzab pa'i dbus su gong gi maNDal sna 'dogs bcas bshams nas/ rnam 'grel
gzhung skyor thugs bsam rnam dag gis bskrun pa 'di/ rgyal ba bu ram shing pa'i bstan pa'i gsal byed dam par gyur nas/ skye dgu kun la 'phral yun phan bde rgya cher 'byung
zhing/ bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas rnams la gsol 'debs dang thugs smon 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i rjes su 'gro bstsal zhing/ gzhan yang sku tshe de nyid du rnam 'grel
tshogs dbur

phebs bzhed thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas/ gzhung yang ha lam thugs kyi bang mdzod du bzhugs par gyur kyang nag phyogs mthu bdo ba'i dbang gis phyag tu son par ma gyur to/
/dgung grangs zhe bdun du phebs pa shing lug rgyal zla nas bzung 'jam mgon sku mched la zab rgyas chos bka' rgya cher gnang rgyu'i tho rengs 'od gsal du/ gser chos glegs
bam ngo mtshar can bka' 'gyur gras yin dgongs pa zhig dge 'dun gyi sde'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i phyed tsam na shog rtags shig 'dug pas/ 'di yan sngar phul zin/ 'di nas da 'bul
dgos yod dgongs pa zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ da gzod brtags tshe lkog gyur rjen gsal lag mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag pa bzhin du go 'das lo'i 'phros dang lo gsal 'phral rnams
su gzhung zhabs nas chibs zam yang yang gi rgyal tshab mchog sku cung zad ltem pa'i rim gro spyi dang bye brag bskang 'phrin gnad smin sogs mdzad/ de nas rim bzhin zhi ba
lhar phyag dpe phon chen dgos tshul/ bsam yas mkhan po sogs kyi skor/ bse 'bag 'dra bzhes thog mtha' gsum/ gur gar sogs ji gsung gi thugs brel rnams dang/ dbo zla'i bcu
bzhi'i tho rengs/ sku rim chen mo'i zor las pa rin chen yar 'phel gyis/ mchod zhing bya khra ma'i lam dang mnyam pa'i ltas ngan sems can ring mo zhig dum bur gtubs pa dang/
yang mi zhig gi 'phros las/ rin chen yar 'phel nas sa skyar rbod gtong byed mi de

bsad tshar bas khrag sku gnyer khang du 'thungs na dmar dri yong 'dug pas/ mgon khang du khrag rdza chung gang 'thung ba yin zer kha dmar dri chil le sleb byung zer ba zhig
'khrungs pas/ bka' las/ 'di ni nges par bsad rtags tshad ldan rang yin 'dra bas dam can pu tra nyid kyis gnod byed bsgral lam snyam/ zhes gsungs/ nag zla'i nang sde dge
bzang ngan blang dor gyi ltas ched du bzung gnang gi tho rengs/ gsang 'dus mi bskyod pa rdul dkyil zab bris thog nas gzhan zhig la dbang bskur mdzad rgyu yin dgongs pa dang
/ gzhan nas dkyil 'khor de drung du tshe brten gyis mtshon/ 'brel thog la bsngo ba zhu dgos zer ba zhig 'khrungs pas bka' las/ dkyil 'khor zab bris de ni dge ba'i mtshan
ma dang / bsngo ba zhu dgos zer ba cung zad 'tshub nyams bcas rim gros 'khyor na skyon cher med/ de las gzhan du gyur na de bzhin 'byung ngo yin 'dra/ zhes gsungs te/
gtsug lag khang rnams su mchod 'bul rgya cher thugs smon gyi mtshams sbyor dang bcas pa/ sbyin sreg spel tshig sde bzhi dge bcu 'dzoms pa'i snod bcud gtso phal la 'phral
rkyen las gyur pa'i byur dang skal ba ngan pa bkra mi shis pa'i nad gdon nyer 'tshe thams cad shinti ku ru swA hA/ zhes sbyor bar mdzad/ tshes brgyad kyi nyin sde dge rgyal

tshig

gsung shog tu 'khod pa dang / sku tshab ngag lam nas kyang 'bul rgyu bcas/ mgron dpal ched mngags kyis mdo smad phyogs la 'thon/ gzhan yang de lo phyi lo sogs la sde dge'i
chos srid dar brtan 'byung phyir/ lha bsangs sme brtsegs/ de'i grib glud/ brgya bzhi/ phywa phrin/ tshogs bdag kyai rdor las bzhi'i sbyin sreg mgon khang rnams su bskang
'phrin/ phur bzlog drug cu pa mchod 'bul/ gsung sgrogs sogs nar mar mdzad cing/ gzhan yang sa ngor sde gsum gyi sku rim du bdun phrag gcig ring/ kyai rdor bdag mdun gtor
bsngo bskang ba bcas gnad smin du mdzad pa'i tshe/ tho rengs zhig sdig pa rwa can khru gang tsam zhig rje nyid nas bsgral bas/ de'i khog na glo snying nang cha thams cad

du/ si tu karma chos 'byung dpon g.yog dang mjal bas/ rje nyid ni grub mtha' ris med kyi mkhas grub la dad pa dag snang rgyun du bcos min bsgom pa'i bag chags kyis gsung

la phan re oM e ho shUddhe sogs 'don par mdzad pa 'khrungs pas/ bla ma 'di la gzhis byes kun kha gtong ba de bden pa e yin/ zhes gsung ba sogs dngos su lta ci/ mnal lam gyi
