gyi rdo mon pa thang gi mgon khang na 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi phyag bzo ma gur mgon gyi 'cham sku sumbha nag por grags pa mal los rgya gar nas gdan drangs zer ba de yod
min rgyal tshab de mo gong mar rtsad gcod gnang dgos zhus don bzhin dang bzhes kyis/ gri gu rdzong dpon mer mo nas la rtsad gcod dgos bka' bstsal ltar/ des kyang shin tu
zhib bris gnas tshul zhabs pad du phul ba ngo ma gdan sar bstsal ba las/ sngar yod dus zhing bskor re la gdan 'dren zhu srol gyis/ skabs shig nyin mo sa rub pa sogs 'tshub
'gyur chen po byung skad dang/ de nas mgon khang rdib gzhom gyis sa 'og tu shor nas ma thon/ zhes dran pa lung pa de na rgan mo zhig las med tshul de yod rnams kyis smras
pas/ slar khungs rdol min la gan rgya 'jog nus sam dris pas nus zer nas bzhag song zer ba phul yang phyis su khungs rdol te 'cham sku gsang sngags dga' tshal du phyag

'dren

nyer brgyad la gnang ba'i nyer dgu'i tho rengs/ zur 'chad grub dbang rje drung lags nas rje nyid la/ mang thos klu sgrub rgya mtsho'i gsung 'bum nang gi mgon po'i rjes gnang
de gnang dgos zhu bar/ de 'dra zhig yod dgongs dbang khang du gnang song bas mngon rtogs ni dkyus ma dang / sngon 'gro'i gsung bshad la 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis rgyud las
btus nas 'di mdzad/ man ngag rnams rdo rje 'chang dang mgon po dngos la gsan/ de nas bram ze mchog sred nas brgyud rje btsun sa skya par bka' babs/ spyir mgon po 'di la
rjes gnang dang dbang bka' kha shas yod pa las/ 'di gur mgon khro bcu'i gtso bo de'i rjes gnang yin gsung ba zhig 'khrungs pas/ thugs la sngar rjes gnang de 'dra gsan pa
dang mdzad pa ni ma dran/ klu sgrub bka' 'bum na'ang yod med ma shes/ gang ltar 'cham sku gsar phebs 'di'i cho 'phrul zhig ni nges par yin 'dug pas bzang ngan dpyod dka'
mo zhig 'dra/ zhes gsungs/ klu sgrub bka' 'bum na mgon po'i rjes gnang gi zin bris shig ni mchis lags so/ /de lo gro bzhin phur sgrub la 'jam mgon e waM bzang po 'di nyid
thog mar phebs rgyu dang/ sri gnon ljags bsgrigs ma'ang thog mar gnam gang nyin mdzad rgyu bcas/ gdan sa'i rtsis pa rnams dang skye re ba sogs nas de'i bco lnga'i zla
'dzin dang/ de nas gnam gang la'ang nyi 'dzin yong bar thag bcad kyang gtan nas ma byung ba ni/ sngon dus rje btsun grags pa rgyal mtshan dang/ 'dul

'dzin kha che paN chen gyi lo rgyus ltar/ rje nyid kyis thog ma'i rten 'brel de dag la gnod par dogs nas nang gi gnad kyi rgyu ba 'gog par mdzad pa ni gor ma chag cing/ de

brag bka' drin che ba dang/ gzhan la yang bka' 'doms bcas yang dag par mdzad de/ sku gsung thugs kyi nang rten rnams bla brang shar du bzhugs su gsol ba dang/ rtse gdong phyogs
su'ang dge rgyun rgya cher 'dzugs par mdzad/ dbo zla'i bcu gnyis nas bzung ste yab sras zhal rgyas nas de mo gong ma mchog gi dgongs rdzogs su kyai rdo rje man ngag
gi lugs kyi dkyil 'khor du dgung zhag gzung skabs rten gyi gtso bor/ sa skya pa chen po kun dga' snying po'i zhal thang mkhan po zhang gsum thog pas bzhengs pa la/ sa chen
nyid kyis phyag nas mdzad pa de nyid skabs shig dbus phyogs su 'khyer ba/ yar klungs pa sengge rgyal mtshan gyis nyams gso mdzad de gnas gsar ba rim can gyi phyag tu bzhugs
pa khyab bdag bka' 'gyur pa chen po gshegs dus sa skyar bsngo rten du rab byung bcu gcig lcags byi lor 'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug gi phyag babs de nyid zhal
dbye zhing/ sta gon lnga dang/ dngos chog drug re bcas rgyas par bstsal/ gzhan yang dge 'dun lnga bcu kha yar gyis zhag lnga'i ring kyai rdor sgrub mchod kyi sngon 'gror
gong ma lnga stod sho lo ka dang po phreng 'khor/ yongs rdzogs dang bskang ba rgyas pa la sogs pa dgongs rdzogs mang du bka' gsang gis gdams nas/ nag zla'i nang sde dge sa
dbang blo gros rgyal mtshan sogs 'das ma 'ongs rgyal rabs rnams kyis dgongs rdzogs su/ dngul bre chen 'ga' zhig sbyor 'jags bzhin/ chos sde lho nas nyin gcig la dge 'dun
zhal grangs

kyis bsags pa'i bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khri tshar 'gro nges ji srid bar nag zla'i nang mdzad dgos kyi gtong tho lha chen dbu byed kyi deb tu 'god par mdzad cing/
chos byang par ni sman bla sogs so/ /de nas tshal gung thang zhes zhang g.yu brag pa'i gdan sa na/ rje drung rin po che dregs byed kyi tshul bzung ba stobs ldan drag shul
dbang po yab yum rje nyid gzhon nu'i dus nas yang yang gzigs snang la 'char ba zhig yod gsungs pa des/ gser 'phyang lo'i gung thang zhang mchod gro bzhin tshes brgyad la/
sa skya nas gser gyi spu gri zhags dmar/ rgyal mtshan dgu brtsegs sengge'i mgo tog can dgos tshul bzhin gnang ba'i dus tshes der/ yong don med par snga dro mchod rten bkra
shis sgo mang byin can gdugs med zhig la nyams gso'i zhal bkod mdzad dgos dang/ gshin rje dgra nag gi dkyil thang/ yang dkyil thang hrul ba zhig phor stong rnams glo
bur du byung zhing/ phur sgrub la phebs thog sku mdun du btsun ma gzhon nu ma gnyis kyis sa sha phung por spungs pa dang/ de nyin phur sgrub bshad las pa'i tshig la rje rdo
rje 'chang nyid 'gro ba thams cad kyi mgon po yin tshul dang / bod kyi grub mtha' kun sa lugs yin tshul gras la zhang g.yu brag pa'ang sa chen gyi zhal slob shan rdor
seng dang/ skyu ra a seng ge zhal slob yin tshul byung ba rnams la/ rje nyid kyi bka' las/ nges par brtag rgyu zhig yod do gsungs/ de mtshams nas dar rtse mdor me chus gnod
pa nar mar byung ba rnams thugs

kyis ma bzod par/ de dag bzlog phyir pha sgar dang zur spug gnyis la bstsal rgyu'i gur lha brgyad 'khor lo bcas dang/ gser zangs kyi rdo rje 'chang/ 'jim grub rje btsun gong
ma lnga/ sngags 'chang chen po/ a mes zhabs rnams ring bsrel rnam bzhi nang gzungs dang/ khyad par yul phyogs der me chu'i gnod pa zhi ba'i 'dod gsol dang bcas dam ye dbyer
med du byin gyis rlob par mdzad de bstsal bas yul phyogs der byon pa tsam gyis gnod pa las grol bar gleng ngo / /dbyug zla'i nang mus chen la de mo rin po che'i mchog
sprul skor lha mo shra ma Na'i sgo nas brtag dgos gsungs pa'i bka' lan smin zla'i bco brgyad la 'byor rgyu'i tho rengs 'od gsal du/ skyed lhas yin dgongs pa'i brag rtser
rje nyid nas brag 'di la gter sgo gsal po yod pa'i gong de nas gcig gis brkos zin pa 'dug gsham 'di na ji 'dra yod dam dgongs shul de nas brko bar mdzad pas/ lanydza na'i
AH rang byon dmar po zhig dang/ brkos zin phyag na yod pa'i rdo ba'i dum bu der bod yig dbu chen gyi AHdmar po yod pa zhig 'khrungs pas mus chen gyi gsung dang cha 'dra
mngon no/ /dgung grangs lnga bcur byon pa sa khyi nag zla'i bcu gcig nas/ gdung sras 'jam mgon dpal ldan chos skyong dang e waM bzang po sku mched gsang yum sger pa'i sras
rje btsun 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma sogs skal ldan rnams la 'jigs bral stobs kyi dpal ldan birWa pa'i bzhed gzhung gsung

ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i smin grol gyi gdams pa zab mo tshogs bshad mkhan chen ngag chos kyi yig steng nas sngon dngos rjes gsum rgyab rten gyi lung dang
bcas pa dang/ nA ro mkha' spyod gur mgon brag rdzong ma phyi nang gsang gsum gyi khrid lung zur bka'i rigs kyi rjes gnang shin tu mang po bcas chos kyi rnam grangs rnam
thar chen mo 'og tu 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can gyi lo rgyus skabs gsal ba bzhin dang/ nag zla'i zla mjug dar lding nas bon gsum srid pa'i lto sku 'dzugs par byung zhing/
de lo tshoms chen skor la dkar gsal dang/ gnam yangs sogs la zhabs tog rgya cher mdzad cing/ dge bsnyen chos nyi byang phyogs su gdan 'dren gyis chab klu sengge sgra sogs
yang dag gnang/ snron zla'i tshes dgu la gdan sa chen po'i dbyar chos kyi thog 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan 'chang nas/ tshad ma rnam 'grel/ dbu ma rtsa sher/ sdom gsum
kha skong sogs la gsung bshad gnang tshul dang/ chu stod tshes bzhi nas gdung sras sku mched la rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i rjes gnang stsol skabs dge mtshan ji ltar 'khrungs
tshul/ de rjes bla ma dam pa'i dus chen nas dbu bzung ste zhag bdun 'gro mgon dpal ldan chos skyong nyid lha thil du rnam 'grel gzhung skyor pa'i tshogs dbur phebs
tshul rnams kyang 'og tu gsal/ de lo'i phur sgrub la rje nyid nas rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i zhabs tog tu gos bzang dgu las bskrun pa'i phod ka rdo gong/
gos bem/

rol phod sogs bgrang yas rnams thog mar bzhes te 'cham par mdzad do/ /dgung grangs nga gcig tu phebs pa sa phag rgyal zla'i sked tsam par rje rdo rje 'chang nas brtse chen
lha khang du zhabs bskor yongs bsdoms nyi khri chig stong bzhi brgya tham pa dang/ phyag 'bul sum stong nyis brgya bcu tham pa gnang dus dang / phun gling dbang khang du
bzhugs dus bcas brtse chen snying po'i snang brnyan dang/ rje btsun rin po che'i snang brnyan zung nyin re bzhin zhal gzigs tshul mi 'dra ba'i gzigs snang mang po zhig dang/
lhag par rje btsun rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal ldan birWa pa nyid mngon sum du byon nas rje nyid la dgyes nyams kyis bzhugs pa la/ rje nyid kyi thugs rnam par mi
rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo de nyid rje btsun rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi thugs kar 'pho la khad pa'i tshe/ sku 'khris kyi 'jam mgon gzhon nu'i zhal dkyil skya khrom gyis
gzigs pas/ gsung ngag slob bshad sogs gdams pa rgya mtsho da ga 'bul dgos dgongs/ thugs rje'i lcags kyus nam yang ma bskyud nas/ re zhig dag snang de 'gag par mdzad pa zhig
rje nyid la 'khrungs shing/ 'di ni kyai rdor gzhi bsnyen thengs gsum pa'i skabs so/ /khrums zla'i tshes bdun nas bzung/ rigs sras 'jam mgon sku mched/ gnas gsar mchog
sprul nam mkha' legs pa/ na lendra pa gzim 'og sprul sku bstan 'dzin 'phrin las sogs la/ tshe dpag med dze ta ri'i lugs kyi dbang chen/ tsha lugs dkar lha gsum sogs rjes

gnang zur bka'i rigs bcu phrag gsum dang/ nyag ma dbang po'i grangs ldan lung dang bcas pa/ sgrub thabs brgya rtsa/ grub chen brgyad cu rnams kyi rjes gnang byin rlabs lung
dang bcas pa/ spyi bka' rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang nyin bco brgyad la/ phur dbang / gur drag dbang/ gdung rabs chen mo/ sa skya bka' 'bum pod dang po gnyis sogs lung gi rigs
dpag par dka' ba bcas bstsal ba zhib pa rnam thar chen mo dang gsham du'ang gsal ba dang/ de'i tshe mchog sprul rin po cher bka' gsung lhug grol gyis 'jam mgon sa skya
paNDi ta'i nang rten thub chen 'dzam gling g.yas bzhag gi drung du/ lha chen mkhan rabs nyer lnga pa byams pa bkra shis sogs dge 'dun grangs tshang ba'i dbus su bsnyen
par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po yang dag par bzhes pa dang/ ring min chu stag lor yang nyid kyi bka' bzhin rje btsun 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi mas rab byung mar de drung
du bzhes so/ /de mtshams nas brtse chen lha khang steng gi rgya phibs gsar sgron mdzad pa'i nang rten/ 'phags mchog kha sar pA Ni/ 'jam dbyangs/ phyag rdor/ sor 'brang/
ri khrod ma rnams 'dam las bskrun pa'i nang gzungs ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyug por mdzad de/ rgyal bstan spyi dang bye brag rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan pa de 'dzin dang
bcas pa'i phyi nang gsang gsum gyi 'gal rkyen zhi zhing/ yul phyogs 'di ltos bcas kyi mi nor phyugs gsum la nad gdon god rigs chags che nyam nga thams cad dang/ sad ser

btsa' mu ge'i gnod pa thams cad las bsrung ba'i thugs smon 'dod gsol dang bcas bskrun par mdzad nas/ sa chod thog brtse chen lha khang du phur sgrub dang sbrags phur pa'i rab
gnas kyi me tog 'thor bar mdzad/ ston chab skabs ma mor chab bdugs gnang zhing/ smin zla'i tshes bcu gcig la zhabs rim rgya cher sngon 'gro'i dmar phyogs dga' ba gnyis
pa'i srod kyi cha mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus la gsang khog tu/ bdag mo sngo ra ba 'chi med dpal 'byor bzang mor grags pa 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan can gyi khab tu bzhes shing/
mtshan gyi mnga' gsol yang rje nyid kyis bstsal lo/ /zla ba de nang bstan dgra gdug pa can sku gnyer du rdzu ba tsha bo dang bcas nas las ngan ji snyed ci bsags pa la
brten drug cu'i gtor bzlog zhig kyang gnang / mgo zla'i dgun chos thog rje nyid kyi bka' bzhin 'jam mgon dbang sdud snying po'i zhal snga nas dbu ma thugs mtshor bzhugs
pa'i gsung bshad kyi dga' ston yang lhug par bstsal to/ /dgung grangs nga gnyis su byon pa lcags byi rgyal zla'i nyer dgur zur 'chad grub dbang dam par bka' 'doms kyis/ rgya
'dre'i 'phrul gyis rta nad sogs sna tshogs mchiis pa rnams/ ma her zhon pa'i rgya 'dre'i glud gzugs rdzong chog gis sa mtshams sgrol bar mdzad do/ /chu bya rta zla'i

bcas mtha' ma lcags byi rgyal zla'i tshes bdun bar la gnang ba/ yongs bsdoms brgyad khri drug stong zhe lnga bka' drin bskyangs so/ /de lo gsar 'phral khams phyogs kyi sbyor
ngan la brten g.yul gshom la nye dus/ nyes med sems can du ma'i srog skyob gyi ched du ngan sbyor de dag rang zhir 'gyur ba'i 'phrin 'chol dang thugs bskyed rgya gang che
mdzad pas 'bras bu mngon 'gyur de bzhin dang / de mtshams nas rje nyid la sngar gyi glo tshad dang zhabs 'bam gyi snyun gzhi lhan 'doms lta bu'i tshul bzhes dang / dbus
phebs la'ang nye ba bcas/ rta zla'i tshes gcig nyin gong gi gsang rgya'ang grol zhing gang ci'i legs 'bul rim bstar dang / tshes gsum nyin chos sde lho byang la dbus phebs
kyi zhabs rim rgya cher bstsal te/ 'grul phebs ban tshang pa rnams nas gzungs gso sri gnon thun gnyis ma/ 'dir bzhugs ban tshang bsnyen song nas phur bzlog mgon po drug
cu pa 'jigs byed drug cu pa rnams mdzad cing / rim bzhin mgon khang khag bzhir 'phrin 'chol gnang ste/ sngo ra dpon slob rnams la sras mo bstsal ba'i legs so'i bdog pa
gya nom pa bstar bar mdzad do/ /tshes bcu gcig nyin rje rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnam gsum/ rje btsun drung 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma/ bdag mo 'chi med dpal 'byor bzang
mo sogs zhal ngo rnams dang / sku zhang chos lung pa dang 'gro mgon pa rnam gnyis/ mdzod 'dzin gyi dbus dpon g.yog skabs su babs pa rnams dang bcas/ dbus phyogs su chibs

bskyod kyi sgo dod pa'i lo rgyus rgyas pa ni gzhan du shes par bya zhing / 'dir rags tsam smos na/ bla brang zam sne nas ki sgra dar g.yab dang / skyel chang ba rnams nas ki
sgra rnams la kha sgyur tsam mdzad/ srol rdzing khar ja zhus/ gra ma lung du gsol tsha/ ga ra bkra shis dar rgyas kyi brag yur bzhugs/ sang nyin tho rengs zhong ba la rtser
lha bsangs rgyas pa'i skabs kha ba cung zad 'tshub cing / dpon slob kun grang ngar 'dar zhum can dang / lha sar rje nyid snyun tshul de ltar lags na'ang bdag gzhan brje
ba'i byang sems kho nas dus 'da' bar mdzad pa ni rje de'i khyad par gyi chos so/ /de nas mgon rgyas dang tsha rong du byon 'phral dkar spro'i dga' ston la longs spyad

chen po'i sgo

nas khyod rang dbang po sogs na ba de dang de ston cig gsungs te ljags sngags mdzad pa'i tshe/ de'i gnas su zhal mchus reg kyang srid pa zhi mnyam gzigs kyi brdar gtsang rme'i
thugs dogs ye mi gnang bar/ kho la phan na nga la dogs pa med ces yang yang gsungs/ dbul po ngan ngon can dag gzigs tshe/ nga khri mthon por zas gos gya nom par longs
spyod pa 'di ltar na/ kho snying rje gsungs nas zas gos kyis tshim par mdzad pa sogs 'phags chen byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bla na med pas rnam kun 'da' bar mdzad pa
kun gyi spyod yul du gyur pa las gzhan pa'i gzhan don rjes chags kyi mdzad pa bem por ston pa ci zhig dgos/ de nas lhun rtse mkhan pos chibs bsus te dus tshogs nas zhabs

nar/ brtson 'grus kyi phar phyin rdzogs pa'i thabs chos rgyal nor bu bzang po'i rnam thar la 'gran bzod pa ni rje nyid la rnam pa kun tu mnga' 'o/ /de nas bzung phebs byams

thog mgon po gang dang/ gdung sras zung gi sngar lam khri mjal du maNDal sogs rteen gsum/ bdog pa'i dngos po/ gser dngul gos dar sogs kyi mtshan grangs rgya dpang che ba
rnams bstar zhing / gong sa mchog nas tshe bka' dang khri chen nas phyag rdor 'khor chen gyi dbang yang gsan cing / gru 'dzin du phebs skabs de ring rgan pos rta rtsal ngom
rgyu yin pas ltos shig gsungs nas rdo skas ring mo de na yar chibs pa'i rmig pas rdo la 'thab pa'i me stag 'phro bzhin pa dang bcas phebs skabs/ chibs pas rmig rjes bzhag
pa sogs

ngo mtshar mang du gleng / rmig rjes ni da lta yang snang ba kho bo gzhon nu'i dus lha skyod skabs kyang sa skya bdag chen zhig gi chibs pa'i rmig rjes yin tshul mthong thos
byung ba dang / sa zla'i tshes gcig la phebs phyag tu/ gzhung sa mchog nas dngos skyes kyi bdog pa rmugs 'dzin dbang po'i gan mdzod zhal phye ba lta bu bstsal/ de dag gi
bar skabs su gser gdung gsar rnying gi drung du mchod 'bul/ mchod spyad ngo mtshar can yang sbyoor 'jags gnang / gzhan yang phyi nang gi rten ji snyed par phyag mchod bsnyen
bkur thugs smon gyis mtshams sbyor/ gong sa mchog gi bka' bzhin jo bo rin po che'i sku mdun kyai rdo rje la brten pa'i rab gnas rgyas pa sbyin sreg bcas dang / lha
sa bla brang / ra mo che/ klu'i pho brang rnams su sengge sgra/ chab klu/ bstan rgyas gling du kyai rdo rje la brten pa'i rab gnas sgrub zhag gsum par phyi skor du me tog
'thor gnang / sems dpa' rin po ches zhus ngor mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs kyi tshe bdud rtsir baM yig rang 'byon 'khrungs/ sde dge'i lcam zur sogs la lcags sdong ma'i tshe
dbang / grwa tshang la grub rgyal tshe dbang dang ljags lung phon chen/ lcang lo can du phur pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs tshe dbang / tshogs bdag
phyag rdor dregs pa kun 'dul/ sor 'brang rjes gnang / skye bo khri phrag du mar khrom dbang / bka'i gung blon chu mig dza sag dga' bzhi gung gi sras sogs che btsan bgrangs
yas che gra spyi sger nas mjal

phyag 'dod chos dbang rjes gnang byin rlabs ljags lung sogs dang / lcang can rang du sbyin sreg sogs rkyen sel 'ga' zhig dang dbang rjes gnang ba/ rme ru bzhi sde sogs su khrom
dbang / che btsan phal cher la nang dbang gras su bzhugs pa bcas/ che gnyan de rnams kyis thog drangs rnam kun tu chos kyi gnad go ba rnams la chos kyi gtam dang / las
byed sne mo ba rnams la las byed de dang mthun pa'i gtam/ tshogs pa rnams la tshogs sogs gang la gang 'dul gyi thabs lam bzang pos bstan 'gro'i bde skyid spel ba dang
/ bka' rtsom gnang ba thugs dam 'od gsal du 'khrungs pas/ phyi nang gsang ba'i lung / grub pa'i sa la bzhugs pa'i rtags sogs mtha' yas so/ /sa ga'i tshes dgur lha sa nas
chibs kha bsgyur te/ yer pa gnas gzigs bco brgyad tsam yod skabs nas phal cher la zhabs bskyod/ de'i tshe dril bu phug par klu dbang srung ba'i sku gsar bskrun mdzad rgyu'i
bka' grol de nas 'brom stod du gsung bskang smin rgyas bzhugs/ nang pa mgar grong pa'i thog kha dang glang thang du yang lha bsangs/ khrom dbang / phyi bskor la me tog
na lendrar bzhugs zhag drug dang / phur dbang tshar gsum sgrol dbang / lam dbang / ljags lung mang ba/ gzim 'og tu rab gnas kyi skor la me char bsnyil zhing / 'jam dbyangs
rjes gnang / sdom gsum rab dbye'i lung / de bzhin gzim 'og tu'ang 'dod chos 'ga' zhig bstsal ba dang dpal ldan rtser bskang 'phrin rgyas pa sogs bstan don

mdzad sgo rnams zin nas/ chibs bsgyur gyi nyin bco brgyad du gnang sbyin byin rten sogs mang po dang / kyai rdor rnam bshad/ rab rten zhal 'bag zho phye las sbrus pa'i gsol
ba rnams gnang nas 'di gsum sku gsung thugs rten gyies slar 'dir nged thengs cig sleb yong ngo / /zhes bka' bstsal nas phebs te lhun grub rdzong du bzhugs shing / rdzong
rtser dang / chag la'i yang rtser lha bsangs skabs gzigs snang ngo mtshar can yang 'khrungs/ stag lung du grub rgyal tshe dbang gnas gzigs dang phun mdor bzhugs/ sang nyin
ko ba thon byang ra sgreng dang nye bar gsang ye'i pho brang du thab bsu dang bcas ra sgreng du phebs te/ jo bo rjes rgya nag nas gdan drangs pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
sku drung du de'i sgrub mchod rgyas pa/ gnas ngo mtshar can de'i shug khrod nas phyi bskor la me char phab ste skye dgu de dag gi gtsug tu phyag gser gyi 'khor lo ngal gsos
te bzhugs sgar du phebs/ de'i sang ye'i pho brang du mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub mchod ra sgreng gi gnas tshad yin tshad khul bcom mda' dang / ko ba 'thon a dkar sum mdo dang
/ 'bar tshag nyi ma tshal/ ki ra thang rnams su bzhugs zhag re dang / gter sgrom chu tshan zhag lnga chab bdugs bcas phebs 'phral rnam 'joms dang / nyin ltar lha bsangs
rgyas pa/ chab klu tshe chog rnams dang snron zla'i tshes gcig la lha mo gsol mchod kyi gsung bskang yang der mdzad nas phebs lam 'bri khung mthil gnas gzigs dang groog
sna zangs khar bzhugs/ de nas 'bri khung

spro khang yang ri sgar du bzhugs/ de nas klong chen rab 'byams pa'i gdan sa zha lha khang du gza' dang dam can par gtor bsngo bcas mdzad nas dbu ru bka' tshal du bzhugs te
klu mal dro gzi byin gyi pho brang mdun du ma 'ongs par skye 'gro rnams klu gza' rgyal gsum gyis 'joms par gsungs pa'i lo rgyus stsol ba dang bcas sengge sgra/ chab klu
bcas smin rgyas bstan 'gro'i bde thabs su gnang nas phyed dkar du phebs te/ 'dus tshogs la rnam sras ser chen dang 'jam dbyangs dmar ser rjes gnang bstsal nas/ rim gyis mal
dro gong dkar kyi rdo legs mgon khang sogs mjal zhing rgya ma sgrub rnying du bzhugs te/ zhabs brtan bskang ba sogs kyi lung dang tshe dbang sogs bstsal zhing / khri khang
du tshe chog kun rig rnam 'joms byabs khrus bcas dang / de nas la mor bzhugs nas ko ba 'then/ lo sems dpa' ren po ches chibs bsus te lo dgon du zhag drug bzhugs te gur
drag gshed dmar sogs kyi dbang dkar bdun rjes gnang / bskang ba'i ljags lung sogs dang / rab gnas sbyin bsreg 'cham gzigs sogs mdzad nas/ gtsang thog tu bzhugs/ sang nyin
gdan sa chen po ri bo dge ldan gzigs/ khrus gsol/ spyi sger nas mjal phyag grwa mang la phyag dbang sogs grub nas bde chen du bzhugs/ de nas bla ma zhang gi gdan sa gung
thang gnas gzigs khrom dbang / 'bum mo cher rab gnas/ bde chen gnas gzigs dang chang tshul du bzhugs/ de nas

nam phyed tsam la chibs bsgyur te/ dgod la'i rtser lha bsangs rgyas pa sngas 'gor bzhugs/ sang nyin g.ya' ma lung gnas gzigs dang bcas bsam yas su bzhugs/ zhag bcu bdun ring
/ mgon khang dang / lcog gnyis su rtag par gsung bskang dang / spyi sger nas mjal phyag gnas gzigs/ 'cham gzigs/ chos skyong sku phebs/ bka' rtsom/ gsung brtag srod tho
rangs mtshan gung sogs su/ phur pa dang / bde mchog dbang cha drug grwa gsum brgya skor la rta mgrin yang gsang dbang chen/ rjes gnang sogs ni grangs las 'das shing / mchims
phu gnas gzigs skabs rje nyid la klu 'dul phug tu mtsho rgyal gyis zhal gzigs te/ lung bstan zhig byung gsungs pa las/ 'di byung bka' ma grol/ lcog tu phyi nang gsang
ba'i rten 'dzugs kyi tshe rje nyid kyi 'od gsal du chos skyong chen po byon nas yon tan gyi rten de la lhag par dgyes nyams kyis 'di phye mar gyis bkang dgos gsungs pa
bzhin dang / sdib khrab la bzo skyor yang mdzad pa sogs gnas der bstan 'gro'i legs spel rnams rim grub kyis/ brag kha rdzong bdun/ bzhugs sgar du bco brgyad/ sku mched bsam
yas mkhan po sogs la lam dbang / lam zab phyi nang / bir srung phyi nang sogs dang / 'on khri smon mgon khang du gsung bskang dang rab gnas/ de nas rgyal sras rin po ches
chibs bsus/ 'on chos sdings su zhag bzhi bzhugs/ rgyal sras sogs la rnal 'byor ma'i byin rlabs dang /

sku rkyang la rig byed ma ngor lugs thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / zhal bsnyen dus bcas dang / tshur yang gong du bstan pa bzhin gyi chos bka' de rnams gsan cing / gnas
der rab gnas rgyas pa rmor chen rin po che'i bzhugs gnas rgod tshang du bla mchod/ bskang 'phrin bsangs khrus tshogs 'khor sogs bod khams bde ba'i thugs bskyed rnams ziin
nas khrom dbang dang / brag kha rdzong bdun/ rtse thang 'bras gling dang / dga' ldan bkra shis chos 'khor dang / lnga mchod la'ang phebs/ bsam ldan gling gi kyai rdor ba
spu ma gzigs te/ khra 'brug yum bu bla mkhar sogs la gnas gzigs mchod 'bul/ dbang ljags lung mang ba sogs bstsal nas/ bkra shis chos sder bzhugs zhag bcu gnyis la/ bde
kyai gsang gsum phur mgon rnams kyi rab gnas/ dges rdor kun riig dbang cha bzhi/ mgon khang chen mor dus gtor rjes gnang zur bka' drug sgrol ma nyer gcig rnams kyi rjes gnang
dang/ lung mtha' yas pa/ rnam sras khang du rnam sras kyi bskang ba/ sku brnyan rnams la na bza' gsar sgron dang / 'on rgod tshang du gnad rgyu'i sku rnams phebs skyel
ba bka' 'doms pa sogs bstan mkhas kyi mdzad sgo rnams grub nas shel brag tu gur drag dang / gnam gang gi dus gtor mdzad rjes btsan thang du lha bsangs rgyas pa dang /
de nas bye tshogs su lha bsangs rgyas pa/ lcog tu gsung bskang / chos skyong sku phebs thog zhal ngo so sor sku sprul mchog gi lung bstan dang / der kyai

rdor rgyu dbang cha bzhi/ sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang / rab gnas/ ljags lung sogs rgya cher bstsal nas smin gling mkhan rin po ches chibs bsus/ smin gling du bdun phrag
gcig bzhugs/ mkhan por dgongs 'dus sogs gong du bstan pa bzhin gsan/ phar yang bla ma zhi khro'i tshe dbang sogs bstsal/ der tshes bcu'i thog 'dus tshogs kyi dbur phebs/
'cham gzigs gnas gzigs sogs grub nas bye tshogs su phebs te 'gro don rgya cher mdzad/ de nas gra thang du rdo rje phur pa'i sbyin sreg rgyas pa dang/ gsang 'dus dang kun
rig gi dbang cha kha shas/ mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs/ phyag rdor khang brtsegs dang zhang blon gyi rjes gnang / sgar chen rin po che'i gdan sa dpal rab tu gsung bskang
gsol 'debs sogs dang nyams gso gsar bskrun gyi bka' 'doms/ byams gling du kyai rdor rab gnas/ gzhan yang ljags lung phon chen khrom dbang sogs bstsal nas gdung phud chos
'khor du kyai rdor dbang cha drug dang / de'i rab gnas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bcas/ mgon khang gtor spod/ rjes gnang kha shas/ gur drag dang khrom dbang sogs re skong rnams
kyis dus 'das rjes/ ra ba smad du bde mchog nag po dang / kun rig dbang cha bzhi/ lcog tu lha bsangs rgyas pa/ rjes gnang 'ga' zhig chu 'gram du kyai rdor rab gnas thog
chu rags mgo mjug la me char nyil ba/ dus gtor khrom dbang sogs dang / de nas rnam rab tu lha bsangs rgyas pa/ kun

rig dbang cha lnga/ sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang tshar lnga dang / spyan gzigs sgrol dkar rjes gnang / kyai rdor rab gnas sbyin sreg rgyal po rnam gsum sku phebs/ sngar
gyi gtor rnying spo gnang dang lcog tu gsar 'dzugs shig kyang gnang / rnog bsod nams bstan 'dzin gyi gdung rten dud sol ma bcas gnas gzigs dus dud sol ma'i sgos kyi gtor
chog kyang gnang zhing / de nas jo phug gnas gzigs dang / gong dkar rdoo rje gdan du zhag nyer gcig bzhugs ring yang / nyin mtshan khor mo yug tu bstan 'gro'i legs spel
'ba' zhig gis dus 'da' bar mdzad pa las/ skya ser mang por dbu ma lugs kyi sems bskyed rta mgrin yang gsang dbang / khrom dbang phur dbang rab gnas sogs brjod kyis mi lang
ba dang ljags lung yang de bzhin/ bshad sgrub gling / sku gnyer grwa tshang / bde chen chos 'khor rnams la'ang zhabs kyis bcags pa/ bstan srung rgya mtsho rgyal bstan rin
po che spyi bye brag rgyas pa'i 'phrin las 'chol ba sogs mdor na ya mtha' bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen nas ma mtha' sprang po'i bar gyi re 'dod skong ba'i dam bca' las
g.yel ba nam yang rje dam pa der mi mnga' zhing / de'i tshe sne shan pa dpal ldan bkra shis la byin rten grangs mang / bdog pa'i dngos po gya nom pa bcas bstsal nas rang
gnas su mngags/ de nas ta ra phur bzhugs dus bshad sgrub gling sku rten par sku phebs thog da gzod mngon du 'gyur pa'i lung bstan yang bstsal/ sang nyin ta phu la rtser

snod bcud spyi bye'i bde thabs la ched du dgongs pa'i lha bsangs dang bzhugs tsher khang dmar/ de'i sang nam phyed tsam la phebs lam shin tu rtsub par nam 'og tu byon pas/
rgyus yod rnams kyi gleng mor rgyun du ni mi re yang mi thar ba lta bur mchis/ da lam dpon g.yog kun nam phyed she mun gyi dus su bde bar phebs pa las gzhan pa'i rdzu 'phrul
lhag tu mi dgos 'dra/ zhes sgrog par gyur pa'ang don gnas kyi tshig yin lags/ de nas sga 'dra chu tshan dang nye bar rje nyid phebs byams thog 'od gsal du 'khrungs skabs
'di ltar gsungs te/ khrums zla'i nyer bdun la 'gyogs byams thog 'don par byed mur bshul lam bgrod pas gnyid zir re ba zhig byung bar/ rmi lam du byang phyogs nas btsun
ma 'dra mo zhig gis/ sga 'dra'i gzhi bdag bsdad med pas re zhig la shog gsung ba'i yi ge bri rogs mdzod/ zer bas/ nub phyogs nas bud med dar yol dpral g.yu can kha shin
tu che bar gdangs pa zhig thal mo sbyar nas mgo gug gug byed pa shar bas/ khyed rang gzhi bdag su 'dra zhig yin na'ang sga 'dra chu tshan dang nged la las 'brel yod pa zhig
ni cis kyang yin 'dug rtags/ lo kha shas nas tshoms dkyil na chu tshan yod pa zhig 'dug pa mngon sum myong ba yin 'dug ces gsungs shing de'i ka ba lho ma bdag 'dzin mdzad/
chab zhag lnga dang der yang lha bsangs rgyas pa dang / rjes gnang kha shas sogs rtsa ba nas zangs khrod/ ri bo drag/dga' ldan ri khrod/ gling rdzong sogs brgyud/ yar

'brog mthar gling du/ gur lha brgyad sogs bstan srung rnams kyi rjes gnang / gyi lnga gza' gdong dang tshe'ii rdzong chung sogs bstsal ba gdul bya 'ga' zhig mig mi bde ba de
'phral gsal ba sogs byin rlabs zhugs rtags kyang byung ba gnang / rab gnas sogs bstsal/ rdzong lha dbang rab bstan gling dang / gsang chos la'ang zhabs bcags nas bsam sdings
su phebs lam/ dus mchod gdung rabs sger la gsol 'debs glo bur du thugs la 'khrungs pa dang / bsam sdings dpe khrod nas spod gcig bzhes pa gdung rabs chen mo phyag phebs
ma 'ongs pa'i la nyer dgongs te/ dus mchod gdung rabs gsol 'debs bka' rtsom dang / der lha bsangs dang / rdo rje phag mo dang phan tshun gong du bstan pa'i bka' chos
gsan bsam sogs mdzad nas/ de nas sna dkar rtse'i mgon khang du gsung bskang dang / mi sde spyis zhus gtor 'dzugs kyang gnang nas srin lag tu bzhugs/ sang nyin kha ro lar
lha bsangs dang gnod sbyin rnam gnyis gsol mchod bcas mdzad cing / ra lung gnas gzigs dang / sne bzhir phebs/ o rgyan yang zab rjer phar tshul chos bka' 'ga' zhig gsan nas/
rgyal rtser gur pa grwa tshang du/ phur pa/ rta mgrin yang gsang / rjes gnang dang / ljags lung phon che/ khrom dbang / de dang rdzong rtser lha bsangs/ gtor spod/ rtse
chen du gnas gzigs bskang ba 'cham gzigs bcas mdzad sgo rnams grub nas/ 'brong rtse/ 'bras khud/ skyid sbug/bar tsho sogs

su zhabs bcags/ tshe dbang / byad grol/ rjes gnang / rab gnas sogs kyi re ba bskangs nas/ mngon dga' gnas gzigs rab gnas/ rkyang 'dur bde ba can du/ kyai'i rgyud dbang cha
bzhi/ khrom dbang sogs dang / lhas lding du sbyin sreg khrom dbang sogs bstsal nas/ pa nam rdzong brgyud/ dga' gdong dgon du bzhugs te gnas gzigs khrom dbang sogs gnang /
de nas yul lha ba pad tshal rnams su rab gnas/ byad grol sogs mang du gnang nas zhwa lur byon/ gling bskor la me char nyil ba/ tshogs yongs la dbu ma lugs kyi sems bskyed
rjes gnang khag ljags lung phon chen rnams gnas gzigs sogs don yod mdzad sgo zin nas/ ri sbug brgyud/ la rtser lha bsangs/ e waM du bdun gcig bzhugs ring / gsang ba'i mgon
khang du bskang 'phrin/ tshogs yongs la dbu ma lugs kyi sems bskyed/ tshe sman gnas gsum gyi rjes gnang / ljags lung mang ba/ khrom dbang rnams dang / thar rtsed rab
gnas bla mchod/ bla khag gzhan du/ tshe dbang dang rjes dbang kha shas gnas de'i mdzad sgo rnams grub nas/ srad rgod du bzhugs zhag thog klu lding sku gshegs kyi dgongs rdzogs
mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub mchod mdzad pa nas bzung zhe dgu nam rdzogs bar mdzad/ de nas shab dge sding du khrom dbang / Da Di bcas par lha bsangs rab gnas/ dmigs su sbyin
sreg rab gnas/ lcam mo grwa tshang par lha bsangs/ tshe dbang / byad grol/ gnas khang la phyag

nas sogs mdzad/ bya gshongs su byon te/ dbang lung rjes gnang gnas gzigs/ rnam sras la gsung bskang / skye bo khri phrag du mar khrom dbang sogs rnam kun don yod kyi mdzad
sgo rnams grub nas/ smin zla'i tshes lngar ram se lung du bzhugs/ tshes drug la phu chen la rtser lha bsangs dang / de nas khams yul du gur dkar bsam grub pho brang nang
/ chibs bsu ba las chen pa zung giis thog drangs phyed nyis brgya brgal tsam la byin rlabs kyi zil dngar phab/ de nas a krol la rtser lha bsangs rgyas pa dang bcas rim phebs
kyis chu kha ma'i steng du 'cham mgon rnams la snyan shal sgron par mdzad de/ ser phreng dang gzhas sogs kyis sngun bsus/ gzhi thog phoo brang du bde bar phebs te dga'
ston gyi dpal la longs spyod par mdzad do/ /de'i sang tshoms chen du legs ston rmad du byung bas dus 'das shing / de nas nyin bzhi mgon khang rnams la gtang rag dang /
rtse lha bsangs rgyas pa dang bcas gzim chung mgon khang zung gi gtor 'bul/ de nas rgyal dbang mchog tu 'bul rgyu'i zhal gyi 'khor lo dang chabs cig 'jam mgon sku mched la'ang
'khor lo re stsol bar mdzad/ mgo zla'i tshes bzhi la mkhan rin po che gsar pa khri phebs gnang rgyu'i gsum gyi tho rengs 'od gsal du/ mkhan gsar sbyin pa bkra shis
dang gzhi thog rtser mjal bas/ rje'i gsung las/ 'o da lam mkhan gsar la bu chung bgres pas legs so gyis gsungs nas 'di gnang byung gsungs pa dang / nyid kyi sku hrag nas

me long zhig gnang bar/ mkhan gsar nas 'di la tshigs bcad zhig rtsom rogs zhu gsung bar/ rje rdo rje 'chang chen nas/ bde gshegs bstan pa'i lha lam rab yangs par/ /lung rtogs
tsha zer rgyas pa'i dpal yon nas/ /shes bya'i 'dab brgya 'dzum pa'i ze'u 'bru'i bcud/ /blo gsal bung ba'i sbrang rtsi dam par shog/ /gsung ba 'dra mo zhig 'then song bas
ma 'ongs pa'i rten 'brel zhig ni cis kyang yin 'dug ces gsungs/ zla ba de nang nas 'jam mgon dpal ldan chos skyong 'di nyid kyi lha mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i ljags bsnyen
la bzhugs pa'i skabs so/ /dgung grangs nga gsum du byon pa lcags glang rgyal zla'i nang / dbus phebs skabs bka' 'phros bzhin/ 'di ga'i sgar chen mthu stobs dbang phyug
gi gdan sa dpal rab gzhis su de nyid snang brnyan byin rlabs kyi gzi 'od 'bar ba gsar bskrun mchod tshogs dang bcas te/ sa phyogs de'i bdee skyed la ched du dgongs pa'i
thugs bskyed dang chabs cig zangs ri gung bkra shis rnam rgyal la/ phebs skabs bsu ba sogs legs lam gyi bka' 'doms dang bcas dpal rab tu bstsal/ rta zla'i tshes gcig la bsam
yas mi 'gyur lhun gyis grub pa'i lha lcog tu rje nyid kyis gsar bskrun gnod sbyin rtsi'u dmar po'i sku gsob la zhugs rang bzhes dang / dbo zla'i mjug nyi ma rgas nye
zhig la'ang gang nas 'ongs cha med pa'i me dpung skad chen zhig 'thon/ nub dang byang phyogs su song ba'i sbir gtam mang du gleng ba

sogs byung zhing / lha rdzong dgon gsar du ye shes pa'i dgon gog bsdus te/ rten mchod dge rgyun rnams mo dgon rin sgang du sbyar na ji ltar legs/ bstan srung rgya mtshor brtag
zhu mdzad pa/ de don mdzad pa bzang babs bzhin mdzad pa dang / 'brong rtse sogs nas zhus ngor klu 'bum mang du sgrub gnang gis bstsal zhing / lo der gdung sras 'jam mgon
sku mched 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma sogs rje btsun zung / thar rtse nam mkha' 'chi med sogs ngor bla khag gi zhabs drung rnams dang / bstan 'dzin 'phrin las/ bco brgyad
sku mched sogs sa lugs bstan 'dzin drag bsdus rnams gtso bor smos gzhan yang gzhis byes don gnyer can 'dus pa'i tshogs la zab rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rgya cher bskor
ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'og tu dbang gi mtshan can gyi rnam thar du gsal ba bzhin dang / nag zla'i nang lcang can gung nor bu phun tshogs nas pha drug khar tar rnam rgyal
sku 'bum gsar bzhengs mdzad rgyu'i phyag len pa de dus kyi dbu byed che sar/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phel gdung dbang po'i grangs ldan gyis mtshon ring bsrel rnam bzhi'i gzungs/
'dod gsol sogs gang ci'i bka' 'doms kyis brgyan te pha drug tu mngags/ gung 'di pas khong ming zhu dus bu 'byung bar thag gcod mdzad pa bzhin byung ba'i ngo mtshar ba
yang yod cing / de nas lha chen mkhan po chos bkra shis kyi dgongs rdzogs thub dbang gnas brtan bcu drug sbyin bdag hA shang rgyal chen bzhi dang bcas 'dod gsol zhus don

bzhin kha'u'i sman chab nas stsal/ rim gyis dam ye dbyer med kyi cho ga bsgrubs te/ shab sgo lnga'i ya gyal Da zhes thabs dang Ta'i shes rab mtshon pa'i dgon gnas su bzhugs
so gsol ba'i bka' grol/ de mtshams nas rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid ni rgyal sras byang sems chen po'i rnam thar lhur bzhes g.yel med nas/ snga sor bud med sems ma dpa'
mo zer ba zhig gis bdag 'chi bdag gi zhags pas zin pa'i tshe nyid kyi thugs rjes zungs shig pa'i gsol btab bzhin/ de nyid lnga lam du song ba'i g.yu byur spos shel lha
gos dri med sogs 'byor bas de 'phral lha rdzas la dmigs yul gyis mtshon lnga lam pa kun dal 'byor gyi rten dang mjal ba'i 'dod gsol dang bcas rje btsun sgrol mar phul te
thugs smon sogs 'di 'dra'i rigs snga phyi kun tu mang du 'byung ba'ang 'dis mtshon par bya'o/ /de'i tshe lha chen phun tshogs gling du gzim chung smun grub thar rtse sogs
dang / khams pa shag sogs ar zug skabs yin pas/ de gras la phu gsum nas btsun ma gzhon nu zhig mchis par/ tshes bcu dgu'i nyin dregs byed zhig gis brlams tshul gyis cal
col mang du gleng ba'i dus/ thugs bskyed bla na med pas gong ma'i byin sna khrus chur sbyar ba dang zas gos sogs gnang zhing / ci yin gyi rgyu mtshan dang bcas gsung shog
zhig bstsal yang nges gsal ni ma byung / sa ga'i tshes gcig nas bzung gong 'khod kyi zhal slob sogs skal ldan bcu phrag lnga tsam la/ rje btsun sa skya pa'i yab chos bla
na med pa gsung ngag

rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa zab mo slob bshad kyi dga' ston stsol bar mdzad pa/ rnam thar gsol 'debs las/ yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i nyams len gsung ngag chos/ /skal
ldan gdul byar sdom tshe ka bzhi dang / /gdung brgyad zhal slob lung bstan bdag med ma'i/ /dbang tshe bdud rtsi khol bar lud la 'dud/ /gzhan yang snod ldan slob mar nang
gi ni/ /phag mo mig lam rtsal dang bir srung dus/ /nyi zla'i 'gro 'ong bkag sogs rdzu 'phrul gyi/ /ngo mtshar mang du bstan la gsol ba 'debs/ /ces gsungs pa ltar/ chos kyi
rnam grangs 'og 'jam mgon sku mched kyi rnam thar bzhin dang / gro bzhin bcu bzhi'i tho rengs rje nyid la ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gi zhal gzigs te/ zhal slob ka bzhi gdung
brgyad sogs 'byung bar lung bstan dang bcas dbugs 'byung gzengs bstod mdzad pa/ zhal slob ka bzhi gdung brgyad kyi ngos 'dzin 'og tu byung zhing / gzhan yang gong du
bstan pa ltar zha lu pa 'ga' zhig dang lo chen sems dpa' chen po sogs la mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs kyi tshe kA pa la'i bdud rtsi nang gi phag mo'i waM yig rang byung du
ston par mdzad pa/ rje nyid kyi gsung las/ tshar chen yab sras gnyis da ltar dpon slob 'dii khrod na yod/ ces lung bstan pa dang / bdag med lha mo bco lnga'i tshe nang
mchod 'khol zhing phyogs brgyar lud nas lag mi tshugs pa ltar tsha dbal dang bcas kun gyi mthun snang du mdzad pa dang / bir srung phyi nang gnang ba'i tshe gdan sa'i rtsis

pa zung / skye re ba/ khang gsar mchod dpon sogs rtsis pa rnams mthun grub kyies nyi 'dzin yong bar thag bcad sgo yig kyang sbyar zhing / don la'ang byed grub mthun par ri
mos gtan la phebs pa'i tshe/ rje nyid grub mtshan 'jog bzhed kyi gsung las/ de ring nyi 'dzin yong bar thag chod de bzhin la/ rgad po rnal 'byor dbang phyug tu langs rgyu
yin pas khyed rang kun/ nyi 'dzin rtsis pa'i sgo yig dang bcas pa la ltad mo ltos shig gsungs pa dang mnyam du nyi 'dzin mi mngon dbyings su byin gyis brlabs pa sogs sa
lam mthon poor byon pa'i rtags 'ga' zhig 'di dus ston par mdzad/ chu stod zla nang gong sa rgyal ba'i dbang po mchog nas chos srid la bka' lung ci dga' bsgyur pa'i zhabs
legs 'bul bar mdzod 'dzin bkas gdams nas de gong gdung sras 'jam dbyangs sku mched la'ang tham ga che chung re gsar bskrun mdzad pa'i tham phud kyang gong sa mchog dang /
'di dag gis rten ji snyed la'ang 'bul bar mdzad/ bka' lan 'dir 'khor skabs gnang skyes bzang po/ khyad par mkha' spyod ma'i snang brnyan dzhai kShiM las grub pa che chung
gsum yab sras rnam gsum la dgyes bstsal dang mnyam du/ rje nyid la 'phan khang dbon po sogs nas/ nA ro mkha' spyod kyi khrid sogs gser chos bcu gsum gnang kha ma dang 'grig
pas rten 'brel gyi gnad khyad par can dang 'grig gzhan yang chu stod zla nang glo bo rgyal po phebs/ 'dod chos dbang bka' 'ga' zhig gsan te dngos 'bul yang dag mdzad/

gong sa rgyal dbang mchog dgung gegs snga bsur byon pa'i sku gegs sel phyir/ gzim spyil dkar po'i bse dgon yid bzhin nor bu'i sku drung du 'jam mgon zhal rnam pa gnyis/ rje
btsun drung / ban tshang pa'i 'khor tshogs bcas nas/ rje nyid kyi bka' bzhin gsung bskang smin rgyas dang / zhag gsum ring 'dus tshogs su sde dge sa dbang la cung zad 'tshub
nyams 'khrungs pa sel phyir sku rim rgya che gnad smin du 'doms par mdzad/ ring min nas rgyal dbang mchog gi thugs bzhed bzhin gnod sbyin rtsi'u dmar po'i sku gsob gzungs
rab gnas sogs cho ga rnam dag gis bskrun pa sku tshab ched mngags kyis phul bas dgyes bzhes yang dag par mdzad ces thos lags/ de mtshams nas gong gi gser chos kyi dbang
rnams 'jam sku mched sogs dang mnyam du bstsal ba ji ltar bstsal ba'i chos rnam grangs 'og tu byung zhing / smin zla'i 'gor byang pa sde tshogs la gsung bskang nyin
gang ma spyir dus bde zhod 'jags byung ba dang / khyad par rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyis chos bka' rgya cher bstsal 'bras bzhin/ gang gi rigs sras rgyal tshab dam pa mchog
dang / gzhan yang bstan 'dzin kha shas gzhi bsnyen la bzhugs stan 'jags rgyu'i rim gror ched dgongs kyis bstsal nas/ ma 'gyangs par kha'u sman chab mdzad de/ 'jam mgon dbang
sdud snying po nyid nas 'khor lo bde mchog dang / ᫗᫙ klungs mchog sprul/ rtse gdong sprul sku sogs kyai rdo rje'i gzhi bsnyen la bzhugs dgos pa'i bka'i gnang ba bstsal
nas/ rje

nyid chos 'chad sogs 'char 'phar gyii bstan 'gro'i bgyi bar thugs gzhol ba'i skabs so/ /dgung grangs nga bzhir byon pa chu stag lcags byi dbyug zla lhag pa'i dbang du btang
na gong bsam yas su zhugs rang 'bar dang zla dus mtshungs par/ sngon chos rgyal kyi dus/ slob dpon padmas khyung lung ma bkug ste bstims par grags pa'i phan ring byang sems
zla ba rgyal mtshan gyis spyan drangs pa'i dmu rdzing mgon khang rten brtan pa bcas rgyu mtshan med par zhugs bzhes kyis dmigs med du song bas/ bod gangs can dus rtags
shin tu gsal ba yin pa bzhin rje rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi thugs la bzod glags dang bral bas rgyal dbang rtse shod bla brang zhabs pad bcas su snyan bsgron te/ rten
brten pa bcas gsar bskrun rta zla'i brgyad tshun la tshar phyin mdzad de/ gos nag lha mor bsgrubs pa bka' bsgo dam bzhag gi yi ge can/ rta mgrin yang gsang dang lha mo'i
snang brnyan/ rnga rol sil snyan gos lham sogs dang / rgyun bskang gtor mi bzhi grwa rnams legs par 'doms so/ /rta zla dbo zla sogs la gzhung sa mchog dang / bla brang
zhabs pad sogs nas dmu rdzing skor sogs legs nyes kyi blang dor 'byed pa'i bka' tshig gsal por phebs dgos rnams la'ang / gtso bo rgyal mchog lnga pa chen po'i lung bstan
rgya chen dang / gter chen bdud 'dul gling pa'i lung bstan skor/ gter bdag gling pa'i dag snang chu za'irol rtsed/ rdo brag rig 'dzin

chen po'i dag snang skor sogs la zhib dpyod mdzad dgos nyi shar sgron 'degs kyi dpe'i sgo nas phul ba dang chabs cig bka' bstan rnying ma rgyud 'bum tshar lnga bcu nga lnga
nyung mtha' byas pa gsung sgrog sogs gnang ba ni/ rje nyid dgongs pa gzhan don du gtad pa'i lung gsal de dus bka' phebs shing / gzhan yang dmu rdzing brgyad grwas bskang
ba gnang smin gyi bka' dang / rje rdo rje 'chang yab sras sogs nas bskang 'phrin sogs dpyad kyis/ bstan 'gro'i bde thabs la ched du gzhol dgos kyi bka' rnams dang bzhes
nas/ rgyal dbang yab sras kyi sku rim gtsor smos bse mgon yin bzhin nor bu'i sku drung du rje rdo rje 'chang yab sras nas bskang 'phrin rgyun ring bar gnang skabs paN chen
thabs cad mkhyen pa dpal ldan ye shes dag zhing du phebs pa gsan 'phral/ mchog gi sprul sku rin po che myur phebs 'phrin 'chol zhu ba dang sbrags/ gangs can chos 'phel
sogs nas 'dzugs bkod zhus pa'i gdung shugs gsol 'debs 'di yang / snga dro zhig thugs skyo lhang gi ngang nas skad cig la mdzad/ de'i tshe bla brang zhabs pad mchog tu spyi
sger rgyal bstan rin po cher sri zhu dang / de 'dzin dam pa rnams kyi zhabs brtan sku rim du ched dgongs kyis/ snar thang bka' bstan rin po cher par sangs nyams gso zhu
dag sogs snyan zhu bzhin/ 'phags chen dam pa'i rnam thar phan tshun 'gran pa lta bu'i sgo nas dang bzhes bka' drin che ba'i 'go brtsams/ gzhan yang gong sa yas phyin sde
dge sa dbang rnams nas

mchod yon bstan lar dgongs pa'i bka' gsang ba'i skor snga phyi kun tu mang du mchis kyang 'dir de tsam dang / nag zla'i nyi shu skor la/ zur 'chad grub dbang la sku khrus sogs
'bul bar khro khang du phyag phebs/ de nas se dkar rigs kyi thig le 'dar sde srid blo gsal tshe dpal dbang phyug ltos bcas la/ rnam pa kun tu thugs rje'i rjes 'dzin g.yel
med bka' drin che mu nas sa ga'i nyar/ tshar chen rin po che'i snang brnyan mi tshad ma sman 'jim las bskrun pa ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyur bur gtams te/ byin rlabs
kyi tshad ma can dang / glo bo rgyal po dbang rgyal rdo rje legs ldan ma zhi drag gi sku dang / sa bcud 'phel ba'i bum gter brgya rtsa byin rlabs kyi mtshan mas phyug pa
rnams thugs brtse ba chen pos bstsal bas/ rgyal po dgyes pa'i rtser son te sA lu 'bras dkar khal mang po dang / gzig bcas phul ba'i gzig ni bsam yas chos skyong la 'bul bar
mdzad do/ /snron zla'i tshes gcig nas bzung chos sde byang pa 'ga' zhig gis gsol btab bzhin sprul pa'i lha khang chen mo'i thub chen dar bzhes ma'i drung du/ gsung ngag
rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag zab mo tshogs bshad 'chad thang lnga pa'i zhal slob kyi gtso bo/ gang gi rigs sras dam pa 'jam mgon e waM bzang pos gtso
mdzad/ yar klungs mchog sprul sogs pa lung bstan 'dzin drag bsdus rnams dang/ chos sde nyi zla rnam gnyis phal mo che/ thub bstan pa/ gser can pa/ 'bras yul skyed tshal
pa/ chos lhun pa sogs

kha shas/ rnam rgyal gser khang pa grwa gcig sogs khyon sdom 'dus pa sum brgya dang brgyad la stsol bar mdzad skabs chos dung rin po che shar skya tsam la gsung bskul dang
/ skabs 'gar snga phyi bcas/ de skabs su mkho ba'i zin bris shig kyang de dus kyi dbu byed che sar brtse skyong mdzad cing / phur sgrub skabs khyams smad lhor skal ldan rnams
rjes su bzung bar gyur te/ gzhan yang snron zla'i nang gling tshang bla gsar gdong / sngon du sde dge sa dbang dgung lo bcu drug lon phyin khab bzhes skor bka' 'doms
bzhin/ chu yos ston ra tha las ma 'gyangs par dgos pa'i bka' gsang dang / bkra shis chos sde'i chog dkyil rnams par bskrun/ rgyu'i zhib mo rnam bcas legs par gdams so/ /bstan
'dzin de gras nas rje nyid kyi bka' bzhin bco brgyad sku mched nas sgrub mchod kha shas dang / rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis/ phur sgrub sogs la gdan sa'i 'dus pa rgya mtsho'i
dbus su phebs shing / khrums zla'i yar tshes nas chos zhu ba rnams la dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i smin grol nyams khrid dang bcas cha tshang / sgrol dkar tshe 'khrid/
gsang 'dus lugs gsum gyi dbang / kun mkhyen rin po che'i bka' 'bum dang / dmar po skor gsum gyi be'u bum ljags lung 'phro can bskang ba'i skor rnams bcas dang / gzhan
yang chos sde lho byang sogs chos zhu ba ji snyed par/ 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma rwa lugs thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang grangs mang / sgrub thabs brgya rgyam/ grub chen brgyad
cu/ snar

thang brgya rtsa/ nyi sbas dang jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig mgon po'i dbang chen lnga dang de'i rjes gnang zab mo'i rigs rnams dang / phyis 'khrid 'phro can rnams gtso bor smos
chos kyi 'khor lo nyin mtshan khor mo yug tu ngal med bdag gzhan brje ba'i thugs bskyed kyi dam bca' g.yel med nas bskor bar mdzad pa 'di gcig pu'i sku drin yang bskal
pa rgya mtshor khyer mtha' mchis min shes ldan gzur gnas dag gis dgongs 'tshal lo/ /dbyug zla bkra shis zla gang bla brang zhabs pad mchog gi bka' bzhin/ sgo rum ye shes
mgon po'i sku drung du/ gang gi rgyal tshab dam pa 'jam mgon zhal rnam pa gnyis rgyun phebs dang / bco brgyad sku mched nas bzung dge 'dun res bskor gyis brgyad grwas bskang
phrin gnad smin zhu dgos bka' gsang gis 'doms nas/ gros 'phral rtags bzang ngan rnams kyang gab sbas dang bral bar phul zhing / de'i tshe gan rdzong du mi dge ba'i
mtshan ma sogs la blang dor gsol ba bzhiin/ sngon gyi lo rgyus las 'phros pa'i spang blang dang / rdo sku khyad mtshar can gdan sar gdan drangs nas nyams gso rab gnas kyis
mnga' gsol dang bcas/ slar gnas rang du bla ma bsnyen song nas spyan 'dren mdzad/ zla ba de nang nas rje nyid kyi thugs bskyed bla na med pa'i gras su gyur pa bya khra
ma'i shar rgyud/ ma thang rten brten par bcas gsar bskrun gyi las 'go brtsams te/ mi ring bar ma bskor rnams la rab tu gnas pa'i me char dang / de'i bcu dgu'i nyi zlar 'chad
grub

dbang bde bar gshegs/ de nas drug cu pa'i zor 'dzin sngon 'gro'i ljags bsnyen zla gang mar thugs gzhol te/ zor 'phen sogs lugs 'gro gnad smin du bka' drin bskyangs shing /
mgo zla'i nang bas se phyag rdor skyabs kyi bsngo 'bul ba sog po rnams la lugs zung bdag rkyen yang dag dang sbrags/ lcang skya rdo rje 'chang nas gsung bris rten ldan gyi
bka' lan dus gsum gnas tshul las 'phros pa'i bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'ang legs par gdams shing / zla mjug nas lha mchog rdo rje gzhon nu'i ljags bsnyen zla gsum mar
thugs gzhol ba'i skabs so/ /rnam thar bsdus pa las/ dbang lung man ngag rjes gnang 'khrid kun kyang / /bka' babs phyag bzhengs ngo sprod la sogs pa/ /ma 'dres so sor spyod
pa'i shes rab kyis/ /gdul bya'i blo gros spel la gsol ba 'debs/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ rje 'di snyigs dus kyi rgyal ba gnyis pa 'jam dbyangs mi'i zol can mngon sum yin pa'i
gtan tshigs kyang kun dang mthun grub tu/ 'di lta ste/ nyin mtshan bar med du chos 'khor ji snyed bskor ba'i tshe'ang / gzhan dag ni yun ring du dpe sbyongs sngon 'gro'i
sgo nas chos 'chad la 'jug kyang / rje 'di ni gsung ngag slob bshad kyis mtshon dbang 'khrid rje gnang kun dpe 'di dang 'di lta bu'i thog nas yin no zhes 'doms par mtshon
byed dpe spyan lam du phab tsam las gzigs yul ye mi dgos shing / phyag len rnam dag gi rgyun ma nyams pa gsung lam kho na nas shar mar gsung rgyun phyag len

bcas 'di dang 'di lta bu yin no/ /zhes 'doms pa dang mnyam du bstsal bar mdzad pa'ang de skabs kyi skye bo kun la yongs su grags pa ltar dang / bstan 'dzin gyi slob bu ji ltar
bskrun pa'i tshul yang / gong du gsung ngag slob bshad gnang skabs/ rgyal ba'i lung bstan ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gi zhal mngon sum du bstan te/ ka bzhi gdung brgyad
lta bu'i bstan 'dzin gyi slob bu byung gsungs pa la/ rnam thar chen mo dang / nyi 'od kyi zhal slob mkhas grub snga phyi mang du byon pa rnams kyis ngos 'dzin gsal bar mdzad
pa ma mthong mod/ 'on kyang de dus gsung ngag tshogs slob sogs rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi bstan 'dzin gyi slob bu so sos dgon sde gang du dar rgyas spel tshul rnams
la dpag pas rtogs nus pa bzhin cung zad bris na/ de yang gdan sa chen po 'di nyid du ni gang gi rigs sras 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan 'chang sku mched kyis ni snyigs dus
kyi skye bo dam tshig bsrung mi nus pa la dgongs pas/ bde kyai phur pa sogs yab chos 'ga' zhig las gsung ngag sogs kyi 'chad spel cher ma mdzad cing / des na yab sras rnam
gsum spangs rtogs kyi yon tan khyad par cher ma mchis stabs zur du ma bgrang bar/ zhal slob ka ba dang po ni/ bdag nyiid chen po nyid kyi sku tsha rigs smug rje btsun
'chi med bstan pa'iii nyi mar grags pa nges pa lnga ldan gyi gtso mo dang dbyer ma mchis pa de nyid yin te/ rgyu mtshan de nyid las phyis sa skya pa pad ma bdud bdul dbang
phyug sku mched

kyiis gsan cing / yab rje pad 'dul las/ sde dge sa dbang bla ma sogs kyis gsan te deng sang gi bar la khyab gdal du 'phel 'dug pas so/ /bka' babs sam ka ba gnyis pa ni grub
pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba thar rtse mkhan chen nam mkha' 'chi med nyid yin par mngon te/ de nyid kyis sa chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' blo gros las gsung ngag slob bshad/
gser chos skor sogs rgya cher gsan bsam mdzad de/ ngor e waM chos ldan du 'chad cing spel ba las thar rtse byams pa kun dga' bstan 'dzin/ byams pa kun dga' bstan pa'i rgyal
mtshan/ dpon slob blo gter dbang po sogs mkhas grub rim par deng sang gi bar du rgya cher 'phel te/ slob dpon rin po che nas deng sang gi bar 'chad spel spar bkod sogs
dar rgyas mdzad pa yongs grags ltar dang / gzhan yang sde dge sa skyong bla ma/ 'jam mgon mkhyen brtse sogs kyis gsan to/ /zhal slob ka ba gsum pa ni/ gang gi dbu bla gnas
gsar mchog sprul nam mkha' legs pa nyid yin par mngon te/ 'di nyid la sa chen kun dga' blo gros la gang gi sku gong mas bcol ba gnang ba'i gsung ngag slob bshad gser chos
mkha' spyod skor gsum/ dmar po skor gsum sogs zab chos phal cher gsan bsam bsgom gsum mthar phyin pa mdzad de/ gdan sa bkra shis chos sde dang / sde dge sogs su rgya
cher spel gnang gi dngos slob kyi gtso bo/ sde dge sa dbang bla ma byams pa kun dga' sangs rgyas/ dpal ldan 'phrin las sogs dang /

yang mkhas grub dge 'dun rgya mtsho kun dga' dpal ldan phan khang mkhan chen kun dga' bstan pa'i blo gros rdo rje/ gtso mo dhaki skal bzang chos kyi nyi ma las kho bo sa skya
pa ngag dbang drag shul 'phrin las rin chen gyis nos pa dang / gzhan yang brgyud pa 'di nyid las mdo smad sde dge ngos su yang rgya cher 'phel tshul ni/ gnas gsar mchog
sprul las/ sde dge grub dbang ngag dbang rin chen gyis gsan/ de las dpal ldan 'phrin las/ de las kun dga' dpal gyis gsan/ yang sa chen kun blos dngos slob sde dge grwa
rgang bla ma kun dga' blo ldan/ de las ngag dbang rin chen/ de las sa dbang bla mas gsan kyang skabs 'dir gtso bor mi mdzad/ sde dge sa skyong bla ma nas ngor thar rtse khu
dbon sogs la'ang gsan cing lhag par gnas gsar mchog sprul nam mkha' legs pa nyid rtsa ba'i bla ma'i mchog tu 'dzin par mdzad/ de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i snyan brgyud gser
chos skor gsum gyi sbyang byang sogs su'ang / gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang gi byin rlabs snying la zhugs pa lha btsun anta nas so/ /zhes pa kho na byung bas so/ /zhal slob ka
ba bzhi pa ni 'phan yul chos rje bco brgyad par grags pa/ rtse gdong sprul sku rig 'dzin phyogs las rnam rgyal lam/ dge 'dun bkra shis dpal 'byor du yang grags pa yin par
mngon te 'di nyid kyis/ sa chen kun blo'i drung du gsung ngag slob bshad kyis mtshon zab chos rgya cher gsan sgom mthar phyin pa mdzad de/ 'phan yul nA lendra 'am dpal
rgyun

gyi dbang po'i chos grwar gsung ngag slob bshad/ rnal 'byor ma sogs chos 'khor rgya cher bskor ba las/ gzim 'og bstan 'dzin 'phrin las yon tan/ gzim 'og sprul sku byis pa bstan
'dzin snyan grags sogs mkhas grub rim byon gyis gsang chen slob bshad kyi bzhed gzhung sengge'i sgra dbyangs cher bsgrags pas/ deng sang gi bar du yang dgon der dar
rgyas bzhugs pa las shes so/ /de rjes gdung ma lta bu'i bstan pa'i khur bzod pa'i zhal slob brgyad bgrang dgos pa ni/ gong gi ka ba dang po rje btsun 'chi med bstan pa'i
nyi ma'am gnas lnga rig pa'i paNDi ta chen po byams pa dpon slob kun bkras gang rung gi gcig ka bar nges na/ cig shos gdung mar nges shing / de gras gnyis pa lha chen mkhan
po chos bkra shis/ de nas rim bzhin/ gdan sa'i zur ba 'chad pa rgyab 'chang ba rin chen rgyal mtshan/ grangs chen mkhan po zhal dkar ba ngag dbang shes rab/ lce rigs gzim
'og sprul sku bstan 'dzin 'phrin las/ ri khud sprul sku kun dga' mkhas grub dbang po/ ngor khang gsar mkhan po/ sde dge gra sgang mkhas grub kun dga' blo ldan rnams yin
par sems te/ 'di dag dbang khrid lung sogs mang po'i brgyud par snang bas so/ /des na sngon dus lho brag mar pa lo tsA sogs la lung bstan pa bzhin slob ma ka chen bzhi
sogs kyii tha snyad byung ba bzhin de rang 'dra ba shin tu ngo mtshar gyi gnas dang gzhan yang rig grol gnyis ldan gyi yon tan la dbang 'byor pa/ a li chos rje

sprul sku ngag dbang chos grags/ ri khud sprul sku bsod nams dbang phyug skyo mda' bla ma 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bstan 'dzin/ sde dge smad shod bla ma yon tan rgya mtsho/ thub
bstan mkhan po bstan 'dzin rgyal mtshan/ chos lhun mkhan po bkra shis yar 'phel/ sde dge bla ma sangs rgyas bzang po/ bsod nams rgyal mtshan/ sangs rgyas dbang phyug sde
dge chog dpon kun dga' 'phrin las sogs phyogs tha dad du bzhugs pa mtshan nas smos kyis mi lang ba dang / gdan sa 'di nyid kyi chos sde nyi zla zung 'brel mkhan po bla
ma las sne dang / ngor e waM gyii mkhan zhabs phal cher gzhan yang dbus gtsang gi sa dgon phal che ba'i mkhan po grwa mang sogs mang du yod pa bcas/ mdor na de dus su yul
dus bskal bar ma gyur na ma gtogs dus mtshungs ris med mkhas grub phal cher gyis zhabs la ma gtug pa med par yongs su grags shing / gzhan yang rnam thar bsdus pa las/ sngags
'chang chos rje a mes zhabs sogs kyi/ / mdzad bzang rjes su slob pa'i thugs bskyed ltar/ /tshogs phebs gdung rigs spel dang de bsgrigs soogs/ /ngor mtshar phyag rje
khrid mthar gsal la 'dud/ /ces gsungs pa ltar/ tshogs phebs gdung spel sogs kyi mdzad pa rnams/ gong lo khams so so'i rnam thar rnams kyi nang du smos pa bzhin dang / bye
brag rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi rje btsun sa skya pa'i sde bstan pa gdung rgyud dang bcas pa'ii 'thas su/ sprul pa'i lha khang chen mo gcig pur yang shar nub

byang gsum la spen bad gsar sgron/ lho kha gso mtha' bskor lcags ri cog bcas kyi spang bad spen bad du bsgyur ba dang / thugs rten khyad mtshar 'dzam gling 'od gsal bskrun/
snga na med pa'i thar pa'i khang bzang gi rtser bgrod pa'i skas ring rmad byung rdzu 'phrul gyis bkod pa 'di nyid dang / 'gro kun ma rig pa'i gnyid las slong ba'i chos kyi
dunadubhiH rje btsun 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi snang brnyan byin rlabs kyi gzi brgya 'bar ba/ rje nyid kyi rtsa ba'i bla ma dam pa yab rje rdo rje 'chang dang 'jam mgon gnas
gsar ba chen po'i snang brnyan sogs mtha' yas pa/ gser khri chen mo shing brkos ngo mtshar can kun gyi mig gi bdud rtsir gyur ba 'di sogs sprul pa'i dri gtsang khang 'di
nyid nang bzhugs pa dang / gzhan yang gong du smos pa bzhin sa tshogs su chos khrims mkhas pa zil non 'phags pa rin po che'i phyi rten 'bum thang / zhal gro lha khang
rnams kyi sngon ma gnyis la nyams gso phyi ma gsar bzhengs rnams kyi rtser gser zangs kyi rgya phibs rin thang can kun gyi mig sngar mdzes pa 'di dag dang / gser srang du
ma las bskrun pa'i gser gyi 'dren chas dkar btegs bzed zhal bcas pa gsum/ gser ltir gser bum zung dang / gser gyi maNDal/ gser gyi phud phor phud dam sogs/ gser chas kho
na smos kyis mi langs pa rnams dang / gdung rabs chen mo dang/ bla chen 'phags pa rin po che'i rnam thar thang ka ngo mtshar can gyis mtshon thang ka grangs dang tshad las
'das pa zhig dang gtsug

lag khang nyams gso gsar bzhengs sogs gong lo khams so so'i rnam thar gyi gseb tshags nas thon pa rnams dang ma 'khod pa yang mang du snang ba sogs dang / mdo sngags chos sde
rnam gnyis/ mdzod gnyer sogs drung rigs/ rtse gsol dmangs gsum gyi thab kha ba/ rung lho byang / drug cu thil pa tshun gyi so so'i byed sgo bca' yig chos sde lho byang
so so'i 'dus tshogs su chos spyod/ sgrub mchod/ bskang ba gtor bzlog khag la sogs pa 'phags chen bla ma gong rnams kyi phyag len 'khrul med ji ltar bya tshul gyi phyag deb
dang / phyag gnyer sogs las khungs khag rnams la/ de dag la bsnyen bkur ji ltar bya tshul sogs mchod rgyun khag gi gtong deb dang yongs sdud kyi deb la sogs pa dang /
gzhan yang gtsug lag la khang rgya che grangs mang rnams kyi rtsis khra'i deb dang / lo zla'i mchod rgyun zhu deb la sogs pa dmus long mig phye ba lta bus dkris char brjod
gtsang gi deb rigs sogs/ mdor na de skabs dge 'dun gyi sde rnams thugs mthun khrims gtsang bshad sgrub 'phel zhing / zhabs 'bring pa rnams phyar ba zur 'degs kyi gzhung
bsam che bas stobs 'byor rgyas pa/ mnga' zhabs mi ser rnams kyang 'byor phyug kho na sogs sa skya pas khri 'khor bcu gsum dbang bsgyur zin nas/ dus phyis nga che nga btsan
gyi nga ro 'byin pa mang / chos srid gnyis char gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni da phan la ni su yang ma byung 'dug pas so/ /

dgung grangs nga lngar byon pa chu yos rgyal zla'i tshes gnyis la gnya' nang ko thang pas/ bal yul gyi gnas tshul las 'phros pa'i gsung brtag gi sa bon 'byor rgyu'i tho rengs
'od gsal du/ bud med rgan mo lus chas mchor can zhig gis/ srang dbar zhig tu byis pa chung ngu zhig bzhag nas/ phar logs thang ka zhig tu bskyod/ mo rang gzhan zhig la
dbang yon byed la 'gro rgyu'i khul la/ btsun ma zhig dang 'phrad pas/ btsun ma des rgan mo der 'dzeem nas song ba dang / byis pa thal phyur ba gsum nas khyi phrug skyes
byung tshad rdo brdungs btang nas gsod rgyu yin/ zer ba zhig 'khrungs pas/ bal yul la lho nub nas nyi ma shar ba snga mo nas 'khrungs pa'i lo rgyus dang bcas zhiib gsal du
bstsal zhing / zla mjug zhabs 'bring pa rnams la bka' 'doms kyis gnas bcu'i rten ji snyed pa rnams la rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs myur byon gyi ched du dgongs rdul
sprugs dang sbrags na bza' gsar sgron dang / rta zla'i nyar mchod 'bul rgya chen/ dge 'dun bsnyen bkur/ ngan slong sbyin gtong / brgyad stong pa dang kyai rdor sgrub mchod
dri med bshad rgyud mtshan 'don rnams dang / khyad par nyam thag phongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams thugs rje'i spyan ras kyis ma bor nas/ ngan sloong sbyin gtong ni snga phyi
kun tu grangs med rnams bka' gsang gis gdams shing / zla ba der 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can nyid tshe mtha' yas pa'i ljags bsnyen zla gang ma'i skabs dang / rje rdo rje
'chang nyid la

ltar snang tsam du zhabs 'bam dang chab bsags sogs mtha' ma'i snyun gzhi'i 'go zug pa nas bzung / rim gyis sku khams je zhan dus spyi sgos mtha' dag nas zhabs brtan sku rim
rgya cher rgyun 'khyongs mdzad dang mdzad mu'i zla sked tsam nas rje nyid kyi bka' bzhin swatstsha 'bum ther gdab pa bde mchog tu zhabs mchod rten gyi nang gzungs su 'bul
gnang dang / de'i tshe lha chen pa sogs dge 'dun 'ga' zhig la tshe lha rnam gsum gyi bsnyen sgrub/ gzhan yang gsung sgrog gtor ma sogs bka' bstsal rnams tshar phyin gnad
smin du bsgrubs pa dang / dbus kyi chos skyong khag gi lung gsal rim gro dang / mo rtsis kyi spang bla spyi dang / phyi rteen sku 'bum dang rig 'dzin pho brang / brtse
chen lha khang bcas kyi rgya skar steng du bya rog gi tshang bsags pa/ g.yas ru byang gi spyi mtsho skya mo'i mtsho sgo yang skya bo kha gdangs la zug pa/ gnod sbyin rtse'u
dmar po'i lung du/ bsod nams kyi zhing sa dam pa de/ /'od nub phyogs su 'phro bar mi 'gyur ram/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / bsam yas su bla ma dam pa'i bla shing sdong bo chen
po la zhugs rang bzhes dang / mo lung du rgyal po gdan nas bskyod pa zhes bya bas bla ma bzang po dge tshul/ gling gi mun nag g.yogs/ mo rtse ma 'then pa sogs rje nyid
dgongs pa gzhan don du gtad pa'i snga ltas shar ba'i zhabs brtan sku rim dmigs bsal rnams la 'bad 'bungs ngos/ dbo zla'i zla mjug sku rim chen mor yang ma phebs na ji ltar
lags/ zhes snyan

zhu mdzad pa'i phyir phebs su/ spyir lhag pa'i lha'i ljags bsnyen yang dag don ldan snyun gzhi thu mo de lta bur ji snyam du yang mi sems par sku srog phangs med du mdzad pa'i
'bras bu mthar phyin pa dang / yang sgos/ rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs phyis 'byung 'di bzhin mdzad mkhan rnams la sri ngan gyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir/ da lam cis
kyang phebs dgos gsungs te phur bzlog gi tshogs dbu rdo rje slob dpon gnang skabs kyang ngo mtshar rdzu 'phrul gyi mdzad pa 'di ltar mthong ste/ snyun gzhi de lta bu la ni/
'jig rteen na skye bo phal mo che drag zhan ji snyeed pa dag rnga rol me nyi sogs spang bya dang / zas spyod sogs 'phrod bsten 'dzol med bgyis kyang ngal ba 'bras med
du song ba mang zhing rje rdo rje 'chang chen pos de dag rnams la blang bya lta bur mdzad pas gnas skabs de'i tshe ci yang ma skyon khar cung zad bder song ba'i tshul gyis
gtor bzlog mthar phyin du gnang ba 'di ni/ grub pa mchog gi sa la bzhugs pa'i mdzad pa 'di lta bu'o/ /zhes skye dgu kun la 'doms par mdzad pa dang chabs cig chos kyi phyir
du sku srog phangs med de tsam du ma zad rnam pa kun tu bzhi mdo'i rtswa bzhin 'dor bar mdzad nas/ skad cig tsam yang dal bar mi bzhugs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi phar phyin
rdzogs pa'i thabs zab mo las nam yang g.yel ba med pas/ gdul bya mtha' dag la brtson 'grus kyi lcag gis bskul ba 'di las gzhan du ma dmigs lags/ ljags bsnyen gyi skabs
dge mi dge'i mtshan ma mang du

'khrungs pa ni gor ma chag kyang / rje rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni/ 'jam mgon bla mas/ chu phran rtag tu ku co che/ /rgya mtsho ca co ga la sgrog//ces gsungs pa ltar gnas skabs
dus skabs dang bstun par mdzad nas gzhan dag la cher bka' mi bstsal zhing / nyid kyi gsung las kyang / kho bo'i gsang gtam logs su 'chad par spro/ gsung mu bzhin snga
phyi kun gyi gsang 'os 'ga' zhig rje nyid las gzhan du cher ma grags so snyam zhing / 'od kyang ljags bsnyen de'i skabs zhig// mi dkar po zhig gzigs skar nas 'oongs te
rje nyid la the tshom byed nyams 'di ni/ snga mo zhig nas res me phung du sprul res mi gzugs su byas te 'ong skad thos pa de'i cho 'phrul zhig yin 'dra zhing / me phung du
byung ba'i tshe gzhan thabs gang gis kyang kho mi 'gro zhing / rje nyid nas rtag chad mtha' bral dbu ma chen po'i dbyings su mnyam par bzhag 'phral me phung de gzigs skar
la song ba zhig snga mo nas byung ba dang / yang dngos nyams dang 'od gsal 'dres pa lta bu'i ngang du rje nyid kyi gzim mal drung du mtho 'tsham byed mi ban gzugs can
zhig byung ba la/ de ma thag rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i thugs rgyal gyis sna tshogs rdo rje gnod byed de'i mgo bor snun par mdzad pas/ kho dus chos su gyur pa zhig 'khrungs
pa ni rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan srid la gnod cing 'tshe bar byed pa'i rgyal 'gong zhig mo brtag sogs su byung ba de bsgral bar mdzad pa ni the tshom dang bral/ gang
ltar phur bzlog

sbyin sreg zhag bdun ma bcas thugs brtson che bskyed ngal ba khyad bsad 'phags chen byang sems chen po'i rnam thar ngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i sgo nas/ gegs med mthar phyin du
mdzad de/ gzim chung gzhi lam 'bras dus smin grol dpal 'bar du gsung bskang smin rgyas thog/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dga' ston rgya chen po la rol bar gnang zhing / mgul ba
bkra shis pa'i lha'i reg bya khyad mtshar can dag gis spras nas/ gzim chung der mchis pa'i 'phral gyi nye mkhor thugs tshags mdzad pa rnams kyang so sor ngo sprod sogs mdzad
de/ sku'i 'phrod bzhes la lhing chags gnad bsnun mdzad rgyu'i dgongs rtse mngon du gtod par gnang ste/ nag zla'i tshes gcig nas tshoms dmar mkha' spyod du phyag legs
par phebs/ 'phrod bzhes rnams dang / spyi sgos nas zhabs pad yun brtan gyi bgyi ba mtha' dag 'bad pa chen pos zhus kyang / sems can las ngan spyod pa la/ /sangs rgyas kyis
kyang ci byar yod/ /ces gsungs pa bzhin/ las ngan dus su bdo ba'i sems can gyi spyod pa ma rungs pa rnams la rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyang thugs khrel nas dgongs pa gzhan
du gtad pa la mngon du phyogs te/ res ni sku khams kyang star chags dang / res ni rje zhan bcas sku byugs/ gsol sman/ gsol zas/ sku rim rnams 'thus la shor bar bka' drin
che skabs rnams su'ang skal ldan rnams la rjes gnang zab mo'i rigs sum cu kha par/ dud sol ma'i be'u bum gyi ljags lung sogs dang / khyad par zhal ngo rnams

kyi dbu g.yas phyag gnyer sogs drag bsdus ji snyed par bzhugs khri pad ma can gyi steng nas rnam sras ser chen gyi rjes gnang gzab mo'i thog nas stsol ba'i tshe/ so sor 'byung
'gyur hur bskyed mdzad dgos kyi bka' 'ang grol ba dgongs gsal ltar dang / gzhan yang stod smad kyi bla tshogs ji snyed par bka' slob sngar bas kyang zhib rgyas 'byung
'gyur dang bcas/ spyi sger dad can rnams la mjal phyag zhabs 'chags/ bka' stsom/ gsung bris/ rnam sras bskang 'phrin/ sku rim gyi ljags bkod/ gnod sbyin 'khor lo mang po'i
sgrub pa/ rje nyid kyi 'dra sku rin po che byes log gzhis brtan ces rje nyid nas mtshan gsol zhing / dar gling grub dbang la ma bstsal bar 'jam mgon mchog la bstsal ba'ang
/ de'i rten 'brel gyis rjes su mang mkhar nas sa skyar byon thub pa yin snyam du kho bo sems pa sogs la phyag nas rgyas pa/ las bzhi'i sbyin sreg phyag rdor gtum po'i
dug dbyung rgyun ring bar/ ring mo'i dus nas rje nyid kyi thugs dgongs thun mong ma yin pa gro bzhin badzra ki la ya'i sgrub mchod thog 'grems par mdzad rgyu'i nor phreng
phye phur sogs gos bzang dgu las grub pa'i mchod rdzas 'di rnams bka' gdams shing / spyan lam du'ang gzigs su gsol ba/ sde dge gnyer chen mgon tsher lugs zung gi bdag
rkyen yang dag pa'i rgyal sras mchog la khab bzhes skor sogs phyi nang gsang ba'i bka' bstsal du ma sogs/

snyun babs lci mo de lta'i gnas skabs su'ang / ngo mtshar dang bcas bstan mkhas kyi mdzad pas dus 'das rjes/ ma 'ongs mngon sum du gzigs te/ tshoms dmar mkha' spyod sogs bkod
legs kyi bka' 'doms ni/ spur zhu'i gnas dang/ pho brang la zhig gso'i skabs sku chas 'jog par dgos so/ /zhes gsung rgyur gor ma chag de nas kha'u sman chab la phebs byams
thog sku bskyod kyi tshe kun rar drag bsdus rnams nas rje nyid la mjal dar bstan pa'i tshe'ang bka' gsang so sor grol mur/ lha bris dbu byed la/ kho bo'i 'dra sku mang
du bzhengs dgos yong bas ngos kyi gdong la yang dag ltos shig ces bka' bstsal/ kha'ur dga' bo chu tshan chab bdugs skabs kyang sku khams res 'jog kho na dang / thog steng
du snga dro lha bsangs/ sengge sgra/ chab

klu bcas rgyal khams lo rim la chad du dgongs te rtag par gnang / snron zla'i lha mo mchod kyang rngo chu'i steng du ji bzhin gnang rgyu'i tho rengs sku khams shin tu nyog
pa de'i tshe dpal ldan lha mo nyid kyi zhal dngos su bstan nas lung bstan mang du bstsal mthar/ gzim lugs de ltar ma mdzad par krong gis dbu sngas la sku rgyab gtad de gzim
na mgul glo chung ba yang yong / zhes kyang gsungs pa dang / de nas nyin gcig sa skyar bzhugs tshe'ang bzhi thog ser khang steng du lo rim ched du dgongs pa'i lha bsangs
sengge sgra/ chab klu sogs thams cad kyang 'phags chen byang chub sems dpa' bdag bas gzhan gces kyi rnam thar lhur bzhes kho nas dus 'da' bar mdzad pa ni deng sang kun
gyi thugs gsal ltar dang / de'i sang nas mang khar sman chab la phebs lam sgrol ma lha khang la gnas gzigs dang g.yas bskor gyis zhal mjal phyag dbang sogs bkag med phebs
byams thog nas stsol bzhin par shel phrel la brgyud rgan mo kha dron zhes par bzhugs/ nyin de ni/ sa skya'i thad nas lho nub phyogs su 'ja' dkar po shing sdong chen po
la 'dab ma rgyas pa lta bu zhig dang/ me tog gi char nyil ba sogs kun gyi mig gi bdud rtsir byung ba dang/ gzhan yang lha kha ma sogs kyis dpa' bo mkha' 'gros gdan 'dren
mdzad kyin 'dug zer ba sogs byung zhing/ de'i sang thub bstan dge 'phel dar gling sogs nas ser phreng gis mdun bsus te/ dge 'phel du gsol tsha'i thog zhabs tog rgya cher
bsgrubs shing/ rim gyis chab bdugs skabs kyang sku khams thog mar res 'jog dang/ de nas je zhan bcas gnas der yang gdul bya spyi bye brag gi skal ba dang 'tsham pa'i mdzad
pa ni sus kyang bzlog med du bka' drin bskyangs shing/ lhag par yul phyogs des mtshon rgyal khams bde skyid la phan pa'i lha bsangs/ sengge sgra/ chab klu sogs nyin re
bzhin rtag par mdzad pas lo legs pa dang / phyi lo chu bzang ba sogs rgyal ba'i mdzad pa nyi shar spar mos mi khebs pa'i dpe bzhin kun gyis gleng ba 'di bzhin dang / senggee
sgra sogs

gnang ba'i tshe nyin re bzhin sbrul mang po sku'i gan du 'ong ba dang / rtsig pa'i gseng nas sbrul chung ngu mang po rje nyid kyi phyogs su mgo btegs nas 'dug ste slar gsung
chog grol nas gar song med pa ltar nyin ltar byung ba'ang der yod kun la rgyus yod cing / de dus bla brang zhabs pad/ shel rdzong / lha rtse rdzong / mang mkhar khul gyi
drag zhan mtha' yas pa sogs nas kyang chab gsos kyi legs skyes tshar du dngar ba dang / zhabs pad yun brtan gyi gsol 'debs zhus shing / dza lung mthu stobs dpal 'byor nas
kyang dug dbyung dang tshe dbang chag med du phul/ gseng 'bar rnams la gang gi rigs sras dam pa 'jam mgon gong ma rin po che nas gro bzhin badzra ki la ya'i sgrub mchod
skabs/ legs bshad kyi bdud rtsi stsol bar mdzad rgyu'i sngon 'gro'i mtshams sbyor ljags rtsom du mdzad pa 'di ni/ rtogs brjod rin po che 'di'i phyi mo lta bu shar ba dang
/ ljags rtsom gyi phyi ma rang yin lags/ de nas phebs te thub bstan dge 'phel du bzhugs nas rje btsun rin po che'i snang brnyan lung bstan sku 'dra rin po che'i drung
/ de'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang sbrags rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs rin po che srid mtha'i bar du byon nas bstan 'gro'i mgon po mchog tu 'gyur ba'i thugs bskyed rgyal
sras kun tu bzang po'i ngang tshul can du mdzad pa dang mnyam du/ sku de sku pang du gdan 'dren skabs rje nyid la ring bsres gnyis tsam byon zhing / mgon khang rten rnams
dang tshar chen rin po che'i snang

brnyan sogs la'ang gong gi mtshams sbyor de bzhin du/ tshogs bdag kyang mdzad cing / de'i nub mo ni sku khams ches cher nyog cing / tho rengs kyi char gsung lhang lhang gi
mur rje btsun rin po che phebs byung bzhugs stan things gsungs pa dang / yang skabs 'gar rje btsun rin po che gdan 'dren zhus shig gsungs pa dang / skabs 'gar dza lung pa
sku mdun du myur du gdan 'dren zhus gsungs pa sogs 'khrungs snang mtha' yas pa'i mur 'byams/ de nas gzhi bdag sho dmar bar gsol mchod dang bcas sngar gyi rgan mo kha dron
du bzhugs/ de'i sang 'phrang phur bzhugs dus rlung chen po ldang ba sogs 'tshub nyams kyang 'ga' zhig byung zhing / de nyin gza' skar yang 'dzom pa bcas rje nyid kyi rtogs
brjod rin po che dbu tshugs tsam zin bris phran bu zhig mdzad pa ni/ 'di dang 'di lta bu dgos so zhes 'doms par mdzad pa yin grags/ de'i sang snron zla sngon ma'i nyer
drug nyin lhun grub sding du zhal ngo rnams dang / chos zhu ba sku drag rnams bcas nas chibs bsus/ mnga' zhabs kyi gzhas/ ser phreng sogs legs lam bzang po dang bcas gdan
sa chen po'i gzhi thog pho brang du phebs skabs/ khyad 'phags byang gi them skas la 'khyel bzhugs yun ring tsam mdzad nas/ skye dgu kun zhal dkyil la longs spyod du 'jug
par mdzad de gzhi thog pho brang du phyag legs par phebs nas/ sku ngo tshang ma zhal rgyas thog gang ci'i phyi nang gsang ba dus gsum gyi gnas tshul dang

bcas ji bzhin gsungs pa dang / phyag gnyer gsol gzim mchod sogs gzhan ma rnams la'ang gnang cha gya nom pa dang bcas so sor snga phyi bar gyi gsung gleng ji bzhin mdzad de/
dus gtor sogs la thugs gzhol ba'i skabs so/ /de dag kyang rnam thar bsdus pa las/ bstan 'gro'i don du sku srog phangs med btang / /dgra 'dre gdug rtsub byams dang snying
rjes bskyangs/ /'khrul snang a 'thas rdzun gtibs kun 'dar dang / /kun bzang rang dbang thob la gsol ba 'debs/ /ces gsungs pa ltar ro/ /snron zla phyi ma'i tshes gcig bar
du thugs dam nyams bzhes rnams chag med dang / spyi sgos nas zhabs pad yun brtan gyi gsol 'debs/ gsung bris/ zhal bkod sogs kyi skabs su'ang gdul bya'i blo sna 'khrid pa'i
phyir du/ rje rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi sku la skyon mi yong ba'i gsung 'ba' zhig snga phyi kun tu byon pa dang / khyad par gzim chung skor gyi rten rnams sku mdun
du spyan drangs/ re re nas phyag bzhes kyis sngon byon dang rje nyid kyi phyag babs rnams so sor ngo sprod dang / bla ma gong ma'i rten sgam rnams kyang zhal phye nas
so sor 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba'i ngo sprod sogs mdzad mu'i srod tho rengs kyi cha 'ga' zhig gsung dar dir gyi ngang du/ sa skyar phebs dus na bza' gzab ma dang bcas phebs
dgos gsungs pa dang / nged kyis sa zhu kha gsar gsum brtsegs su bzhes yod gsungs pa dang / rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan zhes yang yang gsungs pa dang / rje
btsun rin po che grags pa

rgyal mtshan byon nas dbang skur kyin 'dug gsung mur thugs zag med kyi bde bar 'byams pa sogs ni dngos su mthong thos su gyur lags/ tshes gcig gi nyin rje rdo rje 'chang chen
po nyid kyi dbu bla rnams la mchod bsham rgyas pa dang / dbu sngas kyi gsol lcog steng du yab rje rdo rje 'chang bsod namasarin chen gyi byin rten 'ga' zhig dang / khyad
'phags nas ma skyes dgra'i gdung skal sangs rgyas kyis 'phel gdung sogs spyan 'dren mdzad/ tshes gnyis kyi tho rengs kyi char sngar mu bzhin bzhes thug zhus pa yang gsol
bar ma gnang nas/ 'o da thugs dam lam dus kyi nyams bzhes la 'jug go gsungs nas/ lam dus rgyas pa gnang ste mi bskyod pa chu dbang gi snying ga yan chad gang / shes rab
ye shes kyi dbang thob/ ces yang yang bskyar zlos kyi tshul du thugs bde nyams dang bcas gsung mur/ rgyun ring 'das rjes rje btsun gong ma'i byin phye dang / sangs rgyas
'phel gdung sogs bzhes te/ rtag 'dzin can rnams chos la bskul ba dang / le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la bskul ba'i phyir/ nyi dro'i dus su gzugs sku 'od gsal chos dbyings
su bsdu ba'i tshul bstan pa'i mod nyid la/ nam mkha' g.ya' dag pa'i khrod du 'ja' dkar po me tog rgyas pa'i dbyibs can dang / me tog gi char mang po rgyun ring bar babs
shing / thugs dam zab mo'i nyams bzhes gsal 'debs sogs mdzad sgo rnams kyang ji bzhin 'jam mgon gong ma mchog gi bka' 'doms kyis mdzad nas/ yar

ngo'i dga' ba gsum pa'i nam langs bar la sku spur la skyon gyi rnam pa ye ma bzhes pa'i ngo mtshar dang bka' drin lhan cig tu che ba dang/ nam langs nas dri bzang gi phye mas
byugs pa'i sku spur zangs nang du spyan drangs pa de mchod 'phreng yongs bsu sogs dang bcas tshoms dmar mchod rdzas mang po'i dbus su gdan 'dren gyis/ chos sde rnam gnyis/
drung skya ser/ rin sgang/ chos lhun pa sogs nas sku spur yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher byin rlabs sogs zhu bar mdzad rjes/ mkhan rin po che/ dbu byed rnam gsum/
grwa tshang mchod dpon bcas nas kyai rdo rje'i dus mtha'i chog smin rgyas kyi thog nas byin zar zhu sbyangs mdzad 'phral/ zhugs rang bzhes lta bu'i ngo mtshar gyi tshe'ang
nam mkha' 'ja' dang me tog gi char sogs ni kun gyi mig lam du gsal zhing/ de nyin sku gdung zhu sbyangs zin 'phral nas bzung klu rnams kyis kyang zim char rtag par 'bebs
par byed/ de nas dgung zhag nam rdzogs par 'jam mgon zhal rnam pa gnyis nas 'khor lo bde mchog nag po'i lugs rdul dkyil gyi steng nas bdun phrag re'i mtshams su dkyil 'khor
gshegs gsol dang bcas zhal phye bar mdzad/ bde mchog tu a Ni'i drung dung btsun mor kun skyid lags nas kyang dgongs rdzogs sgrub mchod dang/ rje btsun drung 'chi med
bstan pa'i nyi ma nas mkha' spyod rdo rje btsun mo'i sgrub mchod kyang de bzhin/ gang gi dngos slob yar klungs mchog sprul dang/ bco brgyad sku mched bcas nas kyang/

kyai rdor dang kun rig gi sgrub mchod/ chos sde lho byang 'dus tshogs res skor gyis kun rig bde kyai gsang gsum/ 'jigs byed phur pa gur drag sogs kyi sgrub mchod dang yang
chos sde rnam gnyis/ chos lhun/ rin sgang/ sngags drug sogs nas bdun phrag gnyis kyi ring bla mchod/ smon lam/ gsol 'debs le tshan rnams la rtag 'grus sogs dgongs pa zab
mo rdzogs thabs rgya che rgyun 'khyongs su mdzad skabs spyi sger nas bsnyen bkur zab pa/ mang ja brgya mchod/ stong mchod/ snyan shal sogs grangs bstsal zhing/ dgung zhag
thim nyin kyang rtse shod nas mchod pa bsnyen bkur bla na med pa sogs mdzad skabs rnams su'ang nam mkha' dwangs shing 'ja' 'od 'khyil ba dang/ me tog gi char ni rtag par
khor mo yug dang lo ltar dus dran gyi thog tu'ang 'bab par byed do/ /gzhan yang/ dbus gtsang mnga' ris lho phyogs dang bcas pa'i grub mtha' ris med dgon bzhi brgya brgal
tsam la mang ja/ bsngo rten/ spyi 'gyed dngul srang brgya dang lnga bcu ri ba nas gnyis gsum ri ba'i bar du 'dus pa mang nyung dang bstun pa dang/ ngor gong mus bkra shis
chos sde sogs rang lugs kyi dgon chen 'ga' zhig tu dmigs bsal gyi dgongs rdzogs sgrub mchod dgos cha yon sogs bzang por bstabs shing/ gzhan yang rgyal dbang rin po cher
gtsos ldan gyi tshan bcu gnyis/ khri chen la de bzhin brgyad/ bstan rgyas gling du mchog sprul rin po cher bzhi/ bka' shag lhan du de bzhiin/ phur lcog lo

sems dpa'/ 'on rgyal sras/ sle lung/ smin gling/ dngos grub sding/ dza lung pa/ bsam sding rje btsun sogs la re re/ bla brang mchog tu thams cad mkhyen gzigs rin po cher drug
phyag mdzod du bzhi sogs gshegs rdzong che phra'ang mang du stob par gnang/ de rnams kyis gtsos gzhis byes mtha' dag nas dngos po bzang dgu mtha' yas pa'i gdung 'bul kyang
phul/ gdung rus rnams gzim chung du spyan drangs te rgyun ring bar 'jam mgon zhal rnam gnyis rje btsun drung sogs nas gsol 'debs bla mchod sogs mdzad/ de nas gdung rus
rnams las rang byon sogs yod pa 'ga' zhig ma gtogs/ tshang ma btul nas satstsha 'bum brgal tsam dang/ bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems chos srung nor lha dang bcas
pa'i sku par grangs mang 'debs par mdzad skabs/ dngul srang chig stong brgya re bdun zho drug gser srang brgyad cu gya brgyad dang zho phyed brgyad sogs las grub pa'i dngul
gdung rin po che phra rgyan gyis spras pa dang/ 'dra sku rin po che gsar bskrun ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi dang bye brag de dus kyi tho gsal bzhin gyis phyur te/ 'jam
mgon gong ma zhal rnam gnyis kyi dbus/ mkhan rin po che sogs ban tshang 'dus tshogs bcas nas rab tu gnas pa'i me tog gis byin rlabs kyi gzi brgya 'bar bar mdzad/ de nas thang
ston/ 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma'i sgrub mchod/ rab dbye/ kha skong / rnam 'grel gzhung skyor ser 'du bcas dus dran

thog rgyun 'dzugs sogs dgongs pa rdzogs thabs mtha' yas pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i gdung rgyud rnams sku tshe srid mthar brtan pa dang/ mdzad 'phrin phyir rje rdo rje 'chang de
nyid kyi dgongs bzhed bzhin/ lha chen sprul pa'i khyams stod kyi gser khri chen mo'i rgyab kyi rgyal ba tshe mtha' yas pa'i snang brnyan rgya dngul rdo tshad brgya rtsar
nyer ba las grub pa ngo mtshar can gzungs dang phra rgyan sogs/ de dus zin bris bzhin dang bcas/ rab tu gnas pa'i me tog gi char gyi byin mthu can du 'grub pa 'di sogs/
'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can sku mched dang / 'phrin las kyis kha lo bsgyur ba po mdzod pa grwa tshang pa kun dga' phun tshogs la sogs pa nas yang dag par 'bad med lhun
grub kyi dge mtshan la brten rgyal bstan spyi dang bye brag brtse chen snying po'i lung rtogs kyi bstan pa yar zla ltar 'phel zhing / bstan 'dzin gyi skyes chen dam pa rnams
sku tshe bde ldan mgoon po'i rang bzhin du grub ste 'gro rnams bde skyid rdzogs ldan dga' ston la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /'dir smras pa/ rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse
nus mthu kun/ /gcig bsdus rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs pa/ /sa chen rdo rje 'chang dngos kun bla zhes/ /dus phyis sa bstan skyong la khyed 'dra ba'i/ /'gro mgon ma
mchis yod na de nyid gang / /gang sku zhi dul lhun ltar brjid chags shing / /gang gsung mdo rgyud rgya mtsho'i mgrin snyan can/ /gang thugs zab cing brling la rtogs dka'
ba/ /de dag tshur mthong rnams kyi snang ngo ste/ /don

dam rgyal ba'ii ye shes las gzhan gang / /des na 'di nas byang chub snying po'i bar/ /brtse chen khyed las skyabs gzhan ma mchis pas/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas dus 'dir tshe mthar
phyin/ /rigs rgyud dri med rgyun chad med byon nas/ /sa skya pa yi chos srid dge mtshan rnams/ /'phral dang yun du rgyas pa'i dge legs stsol/ /zhes kyang smras so//2 dbang
sdud snying po/de ltar sa chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' blo gros de nyid kyi rgyal bstan spyi bye'i phan bde'i gzhi rtsa skabs der gdung rgyud sku rkyang la thug par
gong smos bzhin gangs ljongs skyes chen che phra du mas gsol btab ngor/ bdag mo chos lung ma bgres gzhon gnyis bzhes pa las bgres bar rje btsun tshe 'dzin dpal rgyas bu khrid
dam rab tu byung ba'i mtshan tshul khrims dpal rgyas dbang mor grags pa de nyid yum bcas gzhon nu la gshegs shing / bdag mo chung lung ma skal bzang bde skyong bu khrid
las/ gdung sku mched gnyis 'khrungs pa las/ gceng po bdag chen dpal ldan chos skyong ngam dbang sdud snying po zhes mtshan snyan srid mthar khyab pa de nyid ni/ nges
