rar grags pa 'di lta bu gzigs te lung bstan du ma brnyes pa yin te/ nyid kyi gsung las kyang / mgon po'i lho nub mtshams nas gdan drangs pa'i/ zhes dang / gzhan yang thugs
dam 'od gsal sogs su lung bstan sngon gnas rjes dran gyi sku skye du mar zhal gyis bzhes pa yin te/ nyid mdzad rnam thar zhal gsung ma las/ phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba sras
bcas kyi/ /mthu stobs drag rtsal yang snying kun gyi bcud/ /gcig bsdus gdod nas rang grol rnal 'byor pa/ /ngag dbang dpal ldan chos skyong zhes grags pa'i/ /skyes mchog
dpal bo sngon tshe 'phags yul du/ /rnam 'dren kun blo'i zhal bzhes lung bstan ltar/ /grub thob guhya'i lus blangs bag chags kyis/ /da lta thams cad brdung btsog 'di 'dra
byung / /grub chen nag po spyod pa zhes grags pas/ /bla ma'i bka' bcag spyod pa mang du byas/ /de yi las kyis da lta smyon par skyees/ /gzhan yang chos rgyal dri med kun
ldan gyi/ /las su blangs pa'i shugs kyis da lta yang / /'dzin chags ser sna mi shes nor rdzas 'thor/ /sngon tshe phru gu ming sring bud med rnams/ /sbyin par btang ba'i
dge ba'i 'phen shugs kyis/ /da lta ring myug lci sogs mang du byung / /gnya' khri btsan po lus blangs bag chags kyis/ /da lta 'gyogs byams 'dod pa 'di 'dra byung / /padma

mar pa lo tsA bgyis pa'i 'phen shugs kyis/ /da lta ras rkyang spyod 'dod 'di 'dra byung / /kun rin lus blangs 'phen shugs ma rdzogs pas/ /da lta dka' spyad sdug 'khur 'di 'dra
byung / /sgar chen lus blangs 'phen shugs ma rdzogs pas/ /da lta 'grul la 'dod pa 'di bzhin byung / /bsod nams rin chen skyes pa'i bag chags kyis/ /da lta lus gcong che
ba 'di 'dra byung / /gong smos kun gyi skye ba yin khul gyis/ /yin yin mang po khas len smyon pa nged/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ thugs dam 'od gsal gyi ngang du mnyam par
bzhag pa las/ bla ma dang yi dam gyi lha yi lung bstan pa bzhin don la gnas pa yin te/ sngon byon sngags 'chang chen po dang a mes zhabs sogs skyes chen dam pa du mas 'khrungs
rabs dus mtshungs dang / ma mtshungs pa'i rgya bod kyi mkhas grub phal che ba'i sku skye yin tshul gsungs pa sogs dang tshul mtshungs par sems/ da lta'i sku skye ba
'dir sa chen kun blos dgung grangs nyer dgu tsam nas khab bzhes mdzad de/ gdung rabs myur byon gyi sku rim thabs dang rten 'brel du ma gnang yang lo gcig lhag tsam la gsang

khang sa chen

sku 'dra rin po cher yab yum gyis phyag gnang ste/ yab kyis yum la rteen bshad gnang rtsis kyis/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ zhes sogs bkra shis tshigs
bcad gsum sngon 'gro'i rten bshad mdzad skabs sku 'dra rin po che gzhan las gsal zhing dgyes nyams che ba zhig 'khrungs/ yang lcags 'brug lo mgon po'i chos skor mkhan chen
chos bkra shis sogs zhal slob 'ga' zhig la stsol ba'i tshe/ khyab bdag dgon gsar ba chen po sngags 'chang bsod nams chos 'phel gyis rje nyid la dbugs dbyung gzengs bstod
pa dang bcas sa skya pa'i gdung rabs 'byon par lung bstan pa dang / yang lcags sbrul lo rdor brag rig 'dzin chen po'i lung bstan gdung rabs myur 'byoon sku rim du/ grwa
lnga dang dmar po skor gsum gyi sku par grangs mang dang / de dag ni sku gang legs bzhengs dgos babs pa bzhin/ grwa lnga lugs sku rnams sde dger yon sbyar gyis zhus/ gong
gi sku par grangs mang de dag dang gdung rabs myur 'byon ched dmar pooo skor gsum bzhengs rgyu'i bca' sgrig la rten 'brel rang 'grig lta bur/ de dag gis mtshon sku par
mang po de sngon nas gsar blugs grub 'phral yin pa bzhin/ brgya stong sogs phyag btab grangs mang dang / sku rgyur byin rlabs rten 'dam mtshal sogs dbang rdzas dmar poo
sna 'dzoms 'jim gtsang la byin rlabs mdzad pa dang bsres te tshoms bar mgon khang du/ tshul khrims bkra shis sogs nas shin tu gsang bar bzhengs te/ thun mong dang

thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs bcas snron zla'i 'gor grub 'phral rje nyid kyis phyag nas tshar gcig dang / chos las pa bstan 'dzin rin cheen gyis brgya tshar mdzad/ gzhan yang
gdung rabs myur 'byon ched mang mkhar thub bstan dge 'phel du lho byang dge 'dun brgyad grwas/ rje btsun rin po che'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'phrin 'chol sogs zla gcig
ring bgyis shing / zla mjug brtse chen lha khang rgya cher bskrun par mdzad pa dang / de sngon nas sde dge zhu chen rin po ches/ gzim chung 'phrod min yang brtag ngos gdung
rgyud myur 'byon gang ci'i mtshams la thugs bsam che bskyed dgos tshul gnang bzhin/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang gi gzim chung 'chi med rdo rje'i gur khang rgya bskyed de/

de rjes rdo rje phur pa'i ras dkyil sgrub mchod kyang mdzad pas byin chags shing thugs bag phebs pa byung gsungs/ skabs shig spyan ltas su/ dpon po ri'i rtse nas lha

slar 'byung sa khyi lo rje nyid nas

rigs sras dam pa nyi zla zung la rnam sras rigs chen bco lnga'i rjes gnang stsol skabs mdzod 'dzin kun dga' phun tshogs kyis thugs rgyud bskul ba ltar/ dngul bre chen brgya
rtsa sogs rje btsun sa skya pa'i thebs su gan mdzod 'dir 'jog par mdzad pa dang / nang ltar na khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i gdung rgyud rin po che myur du zhal gzigs kyi
brdar gor ma chag/ gro bzhin zla nang tsam la spyan ltas su/ pu trar 'phrin 'chol dmigs phug mdzad tshe chu lug nang gdung rgyud rin po che 'byon par lung bstan pa dang
dus mtshungs/ 'dar grang mkhan chen ngag dbang shes rab nas kyang thub bstan dge 'phel du/ gdung rabs myur 'byon gyi gsol 'debs nan tan mdzad pa'i mnal lam du/ 'jam dbyangs
kyi bris sku zhig gi gras la byis pa chung ngu dar dang rin po ches brgyan pa zhig kyang byung ba bzhin/ gdung rgyud phebs ngo shin tu chee ba 'khrungs shing / gzhan
yang gro bzhin nang rje nyid nas nang sor 'phrin 'chol zhag gcig ma dang / khrums zla'i bcu bzhi nas bzung gta' gtor zur brgyad pa 'dzugs gnang dang chabs cig 'phrin 'chol

dus gtor bzung ba gnang ba yin te gang gi rnam thar zhal gsung ma las kyang / mi bzung dgu bzung yab rje kun blos bzung / /thugs rje bzlog med lcags kyus bzung ba'i khar/ /mi
byed dgu byed pu tra zer ba khos/ /byed rgyu thams cad zad nas nga 'dra ba/ /mangs shos sdug shos rdzii 'tshub 'di 'dra zhig /chu mo lug la 'khon gyi gdung du bskyal/
/zhes gsungs pa'i don yang 'di bzhin dang / lo rgyus 'di la dpags na/ dpal sa skya'i chos srung las mgon po chen po nyid kyis snyigs dus kyi bstan srid la dmu 'gong dam sri

ris 'phel rgyas gling gi grwa pa rnams la mjal phyag gnang ba'i nub mo 'od gsal du/ sa chen gyi sku zhal byang gzigs shin tu dgyes nyams can 'dzum zhing gsung 'byon la khad

de tshugs par mdzad pa'i spyan 'dren dang bstun/ kha'u phyogs nas kha ba bu yug 'tshub pa sogs lha 'go ba'i rtags dang bcas/ gsung bskang yongs rdzogs nyin khongs su grub par

gnang mu'i dgu'i srod 'khor tsam nas bzung / kha ba cung zad 'bab mur sku gdung rin po che bltams ran pas/ rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid thugs lhag par spro ba'i ngang nas rgyal
tshing sogs de skabs kyi zhabs phyi rnams la bsrung 'khor/ srid pa ho'i tsakli bcas 'dogs par mdzad pa dang / gang la gang dgos sngags dang rtsis sman nas bshad pa'i nyer
mkho mtha' dag 'du mdzad cing / yum la'ang gang ci'i bka' 'doms lhus 'thing zhib lhug stsol rjes/ rtsa ba'i bla ma dam pa dang dbyer med rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal
mtshan dang / sangs rgyas sman bla/ rje btsun sgrol ma rnams la thugs smon gsol 'debs rtse gcig tu mdzad kyin bzhugs pas/ de yang rab byung bcu gsum pa'i nang tshan
nyi ma zhes pa chu mo lug gi lo/ bdag cag gi ston pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs te/ dpal ldan 'bras spungs su chos rgyal zla ba sogs la khyab bdag dus kyi 'khor
lo'i rtsa ba'i rgyud gsungs pa'i dus chen dang nye bar nag zla'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes dgu'i srod yol tsam la sngar gyi kha ba char du gyur nas ches cher nyil

ba dang chabs cig yum la gnod pa med par bde bar sku bltams pa'i gtam bzang yab rje rdo rje 'chang gi snyan du sgron ma thag dga' dgu yus pa'i rnam pa dang ldan bzhin du na
bza'i khrod nas dbu zhwa gang thebs bsnams shig pas kha gsar spus legs shig phyag tu son pa de bzhes/ de dus gnas bcur kha btags mang po skya nyog ge mchis pa'i khrod nas
rje btsun rin po che'i snang brnyan gsar bzhengs dang / lung bstan sgrol ma zung la snyan shal/ yum sras la bstsal rgyu'i kha btags mdzod rnying spus legs 'ba' zhig phyag
thebs rnams bsnams nas byon pas/ sngon gyi bla ma gong ma rnams dang cha 'dra bar gsung 'byon la khad lta bur spyan gnyis rje nyid la dwangs gsal sgrib med du gzigs shugs
che bar bzhugs pas/ rje nyid kyi thugs dgongs la sngar rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan pa'i rtsa ba gdung rabs rin po che 'byon dka' ba de tsam gyi thugs 'khur bzod par
mdzad nas/ gang ci'i thad la 'on seng 'gyod med mdzad pa phyag thog tu khel ba 'di'ang bla ma dkon mchog gi thugs rje nyag gcig tu 'khum pas bslu med rten 'brel gyi chos

/ sras yum zhal rgyas la'ang mgul dar 'bras dkar gyi me tog nyil bzhin par phar phyin drug gi bkra shis kyi mnga' gsol yang bka' drin che/ de nub yab rje thugs spro ches
pas 'od gsal yer ba ltar

ba dang / mgon khang khag bzhi khyad par nang sor rtag gtor gsar 'dzugs/ gtang rag sogs rgya cher mdzad tshul sogs gong 'og 'di rnams kyi zhib pa gong yab rje'i rnam thar bzhin

la rten 'brel rab la sgrig mi dgos zer ba de 'di yin dgongs pa 'khrungs shing / gzim chung rtser lha bsangs dang / de nas rnam 'joms sbyangs khrus tshe chog lo gtor

drin che nas/ khrums zla'i gza' tshes dge ba nas nyer bsdog mdzad nas 'khrungs ston mdos chen gzab res mdzad tshul rnams gong yab rje'i rnam thar bzhin dang shing sprel gsar

par lha mo rje khol gyi mdos sogs mdzad pas nyams nyes che bar ma gyur/ dgung grangs bcu phrag gcig tu phebs par ji skad du/ rnam thar tshigs bcad gong 'phros las/ lo
bcu pa la rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis rgyugs/ /de nas bzung ste bcu drug ma lon par/ /yab yum gnas slob rnams kyi thugs rje las/ /phur sgrub la sogs sgrub mchod thams cad dang
/ /dbyar dgun chos thog bka' bzhi rnam 'grel sogs/ /bshad grwa skor gyi rgyugs sprod mang sprad nas/ /chos thog rnams la bshad pa mang du rgyab/ /gzhan

yang chos spyod bskang ba mang du sbyangs/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ sa zla'i mjug bas se tA la sbo shog thu'i gsung mngags zhib cha bcas/ bla ma sangs rgyas don grub dpon g.yog
'byor pa rje nyid ril sgrub bcad rgya dang 'grig pas zhag 'ga' sgugs thogs nas/ rten 'brel rab la sgrig mi dgos par 'grig pa ni/ snron zla'i tshes gnyis la 'jam mgon khams
gsum dbang 'dus nyid kyai rdo rje'i rgyud 'don la thog mar phebs dus bla ma dpon g.yog la 'byor phyag thog khong tsho'i mgul la bkra shis pa'i lha dar phul ba dang /
gzhan yang tshoms chen du lam 'bras bla brgyud gos yol sogs rgyan 'grems/ sku ngo rnams dang / lha sde mi sde bcas bas zhabs brtan legs 'bul drung 'khor gyi gzhas sogs rgya
cher mdzad pa dngos dod kyang / lo rgyus gsal ba mi snang / tshes gsum nyin sprul pa'i lha khang chen mo/ zab pa'i yang rtse bla ma'i rnal 'byor nyams bzhes pa mdo sngags
tshogs yongs kyi dbu rjer yang yab sras byon thog dam tshig 'gyur med bas se phyag rdor skyabs kyi gsung shog rten gya nom pas thog drangs/ maNDal gyis gtsos dngul bre
chen mang po'i 'bul chen mdzad pa sogs dge legs rten 'brel bzang po rab 'byams rgyal ba'i zhing khams su'ang khyab cing grub par gyur to/ /de rjes lo de'i gro bzhin zla
bar 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan 'chang nyid dpal chen badzra ki la ya'i sgrub mchod skabs/ tshogs dbu thog mar phebs te gar 'cham sogs cho ga phyag len thams cad kun gyi yid
'phrog par mdzad pa dang / khrums zla'i tshes

brgyad la phun gling dbang khang du yab rje dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i rigs bdag mchog nas/ gsang chen bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi gtso bo rje btsun sa skya pa'i yab chos dri ma
med pa bcom ldan snying po kyai rdo rje'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du sku tshe 'dir rags pa'i phung khams skye mched rnams lha dang ye shes kyi ngo bor bskyed cing gsal
'debs pa dang sbyang gzhi sbyong byed ngo 'phrod pa'i smin byed dbang gi chu bos smin par mdzad de rtsa sngags bzlas lung bcas bstsal ba gsan cing / dgung grangs bcu gcig
du phebs pa chu sbrul lor yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid sku phreng 'tshub pas lo gang phyir phebs spangs nas bzhugs skabs/ dag snang du zi gu lha khang 'dra mo zhig yab
rje mchog la tshe dpag med snang brnyan che chung sna tshogs dang rje nyid la rnam rgyal gyi sku brnyes pa 'khrungs pa na yab rje mchog gi sku phreng gi 'tshub ma zhi zhing
'jam mgon gzhon nu gang nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs las rgyal ba'i mtshan mar gor ma chag chu stod zla nang yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas snod bcud spyi bye'i phywa g.yang
'phel phyir sde dge zhu chen rin po che'i gsung rab bzhin la rang lugs dbyangs rol phyag len sbyar ba thog mar gnang skabs/ grol nyin phywa sgo dbye skabs/ 'jam mgon sku
mched yum mchog bcas phywa rdzas lta bar phebs shing / gro bzhin phur sgrub skabs yab sras lhan rgyas kyis/ phur cha sogs khyad byang nas bzhes te/ gnas bcu lha khang du
dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i sgrub mchod rgyas par mdzad cing / smin zla'i nang rje yab sras rnams

kyi thugs bzhed thun mong ma yin pa/ lha chen khyams stod du da lta'i gser khri rin po che gsar bskrun gyi zhal gro tshogs dbur yab sras zhal rgyas nas phebs skabs dge 'dun
tshogs yongs la bsnyen bkur dang/ de nyin 'bul ba rnams dngos thog tu phab pa dngul srang lnga stong sum brgya dang bzhi la sogs pa byung ba zhib rgyas gong yab rje rdo
rje 'chang gi rnam thar bzhin dang / dgung grangs bcu gnyis la phebs pa/ rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi thugs bskyed rlabs po ches dpal sa skyar dpal ldan chos kyi grags pas
mdzad pa'i rgyas pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam 'grel gzhung skyor tshes mchod thog mar tshugs skabs/ ma bsgrigs rang 'grig gi ngo mtshar du/ od du su dza sag bas se tA las
tshe chen tsho thur bkra shis tshe ring gi gsung bris rten gos dar dngul sogs spam mtho ba dang / de sras thA ji mgon po rdo rje byon pas dngul gyi maNDal/ dngul bre chen
mang ba/ zhang po me rin bde mchog gis kyang de bzhin bcas 'byor ba sogs gzhung skyor gyi la nye bzang zhing / de nyin rje rdo rje 'chang yab sras nas gnas bcu lha khang
rten drung mchod tshogs gzab pa'i dbus su gong gi maNDal sne 'dogs bcas bshams nas/ rnam 'grel gzhung skyor thugs bsam rnam dag gis bskrun pa 'di rgyal ba bu ram shing
bstan pa'i gsal byed dam par gyur nas/ skye dgu kun la 'phral yun phan bde rgya cher 'byung ba zhig bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems rnams la gsol ba 'debs dang thugs
smon 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i rjes

su 'gro ba bstsal zhing / dgung grangs bcu gsum du phebs pa shing lug lo rgyal zla nas bzung yab rje rigs brgya'i khyab bdag mchog nas/ 'jam mgon sku mched la zab rgyas chos
bka' rgya cher gnang rgyu'i tho rengs 'od gsal du/ gser chos glegs bam ngo mtshar can bka' 'gyur gras yin dgongs pa zhig dge 'dun gyi sde'i dbus na bzhugs pa'i phyed tsam
na shog rtags shig 'dug pas/ 'di yan sngar phul zin/ 'di nas 'bul dgos yod dgongs pa zhig 'khrungs pa ni/ da gzod brtags tshe lkog gyur rjen gsal lag mthil du skyu ru
ra bzhag pa bzhin du go 'di lo rigs sras sku mched la dbang chos dmigs gsal 'di gnang sa chen kun blo'i rnam thar nang mi gsal ba bcas/dgung grangs bcu bzhi pa me sprel rgyal
zla'i nang yab rje rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dag snang du dbang khang na gnas gsar rdo rje 'chang la bka' chos zhu mur mangga la kU Ta'i sgra sgrub dang bcas gsung bshad
rgyas po zhig mdzad pa 'khrungs pas/ de'i don ni bkra shis brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /tshes drug pa she 'grub sbyor nyin gzim chung gtor spod skabs/ gang gi rigs
sras dam pa 'jam mgon gzhon nur gyur pa nas/ da nang bka' bzhi thugs su chub pas da dpe 'dzin ji 'dra yod bka' bstsal bar bskul bas/ thugs rje che/ da lta rang gsal zhig
'bul dgos gsungs shing / thugs la glo bur bu sprel lo'i dbyar char la gsung bshad gnang / de nas

gser 'phyang mchu zla'i nang gzhan yang yong 'dra dgongs pa'i thugs spro dang bcas/ gtsug tor rnam rgyal gyi bsgom bzlas grub ma thag lha'i nga rgyal brtan pos yab sras yum
bcas nas gzab bzhes dang bcas/ sku gsung thugs rten/ bzang dgu 'dzoms pa'i spro zas/ mgul dar sogs stob par sku yon khang du phebs lam 'char can dar 'gyed grabs bsham skya
'khyil dang / rtser lha bsangs grol ba'i lha rgyal dang / mdung dar khra rog ge yod pa sogs rten 'brel bzang po dang bcas rgyal sras lam bzang bstsal te thugs 'dzin gnang
shig par shis brjod kyi lo tog dang bcas phul/ de'i tshe mdzod 'dzin la gong gi gnas tshul rnams dang lhag par bstan don gal po che'i skor phyag bris thog nas gnang ba'i
bka' grol/ mdung nag zhabs drung dge bshes bcos med nas maNDal gos dar sogs dngos po bzang dgu du ma dang / lhag par lcang skya rdo rje 'chang nas gsung shog gnang rten
bzang pos spa ba'i gsung tshig tu/ thub bstan gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me dpal ldan sa skya paNDi ta zhes snyan par grags pa gang de'i zhabs drung du/ zhes dang/ bkra
shis kyis mtshan pa'i dus kyi char yang / 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal rmad du byung ba gzugs sku'i dkyil 'khor dwangs shing/ mdzad khyab bzang po 'gran bral gyi ring nas/ zhes
sogs kyi tshig sgra sogs che 'don mdzad rgyu'i thog ma'i dge ltas dang / 'di lo yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas sa tshogs kyi/ 'jam mgon sa paN gyi chos khri mkhas pa zil gnon

du grags pa nyams gso gsar bskrun lta bur gser shog leb byugs dang khor yug tu gser zangs kyi rgya phibs tog dang bcas pa sogs ngo mtshar can dang / jo dar chen mor gser zangs
kyi rgyal mtshan kun gyi mig gi bdud rtsir gyur pa ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyur por gtams pa 'di sogs rim bzhin gsar bskrun gyi snron zla'i tshes gcig la chos khri chen
mo rags tsam rab gnas bcas grub nas/ dbyar chos spyi pa gzhis len sogs rgyas bshams gras la bla chen 'phags pa'i rnam thar gser bris sogs zhal phye zhing dngos gzhi 'jam
mgon dbang gi mtshan 'chang nas gzhung ka chen thugs su chud nas gsung dam bca' mdzad rgyur gsung chos snron zla'i tshes lnga gza' skar legs 'dzom nyin sa tshogs su gangs
nyi shar tsam la chos dung rin po ches gsung gis bskul te tshang ma gzab bzhes bcas/ gsung chos la phebs te chos khrir 'jam mgon sa paN gnyis pa yab rje chos kyi rgyal
po mchog dang / bshad gral 'gor 'jam mgon gsung bshad kyi dga' ston stsol ba po/ 'cham khang lho 'gram nas zhal ngo byings rnams dang / ru thog rgyal po/ phyag gnyer drung
'khor sogs/ mdun gyi sa stegs rtsa ba'i dbus su klu lding zhabs drung / g.yas phyogs la lha chen dang chos lhun mkhan po zung / brgya dpon/ g.yon nas chos las pa zung
/ zur 'chad/ ban tshang pa bcas lhor bstan dang me lcags 'gug 'jam mgon gsung bshad pa'i sku mdun g.yon ngos su sku yon pa/ de nas tshogs gral rnams

la chos sde lho byang / chos lhun pa sogs dang / brgya dpon g.yas nas bla rigs bya chu ba rnams/ gzhan yang khal kha thu she ye thu rgyal po'i mi sna e rten ne jo bo'i dge
bskos blo bzang chos grub pa'i lig thu dang / mi sna gzhan ye shes rab rgyas/ lo tsA ba bcas dang / sngon gyi dbu chen gras bdag chen shad pa kun dga' ye shes lhun grub/
sde dge sku tshab mtshon byed phur pa bla gsar/ glo bo rgyal khab nas byon pa mtshon byed gnas bskor ba/ dbus phyogs nas gong dkar gnas bskor ba/ khams phyogs nas bde gling
grwa rgyun dang gser can grwa bskor ba/ mnga' ris nas byung ba mtshon phyir stag mkhar gnyer rnying / lho phyogs nas byung ba mtshon pa'i grwa rgyun gnyis/ byang phyogs
nas byung ba mtshon pa'i mus pa rgyugs 'bul ba sogs/ gtsang phyogs nas gzhi grwa/ chos lhun/ skyed tshal/ bya gshongs pa bcas 'dus pa'i thog mar bstan srung yus pa lta
bu'i bser bu phran bu ldang zhing / 'jam mgon mchog nas gsung bshad tshugs pa dang gnam gshis kyang 'jam la/ grol khar chos char nyil ba sogs kyi dge mtshan dang ldan bzhin
par nyin dang po/ gsang phu ba'i skor cha'i gras la rigs gter/ sdom gsum/ so thar skabs dang / gnyis par zhi ba'i skor cha'i gras la mngon rtogs rgyan dang / sdom gsum
sems bskyed skabs dang / gsum par ngam ring pa'i skor cha'i gras la sdom gsum skabs gsum par gsung bshad mdzad cing / de lta bu'i rgyun yang sngon sngags

'chang chos kyi rgyal po'i sku thog la 'jam dbyangs sku mched kyis gsung bshad gnang ba nas bzung 'di lo'i bar gdung rgyud gsung bshad gnang mkhan ma byung bas/ rje rdo rje
'chang chen po yab sras nas de lta'i rgyun bzang nub dogs thugs bskyed rmad du byung ba gnang ba'i tshe/ spyi sgos nas bsnyen bkur legs skyes zad mi shes pa dang / lhag
par sa skya pa'i sbyin bdag sog po khal kha 'jam dpal rdo rje no mi han du grags pa dpon 'khor stobs chen zhig sngon du gzhis len skabs 'byor pa rnams nas/ 'byor phyag skabs
dang skabs 'di bcas par maNDal rten gsum gyis mtshon 'bul dngos ji ltar rnam mang thos kyi gan mdzod kha phye ba lta bus rgya che ba dang 'dus tshogs la mang 'gyed gya
nom pa bstabs/ spyi sgyur thog spyi sger nas legs so'i mgur dar sgron pa sogs phul byung gi mdzad bzang rnams grub nas khal kha mi sna rnams dbang chos zang zing gi skyes
sogs kyis 'dod pa tshim par mdzad/ rje yab sras 'di zung snyigs dus kyi bstan pa'i gsal byed mtshungs zla ma mchis pa yin pa yang mdzad bzang 'di rnams kyis grub/ zla
tshes bcu bzhi nas bzung 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can nyid sdom gsum rab dbyer gzhung 'don tshogs dbur thog mar phebs thog khal kha de dag dngul gyi maNDal dang / bstan
pa rgyas pa'i thugs smon zhu rten rgya dngul bre chen rnams phul ba sogs 'phral phugs kyi la nye bzang zhing 'di nas bzung gzhung 'don tshes mchod la rtag par phebs par mdzad
do/ /gzhan

yang gdan sa chen po 'di nyid na bzhugs pa'i bde kyai gsang gsum bdag med ma kun rig nA ro mkha' spyod chos spyod bskang ba'i ring gtor bzlog khag dang bcas pa'i cho ga gdangs
dbyangs phyag rgya bca' tshul sogs phyag len phra mo tshun chad thugs la bzung ste chub par mdzad nas/ tshogs phebs rtag par gnang ba dang de lo yab rje mchog nas gdung
sras rnam gnyis la dpal chen badzra ki la ya yi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur te smin par mdzad nas/ yab sras rnam gsum zhal rgyas nas phur bsnyen bdun gcig sbyin sreg bcas
kyang gnang / de nas yab rje mchog nas sa tshogs chos khrid dar chen sogs rab gnas rgyas par mdzad tshul rnams gong yab rje'i rnam thar bzhin dang / dgung grangs bco lngar
phebs thog rnam thar zhal gsung ma las/ bco lnga pa la khri thog bsdad nas su/ /bstan bcos thub pa dgongs gsal yong nges bskyor/ /yab rje dgongs pa dgyes nas che brjod
mdzad/ /ces gsungs pa ltar/ de nas sa skya pa'i gdung rgyud rin po che rnams khri 'don gnang skabs dus phyis rim bzhin je rgyas su song gras/ dus mdos gzab ma rgyal zlar
'gyangs pa'i tshes 'gor gtor spod dang sbrags/ sgo rum/ nang so bdud 'dul phug skyes lhas/ bsam brling rnams su ru mtshon gsar pa bzhengs re dang / bdud 'dul phug min
pa'i mgon khang bzhi la lha mdung gsar pa re 'bul ba bcas/ dus mdos 'phrin 'chol dang chabs cig thug chog re mdzad pa 'jam mgon bsod nams

dbang phyug gi sku thog tsam nas bzung chag med byung ba bzhin/ gtor spod dang sbrags gong gi mgon khang rnams su thug chog dang / nyer gcig la kun rar chog sgrigs/ nyer gnyis
la mdos gzab bca' sgrig nyer gsum la 'cham sku gdan 'dren gzab ma rnams deb nang bzhin dang / de lo dbu rtse nas lcam dral dregs pa zil gnon gdan 'dren bcas/ nyer bzhir
nyin chas 'di snga sor lha khang rdo gcal du mdzad kyang rje nyid kyi deb chen du sa tshogs su dgos tshul bzhin mdzad cing / nyer lnga rgyun bzhin/ nyer drug nyer bdun
la la chen shar nub gtor 'bul/ sa 'dul/ nyer brgyad la 'cham dngos/ nyer dgur gtor rgyag gnam gang la bskang gso brgya tshar dang sa khyi rgyal zla'i tshes gcig la snga
dror bstan srung bsngags gsol rgyas pa/ phyi dror lo gsar bzhugs gral gzab rgyas bstsal ba dang / rta zla'i bcu gcig nas khri phebs dngos gzhi nyin gsum ma mdzad pa'i tshe/
thog mar nam langs la chos khri steng gi lha khang 'chi med yang rtser yab rje rdo rje 'chang bka' drin mtshungs zla ma mchis pa mchog nas rang bzhin 'byung ba'i gtsug
tor rnam rgyal gyi sta gon sgrub par phebs/ sngar srol la nyin gnyis yab phebs srol ma mchis rung / de lo nyin gnyis sgrig gras ma mdzad pa ma gtogs rje nyid phebs shing
/ de yang bzhugs khri'i dbus su bka' chos kyi dga' ston stsol ba po dag dbang kun dga' dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po 'di nyid dang
/ g.yon du ngag

dbang kun dga' phan bde rgya mtsho theg mchog bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po 'di nyid dang / rigs bdag dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i khyab bdag drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen
po de nyid ni/ nyin dang po gnyis rab gsal shar lho'i 'gug nang du khri chen la nub gzigs su bzhugs/ de nas byang la zhal ngo / mkhan phyag gnyer/ gzhung zhabs rin po che'i
sku tshab sogs gsol ja dang 'bul chen 'gro yul ma gtogs sku drag ji snyed pas phyur zhing / bzhugs khri'i g.yas rdo skas 'gor sku yon pa/ de skabs 'dren chas thob pa
rnams la rang rang gi 'dren chas 'bul mi dang de min sku drag rnams la 'dren pas zhal dkar rag stegs bcas thob mi thob kyi rnam bzhag dang ldan par mdzad/ mthil rdo gcal
la sngar phan byang gral 'gor mdzad nas zhal shar nub la gzigs srol yang / de lo nas bzung byang gzigs kho nar mdzad dgos la sgrigs can rnams ni bka' chos chos spyod sogs
dang bstun/ de phyin rang rang blo dang bstun chog pa'i bka' 'doms dang / nyin gnyis rje nyid kyang sgrigs gras min pas nam langs la nang so sogs brgyud gong gi rnam rgyal
sgrub mchod ji 'gro dang / bka' chos ran pa dang bstun gsang sgo nas phebs/ bka' chos dang 'bul bzhes rnams grub nas rje nyid kyis sgrub mchod 'phro dang/ 'jam mgon sku
mched gzhi thog tu phebs/ bka' dbang ran pa dang phebs brda bcas 'chi med yang rtser byon/ nyin gsum par sgrigs gras mdzad pa deb nang bzhin bzhugs khri'i

g.yas su phebs shing bka' chos stsol ba pos/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung rab dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ gsungs pa dang mdo klog pa sogs/ maNDal gyi tshe sngags 'chang
bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal sras sems dpa'i dbang phyug dam pa'i drung du/ theg pa chen po'i dam pa'i chos zab mo zhu ba'i yon du sogs dang / gdung rgyud las sngar
dbang gsan phyin dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bo sogs/ lugs 'di ni zhu 'bul phyag bcos brgyad kyi tshe'ang dbang ma thob pa'i tshogs dpon la/ ma tshang ba
med pa 'di nyid bshes gnyen dam pa khyed la tshogs kyi rdo rje slob dpon zhu ba'i yon du/ zhes sogs dang / dbang thob nas dus gsum sangs rgyas sogs gsungs dgos pa'i rgyu
mtshan bzhin mdzad/ bka' chos gnang nas chos spyod gtong rin 'bul ba rnams gral gyi sku rgyab dang / g.yon sku mdun rnams bskor/ rdo skas shar ma brgyud bzhugs khri'i g.yon
nas sku mdun du slebs pa dang/ mdzod 'dzin nas bzhugs khri'i lho nub tu bzhengs te 'bul thog bsher nas gsang sgo la drangs/ de nas 'phro rnams la gzhol bar mdzad/ de
lta'i skabs khri 'don bstar mi/ gzhung sa mchog dang rgyal mtshan mthon po bas mtshon che ba can khag nas legs skyes stobs mi rtse drung sogs mi sna che 'bring ji snyed
cig 'byor ba dang / rang khongs chos sde lho byang spyi dang / mkhan po sogs las sne khag dang / gzhan yang chos lhun/ rtse chos/ rgyal rtse gur grwa/ gong chos sogs

grwa tshang khag dang / rin sgang sogs mo dgon khag dang / mdzod gnyer gyis mtshon drung rigs ser skya/ gzhis khag stod smad bla khag sogs/ gzhis byes rnams nas dar dkar srid
na ring bas mtshon dngos 'bul rmugs 'dzin dbang po'i gan mdzod la co 'dri ba lta bu bstabs shing / grol nyin gdan sa chen po'i dri gtsang khang rnams su sna lnga'i mchod
sprin tshar du dngar ba dang / dam can rgya mtsho sprin bzhin 'du ba'i gnas mgon khang rnams su/ spyan gzigs gos dar/ gcan gzan dang zhing chen gyi lpags rigs go mtshon
sogs 'bul ba/ dge 'dun 'dus pa'i tshogs la bsnyen bkur dang / mnga' zhabs skye bo'i tshogs la 'bru 'gyed gya nom pa sogs mdzad cing / de lta'i dge rtsa rnams rigs dang
dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i khyab bdag yab rje chos kyi rgyal po mchog nas 'khor gsum ma dmigs pa'i shes rab zab mos yongs su bsngo bas rgyas btab grub nas bkra shis mnga' gsol
gyi tshe gzhi thog tu mkhan phyag gnyer/ brgya las ban tshang / bde gling dbu chos/ tshogs chen dbu chos/ gling dpon bcu drug yul slob gnyis/ rtse gdong slob bu dbu ban
tshang bcas byon nas/ mkhan chen gyi sku rten/ brgya dpon nas gsung rten/ las chen pas thugs rten dang 'phrin las rten/ phyag gnyer la yon tan rten la gser bum re re/
ban tshang rim bzhin rol sil rnga/ chos dung rin po che/ rdo dril/ sna bdun/ rdzas brgyad/ bzhugs stan rdo rje rgya gram rnams phyag khyer gyis phebs gong tshogs pa byings

bzhugs tshar ba mdzad/ 'jam mgon sku mched chos khrir bzhugs pa'i sku mdun yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhengs mthar/ g.yas g.yon la phyag phyi ba rnams bsgrigs nas/ dbu byed
che bas bskul la/ sangs rgyas chos tshogs shur ma gsum nas bzung / khrus gsol/ sku phyis bar de dus kyi zin bris bzhin mdzad/ de nas sku rten yab kyi phyag tu bsnams te/
rgyal srid sna bdun gyi gdangs bcas pas/ tshogs gnyis mthar phyin mtshan mchog so gnyis dang / /rab mdzes dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras/ /sprul pa'i 'od zer dpag
med 'phro ba can/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku chen por dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra kA ya siddhi a bhi Shi nytsami/ gsung rten bsnams te/ nye ring kun la snyoms pa tshangs pa'i
dbyangs/ /thar lam ston pa lha yi rnga bo che/ /skye med 'gag pa med pa brag cha'i gsung/ /yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra wA ka siddhi a bhi Shi
nytsami/ thugs rten bsnams te/ chos nyid dag pa gnyis ldan mngon du gyur/ /chos can ji snyed dbye ba so sor gzigs/ /chos rnams rnam kun mngon rdzogs byang chub pa'i/ /sgrib
bral rnam dag thugs kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra tsitta siddhi a bhi Shi nytsamo/ yon tan rten gser bum cha bsnams te/ stobs nyid rdo rje mi 'jigs sengge bzhin/ /ma
'dres mkha' dag thub bstan chu zla ltar/ /bral dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yi/ /yon tan drug cu bzhi yi dbang bskur ro/ /oM gu Na siddhi a bhi Shi

nytsami/ rgyal srid sna bdun tshe chog bzhin/ rdzas brgyad bsangs sbyangs byin rlabs 'bul tshig rab gnas bzhin la/ bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad/ dpal sa skya pa chen po sngags
'chang bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal sras sems dpa'i dbang phyug dam pa rnams kyis gtso mdzad/ sems can sogs/ me long ye shes sogs/ deng 'dir yang dpal sa skya pa sogs
rigs 'gres/ yung dkar rdzong nas/ 'phrin las rten sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams te/ brgya byin rnga sprin tshangs nyi yid bzhin nor/ /sgra snyan nam mkha' sa bzhin srid mtha'i
bar/ /'bad med lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad pa ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid du dbang bskur ro/ /oM karma sidhI a bhi Shi nytsami/ de nas bzhugs stan phul nas brtan bzhugs
gdangs ma/ de nas dril bsil me tog 'thor ba dang bcas shis brjod gdangs ma/ nyin bde gdangs ring mthar rol chen/ chos dung rgyun bzhin rdzogs pa dang / btso thab pa'i zhwa
g.yab ki sgra bskul bkra shis tshugs pa dang shar sgo lho ma sa tshogs kyi nub rgyud la cha zhabs khams drung gi gzhas dang / de nas bzung shar sgo byang ma'i bar la
rgya lu chas pa'i mdung bcu gcig nas bzung phye phur lnga'i bar mchod phreng rnams dang / ki sgra rdzogs nas mchod rol dkrol la chos dung rin po ches sna drangs rnga rol/
'phrin las rten/ rdzas brgyad/ sna bdun/ gser bum/ thugs gsung sku rten/ de nas chos khrims pa nas rtsi ma'i bar/ phye mar gro 'bras dang bcas pa tshogs kyi phyi bskor/
mdzo mo bar

ltag skyed 'phrang / bkra shis lha khang / bla brang zam pa/ sengge sgo/ sde yangs bdun skas brgyud pho brang rtse'i gzim chung bzhugs khri la byon drung / gong gi rten rnams
bshams/ de nas chos dung rin po che gzhi thog rtse nas thengs bcu gsum bskul/ gzhas sogs ni zhag grangs du ma'i bar du byung zhing / legs 'bul dga' ston zhag lnga ma gtang
rag sogs la thugs gzhol bar gyur to/ /ces sngar srol bzang po mi nyams shing / da srol bzang po je rgyas su mdzad pa'i rnam bzhag rgyas pa ni/ de skabs mdzad pa'i rje
nyid kyi zin bris so sor bkram pa rnams bzhin te 'dir ni mtshon pa tsam mo/ /chos khri rin po che 'di nyid du sngon byon gong ma rnams rim phebs dang / sa lo dgung snying
shing sbrul bcu gnyis su phebs pa me 'brug lor khrir 'khod/ sngags 'chang chen po dgung snying me glang dgur byon pa shing byar khrir phebs/ bsod nams dbang po dgung snying
sa lug bcu gnyis su byon pa lcags rtar khrir phebs/ sgar chen sa byi bcu gsum du byon pa lcags byi lor khrir phebs/ bsod nams dbang phyug sa stag bcu bzhir byon pa
lcags yos lor khrir phebs/ mangga'i mtshan can me sprel bcu gsum du byon pa sprel lor khrir phebs/ bsod nams rin chen shing bya bcu gnyis pa me sprel lor khrir phebs/ yab
rje rdo rje 'chang nyid sa bya bcu gnyis su byon pa lcags sprel lor khrir phebs/ 'jam mgon dbang sdud snying po nyid chu lug bcu drug tu byon pa sa khyi lor khrir phebs
pa bcas sa lo dang

sngags 'chang sku rkyang / bsod nams dbang po sku mched gnyis sgar chen sku mched gsum/ bsod nams dbang phyug mangga'i mtshan can/ yab rje bsod nams rin chen rnams sku rkyang
/ rigs brgya'i khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po sku mched/ 'jam mgon mi srid bzung ba ngag dbang kun dga' dpal ldan chos skyong bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang
po sku mched bcas las/ yab kyis mnga' gsol mdzad pa bsod nams dbang po nas mangga'i mtshan can bar dang/ yab rje bsod nams rin chen la dge 'dun tshogs chen nas shis
brjod/ de nas so sor yab kyi mdzad pa bcas/ sngar srol la gsung bsngo'i mjug gi bkra shis mang du gsungs mthar mdzad pa 'dra mo rnam thar phal cher na mchis/ rje rdo rje
'chang sku mched la ni/ sna bdun/ rdzas brgyad gnang zhing / so so'i gzhung gsungs mthar shis brjod mang po gdangs dang bcas me tog 'thor bar mdzad cing / gang ltar yab rje
bka' drin mtshungs zla ma mchis pa mchog nas chos khri mkhas pa zil gnon 'di nyid la zhabs tog tshar phyin ngo mtshar can dang / de'i shar phyogs kyi dar chen bkod legs/
khro khang khro chen la dkar g.ya'/ 'cham sku dregs pa zil gnon lcam dral/ las mkhan zhal 'bag gsar bskrun/ de dag thams cad kyi snga phyi bar gsum gyi deb dang / tho
gzhi gsar sgrigs sogs bla ma gong ma rnams kyi dgongs zab rdzogs phyir dang / slad kyi spyan ltos bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba sogs thugs bskyed bla na

med pas dus 'da' bar mdzad/ de ltar khri phebs mnga' gsol gegs med du grub mtshams/ rnam thar zhal gsungs ma las/ khri 'don mjug gi dga' ston ma rdzogs par/ /drin can ma ma
chos kyi dbyings su thim/ /lugs mi rgyug pa'i sgo gcig 'di nas dod/ /ces gsungs pa ltar/ rta zla'i nyi shu skor la rgyal gsungs bka' 'gyur rin po che gsung sgrogs sogs sku
rim rgya cher mdzad mu'i nyer gnyis la rgyal tshab de mo gong ma rin po che dang / nyer dgur rgyal yum skal bzang bde skyid dbu khrid zhi bar gshegs pas/ yab sras zhal
rgyas nas yum mchog de nyid kyi dgongs rdzogs spyi dang bye brag gdan sa 'di nyid dang / lha ldan jo shAka rnam gnyis dbus lho byang gtsang khul gyi gnas rten dgon sde rnams
la rgya cher bstsal zhing / da ltar bla brang shar na bzhugs pa'i sku rten du bdag cag gi ston pa'i snang brnyan gser zangs las grub pa/ gsung rten sangs rgyas mtshan
lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu bzhugs pa'i gser bris glegs bam/ thugs rten gser dngul ra ma lug gi mchod rten rin thang can sogs phra rgyan gyis phyug pa 'di rnams gsar
skrun/ rab gnas rgyas pa bcas mdzad cing / rtsed gdong chos sde'ang bris thang gong bshams zhal khebs sogs 'gran bral grangs bcu bzhi dang / rnal 'byor ma dang kun rig gi
cho ga sogs da lta'i bar du/ lo zlar chag med sgrub pa 'di rnams sbyor 'jags mdzad/ rgyal tshab mchog gi dgongs rdzogs su kyai rdor sgrub mchod sogs mdzad do/ /dgung

grangs bcu drug tu phebs pa sa khyi nag zla'i yar tshes bcu gcig nas bzung rigs dang dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i khyab bdag yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi spyan sngar 'jam mgon
sku mched rje btsun drung sogs la lam 'bras tshogs bshad rjes 'brel/ gzhan yang dbang rjes gnang khrid lung la sogs pa snga phyir gsan pa rnams 'dir phyogs gcig tu bkod
na thog mar 'phags pa klu sgrub dang / rgyal sras zhi ba lha nas brgyud pa'i dbu ma lugs kyi sems bskyed/ jo bo rje nas brgyud pa'i blo sbyong don bdun ma'i nyams khrid
lung bcas/ jo bos chos 'byung brgya rtsa/ dpe chos rin spungs/ man ngag rin spungs/ gtam rgyud rin phreng / sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu rgyal mchog dang / mus chen dkon mchog
rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis bsgrigs pa'i blo sbyong glegs bam/ des mdzad pa'i blo sbyong khrid yig blo sbyong legs bshad kun 'dus rnams kyi lung blo sbyong zhen pa bzhi
bral gyi khrid/ 'phags yul gyi slob dpon a bha yas phyogs gcig tu sgrigs shing yar lung lo tsA ba grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'i rgyal thabs rgya mtshor grags pa
nas byung ba'i rjes gnang brgya dang zhe gcig rgya gzhung gi lung dang bcas pa/ ba ri lugs kyi sgrub thabs brgya rtsa rjes gnang don brgyad rgya gzhung gi lung dang bcas
pa/ jo bo rje nas brgyud pa'i rjes gnang man ngag thor bu rnams mchims nam mkha' grags kyis phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa'i snar thang brgya rtsar grags pa nas byung ba'i rjes
gnang so bzhi/ mchims

kyis bsgrigs pa'i yig lung bcas/ sngags 'chang kun rin yig steng nas 'phags yul gyi grub chen brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i byin rlabs rnams dang / rnam thar rdor glu bstod pa tshogs
'khor rnams kyi lung / rgyud sde'i skor la thog mar bya rgyud gras sman bla mched bdun/ klu dbang lha lnga/ gnas bcu rnams so so'i rjes gnang sgrub skor rnams kyi lung
dang bcas pa/ bya ba spyi'i rgyud la rigs gsum spyi dbang / gang blo ma'i rig gtad/ 'jam dkar gser gdugs can/ 'jam dbyangs dmar ser/ 'jam dkar ma ti lung / 'jam dpal smra
seng rnams kyi rjes gnang / rgya gzhung bod gzhung sgrub skor cha tshang ba'i lung / srung ba lha lnga bcu rtsa gcig gza' yum lha bcu gnyis/ gdugs dkar lha nyer bdun ma/
gtsug gtor dri med dang 'od zer dri med rnams kyi rdul dkyil du dbang / sgrub dkyil dbang / srog shing 'dzugs chog mchod rten/ thig rtsa rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa/ 'od
zer can ma dang / rnam rgyal lha dgu/ gtsug 'bar/ gza' yum rnams kyi rjes gnang yig lung bcas rigs kyi khro bo mi g.yo ba dkar sngon gyi rjes gnang sgrub skor rnams kyi
lung dang bcas pa/ padma rigs 'chi med rnga sgra lha dgu'i dbang / padma'i rigs bdag 'phags pa bcu gcig zhal gtso rkyang dang lha lnga'i rjes gnang / smyung gnas cho ga
dang / 'pho ba 'debs tshul sogs kyi lung / spyan gzigs skyer sgang lugs/ spyan gzigs gtso 'khor gsum pa/ don zhags lha lnga

rnams kyi rjes gnang / tshem bu lugs kyi thugs rje chen po'i dmar khrid padma'i yum/ sgrol dkar bka' babs dgu ldan dang / 'od zer drug sbrags so so'i rjes gnang / phyi ma'i
tshe khrid sgrub skor yongs rdzogs kyi lung / dbyangs can dkar mo'i rjes gnang sgrub skor lung / jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang / yig lung bcas/ nyi sbas lugs
kyi sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang lung bcas/ gnyan sgrol rjes gnang yig lung bcas/ pad rigs khro bo'i skor la/ rta nag lcags ral can jo lugs/ shwa na bzhi skor dbyug tho
can rnams kyi rjes gnang / sgrub skor rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo/ mi 'khrug lha dgu'i dbang / rdo rje rigs bdag phyag rdor gos sngon can gyi
rjes gnang / phyag rdor gtum po/ phyag rdor u tsya rnams kyi rjes gnang yig lung bcas/ rdor rigs pho nyar gtogs pa dme brtseg dud ljang gnyis kyi rjes gnang / sgrub skor
yongs rdzogs rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa/ bya rgyud nor rigs dzam dkar 'brug zhon lha lnga dang / dzam ser nag rnam sras gser can lha dgu rnams kyi rjes gnang / sgrub
skor rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa/ rnam 'joms dang ri khrod ma ser mo'i rjes gnang yig lung bcas/ gnyis pa spyod pa'i rgyud la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag po 'jam
dbyangs a ra pa tsa lha lnga'i dbang yig cha rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa/ gsum pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la/ kun rig

rtsa ba'i ras dkyil du dbang / sgrub dkyil dbang chog sogs kyi lung / rgyud sde bzhi pa rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i skor la/ pha rgyud gsang 'dus mi bskyod rdo rje lha so gnyis
rdul dkyil du dbang / gsang 'dus 'jam rdor lha bcu dgu rdul dkyil dbang / gsang 'dus spyan gzigs lha bcu dgu ras dkyil dbang / de rnams yig lung dang bcas/ gshed dmar
lha lnga'i rdul dkyil du dbang sngon 'gro'i/ spros med kyi nyams khrid yig lung dang bcas pa/ 'jigs byed rwa lugs lha bcu gsum rdul dkyil du dbang / las gshin bskang ba
sogs kyi lung / ma rgyud skor la/ 'khor lo bde mchog nag po lugs/ lha drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi rdul dkyil du dbang / a mes zhabs kyi bde mchog chos 'byung gi lung / phag dkar
shes rab gsal byed kyi rjes gnang / dpyal lugs phag mo skor gsum gyi byin rlabs lung bcas/ grub rgyal lugs kyi tshe dbang lung bcas/ khyung nag rgyas nang sgrub skor man
ngag rnams kyi lung dang bcas/ seng gdong dmar po'i rjes gnang lung bcas/ gnyis med rgyud khongs su gtogs pa nor lha dbyu gu mched gsum gyi sgrub skor man ngag rnams rdo
rje gur las gsungs pa'i thun mong sgrub pa'i lha gsum gyi rjes gnang yig lung bcas/ dus 'khor nas gsungs pa'i thun mong sgrub pa'i lha gsum nang tshan rdo rje khyung khra'i
skor la sngags 'chang zung dpal bas mdzad pa'i khyung spod dkar chag ltar yongs rdzogs kyi lung / 'phags yul gyi slob dpon a bha yis bkram pa'i

phreng ba skor gsum dgongs don dkyil 'khor bzhi zhe gnyis steng / dA paN atsya zhes dgung lo stong dang nyi shu bzhugs shing tshems lan nyi shu brjes par grags pas bkral ba'i
dge legs su byed dkyil 'khor gsum bsnan pas/ dkyil 'khor zhe lnga'i ras dkyil du dbang nyin bco brgyad ma'i lugs su bskur ba mdzad / gsang sngags rnying ma'i skor la/
rdo rje phur pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du/ chos rje bla ma dam pa dang / sa lo chen po dang / sngags 'chang kun rin rnams kyi yig cha'i steng nas stod las byang chub
sgrub pa'i dbang dang / smad las drag po sgrol ba'i rjes gnang / sa lo kun bsod kyis mdzad pa'i phur pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi lung / bdag chen rgya gar ba'i 'phrin gzhung
dregs pa zil gnon dang / sngags 'chang kun rin pa'i dbang chog mthong ba rang grol/ rje rang gis mdzad pa'i bsgrigs rim rnams kyi steng nas gu ru drag dmar nyang lugs
kyi dbang dang yig cha rnams kyi lung / rta mgrin gsang sgrub byin rlabs/ sgrub skor rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa 'dod 'bum nang nas byin rlabs thugs dbang bsdus pa/ phyag
rdor dregs 'dul gyi dbang / bstan ma bcu gnyis kyi rjes gnang / tshe rta zung 'brel/ byang gter lcags gdong ma/ mda' 'phel ma rnams tshe dbang / khyad par rgyal ba'i
bstan pa rin po che'i sgor zhugs pa phal cher gyi rna bar ma thos pa'i gser chos snyan brgyud kyi skor la/ 'phags yul gyi paN grub rgya mtsho'i gtsug rgyan rnal 'byor gyi
dbang phyug dpal ldan bi

rWa pas rgyal yum bdag med ma las dngos su gsan pa'i gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i skor la/ tshogs bshad dang / slob bshad du grags pa gnyis las/ dang po/
tshogs bshad mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyi yig steng nas/ sngon 'gro snang ba gsum gyi 'khrid/ rgyab rten lung gi skor la/ birWa pa'i rnam 'gyur drug gi sgo nas
bstod pa bla ma rgya bod kyi lo rgyus nas bzung yab rje bsod nams rin chen bar gyi bla brgyud rnam thar rnams dang gsung ngag byung tshul legs bshad 'dus pa'i rgya mtsho
rnams sngon du 'gro ba'i/ brgyud pa'i khyad par gnyis ldan gyi sems bskyed rnams dang / lam gyi dngos gzhi rgyud gsum gyi sgo nas dkri ba la/ thog mar slob ma rjes 'dzin
sogs/ dbang gi mngon par rtogs pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyu dus kyi dbang bskur ba rtsa sngags aShTA'i bzlas lung dang bcas pa/ lus dkyil
'khrid kyi sngon 'gror/ thabs rgyud kyi gtso bo lam dus kyi dbang bskur ba yi ge brgya pa'i bzlas lung dang bcas pa/ gsang dbang gi 'khrid kyi sngon 'gror/ rje btsun rdo
rje bdag med ma'i ras dkyil du dbang bskur dang / sindhu ra'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa bcas lta ba'i skabs su dam tshig rnam bshad dang bcas/ dngos gzhi'i 'khrid
brgyud gsum snying po'i legs bshad ji lta ba bzhin dang / rgyab rten lung la/ rje btsun gyi dkar chag nang bzhin glegs bam pod ser ma/ rgyal tshab dam pa'i dkar chag nang
bzhin pod

dmar ma/ bla ma dam pa'i pod nag ma la/ rnam thar ngo mtshar snang ba/ lus dkyil cho ga lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor/ 'khrid yig sbas don gsal ba/ gnad bcu gcig gnad drug dbang
po rab 'bring gsum gyis dkri ba'i 'khrid rnams gsal byed rnam bshad man ngag gi mdzod rnams dang / bskyed rim rnam bshad gsang sngags mdzes rgyan/ phyi dkyil rnam bshad
blo gsal bde 'jug lus dkyil rnam bshad bde chen bcud snying / yang de'i rnam bshad nyung ngus rnam gsal/ rdo dril bgrang 'phreng dgang blugs bum pa rnams kyi rnam bshad/
dam tshig rdo rje'i sgrub thabs sdig sgrib kun 'joms/ gsung ngag byung tshul dang khog phubs kyi zin bris gsung ngag bstan pa'i pad tshal bzhad pa/ brgyud pa'i khyad par
gnyis ldan gyi sems bskyed kyi cho ga dam pa'i bzhed srol/ slob ma rjes 'dzin nyams su blangs bde/ aShTA sogs kyi bzlas lung go bder bkod pa/ bdag med ma'i byin rlabs
bya tshul legs byas gtam gyi bdud rtsi/ dam tshig rnam bshad bag yod gtam gyi bdud rtsi/ lam dus rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gyi rnam dbye bdud rtsi'i gtam bzang / snang gsum
dang brgyud gsum snying po'i legs bshad rnams kyi lung / ngag dbang chos grags kyi yig steng nas lam zab phyi ma'i byin rlabs yig lung bcas dang / rgyun gyi nyams len gyi
yi ge dkon mchog lhun grub kyi tshigs bcad ma dang / sngags 'chang chen pos mdzad pa ngor chen gyi brgyud 'debs kha skong bcas pa'i lung / bir srung thun mong

ba ngor chen gyis mdzad pa zur 'debs bcas dang / thar rtse paN chen gyi yig lung bcas/ gnyis pa/ khyad par du ngor lugs thun mong ma yin pa gsung ngag rin po che slob bshad
kyi skor la/ thog mar bla ma tshad mar bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug birWa pa la bstod pa a la la te nas bzung / rmor chen rdo rje 'chang gi 'khrungs rabs gsol
'debs kyi bar gyi bla ma brgyud pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i skor gyi lung dang / rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i bla ma rgya bod kyi lo rgyus nas
bzung / gnas gsar pa ngag dbang kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas kyi rnam thar 'jam mgon kun blo rang gis mdzad pa'i bar gyi rnam thar skor rnams kyi lung / sngon du 'gro
ba'i sgo nas/ nyams myong tshad ma rgyud la skyed par byed pa'i khrid dngos ni/ rdo rje 'chang tshar pa chos rje'i gsung sgros 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang phyug gis
zin bris su mdzad pa'i khrid yig gsang chen bstan pa rgyas byed kha'u brag rdzong pa'i bzhed pa ma nor ba la gzhi byas/ bum dbang rmi lam man gyi khrid 'phro lus pa rgyal
dbang lnga pa rin po ches mdzad pa dang / snang gsum gyi skabs su 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i gsung ngag byung tshul gyi zin bris kyi steng nas thog mar man ngag gi byung
tshul dang / byung ba'i chos la bshad bsgrub bya tshul gyi gsung bshad shin tu rgyas pa dang / gzhan yang gsung bshad kyi rgyab skyor du dgos pa'i yig cha rnams dam pa'i
phyag gzhes ltar mdzad de/

lam gyi sngon 'gro snang gsum gyi khrid shin tu rgyas pa zhag nyi shu skor dang / de skabs rnams su'ang bla ma lnga bcu pa rtsa 'grel rnams kyi steng nas gsung bshad mthil
phyin pa dang / sdom pa nyi shu pa rtsa 'grel gyi steng nas gsung bshad zhib rgyas dang / rje btsun gyi sdom pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa/ rtse mos mdzad pa'i chos la 'jug pa'i
sgo bcas kyi lung / de nas maNDal tshom bu lnga pa la brten pa'i brgyud pa'i khyad par gnyis ldan gyi sems bskyed ngor chen dkon mchog lhun grub pa'i yig cha ltar dang
/ des mdzad pa'i yig cha'i steng nas slob ma rjes 'dzin sogs dbang gi mngon par rtogs pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgo nas dpal kyai rdo rje'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor chen
por/ mus chen sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa'i dbang chu dang / tshar chen gyi dbang chu'i gsal byed/ dkon mchog lhun grub kyi dbang gi mtshams sbyor chen mo sogs kyi steng
nas rgyu dus kyi dbang bskur ba yongs su rdzogs pa/ mkhyen brtse'i yig steng nas aShTA'i bzlas lung dang bcas pa/ dngos gzhi grol byed khrid la/ thog mar lta bas spros
pa gcod pa'i phyir du kun gzhi rgyu rgyud la 'khor 'das dbyer med kyi lta ba bsgom pa'i khrid dang / de skabs su dam tshig dang sdom pa'i gsum bshad shin tu zhib pa rje btsun
grags pas mdzad pa'i rtsa ltung 'khrul spong gi lung dang bcas pa/ de nas 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyis yig cha'i steng nas bdag med lha mo bco lnga'i dbang / lus thabs
rgyud la dbang bzhi dang 'brel ba'i lam bzhi las/

thog mar bum dbang dang 'brel ba phyi bskyed rim gyi khrid sems 'dzin dang bcas pa/ bdag chen gyi yig cha'i steng nas lam dus kyi dbang bskur ba yig brgya'i bzlas lung dang
bcas pa/ de rjes nang bskyed rim gyi khrid sems 'dzin dang 'brel ba sogs bum dbang gi lam yongs su rdzogs pa/ de dag gi sgro 'dogs gcod pa'i skabs su phyi nang gi bskyed
rim/ dbang / rab gnas/ sbyin sreg sogs lam yongs su rdzogs pa cha lag dang bcas pa'i gsung bshad dpyis phyin pa/ gtum mo'i bde drod bskyed pa'i slad du ngag chos pa'i yig
cha'i steng nas bdag med lha mo bco lnga'i byin rlabs/ de rjes gsang dbang dang / shes rab ye shes dang / dbang bzhi pa dang rjes su 'brel ba'i lam la sogs pa mdor na nyams
khrid zab mo yongs su rdzogs pa zla ba drug gi bar du gsan cing de dag gi bar skabs rnams su/ 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i yig cha'i steng nas tshar gsum khug pa'i byin
rlabs/ ngag chos kyi yig steng nas lam zab thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i byin rlabs dmigs khrid dang 'brel ba/ mkhyen brtse'i yig cha'i steng nas bla ma rin 'byung
gi byin rlabs/ ngor chen rdo rje 'chang dang ngag chos pa'i yig steng nas bir srung thun mong ba dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i byin rlabs rnams lung dang bcas pa/ zhar
byung bir srung gsar ma'i dmigs khrid dang bcas pa/ mkhyen brtse'i yig steng nas brda don gsal ba'i byin rlabs/ ngag chos kyi yig steng nas lam sbas bshad kyi

byin rlabs/ nub pa rig 'dzin grags dang / kun mkhyen gyi yig cha'i steng nas rnam 'joms bir lugs kyi byin rlabs/ rje rang gi yig cha'i steng nas rten 'brel snying po'i srung
ba'i byin rlabs/ mkhyen brtse'i yig cha'i steng nas dbang bzhi'i brda tshig brgyud du bstsal ba'i byin rlabs gdams ngag rnams rdzogs pa'i tshe/ mkhyen brtse'i yig steng
nas sgrub pa lung sbyin gyi byin rlabs dang / gsang ba bcu'i rgyas 'debs pa/ mthar bstan pa gtad pa'i tshul du kun mkhyen gyi yig cha'i steng nas ga ya dha ra'i lugs kyi
mgon rkyang rjes gnang rnams legs par gsan no/ /de rnams kyi rgyab rten du lung dang bstan bcos tshad mar bya ba'i phyir gong tshogs bshad kyi skabs su bshad pa'i lam 'bras
pod dmar ser rnams kyi lung dang / gzhan yang snga phyir gsan pa'i lung gi skor la/ slob dpon rin po che bsod nams rtse mos mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs yan lag bzhi po/ dbang
gi chu bo chen mo/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg rab gnas bzang po drug pa rnams dang / rje btsun gyis mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa/ bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs/ tshogs
'khor 'bring po/ las bzhi'i sbyin sreg dus mtha' ma'i cho ga rab gnas don gsal/ he ru ka'i chas drug brgyud pa'i bkra shis mtshungs med bla ma rnams dang / sa paN gyis mdzad
pa'i tshogs 'khor rtsod spong / 'phags pas mdzad pa'i tshogs 'khor bdud rtsi'i bum pa/ bla ma dam pas mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa/

mus chen sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa'i mngon rtogs yan lag drug pa bya bral mar grags pa/ lam dus kyi nyams len/ dbang chu gsal ba'i me long / sta gon skabs kyi so shing sogs
kyi dgos pa bshad pa/ lam zab thun mong ba'i nyams len rnams dang / bdag chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa'i skor la/ lam dus kyi dbang bskur tshul/ lam zab thun mong ba'i
nyams len/ bdud rtsi ril bu sgrub tshul/ de skabs su dgos pa'i sman gyi rkang grangs rdor dril gyi rnam bshad/ dam tshig gi bshad pa 'khrul spong rab gsal/ lta ba 'khor
'das dbyer med kyi khrid/ lam sbas bshad kyi man ngag zin bris rnams dang / tshar chen chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa'i skor la/ lam 'bras brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs dngos grub
rin po che'i char 'bebs la bla ma phyi ma rnams kyi kha skong dang bcas pa / bla mchod dngos grub rin po che'i bang mdzod/ bla ma lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa/ lam skor dgu'i
yi ge rtsa ltung bcu bzhi'i 'grel pa'i lung bshad/ dbang chu'i lhan thabs nor bu'i phreng ba/ bla ma rin 'byung gi nyams len/ phyi nang bskyed rim gyi rnam bshad nyi ma'i
'od zer gsung ngag brgyud pa'i bkra shis rnams dang / 'jam mgon mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i skor la/ man ngag gi byung tshul dang / byung ba'i chos la bshad sgrub bya tshul
bcas kyi khog phug zin bris/ khrid kyi zin bris gsang chen bstan pa rgyas byed ces bya ba la nang gses su/ snang gsum/ rgyud gsum/ phyi bskyed pa'i

rim pa bar do yan gyi khrid/ nang bskyed rim gyi khrid bcas dang / bsnyen chen gyi yi ge/ bsnyen pa'i kha skong gi sbyin sreg rnams dang / bum dbang gi rmi lam man gyi khrid
kyi 'phror lus pa rgyal dbang lnga pa rin po ches mdzad pa/ mang thos klu sgrub rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i skor la/ kyai rdor rgyud gsum gyi brgyud 'debs/ slob bshad kyi brgyud
'debs byin rlabs pho nya/ snang gsum khrid yig zla ba bdud rtsi'i thigs phreng / rgyud gsum khrid yig nyi bzhon gsar pa'i thigs phreng la nang gses su/ lta ba 'khor
'das dbyer med/ phyi bskyed rim/ nang bskyed rim/ bum dbang gi 'da' kha ma/ bar do rmi lam/ sgyu lus bcas dang / khams 'dus pa dang po/ gnyis pa/ gsum pa bcas dang / brda
don gsal ba'i byin rlabs kyi yi ge rnams dang / mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan gyis mdzad pa'i tshogs 'khor chog khrigs/ rin chen bsod nams mchog grub kyis mdzad pa'i slob
bshad 'chad thabs/ rmor chen gyis mdzad pa'i lam 'bras bla mchod bsod nams rab rgyas rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa legs par gsan zhing khong du chud par mdzad do/ /gzhan yang
dpal ldan sa skya pa'i gser chos bcu gsum gyi nang tshan mchog bsgrubs pas thun mong zhar las 'byung ba dmar mo skor gsum du grags pa'i skor la/ ngag chos yig cha'i steng
nas rgyal chen indra bhu tis bkral ba'i phag mo zhal gnyis ma'i byin rlabs lung dang bcas pa/ spro lung pa kun smon dang ngag chos pa'i yig cha'i steng

nas slob dpon mai tri pas bkral ba'i rnal 'byor la rig pa 'dzin ma rtsen mo'i byin rlabs lung dang bcas pa/ zab pa'i yang zab nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i sindhu ra'i dkyil 'khor
du tshar chen sogs kyi yig steng nas dbang bzhi byin rlabs kyi tshul du bskur ba sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i khrid yig dang / rgyal

rim rtsa dbu ma/ bde ba dang 'ja' lus sgrub pa/ yab dang yum la brten pa'i 'pho ba/ mkha' spyod sgrub pa sogs cha lag yongs rdzogs kyi khrid/ a mes zhabs kyi yig cha'i
steng nas chos nyid dngos bstan gyi byin rlabs/ mkhyen brtse'i yig cha'i steng nas rtsa dbu ma che ba'i khrid dang bcas pa rnams dang / de rnams kyi rgyab rten du/ mkhyen
brtses mdzad pa'i mkha' spyod ma'i khrid/ mkha' spyod ma'i rnam bshad nyi zla bzang pos mdzad pa/ tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i lus dkyil dang / rje btsun yab yum gyi 'pho
ba bcas dang / sangs rgyas dpal bzang gis mdzad pa'i byin rlabs bya tshul/ ring mo bas mdzad pa'i bsam mi khyab/ lnga pas mdzad pa'i mthong grol lde mig rje rang gis mdzad
pa'i 'chad thabs/ dbang rab pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang / sbyin sreg mkha' spyod sgrub pa/ rmor chen gyis mdzad pa'i bsnyen thabs dngos grub myur 'gugs rnams kyi lung
dang /

rmor chen gyi yig cha'i steng nas sa skya pa'i gser chos kyi nang tshan tshe dpag sprul sku'i rjes gnang lung bcas/ rmor chen gyi yig cha'i steng nas gser chos 'jam dpal nag
po'i rjes gnang sngon du 'gro ba'i lung la/ 'jam dpal nag po'i rjes gnang bya tshul gyi yig rnying / de'i nyams len zab mo gnad bcu gcig dang ldan pa tshar chen gyis mdzad
par grags pa/ de'i sgrub thabs gu ge paNDi tas mdzad pa/ yang sgrub thabs mdzad byang mi gsal ba bcas kyi lung / klu pa'i gser chos seng ge sgra'i ngag srung grol gyi
skor la/ seng ge sgra'i man ngag klu pa'i gser chos kyi yi ger yar klungs pas zhu dag byas pa/ seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs kyi ngag 'don tshar chen gyis mdzad pa/ yang sgrub
thabs nyung ngu rmor chen gyis mdzad pa rnams kyi lung dang / tshar chen gyi yig cha'i steng nas sengge sgra'i rjes gnang / dkon lhun gyi yig cha'i steng nas seng ge
sgra'i rjes gnang bcas dang / gser chos mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong can gyi skor la/ byad ma 'bum rdugs kyi 'khor lor grags pa'i man ngag la nang gses su gdams pa byung
tshul/ rtsa ba'i sgrub thabs/ las tshogs nyer lnga bcas yod pa/ mkha' 'gro stong gi srog snying nang nas phyir bzlog pa'i thabs/ seng gdong ma'i man ngag yi ge bcu bzhi'i
las tshogs tshigs bcad ma/ tshar chen gyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs/ mkhyen brtses mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs rnams kyi lung / rmor chen gyi yig cha'i steng nas gser chos rdo
rje khyung khra'i rjes gnang lung

bcas dang / de'i chos skor la/ gser chos khyung khra'i lung gi skor 'di rnams gsan tshul gsan yig tu mi gsal yang gsan yod rtsis kyis bris pa'o/ khyung khra'i sgrub thabs mdzad

brten nas mdze gso ba'i ril bu sogs rgyas par bstan pa/ rje btsun gyis mdzad pa'i bstod pa/ bzlas lung ster ba'i man ngag rnams kyi lung dang / sa skya pa'i gser chos bcu

ma yin pa'i rjes gnang lung bcas/ 'jam mgon kun blo rang gis mdzad pa'i yig cha'i steng nas rigs byed ma tshar lugs thun mong ba dang / thun mong ma yin pa gnyis kyi
rjes gnang lung bcas/ ngag chos kyi yig cha'i steng nas gsang sgrub ku ru kulle lha lnga'i byin rlabs lung bcas/ thar paN gyi yig steng nas dA na shI la las brgyud pa'i ku

mong ma

rjes gnang / mgon

po rnam rol gyi mngon rtogs sogs kyi steng nas mgon po lha bcu gnyis ma thun mong ba'i rjes gnang / 'jam dbyangs grags pa'i sgrub thabs dang / mkhyen brtse'i tho yig sogs kyi
steng nas lha bcu gnyis ma thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / dbang rab dang ngag chos pa'i yig cha'i steng nas mgon po khro bcu'i rjes gnang lung dang bcas pa rnams sngon
du gsan nas/ grol byed kyi khrid la/ 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse'i dbang phyug gis mdzad pa'i khrid yig la zhwa lu mkhan chen gyi 'chad thabs sbyar zhing / zhal shes yig

kyi gdung rabs rnam thar

chen mo dang / yab rje nyid kyi gdung rabs zhal skong drug pa'i lo rgyus mdor bsdus de bzhin dang zhes pa'i bar/ sa skya dang e waM chos ldan chos sbyong rags bsdus/ sa skya

tshar gcod pa'i bstan bcos chen po tshad ma'i gzhung lugs grub mtha' phyi nang gnyis kas zhal gyis bzhes pa las/ nang pa'i gzhung lugs rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dag par
sgrub pa'i ched/ dgra bcom pa chos skyobs la sogs pas 'phags yul du rig gzhung rnam dag spel bar mdzad mod/ de dag las kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa ni dpal ldan chos
kyi grags pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam 'grel zhes tshad ma'i bstan bcos rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa 'di nyid/ sngon gyi lo tsA ba chen po rnams kyis ljongs 'dir
bsgyur zhing / bshad pa'i rgyun bzhugs pa ltar yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun sa skya pa chen po kun dga' snying pos dpal me dig pa dang / mes lhang 'tsher
ba sogs las tshad ma gsan pa dang / rje btsun rtse mos cha pa chos kyi sengge sogs la gsan cing / de bas kyang phul du gyur pa 'jam mgon sa skya paNDi tas/ rgya bod snga
rabs dag gi log rtog rnams lung rigs kyis sun phyung nas/ chos kyi grags pa'i dgongs pa 'khrul med du skyong bar mdzad pa sogs sa skya pa'i yab chos gras rang yin pas
na/ ring mo'i dus nas rje rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi dgongs bzhed thun mong min par gdung rgyud rnams dang / 'dir bzhugs tshad ma ba rnams la gzhung skyor zhig byung
na ci ma rung dgongs pa dam pa'i thugs bskyed mngon du gyur to/ /lo 'dir phur sgrub skabs 'cham phod rol phod/ gos bem sogs gsar bzo mdzad pa rnams ni/ da lta rtse phyag
rtsis khra'i phur sgrub

gzab mar 'don pa 'di rnams yin 'dra zhing / gos bem rnams ni da lta mdos zab dang 'dres sam snyam mo/ /dgung grangs bcu bdun du phebs pa rgyal zla'i 'go tsam nas lo de'i gro
bzhin zla 'go tsam bar yab sras rnam gsum zhal rgyas te/ phun gling bzhugs g.yab tu bcom ldan 'das dges pa rdo rje'i gzhi bsnyen la bzhugs skabs/ yab rje mchog la gzigs
snang ngo mtshar can rnams gong du song zhing / 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can gang gi 'od gsal du/ gzim chung phun tshogs dpal 'bar na/ rus pa'i rgyan drug 'dug pa/ gang
gi yab rje rigs kun khyab bdag nyid nas/ spyi bo'i 'khor lo mi bskyod pa/ rna chis bdag nyid 'od dpag med sogs rgyud tshig rnams gsungs pa dang mnyam nas so sor bstsal ba
zhig byung gsungs pa ni/ rgyud don mkhyen pa'i mkhas grub rnams kyis gzigs na sku tshe 'dir/ rdo rje theg pa nas gsungs pa'i 'khor 'das gnyis med kyi spyod pa rnam gsum
mthar phyin te/ e waM zung 'jug mngon du gyur pa'i grub rtags su gor ma chag gam snyam du sems so/ /de ltar gzhi bsnyen grol nas dga' ston sogs rgya cher mdzad pa gzhi grub
kyang lo rgyus gsal bar mi snang / lo 'di'i khrums zla'i yar tshes nas/ yab rje rigs brgya'i mgon po mchog nas/ rigs sras sku mched/ gnas gsar mchog sprul/ 'phan yul
bco brgyad gzim 'og sprul sku rnams la/ gong du bkod pa'i dbang chen dang rjes gnang zur bka'i rigs/ rdor phreng dbang dang grub

brgya'i byin rlabs/ gdung rabs sa skya bka' 'bum gyi lung gang 'gro dang / yang rje nyid mdzad kyi grangs sogs ljags lung phon che ba de nas smin zla'i bcu gcig nyin phyug
po dbu rtse'i ne'u gsing du shar gzigs/ ri bya sder ma lho gzigs/ phyag 'tshal sgang mchod rten du nub gzigs/ ga ra zhing gsar du byang gzigs bcas lho byang cha snyoms te/
byang pas lha bsangs rgyas pa sngon 'gro'i sme brtsegs/ de'i grib glud/ brgya bzhi rnams mdzad pa'i glud rnams phyogs bzhir brdzangs pa gnang / lho pas gtor ma brgya rtsa/
'byung bzhi/ cha gsum/ so 'brang / tog gzung / gtsug lag mdo bzhi rnams klog 'don/ gnas brtan phyag mchod/ bsam myur ma/ sgrol bzlog rnams smin rgyas/ mgon khang mtshan
thogs/ bon gyi phyA 'gugs/ sgrol ma dang gser 'od mtshan 'don rnam rgyal stong mchod sogs rim gro rgya cher sngon 'gro'i dmar phyogs dga' ba gnyis pa'i srod kyi cha mkha'
'gro 'du ba'i dus kyi tshe gsang khog tu/ gnya' nang sngo ra'am do ma ra yang grags pa'i bdag mo 'chi med dpal 'byor bzang mor grags pa gang gi rigs sras sku mched kyi
khab tu bzhes/ mtshan gyi mnga' gsol yang yab rje mchog nas mdzad/ rnam thar rtsa ba zhal gsungs ma las/ bco brgyad pa la dbus 'grul chen mo'i thog /'gan 'khur ma dgos
bzos bde gu yangs skabs/ /lus sems skyid po kho na'i ngang la song / /zhes pa ltar dgung grangs bco brgyad par rje

rdo rje 'chang yab sras rnam gsum/ rje btsun drung 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma/ bdag mo 'chi med dpal 'byor bzang mo/ sku zhang 'gro mgon pa dang / chos lung pa gnyis mdzod
pa gsol gzims sogs drung rigs/ ban tshang pa sogs dpon g.yog skabs su babs pa dang bcas/ gtso chen gong sa phyag na padmo 'chang ba mchog gi mjal phyag dang 'brel gang gi
rigs sras zung khrir phebs gsar 'jags legs 'bul gyi skyes dang / chabs cig jo shAka rnam gnyis sogs/ gtsang dbus lho byang gi gnas rten rnams la mchod 'bul/ dge 'dun gyi
sde rnams su bsnyen bkur dang / skye bo'i tshogs la zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya ba'i slad du/ 'di ga gdan sa chen po nas/ lcags byi rta zla'i tshes la
chibs kyi kha lo bsgyur te bar lam gyi mdzad sgo rnams gong yab rje kun blos rnam thar skabs rgyas par smos pa bzhin dang / lha ldan du bzhugs tsher lcang can du bzhugs
te yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid gdan sa nas phebs gong zhabs snyun tshul bzhes pa bar lam phal che drag skyed bzhes shing / slar stod lung chab tshan du phebs pas sing drag
gis nag zla'i tshes bcur/ gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang bstan pa'i dbang phyug 'jam dpal rgya mtsho dpal bzang po'i mjal phyag dang / tshes bzhi la
khri mjal dngos gzhir sku mdun du maNDal gsung bshad dang bcas/ 'bul ba zhabs brtan zhal bzhes zhu ba/ rten gsum gyi ljags bshad sogs mdo rgyud rgya mtsho thugs su

bzhugs pa'i rgya cher spro ba dang bcas yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas mdzad cing / 'bul dngos sogs ni rmugs 'dzin dbang po'i gan mdzod la co 'dri ba'i sgo 'phar yangs por phye
ba'i dngos skyes 'bul ba mdzad pa zhib cha mdzod deb sogs su gsal ba las 'dir ha cang mang bas 'brir ma lang ba bcas/ gong sa chen po zhabs pad yun brtan gyi mchod rdzas
su 'bul bar mdzad/ rtse po ta la'i mchod khang rnams su/ mchod tshogs rab 'byams dang bcas bstan 'gror phan pa'i thugs bskyed smon lam rgyal sras kun tu bzang po'i rnam
thar gyi rjes su 'gro ba mdzad thog de skabs kyi srid skyong mtsho smon gling pa dang / bka'i gung blon chen po rnams su'ang so so'i go babs dang bstun pa'i phyag skyes kyi
dngos po spam mtho ba bstar bar mdzad skabs gzhung sa mchog nas snga phyi bar gsum du/ skur gsos kyi dngos skyes spam ha cang mtho ba dang / gsol ston gyi rim pa yang
rgya cher bstsal te/ sa ga'i tshes gcig la phebs phyag skabs gsol ston thog dngos po bzang dgu gya nom pa'i gsol ras sogs de skabs kyi mdzod deb sogs su gsal ba bzhin stsol
thog dgyes pa'i 'dzum zhal lhug par bstan/ de dag gi bar skabs rnams su thel gyi gnas gzigs mchod 'bul sogs gnang tshul gong du sa chen kun blo'i rnam thar skabs rgyas
par smos pa bzhin dang / de nas chibs bsgyur te/ yer pa/ na landra/ rgod dkar la brgyud bsam yas sogs lho kha dang sgang brgyud lo 'di'i smin zla'i tshes

'gor gdan sa chen po 'di nyid du ser phreng gis sner 'cham mgon byin rlabs can rnams kyang phebs pa phebs bsu'i tshogs shin tu rgyas pa dang / bla brang zam sner/ 'dir bzhugs
sku ngo rnams dang / drung rigs ser skya sogs nas mjal dar phul te/ skye pho mo'i gzhas bsu dang bcas/ gzhi thog pho brang du bde bar phebs te/ de'i sang tshoms chen du
dga' ston bzhugs gral dang / de nas bstan srung rgya mtshor gtang rag sogs mdzad/ gong sa mchog tu 'bul rgyu'i zhal gyi bsrung 'khor dang chabs cig rigs sras sku mched
la'ang 'khor lo re stsol bar mdzad do/ /dgung grangs bcu dgur phebs pa/ nag zla'i tshes 'go nas bzung / rigs sras sku mched/ yar klungs mchog sprul/ ngor bla khag zhabs drung
rnams dang / bco brgyad sku mched sogs sa lugs kyi bstan 'dzin drag bsdus rnams gtso bor smos gzhis byes nas don gnyer can mang du 'dus pa'i tshogs la/ yab rje rigs
kun khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang nyid nas/ bstan srung rgya mtshor 'phrin 'chol dang 'brel nyi ma me bzhi 'grub sbyor nas dbu bzung / gong du bstan pa'i bya rgyud dbang chen
rnams dang / blo sbyong gi skor sogs chos 'khor rgya che ba dang / sa ga zla ba'i tshes gcig nas bzung gong 'khod kyi zhal slob skal ldan bcu phrag lnga lhag tsam la/ rje
btsun sa skya pa'i yab chos bla na med pa gsung ngag slob bshad bstsal ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rnams gong du bstan pa bzhin gsan bsam mthar phyin pa mdzad cing / chu
stod

zla nang gong sa rgyal dbang mchog nas lugs gnyis thugs 'gan bzhes pa'i legs skyes bstar ba dang chabs cig gang gi rigs sras sku mched la sngon du tham ga che chung gsar pa
mdzad pa/ 'di skabs yab rje'i bka' bzhin 'di ga'i rten ji snyed pa dang gong sa rgyal ba'i dbang po sogs la tham phud 'bul ba bcas mdzod 'dzin par bka' sdom gyis 'khor skabs/
skabs gang ci'i gsung shog legs lam dge ba skyes bzang gis spa bas mtshon/ rin po che khams brgyad kyi dzhaikShi las grub pa'i mkha' spyod rdo rje btsun mo'i snang
brnyan che chung gsum rje rdo rje 'chang yab sras zhal rnam pa gsum la dgyes bstsal dang mnyam du/ gang gi yab rje mchog la phan khang dpon po sogs nas nA ro mkha' spyod
ma'i 'dod chos zhu ba skabs 'grig sogs la nye 'grig par byung / lcags glang lo de'i bar seng zhig tu rigs sras 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can nyid nas dpal chen rdo rje gzhon
nu'i dus grangs kyi bsnyen mthar phyin par mdzad skabs mgo zla'i bcu gsum tho rangs zha lu yin snyam pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig 'dug pa/ phyi rol na khyung nag gi snang
brnyan sku zhig dang / phor pa zhig snang ba gang gi yab rje mchog nas phor ba 'di sngar dang mi 'dra ba'i yag tu song 'dug gsungs pa 'dra po dang / de'i phu de na 'jam
mgon sa skya paNTi ta'i snang brnyan shin tu sgros pa zhig la rang res phul snyam pa'i sa zhu rgya mdud ma zhig bzhes nas/ zhal 'dzum dpag med mdzad mur bzhin ras la nyi
ma shar ba zhig dang / yang rgyal

zla'i bcu gsum tho rangs/ 'jam mgon sa paN zhal 'dzum can dang / jo bo rje'i thugs dam sgrol ma zhig sgo rum ye shes mgon po gzi gdangs can du bsgyur ba zhig dang / rta zla'i
tshes bzhi'i tho rangs/ lha ldan bcu gcig zhal gtsug lag khang yin snyam pa zhig bzhugs khang ha cang mi legs pa'i nang 'jam dbyangs kyi sku zhig gi sku pang na/ rgya
khab mang po dang sha sbrang sogs yod par/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas 'di 'dra'i byin rlabs la chod gang yod rang rer yod na bzhugs khyim dga' ba zhig chos yong gsung mur/
de na mgon khang zhig 'dug par yab rje nyid nas 'dir las gshin gyi sku mtshams zhig mdzod dang gsungs mur nyid nas/ o~M ka la ru pa hU~M phaT/ zhes gsungs mur/ sku yod
snyam pa zhig mdun/ tsandan dmar po'i sgrub khung nang chu nag thing nge zhig gis gang 'dug dgongs pa sogs mnal lam ngo mtshar can 'di rnams/ sa chen kun blos phyag rtags
thor 'god par mdzad 'dug pa zhig zhal bshus pa legs shing / de yang sa paN gyi snang brnyan sgros gtsang ba nyi ma shar ba dang bcas pa/ sa bstan dar rgyas yun brtan dang
/ 'on kyang sa bdag klu gnyan gyi gdon gnod thu bar/ mnyen por rdo rje khyung gi sgrub pa dgos pa dang / bcu gcig zhal dang 'jam dbyangs bzhugs khang mi legs pa sogs ni/
ring min bod 'dir dmag sogs kyi rkyen pas rgyal dbang yab sras sogs kyi mdzad 'phrin la cung zad gnod 'gal che bar/ nyid nas las gshin ni mtshon

pa tsam ste drag las dmag bzlog mang du gnang dgos pa'i rtags mtshon du nges snyam te/ rgyal dbang padma ka ras kyang / bal bod mtshams su dbang gi ming can 'byung / /mtha'
dmag bzlog pa'i rten 'brel de la yod/ /ces lung bstan pa dang 'dra bar sems/ gzhan yang lo phyi nang 'di rnams su sgo rum ye shes mgon po'i drung du yab rje rdo rje 'chang
gi bka' bzhin gong sa rgyal ba'i dbang po dgung skeg snga bsu'i zhabs rim du/ 'jam mgon sku mched rje btsun drung bco brgyad sku mched sogs/ chog gra bcas nas bskang 'phrin
nyin grangs du ma mdzad cing / bar seng rnams su yab rdo rje 'chang la gong du bshad pa'i dmar po skor gsum gtso bor smos pa'i gser chos bcu gsum gyi skor rnams kyang
gsan bzhes mdzad/ lo 'dir gro bzhin zla bar dpal chen rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod kyi rdo rje slob dpon thog mar mdzad skabs yin te rnam thar zhal gsungs ma las/ bcu
dgu pa la yab rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /phur sgrub chen mo'i rdo rje slob dpon byas/ /de tshe sgrig lam kun spyod ma lus pa'i/ /'gan 'khur gang yod bdag la 'bog par mdzad/ /rnam
'dren yab rje thugs rje che drags pas/ /grwa mangs rnams nas bdag la brtsi 'jog med/ /de tshe skabs shig bdag gis yab rje la/ /sku zhabs rang gis mi mang thams cad la/
/thugs rje'i zhal 'dzum du ma mdzad drags pas/ /bdag la brtsi mkhan mi 'dug ces zhus pas/ /drin can bla ma'i bka' las 'di skad

gsungs/ /a ma jo jos bstan bshig yong ba la/ /de tshe kho yi don rang bcur rgyu red/ /ces gsungs sang nyin nas bzung rdo rje 'chang / /zhal dkyil nag par mdzad pas dga' mo
byung / /zhes gsungs pa ltar dang / 'khor lo bde mchog gi gzhi bsnyen sbyin sreg bcas lo gang mdzad pa yin te/ rnam thar rtsa tshig las/ nyi shu pa la dam pa'i bka' bzhin
du/ /bde mchog nag po lugs kyi gzhi'i bsnyen pa/ /las bzhi'i sbyin sreg bcas pa lo gang byas/ /de tshe bar chad gzhan gyis ma tshugs kyang / /lha lcam rdo dmar ba der rigs
kyi bu/ /ngo mtshar khyad 'phags bltams pa de 'phral gshegs/ /bdag gi bsnyen sgrub sbyin sreg byed lugs la/ /yab rje shin tu dgongs pa rdzogs na yang / /bu chung ma bzhugs
rkyen sogs 'ga' zhig la/ /brtan pa'i yab gcig rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /thugs 'byung bzhes te gzhan don dgongs pa gtad/ /zhes gsungs pas shes nus so/ /dgung grangs nyi
shur phebs pa chu stag dbyug zla tsam la bsnyen pa sbyin sreg bcas grol bar/ de skabs mtshan rtags sogs ngo mtshar du ma byung yod pa gzhir grub kyang lo rgyus gsal ba
ma mthong zhing / lo 'dir zangs ldan nye 'dabs rmu rdzing mgon khang rten bcas me bzhes kyi dus rtags bod spyir ngan pa yab rje rdo rje 'chang mchog thugs ngal bzod glags
med pas rgyal ba yab sras sogs la snyan 'bul gyi zhabs rim mdzad gal che ba zhu gnang mdzad pa dang dus mtshungs tsam la/ paN chen blo bzang dpal ldan ye shes rgya nag tu

dag zhing la dgongs sku gegs bzlog med kyi rnam pa shar ba la rje yab sras nas rnying ma rgyud 'bum tshar lnga bcur nye ba gsungs sgrogs gnang zhing / sgo rum sogs su bskang
'phrin la nyin grangs du ma thugs gzhol ba'i skabs so/ /dgung grangs nyer gcig pa la yab rje'i bka' bzhin dus mdos chen mo'i rdo rje slob dpon mdzad tshul rnam thar rtsa
tshig las/ nyer gcig pa la yab rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /sa skya'i dus mdos chen mo'i slob dpon byas/ /de tshe nyer gsum dus mdos grol snga bas/ /yab rje cung zad dgongs pa
ma dgyes te/ /bdag la rdo rje'i bka' nan 'di ltar phebs/ /'o byung de rigs mdos chen dbyangs res ni/ /nged rang tshogs la 'gro skabs gnyan mgon gyi/ /dam tshig bskang ba'i
phyur ma tsam las mdos/ /'di bzhin gyis shig rang re'i phyag len rnams/ /myur du nub par 'dug go gsung ba las/ /bdag ni sems rgyud ngar bas 'di skad zhus/ /da nang 'cham
sku gdan 'dren kho la yang / /gur phug grwa pa rin chen slebs ma byung / /skya bo dpon la mgo rkang sgrig rgyu med/ /bdag gi grwa tshang mchod dpon kho pa la/ /'di rnams
nged la brnyas bcos yin nges pas/ /brgya phyag khol la tshogs dka' gcod byas kyang / /brgya phyag yin zer sgur tsam su yis 'gel/ /tshogs skal gcod pa yang ni su yis byed/
/'di tsho'i kha ya bdag gis mi yong zhes/ /zhus pas yab rje'i bka' las 'di skad gsungs/ /ha cang ngan langs btang ba'i skyon 'dra bas/ /bca' yig de yi 'bru snon dgos
par 'dug /gsungs pa'i don

bzhin sang nyin tho rengs der/ /brgya dpon dbu mdzad grwa tshang mchod dpon rnams/ /nged kyi gam du bkug nas bca' yig bklags/ /rang gis gang shes rdzig rdzig dpe med btang
/ /gsol ba'i thog tu dbyangs dpon thams cad la/ /bca' yig bsgrags la dbyangs kyi ring thung tshad/ /nged kyi lcam ze'i sbugs nas lag brda byed/ /de la ltos nas ring bar rgyong
dgos kyi/ /da dung nga yis bkod pa mi byed na/ /dus mdos slob dpon nged kyi mi yong bas/ /nga ni tshogs nas log nas 'gro nges yin/ /byas pas nyer bzhi'i dus mdos grol
ba'i skabs/ /srod chen phag sna zin pa'i dus slebs 'dug /dbyangs sbyongs grub nas yab rje'i drung phyin pas/ /yab rje gzims nas bdag la su yin gsungs/ /bdag yin zhus pas
bla ma byang chub sems/ /thugs 'gal zhi nas bzhad sgra dang bcas pas/ /bdag la a da do tshe jo legs khos/ /bstan bshig 'di 'dra yong ba e ma mtshar/ /'di 'dra'i mdos chen
ha cang rgyas drags pas/ /da ni ma byed grwa pa 'o brgyal gsungs/ /bdag gis 'di tsho ga tsam gal na'ang gal/ /mdos chen mgyogs su mi gtong thag chod yin/ /zhus pas thugs
rje che gsungs bzhad mo mdzad/ /nyer dgu'i gtor ma thebs nas yar slebs skabs/ /yab rje thugs nyams 'ur ba'i rnam pa yis/ /rab dkar lha gos srid du ring ba zhig /bdag
dang nu bor stsal nas 'di skad gsungs/ /rang re'i 'khrul zad rje btsun sa skya pa'i/ /bstan pa rin chen da ni zin song gsungs/ /

de ring khyed kyi sngags dpyangs ring mo'i skabs/ /nged kyis bzlas pa lnga brgya song zhes gsungs/ /ha re rdo rje mdzad nas bzhad sgra bcas/ /gzim spyil sgrub khang che la
phogs song lags/ /zhes pa ltar mdzad nas/ rgyal zla'i nang rgyal ba tshe mtha' yas pa'i ljags bsnyen zla gang mar gzhol bar mdzad/ 'di skabs yab rje kun blo nyid 'di ga'i
gdan sa'i sku rim chen mo'i zor 'dzin mdzad rgyu'i dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i ljags bsnyen zla gsum mar bzhugs skabs dang / rdo rje'i sku la rtag brtan gzhom gzhig bral
yang / snyigs dus kyi sems can rnams bsod nams dman pas/ zhabs 'bam chab bsags sogs mtha' ma'i snyun gzhi'i 'go bzhes par/ gzhung sger nas zhabs brtan rgya cher 'bad sgrub
mdzad kyang drag skyed ma bzhed par brten rje nyid sogs nas/ zla mjug sku rim chen mor yang ma phebs na ji ltar lags kyi snyan zhu mdzad pa'i phyir phebs su/ spyir lhag
pa lha'i ljags bsnyen yang dag don ldan snyun gzhi mthu med de lta bur ji snyam du yang mi sems par sku srog phangs med du mdzad pa'i 'bras bu mthar phyin pa dang / yang
sgos rje btsun sa skya pa'i gdung rabs phyis 'byung 'di bzhin mdzad mkhan rnams la sri ngan gyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir/ da lam cis kyang phebs dgos gsungs te phur bzlog
gi tshogs dbu rdo rje slob dpon gnang skabs kyang ngo mtshar rdzu 'phrul gyi mdzad pa 'di ltar mthong ste/ snyun gzhi de lta bu la ni/ 'jig rten na skye bo phal che drag
zhan ji snyedapa

dag rnga rol me nye sogs spang bya dang / zas spyod sogs 'phrod bsten 'dzol med bgyis kyang ngal ba 'bras med du song ba mang zhing / yab rje nyid nas de rnams blang bya lta
bur mdzad kyang / sku la cung zad kyang ma gnod pa'i khar bder song ba'i tshul gyis gtor bzlog mthar phyin gnang ba dang / de nas sku'i 'phrod bzhes gnad snun mdzad rgyu
lta bus tshoms dmar mkha' spyod tu phebs te/ sku khams re 'jog kho na la zhabs pad yun brtan gyi bgyi ba mtha' dag 'bad sgrub dang / 'di skabs kyang skal ldan rnams la
rjes gnang zab mo'i rigs sum cu tsam dang / lhag par rje nyid sogs zhal ngo rnams kyi dbu byed phyag gnyer sogs drag zhan ji snyed par bzhugs khri padma can gyi steng nas
rnam sras ser can gyi rjes gnang bstsal te/ 'byung 'gyur bstan srid kyi bgyi ba mtha' dag yar 'phel 'thus ma shor ba dgos rgyu'i bka' bkod dang / phur sgrub skabs 'grem
rgyu'i dra phyed nor 'phreng phye phur sogs bzang gos las bskrun pa ngo mtshar can deng skabs kyang snang ba 'di rnams gsar bskrun zin te gzigs lam du yang phab pa sogs la
bstan 'gro'i don kho nar nam yang lhod pa med thog kha'u dang mang khar chab tshan 'phrod bzhes rnams kyang gdul bya'i re skong tsam du chibs bsgyur gnang tshul bstan kyang
/ gdan sa 'di nyid kyi bstan srid la sku gegs bzlog med dang / gdul bya rnams kyi bsod nams dus gcig tu zad par brten/ 'di bas zhing khams gzhan du 'gro don rgya che
bar

gzigs te/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la bskul ba dang / rtag 'dzin can rnams chos la bskul ba'i phyir lo de'i snron zla phyi ma'i tshes gnyis kyi nyi dro'i khar ngo mtshar
ba'i ltas du ma dang bcas re zhig gzugs sku'i bkod pa chos kyi dbyings su bsdus par brten/ rigs sras 'jam mgon sku mched zung / rje btsun bdag mo sogs dang / mdzod pa sogs
zhabs 'bring pa rnams dang bcas pa thugs ngal bzod glags med pa 'jig rten pa'i gtam dper/ byi phrug thang skyur ri ma spang nas bu dor gyi ngang tshul la ci mdzad rol
med du gyur pa'i tshul rnams yab rje gang gi gsol 'debs phyogs rgyal ma'i sbyar byang las/ snyigs ma bas kyang ches snyigs ma rtags tsam 'dzin pa la nye ba'i dus 'dir bde
bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che spyi dang / bye brag rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan pa rin po che la bzlog tu med pa'i sku gegs dang / khyad par bdag sa skya bdag po'i
gzugs brnyan dbang gi ming can dang / bdag gi nu bo e waM bzang po/ a Ni kun dga' bsod nams bstan pa'i nyi ma dang kun skyid chos skal bzang mo/ a lce 'chi med bstan pa'i
nyi ma/ lcam 'chi med dpal 'byor bzang mo ltos par bcas pa'i bsod nams kyi nyi ma dgung du nub pa'i dus dang / khyad par skal dman dbang gi ming can bdag gis bskal pa
dpag tu med pa nas bsags pa'i las ngan gyi 'bras bu thog tu smin pa'i dus 'dir kho bo'i lus kyi srog chad pa dang / gdong gi mig ldong ba/ pang

pa'i nor bu bor ba'i dus mthong ba'i skabs su kho bo sa skya pa'i gzugs brnyan 'u thug cing / hon 'thor ba/ skal pa dman pa/ mya ngan drag pos non pa khos ngu ma lab kyis sug
bris su bgyis pa 'dis dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs dgongs rdzogs pa dang / bdag sogs sems can thams cad sdug bsngal drag po las grol ba'i rgyur gyur cig zhes gsungs pa ltar
dang / dgung zhag ring 'jam mgon sku mched nas/ dpal 'khor lo bde mchog grub chen nag po pa'i lugs kyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub cing mchod pa dang / rje btsun 'chi
med bstan pa'i nyi ma nas mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub mchod/ btsun mo a Ni drung kun skyid lags nas kyang / dgongs rdzogs sgrub mchod chos sde lho byang 'dus tshogs res skor
gyis/ kun rig kyai rdor/ gsang 'dus/ 'jigs byed ro langs brgyad skor/ bdag med ma/ phur pa/ gur drag rnams kyi dkyil 'khor zhal phye ste mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen dang
bcas/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rnams dang / rigs bdag yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid dbyer med par/ sgrub cing mchod bstod gsol ba 'debs pa/ bdag 'jug dbang bzhi len pa sogs
dang / sku spur yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po cher/ tshoms dmar du mchod tshogs dbus su gdan drangs te/ zhal ngo rnams kyis mtshon nye 'khor lha sde mi sde sogs nas byin
rlabs zhu bar mdzad rjes rgyud sde nas bshad pa'i sku gdung chas bzhugs kyi/ lha khang mkhan chen sogs nas dus mtha'i cho ga'i sgo nas byin

zar spur sbyong dang / gdung rus rnams btul te satstsha dri med snying po can 'bum brgal ba/ bla ma yi dam chos srung nor lha bcas kyi sku spar grangs med btab/ chos lhun ri
sgang sngags drug sogs nas bla mchod/ smon lam/ gsol 'debs le tshan rnams la/ rtag 'grus dang / mang ja/ brgya mchod/ stong mchod/ snyan shal sogs ni grangs las 'das pa
bcas/ 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan 'chang nyid mdzod pa bcas nas bka' 'khor gyis 'doms par mdzad cing / gzhan yang skabs der gdan sar bzhugs mus/ yab rje dam pa gang gi dngos
slob/ yar klungs mchog sprul nam mkha' legs pa mchog nas bdun gsum ring gi kyai rdor sgrub mchod/ bco brgyad mched sogs nas kun rig sogs dgongs pa zab mo rdzogs thabs
rgya che rgyun 'khyongs su mdzad skabs spyi sger nas bsnyen bkur zab mos dus 'das shing / dgung zhag thim nyin mchod sprin dang / dge 'dun bsnyen bkur/ sbyin gtong rgya cher
sogs mdzad skabs rnams su nam 'kha' mdangs gsal zhing / 'ja' 'od 'khyil ba dang / me tog gi char ni rtag par khor mo yug dang lo ltar dus dran gyi thog tu'ang 'bab pa
sogs zhib cha gong yab rje mchog gi rnam thar bzhin dang / gzhan yang lha ldan jo shAka rnam gnyis kyis mtshon/ dbus gtsang mnga' ris lho phyogs gnas rten rnams la mchod
'bul/ gong gsal de rnams kyi dgon grub mtha' ris med bzhi brgya brgal tsam la/ mang 'gyed bsnyen bkur/ sa

lugs ngor mus yar lung gong dkar sogs sngags dgon rnams su rgyud sde khag gi sgrub mchod dgos cha bcas pa rgya che ba dang / rgyal dbang yab sras/ dge ldan khri pa/ gling khag
gi hu thog thu'i rigs sogs dang bar gyi sprul sku rnam gsum/ yab rje bde bar gshegs pa de nyid kyi dbu bla khag sogs zur 'bul 'os pa rnams la bsngo rten mtshan grangs
na bza' skor spyad sogs rgya dpangs che ba/ khyad par dngul srang chig stong chig brgya re bdun zho drug gser srang brgyad cu gya brgyad dang zho phyed brgyad las grub pa'i
byang chub mchod rten rin po che'i phra rgyan gyis phyug pa dang/ 'dra sku rin po che gsar bskrun/ lha chen khyams stod du rgyal ba tshe mtha' yas pa'i snang brnyan/
rgya dngul rdo tshad brgya rtsar nye ba las grub pa bcas su gong gsal spur cha gdung rus sogs byin rten sna mang bcas bzhugs pa dang / rab gnas thang ston ser 'du bcas/ lo
ltar gyi dus dran gyi mchod par 'jigs byed rwa lugs bcu gsum ma'i sgrub mchod dang/ lho pas/ sdom gsum rab dbye/ kha skong rnam 'grel gyi gzhung skyor/ ser tshogs bcas
