ji srid bar sgrub bzhin pa/ 'di rnams gsar btsugs sogs yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid kyi dgongs rdzogs rgya che smin sgrub mdzad tshul sogs zhib pa gong yab rje'i rnam thar
skabs su smos zin pa bzhin de skor gyi rnam thar mdor bsdus zhal gsung ma las/ lo de'i snron zla phyi bshol tshes gnyis nyin/ /skyabs gcig yab rje grub pa'i dbang phyug
nyid/ /dgongs pa chos kyi

dbyings su thim tshul bstan/ /kyee ma bla ma bral ba'i mgon med bdag /dam chos nor la dbang ba'i skal bas dben/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar dang / 'di skabs chos sde byang 'dir sgrigs
lam rnams cung zad nyag phra bar/ da lta'i ban tshang chos khrims chen mo'am/ dge bskos su grags pa 'di bzhin bca' yig dang bcas sku mdun rang du gsar bkod kyi thog
mar/ gro bzhin zla ba'i tshes bzhi/ nyi ma me bzhi 'grub sbyor nyin bzhengs te/ sgrigs gnon bya rgyu mdzad cing / cho ga phyag len che phra mtha' dag zhib bkod kyis ban tshang
pa'i deb chen du grags pa dang / rgyud sde khag gi rdul tshon 'grems tho/ da ltar tshon dbor pa 'di rnams deb sgrig mdzad de ban tshang pa so so'i lta zhib mthil phyin
bgyid pa las phyir gyar mi chog pa'i bka' gtad mdzad pa bcas/ nyams pa sor chud dar rgyas yun brtan gnas pa 'di bzhin byung zhing / lo 'dir phur sgrub skabs yab rje dam
pa mchog nas 'go 'gyangs gsar bzo mdzad pa bzhin 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can nyid nas tshogs dbus su 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i phur pa'i rnam bshad sogs
kyi steng nas dag gsal snyan gsum dang 'brel ba'i gsung bshad bka' drin bskyangs pa'i tshul rnams rnam thar rtsa tshig las/ 'di lo phur sgrub chen mo'i bshad las kyi/ /las
'khur skal dman mu med bdag gis zhus/ /zhes pa ltar rnam thar rnams su gsung bshad kho na las las rim sogs ni phyir lo gnang tshul 'dug cing / 'di

lo gzhan yang mdzad 'phrin 'ga' re yong ba gzhir grub kyang zin bris mi gnang bas 'bri bar rngo mi thogs shing / dgung grangs nyer gnyis su phebs pa shing 'brug rgyal zla'i
nang / 'gro mgon dpal ldan chos skyong ngam dbang sdud snying po bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po gang nyid/ gzhi thog tshoms dmar du bla chen 'phags pa rin
po che'i bzhugs khrir gzhung sa mchog nas bkod rgya dang bcas 'di ga'i chos srid kyi bdag por rgyal tshab tu mnga' gsol te/ sku ngo rnams dang / mkhan phyag gnyer gsum drung
rigs ser skya bla gnyer/ gzhis gnyer khag sogs nas khri 'bul mjal dar sogs bstar te/ 'di nas bzung skabs re tsam ma gtogs/ phur sgrub mdos chen gtor spod chen mo lo
gnang dus kyi ril sgrub/ lha mo gsol mchod/ bla ma gong ma'i dus dran sgrub mchod sogs la rtag par phebs te/ rdo rje slob dpon mdzad pa dang 'brel/ rgyud sde so so'i dkyil
'khor rnams su skal ldan rnams la smin byed kyi dbang bskur ba grol byed kyi lam ston pa sogs sa chen gong ma'i phyag srol bzhin/ dgung grangs nyer gnyis tsam nas gong
yab rje rdo rje 'chang la gsan ma thub pa'i zab chos rnams gsan tshul gong 'phros rnam thar rtsa tshig las/ de nas ma 'gyangs nyer gnyis nas bzung ste/ /sum cu bzhi bcu skor
la rang nyid kyis/ /sngon bsags bsod nams mthu las dam pa'i chos/ /nor bu sgo skyel mdzad pa'i bka' drin can/ /ngor chen kun bsod ngor mkhan khang

gsar ba/ /rgyal ba mus pa rje dang 'jam dbyangs bzhad/ /blo gros 'od zer kun dga' rab rgyas mtshan/ /bzang ldan slob dpon khyab bdag zhwa lu ba/ /byams pa rin chen sbyin pa
chos 'phel dang / /bshes gnyen chen po ngag dbang dge legs zhabs/ /bka' drin mnyam med bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan sogs/ /rang lugs bla ma mang pos rjes su bzung / /padma mkhyen
brtse pad ma bshes gnyen dang / /grub dbang na bza' pa dang ja lung ba/ /'gro ba'i mgon dang rig 'dzin rdo dmar ba/ /rgyang mkhar rje dang 'jigs med go cha'i zhabs/
/snang mdzad rdo rje rnal 'byor skad gtong ba/ /he ru ka dpal ma he chen po dang / /rig 'dzin snying ri ba sogs mang po la/ /gsang chen rnying ma'i chos dang bo dong chos/
/rgyal ba 'brug pa'i dam chos mang du nos/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ ngor chen kun dga' bsod nams las rgyun gyi thugs dam rigs kha gso dang / tshe dbang tsam gsan yod na las
rgya cher ma gsan/ ngor khang gsar bsod nams bstan 'dzin las zhal spod nor bu'i do zhags dkar chag gi zin pa dang ma zin pa yongs rdzogs kyi lung gsan pa dang / mus chen
grub pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid ye shes las/ gsang 'dus 'jam rdor bka' babs dgu ldan/ gsang 'dus jo lugs spyan ras gzigs/ bde mchog lo hi pa/ dril bu lus dkyil/ 'jigs byed
sa lugs dang ro langs brgyad skor 'jigs byed rwa lugs lha bcu gsum ma rnams kyi dbang chen/ rwa khrid mkha' 'gro snyan

brgyud sogs dang dpa' gcig gi rjes gnang dang / dug dbang ma gtogs pa'i rwa spod rnams kyi lung dang / las gshin lha bcu gsum ma/ dpa' gcig khrag mdog yab yum/ bse bya bzhi
skor/ 'jigs byed sngags btu rnams kyi rjes gnang bcas gsan/ thugs rje phyag chen zung 'jug gi rjes gnang / dmar khrid tshem bu lugs/ rgyal po lugs/ ma Ni bka' 'bum gyi lung
dang bcas pa/ smin gling thugs chen 'gro ba kun sgrol/ byang gter 'khor ba dong sprul rnams kyi dbang lung khrid gsum tshang ba/ gshed dmar lha lnga'i dbang chen spros
med nyams khrid yig cha rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa/ zab lam ni gu chos drug gi dbang byin rlabs nyams khrid rgyab rten lung dang bcas pa cha tshang / tshe dbang grub rgyal
ma/ bla ma zhi khro/ tshe dbang lcags sdong ma/ mda' 'phel ma rnams kyi dbang dang / gur mgon lha dgu'i rjes gnang sngon 'gro'i gsang khrid gsan pa'i brgyud pa ni/ gnas
gsar pa kun dga' legs byung nas/ mus chen bsod nams dpal bzang / zhe dgon mkhan po rje dge 'dun bstan 'phel de las mus chen gyis gsan/ mgon pod me 'bar ma/ kha skong
/ snyan brgyud/ khyi ljang ngur pod rnams kyi lung gsan brgyud pa/ sa chen kun blo nas rin chen rgyal mtshan/ byams pa bstan 'dzin de las mus chen/ lha chen mkhan po kun
dga' rab rgyas las/ sbyong rgyud dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang chen dang / mgon po zhal gyi tshe sgrub gur bdun ma dang /

gsang khrid sogs gsan pa/ brgyud pa sa chen kun blo nas/ sde dge sman bla dkon mchog grags pa las kun rab kyis gsan 'dug 'jam bzhad dngos slob blo gros 'od zer las zhal rnam
'gyur gcun sogs kyi rjes gnang rnams dang / 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa sku gong ma las zhal pod ha la nag po'i be'u bum gyi lung gsan/ brgyud pa gnas gsar kun legs la gsan 'dug
khyab bdag zhwa lu pa mtshungs med rin chen sbyin pa chos 'phel las/ dus 'khor byis 'jug gong ma gong chen bdag po chen po dang bcas pa'i dbang / dus 'khor sdom chen/
sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor/ sgyu ma chen po lha lnga/ dril bu lus dkyil phyag rdor 'khor chen rnams kyi dbang chen rdo dbyings/ rtse mo/ dpal mchog rigs bsdus/ 'jam dpal gsang
ldan/ shaka seng lha dgu sogs yon dkyil chen po rnams kyi dbang / spyod rgyud rnam snang mngon byang / bya rgyud gdugs dkar nyer bdun/ phyag rdor 'gro bzang lugs/ don
zhags lha mang rnams kyi dbang chen/ rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i rjes gnang / rnam sras zhi drag gi be'u bum gyi lung sogs gsan/ sde dge zhu chen tshul khrims rin chen
gyi dben po/ ngag dbang dge legs lhun grub las/ bcu gcig zhal lha so bdun ma/ bde mchog mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho/ phyag rdor 'chi bdag 'joms pa lha bcu gsum pa/ tshe dpag med
gsung dkyil le tshan/ kyai rdor bka' babs bzhi/ gser chos dmar po skor gsum gyi be'u

bum/ dkar chag gi zin pa dang ma zin pa yongs rdzogs kyi lung dang dam pa'i mkhyud dpyad dkar nag khra gsum gyi lung sogs gsan/ rgyud pa sa chen kun blo nas/ phur bla sangs
rgyas bzang po/ de la khu dbon gyis gsan/ dpon slob byams pa bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan las/ sa skya bka' 'bum yongs rdzogs kyi lung sde spar dkar chag bzhin gsan/ brgyud sa
chen kun blo nas/ lha chen mkhan po chos bkra shis/ de nas kun rab nas brgyud do/ /rdo brag rig 'dzin yang zab padma bshes gnyen las smin gling 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang gi
dbang lung tshang ma/ rig 'dzin 'jigs med go cha las/ ra ston phur dbang dang / gzhung pod kyi lung / gter ston 'ja' tshon snying po'i dkon mchog spyi 'dus kyi dbang nyams
khrid chos skor rnams kyi lung dang bcas pa/ gter bdag gling pa'i gshin rje dregs 'joms/ rdo sems/ a ri zab don snying po rnams kyi dbang dang gzhung pod rnams kyi lung
/ ratna gling pa'i phur pa yang gsang bla med kyi dbang lung / byang gter byin rlabs thugs dbang yang tig gces sgron gyi nyams khrid/ chos tshan nyer lnga them yod sogs
gzhung pod kyi lung / byang gter rig 'dzin gdung sgrub kyi dbang lung / drang srong log tri'i dbang dang / gzhung pod kyi lung / rnying ma rgyud 'bum lung sogs rgya chen
gsan/ yongs 'dzin skal bzang bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan las byang gter thugs sgrub dbang rgyas 'bring sgrub skor lung sogs gsan/ khyab bdag

snang mdzad rdo rje las bo dong ba'i thugs dam gtor rgyun rgya mtsho las/ byin rlabs rjes gnang sogs nyis brgya lnga bcu nga lnga tsam gsan pa sogs dang / rnal 'byor pa rlung
sems la dbang 'byor ba ma he skad gtong ba las 'brug pa bka' brgyud pa'i lugs na ro chos drug skor/ rlung sbyong dang lus sbyong gi phyag khrid sogs dang / gzhan rnam
thar zhal gsung ma 'dir gsal ba'i gsar ma'i skor la/ bzang ldan slob dpon dang / rnying ma'i dbu bla'i gras nas/ pad ma mkhyen brtse grub dbang na za ba sogs kha shas gsan
yin sogs su mi gsal ba chad lus song ba 'dra ba bcas grub mtha' ris med kyi bla ma 'di rnams 'ga' zhig la dbang lung sogs rgya che ba dang / tha na'ang chos 'brel tsam
gsan yod nges bcas/ gsan pa rgya mtsho'i pha mthar son pa 'di dag kyang dgung grangs so brgyad yan la yin cing / de nas kyang lo grangs bcu tsam bzhugs pa/ de lhag gsan nges
snyam pa 'di dag kyang / ming rkyang tsam du ma lus pa bsam pas sgro 'dogs bcad de bsgoms pas nyams su bstar dgos pa yang / tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pas/ /bsgom
pa la ni rab tu sbyor/ /zhes pa ltar/ lhag pa'i lha yi bsnyen sgrub snga phyir mdzad tshul rnam thar zhal gsung ma las/ dges pa rdo rje bde mchog nag po la/ /rdo rje gzhon
nu badzra bhai ra ba/ /tshe dpag lha dgu 'chi med dpal ster dang / /phyag rdor gtum po drang srong log tri dang / /mkha' 'gro seng gdong ma hA kA la dang / /

tsaturmu kha la sogs gsar rnying gi /yi dam chos skyong bsnyen pa mang du byas/ /drag sngags nus pa che ba'i tshad kyang byas/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ sngon du mdzad zin pa dang
/ phyis nas mdzad pa 'ga' zhig rnam thar 'di nyid gong 'og rnams su rags tsam thon pa ltar dang zhib cha lo khams 'dir gnang gi zin bris gsal ba mi snang bas 'di'i mtshon
te shes par bya'o/ /dgung grangs nyer gnyis pa gdan sa 'di nyid na bzhugs pa'i bstan zhabs/ mgon po drug cu'i zor 'dzin sogs gnang tshul gong 'phros rnam thar las/ nyer
gnyis lo la mgon po drug cu dang / /sku rim chen mor grags pa'i phur bzlog dang / /mgon mdos zab ma la sogs dus rims kyi/ /zor 'dzin slob dpon las 'khur bgyis nas su/
/rtogs pa mi mtho mtho mdog mang po byas/ /bdag la las kyis ded pa'i chos med tshos/ /grub thob dpe med yin par khas kyang blangs/ /de 'dra zhig nas 'go brtsams dbus phyogs
dang / /khams phyogs rgya nag yul sogs thams cad du/ /'ben ci gro lod spro thung bdag nyid la/ /grub thob grub thob zer ba'i mi kha dar/ /zhes sogs gsungs pa ni rang
nyid khengs rlom skyung ba dam pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan du shes bzhin sgro btags kyi grub rtags mngon shes rdzu 'phrul yod skad zol zog ri bong cal 'drogs kyis rgyal khams
bskor te rnyed pa tshol zhing gal che dgos dus sogs ci yang mi shes pa'i las 'bras rgyab bskyur gyi mthu stobs chen por rloms pa rnams

dang ye nas mi 'dra ba'i tshul nang du rlung sems la dbang thob pas bskyed rim la brtan pa thob cing / bzlas brjod rab 'byams kyi nus pa mthar phyin pas lha 'dre mi gsum dbang
du 'dus shing / lhag par 'og tu gsal ba bzhin/ zab phu'i gnas chen rnams su/ brag g.yang su yang mi thar ba rnams su rdzu 'phrul gyis skad cig la byon te zab gter 'ga'
zhig bzhes pa dang / bzhes 'phror lus shul sogs deng dus kun gyi mig sngar gsal ba/ thogs med kyi rdzu 'phrul sogs dang / sa gter la dbang ba 'phags lam sa dang po dang
dgu pa sogs ma 'grong par mi dbang ba'i tshul rgyal ba'i mdo rgyud bstan bcos thams cad nas gsungs pas na mngon sum tshad mas grub bo/ /dgung grangs nyer gsum tsam la/ 'di
ga'i las rim gras dpal mgon zhal bzhi'i sgrub bsnyen sngon 'gro'i zor 'phen sogs mdzad pa ste/ bsnyen sgrub skabs mtshan ma ji ltar byung tshul rnams zin thor 'god par
mdzad pa las 'di ltar byung ste/ hor zla bcu gcig pa'i tshes bcu bdun nyin snga thun gyi spyan 'dren skabs sgrub khang gi gdung byang ma la tshag sgra shin tu che ba dang
/ bcu dgu'i snga thun gyi bzlas pa tshugs 'phral kho bo'i mthong snang du sa stegs kyi g.yon zur du btsun pa dar yol gdong thams cad sbos shing ngu ba zhig mthong ba dang
/ de rjes thun ma grol tsam la rdo rje dpal 'byor kho bo'i mdun na bsdad yod par/ sgrub khang gi sgo rtsa nas hel hel zer mkhan zhig 'dug zer nas ltar song bas su yang
med pa

zhig dang / tshes nyi shu'i snga thun grol nas nged rnams gung tshigs kyi skabs rdo rje dpal 'byor gyi sgrub gtor rnams la gtor kha gso skabs sgrub khang la rjes dkar gnyis
yod pas nub mar phyi nas rdo 'phangs pa lta bu'i theg sgra shin tu che ba byung bas nye gnas tsab tsob tu gyur nas gtor kha gso mi thub pa lta bu byung ba dang / yang nyi
shu'i nyin rtse'i khang gnyer 'ba' ra tshe 'phel la da rang nas mchod dpon par bla ma dbu mdzad lags kun rab rgyas la sang nas bzung zhal gyi bla brgyud gsar bzhengs rnams
la/ phyag nas mdzad par phebs zhus byas pa yin kyang byung yod min mi shes pas de zhu bar rgyug byas par/ khang gnyer khos ma zhus par nub mo shag tu bsdad nas sang snga
bar phyin skabs cung zad 'tshub 'gyur gyi rnam pas tshoms chen 'di'i 'gag gi nyis skras la mi'i pang du bteg nas g.yugs pa lta bu'i nyams kyi gting du tshar nas rkang
pa g.yas kyi tshigs rnams khrogs nas shin tu na ba byung ba dang / tshes bcu bzhi chad pa nyer drug nyin snga thun ma grol tsam la kho bo'i snyam snang du lho phyogs kyi
rgyang ring mo zhig nas btsun pa rgad po gdong shin tu sngo zhing gnyer mas gang ba mgo dkar po byas pa zhig mi nag rab tu 'jigs pa zhig gis ded nas yong ba zhig dang /
thun grol khar sa stegs kyi g.yas zur mdun gyi nam mkhar 'brub khung zur langs shig gi nang du mi skya dar ma gcig gcer bu ro stabs su bkyigs nas lus thams cad rmas gang
zhing khrag 'dzags pa zhig mthong ba dang / nu bo'i

gzim chung du gzugs med pa'i lag pa nag po rkyong ba gzigs pa dang / sgo har gyis phye ba zhig dang / rdo rje phug tu a lce lags la mtshan mo mngon sum du rten khri'i 'og nas
shob shob zer ba dum tsam byung ba dang / yang nyer bdun rting ma'i thor thun skabs sgrub khang mdo'i g.yab nang ma nas gzugs med pa'i skad zhig gis rtse thab pa kun dga'
chos 'byor don med du bos pas kho pa skrag nas nged la ja skyel bar yong mi nus pa gang drag ci drag la thug pa zhig byung ba dang / yang nyer brgyad kyi snga thun grol
nas bdag gi drin can rtsa ba'i bla ma dam pa mus chen rdo rje 'chang la mjal 'phrad zhus shing / de grub nas g.yab mdo mar gung tshigs la phyin skabs rkang pa g.yon pa'i
mthe bong gi mdun nas bzung rkang mthil bar dang yar brla g.yon pa'i tsam bar la tsha khug dang zug gzer sna tshogs brgyab nas gyol ba tsam byung zhing / dgong thun dang
srod thun skabs kyang de 'dra'i mu nas bskyal bas nged rang gi sems la bar chad kyi rnam pas 'bam zhig rgyag tu yin snyam nas srod thun grol nas nyal ba'i tshe zhe sdang
drag po'i sgo nas rang nyid thun mtshams kyi he ru kar gsal ba'i snying ga nas 'od zer 'phros/ mdun bskyed kyi stobs 'phrog dbang po 'khor bcas la phog pas de dag gi thugs
ka nas rang 'dra'i khro bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa khyung gi mgo can 'ba' zhig byung nas/ rnal 'byor pa rang nyid kyi rkang pa g.yon pa la yod pa'i zug gzer tsha khyug
sogs klu gnyan sa bdag gtsor gyur pa'i sde brgyad

ma rungs pa rnams kyis chos sgrub pa la bar du gcod pa thams cad/ zos shing mid nas byung ba'i shul tsam yang med par byas song snyam pa'i nga rgyal drag po'i sgo nas oM ma
hA kA la kA la/ bi kA la rA tri ta/ Dombhi nI tsaNDa li/ rAkkha sI/ singga lI de wi gnod byed nA ga thams cad mA ra ya phaT/ zhes dum tsam bzlas nas rkang g.yon la sngags
brgyab cing nyal bas nyer dgu'i nyin zug gzer sogs cung drag tsam dang / gnam gang nyin de bas kyang drag tsam/ zla ba bcu gnyis pa'i tshes gcig nyin sing drag tu song
ba zhig byung ba dang / gnam gang gi srod thun skabs sngas mgo nas chung chung zer ba'i sgra zhig dang / srod thun grol 'phral 'khrul snang shin tu che ba zhig byung ba dang
/ tshes gnyis kyi thor thun skabs bam skyur 'dra ba'i mer sgra dang / thog ldibs pa tsam gyi tshag sgra shin tu che ba sgrub khang nang du 'dug mi nus pa tsam byung nas/
'jigs shing sgrub grogs la sa g.yos min nam zer shor la khad pa'i mu nas de ma thag sems 'gyur te a kha kha mi nga la gang byung kha sing mtshams bsdoms dus gnas 'di
nyid du mi dbang lha'i zhal gzigs pa'am/ de min yang rab 'bring mtha' gsum gyi rtags gang yang rung ba nges pa can zhig ma byung bar la steng nas gnam sdib pa'am/ 'og nas
sa g.yo ba sogs ci byung yang rung gnas 'di nas mi 'da' snyam pa'i dran pa gsal btab cing / de ga rang bgyid snyam pa'i dam bca' brtan por bgyis pa yin bzhin du tshag sgra
dang mer sgra phran bu la skrag nas 'dug

dgos pa 'di 'dra re ma legs snyam nas yi dam lha'i nga rgyal dpe med byas khul dang / rmi ltas su nag rtsi'i 'gag gi skas 'og na 'brum pa thar 'phral zhig gi mi skya bag can
dar yol gyon pa dkar po dud pa'i nogs pa gyon zhing / rna ba la lcug ma dang ko byir sogs las byas pa'i sog skong ngan ngon btags pa a tsa ra'i skad phran bu shes mkhan
gnyis kyi rgan pa mdog sngo zhing 'bur rjes dang rma yis gdong gang ba da lta yang cung zad na ba'i mur yod pa dang / gzhon pa gdong dkar zhing 'bur rjes phran bu yod pa
gnyis char gzugs thung tsam byas pa zhig gis nged la ha ra hu re ha ra hu re zer byung bas/ nged kyi thog kha nas khyod mi bags can zhig 'dra na mi shes pa'i ar skad dga'
mdog de mi yong / da lta 'gro ba khyo yo byas par khos bdag la nu bo zhig yod pa yang shi song zer nas/ mun ner bsdad pa zhig dang / yang tshes lnga'i srod thun grol nas
nyal grabs byed skabs stegs gtor gyi khebs la lcag tshan bus pa lta bu'i rdob zer ba zhig dang / tshes drug gi snga thun grol nyer thun gtor bsags pa'i stegs nas gtor ma
rnying pa gcig don med du shed bskyed nas sa la g.yugs pa dang / de'i dgong thun gyi bzlas pa tshugs gral kun dga' bkra shis kyi glo 'dra ba zhig gis sgrub khang mdor nas
mang du bos kyang btang snyoms su bzhag pa yin/ yang yud tsam zhig nas sngar gyi glo des shin tu shugs che bar bos byung 'phral rdo rje dpal 'byor sgrub khang sbug nas
phyir bltar song bas su yang

med pa zhig dang / yang tshes brgyad kyi nub mo rmi lam du 'brog pa yin zer ba'i mi skya dar ma gdong thams cad kha spus gang ba zhig nas nged la bdag gi yul na nang tshang
mang po yod kyang da thams cad shi nas med zer ba zhig dang / yang tshes brgyad chad pa'i bcu gnyis kyi thor thun dang snga thun gnyis char rig pa nyob nas grul rtub mang
bas de nyin gung tshigs kyang med pa byas nas snga thun grol 'phral la dgong thun mthud nas tshugs shing gcung lags dang / a lce lags/ lcam a cung bcas gung tshigs kyi
skabs khos khong tsho la yi ge bris nas 'di bzhin byas so/ / da de ring kho bo rnal 'byor la/ /kho nag po bdud kyi bar chad kyis/ /nged rig pa nyob nas thor thun dang / /snga
thun gyi gnas skabs thams cad du/ /sngags gcig kyang bgrang du ma bcug rung / de ring gi khri tsho gcig po de/ /da nam song bar la zhog re skan/ /lag 'dzub mo chad kyang
bzhag rgyu min/ /rkang dpyi mgo rul yang bzhag rgyu min/ /sa gnam du song yang gzhag rgyu min/ /gnam sa ru song yang bzhag rgyu min/ /'khrugs dgu rtsegs byung yang bzhag
rgyu min/ /rlung brgya tshar langs kyang bzhag rgyu min/ /khyod nag po bdud kyi bar chad de/ /sngar phan yang grangs med slebs byung ngo / /da dung yang ji skad yong
gyur kyang / /rnal 'byor dang bar chad khyed gnyis po/ /'thab pa rang chog pa yod do ang / /su skyen de nges par sdur ro ang / /khos 'og tu non na ma 'gyod cig /mthu zhan
pa byung na ma 'gyod

cig /rtsal sdug pa byung na ma 'gyod cig /skye med kyi sdug zad rnal 'byor nga / /gang dang yang 'thab pas chog pa yod / /'di dran par gyis la bar chad rnams/ /spo skyer skyer
byas nas shog cig go /yong pas rang chog pas yong ngo ang / /zhes bris nas spras pa yin no/ /yang tshes bcu drug gi snga thun gyi bzlas pa'i skabs las mkhan spro bsdu'i
dmigs pa 'gyed pa'i mu nas dum tsam zhig rang nyid dran pa stor ba lta bu sems na chod de lus pa'i ngang nas mthong snang dang nyams snang 'dres par sa stegs kyi mdun
g.yon zur na bud med dar ma gos sngon dang sga spe rgya kha gyon pa zhig gi mgo bo sgam 'dra ba cig gi sbugs la bcug nas ngu 'bod chen po 'don pa dang / nged rang gi mdun
na rdo rje dpal 'byor yin snyam pa'i ban chung zhig langs nas 'dug par nged kyis da 'di 'dra gang byas pa yin byas song bas ban chung des 'di mo rang gi khyo de shi ba'i
mya ngan byed pa yin/ da rung mgo bo mgo bo brdab/ skra skra 'bal 'gro zer byung 'phral nged rang gi sems stor ba lta bu de dran pas zin nas sngar gyi mthong snang dang
nyams snang 'dres pa'i ban chung dang bud med ngu ba de gnyis la 'jigs snang dang skyo snang 'dres pa zhig byung / rjes su bsam blo btang bas bud med ngu ba de bstan dgra
zhig gi bla yin 'dra zhing ban chung de gnyen mgon kho rang yin 'dug snyam du kho bo sems so/ /yang tshes bcu dgu tho rengs rmi lam du khams pa 'dra ba'i mi skya rgad po
zhig gis kho rang gi chung ma tshe brtan

sgrol ma zer ba shi zer nas/ ngu zhing mya ngan stobs chen byed pa zhig dang / zhes gsungs pa ltar bsnyen sgrub mthar phyin nas rgyal zla'i nyer gsum nas snga lam byang pa
tshogs yong bcas gtor sgrub dang / nyer dgu'i zor 'phen sogs phyag len bzhin mdzad/ bsnyen sgrub las gsum grub rtags sogs gzhung nas bshad pa bzhin mthar phyin par mdzad
pa dang / rta zla'i tshes la mgon khang khag bzhi la gdung rabs myur 'byon gyi 'phrin bcol dang / kha'u brag rdzong du gri mdung sogs drag po'i spyan gzigs bcas/ lho rir
lha bsangs phrin 'chol mdzad skabs de nyin ma bsgrigs rten 'brel gyi tshes brgyad dang bod 'brog rnams nas glu gzhas gzigs 'bul dang bsod nams zhes pa nas bum chu phul zhing
gza' skar gnam gshis 'jam pa sogs zhing skyong mnyes pa'i mtshan ma dang / de nas phebs khar zhing skyong 'phreng ba'i rnam pas thal rlung che bar/ gsol krum sogs bzhes
'phro rnams nas shar la cung zad thor zhig gsungs te/ rdo rje shugs ldan la spo bo khyod kyi rnal 'byor pa la lam du rlung 'tshub ma gtong zhig gsungs pas de 'phral 'jam
gyis zhi ste/ phebs lam la rlung 'tshub gtan nas med pa dang/ bsam brling du phun tshogs yang rtser nam gzir la lha bsangs la phebs skabs 'gag rin dbang nas mgon khang
gi phebs spras gsham du gzim zhu bzung nas sdod pa bud med thod rdzas btags pa zhig tu gzigs pa sogs bstan srung bran 'khol gyi lo rgyus de mtshungs snga phyi mang du yod

'gro yang de tsam las zin bris mdzad pa ma mthong bas 'on kyang 'dis mtshon nus par sems/ de skabs gzhan phul kha btags sogs la gdung rabs myur 'byon gyi 'dod gsol sbyar ba
dang bcas lha mor slar 'bul bar mdzad do/ /de nyin rten 'brel legs so zhes zhabs 'bring pa rnams la bka' bstsal ba ring min gdung rgyud phebs pa'i rten 'brel du nges shing
/ de mtshams nas mus chen chos nyid ye shes zhes/ rgyun du sgom sgrub kho na la bzhugs te/ bde kyai gur mgon sogs yi dam chos srung 'ga' zhig la bye bsnyen song ba'i bla
ma bgres po de nyid la gong du bshad pa'i dbang khrid rjes gnang lung sogs lo gnyis tsam gyi khongs su rim par gsan cing / 'jigs byed dbang skabs 'jam mgon nyid nas bla
ma de nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed du mngon sum du gzigs par nyid mdzad gsol 'debs las kyang / bdag la 'jigs mdzad zhal gyis mngon sum bstan/ /zhes sogs gsungs shing mgon po'i
gsang khrid sogs stsol skabs kyang / 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can nyid nas gur mgon dngos su gzigs pa sogs la brten/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang kun blo phud pa'i sku mched
zung gi dbu bla rnams kyis thugs dad che bar mdzad do/ /'di lo dpyid tsam nas gdan sa 'dir gdung rgyud bzhugs pa'i bla brang che bzhi las gzhan gsum gyi gdung rabs deng
skabs mi bzhugs pas dus mchod gdung rgyud da lta'i bar la dar zhing rgyas par bzhugs kyang dus mchod bla brang 'di bzhin gog zom shin tu che

bar/ da lta'i bkod legs ngo mtshar can 'di bzhin gsar bskrun mdzad de/ steng du bla ma lha khang ka ba bcu gnyis kyi sa gnam sa bar gsum gyi rgyan dang tshon rtsi sogs tshar
du dngar bar 'jam dbyangs sa paN shel gtsug mar grags pa/ 'phags pa'i 'dra sku 'bul thog ma sogs rnying gras rnams dang / dus mchod gdung rabs sngags 'chang chen pos bzhengs
mdzad rnams kyi zhal skong sku brnyan gang dgos rje sku mched sogs sbyin bdag gi snang brnyan sogs gsar bzhengs mdzad de bzhugs pa dang / mgon khang du rta mgrin yang
gsang gi bla brgyud dang / gur lcam dral/ sngags 'chang chen po/ a mes zhabs/ kun dga' bkra shis pa rnams kyi thugs dam rten pu tra dmar nag rnams dang / gsar du rtsi
dmar mched bdun gong 'og gsar bskrun rnams/ sman 'dam rin chen phye ma sogs kyi phung por rten 'dam dpe grags ma sogs byin rten mang bsres kyi rgyu las grub pa ma zad rtsi
dmar sogs la med mi rung ba'i bla rdo srog 'khor sogs kyis mtshon ring bsrel rnam bzhis gong bur bskrun te byin rlabs dang rab gnas sogs 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan can mchog
nas mdzad pa rnams la gnam sa bar gsum du drag po'i rgyan dang / gtor ma gsum sogs drug rten gyi rdzas rnams dang / rten mdos bya rta g.yag sogs spyan gzigs sogs dang
/ 'khor lha srin sde brgyad kyi tshogs rnams gyon sbag gi tshul du gnas pa/ 'jigs shing rngam brjid dang ldan pa'i mthil du gnod sbyin chen po'i sku

mkhar gsum brtsegs nang du yi dam chos skyong sde brgyad so so'i snang brnyan nye 'dabs su bstan dgra rnams kyi bla gnas 'gugs pa'i sha khang du grags pa bcas rang bzhin gyis
'jigs shing skyi g.ya' ba rnams su mthu chen dbang sdud snying po nyid nas/ gdan sa 'di nyid du bstan bshig dam nyams mtho dma' gang du byung yang sgrol cig pa'i bka'
bsgo drag po mang du gnang ba sogs dang / steng du gser zangs kyi rgyan gser 'phru/ thigs g.yab steng gi phyogs bzhir gser zangs rgyan 'od 'bar ba gur lcam dral/ zhal bzhi
pa sogs sku lnga/ rtsi dmar bcas pa'i ru mtshon rtse gsum rnga thug dang bcas pa thams cad la yang rang rang gi gzhung nas bshad pa'i nang gzungs phun sum tshogs pa/ rgyan
'dzugs chog dang ru mtshon 'dzugs chog bcas mdzad pa la/ spyir 'jam mgon sku mched chog grwa bcas nas 'khor lo bde mchog gi rab tu gnas pa rgyas par mdzad do/ /dgung
grangs nyer lngar son pa me lug lor deng sang mdo sde lha mchod dang 'brel ya ba skya bdun gyi 'cham zor 'phen bcas gsar btsugs thog mar mdzad lo yin te/ de gong bsam yas
mdo sde lha mchod yin/ 'dir yang bdag khri ban tshang pa sogs nas lha bsangs tsam gnang srol/ sngags 'chang chen po dang a mes zhabs kyi sku dus tsam nas byung 'dra yang
/ 'cham dang zor 'phen sogs kyi spros pa med cing / bdag chen 'di nyid kyi sku dus la/ de nyin sgar mus bzung gi dgongs rdzogs bde mchog sgrub mchod

nam 'og ma grol bar mdzad nas/ lha bsangs snga mus bzhin dang / de grol nas dus mchod mgon khang du sku gdung rnams dang / bde gling tshogs yongs bsnyen sogs yan nas gnod sbyin
mched bdun gyi gtor sgrub/ zor 'phen 'cham sogs spros pa che ba zhib cha deb sgrigs bzhin zab dkyus kyi rnam bzhag bcas mdzad pa dang / bdag khri nas rgyal chen sku
lnga dang / rtsi dmar mched bdun gyi rten mdos yab rje kun blo'i ljags sgrigs bzhin da lta'i bar bstan don zhabs rim mdzad srol 'di bzhin thog mar dzugs pa mdzad lo dang
/ gzhan yang rang re'i mnga' zhabs rnams la dur spod nas byung ba'i bu spel gyi las tshogs mang du mdzad pa yin te rnam thar rtsa tshig zhal gsung ma las/ skabs shig mdzod
pa kun dga' phun tshogs nas/ /bskul ngor rang re'i chab 'bangs thams cad la/ /nor skyong las tshogs srid spel mang du byas/ /dam ldan tsho la bu yang 'byung nges dang /
/dam med rnams la bu tsha mi 'dug go /lhag par dam nyams sdom nyams bza' mi gnyis/ /rang yul ma slebs khong khrag skyugs nas 'chi/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / /da lta gzhi thog
dbang khang sogs na bzhugs pa'i nor skyong yab yum 'khril sbyor gyi gsham du gzhi thog pho brang sogs bris pa'i phan tshun mi sde'i grong gis khengs pa la/ srid spel snyoms
'jug gi rnam pa mang du bri bar mdzad pa'i thang ga gong gsham 'ja' gos nor chab can/ zhal khebs sman rnying spus dag du mas brgyan pa 'di/ de skabs kyi rten byin can
zhig

yin 'dra'o/ /'di skabs tsam la yin nam gangs ri'i khrod kyi dam chos rdzogs pa chen po klong chen snying thig zhes/ 'dzam gling na yongs su grags pa'i bka' babs kyi shing rta
'dren pa sogs rig 'dzin chen po 'jigs med gling pa las sku mched gnyis char gyis dbang chos gsan tshul khong rang gi rnam thar lo rgyus nang gsal ba gong dbu bla'i gras
su ma 'khod pa cung zad thugs tshom byung ngam snyam pa bcas dang / dgung grangs nyer drug pa sa sprel sa ga zla bar gang gi sku mched gcung po e waM bzang po kun dga'
phan bde rgya mtsho de nyid dgung grangs nyer gsum par bstan gegs bzlog med kyis glo bur du zhing brjes pa'i tshul bstan pa yin te/ rnam thar rtsa tshig las/ bar skabs zhig
la rigs kyis phongs pa'i khar/ /nu bo rgyan mchog nam mkha'i 'ja' ltar yal/ /nges 'byung zhe sdang 'bras bus lus sems mnar/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar sku na phra ba sogs sku
mched du gyur pa'i thugs ngal tsam du ma zad de skabs gdan sa chen po 'dir gdung rgyud ha cang nyag phrar thug pa sogs rje 'bangs tshang ma thugs pham kyi rang bzhin du
gyur kyang sngon du zhabs rim sogs rgya cher 'bad sgrub mdzad dang mdzad mus bcas bya thabs bral tshul de skabs sku mched rje btsun ma/ mdzod pa kun dga' phun tshogs dang
/ mkhan po ngag dbang dpal bzang / rje mus pa chen po sogs nyid kyi dbu bla rnams dang bcas nas dngos 'bul dang bcas rgyu mtshan mang du gsol bas gnas skabs thugs gsos
te/

dgongs rdzogs rnams kyi zhal bkod dang bcas sku gdung rin po che mchod sbyin gyi dbus su gdan drangs te/ longs sku'i chas su bzhugs mdun bla ma mchod mchog dang thugs dam 'dzin
mdzad sogs dang / rgyud sde nas bshad pa bzhin dus mtha'i cho ga'i sgo nas zhugs la 'bul ba sogs dang dgongs rdzogs dngos gzhi gdan sa chen po 'di nyid dang / stod smad
bar gsum gyi dgon sde che phra ji snyed par mchod 'bul dang / dge 'dun 'dus tshogs su bsnyen bkur phyag 'gyed/ skye bo'i tshogs la sbyin gtong sogs rgya cher mdzad pa
gzhir grub kyang deng skabs zin tho sogs mi snang bas sku gdung zhu yul sogs gnas dang gang zag nges tig 'god pa rngo mi thogs shing / spur khang zhal phye ste gdung rus
rnams bsdus te satstsha dri med snying po can dang / bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems chos srung nor lha dang bcas pa'i sku spar grangs mang 'debs gnang gis nub gcig
gzim chung du bzhugs su gsol bar/ me tog dkar po padma 'dab bzhi yu ba phran bu dang bcas satstsha sogs gdung 'di las grub pa'i sku spar rnams yod sar lha rnams kyis mang
du phab pa sngon lha khang bla brang gi gdung rabs zhig la'ang de bzhin byung 'phros bcas pa'i nang gzungs kyi gzhi byas te/ gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ring
bsrel 'khrul med gdan sa 'di nyid kyi rten dam dpe grags ma bla ma gong ma'i na bza' dbu ljon dam rdzas sogs ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyur por gtams pa'i lha chen khyams stod
du byang nas lho

gzigs kyi rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa'i 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs bcu gcig zhal gyi snang brnyan dang / de nub kyi dngul grub rnam rgyal mchod rten
bcas gser sogs rin chen du ma'i phra tshom gyis phyug pa 'di zung gsar bzhengs mdzad de rab tu gnas pa sogs bdag chen dpal ldan chos skyong nyid chog gra dang bcas rgyas
par mdzad nas/ phyi skor la me tog 'thor ba gos sku zhal phye sogs sngon gyi phyag srol bzhin rab ston rgyas par mdzad dam snyam zhing / de tsam nas gdan sa 'di nyid kyi
tsho 'dzin gyi gtso bo mkhan phyag gnyer gsum du grags pa'i nang tshan phyag mdzod grwa tshang pa nas/ sngon dus bdag nyid chen po bzang po dpal la gong ma'i lung gis gdung
rabs spel bar bkod pa na/ de skabs gdan sa 'di nyid kyi dpon chen aka glan sogs kyis zhus ngor btsun mo drug tsam khab bzhes mdzad pa ltar slar yang khab bzhes nan du
gsol ba btab tshul rnam thar rtsa tshig las/ der brten mdzod pa kun dga' phun tshogs nas/ /kye ma 'gro kun bsod nams dman pa'i mthus/ /da ni sa skya'i gdung rabs ma byon
khar/ /sku zhabs sku ni nyag gcig 'di la thug /da ni bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la/ /thugs rjes dgongs te gsan bzhes mdzod zhu bar/ /da dung lha lcam gcig ni ma bzhes na/ /sa
skya'i gdung rabs chad par gdon mi za/ /zhes pa'i zhu ba nan gyis phul lan du/ /sa skya'i gdung ni gzhan dang mi 'dra bas/ /yong snying 'dod na gcig la'ang mang du byon/
/med

snying 'dod na btsun mo brgya yod kyang / kha ya lkog pa'i rgyu las dge mtshan med/ /de phyir lha lcam len par mi 'dod kyang / /cis kyang longs rang zer na blangs pas chog
/byas pa'i don ltar lha lcam 'os tho rnams/ /brtag pa'i don du sgrol ma lha khang du/ /dka' spyad sdug khur mang du bgyis don la/ /rang byon bu mo a lig chug pa ltar/ /'di
nyid gsang khog thog nas lcam du blangs/ /skal bzang lha yi bu mo 'chi med ni/ /tshe dbang zhes bya'i ming btags bcom ldan 'das/ /dges pa rdo rje'i rdul tshon dkyil 'khor
du/ /bcug cing dam tshig las kyi gzung ma byas/ /ring por ma thogs rigs kyi myu gu zhig /legs par phebs kyang dang po dus las yol/ /de la brten nas lha lcam yi thang chad/
/nges 'byung skyo shas drag pos lcam ma 'dod/ /byas 'gyur rdo rje'i brag rdzong chen po ru/ /tshe dang sgrub pa mnyam pa'i blo gtad la/ /yang yang bshol btab mang du
bgyis na yang / /khas len mi byed chos la shor nye'i skabs/ /bdag gi bla ma rnam 'dren bka' drin can/ /rgyal ba mus pa chen pos u tshugs kyis/ /bshol 'debs mdzad pas thebs
chag nyan thog skabs/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ rta nag sger rang byon ma'i sras mo de nyid khab tu bzhes te skal bzang lha yi bu khrid 'chi med tshe dbang dpal lha mo zhes
pa'i mtshan gsol te/ bcom ldan kyai rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur te thugs rgyud smin par mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang lhag pa'i lha gsar rnying du ma'i dbang dang
/ byin

rlabs rjes gnang sogs mang du stsol thog ring por ma lon par gdung rgyud zhig phebs kyang snyigs dus log smon rnams kha rgyal ba'i dbang gis ma bzhugs pa/ slar yang gdung rgyud
myur 'byon gyi thabs rim 'bad brtson mdzad skabs/ gangs ljongs bstan 'gro yongs la 'tshe ba'i mi srun pa 'ga' zhig gi cho 'phrul gyis stod phyogs nas nAai pa la ste
gorSha'i dmag 'dren gyi 'go rtsom pa yin te gong 'phros las/ nAai pa la yis dmag gi sta gon brtsams/ /rtse gdong phyogs su 'gro sogs don med las/ /rnam g.yengs 'ga' zhig
grub nas lha rtse ru/ /zhes pa ltar de skabs bod 'dir gzim chung sku srung dmag mi tsam las de lhag gi rgya dmag dang bod dmag zhes pa sogs gang yang med stabs stod smad
yul gru kun tu dmag bskul sogs kyis 'dabs zing dang khyad par gdan sa 'dir sa khad nye zhing dmag lam sogs kyis skyon ji yod ma rtogs pas 'di khul mdzod pa sogs blos 'gan
bzod min gyi gnas skabs rtse gdong sogs su gdan zhus kyis bzhugs gdan 'jags mur gu ru rin po che'i gnas chen gza' phug sog po sogs gnas mjal du phebs te/ za phu'i shar gyi
gter lung phye bar mdzad kyang snyigs dus kyi gdul bya rnams bsod nams dman pas dam sel sogs kyi dbang las/ kong gter sangs rgyas gling pas lung bstan sogs su/ sna rnams
rdo rje bdud 'joms kyi sprul pa dang / chos gter sogs gdon par mngags kyang / gong gi rgyu rkyen de dag las bzhes ma thub/ 'on kyang brag

g.yangs su gang mi thar ba'i sked zhig na sa skya bdag chen gyis gter bzhes 'phro red zer ba'i gser gzhong 'od can zhig phyed sa yis non cing phyed mthong ba yod ces bdag gi
bla ma khu bo rin po che gsang ba'i bdag po gnas der mjal bar phebs skabs gzigs tshul bka' las yang yang thos pa sogs bdag bstod sogs las kyang / ma bsgrubs he ru ka dpal
che la bstod gsungs pa bzhin don la gnas pa yin cing / slar gdan sa chen por phebs te/ gdung rabs myur 'byon gyi zhabs brtan la brtson par mdzad tshul gong 'phros rnam
thar zhal gsung ma las/ lha lcam nyid nas gu ru drag dmar dang / /tshe sbyin yid bzhin 'khor lo'i sgrub pa dang / /las bzhi'i sbyin sreg bcas pa mthar phyin byas/ /de rjes
rje btsun kun dga' bstan sgron bltams/ /de nas re zhig song ba'i dus dag tu/ /sgrol mar tshe lha lha khang gsar pa dang / /'jam dpal lha khang gsar bzhengs 'phro can dang
/ /bsam gling mgon khang nyams gso gsar bzhengs byas/ /ya ma zung gi cho 'phrul mang po dang / /zhes gsungs pa ltar rgyal yum de nyid nas/ /lha khang chen mo'i yang steng
po ta la zhes sngon gyi dus su sngags 'chang chen po'i gzim chung de nyid du/ gter kha gong mar grags pa sngags pa nyang ral gyi brag srin mo'i sbar rjes can nas spyan
drangs pa'i snyigs dus kyi rgyal btsan bsen mo sogs 'byung gdon sogs la shin tu bsngags pa sngags 'chang rgya gar shes bzang dang / sa lo sku mched rnams nas bzung

rgyun du thugs dam mdzad pas yab chos gras su gyur pa'i gu ru drag dmar dang / sgrol dkar tshe sbyin 'di la lugs srol mang yang / 'di ni tshar lugs 'od zer drug bsgrags yin
'dra ba bcas kyi gzhi'i bsnyen pa sbyin sreg bcas mdzad cing sa bya lor rje btsun kun dga' bstan pa'i sgron me bltams shing / 'di ni mjug la gar bzhugs mi gsal yang sgo
spel lam/ btsun mo gang rigs zhig tu bzhugs sam snyam zhing / de nas gdung rabs myur 'byon la ched du dmigs gdan gzhung nas/ sgrol ma gtsug lag khang gi byang gi steng du
rgyud sde nas gsungs pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal rigs lnga'i 'bur sku la de las gzhan pa'i rigs gzhan rnams sdeb ris su bzhugs pa 'og tu tshe lha khang du tshe lha rnam gsum
mi tshad ma dngul grub/ rgyan cha rnams tsha gser can gsum la/ tshe lha rnam gsum 'bur sku/ so sor nas brgya tshar re bzhugs pa rnams la ring bsrel rnam bzhi gzungs bzhugs
kyis brgyan pa bcas gtsug lag khang steng shod rnams kyi steng du bla bre sogs dang / bzhugs yul shing khri bang rim can rnams kyi mdun du kar dpyad/ rgya ting sogs mchod
pa du mas spras pa 'di rnams gsar bskrun mdzad de/ rgyud sde nas gsungs pa ltar gyi rab tu gnas pa'i me tog kyang / bdag chen dbang gi mtshan can gang nyid chog gra
dang bcas pas rgyas par mdzad cing / de mtshungs bsam brling mgon khang 'di nyid gcong zom shin tu che ba rtsa ba nas spos gnang gis da lta'i mgon khang bkod legs phu mdo

can 'di bzhin gsar bskrun mdzad te phur zhal shar bstan du sngon du theg chen chos rje dang / bdag chen shar pa sogs kyi thugs dam rten gshed dmar dang / lha mo rje khol gyi
sku rnying rnams da lta rten sgam zangs phra can gyi nang du bzhugs pa 'di rnams dang / gsar du gshin rje gshed dmar po/ 'dod khams dbang phyug ma dmag zor rgyal mo rnams
mi tshad ma gsum la 'khor rnams khru phyed tsam re steng 'og sogs go rim ma log pa phyogs so sor bzhugs pa rnams la nang gzungs spyi dang / bye brag srog 'khor bla rdo
sogs mtshan nyid dang ldan pa bzhugs su gsol ba rnams la snga phyir ye shes pa stim pa brgya phrag du ma mdzad rtags su/ da lta yang mig ldan su zhig gis mthong yang zil
shin tu che zhing skabs re mdun du byang ba dang / skabs re rgyab tu phebs pa zhal dang / spyan gyi 'gug sogs nas khrag dang bdud rtsi rlon pa dngos su 'dzag pa sogs/ kun
gyi mthong chos su gyur pa 'di rnams kyi sku rgyu rten mdo dpe bral ma dang / lha mo dngos bzhugs dbu gtsang gi rten gnas kyi sa sogs 'dres pa rnams las bskrun par mdzad
pa rnams la gnam sa bar gsum gyi drag po'i rgyan dang / rten rdzas che phra rnams zangs khra'i nang sbyar du bzhugs pa dang / logs rnams su stag gzig dom dred ri dwags
bya sogs kyi shun lpags rnams bzang gos 'ba' zhig las grub pa/ ka ba yod do cog la khrab rmog gri phub stag gzig gi lpags pas brgyan pa/ gzhan yang gri man mdung gsum sogs

drag po'i spyan gzigs su zhig gis mthong ba tsam gyis spa bkong bar byed pa 'di rnams gsar bskrun gyis 'jam mgon mthu chen dpa' bo nyid chog gra dang bcas pas rab tu gnas pa
rgyas par mdzad skabs sogs su/ logs bris kyi ma mo'i skad 'byin pa dang bong bu'i sgra grags pa sogs/ cho 'phrul du ma byung tshul dang / yang rnam thar rtsa tshig las/
lhag par slar yang nAai pA la kho yi/ /rab 'jigs dmag gi g.yul ngo bshams pa'i skabs/ /gzhung sa mchog nas bka' bstsal lhur blangs kyis/ /drag po mngon spyod las mtha' mi
gcig pa/ mnan bsreg 'phangs gsum mang po rems nas byas/ /nus pa thon pa'i skad kyang mang po byung / /zhes gsungs pa ltar bal dmag 'go pa sprel lo langs kyang / de nas
sa bkras dang gdan sa gsum gyi sku tshab nas bal bod bar chings sgrig bgyis tshad kyang le 'grig pa zhig ma byung tshul gyis/ slar lcags khyi lo rong bkras rab ngos nas thon
te gtsang phyogs phal cher bal dmag gis khyab te/ dgon sde che ba phal che ba ni rtsad nas stongs/ 'ga' zhig ni stong la khad du gyur/ dge 'dun 'dus pa rgya mtsho/ gnam
sa'i khyon gang ba tsam bzhugs pa'i chos grwa chen po bkra shis lhun por yang bal dmag rnams zla gcig tsam bsdad pa sogs kyis zhabs 'dren ci cher gyur skabs/ gzhung sa
mchog gi bka' don dmag bzlog mngon spyod kyi las sbyor mang du mdzad pas gor Sha'i dmag sgar rnams gtor zor 'ur sgra dang bcas nam mkha' nas dngos su babs

pa sogs dang bstun sgar nad mi bzad pas btab ste/ phal cher 'chi ba dang / 'phro rnams kyang bod dmag rnams nas bsad bcom gyis rang zhir gyur tshul bdag chen nyid nas mdzad
pa'i dmag zor ma'i gtor bzlog gi sbyar byang las/ a bu ltar bcos pa'i go rgyal dpung / /bod mi dmangs kun gyis ma thul ba/ /nga sa skya'i mig gcig 'khos med pos/ /da myur
du 'joms pa rgod re bro/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ de skabs skyes chen dam pa gzhan nas kyang dmag bzlog mang du mdzad pa gzhir grub kyang 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan 'chang
'di nyid ni/ dus tshod 'di skabs su gnas dus kyi rten 'brel ma 'chugs na mtha' dmag 'dul bar ched du mngags tshul/ gu ru padmas gter lung rnams su/ zhang sna rnam rdo rje
bdud 'joms kyi sprul par lung bstan tshul sogs las/ bal bod mtshams su dbang gi ming can byung / mtha' dmag bzlog pa'i rten 'brel de la yod/ ces sogs de 'dra'i lung bstan
mang por gsal bar gsungs pa ltar mthu stobs lag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa ni/ de skabs kyi skye bo rdzun mi zer ba phal cher gyis shes chos su gyur/ yang rnam thar gong
'phros las/ skabs rer gzhan gyis bka' bstsal lhur blangs nas/ /rang yul spangs nas sprang po'i tshul tshan gyis/ /shab gzhung phra mo'i yul phyogs 'grim 'grim nas/ /nam
phyed spang skya'i steng nas phur pa yi/ /zor 'phen sngon chad ma grags ya mtshan can/ /zhwa nag tshab tu sog zhwa kha krong dang / /rdo gong tshab tu rdul

len khra bo dang / /dung long tshab tu sor kong gzi g.yu bcas/ /rus rgyan tshab tu phor shubs sbo gri dang / /zor spang tshab tu me lcags phra ldan dang / /phod ka'i tshab
tu dor ma rgya mtsho bcas/ /srang 'gag gzhung la zor gtor sha ra ra/ /zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar da lta lha chen lcags ri 'khor mor 'dzin cha'i me mda'i so khung 'di rnams
de skabs su mdzod 'dzin grwa tshang pa'i dus brgyab tshod dang / de skabs 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan can nyid ni shab chos lcam gra sogs su brdzus stabs su rgyun ring tsam
bzhugs te/ de skabs bal dmag rnams gzhis rtser 'gro/ lam tsho gcig 'dir yang khel ba 'brong ngu la brgyud phyag 'tshal sgang nas dmag ru bsnar te 'ongs/ de skabs gdan sa
'dir lha chen sogs srung cha tsam 'jog pa las gzhan pas zing cha ma bgyis pa sogs la brten bal dmag rnams shar bskyod kyis de nub dmag sgar bu lung du brgyab tshod kyi de
sa nas dmag mi 'ga' res lha chen sogs rgyal sgo mnan te 'gro sa med rkyen/ chus byang gi sde gseb dang / byang rgyud dgon gseb sogs la phyin te sgo rum rag dung rnams khyer
tshod kyang / cho 'phrul 'ga' zhig byung pa yin nam/ slar bzhag skad bcas/ de tsam las lha bla ma kho na'i byin mthus skyon 'gyur ma byung zhing de nas sa gzhis rtses
brgyud lha ldan rang du 'gro rtsis kyang sgar nad mi zad pas btab pa dang bod dmag sogs kyis 'gro lam ma bde ba phyir log skabs bkras lhun nas khyer ba'i chos gos rdor
phreng / mtshams phod sogs/

'dir yang kha re byung tshod rnam thar zhal gsungs ma'i gong gi 'phror/ de rjes ma 'gyangs snying rus 'gro ba'i mgon/ /bdag gi sems kyi gdung sel bka' drin can/ /padma bdud
'dul dbang phyug ces grags pa'i/ /'jam dbyangs rigs thigs gzhon nu legs par byon/ /dam pa'i phyag srol dus mdos zab ma sogs/ /bde skyid rdzogs ldan gsar pa'i dpal la spyad/
/de nas rim bzhin kun dga' rin chen dang / /spyan ras gzigs sprul rigs myug yin pa la/ /bar chad dbang gis bu mor gyur ba'i rjes/ /bskal bzang tshul khrims zhes su grags
pa dang / /mgon po dngos grub gzhung brgya dpal 'bar gyi/ /rnam par sprul pa dngos grub mtshan can rnams/ /gegs med don ldan kho na legs par byon/ /dngos grub mtshan
can bltams rjes rgyal yum la/ /rlung nad tshabs chen btab pa'i sku gegs shar/ /de rjes nar mar rlung nad rgyun bsring gi /rgyal yum skrag ste gdung spel mdzad ma 'dod/ /de
la brten dang rig 'dzin 'jigs med kyis/ /lung bstan don bzhin slar yang yum gyi spun/ /dam tshig sgrol ma rnal 'byor rig mar brten/ /rgyal yum dam pas bka' 'gyur rin po
che/ /snying rus 'bad nas gsung sgrogs mdzad pa dang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi bsnyen pa dang / /mkha' 'gro seng gdong bsgrub pa bskang ba dang / /phyag 'tshal skor ba
grangs med mdzad pa sogs/ sgo gsum rnam dkar las la 'bad pa rnams/ /shin tu legs mod sku gzugs bzang ba'i skabs/ /lo grangs

sum cu ma lon gdung sogs kyang / /'byon 'phro 'byon pa'i mu rang yin nges la/ /gdung spel bya ba dgongs zhu mdzad pa 'di/ /rnal 'byor bdag gi sems la cung ma babs/ /'on kyang
thog mtha' bar du drin che bas/ /rang 'dod kha tshang bdag gis ci la nus/ /zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin dmag thag kyang phal cher lcags phag lor chod nas/ dag chen dbang
sdud snying po'am dpal ldan chos skyong nyid dgung grangs sum cur phebs pa chu pho byi ba'i lo sa ga zla ba'i tshes bco brgyad la/ snyigs dus 'gro ba'i mgon po padma bdud
'dul dbang phyug kun dga' bkra shis mthu stobs bstan 'dzin bzang por grags pa nyid sku bltams pa'i dga' ston du dus mdos zab ma sogs gtang rag rgya cher mdzad tshul rnams
phal cher chu lug lo yab rje nyid sku 'khrungs dus bzhin mdzad dam snyam shing / yang yab rje nyid dgung grangs so gnyis su phebs shing stag lor yab kun dga' rin chen bltams
pa'i dga' ston du yum chen ban tshang pas mdos zab su grags pa'i 'cham gzigs phul cing / me 'brug lor bde skyid rje btsun du grags pa tshul khrims dpal rgyas dbang
mo 'khrungs/ lcags sprel lor mgon po dngos grub dpal 'bar 'khrungs ston du mgon mdos zab mar grags pa mdzad lo dang / de rjes rgyal yum mchog la sku rlung snyun bzhes kyis
gdung spel dgongs zhu mdzad tshul bcas rnam thar rtsa tshig bzhin dang / gzhan yang sa rta lo nang dpal sa skya'i byang ngos bde mchog pho brang 'di bzhin

sngon dus chu mig bla brang zhes chu bo gangga tshun chad la 'gran zla dang bral ba'i slob dpon rin po che bsod nams rtse mo'i gzim spyil dang / de rjes sngags 'chang chen
po dang / 'jam mgon a mes zhabs rnams kyi sku dus nyams gso rim par mdzad kyang gog zoms la nyams gso gsar bzhengs lta bu mdzad pa'i steng thog bar gsum gyi bla ma lha khang
du sngon sngags 'chang chen po'i sku dus bzhengs par mdzad pa'i/ bla ma sa chen yab sras gsum sa lo chen po rnams la dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi dbang dang lam gyi bla
ma brgyud pa'i zhal skong gang dgos nyid kyi dbu bla rnams dang / 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can yum sras rnams dang bcas sbyin bdag gi tshul du bzhugs pa mthong ba tsam
gyis yid 'phrog pa 'di rnams dang / bar thog du yi dam lha khang du rten gtso dbus su dpal bde mchog mi tshad che tsam la/ snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi dang / thugs gsung
sku'i lha tshogs/ sgo mtshams ma brgyad bcas kyis bskor ba/ de 'og mgon khang steng bstar la gur mgon gyi bla brgyud dang / sngon dus kyi rten rnying rnams g.yas g.yon
gyi me ri sogs kyi nang bzhugs shing de dus gsar bzhengs mdzad pas gur mgon lha bcu gnyis ma'i steng dmag zor rgyal mo dur khrod bdag po yab yum phur srung dkar bdud lcam
dral 'khor ru 'dren sde bzhi dang bcas pa rnams sa 'jim la rten 'dam sogs dang / gnas chen rnams kyi sa chu sogs bsres te bskrun pa rnams la ring bsrel rnam bzhi gzungs
rdzogs spyi

dang khyad par bstan srung rnams la dam pa kun grags dang sngags 'chang chen po'i sgrub yig bzhin so sor srog 'khor bla rdo khyad par gur mgon la gri snying lcags rdor rtse
dgu sogs thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs bzhugs rnams kyis phyug par rab gnas mdzad de/ steng 'og bar gsum du gnam sa logs kyi rgyan mchod rdzas spyi dang bye brag mgon khang
du zhing chen gyi bla bre khrab rmog gri me mda' mdung sogs drag po'i rgyan dang / rtag rten rgyun gtor sogs mthong ba tsam gyis dpa' 'khums byed pa rnams la/ bdag chen
dbang gi mtshan can nyid nas 'khor lo bde mchog la brten pa'i rab tu gnas pa rgyas par mdzad de dam ye dbyer med du byin gyis rlobs par mdzad do/ /de'i nub sngon sngags
'chang chen po'i sku dus kyi gzim chung bde ba can du grags pa gong ma na rim gyi dam rdzas bdud rtsi ril bu sgrub mdzad kyi gzim chung dang / gzim phug bzhugs g.yab gting
du sman khang ka ba bcu gnyis pa/ de'i phur 'dam brdung rdo gtun dang bcas de'i nye mkho 'jog pa'i khang pa/ shod du rtse thab sgril rtsi bkang dang bcas pa bkod legs
ngo mtshar 'di rnams gsar bskrun mdzad/ de'i lhor sngags 'chang grags blo sogs kyi gzim chung deng sang bde mchog lhor grags pa shod rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i lha khang
dang bcas pa 'di rnams kyang sku thog 'dir gsar bskrun mdzad pa mtha' klas mgon khang mdo'i g.yab la drag ris rnams nang so pu tra khang bzhin mdzad pa der 'gro mgon dbang

gi mtshan can gang gi zhabs rjes su 'brang zhing bstan pa srung zhing 'jig rten skyong bar bka' bsgos pa'i lha srung bzhi tsam yod pa las/ kun gyi gtso mo shangs mo rdo rje
bu khrid du grags pa ni/ shangs za phu'i gnas sgo dang po dang nye bar skyid phug par grags pa'i bu mor skyes shing / rgyun du gson 'dre byed cing kun la khog zhugs dang
gnod 'tshe drag po byed pa zhig 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan can nyid khul der phebs skabs bka' bsgo dam 'dogs mdzad pas gzhan la don med gnod pa cung chung du song ba de rjes
mo rang yang phyi nang mi rnams brgyud pa chad de mo rang gi ca lag sgo yi lde mig bcas phul 'byor da lta 'dra 'bag gi mgo bor yod pa bzhin de skabs shin tu 'tshubs pas/
spyi bye'i bstan pa srung zhing 'jig rten skyong bar bka' bsgo dam 'dogs 'phrin gsol bcas mdzad pa nas bzung / da lta'i bar gdan sa 'dir bstan srung rnams kyi mngags
gzhug tu gnas te srung skyobs byas pa 'di bzhin byung zhing / de mtshungs zab bu'i gnas bdag gdol pa nag por grags pa yang zhabs rjes su 'brangs pa'i 'di nyid kha'u'i gzhi
bdag btsan chung ba 'di bzhin sngags 'chang chen pos bka' bsgo dam bzhag mdzad pa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis bdag chen nyid kyi gzigs snang du/ kha'u lung pa thams cad
chus bkang ste gdan sa dus gcig tu phab ste 'joms par byed cing gzigs pa na/ bdag chen dbang gi mtshan can nyid thugs 'khrugs

te drag po'i sbyin sreg dang 'brel btsan chung sreg sbyangs mdzad pa da lta byang gi brag dmar gyi logs rten khang yod pa bshig ste kha snon bdud 'dul mchod rten gyi bum sgor
rta mgrin gsang sgrub kyi snang brnyan bzhugs sa 'di bzhin gsar bskrun dang bcas pa btsan chung ba'i ming bos mi chog pa mdzad de/ de'i tshab tu gnod sbyin beg rtse dang
gang gi klu gdol pa nag po gzhi bdag tu bskos pas da lta beg gdol du grags pa chab chen chen mor gsol mchod mdzad pa bzhin byung zhing / lha srin gzhan la btsan chung
ba'i rgyab dang 'gro ba gzhan dag la gnod 'tshe mi chog pa'i spreng yig bcas mdzad pa la/ da lta spring yig ces pa'i bzhugs khang 'di bzhin byung ngo / /gzhan yang rgyal
chen bsod nams dpal du grags pa sogs rten khang bde mchog na yod pa 'di rnams dang / gzhan yang ril sgrub skabs sogs la phebs pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug birWa pa'i srung
ba/ thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i mngon rtogs pa'i mthun pa'i snang brnyan zung dang / da lta ril sgrub sogs la 'grem pa'i sngags 'chang chen pos bzhengs par mdzad
pa'i sngags thang chen mo/ bla ma yi dam chos srung bcas pa'i zhal skong gsar bris mang du mdzad pa'i thang ka dang bcas par gos rgyan gzhi li wang gi gong sham 'ja' sgrigs
zhal khebs ling sna lnga sogs kyis spras pa dngul tog can 'di dag dang / gzim chung dang bcad rgya khang bcas kyi gos kyi bla bre dang hor gos 'ba' zhig las grub pa'i
gos kyi yol ba gsum/

mchod chas dngul ting che chung bdun cha gnyis mchod kong che chung gnyis/ spos 'dzin/ me dam spos phor che ba dngul grub kyai rdor lha dgu pad sdong can sogs tsha gser gyis
brgyan pa sha stag dang gta' spel snod sogs dngul teb bzhi bcu skor dang / gzhan yang nye 'khor gos dmar gyi smad khebs 'khor lo can/ stong ser sa chings gzung thag rdor
bcas la sogs pa rdo gzhong dang rang 'thag sogs tshun chad nyer mkho byas chog 'di dag gsar bskrun mdzad cing / dgung grangs so brgyad du phebs pa lcags sprel khrums zla'i
nang sku kha bdo ba zhig kyang byung tshod kyi rnam thar zhal gsung ma'i gong 'phros las/ so brgyad lo la gro bzhin zla ba'i mjug/ /bya rgyal rgod po gnam 'phang gcod
pa la/ /hor las skyes pa'i bdud sprul ma rungs pas/ /sa rnyi btsugs zin nas 'gum 'dod kyang / /ro zan 'dab chags lta bu'i sngags smyon kho/ /rnyi la thebs las med do rgas
gog tsho/ /phyin chad snying tshim yid bde dga' bar mdzod/ /zhes gsungs pas shes nus so/ /de ltar dgung grangs so brgyad yan gyi rnam thar zhal gsung ma dang bstun na rags
tsam de ltar lags kyang / lo khams mi gsal ba'i sngon byon gong ma rim byon gyis phyag btab pa'i spyi dang bye brag gi bstan 'gro'i me btsa' gtsug lag khang rnying gras
che phra rnams la nyams gso ji ltar mdzad pa rnams rags tsam brjod na/ thog mar rje btsun gong ma'i gzim sbug gzim spyil dkar po'am sgo rum du grags pa 'di nyid kyi rtse'i
spang bad spen bad du bsgyur

ba dang / thug chen 'di bzhin yab rje kun blo'i sku dus spos gnang mdzad kyang / lo mang cung zad gog skyon gyis gsar bskrun mdzad nas dbu rtse'i khyams rar mgon po'i man ngag
nas byung ba bzhin thun mong ma yin pa'i thugs sgrub tshul bzhin gsar 'dzugs mdzad de/ thub chog mnga' gsol bcas rgyas pa mdzad par grags pa dang / dbu rtse rnying ma'i
thog gi gser zangs kyi rgya phibs 'di bzhin sngags 'chang grags blo bas bzhengs gnang la lo mang gog skyon shing cha gsar spod sogs gsar bzhengs dang 'dra ba'i nyams gso
mdzad pa dang/ dbu rtse gsar mar grags pa'i lam 'bras bla brgyud kyi zhal skong / yab rje rdo rje 'chang kun dga' blo gros kyi snang brnyan dngul grub ma mchod rdzas bcas
'di bzhin sogs gsar skrun rab gnas bcas mdzad pa dang / slob dpon rin po che bsod nams rtse mo'i gzim phug gzim khang rnying ma'am da lta grwa shar gtsug lag khang du
grags pa 'di la nyams gso gsar bskrun lta bu dang / nang du bzang gos kyi bla bre 'phan sogs mchod rdzas du ma 'bul sbyor mdzad pa dang de nub smug chung mgon khang la nyams
gso dang nang du rgyal chen rigs bzhi mi tshad ma 'di rnams dang / drag po'i gzhal yas khang sogs nang gzungs mtshan ldan 'khor tshogs rnams kyi mgo brnyan dang bcas
gsar bskrun gyis rdo rje phur pa la brten pa'i rab gnas rgyas par mdzad pa dang / de rnams kyi ltag bde gling mgon khang sogs nyams gso dang / mgon po lcam dral

sngon sngags 'chang chen pos lha sa rdzong nas spyan drangs pa de nyid bde mchog pho brang du phyag len bzhin dbyangs rol dang bcas phar dang tshur gdan drangs te nyams gso
rab gnas bcas gsar bzhengs lta bur mdzad pa dang / shAka bzang sku 'bum nyams gso rmang nas gsar bcos mdzad de steng gzim khang dkar po grags pa sngon du dpon chen dang
/ de rjes sa bzang ma ti paN chen/ sa bzang 'phags pa de rjes ngor chen rdo rje 'chang la gtsug tor rnam rgyal zhal gzigs sogs kyi gtsug lag khang rnams nyams gso gsar bzhengs
mdzad cing / de'i shar na dkar shAkya grags kyi nang rten sku 'bum dang / de 'og rdor khang gtsug lag khang lho jo sras shAkya ye shes sogs kyi sku 'bum bcas bde gshegs
mchod rten brgyad du bsgyur bar mdzad nas/ gzungs brdzang rab gnas phun sum tshoT par mdzad de sa rgyan gnam rgyan sogs gsar 'bul mdzad pa dang / de mtshungs mgon nub
'cham mgon rnams dang / g.yag zengs bcas nyams gso gsar bskrun lta bur mdzad de/ mgon po'i rab gnas man ngag nas byung ba bzhin mdzad pa dang / sngon dus zan tshul bla
brang ngam deng sang khro khang bla brang du grags pa 'di'ang 'dir rmang nas chos sar dang chabs gcig mgon khang 'di'ang zhal bkod phun sum tshogs pa 'og tu spod gnang thog
mi sring gsum la sku 'jim sgrub ma gos bzang gi phod kha rdor gong rus rgyan sogs kyis brgyan pa khyad par nang gzungs rnams kyang rnam 'dren kun blos

nang sor a mes zhabs kyis pu tra'i zhal 'bag la sku byings bskrun pa'i dkar chag sor bzhag lta bus mdzad/ me ris kyi khrod gur lha brgyad 'byung 'dul sogs gsar bskrun mdzad
cing / gzungs rnams zab par phul te steng du gser gyi ganydzi ra rgyal mtshan rnga thug kyis tshogs bcas gsar bskrun mdzad de/ rab tu gnas pa'i dga' ston bcas mdzad pa 'di
sngon dus nas bzung gdan sa'i byang rgyud la chu gnod mi 'byung ba'i bka' bsgo mdzad pa bzhin phyi lo dgun dus grum chu sbos te bla brang zam sner thon tsam nas mchod
zhing bya phra mar phyogs pas rdo skyor bgyis kyang bsrung dka' ba byung 'dug pa/ chos skyong gis cung zad kyang bka' las mi 'da' ba'i mtshan mar mngon pa der gnam sa bar
gsum gyi drag po'i rgyan dang / drug rten gyi tshogs dang bcas gsar bskrun mdzad pa dang / de'i ltag gi dga' ldan bla brang 'di nyid dmangs nas brling chos mdzad de/ sngar
las bkod pa rab tu son pa 'og gi mgon khang du rgyal chen bse khrab pa'i g.yas g.yon du mdung dmar can chos skyong dung thod can rnams sku gzugs dang bcas par gsar bzhengs
mdzad/ bla ma bdag nyid chen po'i thugs dam rten gur mgon lcam dral sogs sngar yod rnams bzhugs su gsol te/ sngags 'chang bla ma nyid kyis rab gnas kyi me tog 'thor/
rgyal bstan srung bar slar yang bka' bsgos te spyan gzigs gtor tshogs sogs sprin ltar gtibs shing / bstan pa'i bya ra g.yel med mdzad slad bzhugs

sa'i steng du gser gyi ganydzi ra dang rgyal mtshan rnga thug sogs kyis brgyan te/ dpal ldan sa skya'i mdzes rgyan du bzhugs pa dang / 'di'i shar 'dab na sngon 'phags pa rin
po che rgya yul phebs skabs dha rma pA lA'i phyi rten gser 'bum la dpon chen shAkya bzang po dang shar pa 'jam dbyangs pa rin chen rgyal mtshan gnyis kyis gtsug lag khang
steng du g.yu rtsi sgron pa'i rgya phubs phag sna ma bcas bskul te bzhengs pa deng sang gi bar du g.yu thog ces grags pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po 'di na bzhugs pa'i gser
'bum chen mo 'di'i 'gram na ma gcig mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi gser 'bum dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i gtsug lag khang la sngags 'chang grags pa blo gros/ sngags 'chang mangga'i
mtshan can/ yab rje dbang sdud snying po rnams kyis nyams gso dang khyad par 'jam mgon dbang sdud snying pos ldebs bris rnams thang kar spod gnang dang / bla bre 'phen sogs
legs par bstsal te/ steng du g.yu rtsi sgron pa'i rgya phubs dgongs pa bzhes kyang lag rgyun med pas bzo pa kha shas nas sgrub khul bgyis kyang ha cang legs par ma byung
ba de rnams bla brang shar gyi klu bha su dha ra'i pho brang steng phul ba 'di yin tshod/ g.yu thog shar ram 'jam chu bzhugs khri zhes grags pa'i lo rgyus cung zad gleng
na/ sngon gyi dus su rgya mtsho dpon gyis gtsos gdan sa'i bka' khrims pa rnams chos khrims sogs bca' ba'i skabs kyi rgya mtsho dpon gyi bzhugs khri yod pa'i g.yas kyi
ldeb bris la sa bir rje btsun rtse mo/ rje btsun grags

pa sogs bzhugs pa la gnas bskor pa dag gi sdod yul byas pas dud skyon dang / khyad par bsam bral 'ga' zhig gis lam ngan dod pas sku so sor phur pa rtod de yo byad 'gel ba dang
mi 'tsham pa la mtshams med kyi las gsog par thugs kyis ma bzod par/ de rnams bsrung ba'i phyir rigs sngags 'chang pa kun dga' bkra shis kyis gtsug lag khang du bsgyur
nas rten gsar bskrun mang du mdzad de bzhugs pa slar yang gangs can bstan 'gro'i rtsa lag o rgyan rgyal ba'i rnam 'phrul dpal ldan chos skyong gis rmang nas gsar bzhengs

sme

ba can la 'dra cog mdzad de bzhengs pa 'bum thang na bzhugs pa'ang sa chen kun blos sa 'bum dngul 'bum du bsgyur skabs 'dir phebs la sogs dang / 'gro mgon phyag rdor sogs 'di'i
rten rnams kyang 'dir spyan drangs te bzhugs su gsol/ gzhan yang sbyin bdag mangga'i mtshan can bcas bzhugs pa'i drung na sa rgyan ting bdun tshar du ma dka' spyad ka
'phan khyad mtshar/ gnam rgyan bzang gos 'ba' zhig las grub pa/ 'di rnams sa skya pa dbang sdud snying pos skye rgu'i bsod nams kyi zhing du bskrun pa 'di rnams dang /
sngon dus nyis thog bla brang de nyid deng sang mngon dga' bde chen du mtshan bsgyur te/ 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi sku dus bzhengs gnang 'di'ang lo mang ring 'gros gyis gcong
zom che bar nyams gso rmang nas gsar bcos mdzad de nang du mchod rdzas dang / steng du gser zangs kyi rgyal mtshan rnga thug bcas gsar bskrun mdzad pa dang / de'i byang
zur khang bla brang du grags pa nyams gso gsar bskrun mdzad de sgrol dkar thog tshad ma sngon sngags 'chang chen pos thugs sras grags pa blo gros rgyal/ sras bsod nams
dbang phyug rnams kyis nyams gso'i skabs ldebs bris su bzhugs pa'i sngags 'chang chen po'i sku/ tshe dpag med/ dzam ser rnams tshar du dngar/ dmar po skor gsum bcas bzhugs
pa rnams zhal grangs de dang mthun pa'i 'bur sku 'di rnams dang / mthong don gtsug lag khang gi nub phyogs 'od dpag med kyi snang brnyan 'di'ang

gsar bskrun mdzad pa dang / gzhi thog pho brang gi gnas bcu lha khang gi nub zur khyad byang mgon khang yan chad nas shar gyi zur bar ling bcos sku drin skyong ba sogs rags
tsam dang / bla brang shar dang grwa shar rnams kyi mthong pa'i gser zangs rgyal mtshan sogs gsar bskrun rgya cher mdzad pa 'di rnams dang lha chen sprul pa'i gandho la
chen po'i khyams stod du gong du bkod pa bzhin gser khri chen mo'i ltag gi rgyal ba tshe mtha' yas dang / de'i g.yas g.yon du rnam par rgyal ma dang / sgrol dkar yid bzhin
'khor lo/ gong du smos pa bzhin gang gi sku mched gcung po'i nang rten bcu gcig zhal rnams kyi snang brnyan rnams gser dngul sbrags ma las grub pa/ rin chen du mas rgyan
spras pa 'di rnams dang / gang gi gdung sras bde gshegs mthu stobs dpal 'byor gyi nang rten dngul gyi gdung rten tsha gser ma rin chen du mas spras pa bcas gsar bzhengs
rgyud sde nas bshad pa'i gzungs yongs rdzogs rab gnas kyis mtha' brgyan pa bcas mdzad/ rgyal chen thang du grags pa 'di na sngon dus rgyal chen bzhi g.yas g.yon du bris
pa yod kyang mi srun pa 'ga' zhig gis nyams chag btang ba rnams sa chen kun blo'i sku dus bzhi char phyogs bsgrigs kyis byang ldeb tu spo bar mdzad kyang / sngar gyi snang
tshul mngon du gyur pa thugs kyis ma bzod par da lta'i rgyal chen bzhi 'bur sku 'gro ba'i don la ring tshul bzhengs stabs can thog so gnyis tsam 'di rnams gzungs rnams
rgyud sde nas bshad pa bzhin sgrub par

mdzad pa 'di rnams dang / de'i lcags sgo g.yas g.yon gyi srid pa'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa dang / mngon pa nas bshad pa'i 'jig rten snod bcud kyi 'khor lo'i ldeb bris 'di rnams
thog phibs bcas gsar bskrun mdzad/ gtsug lag khang gi sgo khang du 'khor lo 'di dag bris pa'i dgos pa ni las 'bras la rmongs pas srid pa 'di dag tu las dang mthun par skyes/
de dag gis sdug bsngal myong nas bde 'gror skyes/ rten de la nges 'byung skyo shas kyis srid pa la chags bral byed dgos/ ma thub na slar yang 'khor bar lu gu rgyud
du 'khor bas lam chos dang mjal dus 'dir srid pa 'di dang sdug gyis thub pa zhig bya'o snyam pa'i nges 'byung bskyed phyir 'du khang gi sgor bris pa lags/ lha rtse theg chen
pho brang gi nub tu o rgyan rin po che gtso 'khor snang brnyan ngo mtshar can 'di rnams kyang gsar bzhengs mdzad/ 'di'i nang gzungs su gu ru rin po che de nyid btsan
po khri srong lde btsan la dgung lo brgyad pa lta bur bstan te rdo la zhabs rjes bzhag pa de nyid gtso bor bzhugs pa'i ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyur bur bkang ste rab gnas
mdzad pa po yang slob dpon nyid dang rnam dbye med par lung gis bsngags pas na/ deng skabs slob dpon dngos dang rnam dbye ma mchis/ snang brnyan 'di dang / thigs g.yab shar
lho nub gsum dang phur khang khyams stod smad thog kha'i zhal ba rnams nyams gso gsar brdung mdzad pa dang / de rnams kyi shar lho'i mthil gyi 'jam khros lha khang ngam
'jigs byed lha khang du grags

pa 'di'ang gsar ldeb mdzad pa sngags 'chang bla ma rang nyid kyi thugs bskyed rmad du byung bas bskrun pa 'di la dgos pa rten 'brel lam la nye ba 'di la nye bar mkho ba'i sa
gsogs skabs rkyen dbang du skyes dar ma zhig song ba'i dur sa 'dres pas drag po'i gzhung las gnas khang dur khrod rol pa'i gzhal yas khang zhees pa de rang byung bas gzhal
yas khang ngam lha khang gi steng gi char rigs kun khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang kun dga' blo gros/ 'jigs byed rwa lugs lha bcu gsum ma'i bla ma brgyud pa'i snang brnyan
rnams g.yas g.yon du bzhugs pa'i 'og dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams kyi snang brnyan 'bur sku bzhugs pa'i me ris kyi ldeb tu/ bde kyai gsang
gsum gur mgon lha bcu gnyis beg rtse lcam sring bcas bzhugs pa dang / de 'og 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje yab yum la 'khor rnams kyis bskor ba dang / sgo logs g.yas na dus
dgra'i dbang po ma he zhal can bdag chen dbang gi mtshan 'chang drag chas kyi rnam pa la thugs sras zung bcas 'khor tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams bzhugs pas 'bur sku thams
cad bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gtso bor gyur pa'i ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyur bur bkang zhing / khyad par rdo rje 'jigs byed gtso 'khor rnams kyi thugs kar lcags las

bla bre mi

ro rengs po mgo lag rkang pa don snying nang khrol gyi 'phan dzar sogs kyis brgyan pa gnas 'dir bzhugs pa tsam gyis skyi g.ya' bar byed pa swau ma pu ri'am dur khrod so sa'i

dang bcas pa 'di dag rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan la 'khu ba'i dam sri'i gshed du sngar med gsar bskrun mdzad pa 'di gang la btab par mdzad pa'i lo khams mi gsal yang sbyin
bdag bzhengs pa'i skabs na thugs sras zung bcas gsungs lugs la dpag na yab rje padma'i mtshan can dang / phun pho kun rin pa zung 'khrungs zin nas bde mchog pho brang

nyams gso gsar bzhengs bkod legs 'di bzhin bskrun te/ rten 'bur sku rdo ring pas bzhengs pa lam 'bras brgyud pa/ snyigs dus bstan pa'i nyi ma sngags 'chang chen pos bzhengs

'di yin lags/ 'di

steng bzhugs khang khrol chen bkod legs spen bad steng du gser 'phru gser zangs rgyal mtshan sogs gnas 'di mdzes shing zhing skyong dgyes pa'i mchod rdzas su bskrun/ mgon khang
mdun gyi gzhung lam phyag 'tshal sgang du grags pa'ang sngon dkar gong spungs pa la dar lcog sgron pa zhig las med pa/ da lta maNDal bkod legs dbus su ngo bo zhing skyong

gyi mdzad 'phrin rags tsam sngar smos pa bzhin dang / khyad par gtsug lag khang nyams gso gsar bskrun mdzad pa sogs 'di dus kyi lha khang mkhan chen kun dga' dpal bzang gis
lcags bya lor mdzad pa'i gdan sa 'di nyid kyi rten bshad chen mo sogs nas btus pa bcas de lhag gi zhib cha ma rnyed pa dang / de nas lcags sprel zla ba brgyad pa'i 'phro
nas sa sbrul zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes bcu drug bar 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa'i lo hril po brgyad dang zla ba bdun dang zhag bcu drug gi rtogs brjod rnam thar sogs mdzad 'phrin
bsam gyis mi khyab pa yong ba gzhir grub kyang deng skabs lo mang song rkyen gtam rgyud sgra dag min sna tshogs brjod pa las lo rgyus zhib par yig 'khod kyi zin bris sogs
cher med rkyen zhib cha 'bri

bar rngo ma thogs kyang / gzhan nas thor bu byung ba 'ga' re gung bstun te sgro bskur spangs te cung zad 'bri na/ lcags bya sogs lo 'di rnams snga phyi gang rigs su lha chen
lcags ri'i byang spel lha khang 'di bzhin rtsa ba nas gsar bskrun gyi nang du phyis byon gdung brgyud sri skeg gi bar gcod kyis mi tshugs pa'i phyir bdud 'dul mchod rten
skeg sri zil gnon gyi 'dra sku rin po che sogs rten rnams byin 'dam khyad par can du ma las bskrun pa gzungs rdzogs rab gnas bcas mdzad pa 'di rnams dang / de'i lho nub
lcog spel du 'du khang ka ba bcu drug pa sdom gsum rab dbyer gzhung skyor mdzad par dmigs te nang gi rten 'jam mgon sa paN gyi sku 'dra rin po che ring bsrel rnam bzhis
phyur bur gtams te/ rab gnas can gsar bzhengs mdzad par sa paN lha khang du grags pa de yang nyid mdzad skeg sri zil gnon gyi sku 'dra bcas gong dang gnyis char rtser gser

blos kyang

bzhugs 'dug pa de dus gsar bskrun mdzad gras dang / gzhan chab tshan skabs khri pa'i bzhugs yul da lta spel ril du grags pa dang / phyag gnyer ban tshang pa sogs sdod yul snga
dus khang phran du ma yod tshod 'dug pa phal cher sku thog 'dir byung 'dra ba dang / gzhan yang yab rje kun blo'i sku dus bzhengs gnang gi gser gyi 'dren chas gsum gyis
sku thog 'dir khom min la brten gser gyi 'dren chas dkar stegs bzed zhal bcas gcig 'phar ba 'di dang / gser ting che ba 'di nyid bcas da lta gsol che'i rtsis khra'i thog
yod pa 'di rnams gsar bskrun mdzad pa dang / dgung grangs bzhi bcur phebs pa chu khyi lo'i mjug tsam nas bdag chen dbang gi mtshan can nyid dang / gdung sras rgyal yum
sku gzhon dam tshig sgrol ma/ mdzod pa drung rigs ban tshang pa sogs zhabs 'bring pa'i 'khor tshogs sngon lam bzhin dang bcas/ gangs ljongs sa yi thig le lha ldan rgyal
khab chen po sogs gong sa yan phyin gyi mjal phyag tu chibs sgyur mdzad sgo rnams phal cher shing glang lor yab rje kun blo yab sras gsum bcas phebs skabs la cha bzhag mdzad
dam snyam pa de skabs 'jam mgon kun blos mdzad pa'i 'grul phebs bca' yig nyung ngu zhig yod pa gzhir mdzad nas/ bca' yig rgyal bstan rab rgyas zhes pa gsar bkod mdzad
de sgar pa rnams kyi byed sgo che phra de bzhin dgos pa'i bka' bsgyur dang bcas/ sngar lam mgon khang rnams su lam gtor sogs mdzad nas/ bar lam zhag thog

rnams su spro khang 'grogs 'gros/ phyi khur 'grogs 'gros gzim gur sogs dang / phyag gnyer ban tshang pa sogs khongs so so'i sdod gur bcas sgar sgrigs kyi phebs srol snga lam
bzhin mdzad nas/ bar lam e waM chos ldan du 'khyug tsam phebs pa/ tshogs chen la gnas bcu'i rjes gnang / thar rtser gu ru drag dmar gyi dbang dang / tshe dbang byad grol
sogs mdzad pa spyi sger nas gsol ston dngos 'bul sogs rgya che bar zhus te/ gzhis rtser rdzong dpon dang / bkras lhun sogs nas phebs bsu thab bsu rgyas pa dang bcas pan
chen rin po che blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi ma'i mjal phyag dang phar tshur gnang skyes sogs sngar lam ltar mdzad snyam sems zhing / de nas gdan bteg ste phebs lam rong brgyud
phebs tshod gyi bar lam zhal mjal zhu ba/ chos 'brel dbul phongs rigs la sbyin gtong / dgon khag rnams la mang 'gyed/ gdul bya rnams re ba skong bzhin par lha ldan dang
nye bar gong sa mchog nas mtshams zhu mjal dar/ mnyes spro le tshan sogs thog ma'i gzigs gsol dang / rang re nas 'tshams 'bul ba mngags shing / skyed tshal klu lding du
rtse shod thab bsu gsol ston drung rigs ser skya sum cu skor gyi phebs bsu ba rnams dang bcas bzhugs mtsher yab gzhis lha klu dga' tshal du gdan chags te/ rtse shod rnams
nas ja zhus 'tshams zhu'i mjal dar bcas phebs shing / de nas mi ring bar rtse drung 'dzin gnyis pa'i zhabs g.yas khang du mjal phyag tu

chibs bsgyur te dpon 'khor rnams rdo ring phyi nang sde yangs shar bcas par sngar gting chibs zhol lugs sogs ma mdzol ba'i sgo nas gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa blo
bzang 'jam dpal rgya mtsho bstan pa'i dbang phyug dpal bzang po'i gser zhal mjal bar/ maNDal/ rten gsum/ 'gyogs dar nang mdzod 'bul mtshon rgya cher bstabs pa sogs dang
/ dngos gzhi khri mjal skabs/ mgon po gang gi sku mdun du ban tshang pa dang bcas bzhengs te maNDal 'bul ba/ rten gsum gyi bshad pa sogs dang dngos 'bul gser dngul gyi
tshan grangs rgya che spam mtho ba 'bul ba sogs shing glang lo 'jam mgon kun blo'i sku dus kyi lam bzhin mdzad yod 'gro snyam pa dang de nas gzhung sa mchog nas snga bar
phyi gsum du ja mar rtsam 'dur chag sogs do lnga bcu sogs kyi zur gsol gya nom sogs 'bul bar mdzad cing / de ring la jo shAka rnam gnyis sogs lha sa thil dang / rtser 'phags
pa lo ke shwa ra dang / gser gdung khag sogs la sna lnga'i mchod 'bul khrus gsol rab gnas rgyas par mdzad snyam pa dang / de mtshams gong sa mchog nas dpal chen rdo rje
gzhon nu'i stod las kyi dbang / nyang gter gu ru drag dmar gyi dbang sogs bzhes pa/ gur drag dbang gi skabs gong sa chen po nyid nas bdag chen dbang gi mtshan can 'di
nyid gur drag dngos su gzigs pa sogs kyi ngo mtshar kyang byung / don du bdag chen 'di nyid rang re gdul bya rnams kyi snang ngor mir snang ba tsam las

don du padma 'byung gnas nyid las gzhan du ma 'das pa'ang skyes chen dam pa phan tshun gzigs snang 'di nyid kyis grub/ de nas gzhung sa mchog gi bka' dgongs mtha' dmag bzlog
thabs su lha ldan gyi phyogs bzhir mnan pa'i steng mchod rten 'debs pa/ rdo rje gzhon nu sogs gtor bzlog kyang mang du mdzad skad dang / chu phag dbyar zla gang rigs zhig
la rgyal yum dam tshig sgrol ma zhes rang byon ma sku chung ba de nyid la ngag dbang kun dga' rgyal mtshan lha klur dga' tshal gyi mchor khang de nyid du sku bltams pa/
rgyang tsam nas gong sa mchog mjal skabs sku pang du bzhes shing dbu phud 'bul gnang gis ngag dbang 'jam dpal bde legs rgya mtsho zhes pa'i mtshan gyi cod pan stsol bar
mdzad pa sogs gzigs bzos che khar gdan sa 'di nyid kyi dgon lag zangs ldan chos sdes mtshon spu dkar gzhis ma lag gtan tshigs dang bcas pa dang / sngar yod chos gzhis khag
la'ang 'byed phra rgyab gnon gtan tshig bcas 'bul sbyor mdzad pa ma zad/ sku thog 'di la sa rta rgya bod dpyad mtshams zhes sngon sa sprel lor gor bod zing zhi skabs nas
'di ga'i chos gzhis rnams la de snga nang khral khag las phyi khral rmon rngod dmag rma bya lha thil gyi mjal skyes tsam las gzhan pa'i khral med kyang / sa sprel gor
bod zing zhi nas bzung lam gtogs 'khri sgrub gzhung bla'i rdzong gzhis sa khongs spyi 'gros ltar sgrub dgos kyang / da phyin sngon lam ltar gyi steng gong sa mchog dang gong
ma'i sku tshab am ban

phebs bzhud ma gtogs gzhan rtsa chag gi gtan tshigs rgya bod skad gnyis shan sbyar ma gtsang btsan bstsal ba sogs mnga' 'bangs rnams la mi 'jigs pa skyabs kyi sbyin pas 'tsho
bar mdzad pa sogs rgyal dbang padma ka ra dngos dang rnam dbyer ma mchis/ de nas thon phyag sogs rim par zhu gnang gis gzhung sa mchog nas phebs zos phebs skyel sogs bla
na med pa'i sku zos dang bcas gdan bteg ste/ bdag chen rang sku rkyang ni byang rwa sgreng / stag lung sogs la'ang phebs tshod 'dug yum sras byings rnams snga phyi gcig
'dzom dus mdzad pa ji ltar yin rung / de nas rgod rgal la brgyud dbus lho khar mnyam phebs kyi bsam yas su rgyang tsam bzhugs te mchims phu dang g.ya' ma lung sogs la gnas
gzigs dang / de skabs rab 'byung par phur dbang stod las smad las sogs bstsal bar bsam lcog dpe gar gling gi steng lha khang zhig tu gnang ba zhu mkhan kyang mang rab
kyi byung tshod gyis ling ga rnams la zhing bcu tshang pa'i dgra bgegs rnams 'gugs gzhug skabs zan ling la 'phar g.yo drag tu byung zhing zan ling dngos nas mthe bong sgreng
ba dang / 'ga' zhig bros stabs su 'dug pa sogs/ de dus mkhan tshang sde pa sogs phal cher gyis mthong ba rig 'dzin bskul tshig tu'ang gsungs pa ltar dang / de skabs
dbang gnang sa lha khang gi dbus der bdag chen nyid kyi snang brnyan 'jim sgrub drag chas can zhig bzhugs pa nye dus gong sa thams cad mkhyen pa phebs pa zhig la

gnas der dogs skyon gyis spo bar brtsam pa na sus kyang sgul bskyod ma nus pa'i ngo mtshar can dang / yar lung shel brag gnas gzigs kyis gu ru'i sgrub phug tu thugs dam nyams
bzhes skabs slob dpon rin po ches thengs gnyis tsam zhal dngos su bstan te/ ma 'ongs lung bstan spyi dang bye brag snyigs dus der rje nyid nas spang blang ji ltar mdzad
dgos sogs lung bstan dang rjes su lung bstan mang du brnyes kyang bdag chen shin tu gsang bar mdzad pa sogs/ bdag chen nyid nas a li chos rje'i sprul sku gong ma ngag dbang
chos grags kyis zur tsam bka' las thos tshul sprul sku nyid kyi rnam thar nang gsal ba las gzhan pa'i de skabs gsung rgyun zin bris zhib par mi gnang bas 'god ma nus/
de ltar dbus lho byang gi 'gro don rnams mdzad zin te gtsang gam pa la nas sgang brgyud nas gdan sa chen po dang nye bar phebs pa na/ der bzhugs rnams nas ser 'phreng rdo
rje chos skyong phebs pa dang bcas pho brang gzhi thog tu gdan drangs te de'i sang nas bzung chos srung rnams la bskang gso brgya tshar/ gzhis byes rnams la gsol ston
rgya cher stsol ba sogs dga' ston gyi dpal la rol ba mdzad do/ /de nas ring min mgon khang rnams su gtang rag dang sngar yar lung shel brag tu zhal gzigs ji ltar byung ba
bzhin gu ru rin po che gtso 'khor gyi snang brnyan rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa tsha gser can rin chen du ma'i phra tshom kyis spras pa'i bzhugs khri gser zangs las grub
pa nang

gzungs ring bsrel rnam bzhis gang bur bkang pa la o rgyan gnyis pa bdag chen de nyid rang gi rab gnas can da lta lha chen khyams stod kyi gser khri chen mo'i g.yas gral la
bzhugs pa 'di bzhin gsar bzhengs mdzad/ de skabs tsam la gzhung bla brang sogs su'ang dbyar ston mtshams su drang srong ri Shi 'char ba dang bstun/ chab bzhes sogs la dmigs
nas nor bu gling kha dang kun khyab gling zhes sogs byung ba dang / dus mtshungs tsam 'dir yang phun tshogs bde skyid gling kha 'di bzhin dbyar dus spro sang gnang yul
sogs la dmigs nas sa gzhung nas gsar rgyag byas tshod dang / gzhung bla sogs su'ang rtse phyag dang bral phyag bzhes pa sogs byung ba dang bstun/ 'dir yang phyag rdzas 'ga'
zhig zur du bdag tshags mdzad de/ sku mdun gzim dpon nas do dam gyis sgrub mchod khag dang gtor bzlog rigs/ gzhung skyor khag sogs la gzhung gtong rnams kyi skyor gnon
du ja thug gsol phor sogs thor re ba dgos pa 'di rnams dang zur du 'khrungs ston chen mo dang / ston dpyid chab tshan skabs rnams dang / gzim chung lho byang gi gtor spod
sprel zla'i gur drag sogs 'char 'phar rnams gtong bar rtse gzim dpon zhes don du rtse phyag mdzod zhes pa rtsis 'khri'i dngos po ma rtsa ru khag sogs sngon dus stobs chen

gzhung sa mchog sogs su snyan 'bul sogs mdzad de/ shing glang rgyal zla'i mjug mdos chen zab re 'jam mgon kun blos deb bzhin la/ gyon chas nyin sa tshogs su 'cham sku dregs
pa zil gnon lcam dral gdan 'dren gyis dpang gzugs sogs la sku 'cham mdzad rgyun 'di bzhin sku thog 'dir 'phar du byung 'dra snyam zhing / snga dus dgu tshan bdun las med

brjod rgyur byas te/ mi ring bar yab rje dpal ldan chos skyong nyid srid skyong dgongs zhu mdzad de rigs sras bgres pa padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug mthu stobs bstan 'dzin
bzang po nyid bla chen 'phags pa rin po che'i bzhugs khrir mnga' gsol te/ yab rje rang khri zur mdzad nas phun tshogs bde skyid dang gzhi thog phun gling sogs gang mnyes
su bzhugs shing skabs re byas 'gyur dang kha'u'i brag rdzong sogs su bcad rgya sogs la bzhugs sam snyam pa bcas/ thugs dam kho nas bstan mkhas kyi bgyi ba spyi bye brag

bzhugs mang ba gnas

rten phyag mchod kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ nA ro mkha' spyod kyi tshogs mchod/ dam tshig rdo rje'i sbyin sreg/ gur mgon khro bcu drag po'i sbyin sreg khyung khra'i sbyin sreg sogs
