sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam thar shin tu bsngags pa'i yul te/ skyes bu dam pa yin par mdzad spyod de dag las rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /de rnams ni chu lug nag zla'i
tshes dgur 'khrungs pa nas sa sbrul sa zla'i bar gyi rnam thar rags tsam ste zhib cha sa chen kun blo'i rnam thar bzhin lo khams so sor mthar chag 'god par mdzad tshul
zin bris sogs med cing ma gsal bas 'ol tshod 'god ma nus pa bcas/ gzhan du 'gro mgon 'di nyid kyi mdzad 'phrin rab 'byams sngags 'chang chen po dang / a mes zhabs rnam
'dren kun blo sogs dang mtshungs par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar bstan pa dang sems can gyi don sogs rgya chen mdzad pa rnams la thugs dgongs rdzogs shing

dus snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i gdul bya ma rungs pa dag la cung zad thugs ma rangs pa yang 'khrungs te/ re zhig zhing khams gzhan du gdul bya rgya che ba la dgongs te/ gzungs
sku'i bkod pa bsdus tshul ni/ 'di skabs sngon rjes rnams su sku thog 'dir phyag 'byor byung ba'i spu dkar gzhis su skabs re phebs te/ bcad rgya sogs la 'gyang tsam bzhugs
srol yod tshod kyi 'di skabs kyang de bzhin yin tshul gyis phebs te 'gyang tsam bzhugs par glo bur du bsnyun te/ 'dir bdag khri dang mdzod pa sogs snang med kyi mur gnas
tshul gsan ma thag zhabs rim rgya cher sbad spung dang lhag par bdag khri padma'i mtshan can nyid mi mjal dogs pas nam nyin ltos med kyis spu gzhis su phebs par/ khul de'i
ko gru sogs la ma ltos par gtsang chur phebs rtsis mdzad pa na yab rje dpal ldan chos skyong de nyid spur gzhis kyi thog khar sku gzi mdangs can bzhengs te gzigs rtog
gnang ba gzigs pas cung zad lhod par gyur kyang nang du phebs skabs/ o rgyan gnyis pa 'gro mgon dbang sdud snying po de nyid dgung grangs zhe bdun pa sa sprel zla ba bzhi
pa'i tshes bcu drug la rnga yab gling du sprul pa sprul gzhi o rgyan gyi thugs kar bsdus te/ dbyer med ro gcig tu gyur zin par dngos su mjal phrad ma byung yang sku gdung
rin po che'i mdun du phyag gyang 'gyel ba ltar du 'tshal gnang gis sku gdung rin po che phyag gnyis kyi dbu gtsug tu bzhes shing dus gsum rgyal dang rgyal sras sogs shlau
ka gsum po 'di

thol byung du gsungs te/ gsol 'debs mdzad par gsungs rgyun las byung zhing / lo rgyus 'di la dpag na sku gdung yang 'od du yal la khad kyi byis pa lo brgyad dam chung ngu zhig
las med par mngon zhing / 'on kyang sngon du zhing brjes zin kyang thog kha nas brtse bas/ dngos su gzigs te/ gtsang chu la gya tshom du phebs tshe sku la gnod rkyen
byung dogs sku yi bkod pa gnyis bstan pa gdon mi za bas don du ye shes kyi skus rjes su bzung ba 'di gcig pu'i rnam thar yang gzhan gyis dpag dka' 'o/ /de nas sku gdung mdun
mchod tshogs bla mchod thugs dam 'dzin mi dus mtha'i zhal bkod spur sbyong gnang yul sogs/ gnas der mdzad dang gdan sar spyan 'dren sogs gang gnang yab rje pad 'dul rnam
thar sogs su mi gsal yang / brtags na bar lam gtsang chu dang spur sbyong ni zang chos rang du gnang med dam snyam pa dang / gdung rus sogs gdan sa chen por ser 'phreng
rgyas pa dang bcas gdan drangs te mchod 'bul dang / mi ring bar gad gtsang du btul te bla ma yi dam chos srung nor lha dang bcas pa'i sku spar grangs mang dang / satstsha
dri med kyi snying po sogs brgya stong du ma btab te/ rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa'i mchod rten bzhugs khri dang gdugs chos 'khor gser zangs can rin chen du ma'i rgyan
gyis mdzes pa'i nang gzungs su bzhugs pa'i steng ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi dang bye brag bla ma gong ma'i dbu lo na bza'/ gdung rus thugs dam snang brnyan sogs grangs
mang bzhugs/

da lta rig 'dzin lha khang gi shar lhor zhal nub bstan du bzhugs pa 'di nyid la rigs sras bdag khri padma'i mtshan can nyid/ ban tshang pa sogs chog gra dang bcas rab gnas
rgyas par mdzad cing / phyi bskor la me tog 'thor ba gos sku dang / 'phan nag zhal phye ste mchod 'bul/ skye bo'i tshogs la sbyin gtong che ba mdzad pa sogs sngon bla ma
gong ma dang 'dra ba mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang de skabs kyi gong sa thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal dbang lung rtogs rgya mtsho/ paN chen rin po che blo bzang dpal ldan bstan
pa'i nyi ma/ bod kyi srid skyong rta tshag sku gong ma sogs dang / gang gi dbu bla zhal bzhugs rnams dang bcas par bsngo rten spam mtho ba dang / 'di ga'i chos sde lho byang
gis mtshon pa dgon sde rnams dang / ris med kyi dgon pa rnams su dgongs rdzogs mchod 'bul/ mang 'gyed sogs rgya che ba dang / lo zla dus dran gyi dgongs rdzogs su chos
sde byang pa tshogs yongs la da lta'i bar la gcung dang lhan cig kyai rdo sgrub mchod zab ma tshul grol dgu dang / dus chen nyin ser 'du mang 'gyed zab pa zla dus la ban
tshang pa'i bla mchod bcas/ bdag khri padma'i mtshan can sogs yum sras rnams nas ji srid bar btsugs pa bcas kyis yab rje dpal ldan chos skyong ngam dbang sdud snying po'i
rnam thar rags tsam brjod zin to/ /

3 kun dga' phan bde rgya mtsho/gang gi gcung po kun dga' phan bde rgya mtsho'am e waM bzang por grags pa ni/ yab sa chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' blo gros de nyid dgung grangs
so brgyad du phebs pa/ me khyi lo sa ga zla ba'i tshes bzhi nyin rgyal yum chos lung ma sku gzhon pa skal bzang bde skyid bu khrid de nyid la gza' skar zla lag chu nang
'phrod pa'i snga dror shar ma skya tsam la 'khrungs pa gang cir bca' sgrig rnams chu lug lo gdung sras gcen po 'khrungs skabs bzhin mdzad nas/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid
nas snga dror lha bsangs rgyas par mdzad rjes rgyal dbang tshe dpag med kyi snang brnyan/ sdom rig dza bIr rig gnas skor rdor dril sogs sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin
las dang bcas pa'i rten bdog pa'i dngos po dang bcas gnang ste tshe dpag med kyi dbang sogs bstsal/ de skabs e waM bzang po zhes mtshan gsol ba'i rgyu mtshan 'khrungs tshes
snga nyin yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas ri bo che nas thang stong rgyal pos rnam thar snga bsgrigs su grags pa zhig ljags klog gi mu dang snga sor sde dger mngags ma
mdzad pa bzhin ban tshang pa'i dam tshig bskang gsol rdor dril theg chen dngos gtsang mang du sgrigs gnang mdzad pa rnams la dgongs e waM dang / thang rgyal gyi mtshan brtson
'grus bzang por gsol bar mdzad cing / 'khrungs ston du yum chen ban tshang

pas mdos zab kyi 'cham gzigs phul zhing / bsam brling lho ri rdo gdugs 'di gcung dam pa'i bla rir ngos 'dzin gyis yab rje nyid nas sa 'dzin phun tshogs yang rtser mnga' gsol
dang / phun gling rtser gser zangs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / thug gsum 'dzugs gnang gis gong ma lcam dral nub mar zhal gtso 'khor/ shar mar las mgon lnga bskyed chog gnang
/ de nas mgon khag bzhir gtang rag gnang tshul sogs gong yab rje rdo rje 'chang gi rnam thar bzhin dang / 'jam mgon de nyid gzhon nu nas yab rje mchog las dbang lung gsan
bsam dang / rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis sgrub dkyil chos spyod gtor bzlog sogs thugs chud kyis tshogs phebs sogs/ gong gdung sras gcen po dang phal cher 'dra bar mdzad tshul
yab rje rdo rje 'chang gi rnam thar bzhin dang / de nyid kyi dgung grangs bcu gnyis par gcen dang mnyam du 'jam dbyangs sa paN gyi chos khrir phebs tshul sogs gong 'gro
mgon dbang sdud snying po'i rnam thar bzhin dang / dgung grangs bco lnga pa yab rje rdo rje 'chang gcen po 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan can dang bcas dbus 'grul chen mor phebs
tshul gong yab rje'i rnam thar bzhin dang dgung grangs bco brgyad pa yab rje rdo rje 'chang dag zhing du phebs te dgongs rdzogs mdzad tshul kyang gcen po'i rnam thar
bzhin las bskyar ldab ma dgos pa dang / de rjes rje mus chen dang rig 'dzin chen po 'jigs med gling pa sogs las gcen po dang mnyam du gsan bsam mdzad

cing / gzhon nu nas rab tu byung ste gdan sa 'di nyid kyi rgyud sde khag dang / gtor bzlog khag rnams kyi rdo rje slob dpon mdzad pa sogs bstan pa'i bya ba thos bsam bsgom
gsum dang / mkhas pa'i bya ba 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum gyis dus 'da' bar mdzad skabs/ snyigs dus kyi gdul bya rnams bsod nams dman pas ma chud par dgung grangs nyer gsum pa
sa sprel zla tshes la zhing du gshegs pa'i tshul dang dgongs rdzogs sogs sgrub tshul gong 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can gyi rnam thar bzhin gdung rus rnams btul te satstsha
dri med snying po can btab ste rab gnas skabs lha'i me tog dkar po yu ba cung zad dang bcas pa mang du babs pa satstsha rnams la'ang sbyar ba dang / snga dus lha khang
bla brang gi gdung rabs zhig la'ang byung tshul gsungs pa sogs gong du bstan pa bzhin dang / gu ru padma'i gter lung zhig las khyi phag rgya mtsho'i ming can byung zhes
dgung snying bcas gsal bar bstan pa/ nang rten da lta lha chen khyams stod na bzhugs pa'i gser dngul ra ma lug gi 'jig rten dbang phyug bcu gcig zhal gyi snang brnyan 'di
yin par gsungs shing / lha chen sku gnyer sprod deb na bcu gcig zhal 'di rje btsun rmol drung 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi mas gsar bskrun dang / de'i nub kyi dngul grub mchod
rten 'di yin par bshad la gang ltar de gnyis gang rung yin pa lha'i me tog satstsha rnams de gnyis gang rung gi nang gzungs su bzhugs shing / gsang yum chos lung ma rje
btsun

ma dpal la zhes gdung sras sku mched rnams kyi a ce drung de nyid ni me khyi lor gshegs shing / nang rten gang gi yum dang mnyam por bla brang shar na bzhugs shing lo dus kyi
mchod 'bul du a drung dbal zhes da lta yang sa gzhung du tshogs chen cho ga gtong ba 'di yin tshod du 'dug sa chen rdo rje 'chang kun dga' blo gros kyi sku mched gcung
mthu stobs dbang phyug dang / bdag ma sger pa'i sras rje btsun 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma ni/ sa chen kun blo las lam 'bras tshogs slob dang / mkha' spyod skor gsum gyi
chos skor gtso bor gyur pa'i dbang lung khrid man ngag la sogs pa gdung sras sku mched rnams dang 'dra bar mdzad cing / rjes la rig 'dzin pho brang du bzhugs shing bsnyen
sgrub thugs dam sogs la brtson pa dang / lam 'bras slob bshad dang / nA ro mkha' spyod kyi chos skor sogs mang du gnang zhing / dus phyis yang rje pad 'dul sku mched rnams
kyi lam 'bras slob bshad dang / mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs khrid lung la sogs pa mang du gsan cing / sde dge bla ma ngag dbang rin chen zhes lam 'bras slob bshad brgyud
pa bzhugs pa de nyid la mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs gnang skabs thod pa'i bdud rtsi khol zhing lud pa kun gyis mthong ba/ bla ma de nyid nas mang du zhu bar mdzad cing
/ nyid kyi gsung las/ bod na khyed lta bu bzhugs pa mthong bas kho mo'i lta byed dbang po je gsal la song phan tshun dag snang 'gran pa bzhin gyi lo rgyus gsan pas/ khams
phyogs kyi bla sprul phal cher gyis

mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs gsan kyang slar byin rlabs che bas bla ma ngag dbang rin chen nyid la bskyar nas gsan tshul dang / dus phyis 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang pos
bla ma de nyid la bskyar ldab tu gsan pa sogs grub pa'i dbang mor bzhugs shing / sku tshe yang ring po bzhugs pas rin pho'i rmo'u drung du grags pa de nyid gshegs pa'i nang
rten nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i snang brnyan rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa'i sku rgyan sogs 'gran bral da lta lha chen khyams stod na bzhugs pa 'di'o/ /'dir smras pa/ 'og
min gnyis pa dpal ldan sa skya 'dir/ /bla chen gong ma spyi dang khyad par du/ /sngags 'chang chos rje a mes zhabs sogs dang / /bye brag sa chen kun blo yab sras kyi/ /rnam
thar gson dang bcos min dad pa 'phel/ /de ltar bsams kyang yi rang mi bskyed na/ /re zhig srid las thar ba'i skabs med phyir/ /zhim rgu zos la bde bar gnyid byos shig
/ci byed yid ches dad gsum 'phel 'gyur rnams/ /bde nas bde bar ring po mi thogs par/ /rnam grol go 'phang mchog la reg gyur te/ /bslu med rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i
gshis/ zhes bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /4 pad ma bdud 'dul dbang phyugde lta bu'i yab rje dpal ldan chos skyong ngam/ 'gro mgon dbang sdud

snying po'i gsang yum ngo mar gdung sras ma byung zhing / de rjes rta nag rang byon pa'i sras mo bgres gzhon gnyis las snga ma la gdung rigs gsum tsam byon pa las/ gcen po
padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gam mthu stobs bstan 'dzin bzang po ni/ yum gyi lhums su bzhugs pa'i tshe'ang yab rje dbang gi mtshan can nyid kyi mnal ltas su/ sa chen rdo rje
'chang kun dga' blo gros de nyid kyi yab rje nyid la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bstsal ba shar ba dang / yum gyi mnal ltas su gzim sbug
thos bsam 'brug sgra'i gzhi thams cad li khrir 'char ba gzigs pa dang / dpon slob lnga rig pa kun dga' bkra shis kyi mnal ltas su yab rje kun dga' blo gros de nyid na bza'
sku sbyar dri ma med pa gsol te/ phun gling de nyid kyi skas thung 'og tu mjal nyams dang phyag mdzad nas yab rje gar phebs zhus pas/ ngos phun tshogs gzim spyil du 'gro
gsungs te/ thogs med byon pa 'khrungs pa dang bcas/ yab rje dbang sdud snying po de nyid dgung grangs sum cu pa dang / yum rang byon ma skal bzang lha yi bu khrid 'chi
med tshe dbang de nyid las/ chu pho byi ba'i lo bdag cag gi ston pa bltams pa dang mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dus gsum tshang ba'i sa ga zla ba'i
tshes bco brgyad nyin re gza' lha'i bla ma zla skar chu stod dang 'phrod pa'i dus phyi ma phyed la gzim chung phun tshogs gling du yum la gnod pa med pa 'ja' 'od dang
me tog gi char sogs ngo mtshar ba'i ltas

du ma dang bcas sku bltams/ de skabs yab rje dbang gi mtshan can nyid kyi dbu bla nyams rtogs mnga' bdag mus chen chos nyid ye shes de nyid ya ga chos sdings kyi mkhan po mdzad
nas/ zhe dgon du 'chad nyan mdzad skabs nam mkha'i shar lho'i phyogs su 'ja' tshon sna lnga/ padma spungs pa/ bkra shis rtags brgyad/ mchod rten brtsegs pa/ la sogs
nyin kha shas bstud mar byung ba/ sa skyar gdung 'khrungs pa'i rtags su gzigs pa bcas/ skabs 'dir sa skyar yab rje dbang gi mtshan can sku rkyang las gdung brgyud shin tu
nyag phra ba'i dus/ yab rje nyid sogs tshang ma thugs dges par gyur cing / yab rje mchog nas gang gi rigs sras dam pa yum bcas par/ rab dkar lha rdzas kyi mgul dar/ rten
gsum bdog pa'i dngos po dang bcas pa bstsal nas rgyal sras kyi spyi bor phyag bzhag ste A yu bhruM zhes gsungs shing / rim bzhin rgyal ba tshe mtha' yas pa lha dgu'i dbang
dang / gdung sras phebs pa'i gtang rag tu/ phun gling thog kha'i thug chen rnams la nyams gso dang gsar 'dzugs sogs dang / mgon khag spyi dang khyad par zhing skyong chen
po tsa ru rmu kha dang / dpal ldan dmag zor rgyal mo zung la gdung rabs myur 'byon gyi 'phrin bcol dmigs phug mdzad pa gsungs pa bzhin de gnyis la gtang rag kyang zab
par yod 'gro zhing / gong dbang gi mjug thog tu mtshan du padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gam/ ngag dbang kun dga' bkra shis mthu stobs bstan 'dzin bzang po zhes gsol ba lho
byang 'dus sder mang ja zab ma'i thog

gtam snyan bka' khra dang brtan bzhugs tshogs 'don bcas bstsal te/ mi ring bar 'khrungs ston du mdos chen zab res sogs dga' ston rgya che mdzad cing / de lta bu'i gdung sras
gzhon nu de nyid ni/ mtshan dpes spras shing ya rabs dam pa'i ngang tshul kho na las/ tha mal gyi byis pa'i spyod pa las 'das pa yab rje rdo rje 'chang las rkyen sel gyi
dbang rjes gnang du ma dang / dpon slob gnas lnga rig pa kun dga' bkra shis de nyid las yi ge'i phyi mo bri klog la sogs pa rig gnas kyi tshogs du ma gsan cing / gzhon
nu'i dus nas gdan sa 'di nyid na bzhugs pa'i chos spyod rnams dang rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis dang bde kyai gsang gsum rdo rje phur pa yo ga dang bcas pa'i sgrub dkyil rnams
dang / rdo rje'i chos skyong rnams kyi gtor bsngo bskang bstod bskul gtor bzlog rnams dang bcas par thugs blor chub ste/ yab rje'i drung du re re bzhin rgyugs 'bul mdzad
nas/ tshogs dbu rnams la phebs shing / khyad par rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis tshogs la phebs skabs rgyud 'don zab ma zhes/ tshoms chen du lam 'bras bla brgyud gos yol/ kyai rdor
gos thang sogs rgyan 'grem dang / tshogs pas 'dab lcam sogs zab gyon dang / sger gzhung nas zhabs brtan ja 'bras dar 'gyed sogs mdzad srol de nyid thog ma sku thog 'di
tsam nas byung bar mngon/ de nas rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod gar 'cham sogs la thog mar phebs te/ skye bo kun gyi yid tshim par mdzad pa dang / nyid kyi dgung grangs bco
lnga bar phebs par/ yab rje mchog nas sngon

srol bzhin mkhas pa zil gnon gyi chos khrid che 'don mdzad rgyur gzhung bla sogs la snyan 'bul dang bcas dril bsgrags te/ gegs sel du chos sde lho nas bka' 'gyur gser chos
gsung sgrogs dang byang pa tshogs yongs nas phur bzlog bcas dang / lo dus kyi dus mdos chen mo 'gyangs nas/ 'go zla'i nyer gsum nas/ byang pa tshogs yongs phyed nas/ dmar
chen gtor bzlog 'jam mgon kun blos deb bsgrigs bzhin dang / phyed nas mgon po zhal gyi gtor bzlog rgyun bzhin mdzad cing rgyal zla'i tshes gcig gzhi thog rtser lha bsangs
la rgyas pa dang / phyi dror lo gsar bzhugs gra rgyun bzhin mdzad pa dang / zla 'di'i nyer gcig la gzhi thog kun rar mdos zab chog bsgrigs dang / nyer gsum 'cham sku gdan
'dren zab ma/ 'jam mgon kun blo'i deb bsgrigs steng ser phreng rgyas pa/ ru 'dren so so nas bcu gcig re dang / pu tra dgu tshan gcig gdung sras bgres gzhon rim par phebs
nas drag chas rdor dril g.yab dar bcas mdzad srol 'di yang 'di tsam nas byung ngam snyam/ nyer bzhir snyem chas/ nyer brgyad la gyong chas/ nyer dgu la gtor bzlog gnam
gang la bskang gso brgya tshar rta zla'i rgyal po lo gsar dga' ston bcas mdos zab phyag deb bzhin dang / khri phebs dngos gzhi gza' tshes dge bar sa tshogs su chos dung
rin po che nas gsung gis bskul te gzhis byes kyi dge 'dun brgya phrag du ma 'dus tshar ba dang / lha chen chos khrims pa rgan gzhon byang pa'i sger chos drug cu the ba'i
las tshan pa sogs

gzhi thog tu phebs bsur 'byor bstun nyin dang po zung la phebs pa'i gtso bor gdung sras bgres pa padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug dang / bar pa ngag dbang kun dga' rin chen zung
sngags 'chang gos dkar lcang los mdzes pa dang / chung ba mgon po dngos grub dpal 'bar rab byung bcas mtha' skor kun tu phyag 'degs pa sogs drung rigs zhabs 'bring pa rnams
dang mjug yum rje btsun ma sogs sku ngo rnams dang / ban tshang pa rnams gdugs chen rgya gling sogs so sor lag 'khyer dang bcas tshogs chen mo'i shar sgo nas dal bus
bgrod pa padma'i mtshan can gyi zhabs g.yas shar sgo'i nang du bzhag pa dang chos dung rin po che'i gsung bskul ba'i dung bskor ba dus gcig byed pa sngon gyi phyag srol gong
ma'i bla dung du grags/ de nas tshogs chen mo'i mtha' skor khri chen gyi mdun thang du phyag gdan dang bcas sku phyag thengs gsum mdzad nas/ chos khri'i steng gi sgo
chung nub brgyud 'jam mgon sku mched gsum 'jam dbyangs sa paN gyi chos khri chen po mkhas pa zil gnon nam/ thang mo che'am/ 'khor lo gsum ldan du grags pa'i khar/ sku lhan
ne lham mer bzhugs grub pa dang / 'dus tshogs kyi longs spyod mtshams bzhag ste/ tshogs pa rnams la gsung rab bskyed la 'jam mgon padma'i mtshan can gyis thams cad mkhyen
pa'i gsung rab dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsungs pa dang / tshogs pas mdo klog pa dang sher snying bdud bzlog bcas grub mtshams/ ban tshang pa rnams langs nas
maNDal

blos blangs bteg ste/ dbu byed che sa nas spos reng bu thogs te tshig rigs dang bstun/ so sor ngo sprod bcas tshogs pas maNDal so bdun ma gdangs bcas gang gi mchod rdzas ma
bcas grub nas/ 'jam mgon pad ma'i mtshan can gyis sems bskyed gsal 'debs par mdzad de/ 'jam mgon sa skya paNDi ta'i sku che ba'i yon tan gyi jeng drangs te gang der dbus
gtsang khams gsum du gsungs pa'i tshogs chos thub pa'i dgongs pa rab tu gsal ba zhes grags pa'i dbu'i mtshan don nas brtsams/ bsam gtan gyi phar phyin yan chad dang / nyin
bar mar bca' sgrigs rnams gong bzhin gyi sku gsum ye shes kyi rnam bzhag yan chad/ nyin gsum par skyabs mgon yab rje dpal ldan chos skyong nyid dang bcas yab sras bzhi
char gong gi dge mtshan dang bcas phebs te/ khri chen gyi steng du yab sras bzhi char bzhugs te/ bca' sgrigs rnams gong bzhin gyi 'jam mgon padma'i mtshan can nas sems bskyed
gsar 'debs par mdzad de snga 'phros sku gsum ye shes kyi rnam bzhag man nas mjug sbyar byang bar sngon byon yab sras gong ma'i bzhed srol bzhin gsal dag snyan gsum
gyi sgo nas thugs thog nas rdzogs par bstsal te/ de dus kyi skya ser thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nu dngos dang mnyam pa'i mos gus 'phel bar gyur to/ / de skabs gzhung sa chen
po nas/ gong sa thams cad mkhyen pa rgyal dbang blo bzang lung rtogs rgya mtsho mchog dang / srid skyong rta tshag no mi han blo bzang dpal ldan rgyal mtshan/ paN chen

rin po che blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi ma bcas so so nas sku tshab mi sna rtse drung mngags shing / gnang skyes maNDal rten gsum gyis mtshon gser dngul gos dar gyi tshan grangs
gnang skyes spam mtho ba dang / gzhan phyogs kyi dgon sde khag dang / rang khongs su gtogs pa'i chos srid kyi sne mo ba ser skya mchog dman yod do cog dang / phyogs mtha'i
dad sbyin khag bcas nas khri ston legs skyes rmugs 'dzin dbang po'i gan mdzod la co 'dri ba stobs pa byung ba rnams dang de nyin gdan sa chen po'i dri gtsang khang rnams
su mchod pa'i 'phreng ba tshar du dngar ba brgya phrag du ma dang / rgyal bstan srung ba'i mel tshe ba khag rnams su spyan gzigs kyi yo byad grangs las 'das pa/ dge 'dun
gyi sde dang skye bo'i tshogs la 'bru 'gyed bcas sngon lam bzhin gya nom pa bstsal ba sogs dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yab rje rdo rje 'chang pad 'byung gnyis pa 'gro mgon
dbang gi mtshan 'chang nyid nas 'khor gsum yongs dag gis rgyas bshad dang bcas/ bsngo ba rnam dag gis rgyas 'debs grub nas/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid dang / mkhan chen
zur chad pa sogs dpon slob kyi rigs ban tshang pa dang bcas pa/ khri chen gyi mdun du bzhengs te/ rten 'bul sna bdun rdzas brgyad sogs kyi mnga' gsol shis brjod rnams me
bya 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan 'chang gang nyid khrir phebs lam bzhin/ mdzad grub mtshams gtso thab pas zhwa g.yab dang ki sgra/ de nas ser phreng drung 'khor dang mi ser
gyi kong gzhas pa rnams kyis bsu ba dang bcas pa

tshogs kyi shar sgo lho ma nas/ khro khang gi mdun nas gzhi thog gi ltag bskor te bar bskor bsdus pa bzhin gzhi thog tu phebs bstun/ rtse nas chos dung rin po che thengs bcu
gsum bskul ba sogs sngon byon gong ma'i bzhed srol ltar dang / kong gzhas sogs gzigs 'bul ni nyin grangs du ma'i bar dga' ston du 'bul bar byung grags shing / de nas yab
rje rdo rje 'chang sogs skyes chen rnams las snga phyi dbang lung khrid sogs gsan bsam mdzad pa rnams rags tsam smos na/ yab rje mchog la bya rgyud tshe dpag lha dgu dpal
chen rdo rje phur pa'i stod las byang chub sgrub pa'i dbang dang / smad las drag po'i sgrol dbang / dges rdor dbang / lam dbang / nyang gter gu ru drag dmar gyi dbang
sogs ni yang yang gsan cing / gzhan yang 'jigs byed rwa lugs bcu gsum ma/ bde mchog grub chen nag po lugs/ gsang 'dus 'phags lugs rta mgrin yang gsang lha dgu/ ngan song
sbyong rgyud kun rig rnams kyi dbang dang / thub dbang gnas bcu/ 'jam dbyangs smra seng / 'jam dkar rta mgrin skyer sgang / phyag rdor gtum mo 'byung 'dul/ khyung khra nag
rnam rgyal/ rnam 'joms/ ri khrod ma byad grol sogs yang yang drang srong log tri pa la'i rig gtad grub chen brgyad cu'i byin rlabs/ gur zhal sogs rdo rje'i chos skyong
rnams kyi rjes gnang / dmar po skor gsum/ nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs/ rgyal po sku lnga dang / rtsi dmar rnams kyi srog gtad sogs gsan cing / gzhan yang 'dir ma 'khod
pa mang du yod nges shing / snyigs

dus sa chen kun blo'i dngos slob sa bstan spel ba lung gis bsngags pa gnas lnga rig pa'i paNDi ta chen po kun dga' bkra shis las/ gsung ngag rin po che tshogs bshad dbang khrid
rgyab rten lung dang bcas pa de dang 'brel ba skor dgu'i khrid lung / bde mchog lo nag gsang 'dus 'phags lugs gser chos bcu gsum/ sgrub thabs brgya rgyam snar thang
brgya rtsa sems bskyed lugs gnyis sogs blo sbyong skor dang / jo bo'i chos 'byung brgya rtsa sogs bka' gdams pa'i skor dang / rjes gnang zur bka'i rigs grangs las 'das pa/
'jigs byed rwa lugs bcu gsum ma'i dbang khrid yongs rdzogs kyi lung dang bcas/ gshed dmar lha lnga'i dbang khrid lung dang bcas pa/ ro langs brgyad skor/ dgra gdong gnyis/
kyai rdor bka' babs bzhi dang / gur bsam gnyis/ mgon po'i dbang chen rnams dang/ gur mgon khro bcu thun mong ma yin pa/ lha brgyad/ lha bcu gnyis ma/ lcam dral lha gsum
pu tra'i zur bka'/ zangs gri skor gsum sogs kyi rjes gnang thun mong ba dang thun min rigs tshang ma/ brag rdzong ma phyi nang gsang gsum gyi nyams khrid lha dgu'i rjes
gnang sngon 'gro'i nang rtsa gsum lnga la brten pa'i gsang khrid gzhung pod me 'bar snyan brgyud kha skong yang skong sogs kyi lung yongs rdzogs/ dud sol ma'i rjes gnang
gnyis sngon 'gro'i dud pod kyi lung zhal rnam rgyur bcun gyi rjes gnang khrid lung bcas yongs rdzogs gsan kyang chos skyong sengge nag po dang / bram ze mngag gtad sogs
kha re yab rje sku mched gnyis char nas ma

gsan pa/ rjes su ngag dbang smin grol rgya mtsho las gsan 'dug rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i rjes gnang / rnam sras zhi drag gi pod lung dang bcas pa sogs gsan pa rgya mtsho
lta bu mdzad pas/ rje nyid kyi dbu bla rnams kyi nang nas kyang 'di nyid la gtso bor mdzad/ gzhan yang rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang yang gzhan par gsan tshul mi snang bas
'di nyid la gsan nam snyam zhing / mdo phyogs pod chen drug mtshan nyid dang / snyan sum sogs rig gnas kyi skor yang mang du gsan bsam mdzad pa nyid kyi gsung las/ nged lo
gzhon nu'i dus su spyir yab rje rdo rje 'chang dang / khyad par yongs 'dzin dam pa kun bkras de nyid kyi zhabs pad bsten te mdo sngags rig gnas dang bcas par slob sbyong
mi dman tsam bgyid rgyu byung ba skal ba bzang zhing / da lta yang rang rgyud la yon tan cha shas tsam yod pa ni dpon slob de nyid kyi bka' drin yin pas khyer mtha' ma
mchis so/ /zhes yang yang gsungs par grags pa sogs kyis shes so/ /rje btsun rmo'u drung 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma zhes grub pa'i dbang mo de nyid las/ gtso bo gsung ngag
slob bshad kyi smin grol yongs rdzogs/ byin rlabs rigs rgyab rten lung dang bcas pa sa chen kun blo'i gsan yig ltar phal cher gsan par nges shing / gzhan yang sbyong rgyud
dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang lung gser chos mkha' spyod skor gyi byin rlabs dang / nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs khrid thun mong ma yin pa'i zhal shes rigs dang
/ be'u bum sogs rgyab rten lung

dang bcas yongs su rdzogs pa gsan/ gzhan yang dbang lung thor bu mang du gsan/ ngor mkhan chen thar rtse byams pa kun dga' bstan 'dzin drung nas/ gtso bo birWa pa lam 'bras
chung bar grags pa/ gshed dmar lha lnga'i dbang lung khrid byin rlabs rigs dang bcas pa yongs rdzogs/ gsang 'dus 'jam pa'i rdo rje'am ye shes zhabs lugs kyi dbang sogs gsan/
gzhan yang kyai rdor rgyu lam gyi dbang dang / lam zab bir srung / nA ro mkha' spyod rnams kyi byin rlabs/ 'jam dpal rigs gsum/ khyung khra nag tshe dpag med lha dgu/
tshe dbang 'chi med dpal gter sogs rgyun gyi thugs dam rnams kyi kha gso dgos rigs rnams yang yang gsan/ zhe dgon mkhan po bsod nams dbang phyug las/ snga phyir gtso bo
bde mchog lu nag dril gsum gyi dbang dang / dril bu lus dkyil rim lnga'i khrid lung sogs dbang lung rjes gnang thor bu ba mang du gsan pa zhib par 'jam mgon de nyid kyi
gsan yig glegs bam las rtogs par bya'o/ /de lta bu thos bsam mdzad pa rnams la bsgom sgrub nyams bzhes ji ltar gnang ba'i tshul ni/ sku gzhon nu'i dus lam 'bras gsan nas
bde mchog pho brang du/ kyai rdor gzhi bsnyen zla drug lhag tsam mdzad dus skabs gcig ljags bzlas skabs sogs su bzhugs gnas de nyid nas phyi gsal nang gsal lta bus yul sde
