nag

phyogs la dga' ba'i the'u rang sogs bar chad byed par rtsom pas/ srung 'khor la 'bad 'bungs dgos lugs gsungs pa bzhin mdzad pas skabs shig kyang sngar bzhin thal byung du gzigs
snyam dang / skor lam phyogs nas bud med bco lnga rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma'i rtsa sngags 'dren zhing 'gro ba gzigs pa sku gam na gnas pa rnams la nged kyi 'di bzhin
mthong ba bskor lam phyogs na ji 'dug ltos shog gsungs pa/ khams mo bco lngas dbyangs 'then bzhin 'gro 'dug mthong tshul zhus pa rnams bla ma kun bkras mchog la'ang
dogs sel zhus/ lan du 'di ni shin tu bzang ste/ khyed nyid dges pa rdo rje'i rnal 'byor la/ bdag med lha mo bco lngas bskor ba byed pa yin sogs gsungs/ yang skabs shig 'od
gsal gyi ngang nas bcom ldan 'das kyai rdo rje rtsa zhal baiDUrya dwangs pa'i mdog lta bu sngon du gzigs shing / de nas je gsal je gsal gyis g.yas g.yon gyi zhal lhag ma
rnams dang / phyag zhabs rgyan cha lugs rnams nas me ris bar ji bzhin gzigs rgyu yin pa la/ zhabs 'bring pa zhig gis gzim sgo phyes te sku mdun du byung bas gzigs snang
de bzhin 'gags pas shin tu 'phangs pa 'khrungs pa ni/ 'jam mgon a mes zhabs sogs sngon byon gong ma'i rnam thar dang mtshungs pa kho nar nges shing / 'on kyang yongs rdzogs
rang ma gzigs pa ni cung zad bar chad rnam pa 'dra ba dang / yang skabs shig 'od gsal ngang nas lag pa dmar mdangs can zhig la 'khor lo yig 'bru can zhig 'khor ba/ nan

gyis gzigs pa na/ gzigs shig pa'i brda lta bu'i 'khor lo ma 'khor ba sdod pa la thugs zhib gnang bas/ dmag bzlog gi gdams pa khyad par can gzigs tshul nang chen bla ma dpal
bzang 'phrin las kyis mdzad pa'i rje nyid kyi rnam thar tshigs bcad ma dang / gsungs rgyun las kyang byung ba don du dmag sogs g.yul bzlog gi man ngag khyad par can zhig
rje nyid la lhag pa'i lha yis gnang ba'i nye brgyud cig bzhugs par grags pa sogs mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rab 'bring tha gsum las/ yi dam lha yi zhal mthong zhing gdams pa
khyad par can bstsal ba ni mtshan rtags rab ste/ 'phags yul gyi grub chen birWa pa sogs dang mtshungs par mngon no/ /de lta bu'i mtshan rtags grangs kyi bsnyen pa kha skong
bcu cha'i sbyin sreg dang bcas pa mthar phyin nas/ bla ma gong ma'i dus mchod rnams kyi rdo rje slob dpon dang 'brel/ gdul bya skal ldan rnams smin grol gyi lam bzang
la bkri ba sogs sngon byon gong ma'i phyag len bzhin nyams med mdzad pa dang gzhan yang snga phyi ma nges par bsnyen sgrub mdzad pa ni/ phyag rdor/ 'byung 'dul/ rdo rje phur
pa/ gur zhal sogs yi dam chos srung rnams kyi dus grangs mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rnams sku gzhon nu'i dus nas mthar phyin pa sgrub par mdzad nas gdan sa chen po 'di nyid
na bzhugs pa'i/ phur sgrub chen mo'i dus mdos/ rdo rje phur pa dang / chos skyong gur zhal sogs kyi gtor bzlog bcas kyi rdor slob sogs phyag len rnams 'gan bzhes gnang
bas kun la dwangs ba 'dren pa dang de ltar

thos bsam sgom gsum gyi thugs rgyud sbyangs te 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum dang mkhas btsun bzang gsum gyi sgo nas rgyal bstan spyi bye brag la phan bde'i sri zhu ji ltar mdzad
tshul bsam las 'das kyang / mdo tsam smos na/ rje nyid dgung grangs bco lngar phebs skabs tsam la yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid khri 'dzin dgongs zhu mdzad de/ gang gi rigs
sras rnam gsum chos khri che 'don mdzad tshul gong bzhin dang / lhag par rje nyid bla chen 'phags pa rin po ches bzhugs khri padma can la mnga' gsol te gdan sa chen po 'di
nyid kyi chos srid kyi khur gang yod 'bogs par mdzad de/ yab rje nyid kun spang bya bral gyi spyod pas bla ma gong ma'i dben gnas sgrub phug rnams su thugs dam kho na
la gzhol mur sa sbrul zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes bcu drug la spur dkar gzhis su gzugs sku'i bkod pa chos dbyings su bsdus tshul bstan skabs/ dgongs rdzogs rnams ji ltar sgrub
par mdzad tshul sogs gong yab rje dbang sdud snying po nyid kyi rnam thar skabs rags tsam smos pa bzhin dang / lo ltar gyi dus mchod du nyid kyi dbu bla kun bkras dang /
yab rje'i sku mched e waM bzang po rnams kyi sku mchod du chos sde byang pa tshogs yongs nas kyai rdor man ngag lugs kyi sgrub mchod tshugs grol dgu la nyin bar ma cho ga
gnyis re mdzad srol snga thog gi phyag len bcas khyon sta gon ma the ba'i dngos chog bco lnga/ nyin dang po tshogs chen la/ bla mchod bcas par phyag cha mchod chas rtse
gzhung nas bsnyen bkur bcas zab ma/ deng skabs sgrub mchod zab bzhes

su grags pa dang / dus chen nyin lho byang chos lhun tshogs yongs bcas la 'bras 'jam skyo ma sogs sde snon zab ma'i thog gser 'gyed/ dus chen gzhan gnyis la ja thug gdan snon
gong 'dra la/ 'gyed med pa deng skabs dus chen du grags pa 'di rnams gsar 'dzugs mdzad/ gzhan zla dus bla mchod tshes mchod zhes pa dang phyi lo dus mchod skabs gser dngul
bkra ma'i byang chub mchod rten sku rgyan nang gzungs bcas khyad par du 'phags pa rig 'dzin lha khang du bzhugs pa 'di sogs gsar bskrun mdzad de/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang
de nyid kyi dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings su rdzogs thabs rgya cher mdzad do/ /de nas mi ring bar mdzod pa sogs sne mo ba rnams mol te/ sa skya pa'i bstan srid kyi rtsa
ba gdung rabs rin po che'i phreng ba srid mtha'i bar du 'byon 'gyur gyi rtsa ba khab bzhes mdzad par zhus te/ sngon dus dpal ldan grub thob 'dar 'phyar ru ba'i rigs rgyud
gsang sngags rnying ma'i rig 'dzin snying ri ba'i sras mo sku mched gnyis char gyi gzung mar phul te gsang sngags zab mo'i dkyil 'khor du smin par mdzad de mtshan padma
bu khrid du gsol nas las rgyar bsten pa las/ ring min gdung sras zhig 'khrungs rtags bzang ba dang bcas byung ba/ mtshan ngag dbang mthu stobs dpal 'byor du gsol te/ 'khrungs
ston dus mdos zab ma sogs sngon lam bzhin dga' ston rgya cher mdzad cing ring min rgyud ston/ phur sgrub sogs la'ang phebs thub pa bcas/ yab rje sku mched kyi thugs
rten snying dang

'dra ba bzhugs kyang ring min nas bar chad kyi dbang du song ste zhing brjes pas tshang ma bya thabs bral zhing yid mug tu gyur pa/ slar yang bar sbug snang smon nang pa'i
sras mo yab rje padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug nyid kyi khab tu phul te/ zhing skyong dbang mor mtshan gsol ba de nyid la/ rje btsun mched gnyis bltams shing / de rjes sa yos
lor yum mchog snying ri ba padma bu khrid las gdung sras ngag dbang rdo rje rin chen 'khrungs ba/ 'khrungs ston zab mo sogs mdzad/ lo 'dir yab padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug
nyid kyi dgongs bzhes thun mong ma yin pa phun tshogs zhabs brtan de nyid gdung rabs myur 'byon ched gsar bskrun gyi gza' tshes dge ba nas dbu bzung ste sa brtag blangs
kyi cho ga rnams rgyud sde nas gsungs pa bzhin legs par mdzad de/ rten dang brten par bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa gsar 'debs kyi lha khang steng shod rgya khyon dang / zhal
ba tshon rtsi logs bris snang brnyan rnams dang bcas 'jam mgon kun dga' blo gros kyi sku dus phyag btab pa'i zhal gro lha khang 'dra cog mdzad nas/ nang du rten gyi gtso
bo bdag cag gi ston pa thub pa'i dbang po'i snang brnyan gser sbyangs kho na las grub pa'i rtse khru gang dang / nyan gnyis dngul grub sku khru gang tsam re/ nang gzungs
ring bsrel rnam bzhi khyad 'phags bzhugs pa dang / rgyal yum zhing skyong dbang mo nas/ rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa'i myur mdzad lha mo'i snang brnyan dang / rje btsun
'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma nas rin chen gnyis pa las

grub pa'i yid bzhin 'khor lo'i snang brnyan bcas khru tsam mdzod spu prog zhu sogs rin po che'i phra rgyan du mas spras pa gsar bskrun dang / yab rje nyid nas sde dge sa skyong
tshe dbang rig 'dzin la zhal mngags mdzad pa'i/ 'phags pa gzungs grwa lnga'i snang brnyan bzhugs khri rgyab yol bcas gser zangs las grub pa/ gzhan yang sman 'dam byin
can las grub pa'i bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems sogs kyi snang brnyan rnams phal cher zhal gro lha khang bzhin bzhugs pa dang / gtsug lag steng mar brag ri bkod
legs khrod du thub dbang gnas bcu rnams/ zhal gro lha khang steng ma bzhin bzhugs pa'i bla sku rnams dang bcas bzhugs pa la/ sa rgyan gnam rgyan gso bzang 'ba' zhig las bskrun
pa mchod rdzas gser srang zhe gnyis las bskrun pa'i gser kong snang ba rab 'byams kyi gtsos pa'i/ nor shel dngul sogs rin chen khams las grub pa'i ting phor dkar chas
sogs ngo mtshar can du ma/ gzhan yang sku brnyan rnams la na bza' bzhugs gdan sogs bzang gos kho na las bskrun pa lha khang rten dang brten pa'i mtshan du'ang phun tshogs
zhabs brtan lha khang / dge legs rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas rigs gsum gdung rabs char 'bebs su mtshan gsol bar mdzad/ de'i nub mgon khang log 'dren tshar gcod rigs gsum
gdung rabs char 'bebs kyi rten gyi gtso bo/ bstan srung kun gyi sde dpon rdo rje nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po'i snang brnyan thog so gang tsam pa sman 'jim las grub pa/
byin rlabs kyi

gzi 'od 'bar ba 'di la gzungs gzhug ring bsrel rnam bzhi thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa/ gri snying srog 'khor lcags rdor sogs cha tshang bzhugs pa 'di skabs mgon khang
nub kyi rgyab tu khams pa tsho cig mtshon thogs 'khrug shor gyis gcig gri 'og tu shi ba'i gri snying man ngag bzhin sgrub pa/ gang gi thugs kar bzhugs pa la rab gnas thun
mong ba sngags 'chang chen po'i rab gnas dngos grub 'byung gnas kyi mjug bzhin dang / thun mong ma yin pa mgon po'i man ngag nas byung ba'i rab gnas zhag bdun mar grags
pa sogs mdzad/ gzhan yang yi dam bde kyai phur pa/ chos srung rnams sman byin las grub pa'i spar sku rnams dang / zhal shar gzigs la dmar po skor gsum gyi sku brnyan mi
gzugs tsam/ sa chen kun blo'i sku dus bzhengs par mdzad pa'i tshom bar mgon khang du bzhugs pa bzhin/ gsar bzhengs rnams la spyi bye brag gi gzungs gzhug bcas byin rlabs
kyi gzi 'od 'bar ba rnams la gnam rgyan sa rgyan/ chos srung rnams kyi mdun spyan gzigs/ gtor ma rnam gsum sogs drug ldan gyi mchod rdzas bcas bzhugs pa rnams kyi pho brang
rtse mor gser zangs kyi gser 'bru rgyal mtshan mgon khang steng chos srung gur zhal sogs kyi ru mtshon rnga thug bcas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ so so'i rab gnas bcas legs
par zin pa rnams la rab gnas dngos gzhi yab rdo rje 'chang sku mched dang / zur bzhugs mkhan chen kun dga' dpal bzang / drung rams pa blo gros chos

dar/ dbu zur dam chos don ldan sogs de skabs kyi dge bshes sku yon can rnams dang / ban tshang 'dus tshogs dang bcas nas dges pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod dang 'brel
ba'i rab gnas rgyas pa nyin gsum ma/ zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg dang bcas pa grol nyin/ phyi bskor la me tog 'thor ba/ lha chen glo sbur la gos sku zhal phye mchod tshogs
rab 'byams dang / dge 'dun gyi sde dang / mnga' zhabs rnams la 'gyed sogs dga' ston gyi rim pa sngon byon gong ma'i bzhed srol ltar mdzad pa nas bzung / gdan sa 'di nyid
du gdung sras rnams kyang 'byung sla zhing sku tshe brtan pa/ phyogs dus kun tu nad mug dang bral zhing lo phyugs rtag tu legs pa sogs dge mtshan gyi dpal dang ldan pa byung
ngo / /skyabs rje 'di nyid dgung grangs so gnyis phebs pa chu lug lo nang yab rje khri skyong nyid dang / gcung po kun rin yum mchog zhing skyong dbang mo bcas/ gong
sa rgyal dbang srid skyong bcas pa'i gser zhal mjal phyag dang bstan 'gro'i phan bde spel slad dbus phebs dgongs bzhed gnang ste/ gsol gzim ban tshang pa sogs zhabs 'bring
pa dang / nye spyod rnams gra sgrig mdzad de phebs par nye ba na bzhi thog tshom bar mgon khang du dbang lha skor gsum gyi cho ga mdzad skabs/ khams pa zhig nas myur mdzad
lha mo'i gser sku sgros gtsang spus ldan zhig phul ba 'di rten 'brel shin tu legs/ 'phags ma rig byed lha mo grub pa'i rtags yin gsungs dges par mdzad pa dang / hor
zla dgu ba'i

gza' tshes dge bar/ sgo rum ye shes mgon por lam gtor gnang zhing / grol 'phral mchod zhing bya 'dra ma'i steng spro khang phying gur mjal gur/ phyag gnyer ban tshang pa gsol
gzim sogs kyi shag gur sogs sgar gra bsgrig par phebs pa sku 'khor rnams bla brang zam khar phebs pa dang dus mnyam/ sgo rum phyogs nas bya rog mang pos skad snyan sgrog
bzhin par gshog rdeb dang bcas bzhugs sgar gyi g.yas g.yon du babs pa/ sgar pa tshang mas da ni chos skyong srung ma rnams kyang rang re rnams kyi cha la phebs pa da lan
phebs 'grul la bar chad med cing / mthun rkyen 'bad med lhun grub tu yong rgyu yin 'dug zer ba byung zhing / de nas chibs bsgyur nye ba na/ phun gling tshoms chen du lho
byang 'dus tshogs la/ skyabs khri padma'i mtshan can nyid nas bka' bsgyur du ngos rnams dbus 'grul ma 'khor bar sgrig lam kun spyod rnams thud shor med par mdzad ngos/
ngos rnams bstan 'gro'i phan bde 'byung ched du 'gro ba lags na/ bya ba thams cad bsam bzhin 'grub pa'i thugs smon dus rtag tu mdzod cig rang cag rnams myur du mjal yong
gsungs pas/ dge 'dun phal che ba zhig spyan chab kyang bsil/ slar yang dam pa 'di nyid nas slad nas 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/ tshong 'dus mgron po dang 'dra/ dngos
po za zir 'di ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam pa chu shing gi 'bras bu dang 'dra la/ 'on kyang da lan gnas skabs ma gtogs phugs nas rang re mjal bas/ de tsam gyi thugs ngal ma mdzad
par sku khams bde mor bzhugs

gsungs pa sogs zhal gdams legs par gnang ste/ de skabs chos srid 'dzin skyong spel ba'i khri tshab tu mgon po dngos grub dpal 'bar nyid 'jog par mdzad nas/ dbus phebs kyi sgar
pa rnams kyi byed sgo/ bca' yig las 'bras blang dor gsal ba'i me long zhes bya ba mdzad/ mdzod pa nas de'i rjes snon dgos pa'i bka' sdom dang bcas phebs nyin 'di bzhugs
zhal ngo rnams nas gsum skas 'gor phebs skyor dang bcas rim bzhin chibs bsgyur te/ gur ra pa'i thad tsam phebs pa na lha chen lcags ri'i steng nas lho byang 'dus sde'i
zhwa g.yab dang / ki sgra thengs gsum gyis dang po rnams la chibs kha bsgyur tsam dang gsum pa'i tshe mchod rten dkar chung bar chibs rgyugs mdzad/ 'di yod phyag gnyer rnams
nas dbu gur dang bcas sro ma 'jing khar thab skyel ja zhus mjal dar sogs phul te/ do nub mgar ra bkra shis dar rgyas su bzhugs zhag sgar sgrigs/ de nas dgon rgyas su
gsol tshal dang tsha gzhis su zhag de skor mjal dmangs dang/ lhun rtse gnas gzigs zam gdong du shab gzhis rgan gyis phebs bsu mjal dar/ rgya mdud du zhag gzhi dmangs la
gnang sbyin gya nom bstsal/ 'di nas gzhung sa mchod nas rta khal 'thus mi gra sgrig gzan shing sogs gya nom pa'i lam yig phyag 'khyer dang bcas gdong sna brgyud de gzhis
rtse dang nye bar ngor bla brang khag nas phebs bsu mjal dar/ 'gar spel bzhugs gnas su ngor pa'i sa mjal rgyas pa mjal dmangs grub nas rim phebs kyis/

ri chung spun gsum zhes pa'i thad bla brang mchog nas thab bsu phebs bsu mi sna mang bas mjal dar phul/ 'di skabs paN chen rin po che blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi mar mjal phyag
dang / de nas bar lam sgang rong lam phyogs gang la phebs pa dang / dgon sde rnams la gnas gzigs mchod 'bul ji ltar mdzad pa dang / bstan pa dang 'gro ba'i don rgya cher
mdzad tshul sogs rgya chen yod na'ang / rnam thar sngon ma rnams su ma gsal bas 'bri bar rngo ma thogs/ de nas gzhis rtser zhag gcig bzhugs te/ lam bar 'gro rnams smin
grol mdzad mur/ lha ldan dang nye ba na gzhung sa chen po nas thab bsu dbu gur gra bsgriigs kyi thog rtse shod bka' shag bcas nas ja zhus dang 'tshams dar 'bul mi mgron gnyer
mngags rdzong dang / phebs bsu ba rtse drung bco lnga skor drung skya rgya lu chas bsgrigs/ de tsam dang bcas bzhugs gnas lha klu dga' tshal du gdan phabs/ de nas zhag
shas nas pho brang chen mor mjal phyag bcar mthus kyi gnang brda snyan seng phul te/ dngos gzhi mjal phyag rtse pho brang du gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa ngag
dbang blo bzang tshul khrims rgya mtsho mjal phyag thog maNDal dang rten gsum gyi gsung bshad shin tu rgyas pa de dus kyi sku drag rnams kyi yid 'phrog par mdzad de/ 'gyogs
dar nang mdzod dang bcas/ gzhan yang gser dngul dang gos dar gyi tshan grangs btsem yod btsem med ja sgam ltang rigs sogs sngon lam bzhin tshan che bar 'bul bar

mdzad nas/ mgron che nas so so'i go babs bzhugs khrir gdan zhus kyis gsol ja 'bras sil bcas phebs/ de nas gsol tshigs sgang du gsol ston sder kha rgya che ba bstsal te/ rtser
gnas gzigs sogs gnang yod dam snyam zhing / de bzhin du srid skyong no mi han mtsho smon gling pa ngag dbang 'jam dpal tshul khrims rgya mtsho drung du khri mjal legs
'bul/ maNDal rten gsum mjal dar gser dngul sogs stobs che ba phul zhing/ de bzhin bka' blon lhan du sngon lam khri 'bul sogs dang/ gong ma'i sku tshab am ban la de mtshungs
mdzad yod 'gro ba bcas dang/ sku mched gnyis char gzhung sa mchog nas gtor bzlog mnan sreg 'phangs gsum zhabs brtan sgrub dgos rnams grub nas/ jo shAka rnam gnyis rten
gsum rnams la mchod 'bul rgya che ba dang / khrus gsol lha gnas kyi me tog 'thor ba bcas mdzad skabs nam mkha' 'ja' 'od kyis khengs pa/ rang bzhin gyis dri bzang 'thul ba
sogs kun gyis gleng ba byung/ srid skyong mchog nas bkas bskul ba bzhin mtsho smon gling pho brang gsar bskyed kyi sa chog rdo rje phur pa'i sgo nas mdzad pa/ khul de na
mtsho gling la shin tu gnod pa'i klu zhig yod pa/ sngar dmar skyur thab gzhob sogs phran tsam phog kyang / de ma thag rma shu gnyan sogs du ma yod pa/ de nas bzung dmar
skyur ched du btab kyang mi gnod pa zhig byung ba/ srid skyong kun 'khor kun bdag khri rin po ches 'di 'dra ba'i mthu stobs zhes gzengs bstod mdzad

tshul rje nyid kyis gsan pa na/ nged kyi khong rnams kyi gsungs bzhin klu de rgya mtsho'i mthar bskrod pa yin pas/ gnas skabs nyes skyon 'ong ba med kyang nam phugs mtsho smon
gling pa'i bstan srid la dar rgud cung zad yod nyen che gsungs nas bzlog thabs rim gro mang du mdzad/ gzhan yang sde dpon che khag dang bka' blon rnam pa sogs che rigs
kun gyi 'dod don sgrub dgos rnams mdzad zin nas/ rme rur chos sder khrom dbang lha sa ba skya ser phal che bas zhal mjal zhing / zang zing gi dngos 'bul kyang rdzogs ldan
gyi dpal la 'gran par byung / gzhan yang bar seng grwa sa se 'bras dge gsum lha ldan gyi tshong pa sogs mjal phyag zhus te/ dngos 'bul rmugs 'dzin dbang po'i gan mdzod
la 'gran par byung / gzhung sa mchog nas snga bar phyi gsum gyi zur gsol rgya che ba bstsal ba sogs gzugs bzos mchog tu dge zhing / de nas ring min thon phyag zhu gnang
gis phebs zos gsol ston thog spyad dngos spam mtho bar bstsal thog phebs skyel dang thab skyel thog rtse shod dang bka' shag nas ja zhus mtshams dar 'bul ba sogs sngar bzhin
mdzad nas/ rgod dkar la brgyud dpal gyi bsam yas su phebs te/ rab grwa rnams nas gsol btab bzhin phur dbang stod las smad las/ gtsug lag khang rnams su sna lnga'i mchod
tshogs rgya che ba dang bcas bstan 'gro phan bde'i thugs smon yang dag dang / chos skyong gnod sbyin chen por/ spyan gzigs mchod gtor gser skyems snyan dar sogs bstsal
te/

sngon dus slob dpon padma 'byung gnas kyis bka' bsgos dam la bzhag pa bzhin spyi bye brag gi bstan pa srung zhing skyong ba'i bka' bsgo gnyer gtad yang dag pa mdzad/ de nas
rim bzhin dbus lho kha dang / rgyal rtse sogs gtsang dbus kyi dgon gnas thams cad du mang 'gyed mchod 'bul khrom dbang sogs gdul bya rnams smin grol la 'god bzhin par gzhis
rtser phebs nas bla brang rgyal mtshan mthon pos thab bsu phebs bsu skyel bkur zos gang che'i thog paN chen rin po che blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi mas mjal phyag dngos 'bul
gya nom pa bcas mdzad nas phan tshul dges pa'i gsung gleng yang mang du gnang / de nas e waM chos ldan du zhag 'ga' re bzhugs te bla brang phan tshul dang 'dus sde rnams
kyi re ba rnams grub nas gdan sa chen po dang nye bar phebs pa na/ de yod kyi mkhan chen sogs lho byang las tshan phyag gnyer drung rigs bcas gar ra bkra shis dar rgyas
zhag sar phebs bsu mjal dar dang / sang nyin a spro la rtser lha bsangs rgyas pa mdzad nas/ sro ma rdzing khar thab bsu de nas gzhung zhing chu kha ma'i steng du chos
sde lho byang 'dus sde nas ser phreng gi sne la chos dung rin po che rdo rje'i chos skyong 'cham mgon brgyad bcas phebs pa dang / sku mched rgyal yum bcas chibs bshol te/
snyan shal bstsal/ de nas cha khams kyi gzhas bsu sogs dang/ bla brang zam sner 'dir sku ngo sogs nas mjal dar dang bcas bsus te gzhi thog pho brang chen po'i tshoms dmar
du rgyan 'grem/ stan sogs bshams

par shar phebs kyis yab rje sku mched rgyal yum gzhung sa mchog gi mdzod pa sogs sgar pa tshang mar so so'i go babs gdan thob dang bcas pa'i thog gzhung nas ja 'bras thog 'dir
bzhugs zhal ngo rnams dang drung rigs las tshan sogs nas maNDal rten gsum so sor go babs dang bstun pa'i mjal dar phul/ de nas gzhung nas dkar spro dang / dmar bro sder
kha rgya dpang che ba sogs bteg zin mtshams gzim chung rtser phebs/ de'i sang nyin nas 'cham mgon rnams tshoms chen du bzhugs par mchod bshams bskang gso brgya tshar/
'cham sku phebs skyel dus mdos bzhin dang / zhag shas nas lha chen gyi gtsos gtsug lag khang rnams la sna lnga'i mchod tshogs/ de skabs lha chen du dngul srang nyer lnga
las grub pa'i mchod kong sogs gsar sbyor mdzad cing chos lhun ri sgang sogs la sku skyes mang 'gyed sogs dang mgon khang khag bzhi sogs la gtang rag rnams rim bzhin mdzad/
gong dbus su ma phebs gong du tshoms bar du dbang lha sgrub chog mdzad skabs sogs dge mtshan mngon gsal bzhin 'di skabs gzhung sa mchog nas gzhis rdzong khongs gtogs dpal
ldan rtse gzhis ka mi grwa yong 'bab dang bcas pa gdugs dkar nyer bdun ma'i sgo nas byad bzlog gtso bo gyur pa'i zhabs brtan bstar chags sgrub rgyu'i thebs rtsar 'bul
'byor mdzad pa sogs/ mdor na sku rkyen mi mthun rigs med cing / thugs bzhed gang ci 'bad med lhun grub tu byung ba sogs/ gzhis byes tshang ma

dga' ston gyi dpal la rol/ dbus phebs skabs gdan sa 'dir zhabs dkar sprul sku zhes pa'i zog rdzus g.yo can dpon g.yog mang zhig sleb tshod kyang / 'dir bzhugs gdung sras sku
mched rje btsun rmol drung 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma sogs nas rdzu 'phrul gyi bkod pas btul/ gsar bskrun zhabs brtan lha khang dge legs rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas rigs gsum
gdung rabs char 'bebs su dus dang rgyun mchod bstar chags/ gzhan yang lo ltar cho 'phrul tshes bco lnga bdag khrii mchog dang / mkhan chen sogs chos sde lho byang las
tshan ban tshang pa 'dus tshogs bcas nas theg chen sems bskyed rang gis len pa sogs dang / bla ma gong ma'i bstod tshogs dang mchod 'bul sogs zhal 'don gyi rim pa rnams/
'jam mgon kun blos mdzad pa'i zhal gro mchod 'bul phyag deb bzhin mdzad pa la mchod tshogs/ bsnyen bskur zab pa bcas gnang srol da lta'i bar gnas pa dang / mgon khang bdud
dpung zil gnon log 'dren tshar gcod gdung rabs char 'bebs su lo ltar rgyal zla'i nang / dam rdzas bskang gtor nag po mchod bstod bcas gsar 'dzugs lo ltar ban tshang pa
stod smad bla khag sogs gtor spod kyi zhal 'don nag po mchod bstod bcu gcig rtsa ltung gi bshags pa grangs shin tu mang ba phyag deb bzhin gnang srol da lta'i bar mchis
pa sogs dang / sngon du skyes chen 'ga' zhig la lung bstan zhu gnang la'ang gdung sras 'byung ba gsungs pa dang / nye lam dbus phebs skabs bsam yas chos skyong

chen pos kyang / yum gyi lhungs na bzhugs pa 'di yab rje dbang sdud snying po'i rnam 'phrul yin cing / mtshan yang theg chen dbang sdud snying por thogs shig ces lung bstan
pa bzhin/ shing sprel hor zla gsum pa'i tshes nyer gnyis la rgyal yul zhing skyong dbang mo nyid las/ gdung sras bkra shis rin chen bltams pa'i tshul rgyas pa 'og tu 'byung
zhing / 'khrungs ston sogs dga' ston rgya che bar mdzad/ gang ltar phun tshogs zhabs brtan lha khang bzhengs pa nas bzung yab yum rnams thugs bzhed 'bad med lhun grub
tu byung ngo / /de mtshams nas gcung po kun dga' rin chen nas phun tshogs pho brang gsar bskrun gyis zur bzhugs lta bur mdzad rgyur/ de skabs sa gzhung mdzod pa ltsam dral
chos 'od zer ram zhabs pad nag po yang zer ba sogs/ gzur gnas rnams nas sku mched rnams thugs 'dod gcig tu las 'di bzhin mdzad tshe/ gdan sa chen po 'di nyid kyi gtam
don lar rgyar gang sar gtugs min sogs babs zhus kyis bkag ste phun pho'i rtsig 'gram brus zin pa yang 'gyang dgos byung yang / slar nas kheg pa zhig ma byung ba yin nam/
pho brang gsar rgyag gi bsam lde'i yum nyi zla dbang mo dang bcas lhan gzhugs kyi phun tshogs pho brang du grags pa 'di bzhin byung zhing / sku mched gras mgon po dngos grub
dpal 'bar nas phun tshogs bde skyid 'di lte ba yab rje dbang gi mtshan can gyi sku dus spro sang gnang yul du sa gzhung rang nas brgyab tshod kyang de las cung rgya bskyed
de sku mched rnams kyi

yum rang byon ma bgres ma bcas bzhugs pa dang sku mched gras chung ba/ 'jam mgon kun dga' rgyal mtshan nas bkras brtsegs bla brang nub 'di snga dus yod cing / bkras brtsegs
shar ram mchod khang du grags pa 'di bzhin gsal skrun gyis gang gi yul mchog rang byon ma chung ba/ dam tshig sgrol ma bcas bzhugs pa 'di rnams kyi rab gnas bdag khri yab
rje padma'i mtshan can gdan drangs te mdzad tshul dang / gzhan yang thang rgyal lha khang ngam/ dmag bzlog lha khang du grags pa 'di yang rten dang brten par bcas yab rje
padma'i mtshan can nyid kyis 'od gsal du lha bla'i lung bstan pa ltar/ rten gtso grub chen thang stong rgyal po'i sku sman 'dam las grub pa che ba ring bsrel rnam bzhi'i
gong bu can spa tri'i dbus na bzhugs pa dang / logs bris su grub chen nyid kyi sku brgya phrag brdal bar bzhugs pa/ rab tu gnas pa yab rje padma'i mtshan can nyid nas
mdzad cing / zhabs brtan lha khang byang ngam mchod khang du grags pa bkras brtsegs 'dra cog mdzad pa 'di'i byang / rje nyid bzhugs yul sgrub phug bkod legs 'di rnams kyang
nang rten bcas gsar skrun mdzad cing / gzhan yang zhabs lha dang / dmag bzlog pho brang gnyis char gyi gzim chung thab tshang zhol shag rdo gcal bcas bkod legs 'di rnams
dang / khyad par sgrol steng ngam dmag bzlog pho brang gi thog rje nyid kyi gzim phug ldebs bris la rgyun gtan thugs dam gang yin gyi lhag lha'i snang brnyan skya bris
su ma tshang ba med pa bzhugs

pa'i zhal brdung yang sa bzang rin sgang sogs kyi a ni lo drug cu zin pa kho nas bgyis pa yin tshul zer ba sogs la rab gnas rje nyid nas mdzad cing / de bzhin bsam brling du
gdan sa 'di nyid kyi gtsug lag khang ngo mtshar rten bzhi'i nang tshan g.yu khar mo'i gtsug lag khang la dpe bzhes pa'i sgrol ma'i lha khang spa tra me tog 'brug sogs kyis
dbus snang brnyan rnams dang bcas/ sman 'dam las grub pa la nang gzungs ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi dang / khyad par mangga'i mtshan can nyid nas rab gnas skabs/ gang nas
'ong cha med pa'i khams mo ming ye shes sgrol ma zer ba zhig nas g.yu zhig phul ba/ bza' btung byin la gang la 'gro sogs dris shog gsungs pas/ bsam dgon gyi 'og tsam nas
rlung tshub zhig tu yal te gar song cha med pa zhig byung tshul yab rje rdo rje 'chang la zhus pas 'di ni shin tu dge/ rab gnas mdzad pas ye shes pa dngos su 'khor rtags
yin gsungs nas/ da lta snang brnyan 'di'i thugs kar gzhug par mdzad pa ngo mtshar can bzhugs pa'i steng du thub dbang gnas bcu'i lha khang bcas par sa rgyan gnam rgyan
mchod rdzas bcas kun gyi snang ngor gsal ba 'di dang / nyid kyi gzim khang rab bsgrub tu grags pa dang / byang 'khyud ban tshang pa'i shag khang pa steng 'og sogs kyang
gsar skrun mdzad cing / gzhan yang bde mchog tu nyid kyi bzhugs yul deng sang sku spar khang du grags pa sogs gdan sa 'di nyid kyi mdzes rgyan dang 'phral phugs su mkho ba'i
khang bzang du ma

gsar du bskrun pa dang / nang rten gsar bzhengs kyang gong du bshad pa yab rje rdo rje 'chang dbang gyi mtshan can gyi gdung rten/ zhabs lha'i rten gtso rnams dang gser kong
dang / gzhan yang dbu bla lnga kun bkras kyi 'dra sku/ rgya dngul lugs ma'i dges rdor lha dgu gser zangs kyi pad sdong can/ yab rje dbang gi mtshan can gyi sku dus bzhengs
gnang ril sgrub skabs mdun bskyed rten 'dra cog gsar bzhengs mdzad pa sogs mang ba/ nyams gso mdzad tshul lha chen khyams stod ka chen zhig rtsa ba sar nub/ gdung zhom
ste/ ldib zhom yong la khad pa byung ba rje nyid nas chos bdag yid bzhin nor bu'i bskang 'phrin gnang bas skyon med kyi mtshan ma gsal ba bzhin rdo shing sogs las byed
rnams nas/ las tsam pas tshegs med ka gdung 'degs thub pas/ las byed rnams la dpa' dar sogs gsol ras kyang gya nom pa bstsal ba dang / rab gnas kyang mdzad pa da bar skyon
'gyur ma byung ba dang / lha chen chos grwa 'di yang nyams gso gsar bzhengs dang 'dra bar mdzad cing rab gnas kyang rgyas pa gnang / me bya lo mjug tsam la thar rtse mkhan
chen byams pa kun dga' bstan 'dzin nyid khams phebs 'khor te/ gdan sa chen po sku mched yab sras rnams mjal phyag tu phebs/ gzhung 'bul ja 'khor drug brgya sogs ha cang
gtos che ba dang sku sger so so la'ang 'bul stobs che ba dang / chos sde lho byang 'dus sde la mang 'gyed tshan che ba bstabs shing / de sngon nas bdag khri yab sras rnams
nas dbu blar

bskur te/ dbang rjes gnang lung sogs mang du gsan pa bcas/ de skabs kyang yab rje padma'i mtshan can nyid nas/ gshed dmar gyi nyams khrid dang / gsang 'dus 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
dbang sogs mang du gsan pa/ gsang 'dus dbang gi skabs rje nyid nas mkhan chen nyid 'jam pa'i rdo rje dngos su rgyun ring gzigs pa nas bzung thar rtse rdo rje 'chang zhes
rje nyid kyi dbu bla'i gtso bo zhig tu mdzad/ gsar bzhengs zhabs lha dang / bsam brling sgrol khang sogs la rab gnas kyang zhu bar mdzad/ me bya lo mjug der yab sras
gnyis char gzhung sa'i zhabs brtan lta bur yin nam/ rgyal rtser chibs bsgyur khyug tsam gnang tshod du 'dug lcags byi lo gsar 'phral gnas len zhabs skor du phebs rgyu'i snga
'phros gzhung sa mchog tu snyan seng dang / rta khal lam yig sogs zhu gnang gis yab sras zung dang / rgyal yum zhing skyong dbang mo bcas ston 'khor rnams gdan sa nas
rim phebs/ mar lam paN chen rin po che blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi ma'i mjal phyag dang / de nas rong brgyud de lha ldan rgyal khab chen por phebs par nye ba na/ bzhung sa
mchog nas bkur bsos thab bsu ja zhus mtshams dar 'bul ba sogs sngar bzhin mdzad nas/ zhag shas nas gong sa rgyal dbang blo bzang mkhas grub rgya mtsho dang / srid skyong
mtsho smon gling pa rnams mjal phyag dngos 'bul bcas dang / jo shAka rnam gnyis/ rtse po ta la 'phags pa lo ki shwa ra dang / gser gdung khag bcas la sna lnga'i stong mchod
rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum dang / zhal

gser sgron pa snyan dar srid na ring ba phul te bstan pa rgyas pa dang de 'dzin rnams sku tshe ring ba/ rnam dkar 'phrin las rgyas pa sogs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su lo
phyugs legs pa sogs bde skyid thugs smon drag la yun ring bar 'debs pa mdzad cing / gzhung sa mchog nas kyang snga bar phyi gsum gyi zur chas gnang sbyin dang / bstan srid
kyi zhabs brtan kyang mang du thon pa rnams bsgrubs nas dgongs zhu'i snyan zhu mdzad de ring min phebs phyag zhu gnang gis/ rtse shod so so nas phebs thon gnang skyes kyang
gya nom par bstsal te/ rgod ka'am dgod kha la brgyud nas lho khar chibs bsgyur gyis bsam yas su phebs te bzhugs yul rgyal dbang mchog gi gzim chung du bsgrigs pa na/
der ma bzhugs par gzhan zhig tu spo dgos tshul gsungs te/ dum tsam nas sngar gra sgrig zhu sa'i gzim khang rdib gzhom du gyur pa bsam yas pa dang 'di phyogs sgar pa rnams
ha las te/ tshang mas bdag chen rin po che la mngon mkhyen thogs med 'di 'dra yod pa min na gzhan rang re rnams sa phyogs 'di nas phyi log rgyu med pa sogs bstod bkur bsngags
gsum gyi sgras bar snang khyab bo/ /chos skyong chen por spyan gzigs gser skyems snyan shal sogs bstsal te bka' bzhin bsgrub rgyu'i tha tshig kyang phul/ de nas rtse
thang dang yar klung rten gsum gnas gsum sogs la mchod 'bul gnas gzigs dang / thugs sras mangga'i mtshan can dang / rgyal yum zhing skyong dbang mo/ dpon slob chos grags
pa bcas gu ru'i sgrub gnas yar klung shel

brag mjal bar phebs te mangga'i mtshan can gang nas grub mtshan bzhag par mdzad tshul sogs 'og tu bdag chen nyid kyi rnam thar skabs rgyas par 'byung zhing / de nas rim bzhin
dgon sde rnams la mang 'gyed/ bsgrub gnas khag bcas par mchod 'bul/ gnas gzigs sogs de skabs kyi gdul bya rnams smin grol la 'god bzhin par chibs bsgyur te/ gdan sa chen
por phebs tshul rnams gong chu lug bzhin mdzad dam snyam zhing / de nas chu stag lo bdag khri nyid dgung grangs nga gcig tu phebs pa rgyal khab chen por rje nyid khri
skyong dgongs zhu'i snyan seng dang chabs cig gdung sras sngon lam bzhin chos khri thang mo che sogs khri 'don zhus chog pa'i snyan zhu dang / sa khongs lha sde mi sde bcas
sogs la dril bsgrags thong gsungs pa/ mdzod pa sogs nas da lta stod nas sing dmag gi skad che ba 'di 'dra la/ 'di lo 'then tsam gnang dgos zhu nan ji ltar phul rung cis
kyang gtong dgos gsungs te ma gsan par btang bas dbus gtsang khul 'dir tshang mas 'di lo dmag skad 'di 'dra la sa skya pas mdos zab dang khri 'don sogs mdzad gsungs lugs
kyis dmag mi yong ba thag 'di nas chod pa red zer zhing / ring min chings bsgrigs shing gzhung sa mchog nas bka' lan kyang legs 'khor gyis khri 'don gnang gtan khel te/
zla ba bcu pa'i nang g.yul thang 'ong la dar 'dzugs dang sku rims bka' 'gyur 'phar ma phur bzlog dus mdos chen mo 'gyangs te de'i tshab tu dmar chen gtor bzlog

dang / 'char can zhal gyi gtor bzlog bsus gnang dang rgyal zla'i tshes gcig la lha bsangs rgyas pa grol nas/ lo gsar bzhugs gral zla mjug dus mdos chen mo zab res chog sgrigs
dang / gnyen chas/ gyong chas/ nyer dgu gtor bzlog gnam gang la bskang ba brgya tshar/ tshes gcig rgyal lo'i bzhugs gral zab ma/ khri phebs dngos gzhi/ rta zla'i tshes
'gor gdung sras rdo rje rin chen mchog dang mangga'i mtshan can kun dga' bsod nams bcas gsum 'jam dbyangs sa paN gyi chos khrir khri 'don mdzad tshul rnams/ gong me stag
lo'i lam gzhir bzhag mdzad pa sogs 'og rdo rje rin chen sogs kyi rnam thar skabs cung zad smos pa bzhin dang / de nas sku mched gsum gyi bgres pa rdo rje rin chen nyid la
khri 'dzin gyi khur phog ste/ yab rje padma'i mtshan can rang nyid/ zhabs lha pho brang dang / sgrol steng dang / skabs re bsam brlung / bde mchog sogs nges med du phebs
bzhud mdzad de kun spang bya bral ba'i tshul gyis 'khrul zhig gi spyod pa skyong bzhin par bstan 'gro'i phan bde 'byung ched/ dbang lung man ngag gnang ba dang / mngon
shes dang grub rtags sogs kyi sgo nas kyang gdul bya rnams smin grol la 'god par mdzad tshul gong gi gseb tshags rnams su'ang cung zad smros pa ltar dang / gzhan yang phur
sgrub slob dpon mdzad skabs nyer dgu'i nyin pa tshogs su bsgral las skabs/ phags rgyab pa dang mnyam phur rtse nas dgra bo'i rnam shes sprang bu'i rnam pa lta bus nam mkhar
song ba gcung po kun rin lags kyis gzigs

tshul gsungs pa dang / yang sku gzhon nu'i dus phur bzlog las rim mdzad skabs kun rar 'dab las kyi 'gugs gzhug mdzad skabs rnams su rlung nag ha cang 'tshub pa dang / dgun
yin yang gtor zor nyung dkar dang bcas pa sar thim pa ma zad sa yang 'phyar ba drug bdun tsam gzhom pa sogs mthu stobs nus pa'i mtshan ma mchog tu ngo mtshar ba ston par
mdzad pa dang / gdan sa 'dir nad bdag stobs 'joms mdzad skabs/ g.ya' lung phyogs kyi mi zhig sa skyar don gcod du phyin pa'i mthong snang du/ bud med sha khrag sgye po gang
tsam khyer ba gnyis phrad pa gang yin smras par/ ngos gnyis sa skyar phyin nas 'gyang tsam sdod bsams kyang sa skya'i gong ma khri chen zhu ba des lus la rdo rje'i mtshon
cha mang du babs pa sogs bka' bkyon byung bas/ da ni mi 'gro ka med byung zer ba gang yin bsams nas bltas pas mar rlung 'tshub cig tu yal bar song ba dngos su mthong
ba dang / yang de rjes lho nas byang la phebs skabs/ phebs byams mdun der bud med gnyis ngu zhing 'gro ba dum tsam nas yal ba dngos su bathong ba ma mo'i 'khrug rtags yin
pas zhabs rim rgya cher 'grub dgos bka' phebs byung zhing / yang skabs shig gzim zur thabs mkhas kyis lhun gzhis 'dzin skabs/ rje nyid gdan zhus kyis bzhugs gral der bla
ma nub pa gu ru zhes grags pa'i sngags pa zhig yod pa/ rje nyid nas de nyin nged gnyis nus pa 'gran pas yang na khyod kyis ser ba phob/ nged bcad kyi/ yang na nged nas phab
khyed kyis

bsrung dgos zhes yang yang gsungs pas/ sngags pas phyag dang bcas de 'dra zhu ma dgos pa de 'dra bdag gis ga la nus sogs zhus kyang ma gsan par/ 'o na skyabs rje mchog nas
'bebs par mdzad tshe bdag gis bsrung ga la nus/ bdag gis phab chog pa la/ skyabs rje mchog nas srung cha thugs rje che rogs gnang zhus te/ sngags pa ser ba 'bebs tu chas
pa las/ rje nyid chas gtam sogs la thugs g.yeng skabs/ sngags pa'i nus mthus nam mkhar glo bur sprin nag bsdus ste glog 'khyug 'brug sgra dang bcas ser ba phab par/ rje nyid
nas cung zad g.yeng ba'i lan/ ser bas lo thog gcom par 'gyur srid gsungs nas/ phyir byon nas mgul phur bton te/ nam mkha' la bsgril bas/ phur rtse nas me stag du ma khrom
khrom 'phros pas/ sprin nag dbyings su 'thor zhing / sprin bral nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis khyab pa na/ de tshogs rnams kyi thugs rje che zhes phyag mang du phul ba'i tshe
gsungs las/ nged kyi phur pa 'di btab na lha yang rdul bzhin brlag par 'gyur na/ gnod byed bgegs dgra sdigs pa tsam gyis 'gum/ de bas na nga rig 'dzin sdegs 'gum bya ba
yin/ khyed rnams kyis da sa brtan po gyis shig gsungs te/ sngags pa la yang nus mthu che gsungs nas/ ma dha na'i mgron dang / spa dar sogs gsol ras bstsal/ sngags pas phyag
'tshal zhing khyod rdo rje gzhon nu dngos dang rnam dbyer ma mchis pa/ phran bdag gis 'gran par ga la nus/ skye ba dang tshe rabs thams cad du rjes su bzung du gsol/
zhus tshul dang yang

gzhung sa'i zhabs brtan bse mgon yid bzhin nor bu'i drung du/ mgon po khro bcu'i gtor sgrub skabs srod la thun gtor 'bul skabs/ gtor rtse las me stag chad pa nam mkhar song
ba je cher gyur te gtso dmar rdza sbom tsam du gyur te lho nub tu song ba kun gyis mthong ba dang / bsgral chog skabs lingga las rlangs pa chil gyis byung ba/ lte gzims
tshe bsam sogs kyis mthong tshul dang / nang chen bla ma dpal bzang rgyal mtshan ban tshong skabs tshes mchod la rje nyid gdan zhus kyis bdud rtsi 'dren snod thod pa ngan
ngon zhig las g.yar mkhan ma 'byor ba rje nyid bdud rtsi byin rlabs skabs/ chang de nyid tsha chil du khol zhing lud pa dang / gzhan yang chab tshan skabs sogs su'ang bdud
rtsi khol zhing lud pa kha re byung ba sogs grub pa'i mtshan ma mtha' klas so/ /yang thugs sras mangga'i mtshan can la mgon po zhal bzhi'i bka' chos gnang skabs/ 'di shin
tu gnyan pas/ thog mar bsnyen sgrub bya dgos gsungs nas dus grangs kyii bsnyen pa mthar phyin pa mdzad rtsis la/ grub dbang 'di nyid kyis zhag bdun song mtshams/ ngos
kyis mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa song ba yin pas dus grangs kyis dgos pa med/ sang nas bzung bka' dbang 'bul gsungs te/ bka' chos tshugs kyang gnas nges med kyi/ res lha khang
/ res grong khyim/ res grwa shag sogs skabs babs su gnang zhing / chos skyong sengge nag po'i rjes gnang ni bsam brling lte ba'i khyim du gnang ba de dus kyi che rigs rnams
kyi bsam par/ chos skyong 'di shin tu bka' gnyan

par gsungs na gnas nges med du gnang ba la/ nyes skyon mi 'byung ba gang yin the tshom za ba na/ rje'i gsungs las don nub gtor 'bul skabs mchod dpon ma gtogs su gang ma 'gro
zhig phyin na bka' chad nges par 'ong gsungs pa/ khyim de'i bu mo zhig gis gsung de ma thos par gtor ma 'bul sar phyin pas skas nas lhung zhing lus kun brdabs te shi la
khad byung ba dang / skabs shig char dkon pas dus mchod du rje nyid la char 'bebs zhus par/ gnod sbyin rtsi dmar drung du gser skyems gtor ma sogs bshams te/ dus mchod yang
steng phebs zhor du/ rgyal khang du phebs nas/ phyag mdzub sgreng te/ rtsi dmar zer ba'i brlag dmar sdug dmar khyod bod 'bangs skyid sdug mi shes gang red/ lo tog than
pas brdungs nas gang bza'/ khyod la mthu nus yod na nga yi sbyin pa'i gtor zo la/ nyi ma de ring nas bzung ste char ma phab na/ nged gnyis gtan du 'cham mi yong ngo zhes
gsungs nas steng du phebs nas dpon slob rnams khrung gzhas la rol/ de nas nyi ma phyed yol tsam nas bzung zhag bdun tsam nam nyin ltos med char zim bur babs pas lo tog
la shin tu phan pa byung tshul kyang 'dug yang skabs shig gang gi sku mched 'jam mgon kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyi nang rten dngul sku rdo rje 'chang 'di nyid bzhengs grub nas/
rab gnas rje nyid nas gnang ba'i snga dror rje nyid thugs cung zad khro tshul bzhes te/ zhabs 'bring pa kun la bka' bkyon cung zad dang bcas khyod rnams kyis nged bla

ma tshad ldan du cha mi 'jog pa de ltar na/ da lam rab gnas bya rgyu'i rten 'di la yang pad gdan steng nas dbu gtsug bar la shing tshad zhog cig nan du gsungs pa na bka' bzhin
bsgrubs pa/ shing tshad de nyid la kun gyis mthong bar dam phrug gis mnan te/ rab gnas ma grub bar phyag gzhung du bdag po rgyob cig gsungs/ de nas rab gnas sngags gsol
grub 'phral du sngar gyi shing tshad khyer shog gsungs te/ rten de nyid la tshad pa'i tshe rten de nyid sngar gyi sku tshad las mtho gang lhag tsam 'phar bas tshang ma
rje nyid rten dang bcas par rjes su yi rang gi dad pa skyes/ yang mdzod nag tu rnam sras bskang ba ban tshang pa dang bcas zhag bdun na bza' zab bzhes bcas gnang skabs rgya
dpon zhig der lhags nas/ gser dngul ja dar mang ba/ khyad par rdo yi lhung bzed 'bru snas bkang ste phul ba ni/ sngon byung dang mthun par rnam sras dngos mjal lta bur
byung ba sogs shin tu dge bar byung ba dang / shing 'brug shing sbrul gang rung zhig la/ rgya dpon chi krung thang du grags pa gong ma chen mos bod kyi las don zhib gcod
du mngags pa de bzhin/ 'dir yang gnas mjal yin tshul du byas te 'ongs pa/ rje nyid nas lha chen chibs stegs su bsu bar phebs te yar lam rgya dpon dang phyag bsgrengs te/
phun gling ngos la gzigs shing kun gyis mthong tshul du/ zhabs gnyis mtho gang tsam 'phags shing / bzhin ras las 'od khrom byed pa rgya dpon de dang gzhung sa'i sku drag
kun gyis mthong ba dang / gcung kun rin phun

gling na yod pas gzigs te/ jo lags ma gi sbug 'dir sku dbang btsan grags pas ma gtogs phyi 'gyang la dang ma byung ka med red gsungs par grags shing / lha mthil khyams stod
du mjal dmangs sar rgya dpon rang dang bod kyi bka' blon gnyis/ de dus lha mthil rten bshad sogs kyang yab rje pad ma'i mtshan can nyid nas gnang zhing 'gro mgon chos rgyal
'phags pa'i rnam thar sogs chos dang 'jig rten gyi gsung gleng mang du mdzad pas rgya dpon gyis kyang gus pas btud de/ rje nyid sogs la'ang skyabs rten 'dus tshogs la
mang ja dang gser 'gyed btang bar grags pa sogs rang cag tshur mthong gdul bya'i snang ngor/ mthu nus dang rdzu 'phrul rten tshul sgro skur dang bral ba mngon sum tshad
mas grub pa rags tsam dang / gzhan yang gsang chab dang ljags sngags bgeg skrod sogs mdzad pas nad las grol ba sogs ni dpag tu med cing 'dir yi ge mang bas ma bkod pa dang
/ bsam na shes pa'i mngon shes kyis ma 'ongs mngon par mkhyen pa lung bstan tshul yang sku gzhon nu'i dus nas/ gzhan gyis lkog tu ci byas thabs cad mngon shes kyis sgrib
med du mkhyen te tsham tshom med par gsungs pas thams cad 'jigs zhum me ba sdod dgos pa gleng ba dang / dus phyis de 'dra gsungs pa mang bas/ tshang ma thog tu khel ba
yong tshul dper mtshon na/ phyis su yab rje 'di nyid sgrol ma lha khang du tshe chog sgrol 'don rgyun 'don bzhi grwa dang mnyam 'don mdzad skad la/ de lta'i skabs nang chen
bla ma dpal bzang

rgyal mtshan nas sgrol 'don 'phar ma zhus par gsol ba'i skabs yab rje mchog nas rgyun zhes dbu zhwa phud nas/ bla ma khams na 'dug ring nged ji tsam rgas 'dug gam gsungs par/
bla mas zhal rgyan cung zad dkar ba las gzhan ma shes zhus/ sgrol ma sku gnyer drung rams pa shel dkar 'od zer du grags pa nas rang bzhin gyis gleng bar skyabs mgon rdo
rje bgres rgud dang bral bas/ rgas rgyu bdag nyid rgas 'dug gam byas par/ de lan nang chen bla mas bzhad gad dang sbrags cung zad sku mdog sngo nyams las/ gzhan bgres nyams
cher mi 'dug byas par/ yab rje mchog nas khyod sngo dang mi sngo'i lo rgyus bral 'dug za 'bu 'dra ba khyed myur du byi'us bza' ba'i dus la babs 'dug pas ltos shig yang
yang gsungs pa/ tshang ma gang zhu 'tsham ma thing the tshom mer lus pa/ zhag shas nas drung rams pa de sngon du nad gzhi che ba med kyang nad glo bur ba zhig byung ste
tshe las yol ba dang/ nang chen bla ma de nyid la thon phyag skabs sa zhwa ske dar sogs gsol ras rgya che ba gnang ste/ gsung las ngos 'khon rigs padma bdud 'dul dbang
phyug tu grags pa bya ba legs par byas pa la bdag rkyen bya dga' sprod pa dang / nyes par byas pa rnams la chad pa gcod pa ngos kyi rnam thar yin pas khyod kyis ma brjed
par gyis shig gsungs pa'ang rjes su brtags na/ zhing brjed zin nas thugs sras mangga'i mtshan can gyi dgongs bzhed bzhin skyabs rje mchog gi rnam thar sgrigs dgos pa 'di
la gsung rgyu yin 'dra gsungs pa sogs de

'dra thogs med du gsung tshul mang du 'dug kyang / yi ge mang bas 'jigs nas de tsam dang / kha cig dgos dbang gi rjes su'ang byung shing de lta dam pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis sam
dgu ru 'dus pa las/ dang po ltar na/ mkhyen brtse nus gsum/ mkhas btsun bzang gsum/ thos bsam sgom gsum/ 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum dang bcu gnyis/ gnyis pa ltar na/ mkhas
btsun bzang gsum sogs dgur bsdus pa las/ thos bsam mdzad tshul sogs gzhan rnams gong gi gseb tshags rnams su ci rigs bstan zin nas/ bsgom sgrub ji ltar mdzad tshul yang
gong du brjod pa ltar yab chos yi dam rdo rje gzhon nu dang / kyai rdor/ phyag rdor/ 'byung po 'dul byed/ gur zhal rnams kyi gzhi bsnyen mthar phyin pa mdzad pa dang / gzhan
yang rje btsun rig byed lha mo tshe bsnyen sogs/ mdzad pa dpag tu med pa yod pa dang dus rgyun du'ang tho rangs ldang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis bzhengs te tshe sgrub rigs
dang thugs dam gyi gtso bo dpal kyai rdo rje'i bskyed rdzogs lus dkyil dang bcas pa bsgoms te/ dbang rgyas pa len par lam dus su grags pa rgyas bsdus gnyis dang / lam zab
phyi nang / bir srung phyi nang / bde mchog dril bu lus dkyil lam nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i bsgom bzlas dang bzhi la chag med rnam bzhi grags pa rnams dang / gzhan yang 'jam
dpal dkar nag ser gsum khyung khra nag 'byung 'dul/ sil gtor brgya rtsa dkar cha bzhi rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyin sreg sogs grub nas/ mjal phyag dang tshogs phebs dbang
dka' rjes gnang tshe dbang / ljags

lung sogs gnang dgos grub nas rgyun gtan phur chung gtor bsngo bskang ba thugs dam ma snga dro ma grub pa'i lam dus sogs gnang dgos rnams dang / gur ru drag dmar ri khrod ma
mgon po brag rdzong ma'i bsrung bzlog sogs rgyun du nyams bzhes lhag lha rnams sgrol steng gzim sbug gi ldebs bris ji bzhin yin 'dug pa dang / srod la nyal ba'i rnal 'byor
gyis gzim ste/ thun mtshams thams cad du rnal 'byor rnam bcu'i dus 'da' ba gzugs sku ma 'dus bar du chag med mdzad pas/ dam pa'i yon tan sa lam mthon por phebs pa gdon
mi za zhing rang cag gdul bya'i snang ngor yang / gong 'og rnams su smos pa bzhin/ mngon shes rdzu 'phrul mthu rtsal sogs la thogs pa med pa 'di bzhin byung ba dang / 'chad
pa nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdul bya'i blo gros kyi pad tshal rgyas par mdzad pa'i tshul yang / sku gzhon nu'i dus nas bzung snga phyi lam 'bras lan lnga tsam gsungs pa/
dang po sde dge chos rgyal tshe dbang rin chen nam/ mjug tu chos sgor zhugs shing rab tu byung ba'i mtshan byams pa kun dga' sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nyid kyi
gtso bor mdzad/ skal ldan 'ga' la bzhi thog mkha' spyod du gnang ba 'di ni lam 'bras slob bshad yin par gnang zhing / dbang sogs kyi skabs sa phyogs de nyid nas gser sil
ma'i tshoms su bkod de phul bar grags pa sogs byung 'dug de rjes khri chen rdo rje rin chen/ bdag khri kun bsod sku mched/ 'di dag gis chos sde lho byang chos lhun pa khams
pa grwa rgyun

sogs la gsung ngag tshogs bshad snga phyi tshar bzhi tsam smin grol byin rlabs rigs pod dmar ser sogs rgyab rten lung bcas gnang ba dang / gzhan yang dbang rjes gnang khrid
lung la sogs/ rgya cher bstsal ba'i gsung las skyes pa'i slob ma'i tshogs kyang srid dang chos kyi bu 'khor rdo rje rin chen/ theg chen bkra shis rin chen/ bdag chen kun
bsod sku mched sogs 'di ga'i sku ngo rnams dang zhwa lu mchog sprul blo gsal bstan skyong / dpal rgyun gyi dbang po'i chos grwa nas gzim 'og sprul sku bstan 'dzin snyan
grags/ thar rtse mkhas grub 'jam dbyangs kun dga' bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan sogs/ de dus kyi mkhan zhal phal che ba mdo smad nas yongs rdzogs bstan pa'i snang byed 'jam dbyangs
mkhyen brtse dbang po/ sde dge sa skyong bla ma byams pa kun dga' sangs rgyas pa yum sras sogs dang gdan sa chen po 'di yin/ de skabs kyi yum rje btsun mkhan chen/ dpon
slob/ ban tshang ba/ bka' rams pa sogs dang de dus kyi rang lugs dgon khag phal che ba rnams dang / srid skyong mtsho smon gling pa sogs kyi bla ma sprul sku khag dang
/ gung bka' mda' rtsis gsum sogs sku drag rigs dang grwa sa se 'bras dge gsum sogs kyi bla ma dge bshes/ phal pa rang ga ba sogs de dus kyi thog mtshungs pa drag zhan phal
che bas zhabs rdul spyi bor blangs te/ yang slob sogs rgya mtsho'i gos can gyi mthar khyab par gyur pa dang / rtsod pa rdo rje'i me char gyis log lta'i ri bo bsnyil ba
mdzad pa'i tshul yang / gzhon nu'i dus dpon

slob lnga rig kun bkras drung / gzhung chen rnams la thos pa mang tsam mdzad tshod kyis gdan sa 'di nyid kyi gzhi len rig bya sogs kyi mtshan nyid rtsod pa'i grwar ma bzhengs
kyang sku seng sogs kyi 'bel gtam dang / 'di'i lan du 'di ltar bgyis kyi bka' slob gnang ba rnams kyang rdo rje'i tshig kho na 'ong tshul gsungs 'dug pa dper mtshon na/
snga dus sde dge sa spyod tshe dbang rab brtan sogs nas/ rtsa ltung bcu bzhi'i gzhung 'di la/ sems can kyang sems can yin dgos pa/ 'di la 'bru snon dgos pa 'dug zhus par
skyabs rje nyid nas 'di rnams ni khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang gi gsung yin pas khyed rnams rgol na rdo rje 'chang la rgol/ 'on kyang rnam par phye na/ sems can la byams pa
spong ba ni theg chen gyi rtsa ba yin pas ltung bar 'gyur bar gsungs pa spyi dang / 'on kyang gdug pa can la byams pa spong ba rtsa ltung bcu par gsungs pa bye brag dbye
ma shes pa'i gtam min nam/ des na ngor chen dkon mchog lhun grub kyi gsung rab las kyang / gdug la byams pa spong zhes gang gsungs pa/ /pha rol ngan spyod byed las bzlog
phyir te/ /snying nas byams pa spong ba theg mchog gi /rtsa ltung bzhi par rgyud gzhung kun las gsungs/ /zhes bshad pa ma yin nam gsungs pas/ sde dge sa dbang mkhas grub
chen po de sogs nas/ skyabs rje'i gsung rdo rje'i tshig rang yin 'dug gsungs shing thal mo spyi bor sbyor ba mdzad cing / gzhan yang de dus kyi sku yon che gras dbu zur
bla smon lam bzang po/ dbu zur grags rnam dpon slob

chos grags pa/ drung rams pa blo gros chos dar/ drung rams pa zung 'jug rdo rje sogs dang / mdo sngags kyi gzhung chen rnams las 'phros pa'i chos gtam kho na mdzad pa mkhas
pa 'di rnams don la 'khrul ba med kyang gnas skabs kyi zhal blangs skyong tshul mi 'dra ba du ma byung yang / skyabs rje nyid nas gsungs pa rnams ni sus kyang rgol du med
pa'i rdo rje'i bka' kho na yong tshul de dus la yongs su grags 'dug pa rnams ni/ rtsod pa mdzad tshul rags tsam dang / mkhas pa'i bya ba gsum pa rtsom pa mdzad tshul yang
/ snga dus dpon slob gnas lnga rig pa'i paNDi ta de nyid kyi drung du thu mi'i gzhung sum rtags dang / slob dpon dbyug pa can gyi snyan gzhung sogs la sbyangs par mdzad
pas/ rtsom pa gang mdzad kyang rang gis brjod bde zhing gzhan gyi rnar snyan pa/ rang gzhan gnyis ka'i don 'grub pa zhig tha snyad kyi gzhung lugs shes pa las 'byung ba/
'jam dbyangs sa paN gyi mkhas pa la 'jug pa'i sgo nas gsungs pa bzhin gyi sngon byon gong ma'i legs bshad dri ma med pa rnams/ gzhan gyi spangs dogs mang po rang mdzad
pa mi snang yang yab rje nyid kyi dbu bla sogs kyi gsol 'debs rgyas bsdus du ma/ gtor bzlog sbyin sreg ru mtshon sogs kyi chog sgrigs kha shas gdams bskur gtor gzungs dang
snyan dar gyi 'dod gsol sogs pod long tsam mdzad 'dug pa rnams ni/ don zab cing rnar snyan pa sogs mkhas pa'i rnam 'gyur kho nar mchis pa de rnams kyi sku tshe 'di'i mdzad
'phrin rags tsam

las/ gzhan pa'i lo zla dus tshod 'di sogs zhib cha rnam thar ma mor yang med 'dug pas/ 'ga' zhig ltar med par yod dang yod par med sogs ham bshad bgyis tshe rgyu 'bras la bskur
'debs gnas su lhung dogs de tsam la bsdus nas/ mthar dgongs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul ni/ rje nyid dgung grangs re gnyis pa chu glang lo shar nas rje
nyid sku khams shin tu nyog pa thugs sras mangga'i mtshan can nyid nas mkha' 'gro bsun bzlog dang / brtan bzhugs 'bul gnang sogs mdzad cing / zhabs pad bskal brgyar brtan
thub pa'i gsol 'debs nan du mdzad cing mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang bkra shis chos 'phel 'di nyid grwa rkyang skabs sogs zhal slob kha re nas kyang zhabs pad brtan dgos tshul
nan bshad bgyis pa na/ da lam mkha' 'gro bsu bzlog 'di yang brtags dpyad dge ba bcas gang ltar 'di lo sdod kyi gsungs nas zhal bzhes gnang / de bzhin mkhan chen bkra shis
chos sogs zhal slob rnams la'ang sngon gyi bla ma gong ma rnams 'ja' lus grub par shas che bar/ nged kyang 'ja' lus zhig ni sgrub 'dod na lo bcu gcig tsam dge skyon mi
yong gsungs kyang / yang tig lo gcig bzhugs rgyu gnang / ngos snyung gzhi rnams sing dwangs kyi tshul mdzad de/ gsungs las nged dang khyed tshos sgor ba'i mchog de las
lod pa myur du go ba 'dug go zhes yang yang gsungs pa 'gyangs tsam nas kun gzigs paN chen rin po che blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi ma gdul bya rnams bsod nams dman pas

glo bur du zhing brjes pa'i tshul bstan/ de rnams kyi snga phyir nam mkha' la sprin ya mtshan rmad du byung ba gzhan nas de bzhin yod tshul zhus pa na/ yab rje mchog gi bka'
las 'di ni dbyibs gzugs mtshon cha 'dra bas bod la myur du dmag 'khrug 'byung rtags yin cing 'on kyang / rgas po nged thod par sa ma bkab bar la mi 'byung / de nas ltos
shig yang yang gsungs pa bzhin/ dam pa gang nyid dgongs rdzogs zin 'phral shing yos lo nang gor bod zing 'khrugs shig byung ba sogs mngon par mkhyen pa'i tshul ni rgyun
du gsungs zer/ dgung grangs mtho yang 'di lo snron zla'i ming chen mchod 'bul nyin gnyis char lha chen gral du bzhengs te chos sde lho byang tshogs chen dbus su gsungs gdangs
rnams sngon gyi phyag len ji bzhinabaskul bar mdzad/ phur sgrub rol ston mdzad pa sogs sngags 'chang chen po dang 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi rnam thar lhur bzhes te gar
'cham sogs la skyon 'don sogs sngar dang mi 'dra ba nan du gnang / chos sde lho byang gi mkhan po brtson 'grus bkra shis sogs la zhing khams gzhan du byon rgyu'i rnam
'gyur kho na gsungs shing / ring min mgon khang khag bzhi sogs la'ang / gtor 'dzugs 'phar ma gnang ste rgyal bstan spyi bye dar zhing rgyas pa/ bstan 'dzin rnams sku tshe
zhabs pad yun du brtan pa/ 'gro rnams dus kyi rgud pa zhi nas/ char chu dus babs lo phyugs legs pa sogs bde skyid kyi dpal la rtag tu longs spyod pa sogs/ dar zhing rgyas
pa khyad par

rgyal ba gnyis pa sa skya'i bstan pa gdung rgyud sde dang bcas pa/ dbyar gyi dpal mo bzhin dar zhing rgyas pa'i 'phrin bcol bka' bsgo gnyer gtad dag mdzad cing / de tshe bdag
cag gi yab rje gdod ma'i mgon po de nyid kyi yum gyi yab de nyid gshegs pa'i byang chog grub pa dang bstun gsungs las/ yab de skal ba dang ldan pa ste/ las sgrib rnam
par dag nas dag pa'i zhing du song / nged kyis kyang da lan byang chog rjes ma yin gsungs/ bsngo smon shis brjod rnams rgyas par mdzad pa dang / de nas lo de'i hor zla bcu
gcig pa'i bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams kyi 'khrungs ston skabs/ ban tshang pa bgres gzhon med la dam pa nyid nas phyag dbang skabs dbu thug mdzad nas/ de nyin bdag gi phyag
dbang rjes ma yin/ da ni rang re tshe 'di la mjal ba zhig mi yong bas/ phyi ma ring min mjal ba'i thugs smon zhu zhing / bgres gzhon kun nas bstan pa'i zhabs tog hur
bskyed mdzod cig ces bka' bstsal ba na/ tshang ma yid zhum ste ci yin nam ci yin nam zer zhing tshom mer lus/ de nas pho brang steng du phebs nas sku mched lhan rgyas sar
yab rje pad ma'i mtshan can nyid kyis rang bzhin gyi gsung gleng sna tshogs mur/ nu bo rgyan mchog khyed rang lo shas bstan 'gro'i dpal du bzhugs/ bdag ni rgas shing gog
pa'i lus 'di dor nas rkang bde mig gsal rnam rig grung ba/ byis pa gzhon nu'i lus rten zhig nges par 'dod gsungs pas/ gcung po kun rin lags nas jo lags de 'dra gsungs pas

gang la 'thus/ bstan 'gro'i dpal du zhabs pad bskal brgyar brtan pa'i thugs 'dun gnang dgos gsungs pas/ a bdag gis ku re zhus pa yin gsungs kyang / don la ring min zhing brje
rgyu'i dgongs bzhes kho na mdzad/ de nas zhabs brtan lha khang du chibs bsgyur rjes/ nu bo kun dga'i mtshan can de nyid kyis de ring snga dro nas bzung ste jo lags kyi
mdzad spyod gang sa nas ha cang legs rgyu ma byung / de 'dra gang yin nam gsungs shing / thugs ngal gyi rnam pa cung zad mdzad par grags shing / de nas zla ba de'i tshes
bcu gsum bcu bzhi tsam nas yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid cung zad sku khams nyog pa'i tshul gnang ste/ zhabs 'bring pa rnams kyis mjal phyag sogs bkag pa na/ rje'i gsungs
las da ni mjal zhu ba thams cad thongs shig gsungs pa bzhin btang ba nas/ rje nyid thugs rgyud 'jam zhing lhod pa dang kun la byams pa'i spyan gyis gzigs shing phyag dbang
byin rlabs gsung gleng sogs shin tu rgyas par gnang bas/ mjal mi thams cad kyi dga' mgur yi rang ba'i sems thob par mdzad do/ /de tshe zhag grangs bcu tsam yab yum sras
bcas lhan du bzhugs thog rje dam pa nyid nas rang bzhin gyi gsungs gleng dang / skabs re gad mo'i rnam 'gyur sna tshogs sogs dag snang dga' spros nyin mtshan 'da' ba
las/ snyung gzhi'i tshul dang zhal gdams bka' mngags sogs nii gsal bar ma gsungs/ yum sras thugs ngal gyur dogs dang zhabs brtan gsol btab yong dgongs pa gor ma chag nyer

gnyis snga dro'i steng gi bzhugs g.yab tu rgyun bzhin phebs bskul zhus pa la de ring rang re bzhugs g.yab tu mi 'gro gsungs nas ma phebs/ de tshe bdag khri mangga'i mtshan
can mchog nas/ de 'phral zhabs drung du phebs pa na gcung sku khams rnyog par gnang yang rang bzhin gyi gsung gleng sna tshogs pa'i gnas tshul kho na gsungs pa'i rjes/ thugs
sras dam mangga'i mtshan can nyid gzhi thog pho brang du byon par chas pa na/ yab rje dus gsum sgrib med du gzigs pa de nyid kyi bka' las/ spyir dus deng sang snyigs
ma lnga bdo ba'i dus su song bas yul khams bde min kyang sna tshogs yong ba ma zad/ khri chen bstan pa spyi dang bye brag gi don la thugs khur ha cang che bas cung zad 'o
brgyal che ba yong 'dra sems kyang / sngon byon dam pa gong ma rnam thar bzhin thugs ngal ma mdzad pa bstan pa'i zhabs tog hur bskyed gyis shig zhes pa sku tshe 'di nyid
kyi gsung gi mtha' mar bka' bstsal bas thugs mug mgul brnang bzhin du lha phyag dang bcas de ltar zhus chog pa nas skyabs rje nyid da dung bdag sogs bstan 'gro'i don du
zhabs pad yun brtan thugs bskyed mi lhod pa zhus gnang la/ nged na so rgas shing 'khogs pa 'di rkang bde lus bde rnam rig grung ba'i byis pa zhig nges par 'dod cing / khri
chen nyid kyang khri thog tu bzhugs ring gang cir lam 'gro che ba yong nges kyang / 'on kyang khri thog tu rgyun ring rang ma byed gsungs te/ gzhan gyis ma mngon pa'i lo
grangs zhig lung bstan kyang gnang tshod bcas bdag khri

mchog nas thugs smon dang bcas lha phyag grangs med phul dbu thug zhus nas/ gzhi thog pho brang du phebs pa'i de nub nam gyi phyed gang tsam gyi dus rgyal kun 'dus pa'i spyi
gzugs yab mchog dam pa de nyid rgyun gyi thugs dam nyams bzhes kyi mjug 'da' ka ma'i rnam 'byor gsal btab ste/ zag pa med pa'i dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings su thim tshul
bzhes pa'i mod la sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang / lhag par chos dung yid bzhin nor bu nyid skyes bu'i rtsol ba la ma ltos pa bzhugs sgam nang nas rang sgra cung zad
sgrogs pa'ang gzhan gyis thos pa byung zhing / de tshe bdag khri mangga'i mtshan can nyid gzhi thog tu thugs dam nyams bzhes rnams grol kyang srod phyi mo'i bar bzhugs
pas rgyal sgo brdung byung ba dang ngas byas 'u cag mi sdod 'gro gsungs gsum skas 'go ru phebs pa dang sku mched rje btsun 'phrin las dbang mo nyid nas/ skyabs rje dgongs
pa chos dbyings su thim tshul zhus te/ zhabs lhar phebs mtshams zhabs 'bring pa kun yi mug ches nas snying gi chu gter 'dren byed kyi lam nas lud de mya ngan ca co bung
ba tshang zhig lta bu gyur pa dang / yum sras rnams kyang thugs ngal tshad med kyi ngang nas rjes bzhugs zhabs tog dgongs rdzogs rnams sgrub pa la thugs gzhol ba'i ngang
nas thugs sras dam pa bdag khri mangga'i mtshan can nyid nas bka' bsgos te/ sku gdung rin po che'i spyan sngar mchod tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa phul te thugs smon dang
bcas sku phyag kyang mang du

mdzad cing / de'i sang nas bzung nyin gsum gyi ring / gdan gzhung / bla brang khag chos sde lho byang / nye 'khor chab 'bangs sogs nas dge 'dun bzhi grwa re tsam gdan zhus
kyis bla mchod cho ga mchod sprin rab 'byams gdung mjal bcas zhus shing / de skabs zhing gshegs gang de'i sngon srol bzhin rgyun gtan thugs dam gang mdzad rnams gsal 'debs
zhu po dam pa gang nyid kyi dbu bla smon lam bzang pos mdzad pa dang / sku gdung rin po cher mchod 'bul khrus gsol sogs kyang yang yang 'bul bar mdzad skabs/ sku gdung
de nyid nyin re bzhin je chung du gyur skabs dpon slob kyis de nyid kyi sku gdung rin po che ring bsrel gyi phung po bstan 'gro'i zhing mchog dam par bzhugs par gsol ba btab
pas/ mthar khru gang tsam zhig bzhugs pa de nyid/ zla de'i nang mchod tshogs ser phreng bcas kyis spyan drangs te dbu rtser 'jam dbyangs gzi 'od 'bar ba'i sku gam du
mchod sprin rgya mtshos brgyan pas rgyud sde nas gsungs pa'i dus mtha'i cho ga'i sgo nas byin zar zhugs sbyangs mdzad cing / de bar thugs sras yab rje dam par gsol 'debs
tshig don byin rlabs khul nyams che ba 'di nyid zhal 'don dang sku phyag grangs med mdzad tshul dang de tshe spur sbyong yam shing yang tsan dan dkar dmar a ka ru sogs kho
nas mdzad cing sa phyogs thams cad dri bzang gis khyab pa dang / nam mkha' 'ja' 'od kyis gang ba sogs byung zhing / zhugs sbyangs zin nas spur khang gi mtha' mar mchod

sprin gyis bskor nas gzhan su yang 'gro sa med pa'i mtshams bcad thog zhag 'ga' song nas spur khang zhal phye ste thugs sras mangga'i mtshan can mchog nas thugs smon dang bcas
spur rus rdog gcig bzhes pa de ni/ dbu thod kyi dum bu sor bzhi tsam gyi ldebs la 'jig bral rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug birWa pa'i bsrung ba thun min gnyis kyi sku'i rang
byon shin tu gsal bar byon pa rgyu mtshan 'di la brten nas/ da lta gdung rten gyi bum sgor rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi snang brnyan rten 'brel de la dgongs nas mdzad par
gleng ba dang / gzhan yang thub gnas bcu/ sgrol ma dkar ljang gur zhal gyi snang brnyan rang byon du ma grangs las 'das pa sku yi rten du byas pa dang / gsung rten du a
li ka li sogs yig 'bru rnam pa grangs med byon zhing / thugs rten du ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam/ mkhan chen byams pa bkra shis chos 'phel nyid kyi phyag tu babs pa khrus
gsol yang yang mdzad pas de las mang du 'phel ba'i lo rgyus kyang snang ba sogs ngo mtshar kyang mtha' klas pa byung 'dug pa bcas/ spur rus rnams mchod phreng dang bcas
pho brang du gdan drangs te yang yang sku khrus gsol zhing mchod sprin dang bcas 'gyangs tsam bzhugs pa dang / de nas lha bla'i lung bstan bzhin chos lhun o rgyan lha khang
du spur rus mchod sprin dang bcas pa gdan drangs te/ rin chen lnga dang sman phye sogs dang bcas dam pa'i spur rus rnams gad gtsang btul te/ rje btsun 'chi med bstan pa'i
sgron ma sogs las can rnams nas/

bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems chos srung nor lha sku spar ji snyed bskrun te tshang mar gser gsol dang bcas rab gnas bsdus tsam gnang nas mchod sprin dbus su bzhugs
su gsol/ de ltar sku spur phebs nyin dang dgung zhag so sor mang 'gyed dang skyabs mgon rgyal dbang yab sras kyis mtshon bla sprul khag la bsngo rten dang dgon khag du mar
dgongs rdzogs rgya cher gnang tshul zhib tu rtogs par 'dod na/ nang chen bla ma dpal bzang rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad pa'i yab rje mchog gi rnam thar dang / der ma gsal ba
rnams de skabs kyi tho gzhung sogs las rtogs par bya ba kho na las 'dir yig tshogs ha cang mang bas ma bris shing / spur tsha sku spar sogs bzhugs pa'i nang rten rnam rgyal
mchod rten gser dngul sbrags ma khri gdan man chad gser zangs las grub pa rgyu tshogs che zhing bzo legs pa/ da lta lha thil gdung rten nub du grags pa'i byang ngos bzhugs
pa 'di bzhin thugs sras bdag khri mangga'i mtshan can mchog nas gsar bzhengs mdzad pa de'i nang gzungs la bla chen 'phags pa rin po che'i dngos slob zhang brtson 'grus
'bar ram 'jam dbyangs sngon por grags pas bla chen 'phags pa rin po che'i gdung khang kha ma phye ba la yus kyi ngang phyag gyang 'gyel ba ltar 'tshal te gsol ba btab/
gdung khang nas sol ba dang spur rus sbrel rtog gcig 'phur byung ba la slar gsol ba btab ste/ sol ba rnams sor mos brad pas spur rus la rigs lnga'i bzhengs sku shin tu
gsal ba rang byon du

byon pa de nyid thub pa'i dngul sku khru gang tsam gcig gi nang bzhugs pa de nyid dus phyis ngor e waM thar rtser byung ba/ thar rtse nam mkha' 'chi med kyis 'jam mgon kun
blor phul ba khyad 'phags byang du bzhugs pa 'khrul med rtsa chen de nyid gdung rten 'di nyid kyi bum nang gzungs gzhug gi gtso bo bzhugs pa'i ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi dang
/ gong gi spur tsha sku spar sogs gong 'og ma 'khrul ba bzhugs pa dang / sngon byon gong ma'i phyag len bzhin dri med rnam gnyis dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod grangs mang dang
'grel ba'i steng srog shing 'dzugs chog dang zhabs su gnod sbyin 'khor lo'i mthar rten pa bzhugs pa'i gtsug lag khang du sa rgyan gnam rgyan nor bu'i dra phyed rgyab
yol lam shog par grags pa rnams gos bzang 'ba' zhig las grub pa gdung rten bum long sogs la rin chen du ma'i do shal phra rgyan gyis phyug pa/ mchod rdzas dngul gyi maNDal
shin tu che ba dngul ting 'gyer kha tsha gser ma re la 'bru bre lnga tsam 'gro tshod bdun tshar sogs/ mdor na dgongs rdzogs kyi 'gro song tshang ma de dus dngul thog phab
pa dngul srang lnga stong brgal tsam zin 'dug kyang / deng sang yin na dngul srang nyis khri tsam gyi tshad gnas shing / gzhan yang lo dus kyi dgongs rdzogs snga dus bde
kyai gsang gsum 'jigs byed rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma gshed dmar phur pa gtso bo bcas dang / chos sde lhor tshe chog rnam rgyal kun rig sogs chog mang gzhir bzhag mdzad
de/ tshul grol yang bdun gcig tsam gnang ba yin

tshod dang phyis su byang pa tshogs yongs nas rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod dang brag bya skyed lhas pa rnams nas nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub mchod dang dus chen skabs gser
tshogs sogs sngon lam dang zla dus kyi mchod pa ban tshang pas bla mchod bcas 'dzugs par mdzad pa 'di rnams dang gdung rten gyi rab gnas sogs rdor slob thugs sras mangga'i
mtshan can nyid nas mdzad cing / rab ston sogs rgyas par mdzad tshul rnams gong yab rje dbang sdud snying po'i gdung rten gyi rab ston ji lta ba bzhin mdzad do/ /'di
dag kyang bla ma yongs bzung gi rgyud las/ bla ma 'das pa'i lo zla tshes grangs rnams/ /nges par bzung nas mchod pa byas gyur na/ /bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig dag ste/
/shin tu mi bzad gshin rje'i grong las thar/ /zhes rgya cher gsungs pa rnams thugs su 'chang ste thugs sras dam pa mangga lam ratna'i mtshan can nyid nas thugs khur cher
bzhes mdzad rkyen/ phyis kyi bdag khri zhig la 'di kho na dgongs rdzogs stobs che bar mngon no/ /de rnams kyi bdag chen yab rje padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gam/ kun dga'
bkra shis sam mthu stobs bstan 'dzin so so'i rtogs brjod sgro skur dang bral ba mdo tsam bstan zin no/ /5 kun dga' rin chen/de nas rgyal yum rta nag rang byon ma skal
bzang lha yi bde skyid bu

khrid kyi gdung sras gnyis pa yab rje kun dga' rinachen ni/ yab rje 'gro mgon dbang sdud snying po dgung grangs so gnyis pa kun dga' zhes pa shing pho stag gi lo'i zla tshes
la yum la gnod pa med par bde bar bltams shing / sku lus la raka zhag gi thig le thal chen gyi rgyas btab pa'i rjes dang / sku smad stag ris can 'khrungs tsam nyid nas
rang byung du yod par grags shing / dus mchod bla brang pa'i gdung rigs 'khrul med la de ltar byung lugs gsungs pa bzhin sku smad stag sham gyi rjes ni yab rje sku mched
sogs da bar gdung brgyud phal che bar yod tshul gsungs so/ /yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas mtshan ngag dbang kun dga' rin chen du gsol zhing / gzhan nas mtshan 'di la brten nas
sngags 'chang chen po dang sgar chen mthu stobs dbang phyug sogs kyi rnam 'phrul du'ang byed do/ /'khrungs ston sngon lam yul chen ban tshang pas mdos chen zab ris 'cham
gzigs dga' ston kyang gzab par gnang ngo / /'di sku na phra mo'i dus yab rje mchog nas dbang rjes gnang sogs dang khyad par gnas lnga rig pa'i ma ha paNDi ta kun dga'
bkra shis nyid gong yab rje padma'i mtshan can gyi rnam thar skabs su bshad pa bzhin sku mched rnams kyi yongs 'dzin du bsten te/ yi ge phyi mo 'bri klog snyan sum sogs rig
gnas la sbyangs pa rgya cher mdzad cing bar skabs rnams su yab rje sogs dam pa rnams las dbang khrid gdams pa mang du gsan tshul rnams sdeb gcig tu smos na/ yab rje rdo
rje

'chang dpal ldan chos skyong ngam dbang sdud snying po zhes rgyal dbang padma 'byung gnas dang zhal mi gnyis pa de nyid kyi zhal snga nas la thog mar grub pa'i slob dpon dzAe
ta ra'i lugs kyi rgyal dbang tshe dpag med lha dgu'i dbang dang man ngag gi lung khrid rdo rje phur pa'i stod las byang chub sgrub dbang dang / smad las drag po sgrol
dbang / mnga' bdag nyang gter gu ru drag dmar gyi dbang lung bcas/ dpal dges pa rdo rje rgyu dus kyi dbang chen rnams rdul tshon kyi dkyil 'khor du bstsal ba dang / slob
dpon spyod pa ba'i lugs kyi 'khor lo bde mchog rwa lugs 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum ma/ rta mgrin yang gsang lha dgu rnams kyi dbang chen/ tshe rta zung 'brel/ grub rgyal ma'i
lugs kyi tshe dbang byang gter tshe dbang lcags sdong ma/ ras chen dpal 'byor bzang po'i nye brgyud tshe dbang mda' 'phel ma 'bri khungs dag snang sgra mi snyan rnams kyi
tshe dbang sbub lugs byad grol/ 'phags yul gyi grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i byin rlabs rjes gnang zur bka' gsan gras/ 'jam dbyangs dmar ser dang / smra seng / 'jam
nag rta mgrin gsang sgrub/ gtum po khyung lnga/ gser chos khyung khra/ so 'breng dkar mo/ sman bla mched bdun/ rme brtsegs dud kha/ rnam rgyal lha dgu rnams kyi rjes gnang
rnams dang / bstan srung dpal ldan lha dmag zor rgyal mo'i rjes gnang / rtsi dmar srog gtad bcas yab rje sku mched nas yab kyi drung du gsan nges dang / smin gling 'dod
'jo bum bzang gi dbang lung yongs rdzogs gsan nam snyam/

yang gal te gsan med tshe de'i nang nas drang srong log tri pa li'i srog gtad bcas sku mched gnyis char nas nges gsan dang yum mchog skal bzang bde skyid bu khrid las bo dong
lugs seng gdong nyer lnga'i dbang lung gsan pa bcas dang / sa chen kun dga' blo gros kyi zhal snga nas/ gsung ngag rin po che gsang chen slob bshad kyi gdams pa gdul bya
skal ldan 'ga' zhig la stsol skabs/ dag snang du rje nyid la zhal slob tu ka gzhi gdung brgyad byung ba lha blas dngos su lung bstan pa bzhin gdan sa 'di nyid du gsang
chen slob bshad kyi ka ba 'degs pa'i khur bzod pa rje btsun rdo rje bdag med ma nyid mi mo'i tshul can rnam pa sdom brtson ngur smrig gi gos kyis mdzes pa rje btsun rnal
'byor dbang mo 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma'i zhal snga nas las/ gtso bo gsung ngag rin po che gsang chen slob bshad chos skor cha lag dang bcas pa 'jam mgon kun blo'i gsan
yig bzhin yab rje sku mched gnyis char dpon slob kun bkras bcas nas gsan tshul 'di la brtags na/ dpon slob kun bkras nas sa chen kun blo las slob bshad ma gsan pa yin nam
brtag/ gzhan yang birWa pa'i lam 'bras chung ba grags pa gshed dmar lha lnga'i dbang dang shin tu spros med kyi nyams khrid rgyab rten lung dang bcas pa/ rwa lugs 'jigs
byed/ rwa khrid dbang byin rlabs rjes gnang las gshin rigs gsum 'khor mang rnams kyi rjes gnang / rwa spos dkar chag zin pa dang ma zin pa dpal 'dzin pod chung gi lung
bcas

gsan yig bzhin dang / gser chos mkha' spyod skor gsum gyi byin rlabs dang / nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i nyams khrid rmong chen rje'i bka' chab bzhin/ mkha' spyod skor gsum char
gyi gdams skor lung dang bcas yongs rdzogs gsan/ gzhan yang spyod rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyai rdor bka' babs bzhin dpal chen yang dag gi dbang sogs dang gdan sa
'di nyid kyi 'don chog rnams kyi lung la sogs pa shin tu mang bar gsan/ rje btsun de nyid kyi gsan yul/ gong rnams kyi nang nas 'jigs byed gshed dmar skor sogs mus chen chos
nyid ye shes las dang / gzhan phal cher yab rje kun blo mchog nas gsan no/ / gzhan yang byang gter byin rlabs thugs dbang 'bring po/ ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gi bka'
'bum gyi lung sogs rgya cher gsan no/ /mchog gi rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun dga' bkra shis drung nas/ lam 'bras tshogs bshad cha lag dang bcas pa 'jam mgon kun blo sogs
kyi gsan yig bzhin dang / gser chos dmar po skor gsum rjes gnang rigs dang dkar chag gis zin pa dang ma zin pa'i gdams skor lung dang bcas pa/ bstan srung gur zhal rnam
gnyis dbang rjes gnang gdams khrid/ mgon pod me 'bar kha skong / snyan brgyud yang bskong dud pod zhal pod ha nag bcas yongs su rdzogs par gsan kyang bram ze mngag gtad sogs
rjes kha shas ma gsan pa mjug tu ngag dbang smin grol rgya mtsho las gsan dgos byung 'dug bstan srung dur bdag chos skor bcas

gong rnams nas gsung ngag dmar po skor gsum dur bdag rnams sa chen kun blo las dang / gur zhal rjes gnang rigs phal cher kun blo nas rin chen rgyal mtshan de las dang / be'u
bum rnams rin rgyan yan 'dra ba las/ de nas mnga' bdag byams pa bstan 'dzin las gsan 'dug rnam sras brgyud pa kun blo ma bzhugs pas rin rgyal las gsan 'dug gzhan yang spyi
bka' sgrub thabs rgya rgyam dang / zur bka'i rjes gnang gong yab rjer gsan pa rnams kyang bskyar gsan bcas deng skabs sgrub btus na bzhugs pa phal che ba gsan par gnang
/ dbang chen zur bka' bde mchog lu dril lus dkyil sogs dang / gsang 'dus rigs gsum 'jigs byed ro langs brgyad skor dgra gdong sogs gsan yod snyam dang / khro shul bla
ma ngag dbang smin grol rgya mtsho las klong chen snying thig gi skor dang / stobs 'phrog zhal bzhi pa'i rnam 'gyur bcu bdun gyi rjes gnang tshang ma yang bskyar gsan pa
sogs yongs 'dzin dam pa rnams las dus snga phyi gsan pa rnams 'dir sdeb gcig tu bkod pa rags tsam dang / de nas rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis sogs gdan sa 'di nyid na zhus/ kyai
rdor yab yum gsang bde 'jigs gsum nA ro mkha' spyod ma rdo rje phur pa chos skyong gur zhal rnal 'byor kun rig sogs kyi cho ga phyag len dbyangs rol gar 'cham chos spyod
rnams dang bcas pa gnas slob drung du sbyangs pa mthar phyin mdzad/ de re re bzhin yab rje rdo rje 'chang la rgyugs sprod 'bul bar mdzad de/ rtsa rgyud brtag

gnyis sogs gzhung 'don dang bla mchod sogs chos spyod sgrub mchod rigs dang gtor bzlog bskang ba bcas par tshogs phebs rtag par mdzad cing / nyid kyi dgung grangs bcu gsum
bzhes pa'i tshe 'jam mgon sa paN gyi chos khri thang mor cher gcen po dang lhan cig yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas khri 'don mdzad tshul gong gcen po'i rnam thar bzhin dang /
de mtshams nas sa skya pa'i 'byung po 'dul byed kyi bsnyen pa zla gang ma dang / de nas dges rdor gzhi bsnyen zla drug ma phur bsnyen zla gsum ma gur mgon brag rdzong ma'i
bsnyen pa zla ba gnyis tsam sogs kha skong bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bcas dus grangs mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa bcas gdan thog gcig tu mthar phyin pa mdzad skabs/ dgung grangs bco
lnga tsam du phebs pa sa sbrul sa ga zla ba'i tshes bcu drug la/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid snyigs lnga'i sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi ra bar ma chun pa spu dkar
bla brang gzhis su glo bur dgongs pa chos dbyings su thim pa'i tshul bzhes par/ gcen bdag khri padma'i mtshan can spu dkar gzhis su tab tab por phebs te/ mchod sprin dang
bcas gsol 'debs gdung dbyangs mdzad pa dang / yum sras lhan nas dgongs rdzogs spyi bye brag mdzad tshul rnams kyang gong du brjod pa ltar dang / rje 'di nyid nas kyang
gsol 'debs sgrub mchod mang du mdzad yod 'gro zhing / de ltar yab rje o rgyan gnyis pa dbang gi mtshan 'chang gdung rten gyi gcen dang lhan mdzad sgo rnams grub nas/ nyid
kyi dgung grangs bcu phrag

gnyis su ma zin tsam der/ dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sgrub mchod chen mo'i tshogs dbus sngon byon dam pa gong ma'i gsung rab legs bshad kyi skyes snyan tshig gi lam las drangs
pas gzur gnas rnams kyi snying gi padmo ches cher bzhad par mdzad/ de mtshams nas dam pa gong ma'i phyag srol mdos chung du grags pa mgon po khro bcu dang drug bcu
ma sku rim chen mor grags pa'i phur bzlog dus mchod mdo sde lha mchod du gnod sbyin tsi'u dmar po'i gtor bzlog rnams sngon du bsnyen pa kha gso zhag bdun re gnang / dngos
gzhi gtor bzlog rnams shar sbyangs tsam ma yin par rdzas sngags dmigs pa ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas sngon byon gong ma'i phyag len mtshams tshul dbyangs rol gar 'cham
mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing / brjid chags pa dam can rnams mnyes shing dgra bgegs skad cig la spa bkong ba mdzad pa dang / de mtshungs lo mjug dpal mgon zhal bzhi pa'i sgrub
bsnyen zla ba gnyis tsam sngon 'gro'i rgyal zla'i mjug zor 'phen lugs mthun bka' drin bskyangs ba dang / de nas bsam brling du dmag zor ma'i gtor bzlog dang / lha mo
rje khol zung gi mdos sgrub de nas gnyan mgon gyi dam tshig bskang ba bcas kyi slob dpon rnams rim mdzad kyi phyag len sogs bstan pa'i mig rgyan la phan par mdzad/ de nas
phur sgrub dang dus mdos chen mo sogs kyi slob dpon rim bzhin mdzad dam snyam/ de nas dgung grangs nyer brgyad pa chu lug lo lha ldan rgyal khab chen por gcen po

bdag khri mchog dang mnyam du khri phebs gsar mjal du phebs te/ gong sa lha mi'i rnam 'dren chen po rgyal dbang tshul khrims rgya mtsho dang srid skyong smin gliing pa sogs
mjal phyag ji ltar mdzad tshul rnams dang / dbus lhor gnas rten mjal mchod 'bul sogs dang / yar lam paN chen rin po che blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi ma'i mjal phyag sogs ji
ltar mdzad tshul rnams gong gcen po'i lo rgyus skabs bzhin dang zhib tu rtogs par 'dod na dbus phebs de skabs kyi bca' yig yab rje pad ma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gis mdzad
pa'i blang dor gsal ba'i me long bzhin dang de dang ring min rje nyid nas phun tshogs pho brang gsar bskrun gyis der bdag yum nyi zla dbang mo dang bcas bzhugs rgyu'i sgo
dod cing/ 'di skabs tsam la ji skad du/ ye shes lha la rtog pa mi mnga' yang / /de'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i dam can rnams/ /zhes sogs gsung pa lta bus zhabs 'bring pa dag gi
byed pas sku mched bar phran bu'i sel zhugs byung ba yin shag sku zhang rta nag rang byon sa dbang nas bar sdum gyi don snying bla brang so sor bzhugs kyang sa gzhung dang
thugs 'dod gcig gyur dgos pa dang bdag 'gan 'khur sku thog dus gcig gi bgres pa kho nas bzhes dgos pa sogs dang / de skabs kyi phan tshun bar dkrug shing byas te se ra'i
drung rams pa zhes pa'i rkang nywa bregs shing kun byang rgya bla ba sogs 'ga' zhig gdan sar yong mi chog pa sogs mdzad tshul yongs grags dang sdum khra 'dra

gnyis so sor dam phrug sbyar ma yod skad kyang / 'dra gcig de skabs yig tshang bka' khong na yod tshul gleng ba las da lta ni gar yod mi snang / de skabs tsam la yin nam gcung
po kun rin nyid sa mdzod las 'khur mdzad cing / dngos dpal legs nas gnyer 'khri las 'khur gnang ste sku ngo rang so sor phebs pa lo shas mdzad tshul gleng ba yang thos
shing rje de nyid kyis btab pa'i phun pho bla brang sngon yod de bzhin sgrol stong 'dra cog zhig gi shod kyi bka' 'gyur lha khang ka drug tu grags pa dang / o rgyan lha
khang nas rje de nyid nas gsar bzhengs gser dngul dra ma'i gu ru rin po che gtso 'khor gsum dang / sman 'dam las grub pa'i gu ru mtshan brgyad/ yab rje dpal ldan chos skyong
lnga rig kun bkras sogs kyi 'dra sku sogs bzhugs pa dang de'i phur dbang khang bcas dang / de'i lhor mgon khang mdo phugs can gyi nang me ris 'bur dod kyi dbus na bzhugs
pa'i dpal ldan lha mo rje khol zung gi sku sman 'dam las grub pa/ 'khor rnams kyi zhal 'bag dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs rnams la ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi dang

tshe sgrub rigs kha shas dang gur drag

dmar khyung khra nag sogs bsnyen mtshams mdzad skad la/ gur drag bsnyen mtshams rig 'dzin pho brang du gnang tshod kyi kha skong sbyin sreg skabs nyin cig lha chen lcags ri
steng phebs skabs shig gsham gyi nyi zla dge legs zhes pa'i gling der dmar skyur thab gzhob cung zad shor kyang rma shu sogs klu nad tshabs chen gtong sa'i klu bdud gdug
pa can zhig gnas pa'i rten khang 'gram der dngos su gzigs pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis sa phag chag dum zhig 'phang par mdzad pa klu de bros nas khang gzugs der thim song
ba dang / sa phag gyis kyang rjes bsnyegs te klu khang der dngos med thim pa nas bzung / deng sang gi bar la klu bdud kyi gnod ming yang mi grags pa sogs grub mtshan kyang

bskor sogs la thengs 'ga' re chibs 'grul gnang ba dang / de skabs phun pho bka' 'gyur du grags pa gdung brgyud rnams dang chos sde lho byang tshogs yongs rnams nas rgyal

mchod zur bzhugs bgres po rnams dang / brag skyed rnams nas nyang lugs gu ru drag dmar gyi sgrub mchod sogs snga phyir bka' 'gyur dang bstun nas nyin bzhir mdzad srol

'di bzhin gsar 'dzugs kyi bsnyen bkur mchod sprin sogs zab tu mdzad pa dang / zor 'phen nyin sngon dus dmag zor gtso mo dang dus bzhi lha mo tsam las med tshul zer ba 'khor
gzhan rnams rjes su 'phar bar mngon/ 'di skabs tsam la zhabs lha'i bka' 'gyur du grags pa da lta sa gzhung nas gtong ba rgyal chen bse khrab pa'i gtor bzlog 'di yab rje
padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gi sku dus la byung zhing / gzhan yang de skabs tsam la rig 'dzin pho brang gi bka' 'gyur zhes pa dang / de'i mjug tsam la phun tshogs gling gi

pa dang/ gzhan pa'i kyai rgyud lam gyi dbang dang phur dbang stod smad las/ gu ru drag dmar byin

nyams bzhes phur chung gtor bsngo

chen mo bskang ba rgyas bsdus gang rung res dang brgyad/ bcu bzhi/ nyer gsum/ nyer drug nas bzung gnam gang bar la dus gtor rnams yab mes gong ma'i phyag len bzhin mdzad pa

de/ nang rten du da lta lha chen khyams stod kyi byang ngos na bzhugs pa'i rgyal yum myur mdzad lha mo'i snang brnyan rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa gser zangs kyi pad gdan

phyag len gdangs dbyangs rol sogs la brdar sha gcod par mdzad cing / nyid kyi dgung grangs brgyad du phebs pa'i tshe/ 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i chos khri mkhas pa zil gnon du grags

du grags pa'i ja
