nyer drug pa chu mo lug gi lor gcen po sku mched dbus phebs skabs/ rje nyid nas gdan sa 'di nyid kyi khri tshab mdzad de gtso bor chos sde lho byang las khungs khag gi sgrigs
lam kun spyod rnams la dag zhur yang yang mdzad de/ khrims 'khur rnams la bya dga' dang khrims 'gal byed par chad las dran 'dzin sogs kyang cung zad gnang ngam snyam
zhing / de nas ring min dbus phebs 'khor te/ rje nyid phun bder bzhugs te thugs gnyer dang gsan sbyong bsnyen sgrub sogs la thugs gzhol skad dang / tshe dbang byad grol
rta phyag khyung gsum gur drag sogs rjes gnang 'ga' zhig lam 'bras dbang lung nyams khrid sogs 'chad spel ni che bar ma gnang zhing / phebs 'grul lan kha shas phebs tshod
dbus gnas lho mjal bskyod du phebs skabs shig la gzhung sa mchog sogs gzhan zhus dang rang nyid kyi dgongs dpyad ji ltar yin rung chos 'khor dpal gyi bsam yas su rab gnas
rgyas par mdzad dus nam mkha' 'ja' sprin gyis gang zhing / me tog gi char bab/ 'od gsal gyi snang ngor slob dpon rin po ches zhal dngos su

bstan cing lung bstan dbugs dbyung bstsal ba byung zhing / dngos su dkor bdag bsam yas chos skyong chen pos 'phrin las ci gsungs 'grub pa khas blangs pa dang / de nas gdan
sar phebs nas phun bder bzhugs skabs rgyun du thugs dam gyi mthil gur drag mdzad cing / zla re bzhin yar mar gyi tshes bcu rnam gnyis sogs la byang gter thugs sgrub gsol
'debs le'u bdun ma tshogs mchod rgyun gtan mdzad tshul 'dug pa de lta'i skabs shig la 'od gsal dag pa'i snang bar/ padma 'od kyi zhing khams 'ja' 'od kyis gang ba dngos su
gzigs pa'i gzhal med khang brtsegs kyi nang du gu ru zhi drag sogs rtsa gsum rgya mtsho'i lha tshogs dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dang bcas pa gzigs snang du shar ba/ gdams pa dang
lung bstan sogs stsol yod 'gro yang lo rgyus gsal bar ma mthong zhing / gzigs snang de dag zhabs 'bring pa 'ga' zhig nas kyang mthong tshul zer ba brtag de lta bu'i slob
dponarin po ches dngos su rjes su bzung ba'i grub pa'i dbang phyug de nyid dgung grangs bdun cu don gnyis bar du bzhugs te gdul bya rnams gang la gang 'dul gyi tshul du
rjes su bzung / lo de nyid kyi zla ba brgyad pa'i tshes bco brgyad la gzugs sku'i bkod pa padmo bkod kyi zhing khams su bsdus pa'i tshul bstan to/ /dgongs rdzogs zhabs
'jug rnams phun bde bla brang nas phal cher phun phos yab rje kun rin gyi lam ltar 'grub par mdzad cing / nang rten du gu ru rin po che'i snang brnyan ngo mtshar che ba

rin chen sna tshogs kyi phra rgyan bcas da lta lha chen khyams stod kyi mchod sdong 'dzam gling 'od gsal gyi g.yas phyogs ngos kyi ka drung na bzhugs pa/ 'di bzhin ring bsrel
rnam bzhi spyi dang bye brag gi gzungs brdzang rab gnas rgyas pa mchod tshogs bcas bzhugs pa 'di nyid yin cing lo dus kyi mchod pa de snga chos byang tshogs yongs nas
dges rdor sgrub mchod tshul grol nyin lnga zab ma dang / chos lhor dus chen dang / bzang gos 'ba' zhig gi mchod phreng bcu gcig mtshan pa zhabs bskor rgyas pa bcas mdzad
pa/ gzhan yang rje de nyid kyi gdan sa lta bu chos 'khor lhun po'ang sngon skyabs rje de rang bzhugs dus bka' 'gyur gsung sgrogs sogs lo ltar gnang ba dang / dgongs rdzogs
dges rdor sgrub mchod da lta'i bar yod skad thos pa bcas/ de rnams kyi mgon po dngos grub dpal 'bar gyi rtogs brjod rnam thar sgro skur dang bral ba cung zad spros zin
to/ /7 ngag dbang kun dga' rgyal mtshan/de nas yang bdag chen dpal ldan chos skyong ngam dbang sdud snying po'i btsun mo yongs grags kyi gsum pa/ rta nag rang byon ma bgres
gzhon gnyis las chung ba rgyal yum dam pa dam tshig sgrol ma las rigs myug gnyis 'khrungs pa'i che ba 'khon gdung ngag dbang kun dga' rgyal mtshan nam rin chen tshul khrims
dbang phyug tu grags pa ni/ yab rje dbang gi

mtshan can nyid dgung grangs zhe gcig tu phebs pa rnga chen zhes pa chu pho byi lo'i zla tshes dge bar/ dbus phebs skabs yab gzhis lha klu dga' tshal du yum la gnod pa med
pa bde bar sku bltams pa na/ mtshan ngag dbang kun dga' rgyal mtshan rin chen tshul khrims dbang phyug tu yab rje mchog nas gsol bar mdzad/ rje btsun sa skya pa'i bstan 'dzin
ngor rdzong rnam gnyis las/ rdzong lugs su grags pa'i nang tshan gong dkar ba kun mkhyen rdo rje gdan pa kun dga' rnam rgyal gyi yang sprul du ngos 'dzin mdzad cing
/ gzim chung nang mjal skabs gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang 'jam dpal rgya mtsho'i zhabs drung du gtsug phud phul te/ sku pang du bzhes te mnyes mnyes
mdzad nas mtshan ngag dbang dge legs rgya mtshor gsol bar mdzad ces grags shing / 'khrungs bsangs dang / 'khrungs ston lha ldan rang du mdzad skad dang / de nas lho gnas
brgyud yum sras rnams gdan sar phebs skabs phebs byams zhu zhur grags pa 'di nyid byung tshod dang yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas bar lam yum sras gnyis char rkyen sel dbang
rjes gnang mang du gnang ste/ gdan sar phebs pa na ring min gnas lnga rig pa'i paNDi ta bal spel khang gsar ba kun dga' bkra shis de nyid gnas kyi slob dpon du bsgo gnang
gis yon tan gyi phyi mo 'bri klog sogs la brtson par mdzad cing yab mes gong ma'i bzhed srol phyin ci ma log pa gdan sa chen po 'di nyid kyi phyag len ltar rtsa rgyud brtag
gnyis kyi

gzhung dang chos spyod rab gsal brgyud 'debs chen mo'i chos spyod rigs dang bde kyai gsang gsum 'jigs byed nA ro mkha' spyod bdag med ma/ rdo rje phur pa/ chos skyong gur zhal
dang bcas pa'i mngon rtogs dkyil chog gtor bsngo bskang ba gtor bzlog rnams kyi chog gzhung rnams re re bzhin yab rje rdo rje 'chang dang bdag khri gcen po padma bdud
'dul dbang phyug sogs kyi sku mdun du re re bzhin rgyugs 'bul mdzad thog cho ga phyag len dbyangs rol gar 'cham phyag rgya bca' tshul tshun chad la chig rkya 'pher bar mdzad/
rgyud sgrub mchod dus gtor rnams dang gtor bzlog khag bcas kyi tshogs dbur phebs te/ rang gzhan thams cad dang ba 'dren par mdzad de kun gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nu dngos
kyi 'du shes bskyed par byung zhing yab rje rdo rje 'chang las snga phyir dbang lung mdor bsdus gsan tshul gong gcen po yab rje sku mched dang 'dra 'am snyam zhing / gzhan
yang gcen po sku mched sogs skyes chen dam pa rnams las dbang rjes gnang nyams khrid lung la sogs pa snga phyir gsan pa rnams sdeb gcig tu brjod na/ thog mar jo lags
gcen po padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gam mthu stobs bstan 'dzin bzang po'i drung nas/ snga phyir lam 'bras tshogs bshad cha lag dang bcas pa/ lam skor phyi ma brgyad pod
dmar ser gyi lung dang bcas pa/ rjes gnang spyi bka' ba ri brgya rtsa'am sgrub thabs brgya rtsar grags pa'i rjes gnang zur dka' 'jam dbyangs dmar ser/ smra seng / 'jam

dkar/ rnam rgyal lha dgu/ bza' yum/ sna tshogs yum/ khyung khra nag bcu gcig zhal/ gtsug 'bar/ phyag rdor/ 'jam nag gnad bcu gcig dang bcas pa 'od zer can/ 'byung 'dul/ ri
khrod ma/ mi g.yo ba dkar sngon/ dzam ser nag nor rgyun ser mo sogs mgon dkar seng gdong sngon mo sogs kyi rjes gnang dang / phur dbang stod smad gur drag rta mgrin yang
gsang gsang sgrub/ gser chos bcu gsum/ gur mgon khro bcu bka' srung rnams kyi rjes gnang yongs rdzogs gsan cing / gcen po kun rin drung nas rdo rje 'jigs byed rwa lugs kyi
dbang rjes gnang nyams khrid lung bcas cha tshang / mgon po'i rjes gnang rigs gsang khri me 'bar ma'i mgon pod rigs zhal gyi chos skor/ rnam sras skor/ dur bdag skor/ dzam
dmar nag gsang sgrub/ seng sgra/ jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig sogs gsan/ rje btsun grub pa'i dbang mo 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma'i sku drung du/ nA ro mkha' spyod kyi chos
skor mkha' spyod skor gsum gyi byin rlabs nyams khrid lung la sogs pa dang kyai rdor bka' babs bzhi/ sbyong rgyud dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang sogs gsan/ dpon slob
lnga rig kun bkras nas lam 'bras gsang chen slob bshad chos skor cha lag dang bcas pa dang / pod dmar ser pod nag sras don ma sogs lung rnams dang bcas pa yongs rdzogs dmar
po skor gsum/ dmar chung skor gsum rnams kyi chos skor sogs gsan/ zhe dgon mkhan po bsod nams dbang

phyug mdun/ bde mchog lo nag dril gsum lung dang bcas pa bde mchog bong zhal/ gsang 'dus 'jam rdor dang spyan gzigs rnams kyi dbang lung sogs gsan/ dga' ldan dpon slob bstan
pa'i rgyal mtshan mdun nas gsang 'dus 'phags lugs sa skya bka' 'bum lung sogs gsan yod dam snyam zhing / dpon slob shes rab 'od zer du grags pa las gur mgon khro bcu'i
rjes gnang brag rdzong ma phyi nang gsang gsum nyams khrid zhal shes dang bcas pa sogs dang rjes gnang zur bka' 'ga' zhig bcas gsan pa de dag ming tsam du mi 'gyur ched/
bsgom pas thugs nyams su bzhes pa'i tshul yang shrI he badzra dang / badzra ki la ya/ gur gyi mgon po rnams kyi gzhi'i bsnyen pa sbyin sreg dang bcas pa mthar phyin par mdzad
pa dang / gzhan yang 'byung po 'dul byed la sogs pa yi dam 'ga' zhig gi bsnyen sgrub kyang mdzad pa sogs mtha' yas shing / de ltar skabs su babs pa na gdan sa 'di nyid
na bzhugs pa'i rdo rje phur pa la sogs pa sgrub mchod rnams kyi rdo rje slob dpon mang du gnang ste/ skal ldan rnams smin grol gyi lam la 'god par mdzad cing / gzhan yang

rdul du brlags te/ sems rgyud byang chub kyi lam du bkri bar mdzad par las rim du grags pa rnams sla bcos dang babs col ma yin par phyag len rnam par dag cing / de dang de
la dgos pa'i dmigs rim rnams ma 'khrul zhing dngos gzhi dmigs med byang chub sems kyi rgyas theb pa'i 'dzin med kyi lta ba'i ngang du yun ring du 'jog pa/ rgyal bas rgyud

ba sogs dang / gzhan sgrub mchod dang las rim sogs kyi rdor slob gnang skabs sogs la yang 'di'i mtshon te shes par bya ba las 'dir yi

ge mang bas 'jigs pas brir ma lang ba dang / dbang chos gdams ngag 'chad spel rgya cher mdzad pa mngon te/ de'i sngon yab rje dbang gi mtshan can nyid zhing brje zin nas/ rje
nyid dang rgyal yum dam tshig sgrol ma rje btsun bcas bkras brtsegs nub 'dir bzhugs tshod/ bkras brtsegs shar mchod khang du grags pa rje dam pa nyid kyi sku dus su dbang
chos nyams khrid sogs gnang bar gsar 'debs mdzad pa bcas/ gsung ngag lam 'bras tshar bcu gsum tsam gsungs pa/ de lta bu re re gnang skabs sa dkar logs 'dir jo dar re
re 'dzugs par mdzad pas jo dar gyi grangs kyang de mtshungs yod 'dug pa dang / gzhan yang gser chos bcu gsum/ 'jigs byed/ mgon po gur zhal gyi mtshon pa'i dbang rjes gnang

pa'i skal dman rnams/ /rjes 'jug gtsug rgyan gtor ro bla ma rje/ /zhes sogs gsungs pa'i rgyu mtshan yang de ltar yin pa'i phyir ro/ /phyogs phebs sogs ni cher ma gnang

srung lam zab/ lam dus bcas thun gnyis re dang de steng bde mchog dril bu lus dkyil lam nA ro mkha' spyod kyi nyams bzhes gang rung bsnan pas bzhir grags pa bzhin dang

rigs bcas chag med gnang zhing zla re bzhin gyi brgyad/ bcu bzhi/ nyer gsum/ nyer drug nas gnam gang bar bcas dus gtor rnams dang bcas zhing ma brjes bar du chag med gnang
bar mdzad cing / bar skabs rnams su gdul bya rnams kyi skal ba dang bstun gong smos gsung chos rnams stsol bar mdzad cing / de lta ba'i bdag nyid chen po de nyid kyi
gsungs las skyes pa'i slob tshogs kyang mang du bskrun par mdzad/ kun gyi mchog ni 'khon ston grub pa'i dbang phyug ngag dbang rdo rje rin chen/ ngag dbang kun dga' theg

na bzhugs pa rnams

dang / gdan sa 'di nyid kyi mdo sngags chos sde nyi zla zung 'brel gyi mkhan chen byams pa bkra shis chos 'phel de nyid kyis mtshon de skabs kyi lho byang bgres gras phal che

grwa dmangs bgres pa'i gras phal che bar yang dngos slob du gyur ba dang / dngos su rtsod par mdzad pa dus gnas dang bstun pas ma mdzad mod/ don du sgrub byed kyi dngos stobs

bka' drin bskyangs shing / de rjes bde dges gsang gsum 'jigs byed bdag med ma nwa ro mkha' spyod/ kun rig rdo rje phur pa rnams kyi sgrub dkyil dang / chos skyong gur zhal

/ tsha lugs sgrol dkar gyi rjes gnang khrid lung / rdo rje 'jigs byed/ gur zhal gnyis dmar po skor gsum/ rnam sras rnams kyi chos skor/ dbang byin rlabs rjes gnang khrid
lung bcas cha tshang gzhung pod rnams kyi lung dang sngags 'chang yig steng nas gur lha brgyad/ zhal bzhi snyan dus/ dmag zor ma/ dur bdag pu tra'i zur bka' dang / ming
sring gsum/ bran bdud/ dkar bdud rnams kyi rjes gnang / lha chen chos spyod rab gsal/ brgyud 'debs rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub dkyil rgyas pa dang bsdus pa phur chung du
grags pa/ gtor bsngo chen mo'i bskang ba/ 'go lugs stod sogs kyi lung / phur bzlog dang drug cu ma'i lung sogs ngor chen bka' 'bum pod bzhi'i lung / byang gter byin rlabs
thugs dbang klong chen snying thig chos skor pod dang / seng gdong nyer lnga'i lung sogs gsan/ dbon ngag dbang kun dga' rgyal mtshan las lam 'bras slob bshad cha lag bcas
cha tshang pod ser pod

dmar pod nag ma/ lam bskor phyi ma brgyad sogs kyi lung / bya rgyud tshe dpag med lha dgu gsang 'dus rigs gsum/ bde mchog lo dril gnyis/ dril bu lus dkyil/ bde mchog bong zhal
rnams kyi dbang chen gtum mo khyung lnga/ 'od zer can ma gtso rkyang / gtsug 'bar/ phyag rdor/ u rtsa/ seng gdong nags sgrol/ rta mgrin zla rgyal lugs/ jo lugs dzam dkar
lugs kyi rjes gnang sgrub lung / khyung khra nag gi rjes gnang sgrub skor lung / 'jam dpal dkar po'i rjes gnang sgrub skor lung bcas gser chos bcu gsum nang tshan mkha'
spyod skor gsum gyi byin rlabs nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i khrid sogs chos skor cha tshang gzhung pod lung mgon po brag rdzong phyi nang gsang gsum nyams khrid dang / mgon
pod me 'bar ma'i lung / khyung dmar rjes gnang sgrub lung / khyung khra'i rjes gnang thun min gnyis/ beg rtse 'khor mang dang / lcam sring gnyis kyi rjes gnang / beg pod
lung / dur bdag pod lung / phyag rdor khang rtsegs dang zhang blon rjes gnang / jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang / klu dbang lha lnga/ khyung khra/ 'jam dkar/ mi
g.yo ba/ sgrol dkar rnams kyi lung/ rtsi dmar srog gtad sogs gsan/ rje btsun rmol drung 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma'i drung tshe sgrub kyi gdams pa thun mong ma yin pa/ grub
rgyal gling pa pad rgyal gyi don du sngags 'chang chen pos yi ger bkod pa'i sgom lung 'jam dbyangs dmar ser/ 'jam nag gang blo ma/ 'byung 'dul/ khro mo sme brtsegs/ bcu
gcig zhal gtso 'khor lnga/ ri khrod ma ser mo rnams kyi rjes gnang /

dbu ma'i lugs kyi sems bskyed blo sbyong zhen pa bzhi bral gyi khrid lung bcas dges rdor bka' babs bzhi/ yang dag me dgu rnams kyi dbang birWa pa nyid kyi lam 'bras chung bar
grags pa shin tu spros med kyi dbang byin rlabs khrid lung la sogs pa chos skor cha tshang / rnal 'byor rgyud sbyong rgyud dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi dbang dang / phyag
rdor 'chi bdag 'joms pa lha bcu gsum ma dang / ngan song sbyong ba brgyud pa lnga ldan kun rig gnyis kyi dbang / 'jigs byed sa lugs ro langs brgyad skor gyi dbang / lam
'bras kyi brda tshig rgyud thun mong ma yin pa'i byin rlabs a mes zhabs kyi seng sgra'i cho ga chab klu gtor gyi lung sogs gsan/ ngor pa dpon slob ngag dbang bzang po las
spyi bka' rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang zhe gnyis steng kri ya nas gsungs pa'i dge legs su byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum bsnan pas dkyil 'khor zhe lnga'i dbang chen/ zur bka' bya
rgyud rigs gsum spyi/ spyod rgyud 'jam dbyangs dmar ser a ra pa tsa na lha lnga/ mi 'khrugs lha dgu/ bcu gcig zhal lha so bdun/ gzungs grwa lnga/ gdugs dkar lha nyer bdun/
phyag rdor 'gro bzang lugs/ 'jigs byed rwa lugs ro langs brgyad skor/ dgra nag lha bcu gsum/ bde mchog mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho/ bde mchog dril bu lugs lha lnga/ ku ru
kulle lha lnga/ bla med gur so gnyis bcas kyi dbang chen rnams dang / rjes gnang spyi bka' sgrub thabs rgya mtshor grags pa/ sgrub thabs brgya dang zhe gnyis/ rjes gnang
brgya dang so brgyad/ snar

thang brgya tshar grags pa rjes gnang so gnyis/ sgrub thabs brgya rtsa yod/ gong sgrub thabs brgya rgyam dang snar thang brgya rtsa sogs rgya gzhung rnams kyi lung bcas zur
bka' gnyan sgrol/ klu dbang lha lnga/ dbyangs can dkar mo/ 'jam dpal shes rab 'khor lo/ phyag rdor gos sngon can/ bla med sgrol ma nyer gcig tshe dpag med dkar po/ gnas
bcu phag dkar shes rab gsal byed/ klu pa'i gser chos seng sgra/ 'byung 'dul/ sems dpa' gsum rtsegs/ ba ri mgon rkyang / lcam dral lha gsum/ lha brgyad/ dud sol gsang sgrub/
bran bdud thun min gnyis/ pu tra thun min gnyis/ legs ldan mched gsum/ las gshin rigs gsum sogs kyi rjes gnang / gzhan yang 'dod rgyal gsang sngags sgra/ sgrol dkar bka'
babs dgu ldan/ dpal mgon rtsegs zhal can/ seng gdong dmar mo/ tshe ring mched lnga/ legs ldan stag zhon lha mo/ thugs chen phyag chen zung 'jug dbyangs can dmar mo/ rta
mgrin grub rgyal lugs/ sgrol ma dmar mo rnams kyi rjes gnang / 'jigs byed dug dbang / rten 'brel srung ba'i byin rlabs/ ngor chen dkon mchog lhun grub kyi bka' 'bum gsum/
kun mkhyen rin po che'i sngags 'bum tshang ma'i lung / bka' gdams lha bzhi'i rjes gnang khrid bcas dang / sgrol ma'i rmi lam rtags sgrub kyi lung / jo nang grol mchog
zhabs kyi khrid brgya yongs rdzogs sogs gsan/ yongs 'dzin ma ti ya mu 'dra las/ sgrol dkar bka' babs dgu ldan gyi rjes gnang tshe sgrub zhag bdun ma/ sems tsam lugs kyi sems
bskyed/

bya rgyud dri med rnam gnyis kyi dpyal lugs phag mo skor gsum gyi byin rlabs/ tshe dpag med sprul sku/ nor rgyun ma ser mo/ don zhags lha lnga/ las gshin rigs rnams kyi rjes
gnang / shangs chos ni gu chos drug gi dbang lung byin rlabs khrid lung bcas tshang ma/ gsher dmar spros med kyi khrid/ de skor bskyed rdzogs sgrub dkyil mtshams kyi lung
/ spyan gzigs tshoms bu lugs kyi dmar khrid skor yig lung chos dbang / thugs chen 'khor ba dong spug gi byin rlabs/ sa chen gong ma lnga'i bka' 'bum tshang ma/ mtshan
nyid gzhung grags chen bco brgyad/ dges rdor rnam bshad/ gsang sngags mdzes rgyan/ snang mtha'i nyal 'pho/ spyan ras gzigs kyi mig 'byed/ kun bkras gsur bsngo/ rong ston
gyi yum la gnang ba'i 'pho dmigs rten rdor gyi thugs chen 'pho dmigs rnams kyi lung dang / sa chen kun blos mdzad pa'i ma Ni'i bzlas lung bcas gsan/ rig 'dzin snying ri khri
chen mthu stobs bstan 'dzin las/ gong du 'jam mgon kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyi gsan ma thub pa'i beg pod kyi 'phro dang de'i gter ma'i skor rnams gsan pa bcas 'jam mgon
kun blo man nas dus phyis byon pa'i gdung rgyud zhig la 'di rang gsan rgya che bar/ kun gzigs 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang po dang / gzim 'og mchog sprul bstan 'dzin
snyan grags sogs kyis kyang bsngags brjod mdzad par grags 'dug de ltar thos bsam mdzad pa de dag bsgom pas nyams su bzhes tshul yang thog mar rdo rje gur

gyi rgyud nas gsungs pa'i sa skya pa'i yab mes kyi phyag len bzhin phyag rdor 'byung 'dul gyi bsnyen pa zla gang ma bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bcas dang / yi dam kyai rdo rje'i gzhi
bsnyen zla drug/ yab chos rnying ma rdo rje phur pa'i bsnyen pa zla gsum ma/ gur mgon brag rdzong ma'i bsnyen pa zla gang lhag tsam rnams/ so sor sbyin sreg dang bcas
mdzad de/ bla ma gong ma'i dgongs rdzogs sgrub mchod so sor rdo rje slob dpon dang / phur sgrub tshogs dbus su gsung bshad dang gdan sa chen po 'dir rgyal bstan spyi dang
bye brag gi zhabs rim du lo ltar gnang ba'i rdo rje phur pa chos skyong gur zhal/ dmag zor ma/ gnod sbyin yang le be sogs gtor bzlog zor las pa/ mgon mdos lha mo rje khol/
mgon po zhal gyi dam tshig bskang gso sogs kyi rdo rje slob dpon rim par mdzad cing / de tsam zhig la yab rje rdo rje sku mched bka' gros kyis yab rje padma bdud 'dul
dbang phyug nyid bdag khri dgongs zhu dang / de mtshams gdung sras gsum khri 'don gnang rgyur sngar lam gzhung sa chen por snyan seng sgron phul mdzad de/ chu stag g.yul
thang 'ong phung la bstan srid je mthor gyur pa'i rten 'brel du/ dar lcog che ba 'dzugs pa khrir phebs zhabs rim du bka' 'gyur gser chos klog 'don dang / ban tshang pas
phur bzlog sku rim chen mo bzhin/ lo dus kyi dus mdos chen mo 'gyangs te/ de'i tshab byang tshogs yongs phyed nas/ dmar chen gtor bzlog zab ma dang phyed nas 'char can zhal
gyi gtor

bzlog sgrub 'phen mdzad pa dang / rgyal zla'i tshes gcig thog rtser lha bsangs rgyas pa dang / de grol nas tshoms chen lo gsar bzhugs gral rgyun bzhin gnang ba dang / zla mjug
dus mdos zab ma dang / gnam gang la bskang gso brgya tshar rje nyid dgung grangs nyer lngar phebs par chu yos rta yos rta zla'i tshes gcig la mgon po mnga' gsol lo gsar
bzhugs gral zab rgyas bcas/ 'jam mgon kun blo'i phyag deb dang me stag lo yab rje sku mched kyi lam bzhin mdzad skad dang / khri phebs dngos gzhi rta zla'i gza' tshes
dge bar sa tshogs su gzhis byes dge 'dun rnams tshogs pa dang / gang gi gsung rgyang grags su thos pa tsam gyi srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal las sgrol ba'i chos dung yid bzhin
nor bu'i gsung gi bskul ma thag thil pa dang lho byang las sne rnams zab phyogs bcas dang / gzhi thog tu 'ong ste 'jam mgon ngag dbang rdo rje rin chen/ 'jam dbyangs
kun dga' theg chen dbang sdud bkra shis rin chen/ 'jam dbyangs gzhon nu kun dga' bsod nams ni 'di skabs dgung grangs gnyis pa yin 'dug pas sras rdzis rgyab tu gdan drangs
pa yin tshod bcas/ na bza' sngags chas steng chos gos me long ma/ sa zhwa bcas gsol te/ phyag 'degs pa dang gdugs dkar khyer mi spos phor sogs drung 'khor rnams kyis bskor
zhing / phebs mjug tu sku ngo khag dang mkhan chen ban tshang pa sogs dang bcas de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'am nyi zla rgyu
skar

gyis bskor ba bzhin dal bus ltag sgo nas rim bzhin g.yas bskor gyis seng sgor brgyud shar sgo'i nang du gdung sras bgres pas zhabs g.yas bzhag pa dang / chos dung rin po cher
dung bshad byed pa rtse mthun dgos pa gong ma'i bla dung du grags pa sogs sngon lam bzhin mdzad de/ khri chen gyi mdun thad tsam du phyag gdan phul la phyag 'tshal grub
nas/ nub kyi sgo chung brgyud chos khri mkhas pa zil gnon gyi khar bzhugs 'khod grub nas chos spyod mtshams bzhag pa dang gsung rab zhal 'byed pa bdud bzlog dang bsngo
smon mdor bsdus grub nas 'jam mgon ngag dbang rdo rje rin chen gyis sems bskyed gsal 'debs pa sngar lam bzhin mdzad de 'jam dbyangs sa skya paNDii tas gsung rab thub pa'i
dgongs pa rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dbu'i mchod brjod nas sbyin pa'i phar phyin yan dang / nyin bar mar sku gsum ye shes kyi rnam bzhag yan chad/ nyin rjes mar rigs dang
dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i khyab bdag yab rje rdo rje 'chang padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug mchog kyang lhan phebs kyis chos khri'i dbus su bzhugs thog ngag dbang rdo rje
rin chen nyid nas sems bskyed gsal 'debs pa mdzad pa nas bzung mjug gi sbyar byang bar thugs thog nas ha cang myur ches pa dang ha cang dal ba dang tshig sgra mi dag pa dang
/ gcod mtshams log pa la sogs pa chos 'chad pa'i skyon rnams dang bral bar gsungs pas/ de 'dus mkhas rmongs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur ro/ /de skabs su gzhung

sa chen po/ bla brang rgyal mtshan mthon po ba sogs so so'i sku tshab rtse drung ched mngags kyis maNDal rten gsum 'gyogs dar nang mdzod so so nas bka' yig dang bcas dngos
po gser dngul bzang gos dar ras kyi tshan grangs sogs sngon lam bzhin spam mtho ba'i gnang skyes dang / gzhan yang sku bzhengs rigs/ sde dpon khag dang / rang khongs bla
khag lha mi sde bcas phyogs mtha'i sa dgon khag bcas nas sngar lam 'char 'phar legs 'bul dngos skyes ngal sos dbang po'i gan mdzod la co 'dri ba lta bu byung ba sogs yab
rje rdo rje 'chang nas yongs su bsngo ba'i rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa skabasa'adir lha khang khag dang / mgon khang rnams dang bcas sna lnga'i mchod sprin rgya che ba dang
mnga' zhabs sogs mi dmangs gang yod la sngar lam 'bru 'gyed dgos pa 'di skabs gnyer dpon dge 'dun yar 'phel zhes pas shar sgo'i phyi bzo khang mdun 'bru spung ha cang khyon
che ba'i khar gnyer dpon las bcas gdan brgyab ste/ bsdad thog bshams nas tshogs pa dang / mi mang khri phrag tu longs par 'bru ji tsam brgyab kyang / gnyer las rnams kyi
gdan la tho reg gang yang ma byung ba 'phro lhag 'bor chen bsdu rgyu byung tshul/ de skabs kyi bgres po rnams kyi gsung rgyun las byung ba ltar dang / de nas yab rje mchog
dang mkhan chen dpon slob ban tshang pa bcas chos khri'i mdun du bzhengs te maNDal rten gsum bkra shis rdzas rtags rgyal srid sna bdun gyi bshad pa dang zhabs brtan
shis brjod/ gtso thabs

pas zhwa g.yab dang ki sgra pho brang du phebs tshul bcas 'khod min la ma ltos par de snga me stag lor yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched kyi lam ji lta ba bzhin mdzad nas/ ngag
dbang rdo rje rin chen nyid tshoms dmar du rgyan 'grem dang bcas bla chen 'phags pa rin po che'i bzhugs khri padma can la mnga' gsol te/ yab rje sku mched/ bla khag lha
sde mi sde bcas nas legs 'bul sogs sngon lam bzhin mdzad grub mtshams/ nye 'khor sogs chos gzhi so so'i gzhas dang / gzigs 'bul rigs rim bzhin zla gcig lhag tsam gyi ring
la phul yod cing / ring min gcen po bdag khri rdo rje rin chen mchog dang/ 'jam dbyangs theg chen dbang sdud bkra shis rin chen sku mched gnyis rgyal khab chen por gsar
mjal zhu bar sngar lam phyag gnyer ban tshang pa ja yas ja mas sogs sku 'khor rnams dang bcas tshal bzhag so sor sgar sgrigs kyis chibs bsgyur tshul rnams chu lug yab
rje sku mched kyi phebs lam ji lta bar mdzad tshul lha ldan du bzhugs mtsher gang du gnang mi gsal yang gzhung sa mchog nas thab bsu phebs bsu rtse shod mgron gnyer so so'i
ja zhus mtshams dar bcas bstsal ba dang / de nas ring min de dus kyi gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang mkhas grub rgya mtsho dang srid skyong mtsho smon
gling pa ngag dbang 'jam dpal tshul khrims rgya mtsho zung gi mjal phyag khri mjal rnams rim par mdzad de/ maNDal rten gsum mjal dar dngos skyes kyi 'bul tshan sogs sngar
lam bzhin

phul thog rtse shod so so nas gsol ston dang bzhugs mtsher du snga bar phyi gsum gyi zung chas rgya che ba dang de nas ring min thon phyag thog mjal slog thon gnang dang /
thab skyel ja zhus mtshams dar phebs skyes bcas gsol bstsal rnams dang bcas pa nye dus chu lug lam ji lta ba bzhin yin 'dug cing / lha ldan du jo shAka rnam gnyis dang rtse
po ta la bcas par mchod 'bul gnas gzigs sogs mdzad/ gzhung sa'i zhabs brtan sogs thon pa gzhir grub kyang 'di nang ma gsal ba nas lho gnas brgyud gdan sar phebs cing 'di
skabs tsam la mdo smad phyogs nas kun gzigs 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang po mchog dang / dpal rgyun gyi dbang po'i chos grwa nas gzim 'og sprul sku bstan 'dzin snyan
grags/ zhwa lu ri phug bstan skyong / sde dge sa dbang bla ma kun dga' sangs rgyas/ sde dge bla ma ngag dbang rin chen sogs mkhas grub chen po de rnams snga phyir gdan
sa 'di nyid du phebs skabs yin 'dug par/ yab rje sku mched dang khyad par rje 'di bcas par dbang khrid byin rlabs rjes gnang lung bcas rab tu mang ba gsan tshod kyi da lta
sgrub btus sogs kyi brgyud yig rnams su 'jam dpal gzhon nu rdo rje rin chen des bdag la'ang gsungs pa mang du gnang ba sogs phal cher 'di skabs yin tshod dang / snga phyi
lam 'bras thengs mang du gnang thog bdag gi bla ma rje btsun grub pa'i dbang mo skal bzang chos kyi nyi mas kyang lam 'bras tshogs bshad 'di skabs gsan

zhing / gzhan gcen po rdo rje rin chen nas gsan pa'i chos gong du bshad pa rnams nas zab chos re gnyis ma gtogs bdag cag gi dpal ldan bla ma de nyid kyis kyang phal cher bum
pa gang byo gsan pa rnams bdag gis kyang gang tsam thob pa skal ba bzang bar mchis/ ngag dbang rdo rje rin chen 'di nyid khri thog lo gsum bzhugs pa de bar phur sgrub mdos
chen sogs slob dpon rtag par mdzad cing / 'di nyid kyi sgrigs lam kun spyod rnams nyams med khar snga phyir nyams gso gsar bzhengs kyang lha thil mthong yangs kyi zangs
khra khyams lho byang gnyis kyi lcags khra phur khang / khyams stod tshoms chen lho byang sogs kyi tshogs gdan rigs nyams gso mang du gnang zhing / da lta gdung brgyud
rnams zor las mdzad skabs sogs la 'grem pa'i 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi sngags thang rnying gras ji lta ba'i snga thang gsar bris 'di rnams 'dren mchog rdo rje rin chen nyid
dang / bkra shis rin chen lhan rgyas kyis gsar bzhengs yin tshul brjod pa dang / gzhan yang dbu rtse sogs kyi rgya phibs kyi shing cha brje ba rnga thug sgrub sde gong
'og sogs la gsar bskrun dang nyams gso mang ba bcas mdzad nas shing sbrul lo khri skyong dgongs zhu mdzad nas/ phun tshogs gling 'dir bdag khri rim phebs kyi dbyar sa yin
yang de skabs bzhugs yul cher med pa lta bu 'di nyid du gtan chags te bzhugs yul gnang mur/ gu ru padmas sbas yul kha 'byed pa dang gter sogs 'don par phebs tshul gsung
pa 'di gar

che phra kun gyis bshol 'debs ji lta zhus kyang ma gsan par kong po'i ngos su phebs te/ gdul bya rnams bsod nams dman pas padma bkod chung bya bar phebs rtsis la phebs ma thub
par gnas der sngar med kyi brag g.yang ko thag gi skas can dang gter gyi lde mig yin tshul brag rdo rje'i bya khyung 'dra ba nub shul sogs da lta yang mjal rgyu yod skad
dang / de skabs su la'ang rgyus med kyi brag lam rnams su phebs skabs nyid kyi nyer dpyad shangs rgyu skya leb zhig yod pa gar phebs kyi sngon brag phug sogs kyi nang
du slebs yong tshul kyang zer/ grub dbang 'di nyid sngon gyi gter lung du mar mtshan zur tsam gsal ba byung ba la dpag na zab gter mang bar bzhes rgyu yod nges kyang cung
zad rten 'brel 'chug rkyen lta bur song zhing / de snga rje 'di nyid rab byung yin kyang / de skabs lung gsal lta bu yin shag la gzung ma rnam sras sgrol ma khab tu bzhes
te/ dge bsnyen rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis 'dir phebs kyis phun gling du bzhugs te/ 'khrul zhig gi spyod pa bskyangs shing dbang lung 'chad spel tho tsam gnang zhing
tshogs phebs sogs la rgya cher phebs skad med 'dug pa dang / dwags kong min pa'i gzhan yang lho rong khul 'go yul stod sogs phyogs phebs lan kha re sogs phebs par spa gro
stag tshang du phur bzlog zhig mdzad skabs gtor chen khrag rlon ltar nyer zhing zor 'phen skabs mda' zor shin tu sra bas brag la zug pa dang / 'grig gi mtsho mo gres dung
du gter bum sba ba dang

khrus gsol rab gnas mdzad pa'i mod la mtsho kha lud cing mdog zangs su bsgyur tshul sogs snga phyi grub mtshan kyang ci rigs ston par mdzad nas dgung grangs zhe dgu pa me yos
chu stod zla ba'i tshes bcu bdun gyi tho rangs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dpon du zhi bar gshegs pa'i tshul bstan cing dgongs rdzogs zhabs rjes rnams phun gling bla brang nas
bsgrubs te/ da ltar brtse chen lha khang du bzhugs pa'i dngul gdung gdan khri dang rgyan spros gser zangs rin chen du ma'i phra rgyan gyis phyug pa 'di'i nang zhugs dam
pa gang nyid kyi spu rus kyi gdung tshwa las rtsa gsum rgya mtsho'i snang brnyan ji snyed kyis mtshon/ ring bsrel rnam bzhis phyur bur gtams pa mchod tshogs dang bcas par
bdag chen kun dga' bsod nams chog grwa dang bcas nas/ rab gnas rgyas par bstsal ba 'di dang lo dus kyi mchod par dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sgrub mchod lho byang 'dus
spyir dus chen thog sngar lam bzhes thug mang ja zhabs skor bcas/ de skabs su dgos pa'i rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs sogs gos rnying 'ba' zhig las gsar bskrun bdun tshan re la
sogs pa gtong rten sgo rum tang ka bcas kyi sa zhing ru khag sogs/ lha spyir sbyor 'jags kyi deng skabs kyang nyams med gtong bzhin pa 'di rnams dang gzhan yang rab ston
sogs la 'grem pa'i gos sku g.yul thang brgya rtsa dang dbyar stong tshogs gur sogs la nyams gso mang bar skyabs mchog de nyid kyi gzung ma

rnam sras sgrol ma ltos bcas nas bsgrubs te rnam sgrol rang ni rang yul du phyir log go /

phun tshogs pho brang gi gdung rabs bshad pa/de rnams kyis grub mchog rdo rje rin chen gyi rnam thar mdor bsdus cung zad brjod zin pa yan chad yab rje sku mched zung thugs
'dod gcig gyur la brten grub dbang badzra ratna'i yab dngos a nan ratna yin 'dug kyang so sor dbye ba ma gnang zhing 'di man nas sgrol ma pho brang dang phun tshogs pho brang
zhes gnyis su gyes 'dug pa 'di bzhin byung 'dug pa ni/ bzang po dpal la yum mi gcig pa'i gdung sras mang du byung ba rnams kyi bgres shos gzhi thog mkhas btsun pa chen
pos/ gcung po rnams la bla brang sgo bzhir gnang ba lta bus rim bzhin brjod rgyur gong mdor bstan skabs smros pa bzhin/ thog mar phun tshogs pho brang gi gdung rabs sam
grub dbang a nan ratna'i rigs sras rnams phun gling du bzhugs pa 'dir 'brel chags su brjod na/1 rje btsun ma rta mgrin dbang mo/de yang yab rje sngags 'chang kun dga' rin
chen gyi btsun mo yongs grags kyi gnyis pa bsam lte ma yum mchog nyi zla dbang mor grags

pa las/ rigs sras gdung sras zung dang rje btsun ma sku mched gsum bcas lcam sring lnga tsam 'khrungs pa las/ gcen mo sku bgres pa ni bdag gi skyabs gcig rigs brgya'i khyab
bdag rje btsun rta mgrin dbang mo skal bzang chos kyi nyi ma de nyid ni/ me sprel lor sku bltams pa/ gzhon nu nas gcen po rdo rje rin chen dang lhan du gus pa'i dpon slob
yongs 'dzin ma tis mu tra de nyid gnas kyi slob dpon du bsko bzhag bstsal bar bsten gnang gis klog 'don chos spyod rnams rje btsun ma yin yang sku gdung dang 'dra bar sbyong
brdar gnang ba dang / gzhan yang kun rig nA ro mkha' spyod dges rdor phur pa sogs kyi mngon dkyil dang phur chung gtor bsngo chen mo bskang ba 'go lugs bstod snying
phur bzlog sogs mang ba rnams kyi cho ga phyag len dbyangs rol sogs tshang ma thugs su chud par mdzad cing / bar skabs rnams su yab rje sku mched zung dang ngag dbang kun
dga' rgyal mtshan sogs las phur dbang bde mchog nag po lugs mkha' spyod ma'i chos skor mang du gsan cing / 'dren mchog rdo rje rin chen las lam 'bras tshogs bshad 'jigs
byed mgon po yi chos skor rnams dbang rjes gnang lung khrid bcas cha tshang ba dang / sgrub thabs brgya rgyam dang rjes gnang zur bka'i rigs rnams sgrub lung bcas phal cher
bum pa gang byor gsan 'dug pa dang / gsher dmar lha bcu gsum sogs dang rdo rje phreng ba zhal gyi chos skor/ dmar po skor gsum be bum/ sa skya bka' 'bum sogs bka' 'bum
rigs tsam ma gtogs gzhan rdo rje rin chen gyi gsan skor phal cher

bzhugs shing / e waM chos ldan gyi phan khang mkhan rin po che byams pa kun dga' bstan pa'i blo gros las gsung ngag rin po che'i slob bshad rdzogs par gsan pa dang / spyi bka'
rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang chen zhe lnga/ 'jam mgon mkhyen brtse dbang po las seng gdong nyer lnga'i dbang lung / dpon slob ngag dbang rin chen las dmar po skor gsum gyi
rjes gnang tshang ma/ sa dbang bla mas mdzad pa'i de skor gyi dpe lung sogs mang du gsan cing / yi dam kyai rdo rje dang / nA ro mkha' spyod/ rdo rje phur pa/ gur mgon/
lha mo rig byed ma/ phyag rdor/ 'byung 'dul rnams kyi bsnyen pa bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bcas mthar phyin pa mdzad cing / dbang lung 'chad spel sogs ni mtho dman drag zhan
che phra tshang mas zhus kyang nyid kyis ma gsan na ma gtogs mi yong gsung srol med pas/ kun gyis chu 'chu ba ltar blang chog par mdzad cing / de lta bus thugs brel med tshe
phyag dpe kho na gzigs rtog gis gtso bor bka' 'gyur yongs rdzogs thengs gnyis tsam klog 'don mdzad cing / de skabs 'dul ba'i lugs sogs kyi/ bdag cag gi ston pa'i skyes
rabs rnam thar ngo mtshar gzigs pa'i tshe spyan chab kho na mdzad cing / gzhan yang gdung rabs chen mo'i sngags 'chang chen po'i rnam thar ngo mtshar rgya mtsho la sogs
dam pa gong ma'i mdzad spyod ngo mtshar can dag gzigs pa na spyan chab gsung bgros kyang mi thon skad mdzad pa 'di dag ni/ thugs rgyud byang chub sems kyis brlan pas/ bcos
min gyi dad pa dang nges 'byung gting nas g.yo ba'i

rtags gzhan las rmad du byung ba ste/ sngon gyi dus su jo bo rje dpal ldan a ti sha nyid zhal bzhugs dus/ dge bshes ston pa'i drung du sku mched gsum dang khams lung pa'i slob
ma yin pa'i btsun pa zhig mjal du byung ba la/ ston pas po to ba kho ci mdzad kyi 'dug gsungs pas khong dge 'dun brgya phrag mang po la chos gsungs kyi gda' zhus pas
'o ngo mtshar che de yang gcig yin gsungs/ dge bshes phu chung pa kho ci mdzad kyi gda' gsungs pas/ khong rang gzhan gyi yo byad mang pos rten gsum 'ba' zhig bzhengs shing
gda' zhus pas/ sngar bzhin gsungs/ dgon pa ba khong ci mdzad kyi gda' gsungs pas/ khong sgom 'ba' zhig mdzad kyi gda' zhus pas sngar bzhin gsungs/ khams pa lung pa khong
ci mdzad kyi gda' gsungs pas/ khos sa grog kha re ru bzhugs/ dbu btums tee bshum pa 'ba' zhig mdzad kyi gda' zhus pas ston pas dbu zhwa phud thugs kar thal mo sbyar spyan
chab mang po phyung nas shin tu ngo mtshar che chos bya ba de khong gis byas pa yin/ 'di'i yon tan mang po bshad rgyu yod de da lta bshad na khong mi mnyes pa 'dug gsungs
pa'i lo rgyus deng sang gi dus tshod mig la thal ba lta bu shor na ma gtogs dad dang nges 'byung gis mchi ma 'byin pa ni srid pa tsam na shin tu ngo mtshar ba'i rnam
thar du shes par bya'o/ /deng dus kyi bla sprul phal che bas mi mkhyen kyang mkhyen pa'i tshul dang ma grub kyang grub pa'i tshul/ mngon shes med kyang yod tshul sogs mdzad
par kun gyi phyag

len du shar mar sdebs pa de ltar lags kyang bdag gi bla ma de nyid ni gong ma rnams las ldog te ci yang mi mkhyen pa'i tshul kho na ston par mdzad de/ go don sogs kyi cha 'ga'
zhig la bka' 'dri zhus kyang tshur 'dri ba skad mdzad pa dang nged la mngon shes med ces rgyun bar bka' stsol zhing nan tar zhus na sho mo gza' bdun 'khor spar mo sogs
mdzad de gang babs gsal bar gsungs par thos shing yang snying gang gsungs thams cad thog tu 'babs yong zhing / dbang rjes gnang khrid la sogs mang po sngon gyi dpe rnying
'chings mdor bsdus tsam yar len mar len mang du dgos pa rnams kyang chad lhag med par thogs med du gsungs pa las the tshom cung zad kyang mi mnga' zhing / ljags lung gnang
skabs ha cang myur ches pas tshig mi gsal ba dang dal che bas mi lhogs pa lta bu ma yin pa/ tshig sgra dag cing gsal ba ring thung gcod mtshams rnams bar 'byed cing
/ skabs re chos zhu ba rnams la gzigs shing bzhad mo mdzad bzhin du thal le gsungs pas/ po sti gcig tsam tshegs med pa srib tsam la gnang grub yong ba sogs nges don gyi rje
btsun ma 'di lta bu ni/ kho bos kyang dbus gtsang khams gsum gang du sngar phan mthong ma myong zhing / dbang chen rnams dang rjes gnang byin rlabs sogs gang mdzad kyang
sla chos gtan nas mi mdzad par/ 'go'i mchod bshams sogs nas bzung mjug chog bar la gzhung nas bshad pa bzhin nan cher mdzad de/ dbang chen sogs la

bzhengs te sngon gyi phyag len bzhin dbang rdzas 'grims pa phyag rgya sogs gang yin yang gcig bsdus lta bu ma yin par slob ma re re'i mdun du gnang ba sogs rje btsun 'di lta
bu ni don dam par rdo rje bdag med ma dang / rgyal yum rdo rje phag mo sogs kyi ngo bor bzhugs pas/ tha dad ma mchis kyang bdag sogs tshur mthong gdul bya'i snang ngor
mthong tshul rags tsam dang sngon du yab rje grub pa'i dbang phyug padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug nas mkha' 'gro ma bye ba 'bum sde'i sprul pa gcig tu bsdus pa yin pas/ bstan
'gro la phan bde 'byung bar lung bstan pa ltar/ thub bstan lha chen mkhan rabs so bzhi pa byams pa bkra shis chos 'phel/ 'dzing phu mkhan po kun dga' bstan pa'i blo gros
rnams las sdom gsum rim gsan gyis rgyun du yang lam 'dus/ lam zab bir srung mkha' spyod ma rnams kyi nyams len dpal sa skya'i thugs dam chag med bzhir grags pa rnams kyis
mtshon tshe sgrub rigs sogs nyams bzhes chag med du mdzad pa dang / brgyad/ bcu bzhi/ nyer gsum/ nyer dgu sogs la bstan srung rgya mtshor bskang 'phrin sogs chag med mdzad
pa mthong zhing / snga phyir lam 'bras tshogs bshad lan mang ba bdag sogs la lam 'bras slob bshad yongs rdzogs lan gnyis/ spyi bka' rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang lan gsum
tsam mkha' spyod skor gsum dang / lhag par nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs khrid lung bcas shin tu mang ba gzhan yang bde mchog lu nag dril gsum/ 'jigs byed ro langs
brgyad skor

dang lha bcu gsum ma/ gshed dmar lha lnga/ ra khrid mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud/ ra spod rnams kyi lung dang / kyai rdor bka' babs bzhi/ mgon po'i dbang chen lnga/ gdugs dkar nyer
bdun ma/ mi 'khrugs lha dgu/ sbyong dkyil bcu gnyis sogs dbang chen rigs shin tu mang ba/ shangs chos ni gu chos drug gi dbang khrid byin rlabs spod lung sogs/ gur zhal
dmag zor ma sogs bstan srung / rnam sras rigs can bco lnga sogs nor lha'i rigs bcas kyi bka' gtad rjes gnang sogs grangs kyis mi langs ba stsol bar mdzad pa'i slob ma
ni/ dbus gtsang khams gsum na bla ma grwa pa khyim bdag rang ga ba sogs bsam las 'das shing / gdan sa 'di nyid du ni bdag khri kun bsod sku mched yum rje btsun ma bcas dang
/ yab rdo rje 'chang sku mched yum rje btsun rnams dang / bdag khri 'jam dbyangs sku mched rje btsun rnams dang bcas chos sde zung gi mkhan thog bkra shis chos 'phel man
gyi mkhan thog dang / dpon slob sogs grwa bgres phal che ba nyams len sogs kyis dben kyang rje nyid la dad gus kyis gsol 'debs la brtson pa bdag lta bus mtha' rten pa'i
slob ma dang yang slob kyis sa steng phal cher du khyab pa 'di rnams so/ /de lta'i rje btsun dam pa bdag cag rnams kyi rmol drung de nyid dgung grangs drug cu re gcig tu
phebs pa me sprel chu stod zla ba'i tshes nyer gcig la 'phel rgyas bla brang du dga' ldan lha yul du slebs song gsungs pa sogs

dag snang du ma'i ngang nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bstan/ dgongs rdzogs zhabs 'jug rnams ni phun bde dang 'phags bdag phun pho bcas nas sgrub sku spur dang spu rus phebs
bsu skyel sogs la mchod phreng sogs gdung rgyud bzhin mdzad cing / zhal bzhugs dus kyang rje btsun gzhan par sngar srol med kyang / 'di nyid gdung rgyud rnams kyi dbu
blar gyur pa sogs la dgongs te gdugs dang rgya gling sogs sku gdung dang 'dra ba bsnams chog par mdzad do/ /nang rten nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i dngul sku da lta lha chen o
rgyan lha khang du bzhugs pa 'di'o/yum nyi zla dbang mo'i sras gnyis pa rje btsun skal bzang bstan 'dzin dbang mo ni bkras brtsegs bla brang du bzhugs shing gdung rgyud gcung
po phyogs kyi glang po'i gdung rten bzhengs par mdo smad glang nag dgon du phebs par mdzad pa de nyid yin no/ /2 ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams/yum mchog nyi zla dbang
mo'i rigs sras gsum pa ni/ yab rje ngag dbang kun dga'i mtshan dgung grangs zhe dgur phebs pa dge byed ces pa chu pho stag lo'i 'go zla'i tshes bcu gnyis la ngag dbang
kun dga' bsod nams bltams pa/ yab rje sku mched sogs nas 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi rnam 'phrul du ngos 'dzin mdzad cing/ tshe dpag lha dgu dbang dang

'khrungs bsangs 'khrungs ston bcas rgyas par mdzad pa dang / gzhon nu nyid nas gnas kyi slob dpon drung klog yig sogs dang / ring min sngon lam bzhin rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis/
rdo rje phur pa/ kyai bdag rnal 'byor gsum/ gsang bde 'jigs gsum chos skyong gur zhal dang bcas pa'i gtor bskang sogs thugs mtshor bzung ste/ bdag khri ngag dbang rdo rje
rin chen sogs dang / chos byang las tshan rnams dang bcas pa'i dbus su re re bzhin rgyugs 'bul mdzad de/ tshogs dbu so sor phebs shing de nas 'byung po 'dul byed dang
dges mdzad rdo rje/ rdo rje phur pa/ gur mgon sogs kyi gzhi bsnyen snga phyir mthar phyin par mdzad pa'i bar skabs rnams su/ rdo rje phur pa gur zhal rnams kyi gtor bzlog
bskang ba 'go lugs bstod rnying sogs rgyugs sprod snga ltar mdzad nas/ phur sgrub chen mo'i tshogs dbus su gsung bshad dang gur mgon khro bcu drug cu ma sku rim chen mo
mgon mdos zab ma dus mchod 'dus sde zab ma'i tsi dmar gtor bzlog rnams kyi zor 'dzin dang / de nas mgon po zhal gyi sgrub bsnyen sngon 'gro'i dngos gzhi gtor mdos zung 'brel
rgyal chen bse khrab pa phun pho dang bsam brling du dmag zor gtor bzlog rnams sgrub 'phen mdzad ngos/ lha mo rje khol zung gi mchod 'dus sgrub 'bul gnyan mgon dam tshig
bskang gso rnams sngon srol nyams med kyi rdo rje slob dpon mthar phyin/ de nas phur sgrub dang dus mdos kyi tshogs dpon rdor slob 'gan bzhes mdzad ces

grags shing / bar skabs rnams su yab rje padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug las gsung ngag rinapo che'i tshogs bshad smin grol rgyab chos dang bcas pa/ gzhan yang sgrub thabs brgya
rtsa'i rjes gnang / grub brgya'i byin rlabs rjes gnang zur bka'i rigs dang bstan srung rnams kyi rjes gnang / tshe rta zung 'brel sogs tshe dbang rigs mang du gsan pa dang
/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang kun dga' rin chen las/ rdo rje phur pa'i stod las byang chub sgrub dbang dang smad las drag po sgrol dbang gur drag rta phyag khyung
gsum byad grol lcags sdong ma dang grub rgyal ma'i tshe dbang sogs gsan/ bdag chen bkra shis rin chen las rta mgrin yang gsang dbang sogs mang du gsan/ rje btsun rta mgrin
dbang mo skal bzang chos kyi nyi ma las rwa lugs 'jigs byed lha bcu gsum smin grol rwa pod rnams kyi lung bcas dang / kyai rdor bka' babs bzhi/ mgon po bka' babs bzhi/
gser chos bcu gsum/ mkha' spyod skor gsum smin grol yongs rdzogs gur mgon gyi chos skor yongs rdzogs/ ni gu'i chos drug dang seng gdong nyer lnga'i skor yongs rdzogs/
zur bka'i rjes gnang mang ba/ beg rtse dur bdag skor tshang ma/ bde mchog lu nag gsang 'dus rigs gsum/ sbyong dkyil bcu gnyis kyi dbang sogs gsan/ de skabs lam 'bras slob
bshad dang spyi bka' rdo rje 'phreng ba'i dbang chen zhe lnga/ dmar po skor gsum be'u bum lung sogs dkon pa bdag chen mchog nas rje btsun rta mgrin dbang mo nyid khams

phebs skabs gong rnams gsan bzhes dgos tshul bka' mngags gnang ba bzhin/ rje btsun bla ma 'di nyid nas mdo smad ngos phan khang mkhan po sogs la gsan te zab chos rnams srog
mthud par mdzad pa 'di rnams yin zhing / bdag chen 'di nyid mnga' ris skor gsum ngos sogs stod phebs thengs re gnyis las phal cher gdan sa rang du bzhugs te chog mang dang
/ 'go zla'i 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi dgongs rdzogs skabs sogs kyi bde mchog slob dpon snron zla'i sa chen kun blo'i dgongs rdzogs kyi rwa lugs 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma
dang / yab rje padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gi dgongs rdzogs phur pa dang / yab rje kun rin gyi dgongs rdzogs kyai rdor sogs sgrub mchod rnams kyi slob dpon mang du gnang
zhing de skabs bdag chen bkra shis rin chen mchog dang thugs snang shin tu gshin pa yod skad kyis phur sgrub slob dpon lo ltar sku mched gnyis nas mdzad cing dus mdos sku
mched gnyis gang rigs nas lo ltar mdzad skad dang / bdag chen mangga'i mtshan can mchog gi dgongs bzhed khyad par ba'i gras zab gsol 'cham gzigs su grags pa sngon dus sa
tshogs su zab rgyas mdzad skabs kyi slob dpon kyang skyabs mchog 'di nyid nas mdzad de/ sku chas sogs kyang ljags bkod mdzad pa sogs yongs grags de skabs tsam la bsam yas
chos skyong gi lung bstan zhig la/ spre'u byang chub sems dpa' shing rtser 'dzegs/ /stag gi lo la stag gi rgyal mtshan 'dzugs/ /zhes pa zhig bstsal ba spre'u

byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag chen bkra shis rin chen dgung snying sprel yin pa ring min zhing brje ba/ skyabs mchog 'di bzhin stag yin pas stag gi lo nang bdag khri mdzad pa'i
lung bstan gsal por gnang / 'di skabs zhabs 'bring pa sogs nas ji bzhin ma rtogs pa shing gi stag mgo'i rgyal mtshan zhig gzhi thog gi rtser btsugs pa da lta yang snang
ba bcas/ de nas shing glang smin zla'i nyer gcig la bdag khri bkra shis rin chen dgongs pa rdzogs par brten 'di'i mkhan mdzad sogs nas rgyal khab tu snyan 'bul gyis skyabs
mchog 'di nyid kho na sku bgres pas 'os phul gyi bka' lan 'khor mtshams 'jam dbyangs sa paN gyi chos khrir sngon du khri 'don grub pas/ 'gro mgon chos rgyal 'phags pa
rin po che'i bzhugs khrir phebs rgyu'i sngon lam mdos chen zab chung zhes pa pu tra dgu tshan lnga dang ru 'dren rnams so sor nyer lnga re/ gzhan phal cher zab chen gzhir
bzhag mdzad skad dang / de nas skyabs mchog de nyid dgung grangs nyer lngar phebs pa zad pa zhes pa me pho stag gi lo'i gza' tshes dge bar tshoms dmar gyi bzhugs khrir
mnga' gsol te/ sa gzhung bla khag lha sde mi sde bcas kyi mjal dar sngar lam bzhin bstar thogs/ sa gzhung nas gsol ston dang drung 'khor dang mi ser gyi skor gzhas nye 'khor
tsho bzhi'i gzigs 'bul sogs rim par zhus shing / de nas ring min lcags lug lo mjug rgyal khab tu khri mjal du bdag khri nyid dang yum mchog gdung sras bcas

phebs par 'di ga nas mdzad sgo dang / rgyal khab nas gnang sgo phal cher sa sprel lor bdag chen bkra shis rin chen gyi phebs lam ltar yin 'dug cing / lha ldan du bzhugs tshe
bzhi sde bla brang du mdzad cing gnas shan du rtse drung chang khyim pa dang shod drung gra phyi smon grub pa bcas/ de nas rim bzhin gong sa rgyal dbang blo bzang 'phrin
las rgya mtsho dang srid skyong sde drug ho thog thu blo bzang mkhyen rab dbang phyug zung gis mjal phyag sogs mdzad de/ jo shAka rnam gnyis gru 'dzin pho brang gnyis pa'i
gnas gzigs mchod sprin bcas mdzad thog de snga lha ldan rgyal khab nang khul du dar han mkhan po dang tre'u dge bskos tsha ba a brtan sogs 'bras grwa 'ga' zhig dang bcas
nang du ngan bsham lam du ma song ba rgyal khrims drag pos tshar gcod grub ma thag tu song gshis/ slar de rigs kyi dam sri 'gong po'i 'tshe ba zhi phyir/ 'gong po ar
gtad sogs zhabs brtan mang du gnang dgos bka' bsgyur phebs te bzhi sde bla brang du 'gong po'i mnan zor sgrub skabs srod dus nye 'khor du ngu 'bod kyi sgra 'byin zhing zhabs
sgrub khang du dngos su rdung mkhan med kyang rnga di ri rir brdungs pa sogs don du 'gong po dngos khug gi rtags dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs dang / dngos gzhi mnan pa'i
'gugs gzhug skabs phyogs bcu nas thal rlung 'tshub ste mnan dong nang du 'gro ba de yod tshang mas mthong ba dang / zor 'phen skabs drag chas kyis sku rngam zhing brjid
pa de nyid sog phon me rlung 'khyil ba'i dbus su srib tsam

bzhugs pa de dus tshang mas mthong tshod kyis sa skya bdag chen gyi zhed drag la zer kun kyang ha las pa byung 'dug pa sogs/ de skabs rgyal blon nas kyang spel legs gzhis 'di
yongs 'bab bcas/ gzhung zhabs su lo ltar rgyal chen rnam sras zhi drag gi bsnyen pa drag po'i g.yu mdos gtso bor gyur/ bstan zhabs sgrub thebs su gsar sbyor mdzad cing
de nas thon phyag sogs rim mdzad 'phan yul nA lendra dang / lho gnas dang / yar 'brog mthar chos nas sgang brgyud/ yar mar gnyis char/ paN chen rin po che blo bzang bstan
pa'i dbang phyug gi mjal phyag sogs sngar lam ltar mdzad tshul rgyal mtshan mthon po bas kyang bkur bzos sogs kyang sngon lam bzhin zhus tshod 'dug yar lam e waM chos ldan
nas shab chos brgyud chu sprel zla ba bdun pa'i nang gdan sar phebs mdun 'cham mgon rnams dang rdo rje'i chos skyong rnams bla khag mkhan phyag gnyer gsum sogs lha mi
sde bcas phebs bsu sogs sngar lam bzhin bgyis te/ bzhi thog tshoms dmar du de skabs kyi rgyal khab nas gnas shan gra phyi smin grub pa'i las tshan pa bcas tshang mar sa
gzhung nas gsol ston rgyas pa'i thog mdzod pa bla khag sogs lho byang las tshan drung rigs bcas nas mjal dar phul/ de nas dgon khang khag la gtang rag sogs rim mdzad bka'
drin bskyangs shing / gong gsal spel legs 'bab yongs steng nas/ 'bru sa khal nyer lnga stong rten du zur bcad kyis mgon mdos nyin gsum 'phar ma 'di bzhin byung

zhing / slar yang chu bya zla ba lnga pa'i nang bka' dgongs lta bur yin shag la bdag khri mchog dang gdung sras bgres pa bcas chibs bsgyur gyis bzhugs mtsher sogs sngon bzhin
gnang ste gzhung sa'i zhabs brtan phur bzlog mnan pa sbyin sreg sogs mang du gnang zhing / rtse po ta la dang nor gling bcas pa yang bstan zhabs spyi dang khyad par gnyan
mgon gyi dam tshig bskang ba sogs la gong sa rgyal dbang nyid kyang yang yang phebs te gzim spos re 'bul gnang mdzad nas/ skabs re tshogs gral du yang bzhugs te/ rtse
mchod bzod chos nas tshogs leb sha bcas phul lugs kyang 'dug de nas gzhung zhabs mdzad sgo rnams grub nas yar lam sgang brgyud shar phebs kyis gdan sar phebs lugs phal cher
sngar bzhin mdzad pa 'dra zhing / bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams 'di nyid kyi sku dus nyams gso mdzad pas tshogs dar chen de'i phyi'i lcags ri nang gi snang brnyan rnams
la tshon gsol lha chen bla brang gi 'du khang nang gi gtsang khang gi phyi skya byang ma'i gyang gsar brje/ thil g.yab nub kyi byang shar mtshams kyi shing bsgrigs rnams
dang steng thog steng gi phur khang gi ka ba gong ma'i gzhung ring rnams gsar brje mdzad pa dang / yab rje kun rin gyi nang rten rje btsun ma'i snang brnyan/ dbu rtser
lam 'bras bla brgyud zhal bskang / 'dren mchog rdo rje rin chen gyi snang brnyan gser zangs las bskrun pa/ phun pho'i ma Ni lha khang gsar pas mtshon/ steng gi gzim chung
khag dang sgo mchor

sogs gsar bskyed dang / bzhi thog kun gsal steng gi shar 'khyud sogs nyams gso gsar bskyed/ bse khrab dang / dus mchod rtsi dmar bcas kyi 'cham gos gyon 'bag phal cher gsar
bskrun gnang zhing gzhan yang phran bu mang du mchis pa dang / snga phyir lam 'bras tshogs bshad/ gdung sras zung rje btsun rnams dang / chos sde lho byang mdo smad khul
gyi dgon grwa rgyun rnams dang bcas par thengs gsum tsam gnang / gdung sras zung la 'jigs byed/ gur zhal/ mkha' spyod ma/ ni gu sogs kyi chos skor rnams dang / sgrub thabs
brgya rtsa sogs spyi bka' dang / zur bka'i rjes gnang rigs dbang chen rigs dang lung sogs mang du gnang tshod dang / sngon du bsnyen mtshams grub pa'i rjes la brag rdzong
ma phyi nang gsang gsum khrid dmigs dang sbrags mgon bsnyen thengs kha shas/ tshe rta zung 'brel sogs kyi bsnyen sgrub mang du gnang zhing / rgyun gtan lam 'dus thun
gnyis/ tshe sgrub gur bdun ma/ gur drag brag rdzong ma bcas chag med gnang / tshogs phebs bdag khri ma gnang gong rtag phebs dang / khri thog gnang nas kyang phur sgrub dang
/ dus mdos lha mchod sogs kyi slob dpon rgyun du gnang / gzhan gtor bzlog sgrub mchod sogs la'ang ther tsam phebs/ dbyar dgun bzhugs thabs dang / ston dpyid chab tshan
kyang 'char can phebs lam dang 'chad spel kyang gong bshad bzhin mang du gnang / slob ma'i gtso bo gcung po phyogs kyi glang

po/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang kun dga' snying po sku mched/ phun pho rang gi gdung sras rje btsun rnams dang / sgrol pho'i yum rje btsun ma sogs/ kho bo la yang na tshod gzhon
nu'i dus jo lags bkra shis rin chen de nyid kyi yang srid yin gsungs nas/ sku pang du yang bzhes tshod dang / bya rgyud tshe dpag med lha dgu dang / tshe rta zung 'brel/
rta phyag khyung gsum/ gur drag rjes gnang sogs kha shas thob cing gnang sbyin 'dra yang bstsal ba thos/ rjes su rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis sogs rgyugs sprod kyang mang du phul
ba dran tshor gsal ba bcas/ de lta bu'i skyabs mchog de nyid dgung grangs so brgyad tsam du phebs pa sa bstan la sku gegs bar chad kyi rnam pas snyung gzhi babs lci chig
bzhes te/ tshogs phebs sogs gang la yang phebs ma thub pa'i mur/ chu rta zla ba dang po'i nang paN chen rin po che bstan pa'i dbang phyug dang / zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes
lnga dgung grangs zhe gcig par bdag chen de nyid dgongs pa rdzogs pa bcas/ don du gangs ljongs gdul bya rnams bsod nams dman dbang kho nar nges pas so snyam/ deng nas dgongs
rdzogs che phra spyi dang gong sa yas phyin du gshegs rdzong sogs sa gzhung dang phun pho nas sgrub par mdzad cing / 'di gar yab rje rdo rje 'chang gi drung du yang
phun pho nas 'di lo'i rin khri pa'i las mjug byas 'thus snyan 'bul zhu gnang gis dgongs rdzogs rnams zab sgrub mdzad song ba/ las mjug byas 'thus 'di skabs gsar byung las/

de sngon yod tshod mi 'dug de nas spur zhu dang dgongs rdzogs/ sgrub mchod/ sku tshogs ring bla brang cho ga phal cher sngon lam bzhin/ nang rten rin chen gnyis pa las grub
pa'i rnam rgyal mchod rten lha chen khyams stod lho ngos bzhugs pa 'di dang / dbu rtser lam 'bras bla brgyud zhal skong gser dngul las grub pa sogs dang / dgongs rdzogs
su 'di lo phun phor byang tshogs yong nas kyai rdor sgrub mchod khag gnyis kyi slob dpon yab rje rdo rje 'chang dang / skyabs mchog 'jam dbang bcas nas mdzad cing / phyi
lo nas bzung sa gzhung nas dges rdor sgrub mchod tshul grol lnga / dus chen bcas lo ltar yod pa 'di rnams mchod phreng bcu gcig gis mtshan pa/ gzhan yang mchod thang zung
dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i gdugs rgyal mtshan sogs dang / grwa mang la 'gyed rgyu'i gos bzang sgrigs kyi rten khebs/ rol khebs gsar bskrun dang / phyi rten gdong sna'i ri ldebs
bdud 'dul mchod rten bcas pa rnams la/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang dang / skyabs mchog 'jam dbang chog grwa dang bcas pas rab gnas rgyas pa/ rab ston dang thangaston sogs
sngar lam bzhin rgyas par mdzad do/ /de rnams kyis bdag chen ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams kyi rnam thar mdor bsdus sgro skur dang bral ba cung zad smos zin to/ /

3 dpal ldan phyogs kyi glang po/rgyal yum nyi zla dbang mo'i gdung sras zung las gnyis pa/ dpal ldan phyogs kyi glang po ste/ yab rje kun dga' rin chen dgung grangs nga gcig
par phun tshogs pho brang du gzugs sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon par gsal zhing / gzhon nu nas rab tu byung ste/ gdan sa 'di nyid kyi las phral chos sogs phal cher mdzad grub
mtshams/ sa gzhung gi 'bul sdud du khams phyogs mdo smad ngos su phebs/ bstan 'gro'i bde thabs la gzhol skabs nyag rong dmag zing 'go tshugs pa bstan don zhabs rim dmag
bzlog sogs mang du mdzad pa dang / gzhung sa mchog nas lha dmag gi dpung gi sbyor ba sogs bshams pas/ pha rol nag phyogs pa'i g.yul las mngon par rgyal te/ mdo smad srid
pa bder bkod kyi rnam thar bskyangs grub kyang / rje 'di nyid bdag bas gzhan gces kyi thugs bskyed dam bca' 'gog tu med pa lta bus rje 'di nyid ngag dbang kun dga' rgyal
mtshan gyi yang srid du zhal gyis 'ches pa gong de nyid kyi sku tshe lhag ma lta bu'i dgung grangs nyer gnyis su thim nas/ nyer gsum pa shing byi lor mdo khams glang nag
dgon du sa g.yo'i rkyen pas zla ba gsum pa'i tshes bco lnga la gshegs tshul bstan/ sku rjes rnams bkras brtsegs bla brang nas sgrub cing / nang rten glang nag dgon rang na
gser dngul bkra

ma'i gdung rten mchod rgyun bcas yod 'dug 'di gar snga dus zla ba gsum pa'i nang kyai rdor sgrub mchod zhag lnga / dus chen bcas 'dzugs par mdzad pa de rnams kyi gcung po phyogs
kyi glang po'i rnam thar mdo tsam dang / bdag yum nyi zla dbang mo'i sras lnga pa ni/ rin phor bzhugs pa'i rje btsun tshul khrims dbang mo bcas yin no//4 drag shul
yon tan rgya mtsho/bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams kyi bdag mo rig 'dzin snying ri ba'i sras mo 'chi med bkra shis dpal gyi bu khrid las/ gdung sras zung dang / rje btsun ma
drug ste sku mched brgyad 'khrungs pa las gdung sras gcen po 'dzam gling che rgu dbang sdud ni/ yab rje dgung grangs nyer gnyis pa khrag skyugs ces pa chu mo phag gi lo'i
tha skar zla ba'i tshes drug nyin bltams shing / sngon lam bzhin tshe dpag med lha dgu'i dbang dang / mtshan gsol brtan bzhugs sogs bdag khri bkra shis rin chen la zhu
gnang gis khrus bsangs dang / phyi lo 'khrungs ston bcas rgyas par mdzad skad dang / de nas rim bzhin yon tan gyi ma mo 'bri klog la sogs pa gsan sbyong ngos/ rtsa rgyud
brtag gnyis la sogs pa rgyugs 'bul rnams sngar srol bzang po bzhin mdzad/ rgyun 'don dang phur sgrub zab ma sogs sgrub mchod khag bcas la tshogs phebs rim par gnang / bar
lam yab

rje mchog bdag khri'i go sar bzhugs te chu sprel chu bya gnyis kyi dbus phebs chen mo gnyis la nyid kyang mnyam du phebs te/ gzhung zhabs sogs la'ang phebs skad 'dug dam pa
gong ma rnams las snga phyir yab chos rnams gsan bsam mdzad gras/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bsod nams las snga phyir lam 'bras tshogs bshad dang / rdo rje phur pa
stod las byang chub sgrub dbang dang / smad las drag po sgrol dbang / bde mchog nag po lugs/ gsang 'dus 'phags lugs/ kun rig sogs dbang chen rigs dang / sgrub thabs brgya
rgyam sogs rjes gnang spyi bka' rigs dang zur bka'i rigs kyang sngags 'chang yig steng nas gtor bsngo chen mo'i rjes gnang rigs sogs dang / gur zhal gnyis kyi chos skor
yongs rdzogs gsan/ rje btsun mkha' spyod dbang mo mi yi tshul bzung ba rta mgrin dbang mo skal bzang chos kyi nyi ma'i drung nas/ lam 'bras slob bshad/ spyi bka' rdo rje'i
phreng ba'i dbang chen/ mkha' spyod skor gsum/ dmar po skor sogs gser chos rigs rnams gsan/ gzhan dpon slob shes rab sogs 'ga' re nas gsan nam snyam/ snga phyir dges rdor
gzhi bsnyen dang / rdo rje gzhon nu/ gur zhal/ 'byung po 'dul byed rnams kyi bsnyen sgrub sbyin sreg bcas mdzad cing rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod tshogs dbus su gsung
bshad kyi dga' ston grub nas/ gur mgon khro bcu dang / drug cu ma lha brgyad gtsub lugs kyi gtor bzlog sku

rim chen mor grags pa'i phur bzlog mgon mdos zab ma/ mdos sde zab ma/ zhal bzhi ba'i rten mdos zung 'brel/ rgyal chen bse khrab pa/ phun pho dang bsam brling du dmag zor gtor
bzlog sogs so so'i bsnyen sgrub kha gso'i zor 'dzin gyi rim pa dang / lha mo rje khol gyi mchod mdos/ gnyan mgon zhal bzhi ba'i dam tshig bskang gso sogs rdo rje slob
dpon gyi mgon bzhes rnams rim par grub nas/ ring po ma 'gor bar yab rje rdo rje 'chang dag zhing du phebs nas/ dgongs rdzogs sogs mdzad sgo rnams gong bzhin bsgrubs nas/
stod phebs thog mar gnang skabs tsam la yin nam/ mtsho sgor drag po'i sbyin sreg mdzad pas 'dre srin gnas khar la gnam lcags kyi thog dbab pa dang / gtor zhabs las bdud rtsi
zil pa la sogs pa byung gleng dang / de nas gdan sar phebs nas khri phebs chen mo'i mdos zab dang / shing sprel rta zla'i nang yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched/ 'jam
dbang sku mched/ dam pa'i rigs su skyes kyang yon tan gyi dri mas dben par ngos rang bcas lnga sdebs gcig tu 'jam dbyangs sa skya paNDi ta'i chos khri mkhas pa zil gnon nam/
'khor lo gsum ldan nam/ thang mo cher grags par mtshan mchog gsum ldan gyi gser khrir mnga' gsol tshul rnams 'og yab rje kun dga' snying po'i rnam thar lo rgyus su gsal
ba bzhin dang / de nas phur sgrub slob dpon thog ma dang / de rjes su lan kha shas gnang zhing / dus mdos

slob dpon kyang de mtshungs dang / stod phebs thengs 'ga' re dang / dbang chos 'chad spel ni/ yab rje de nyid bzhugs dus lam 'bras tshogs bshad thengs gcig gnang zhing / de
dus zur ba'i dbang chen rjes gnang sogs kyang mang tsam gnang zer/ kun dga' bsod nams kyi dgongs rdzogs kyai rdor gyi slob dpon thengs kha shas gnang / phur sgrub dus mdos/
gzhis len sogs la tshogs phebs thor tsam dang / me phag tsam nas bzung bsam brling du brag dkar bskang gsor rtag par pheb cing/ mjug la gnyer pa'i khur len kyang bzhes/
sngon dus bskang gso 'di bzhin brag dkar/ lha mo rang gi mgon khang du gtong bar 'di nas chog grwa/ dpon slob re/ ban tshang pa dang / bsnyen song / gzhi grwa bcas re
mos kyis 'gro srol/ bo dong bzhin yin 'dug kyang bsam brling du gtong rgyu bar skabs shig nas byung bar sems/ rje nyid dgung grangs so brgyad du phebs par/ da lta'i gdung

/ lcags byi lo mjug g.yul thang 'ong spung la dar 'dzugs dang / 'go zla'i dus mdos cung zab pa/ rgyal zla'i 'gor gza' tshes dge bar tshoms dmar du chos rgyal 'phags pa'i

che gnang sbyin dang bcas sogs dang / 'di ga sa gzhung bla khag lha mi sde bcas nas khri ston mjal dar legs 'bul gsol ston zab tu bgyis/ de nas shing 'brug lo nang rgyal khab
tu gsar mjal du phebs rgyur 'di skabs dmag skad kyang re che yod pa/ de nas lam gtor sogs gnang stee bkras brtsegs rje btsun tshe sbyin dngos grub dbang mo nyid 'dir bzhugs
khri'i tshab tu bskos gnang bcas/ 'di ga sa gzhung lha mi sde bcas nas phebs skyel thab skyel sogs zhu sgo rnams sngar lam bzhin zhus te chibs bsgyur bskyangs pa/ lha
ldan du thab bsu rtse shod bka' shag so so'i mgron gnyer nas ja zhus mtshams dar sogs sngar lam bzhin dang / bzhugs mtsher bstan gling bla brang du/ de nas mjal phyag
snyan seng gi bka' lan phebs mtshams/ nor gling du sngar lam bzhin snga bar phebs te/ de dus gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang thub bstan rgya mtsho mchog
'jigs byed ljags bsnyen du bzhugs par/ gzim chung nyi 'od du sku zla drung du maNDal rten gsum 'bul tshan sogs phul gnang grub nas/ gsol ja dang bzhes 'bras phebs thog gsol

dmag skad kyang je cher brten 'phros lus 'ga' zhig gdan sar sgrub 'thus dgongs zhu gnang ste/ thon phyag sogs sngar bzhin

dang / ngos rnams bdun skas gsham du mjal dar phul te tshoms dmar du sa gzhung nas gzhis byes tshang ma gsol ston rgyas pa sogs gnang / 'di lo gzhung shan bar lam nad mnar

gyi nang rten rgyal yum myur mdzad lha mo'i snang brnyan dang / nyid kyi a ne rje btsun mched zung sogs kyi nang rten dngul sku rnams lha chen nub ngos thil bskor 'phrin
las kyi ma thang ring mo lag bskor bcas pa 'di dang / lcags ri chen mo'i phyir lho'i khris kyi ma thang lag skor bcas gsar bskrun mdzad/ bya khra ma'i khris dang / g.yul

dang / phyi bskor dang / kha'u'i srin brag yas mas kyi lam bcos sogs sa gzhung gi dbus phebs sgar sgrigs skabs kyi spro khang dang / phyi

gur mjal gur sogs 'bub gnang dang bcas bdag khri rang ngos phebs kyis ru ngar mdzad song ba dang / de mtshungs lha chen lcags ri steng gi zur lcog rnams dang bcas pa'i spen
mu phreng sogs nyams gso legs par gnang song / khrir phebs pa nas phur sgrub dus mdos sogs la tshogs phebs khyug tsam gnang ba las gzhan rgyun du tshogs phebs dang / slob

can phebs shing / chos rgyal srong btsan sgam po'i rnam thar gyi cha shas rgya bza' bal bza' sogs 'khrab mdzad/ bod blon mgar ba gdong btsan gyi khur bzhes bdag khri

de

nas gdan sar phebs nas lcags glang zla ba drug pa'i nang zhing brjes/ dgongs rdzogs sogs phun pho nas 'grub ngos/ nang rten phun bde slob dpon gyi byang ngos na bzhugs pa'i

gi gzung ma shangs mu zhang bya rig pa'i lcam mo las/ da lta'i gdung sras zung rje btsun mched bcas/ da lta 'tsho zhing gzhes pa 'di rnams byon pa'o/ 'dir smras pa/

nyid bltams pa yin te/ de yang sngags 'chang bla ma de nyid 'jam mgon dbang sdud snying po'i rnam 'phrul yin pa ni/ rje btsun kun bsod bstan pa'i nyi mas/ gdan sa'i gtsug
lag khang rten mchod rnams la mchod 'bul gnas

gzigs mdzad skabs/ bde mchog pho brang du yab rje padma'i mtshan 'chang gis bstan bshad gnang ba'i tshe/ sman khang steng gi gzim spyil mdo'i byang ngos la yod pa'i dbang sdud
snying po'i sku brnyan de la/ 'o kho bo gdan sa'i 'dzin skyong 'di la gdung rgyud kyang 'byon pa dka' zhing byon pa rnams kyang gzhon nu nas gzhan don la phyogs skabs
lus sems shin tu mnar ba'i tshe/ dkon mchog la gsol ba btab cing / bka' srung rnams la gdung rabs myur 'byon gyi 'phrin bcol la brtson par gyur pa na/ dbang sdud snying
po'i sku'i rnam 'gyur 'di bzhin gyi zhal mngon gsum du bstan te/ khyod sa skya'i gdung 'di la de ltar du ngal ba byed mi dgos/ nga myur du 'ong ngo gsung zhing thugs ka nas
'od 'ja' tshon lta bu zhig byung / nged kyi snying khar zug pa'i sne la sngags 'chang gzhon nu gnyis kyang byon byung ba'i dang po 'di gdung mthu stobs dbang phyug 'di
yin pa sku tshe mthar ma phyin/ phyi ma 'di rgyan mchog khri chen bkra shis rin chen 'di yin/ yang shar gyi byang ngos kyi phur sku 'di rnams dang bcas/ dpal chen pho brang
rgyab kyi hor gyi bla ri nag po pha ga'i kha gnon du bris pa yin gsungs pa ni/ don la skyabs rje dam pa dbang sdud snying po'i rnam 'phrul yin pa ma zad stod hor gyi
kha gnon du'ang lung bstan pa dang / yang padma'i mtshan 'chang gi gsung mgur las/ nga sa skya'i sde gog 'dzin pa la/ /re ltos ni snying nang zug khrag ltar/ /rang

cag gi snying gi gdung sel mchog /pha dbang gi mtshan 'chang slar byon pa/ /bu mchog ni bkra shis rin chen dang / zhes sogs dang / gzhan yang 'og tu 'byung ba bzhin lha dang
bla ma rnams kyi lung gis yang yang bsngags pa'i phyir na/ dbang sdud snying po'i rnam thar zhal gsung ma las/ padma 'byung gnas 'phen shugs ma rdzogs pas/ da lta lha 'dre
mi gsum byams pa 'byung / zhes gsungs pas/ rgyal dbang padma ka ra'i rnam 'phrul du nges pas sngon gyi dus na'ang bod la bka' drin che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa dang / 'jam
mgon dbang sdud snying po zhing brje nye'i dus shig dbyar dgun chos thog rgyugs 'bul ba rnams la bdag rkyen du dbang zhig stsol ba'i phyag rgyun bzhugs pa las/ rnam 'dren
dam pa 'di'i yongs 'dzin dpon slob chos grags pa nyid sku gzhon nu'i dus/ deng sang bsgrigs pa'i rgyugs sprod du grags pa 'di nyid rgyugs 'bul mdzad skabs/ dbang de nyid
'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan can nas spyan gsal gyis stsol skabs rgyugs 'bul ba gzhan dag rnams la tshe ril mchod dpon nas bkye pa'i mu nas/ dpon slob de nyid la gnang ba'i
tshe 'jam mgon de nyid rang nas bzhes te/ phyag spar gang bstsal ba dang chabs cig nga yi dge rgan byed dgos gsungs pa'i tshe/ dpon slob de nyid sku na gzhon pa'i stabs
kyis/ ci gsung rgyu yin nam snyam pa'i ngang nas zhag du ma'i bar 'jigs chum me ba zhig byung / deng sang brtags na gdung sras rin po

che 'di'i sku yon pa byed dgos 'di gsung rgyu yin pa 'dra zhes gsungs pa gzhis byes kyi dge 'dun bgres po rdzun mi gsung pa du mas gsungs pa thos/ 'jam mgon dbang gi mtshan
can de nyid slar yang bstan 'gro'i don du dri med lha rigs 'khon gdung du phebs rgyu dang / de ltar phebs pa'i yongs 'dzin 'chol gnang bcas kun gyi mthun snang du grub pa
dang / gzhan yang gter ston mchog sprul bde chen gling pas thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel gyi lung byung las/ bdud 'joms sprul pa mangga lamaH gtsang stod phyogs su 'byung
bar 'gyuraH de dang 'di 'phrad bod khams bdeH zhes slob dpon rin po ches las can dag pa'i 'khor lnga'i nang tshan/ zhang sna nam rdo rje bdud 'joms kyi sprul pa/ gsal bar
lung bstan pa dang / 'o na gong yab rje dbang sdud snying po'i rnam sprul du lung bstan pa dang 'gal lo snyam du dogs na/ de ni rnam par ma brtags pa yin te yab rje dbang
sdud snying po yang / sna nam rdo rje bdud 'joms kyi sprul par lung bstan yod tshul gsungs pa dang / gter lung gzhan las kyang / sna nam skye ba sa skya'i 'thil du 'byung
/ mtha' dmag bzlog pa'i rten 'brel de la yod/ ces sogs mang du 'byung / 'o na yab rje dbang gi mtshan can yang srid bcas pa slob dpon rin po che'i rnam 'phrul du bshad
pa dang / 'dir rdo rje bdud 'joms kyi sprul par bshad pa mi 'gal lam snyam na/ de ni ga la 'gal te/ rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis las/ 'chad pa po nga chos

kyang nga / /rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa'ang nga / /zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar nges don du ston pa dang 'khor gnyis thugs rgyud gcig gis bsdus par gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang
gong du smos pa bzhin chu lug lo yab rje sku mched zung dang rgyal yum zhing skyong dbang mo bcas dbus phebs thog ma'i skabs/ rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa sogs mjal
phyag grub nas/ lho gnas su phebs skabs bsam yas chos skyong chen po'i lung bstan du da lta yum gyi lhums na yod pa 'di gdung sras dang / de yang pad 'byung gnyis pa 'gro
mgon dbang sdud snying po'i rnam sprul yin pas mtshan yang theg chen dbang sdud snying por thogs shig ces 'bru dkar gyi me tog snyil ba sogs don du yab rje dam pa'i rnam
sprul tshang mas mthun grub tu 'byung ba bzhin lhums zhugs kyi zla grangs rdzogs nas bdag cag rnams kyi ston pa'i dbang po nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs te/
dpal ldan 'bras spungs su dus 'khor gyi rgyud gsungs pa'i dus chen dang nye bar nag zla'i tshes nyer gnyis la/ dge legs rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas pho brang du dri bzang
'thul ba/ lha rnams kyis 'ja' 'od dang me tog gi char snyil ba sogs ltas bzang po du ma dang bcas te sku bltams shing / gdan sa'i chab 'bangs rnams kyang nam ltas 'di la
dpag na gong sar 'khrungs sgo zhig yod par gdung sras khyad par can zhig sku bltams par thag chod/ zer zhing dga' ba'i rnam 'gyur ston pa dang / zhabs lha'i rgyab phyogs

kyi sa 'dzin skya bo'i logs der gser bya ngang pa'i tshangs bcas te phru gu rnams sgor thon byung ba dang / gzim chung gi skar khung steng byi'us tshang bca' ba/ chibs rar
rgod ma g.yang 'dzin la rte'u dkar po btsas pa rnams mnyam du byung ba ni/ bdag cag gi ston pa rgyal bu don 'grub 'khrungs pa dang tshul mtshungs par byung ngo / /de nas
yab rje mchog nas/ yum sras rnams la rab dkar lha rdzas srid na ring ba sgron pa dang / skyobs pa 'chi med dbang po lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur te bkra shis rdzas
brgyad rgyal srid sna bdun rnams gdung sras nyid kyi sku pang du 'grem pa dang / gur mgon khro bcu'i rjes gnang sogs stsol bar mdzad/ gsang rgya bkrol nas brtan bzhugs
kyang gsar rtsom gza' tshes dge bar mang ja'i thog tshogs 'don dang / 'khrungs bsangs rgyas pa phyi lo dus mdos zab ma rnams sngon lam ltar mdzad cing / de lta bu'i gdung
sras de nyid gzhon nu'i rol rtsed kyi dus kyang chos 'chad zor 'phen sogs dam pa'i ngang tshul kho nas dus 'da' bar mdzad pa zhig yod tshod dang / de nas rim bzhin sngon
gyi lung bstan bzhin dpon slob chos grags pa nyid rig gnas slob dpon du bsko bzhag bstsal te/ yon tan gyi phyi mo bri klog sogs dka' tshegs med par thugs su chud/ chos spyod
rab gsal thugs 'dzin skabs rnam rgyal gzungs sngags/ dpal mo gang zhig ma bstod pa 'dod gsol bcas thol byung du gsungs pa sogs ngo mtshar rmad du byung

ba dang / de nas yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas yab chos kyi snying po kyai rdo rje'i rdul tshon gyi dbang rgyas par sku tshe 'di nyid kyi smin byed thog mar bstsal/ de nas yab
mes gong ma'i bzhed srol bzhin/ rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis/ rdo rje phur pa/ dges rdor/ gsang 'dus 'phags lugs/ bdag med ma/ nA ro mkha' spyod/ kun rig sogs/ mngon dkyil rnams
thugs sbyong gis re re bzhin yab rje rdo rje 'chang dang / lho byang las tshan bcas kyi dbus su rgyugs sprod 'bul gnang gis rim gyis dgung grangs drug bdun la rgyud 'don
zab ma/ dgung grangs brgyad par phur sgrub tshogs dbus sogs su phebs/ gar 'cham phyag len rnams kun gyi yid 'phrog par mdzad cing / gzhan yang dges rdor sogs gong du rgyugs
sprod gang gnang so so'i tshogs dbu dang / de mtshams rgyal bas bka' bsdu bzhi pa sdom gsum rab dbye'i gzhung skyor la yang rtag par phebs tshod dang / bar gseng rnams
su yab rje rdo rje 'chang sogs dam pa rnams las snga phyir dbang lung man ngag gsan pa rnams phyogs gcig tu brjod na/ de yang yab rje padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug las/
rdo rje phur pa'i stod las byang chub sgrub dbang dang / smad las drag po sgrol dbang / gur drag nyang lugs/ kyai rdor rgyu dus dang / lam dus kyi dbang / 'jam dbyangs dmar
ser/ gser chos 'jam nag rta phyag khyung gsum/ rje btsun ma ku ru ku le/ dpal mo snying gi gser thig can/ tshogs bdag khyad par ba rnams kyi

rjes gnang / byad grol gser lde/ mgon po zhal bzhi'i rjes gnang / gsang sgrub kyi nyams khrid/ zhal pod rnams kyi lung bcas chos skor yongs rdzogs gsan/ sa skya ngag dbang
kun dga' rgyal mtshan rin chen tshul khrims dbang phyug las/ gsung ngag lam 'bras tshogs bshad cha lag dang bcas pa yongs rdzogs/ bde mchog lu nag zung dang / dril bu lus
dkyil/ bde mchog bong zhal/ gsang 'dus rigs gsum rnams kyi dbang chen/ rjes gnang spyi bka' sgrub thabs brgya rtsa/ zur bka' 'byung 'dul/ phyag rdor u tsya/ 'jam dpal dkar
po/ gza' yum/ gtsug 'bar gser chos 'jam nag gnad bcu gcig dang bcas/ ri khrod ma/ khyung nag sna tshogs yum/ 'jam dbyangs dmar seradang smra seng / seng sgra/ mi g.yo
ba dkar sngon/ rnam rgyal lha dgu/ gser chos seng gdong sngon mo/ dzam ser nag nor rgyun ma ser mo/ jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig rnams kyi rjes gnang / chos spyod rab gsal
kyi lung sogs gsan/ gur mgon brag rdzong ma phyi nang gsang gsum gyi nyams khrid rjes gnang rnams dang / gsang khrid be bum rnams kyi lung la sogs pa chos skor yongs rdzogs
gsan/ gser chos mkha' spyod skor gsum/ nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i nyams khrid chos skor yongs rdzogs gsan/ sngags 'chang yig steng gi gtor bsngo chen mo'i bka' srung rnams
kyi rjes gnang sogs kyang gsan/ rje btsun rmol drung 'chi med bstan pa'i nyi ma

las/ sbyong rgyud dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis dang / phyag rdor 'chi bdag 'joms pa/ kun rig gi dbang sogs gsan/ rje btsun a ni drung skal bzang chos kyi nyi ma las/ grub chen brgyad
cu'i byin rlabs/ bla med sgrol ma nyer gcig dang / rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i rjes gnang sogs gsan/ thar rtse mkhan rin po che byams pa kun dga' bstan 'dzin las gsung
ngag slob bshad cha lag dbang byin rlabs lung pod rnams dang bcas yongs rdzogs/ gzhan yang bir wa pa'i lam 'bras chung bar grags pa gshed dmar spros med kyi dbang byin
rlabs nyams khrid lung bcas gsan/ spyi bka' rdo rjes phreng ba'i dbang chen dngos la zhe gnyis dang / kri ya sa mu rtsa nas gsungs pa'i dge legs su byed pa'i dkyil 'khor
gsum bsnan pa'i dkyil 'khor zhe lnga'i dbang chen/ zur bka' bya rgyud dri med rnam gnyis/ gdugs dkar nyer bdun ma/ spyod rgyud a ra pa tsa na lha lnga / rnal 'byor rgyud
phyag rdor 'chi bdag 'joms pa lha bcu gsum ma/ bla med gsang 'dus ye shes zhabs lugs rnams kyi dbang chen/ gzhan yang byang gter tshe dbang lcags sdong ma/ tshe dbang mda'
'phel ma/ tshe rta zung 'brel rnams kyi dbang rjes gnang skor la/ nyang lugs gur drag gnyan sgrol/ dbyangs can dkar mo/ don zhags lha lnga seng ge sgra ngag gsung grol
bcas pa/ dzam dmar srog sgrub rnams kyi rjes gnang / sa 'jam sbags sgrub/ gang blo ma'i rig gtad/ kun

mkhyen go rams pa'i bka' 'bum gyi lung sogs rgya cher gsan/ nges pa don gyi rdo rje 'chang thams cad mkhyen pa 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang po las chos dbang bla ma gsang
'dus kyi dbang lung sogs gsan/ byams pa smon lam grags pa las dpal chen yang dag sa lugs kyi dbang / sam Ta nas gsungs shing bdag med lha nyer gsum ma rdo rje phreng ba
lugs kyi dbang / sgrub thabs rgya mtsho'i rjes gnang lung bcas dang / beg rtse 'khor mang gi rjes gnang sogs gsan/ snying ri khri chen blo bzang bstan pa'i nyi ma las/ byang
gter byin rlabs thugs dbang rgyas pa/ tshe chog 'dod bum lugs sogs gsan/ lcam phu ba 'gro mgon bstan 'dzin blo bzang las/ smin gling 'dod 'jo'i bum bzang dbang byin
rlabs rjes gnang srog gtad lung sogs/ chos skor yongs rdzogs gsan pa dang / gzhan yang gsan thor ma 'khod pa 'dren pa dam pa rnams las dbang lung gsan pa 'ga' zhig yod tshod/
de ltar thos bsam mdzad pa rnams bsgom pas thugs nyams su bzhes tshul snga phyir/ phyag na rdo rje/ 'byung po 'dul byed/ dges pa rdo rje/ rdo rje phur pa/ gur gyi mgon
po/ gnyan mgon zhal bzhi rnams kyi bsnyen sgrub mthar phyin mdzad de/ de rnams kyi nyams bzhes kyang rgyun bton chag med gnang / lhag par yab mes gong ma'i phyag len dbyangs
rol gar 'cham 'don chog dmigs pa'i go don bcas byang chub par mdzad/ dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sgrub mchod

tshogs dbus gsung bshad kyi dga' ston stsol ba dang / de nas rim pa bzhin/ zla dus so sor gur mgon khro bcu dang / drug cu ma/ sku rim chen mor grags pa'i phur bzlog mgon mdos
zab ma/ rtsi dmar gtor bzlog zab ma/ zhal bzhi pa'i gtor mdos zung 'brel/ rgyal chen bse khrab dang / dmag zor ma'i gtor bzlog rnams kyi zor 'dzin/ lha mo rje khol zung
gi mchod mdos/ gnyan mgon gyi dam tshig bskang ba rnams kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi khur bzhes mdzad de/ de nas phur sgrub dang dus mdos bla ma gong ma rdo rje 'chang dang
zhal mi gnyis rnams kyi dus mchod rgyud sde khag mang gi slob dpon sogs mang du gnang ba cho ga phyag len dbyangs rol gar 'cham bcas par rang gzhan thams cad la bstan
pa'i mig rgyan du phan par mdzad do/ /de nas nyid kyi dgung grangs bcu bdun pa kun ldan gyi yab rje rdo rje 'chang padma'i mtshan can nyid slar yang gong sa thams cad mkhyen
pa mjal phyag dang dbus gnas len du phebs bzhed skabs/ rje nyid dang yum mchog zhing skyong dbang mo bcas ston 'khor bstar sgrigs kyi phebs lugs rnams chu lug bzhin mdzad
de/ bar lam rong nang brgyud dgon gnas khag gi gnas gzigs sogs rim gnang gis lha ldan du phebs skabs thab bsu/ phebs bsu rtse shod bka' shag bcas nas ja zhus mtshams
dar sogs sngar lam bzhin stsol thog bzhugs mtsher gang du gnang ba ma gsal yang / dga' ldan khang gsar du bzhugs

med dam snyam/ de nas rim bzhin gong sa thams cad mkhyen pa tshul khrims rgya mtsho/ srid skyong mtsho smon gling pa rnams mjal phyag sogs dang / jo shAka rnam gnyis kyis mtshon
gnas rten khyad par can rnams kyi gnas gzigs mchod 'bul khrus gsol rab gnas sogs bstan 'gro yongs kyi bde thabs la phan bzhed rnams grub nas/ gzhung gi zhabs brtan
gnang tshul ma gsal yang mang du gnang bar gzhir grub pa bcas/ gzhung sa mchog nas zur gsos snga phyi bar gsum dang thon phyag mjal sogs bstsal te/ bsam yas sogs lho gnas
rnams su rim par phebs/ de skabs yar lung shel brag rten brten pa bcas pa mjal bar dam pa de nyid dang / gang gi yum mchog zhing mchog dbang mo/ gnas chos grags pa sogs
dpon 'khor rags bsdus shig phebs te/ o rgyan rin po che'i drung du tshogs brgya dang gsol 'debs le'u bdun ma zhal 'don mdzad pa'i tshe o rgyan rin po che'i sku brnyan byin
can de'i zhal bsgyur cing / zhal rgyan 'gul ba ltar mdzad par/ rdo rje 'chang de nyid phyi rol ma dag pa'i snang ngor mnal du cung zad phebs pa dang / dag pa'i snang ngor
'od gsal du mjal bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/ o rgyan rin po che'i zhal dngos su gzigs rgyu yin pa gdon mi za/ de skabs phyi nang gi mi mang las dag min sna tshogs yod pa la
brten/ zhal gzigs kun gyis mthong snang rang ma byung rung / brag phug gi yang thog nas tshe chu dbu thog tu tsheg sgra

dang bcas babs pas/ de'i rkyen gyis mnal sad pa ltar mdzad 'phral/ phyag mthil nam mkhar ston par mdzad pa na/ tshe chu mang rab byung ba rje rang nyid kyis gsol zhing / yang
bskyar gong ltar mdzad pas/ tshe chu thig pa gsum tsam byung ba rgyal yum nyid la 'bul gnang dang / da dung dpon slob de nyid la 'bul rgyu'i phyag gong ltar mdzad kyang
tshe chu ma babs pa dang / rje de nyid bzhugs gdan gyi steng nas bzhengs te/ tshe chu byung ba'i brag ngos la phyag rkyong par mdzad pas/ brag skam po chu byung ba'i rjes
tsam yang mi 'dug pa de la thugs ma tshim pa'i rnam pas slar yang gsol 'debs kyi 'phros mdzad grub 'phral chibs zhal bsgyur te sgar chen du phebs/ de'i sang nyin dpon
slob bzod pa phun tshogs sogs ban tshang pa 'ga' zhig gong gi gnas chen der mjal du byon skabs/ sku gnyer de nyid nas kha seng gi bla ma de o rgyan rin po che'i rnam 'phrul
lam/ yang na o rgyan rin po che'i zhal slob zhig yin pa the tshom gtan nas mi dgos par 'dug ste/ nga yis gnas 'dir sku gnyer byas nas lo mang de tsam song rung / kha seng
gi ya mtshan de 'dra gtan nas ma byung / gong gi phyag phyi sogs nang gi mi mang de 'dra'i khrod na dam sri sdig can kha shas pa de'i skyon gyis ma byung ba ma gtogs/
gnas 'dir bla ma de la o rgyan rin po che'i zhal mngon sum du gzigs rgyur yin pa gdon mi za bar 'dug ces zer/ de skabs ban tshang pa dpon slob bzod pa phun tshogs sogs

rdzun mi zer ba du mas 'phros pa byung gleng 'dug yar 'brog nas sgang brgyud rgyal rtse gud pa grwa tshang du phur bzlog zhig mdzad pa/ zor 'phen skabs skyabs rje dam pa 'khor
tshogs dang bcas pa'i steng gi nam mkhar 'ja' 'od kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gur khyim chos 'byung gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can phub cing / me tog gi char yang babs pas de
phyogs kyi skye bo kun mi phyed pa'i dad pa'i sa la bkod par mdzad pa na/ gang gi yab rje mchog nas/ gces gces ltar ma byed cig ang sku tshe la bar chad kyang 'byung nyen
che/ zhes gsungs par grags pa sogs ngo mtshar ba'i mdzad bzang du ma dang bcas gdan sar phebs nas ring po ma lon par rje nyid dgung grangs nyi shur phebs par chu stag lor
yab rje sku mched gnyis bka' gros mdzad de/ chu yos rigs sras sku mched rnams 'jam dbyangs sa skya paN chen gyi chos khrir phebs tshul gong rdo rje rin chen gyi rnam thar
lo rgyus skabs bzhin dang / de nas yab rje padma'i mtshan can nyid khri 'dzin dgongs zhu mdzad de gdung sras rdo rje rin chen mchog khri 'dzin du mnga' gsol te/ ring min
rje nyid dgung grangs nyer gcig tu phebs pa bcas sku mched gnyis char lha ldan rgyal khab chen por khri mjal du phebs tshul gong gcen po'i lo rgyus skabs bzhin dang /
