'di skabs tsam la rje nyid rab byung gnang 'dod thun mong ma yin par yod 'dug kyang yab rje mchog nas sa skya'i gdung rgyud 'di bzhin gangs ljongs yongs kyi bstan pa'i srog

shing du gyur cing / de ltar mdzad pas ga la 'thus kyi bka' bkyon ldog ma nus pa sngags 'chang dge bsnyen rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go sar mi bzhugs thabs med kyi rgyal khab bka'
dgongs/ sngar lo la sing dpung 'jug mdzad skabs/ gangs ri ti se dang / mtsho ma dros pa sogs gnas rten rnams la khrus gsol rab gnas su phebs dgos bka' bsgyur spyi phebs kyis
de bzhin zhu bar stod phyogs la chibs bsgyur gyi gong gsal bka' dgongs rnams dang / mnga' ris skor gsum gyi gdul bya rnams kyi bde thabs la brtson bzhugs skabs gdan sa
'dir rdo rje rin chen nyid khri 'dzin dgongs zhu mdzad par brten/ 'di ga'i lha mi sde 'bangs bcas nas da cha gdan sa'i 'dzin skyong gnang ba po skyabs mgon bkra shis rin
chen 'os pa zhig yin zhes rgyal khab tu snyan phul bzhin bka' dam bstsal bar brten/ yab rje mchog nas gdan sa'i khur bzhes mdzad dgos kyi bka' yig phebs don bzhin gdan
sar shar phebs kyis skyabs mchog de nyid dgung grangs nyer bzhir phebs pa shing sbrul lo mjug g.yul thang 'ong bzhes la dar 'dzugs dang / khri phebs chen mo gnang zin/ stabs
dus mdos zab chung sogs mdzad/ rgyal zla'i gza' tshes dge bar skyabs mchog de nyid bla chen 'phags pa rin po che'i bzhugs khri ga la bar zhabs zung mngon par bkod de/
yab rje grub pa'i dbang phyug ban tshang pa dang bcas pas slar yang gangs ljongs bstan 'gro'i mgon dpung

du mnga' gsol te shis brjod me tog 'thor ba mdzad nas/ dga' ston gyi dpal la rol bar mdzad do/ /de skabs tsam la gong ma chen mo'i bla mchod lcang skya rin po che 'di phyogs
phebs pa yab rje sku mched rnam gnyis mjal ba dang / gnas gzigs sogs mdzad nas rje 'di la zhing skyong rtsa turmu kha'i chos skor 'ga' zhig gsan/ dngul bre chen gcig gis
gtsos 'bul nod bsam gyis mi khyab pa phul zhes kyang grag go de'i sngon tsam du mdo smad khul nas nges pa don gyi thams cad gzigs pa 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse dbang po/
'phan yul nA lenDa nas mkhas grub bstan 'dzin snyan grags sogs/ skyes chen du ma rim phebs kyis phan tshun dbang bka' mang po gsan bzhes kyang mdzad do/ /de nas sa sprel
rje nyid bdag mo rje btsun ma bcas lha ldan rgyal khab chibs bsgyur rgyu'i lam gtor sogs sngar lam bzhin rim mdzad kyis/ /'di ga gdan sa nas zla ba brgyad pa'i zla phyed
tsam la sgar sgrigs kyis chibs bskyod de bar lam paN chen rin po che mjal phyag dang / bla brang mchog nas kyang bkur bzos sngar lam ltar zhus shing / de nas rong brgyud
tha skar zla ba'i tshes dgu la lha ldan du phebs/ gzhung sa mchog nas skyid tshal klu lding du thab bsu/ rtse shod bka' shag bcas so sor nas ja zhus mtshams dar 'bul ba
so sor nas mgron gnyer re phebs shing / phebs bsu ba drung skya ser so sor nas bco lnga re bstsal te pho brang sku mdun brgyud bzhugs tshe dga' ldan khang

gsar du phebs/ 'phral sne shan du/ sher spang dga' bzhi sras dang / rtse drung dam chos gnyis bstsal ba dang / mtshams der ja zhus gong bzhin phebs/ bka' shag gi phebs gsol
'bul bar sa dbang dpal lhun ngo ma phebs/ 'di lo lha ldan du rdo rje tsher ma'i nad rim tho bar skyabs mchog bdag mo rje btsun bcas bka' shag bka' 'grel rgyal dbang mchog
gi mjal phyag rtsa 'gangs che ba'i 'khor bco brgyad kyis kun gling du bag sang nyin lnga gnang / mjal phyag dngos gzhir phun tshogs mdun lam brgyud rang re'i gdugs chibs
bshol mtshams dang / gzhung sa chen po'i drung skya ser gyi mjal dar sogs sngon lam bzhin dang / gzim chung bde ldan 'khyil du cung zad bzhugs skabs gsol ja phebs/ de nas
rtse mgron nas phebs brda byung mtshams shar phebs gzim chung nyi 'od mdo sbug mkhan sde chung khag dang che kha'i mjal dar rnams bzhes te srung mdud re gnang srol sogs
sngon lam bzhin dang / de nas gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang mkhas grub rgya mtsho dang / srid skyong rwa sgreng ho thog thu bcas par mjal phyag thog
maNDal rten gsum rnams ljags bshad bcas dang / dngos 'bul sogs sngon lam bzhin mdzad/ bzhugs khrir 'khod nas gsol ja dang 'tshams 'dri bcas phebs/ de nas slar yang sngar
gyi gzim chung du gsol ja dang gsol ston spam che ba bstsal te/ spyi mkhan shag phebs kyis phyag skyes bstsal bar mgul dar phul te

mar tsam phebs skyel du'ang phebs te/ bzhugs mtsher shar bskyod gnang / de nas yongs 'dzin rta tshag rin po che nas gdan zhus kyis tshe dbang lcags sdong ma 'bul gnang dang
/ phan tshun 'bul nod zab du gnang tshul 'dug de nas jo shAka rnam gnyis dang rtser 'phags pa rin po che gser gdung khag bcas yar mchod sprin rab 'byams kyis mchod cing
/ gzhan pa'i gnas gzigs rnams kyang gnang zin nas/ zhag 'ga' nas skyabs mgon srid skyong nang mjal skabs 'di pa'i lugs gnyis khrims srol rnams dus dbang gis 'khyog po'i lam
du gyur tshul sogs gang sa nas spyi dang bye brag gi bstan don gyi zhabs 'gyur dka' ba'i khar dang / nyid kyang shes rmongs kyi gnas sogs gang sa nas gdan sa'i 'dzin skyong
dgongs zhu nan du mdzad pas/ sngon dus sa skya lha mi sde bcas nas mgrin gcig bdag chen nyid rang 'os cig mtshan 'byor pa spyan bstar dang / so so'i dag bsher dang
'brel ba bka' bkyon phebs rigs ltar gnang mod bdag nyid chen po'i phyag 'tshal dang chabs cig spyir bstan pa'i 'phel 'grib/ snyigs dus dmu rgod kyi gnas tshul/ rang nyid
skyes sbyangs kyi blo dman tshul sogs lung rigs dang 'brel ba zhu bar mdzad 'dug zhag shas nas/ rgyal po lhan rgyas te/ bka' blon bshad sgra dbang phyug rgyal po ched rdzong
gis gnang char gser srang gsum kha btags bcas bstsal te/ gdan sa'i khri 'dzin bdag chen mchog nas ma mdzad phyin/ bstan 'gro spyi

sger la gnod tshabs che lugs sogs bka' bsgyur zab brling byin chags can nan tan du phebs shing / lugs gnyis 'dzin skyong gi zhal bkod la mtho dman gang sa nas brtsi 'jog ma
byung tshe 'di gar snyan seng dang bstun nas rgyal khab rang nas rgyab gnon mdzad rgyu yin gsungs pa/ bka' don 'gal med zhu bar mdzad cing de skabs bdag chen nyid gong sa
rgyal dbang mchog gi sku gam du nyin ltar phebs dgos la mdo sngags chos kyi 'bel gtam sogs kyis dus 'da' bar mdzad/ sngon shing sprel lo yab rje sku mched dbus phebs skabs
dpal rtse bstsal gnang yang / shing sbrul lo gong ma bdag po chen pos bod kyi zhib gcod pa chis krung thang ma mngags nas srid skyong mtsho smon gling par dbu nyes kyi
zhor drud du dpal rtse gzhis ka gzhung bzhes gnang ste/ bstan rim gdugs dkar nyer bdun ma'i zhabs brtan chag thabs ma mchis stabs/ lo ltar gzhis rdzong bkar steng nas 'bru
khal nyis brgya re bstsal ba yin yang / 'di skabs rgyal blon rnams nas dpal rtse gzhis phyir log gtan chags bstsal rgyu'i bka' dam bstsal ba dang / gong sa rgyal ba'i
dbang po nas kyang / rgyal blon lhan du/ sa skya bdag chen rin po che la gdugs dkar zhig 'bul dgos bka' phebs la/ sa dbang bshad sgra dbang phyug rgyal pos kyang / de ni
bdag cag gi ston par lha dbang brgya byin gyis gdugs phul ba ltar shin tu legs so zhus te/ gdugs dkar gyi thob bya thob byed rnams ser byes dge bshes lcang bla mar

grags pas bkod de bstsal ba da ltar 'di ga bla brang na yod pa 'di dang / yang 'jam mgon kun blo dbus phebs skabs/ de ring bus rta rtsal ngom rgyu yin gsungs pa'i rnam thar
bzhin/ bdag nyid chen po'i chibs pa rgyun du brling ba yod kyang skabs shig rta skad 'tsher zhing shin tu dkrog nyams dang / me stag gi tsha tsha 'phro ba phyung bar gong
sa rgyal ba'i dbang po nas gzigs par/ bdag chen mchog gi chibs pa dkrog chen de las 'gyogs byams legs tshul bka' bstsal te/ rgyal tshab mchog gling ba'i 'gyogs byams de
bzhin gsol ras bstsal ba de'ang / da lta 'khyer ba'i 'gyogs byams rgya bzo ma che ba 'di yin tshod 'dug gzigs bzos bdag rkyen kyang tshad med pa bstsal/ gzhan yang bka'
shag sogs nas snga bar phyi gsum gyi zur gsos dang / bstan srid zhabs brtan kyang mang du thon zhing / ring min thon phyag zhu gnang gis gsol ston ljags bslog gnang cha sogs
tshad med pa bcas te/ chibs bsgyur skabs sne shan du rdo ring sher spang bstsal/ lho gnas brgyud gzhis rtser paN chen rin po che mjal phyag sogs zhu gnang gis gdan sar
phebs mdun 'dir bzhugs sku ngo rnams dang / rdo rje chos skyong lha mi sde bcas kyi las sne gtso drag gi go rim gyis phebs bsu dang / ser phreng rgyas pa bcas tshoms dmar
du gzhis byes sku ngo/ gzhung sa'i sne shan dang gsol ston sogs sngar lam rgyas par bstsal/ rdo rje chos skyong rnams gtang rag sogs kyis dus 'da' ba'i skabs so/ /

'di skabs tsam la hor khang bdag mor gdung rgyud ma byung bas yab rje mchog sogs nas rgyal rigs shing sa la lta bu dwags po lcang ra ba'i bdag mo khab bzhes kyis mtshan bsod
nams bu khrid du gsol te/ snga dus sgrol ma dmar bzlog lha khang gi byang gi 'khris lcang gseb 'dir spro khang lta bu'i gzim khang stabs bde zhig yod par rje btsun sgrol
ma skal bzang chos sgron gzim khang der 'khrungs tshod dang / de ga'i byang tsam gyi sar sgrol ma phun dpal pho brang 'di bzhin brtag slong sbyangs gsum sogs rgyud sde
nas gsungs pas sa chog dang 'brel rtsa ba nas gsar 'debs mdzad pa 'di ni/ da lta byang ngos dang bde can steng 'og klu lding lcang ra bcas pa 'di rnams yin cing / rab gnas
bcas bdag khri nyid dang chog grwa bcas nas mdzad de/ dbyar bzhugs phal cher 'di gar gnang zhing / dgun thog gzhi thog tu gdan bzhugs skabs lcang skya'i dgongs rdzogs su
sog po chu bzang sprul sku nas dus gcig la rgya dngul rta mig mar grags pa brgya phrag gcig dang lnga phul ba/ tshoms dmar du bla chen 'phags pa rin po che'i bzhugs khri'i
mdun du bzhes shing / phar yang byin rten sogs dang chos dang zang zing gi gnang sbyin zab par bstsal/ lo 'di'i sngon tsam nas bzung sngar phan srol lam med kyang sa
mchod chen mor dge ldan gnam mchod bzhin gyi thog khar mar me phreng ba spor ba dung rgya rdo gsur sogs gtong ba/ lha chen lcags ri'i steng sogs nas gsol 'debs 'ur 'don dgos
lugs

sogs bka' bsgyur dang bcas gsar btsugs gnang / phyi lo lcags khyi zla ba bdun pa'i tshes gsum la yab rdo rje 'chang nyid sku bltams pa'i tshul rgyas pa 'og nas 'byung zhing
/ 'khrungs ston du dus mdos zab ma sogs rgyas par gnang / de dang dus mnyam tsam du hor zla lnga pa'i nang bstan srid spyi bye'i zhabs brtan du zab gsol 'cham gzigs chen
mor grags pa 'di'ang / gong chu bzang ba'i 'bul dngul nas gsar 'dzugs mdzad par grags/ de snga lha chen khyams stod du bka' 'gyur gsung sgrogs dang / phur khang dang / dus
mchod du gnod sbyin rtsi'u dmar po'i gtor sgrub khag gnyis bcas zhag bdun/ phan nyin sa tshogs su tshogs gur dang / 'cham gos gyon 'bag bcas gsar bskrun 'di rnams kyi
gar 'cham nyin gnyis la gtor sgrub khag gnyis kyi zor 'phen rim pa gnyis kyi bar der dbugs ngal nyin gcig bcas mdzad srol/ de bzhin gsar 'dzugs mdzad cing / mchod rgyun bsnyen
bkur bcas zab rgyas mdzad/ gzhan yang bdag nyid chen po de nyid kyi sku thog sgrub mchod dang / gtor bzlog sogs tshogs 'du rnams la rtag par phebs shing / 'di rnams
kyi gtor 'bul dang bstun thog khar rkang gling sngon yod steng tshag shar du grags pa dung rgya rnams 'bud gtong 'di bzhin/ snga dus sgrub mchod khag la gtor bsngo chen
mo tshun nas ma gtogs dung rgya 'bud srol med pa 'dra zhing / phur sgrub gtor bzlog khag bcas la phyi nang gnyis kar 'bud srol dang / de

bzhin du gzhung bla sogs kyi srol bzhin rdo brdar ma dang sur sna bzhes pa 'di nyid la 'cham gzigs dang dus mnyam tsam la byung ba 'dra ba 'di dag gis kar gsar rnying sogs
la kho ba'i brdung tshul rnams/ 'ga' re gzhung bla sogs dang mthun zhing la la mi mthun pa yod pa 'di rnams dang / rgyun gtan bsgral las sogs la brdung ba'i brdar ma drag
brdung 'di rnams sogs mang po rig bcos lta bus bzo gnang las gzhan la cher ma grags sam snyam mo/ /de bzhin du ban tshang pa tshes mchod gtong res 'di bzhin kyang / snga
dus rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis rgyud 'don dang / dgong mo nang mchod dam bdud rtsi gtong lugs da lta bzhin mdzad pa zhig yod 'dug pa sku thog 'di nas byang gter thugs sgrub
kyi tshes bcur bsgyur gnang gis gdangs dbyangs rol mo gsol 'debs le'u bdun ma'i gdangs bcas skyabs mchog rang nas gsar bcos mdzad pa dang / 'di ni gzhung las/ khye'u pha
ma 'bod 'dra'i gdung dbyangs laH pi waM gling bu'i gdangs ltar snyan pa yiH nyin tshan dus drug rnams su gsol ba thobaH gsungs pa la dpag na 'di 'dra zhig rang yin dgos pa
don du skyabs mchog de nyid o rgyan dngos sam/ rnam sprul du gong bshad bzhin mdzad pa 'di dag gis rtogs nus so/ /gzhan chos 'di'i 'byung khungs rdo rje brag sogs su'ang
le'u bdun ma'i gdangs yod skad ma thos/ sngon gsang sngags pho brang zhes pa sngags 'chang grags pa blo gros kyi gzim spyil yin 'dug pa/

rten gtso gu ru mtshan brgyad 'di rnams thil g.yab nub nas bzhes pa sngags 'chang chen po sogs kyi phyag nas yin skad dang / gzhan 'di ga gdan sa'i gtsug lag khang gang yod
kyi slob dpon gyi snang brnyan gang na ci yod bsdus gnang gis 'dir bzhugs su gsol ba yin skad dang / de skabs khul 'dir tshang ma slob dpon la ha cang mos pas tshes bcu
sogs kyang gzhan dang mi 'dra'i gdab shog che ba byung / phur sgrub snga dus gdung rgyud bu slob sogs sus mdzad kyang gcig rang las gnang srol ma mchis kyang / bdag chen
'di nyid kyi dgongs pas sgrub yun zla gang 'gor bas/ de skabs gcig bu de nyid snyung gzhi glo bur ba de 'dra mi srid kyang nges med byung na sgrub mchod 'phro la 'jog pa
las 'os ma che gsungs nas gnyis mdzad srol 'di bzhin byung 'dug pa rnams rang bzhin gyi lo rgyus tsam dang / 'di skabs bdag chen nyid chos sde lho byang gi tshogs 'du spyi
dang / zhal lha dang zhal lha'i mchod 'bul/ bde mchog drug pa tshes bzhi sogs la'ang phebs te/ chos spyod rnam dag skyong bar mdzad cing / sa zhu lag skyangs ma dang /
chos gos me long ma gsol te chos la yang ban tshang pa dang bcas phebs te/ da lta mkhan pos gnang ba'i gsung bsngo rgyas pa bdag khri rang nas bsngo bshad rgyas pa bcas gnang
ba dang / phur sgrub dang dus mdos sogs kyi slob dpon bdag khri rang nyid dang gcung po kun dga' bsod nams gnyis kho nas gnang zhing / sgrub mchod gzhan

gyi slob dpon mang du gnang ba dang / chu byi lo mjug yab rje rdo rje 'chang padma'i mtshan can nyid cung zad sku snyung tshul bzhes par/ zhabs rim mang du sgrub par mdzad
de/ zhabs brtan rdo rje'i re kha dang bcas zhabs pad yun brtan gyi gsol btab mdzad pa lo gcig zhal bzhes mdzad cing / phyi lo chu glang yongs grags kyi dgung grangs re gnyis
dang nag rtsis pa'i lugs ltar na re gsum du phebs pa shing stag 'go zla'i nyer gnyis la dag zhing du gshegs pa dgongs rdzogs mdzad tshul rnams gong yab rje mchog gi lo
rgyus rnam thar bzhin no/ /de nas shing yos lor gor bod sde gzar byung zhing / 'di phyogs bod dmag yar bskyod rnams kyi dmag lam khel ba dang / rang zhabs rnams la 'don
dmag rtsam skyel sogs du ma gal ba/ bdag nyid chen po nyid nas chos srung rnams la bskang 'phrin dmag bzlog sogs mang du gnang bas ring min nas bal bod gnyis chings don
legs 'grig gis/ mnga' zhabs sogs 'gro ba rnams ngan 'gro'i du khaHlas thar ba lta bur gyur to/ /lo snga phyi 'di rnams su bdag cag gi ston pa grong khyer ser skyar gshegs
pa na rgyal po zas gtsang gi mnga' 'bangs rnams la gra khral bcas pa ltar/ bdag nyid chen po 'dis kyang mnga' zhabs rigs rus gtsang ldan rnams rab tu byung ste skal ldan
gyi gdul bya rnams nges 'byung gi 'byor pa dang ldan par mdzad pa dang / mdo sngags so so'i nyams len

rnams kyang spang blang tshul bzhin mdzad dgos kyi bca' khrims la brten chos sde nyi zla zung yang grwa tshogs che zhing bshad pa dang sgrub pa'i bzhed srol da lta'i bar mi
nyams gong 'phel du bzhugs pa sogs/ rnam 'dren gang gi thugs bskyed rmad du bab kho nar zad do/ /sa rta lo gsang bdag dpal chen 'od po 'khrungs pa 'khrungs ston du yul can
ban tshang pas mdos zab sngar lam bzhin gzigs phul/ gzhan yang sa mo lug gi lor dbus gtsang gi bstan 'gro'i bde thabs rgya chen bsgrub phyir lha ldan phyogs su chibs zhal
bsgyur skabs gtso bor sde 'khrug byas pa'i nyes grib sel thabs rme brtsegs kyi sgrub thabs khrus chog bcas la thugs brtson lhag par che zhing / jo shAka rnam gnyis sogs
la mchod 'bul thugs smon gang mdzad kyang / 'khrug rtsod zhi ba'i gsung kho na mdzad pa sogs rgyun dang mi 'dra ba'i thugs ngal che cher mdzad/ de nas mi ring bar 'phan
po khul gyi dgon sde spyi dang / bye brag lcang gling chos sde nas gdan zhu dbu nan mdzad par brten/ de phyogs su chibs zhal bsgyur te lcang gling chos sder phebs 'phral/
lha ldan nas rgyal blon rnams kyis 'phral du lha sar phebs dgos/ de yang dge ldan 'dus spyi rnams nas/ gzhung sa'i gzhis lhag cig tu la phug sogs dbyar zas kyi lab gzhir
brten/ smon lam chen mor ma phebs pa de legs sgrig mdzad dgos gsal ba'i zhu yig 'byor byung 'phral/ bstan 'gror dgongs pa'i thugs bskyed

bzang pos bskul te/ myur bar chibs zhal bsgyur gnang gis 'dus sder dbu mang rnams la smon lam chen mo 'di nyid spyir yang bstan 'gro yongs dang / der 'du ba po rang rang rnams
kyi bde thabs bla na med pa zhig yin pa dang / 'jam mgon chos kyi rgyal po'i mdzad chen bzhir grags pa'i nang nas gnad che shos yin pa sogs gang sa nas phebs dgos tshul
mdo rgyud lung dang sbyar ba'i rdo rje'i bka' nan chen po bstsal bar/ 'dus sde rnams nas kyang gus zhen drag pos bka' don dang len zhus shing / de mthun rgyal blon rnams
la'ang gang ci'i mdzad sgo rnams kyi legs 'chos kyi bka' rgya chen bstsal bar brten/ tshegs med legs 'grig byung ba sogs mdor na/ sde 'khrug sogs kyi gleng gzhi rtsa med
gong du de dag zhi ba'i thabs rim kho na la thugs brtson mdzad pa sogs/ dus gsum sgrib bral du gzigs pa'i 'dren pa bla na med pa zhig yin pa ni sems ldan kun gyis rtogs
bya'i yul yin no/ /yang de skabs tsam la yin shag la/ srid skyong skyabs mgon sbug mgul la snyung gzhi thu mo che zhig bzhes skabs rnam 'dren dam pa nas ljags chu phul
zhing / srung 'khor byin rlabs sogs mdzad pas snyun las grol te gzigs bzos bdag rkyen tshad med byung ba dang / bal po'i dpon po zhig nad kyis mnar te 'chi la thug pa'i tshe/
rgyal blon rnams nas mi 'chi ba'i thabs sa skya bdag chen mchog nas ma mdzad phyin/ 'dir shi na bod khams yongs la gnod tshabs che bas de

bzhin dgongs dgos zhes zhus pa na/ bdag nyid chen pos bka' bsgo byin rlabs nad bdag la gtor ma sogs mdzad pas bal po'i dpon nad las thar te/ sa skya bdag chen gyis bdag 'chi
ba'i 'jigs pa las bskyabs par gyur to/ /zhes gsol zhing dad gus kyis 'bul nor bsam gyis mi khyab pa phul ba dang / skyabs mgon rtse shod nas kyang legs gsol stobs pa sogs
bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / skye 'gro mchog dman kun gyis bdag chen rin po che la nad de ga'i skyon ye nas ma byung bas so skye tha mal ga la yin zer/ 'di ni nges par
slob dpon rin po che'i gangs can gyi mgon skyabs su sprul par gdon mi za'o/ /'di skabs kyang mjal phyag sogs dang sngar lam sne shan thab bsu skyel chibs zhabs/ sne shan
lam yig zur bzos sogs sngar lam bzhin bstsal ba'o/ /de nas gzhung zhabs ji snyed mdzad dgos rnams grub ste thon phyag sogs sngar bzhin zhu gnang gis sngar lam lho gnas gzigs
te gdan sar phal cher sngar bzhin gyis gdan sa chen por phebs tshul sngar bzhin dang / 'di skabs bzhugs gnas rdo ring du gnang zhing / sne shan kyang de nyid yin skad/
yang lcags bya lo lha ldan du zing gzhi cung zhig byung bar bdag nyid chen pos bab bsed zhu yig rten bcas khungs so sor phul bas 'dus sde rnams mi phyed pa'i dad gus la
bkod de/ zhu lan legs pa dang / maNDal rten gsum bcas phul zhing / slar zing gzhi je gyes su song ba na/ gzhis

rtse spyi khyab mkhan po/ bla brang phyag mdzod no mi han gyis gtsos gtsang khul gtso drag rnams dang / bod gzhung am ban zung bcas nas kyang chings sgrig la phebs dgos 'byor
don bzhin dang / sgo rum ye shes mgon po'i drung du brtag sgril mdzad pas/ byon pa legs tshul thon pa bzhin/ bdag nyid chen po lha ldan rgyal khab chen por phebs/ rtse
shod am ban bcas la 'byor phyag mdzad/ de skabs bzhugs gnas ra shag tu mdzad de/ sa dbang bshad sgra dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bdag nyid chen po gnyis thog mtha' bar gsum
gyi bka' mchid mol te/ chings sgrigs kyi zhabs 'degs su lha sa bla brang gi yang steng tshoms chen du/ drung spyi sogs che btsan khag mang dang / bla ma las sne sogs
brgya phrag lnga tsam tshogs pa'i dbus/ bkra shis lhun po nas sngags chen/ gsol dpon mkhan po sogs dang / ser smad sngags grwa dang bcas pa'i las sne sogs bar mi mtha' dag
lhan rgyas mdzad/ bdag nyid chen po bzhugs khri padma ra ga'i mdangs ldan shin tu mtho brtsegs yod pa'i steng du gdan drangs te/ sku gzi mdangs 'bar zhing 'gying bag gi
tshul dang / thugs g.yo med ngang nas/ der yod kun la zhal dkyil gyi 'dzum mdangs ngom bzhin par spyir sems can gyi las mthu dang / bstan pa'i sku gegs yin tshul sogs bka'
'dom la 'dus che ba kun gyi rna dbang du 'jebs pa dpag med mdzad pa dang / slad char yang snying sngon du yi ge phul ba ltar tshang mas

dgongs 'jags zhu gsungs pa na/ kun kyang mi phyed dad pas thal mo snying khar zum/ de nas 'bras spungs pa'i dbu bzhugs zhal ngo sgo byed dang / dge ldan khri pa'i phyag mdzod
gnyis kyang rim bzhin stan las langs te snga phyi'i byung rkyen mtha' dag zhib par gsol/ dge bshes zhig nas chos kyi 'bel gtam dang bcas zhu ba/ so so la rang rang gi
bsam pa dang mthun pa'i bka' bsgyur bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnang / bar pa gong gsal rnams nas kyang zhu 'degs mdzad/ de rjes bzhi sder rgyal blon sogs dang / ser byes dbu
dmangs sogs la'ang gong ltar bka' slob snying gi bdud rtsi bstsal/ de nas zhag 'ga'i bar la yi ge'i lam nas bden rdzun gtan la dbab pa sogs sku ngal khyad du bsad de sgrigs
'dum mdzad/ de dus phar byon tshur byon skabs khrom tshogs 'bum du longs pa dag nas kyang sangs rgyas dngos slob dpon rin po che sa skya bdag chen mkhyen/ mkhyen/ bdag
cag zing gzhi 'di las bskyab tu gsol/ zhes du ma lab cing gsol ba 'debs pa dang / dmag mi rnams nas kyang mjal phyag ma byung dogs nas 'tshangs byed de 'byon lam mi shong
ba lta bur byung / de nas so sos bdag chen rin po che'i bka' la don 'khyol zhu bar thag chod mtshams/ glo bur du rkyen ngan lta bus ma sgrib pa/ re zhig dbus lho phyogs
su phebs te/ dgon sde rnams la rab gnas mchod 'bul so so'i 'dod 'char gyi chos bka' mang 'gyed bslab khrims nas

brtsams te bshad sgrub kyi nyams len thugs zhen mdzad dgos kyi bca' khrims sogs kyang mdzad/ yar lam paN chen thams cad mkhyen par mjal phyag legs pa dang / bla brang zhabs
pad nas kyang gus 'dud kyis nang lugs gsol ston rgyas gshom dang bcas gsungs gleng zhib rgyas mdzad/ rim bzhin gdan sa chen por phebs te chos srung rnams la gtang rag 'bul
ba sogs sngar bzhin mdzad/ gtsug lag khang du rten bzhengs sogs ji ltar mdzad tshul ni/ shing byi lo snron zla'i nang rgyal yum dam pa skal bzang bde skyid bu khrid dag
zhing du phebs par dgongs rdzogs spyi dang / dbu rtse gtsug lag khang du rje nyid dang chog grwa bcas nas dpal ngan song sbyong rgyud kun rig gi cho ga sta gon dang dngos
gzhi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i sgrub mchod nyin grangs du ma dang / lho byang tshogs yongs nas bzang spyod sogs smon lam grangs mang tshogs 'don/ phyi lo
dbu rtser lam 'bras bla brgyud zhal skong du rje rdo rje 'chang padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gi snang brnyan rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa 'di'ang rgyal yum de nyid dang
gdung sras sngon du gshegs pa bcas kyi nang rten chabs cig yin par gsungs shing / sngon dus gtsug lag khang der dbyar dus rlon gyis gnod tshabs che bar gnam g.yab lcam gang
gnyis ka ring gnyis bcas gsar bskrun mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang mchod rdzas gsar sbyor mang du mdzad/ chos byang la dgon gsang sngags bde chen gling dri

gtsang khang nyams shin tu che bar rmang nas gsar bskrun dang / nang du sman bla'i dkyil 'khor blos bslangs/ nye 'khor grwa shag rnams dang / nyams gso gsar bzhengs lta bu
mdzad pa yin yang / dgon gnyer rim pas bdag tshags dag min la brten mchod rdzas rnams kyang bor brlag sogs chud zos su btang ba/ dpon khungs rim pa nas thugs zhib dang rgyab
gnyer ma mdzad pas/ da skabs ming gi lhag mar gyur pa de ltar dang / lha chen chos grwa'i byang ngos rten brten pa bcas gsar bskrun mdzad pa dang / rje btsun kun bsod
bstan pa'i nyi ma'i dgongs rdzogs su snga dus kyi rnam rgyal sku 'bum nyams gso dang bum ldir la grang gser 'jim byugs/ mchod khang bkod legs sngar bas bzang ba/ gzhan yang
de'i rgyab kyi theg chen chos rje'i phyi rten dang / 'khon sku 'bum/ 'bum thang steng 'og shAka bzang sku 'bum sogs la nyams gso dang / bde mchog pho brang gi bla ma
lha khang / steng gi mgon khang nyams gso gsar bskrun lta bur mdzad pa dang / zhabs brtan lha khang gi gzim spyil 'dzam gling 'od 'bar gyi nub ngos kyi gyang logs la/ 'gro
mgon chos rgyal 'phags pa'i rnam thar bkod legs rab mdzes bris par mdzad pa ni rje nyid kyi sku tshe 'dir rten bzhengs kyi thog ma yin pas/ dam pa 'di nyid kyis lugs gnyis
kyi mdzad 'phrin rgya cher 'byung ba'i rten 'brel yang dag go /gzim chung nyi 'od du gzhon nu rol rtsed skabs kyi thugs dam 'cham mgon lcam

dral zung dang / gnyan mgon zhal bzhi pa bcas bzhugs pa'i gzim spyil mgon khang shar/ sngon du song ba bzhin g.yu khar ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang gi byang du bsti gnas phun
dpal rten brten pa bcas dang / lhag tu yab rje grub pa'i dbang phyug dang / ngag dbang kun dga' rgyal mtshan zung gi sman sku byin rlabs gzi 'bar sprul pa'i gandho la chen
po'i nub byang mtshams su/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gi gdung rten dri gtsang khang sngar bshad pa bzhin rgyal yum zhing skyong dbang mo'i nang
rten dngul gdung khyad 'phags/ lha thil khyams stod du gdung zhing gshegs kyi nang rten/ gu ru rin po che snang srid zil gnon gser zangs las grub pa'i thugs kar yab rje
pad ma'i mtshan can gyi phyag bzo 'khrul med slob dpon rin po che'i sman sku bzhugs pa/ lha rtse bla ma lha khang du stod hor sogs mtha' dmag gi kha gnon du yab rje padma'i
mtshan can gyi sman sku nang gzungs su de nyid kyi gdung tshwa ci mang dang / rig byed lha mo'i snang brnyan thugs kar bzhugs pa'i sku 'dra shin tu byon gtsang ma log
'dren zil gnon du grags pa rten bzhengs mdzad rigs rags tsam dang / gzhan yang sgar chen gyi gdan sa yul chen 'dzam gling kun smon dang / yab rje dbang sdud snying po'i
gzim spyil sbu gzhis dang / bzang ldan chos sde sogs la'ang nyams gso dang / dge 'dun rnams la bca' khrims sdom pa sogs yab mes gong ma rnams kyi mdzad spyod kyi rjes su
slob par mdzad do/ /

de lta bu'i dam pa de nyid rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa gsum gyis thugs rgyud bcings te/ gong du brjod pa bzhin bsnyen sgrub gyi rim pa mang du gnang ngo / /rgyun du yang / dpal
sa skya'i thugs dam bir srung dang lam zab phyi nang gnyis re dang / lam rgyas bsdus zung / de steng dril bu lus dkyil lam/ nA ro mkha' spyod gang rung bsnan pas bzhir
grags pa rnams dang / 'byung po 'dul byed/ srung 'khor rdo rje brag rdzong ma rnams chags med dang brgyad/ bcu bzhi nyer gsum nyer dgu rnams la sgrub mchod gtor bzlog sogs
phebs skabs su de nyid dang / gzhan du mgon khang so sor bskang gso ched phebs kyis chag med mdzad/ gzhan yang tshes gsum dus mchod/ rmug chung sogs su'ang chog grwa dang
/ nang gsol zhes pa nyer spyod mchod chab sogs sku 'khor gsol gzim gang rung nas gtong rten rnams zhing ma brjes bar du gnang skad 'dug pa sogs thugs nyams su bzhes pa
las da gzod grub 'bras sngon du brnyes zin pas/ grub mtshan mngon shes sogs ni byis pa mtshar skyed tsam las dper na lo legs na rtsa dang phub ma zhar la byung ba 'dra
bas dam pa rnams dges par gyur dben yang rang cag gdul bya dman pa rnams kyi ngor cung zad gong du brjod zin pa dang / gzhan yang sku gzhon nu'i dus su nyin ltar 'bras sil
zhal dkar re 'bul dgos pa/ nyin gcig cung 'gyangs pa gzigs nan che ba dang bcas zhal dkar 'bras bcas zhabs lha'i rdo gcal nang du

sing sgra dang bcas 'phangs par mdzad kyang / zhal dkar chag skyon lta ci 'bras kyang ma bor bar grags pa dang / bsam brling du yab rje mchog nas sgrol khang gsar bzhengs kyi
rab gnas mdzad skabs khams mo zhig gis g.yu zhig phul ba ming la ci zer gsungs pas/ ye shes sgrol ma zer zhus te/ sku 'khor rnams la bdag rkyen sprod gsungs kyang khams
mo dgon pa'i mar tsam nas rlung 'tshub tu yal bar/ yab rje mchog la zhus pas gcen gyis rab gnas mdzad pas ye shes phebs rtags yin gsungs/ gong gi snang brnyan gyi thugs
kar bzhugs pas g.yu khar mo che'i sgrol ma'i lo rgyus dang mtshungs pa'i ngo mtshar gyi gnas mchis/ yang gzhung sa'i zhabs brtan sing dmag sogs kyis 'tshe ba zhi phyir las
mgon pu tra'i gtor bzlog mdzad pas zor 'phen skabs rwa zor phyir log pa na ga nas byung cha med pa'i khyi nag snying dkar zhig glo bur du byung ste/ rwa zor khar khur
nas dgra phyogs su rtse bstan te bzhag song ba de yod kun gyis mthong bar grags pa sogs grub mtshan bstan tshul rags pa dang / bsam brling smon bde ba'i dgag pa legs ldan
la khyod kyi pha na ba drag gam gsungs pa la/ bdag kha sang nas 'gro rgyu ma byung lags zhus pas/ 'o na do nub nges par 'phrad par gyis gsungs/ de bzhin byas pas de'i nub
mor 'das song ba kho na re/ skyabs mgon chen po'i thugs rje mngon mkhyen ma gtogs 'chi khar pha bu 'phrad pa med zhus tshod bcas de 'dra'i rigs mang

du snang yang 'dis mtshon par bya'o/ /'chad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdul bya'i blo gros kyi pad tshal 'byed pa'i tshul yang snga phyir gsung ngag rin po che smin grol gyi
gdams pa thengs gsum tsam gnang / mgon po'i chos skor sogs dang lung man ngag mang du gnang ba'i dngos slob kyang / gang gi sku mched sngags 'chang kun dga' bsod nams sku
mched yab rje rdo rje 'chang kun dga' snying po mched zhal zung gang gi rigs sras rje btsun rnams dang / 'jam mgon mkhyen brtse dbang po gong dkar mchog sprul/ chos sde
nyi zla zung gi mkhan slob rnams dang / gzhan yang gong ma bdag po chen po'i bla mchod lcang skya rin po che/ chu bzang sprul sku/ lcang lung sprul sku/ brag g.yab no mi
han/ sde dge rgyal sras bla mas mtshon gangs can gyi dgon gnas so so'i mkhan po/ de dag gi bu slob yang slob sogs kyis 'dzin ma'i khyon 'dir khyab par rgyal bstan ji srid
gnas kyi bar du 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad do/ /rtsod pa rdo rje'i me char gyis log lta'i ri bo snyil tshul ni/ spyir rtsod pa zhes pa rang gzhan gyi grub mtha'i gzhung gang
yin dpang du btsugs te rgol snga phyi rnam gzhag gi rgyal bstan dag par sgrub pa bzhin la 'jog pa la dam pa 'di nyid nas dngos su rtsod pa ma mdzad kyang brgyud nas sdom
pa gsum gyi phyag len spyi dang bye brag gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor bri thig rgyan gtor bzo dbyangs rol cho ga phyag len gang la yang rgyud dang grub chen gyi gzhung
dang /

bla ma gong ma dag gi mngon dkyil sogs gzhung lugs rnams dang / mthun mi mthun gyi dag zhur yang dag mdzad/ gal te mi mthun pa 'dug na lung rigs rnam dag gis rgyab gnon dang
bcas tshar bcad de phyin chad de rigs mi chog pa'i bka' nan dang / gal cher lus longs spyod thog bka' nyes sogs bstsal te bstan pa'i mig rgyan la phan par mdzad pa shin
tu mang ba dper mtshon na/ deng dus bdun pa'i bskul res zhes pa 'di snga dus med kyang bdag nyid chen po de nyid kyi sku dus su tshogs phebs dang slob dpon rtag par gnang
skabs ban tshang gzhon gras dang bsnyen song rnams nas 'don chog dang dbyangs rol rnams blor chub yod med sna tshogs la brten re re bzhin zhu dag dang 'brel phyin chad
de bzhin mi 'byung ched bdun pa'i phur sgrub zla gcig ring gzhon gras rnams la bskul res 'di bzhin 'dzugs gnang la brten/ deng sang slob gnyer yar skyed 'di bzhin byung 'dug
pa sogs kyis shes so/ /rtsom pa sdebs legs kyi phreng bas rgyal bstan mdzes par mdzad pa yang / spyir rtsom pa zhes pa yi dam gyi lha dang sangs rgyas byang sems la bstod
pa rtogs brjod sogs dang rgyal gsung mdo rgyud rab 'byams kyi dgongs pa dang 'brel ba'i bstan bcos la sogs pa 'phags bod du byon pa'i paN grub rnams kyis mdzad pa bzhin
nus tshe rtsom pa kho nas kyang yi dam lha yi zhal mthong ba dang / gnas lugs kyi don rtogs pa la sogs pa 'byung bar gsungs kyang / de las ldog pa'i kun

slong gzhan la sma phab 'dod dang / rang nyid che 'dod kyi nga rgyal/ rang bzhin drang po ma yin par rtsom pa sogs la ni phan yon med pa'i khar nyes pa ches lci bar sgrub byed
las dgos pa gang yang med kyang / bdag nyid chen po 'dis ni mang po brtsams par mdzad kyang / yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched sogs rje rang nyid kyi dbu bla rnams kyi
brtan bzhugs gsol 'debs mang ba dang / sgrol dkar tshar lugs 'od zer drug sbrags kyi cho ga rje 'di nyid nas chos sde lhor zla re bzhin tshes gnyis la gsar 'dzugs mdzad
pa'i chog sgrigs/ kun thub 'khor lo'i rab gnas/ zab gsol 'cham gzigs chen mo'i gtong gzhi dang / 'don chog gi deb/ nang gsol skabs sogs la mkho ba'i chos srung khag gi gsol
kha 'phrin bskul la sogs pa mang du bzhugs tshod rnams rgyal bstan spyi dang bye brag la phan pa dang bde ba'i 'phrin las kyi mdzad sgo rags tsam las zhib pa ni/ rnam
thar phyi mor yang ma 'khod pas ham rdzun gyi phreng ba sgrig ma nus pas re zhig de tsam la bsdus nas/ da ni re zhig gzugs sku chos dbyings su bsdus pa'i tshul ni/ dgung
grangs zhe gnyis su phebs par khro bo zhes pa shing glang lo shar ba na/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten sogs kyi nyams gso rnams kyang ma grub dogs pas thugs brtson che
bar mdzad pa dang / spyir yang lo snga phyi 'di rnams su khul 'dir bla brang khag dang / drung rigs/ chos sde lho byang sogs snyigs lnga'i rang mdangs brdol ba dang 'byung
po'i cho

'phrul lta bus/ phan tshun phyogs lang dpung sgrig byed phyogs kyis bdag khri la yang brtsi min sna tshogs zhig byung 'dug pa/ sngon du gong sa mchog dang rgyal blon sogs kyi
bka'i phebs sgo bzhin rgyal khab rang la snyan seng mdzad tshe bka' zhib dang 'brel byed gte rnams ther 'don gyis bskal pa bde 'jam yong ba gzhir grub kyang / de bzhin
gnang tshe bla brang khag rnams dang / chos sde rnams ni phan tshun bla slob gnas su gyur pa'i dam sel sogs la dgongs nas snyan seng sogs ma gnang yang / 'di bzhin du rtag
par gyur tshe sa bstan chos srid dang / ma 'ongs gdung rgyud rnams kyang chos srid kyi 'phrin las mdzad bkag la dgongs pa de skabs kyi gzhis rtser rta khal spyi khyab
pa mkhan chung chos bzang dge 'dun la bka' mol gyis bla khag las byed/ lho byang las sne/ drung rigs bcas par gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' bkod bzhin/ bdag
chen rin po che'i bka' gnang thod bcing zhu rgyu'i gan rgya mthu mo che zhes pa 'jog dgos byung 'dug pa sogs dang / de skabs rnams su sku mdun pa rnams la bka' phebs
su'ang / da cha dam sel gyi dbang las rang gzhan mtha' dag ngan song gi rgyu las mi 'da' bas ca zing gi yul las ne'u gseng gi spras pa'i spang ljongs sam bas mtha' zhig tu
skye ba blangs pas 'gab ces yang yang gsungs kyang bdag cag gi ston pas/ kun dga' bo la de bzhin pa ni 'dod na/ bskal pa'am bskal pa'i bar du

bzhugs par nus so/ /zhes yang yang gsungs kyang / kun dga' bo bdud kyis rna ba khebs nas ci yang ma zhus pa bzhin don du bstan srid kyi sku gegs bdo bas gang yang zhu ma spobs
pa'i khar/ rtse phyag ye shes pa la de don rang nyes pa yong gi min nam snyam pa zhus tshod sogs dang / yang dam pa de nyid kyi gsung las/ sngon dus yab rje rdo rje 'chang
gzhan don du gshegs skabs/ da khri chen gzhi thog tu byon cing gsungs pa na/ kho bos phyag 'tshal dang 'brel lo gnyis gsum brtan bzhugs kyi yid smon byas pas yab rje
mchog nas nga lus na so rgas pas bsdod na ci la phan/ khyed rang yang khri thog tu sdad ring jus lam sogs gang sa nas phun sum tshogs pa byung / khri thog yun ring por
ma byed gsungs pa'i lo dus da lo rdzogs kyin yod gsungs pa dang / yang gzhi thog pho brang gi sku sger gyi phyag rdzas rnams kyang / sgrol pho dang zhabs lha sogs su spo
ba dang / sngon nas yod pa'i khri thog pa'i thugs mkho rnams de khar bzhag gnang gi zhal bkod mdzad pa la rgyun dang mi 'dra ba'i rtags 'grus che ba mdzad/ yang skabs shig
tu gzhi thog nas zhabs lhar byon pa'i tshe/ kun ra nas gnas der spyan cher gzigs te/ da phan skyid po rang byung / da ni ga ler sku bzhugs gnang gsungs pa ni/ mkhan chen
ngag dbang chos grags kyi rnam thar dang mtshungs pa dang / yang skabs shig gsungs las mdang nub gnyid dang 'od gsal 'brel ba'i ngang las nub phyogs bde ba can du phyin

pa'i dag snang shar te/ de nas yab rje grub pa'i dbang po dang / yum mchog zhing skyong dbang mo skal bzang bde skyid bu khrid bcas kyang bzhugs 'dug pa/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang
gi gsung las/ 'o khri chen kyang byon pa shin tu legs/ da 'di rang du bzhugs shig gsungs pa'i mod la gnyid sad pas thugs yid dga' skyo 'brel ba'i ngang las/ gzhan dang
mi 'dra ba'i rig pa dwangs sing nge ba zhig byung ba gang yin ni ma shes/ zhes zhabs 'bring pa 'ga' zhig la gsung pa na/ bde ba can dang seng ge bris cha dang mtshungs
pa lags sam zhus pas/ bris cha ni mtshon byed tsam yin/ de lta'i zhing khams ni brjod du med pa'i ngo mtshar che nges shig gda' gsungs pa ni sa lo chen po dang rje btsun
rin po che'i rnam thar dang mtshungs/ yang lha bzo ba dbu mdzad rnam rgyal la/ bstan ma bcu gnyis kyi zhing bkod 'di dang 'di bzhin bris shig gsungs pa'i bka' gnang bzhin
bris zin pa/ gzigs rtog phul ba na/ 'o 'di la rgyab zung dgos pas drung rams pa zhig la sprod/ 'di la tsha brag kyang yod do gsungs/ phyis brtag tshe brtan ma bcu gnyis
rnams gdan la bzhugs shing / gzhon pa rnams spa ra lta bu zhig na 'dug pa'i zhal bkod mdzad 'dug pa bod khams skyong ba'i gzhi bdag rnams la'ang da ni bzhugs shig gsungs
pa'i brda dang / de nyin sku 'khor rnams la de ring shin tu skyid po rang 'dug khyed rang rnams lhod par sdod gsungs/ de'i sang hor lugs smin drug

zla ba'i mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus kyi tshes nyer gcig la sku rlung gi snyun gzhi lta bu'i dbu phran tsam snyung ba'i tshul bzhes te/ rdor sems kyi sgom bzlas mdzad pa dang /
de nas cung zhig nas 'da' kha ma'i rnal 'byor zab mo gsal 'debs par mdzad de/ nyi zla'i rlung dhu tA'i nang du bsdus te/ rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong nyid dang / mchog
tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde chen ro mnyam par/ 'od gsal phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du mnyam par bzhag nas/ thun mong gzugs sku'i bkod pa chos dbyings su bsdu ba'i tshul bstan/ de
'phral mkhan khri bkra shis chos 'phel nas thugs dam zab mo'i gsal 'debs zhus thog de nas tshes nyer lnga'i srod la dge ldan gnam mchod kyi thog khar snang gsal sogs kyi
mchod pa sbrengs shing / dung rgya gling rdar ma bsu sna sogs rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs sgra snyan gyi phyogs kun khyab pa dang mnyam du gong 'od gsal las zung 'jug
gi skur bzhengs te/ dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi mdun bsus shing / mdo nas bshad pa'i bde ba can nam sngags nas bshad pa'i mkha' spyod rig 'dzin gyi gzhal yas khang du
spyan drangs par gyur to/ /de nas sku spur longs sku'i chas su bzhugs su gsol ba'i mdun du sna lnga'i mchod sprin rab 'byams bcas/ dge 'dun bzhi gras bla mchod la sogs pa
gzhung sger sogs nas dgongs rdzogs don ldan sgrub cing skabs der phun phor yang snyan 'bul zhus tshod la/ de 'phral skyabs mchog kun dga' bsod nams

ngo phebs kyis mchod tshogs dang bcas spur mjal gnang thog thugs smon dang bcas spyan chab kyang mang gsil gyis/ ngos kyi jo lags 'di bzhin bsod nams kyi ra bar ma chun tshul
gyi thugs ngal mang gnang bcas dgongs rdzogs rnams kyi bka' bkod bskyangs pa dang / de nas phun phor phebs te gsol 'debs rigs kun khyab bdag 'di bzhin skad cig la ljags
rtsom gyis de nub mang ja'i steng tshogs chen du zhal 'don du bstsal/ de skabs yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid rdo rje phur pa'i ljags bsnyen bzhugs skabs yin pas a lce drung
rje btsun skal bzang chos sgron zhabs 'bring drag gras nas 'gan 'khur byas te/ dgongs rdzogs kyi rigs dang khri 'dzin gyi las dam yig rigs sogs kyang de nyin rang phul
bzhes gnang tshod dang / sku gdung bzhugs pa'i steng der bla bre med pa/ sngon thub bstan yangs pa can gyi mkhan rnying nas bla bre de sku gdung yid bzhin nor bu'i dbu thog
tu phul bas gdung der ches skyon chung skyon med par sngon du bzo bo mkhas pas tshad pa bzhin legs par 'grig cing / rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / kyai rdo rje'i
sgrub mchod/ zab mo bla ma'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa'i thugs dam gsal 'debs/ rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen por gsung rten 'bul ba dang chabs cig gser snyan sgron
pa sogs dang / hor zla bcu gcig pa'i tshes gsum nyin ser phreng zab ma dang bcas sku gdung rin po che sprul ba'i gandho la chen po'i phur khang du mchod tshogs kyi

dbus su gdan drangs te/ thub bstan lha chen gyi mkhan po byams pa bkra shis chos 'phel nyid kyis rdo rje phur pa la brten pa'i dus mtha'i cho gas byin zar zhu sbyong mdzad
'phral/ zhugs rang bzhes lta bu'i ngo mtshar gyi tshe'ang / nam mkha' shin tu sngo dwangs pa la me tog gi char babs pa sogs byung zhing / de nyin sna lnga'i stong mchod/
'dus tshogs su bla ma mchod chog mjam mang ja dngul 'gyed/ ngan slong rnams la sbyin gtong rlabs po che spyi sger nas bstsal/ tshes lnga nyin gdung rus rnams zhabs lhar spyan
drangs te mchod 'bul khrus gsol bcas dang / de ltar gdung rus rnams la yungs 'bru lta bu'i ring bsrel dang / rje btsun gong ma lnga/ dbang lha skor gsum/ thub pa'i dbang
po'i sku bzhugs khyim bcas dang / rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'jam dbyangs la sogs pa dang / hU~M yig la sogs pa yig 'bru'i tshogs rnams dang / byang chub mchod rten la sogs
pa rten gsum 'bur dod dang / ri mo'i rnam pa can la sogs pa dad ldan gyi gdul bya rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dpal du bskrun par mdzad do/ /de rnams gdung rus rnams rgyud
sde rnams nas gsungs pa bzhin dri bzang dang bcas btul te/ gdung tshwa bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems/ chos srung nor lha dang bcas pa'i sku par grangs med par btab
ste/ gser gsol phul nas/ sngags 'chang kun dga' bsod nams kyis rab gnas mdzad/ phyag rgyas btab nas tshogs kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol/

de ltar dgung zhag nam rdzogs bar bla ma mchod chog kyai rdor sgrub mchod dgung zhag bdun re'i mtshams dang / skabs 'gar 'dus tshogs su 'gyed mang ja/ kun rig cho ga sogs dang
/ dgung zhag gsum bar sngags 'chang bla ma ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams tshogs dbur phebs te/ gsang sngags bde chen gling gi 'dus tshogs dang bcas pa'i rdo rje phur
pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod zab mo zhag bdun mdzad pa dang / de nas bzung lo ltar rgyun 'dzugs kyi phur pa sgrub mchod/ dus dran gyi mchod 'bul gser sdu bcas/
dgung zhag thim nyin stong mchod rten gsum rnams la snyan dar/ 'dus tshogs su mang ja 'gyed/ ngan slong rnams la sbyin gtong sogs dang / lo de'i zla re nyin ltar chos
sder kun rig cho ga mang ja/ brgya mchod bcas dang / gzhan yang skyabs mgon rgyal dbang rin po ches gtsos skyabs mgon rtse shod/ paN chen thams cad gzigs sogs la 'bul tshan/
ngor sogs dbus gtsang gi dgon gnas rnams la mang ja 'gyed bsngo rten sogs zhib par de dus kyi thor gsal zhing / de nas yab rje mchog bcad rgya rdol nas/ gzhung sger
nas nang rten rin chen gnyis pa dang / gdan khri chos 'khor zangs las grub pa'i byang chen mchod rten nang gzungs ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi bye brag bdag chen de nyid kyi
gdung rus la khang bzang gi nang thub dbang grong zhud ma rang byon shin tu gsal bas mtshon rtsa ba'i lha tshogs kyi snang brnyan du

ma byon pa rnams btul te/ gdung 'dam las spar ba'i bla ma chos srung nor lha'i sku du ma dang / khro phu byams pas dga' ldan nas phab pa'i thub dbang lha bab mas mtshon gser
sku dang sman sku 'grel bzhi bcu byin can rnams bzhugs pa la rin po che du ma'i phra rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ lha chen du yab rje padma'i mtshan can gyi nang rten gyi g.yas
ngos su zhal shar bstan du bzhugs pa 'di nyid la/ yab rje mchog nas rab gnas bsdus pa lan du ma/ rgyas pa zhag bdun bcas bstsal bas/ slar chu stod zla nang gza' tshes dge
bar bdag khri ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams/ chog grwa ban tshang pa dang bcas pas rdo rje phur pa la brten pa'i rab gnas shin tu rgyas pa/ zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg grol
nyin phyi bskor la me tog 'thor ba/ lha chen glo bur la gos sku zhal phye'i mchod 'bul dang / gtsug lag so sor yang sna lnga'i mchod pa brgya phrag du ma dge 'dun dang
skye bo'i sde la dngos 'gyed sogs rgya che ba dang / lo dus kyi sku mchod du gzhung sger nas dpal chen rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor zhal phye
stee zhag lnga / dus chen nyin ser 'du ja thug zhal bskor skabs dgos pa'i bzang gos kyi mchod phreng bcu gnyis mtshan pa gsar bskrun sogs/ mdor na dpal ldan bla ma dam pa
rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi zab dgongs yongs su rdzogs thabs rgya che ba'i thabs la brtson par mdzad tshul mdo tsam bshad pa ste/ de rnams kyis bdag chen sngags 'chang mangga'i
mtshan can gyi mdzad

pa'i cha shas cung zad bshad zin to/ /de nyid dang yab yum gcig pa'i a lce drung rje btsun skal bzang chos kyi nyi ma ni rjes su zhabs byang du bzhugs shing thugs dam kho na
la brtson pa rnam sras sogs kyi chos skor 'ga' zhig 'chad spel mdzad pa po de nyid dang / sring mo bgres pa kun bsod bstan pa'i nyi ma zhes yongs grags su btsun mo spel
du bzhugs pa'i btsun mo'i rje btsun du grags pa de dang / sring mo chung ba rjes su zhabs lhor bzhugs pa'i mchog gsum 'phrin las dbang mo zhes pa de nyid dang / sku mched
chung shos sgrol steng du bzhugs pa 'chi med dpal gyi dbang mo'am/ yongs grags su bla ma dpal la zhu ba bgres mo de nyid bcas 'di dag kyang rgyun gtan sbas pa'i rnal 'byor
mas bzhugs te lam dus lam zab sgrol chog brag rdzong ma gur drag sogs dang / phur chung gtor bsngo bskang ba thugs dam ma bcas chag med mdzad pa kho nas kyang dngos su
mthong ba bcas thugs dam la brtson zhing / sku sger gyi phyag rdzas phran yod dag kyang gang gi yab yum rnams kyi dgongs rdzogs kyis mtshon rnam dkar kho nar 'byor gtong
mdzad pa sogs dam pa'i ngang tshul kho na lhur bzhes mdzad do/ /2 kun dga' snying po/de lta bu'i bdag chen mangga'i mtshan can de nyid kyi rigs bdag yab

rje padma'i mtshan can gyi bka' bzhin gsang yum bgres pa hor khang gsar pa skal bzang dpal gyi sgrol ma las/ rje btsun 'chi med nyi zla dbang mo las gdung sras ma byung zhing
/ de rjes yab rje rdo rje 'chang padma'i mtshan can gyi bka' bzhin slar yang dwags po lcang ra ba bsod nams dpal sgron bu khrid gsang yum du bzhes te/ mngal gsol mtshan
'dogs bcas mdzad kyang / sa skya pa'i gdung rabs gtsang ma 'di bzhin gzhan dang mi 'dra bas shin tu phebs dka' ba dang / sngon du gdung sras gnyis byung / snyigs lnga'i
'gro rnams bsod nams kyi shugs chung bar brten/ zhabs ma brtan par bdag chen nyid nas yab rje grub pa'i dbang phyug padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug la gdung rabs myur 'byon
gyi 'phrin bcol gsol 'debs kyi bskul ma mdzad pa/ yab rje mchog nas kyang zhal bzhes te rum steng 'og sogs gdan sa 'di nyid kyi chos srung ye shes pa dang dbyer med pa dngos
su bzhugs pa'i mgon khang rnams su 'phrin bcol mdzad de/ grol nyin brtag dpyad zhu gnang skabs yab rje mchog gi bka' las/ gces gzhan ni yong mkhan mi 'byor 'dug spo bo
shugs ldan yong ba yod do zhes bka' stsal ba drang don tsam las don la/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na padmo 'chang ba nyid dmu rgod gdul dka' sems can 'dul ba'i slad du
mi'i gzugs su sprul par lung bstan pa yin te/ rgyal chen rdo rje shugs ldan rtsal zhes grags pa de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang ngo bo

dbyer med pa ni/ rnying ma rgyud 'bum gras su rin chen sna bdun bya ba las/ dol rgya dol rgya zhes pa 'di/ /thar lam log pa ma yin te/ /ngo bo thugs rje chen po'o/ /zhes gsungs
pa ltar de skabs su sa skya pa yab rje bsod nams rin chen dang / khyad par 'jam mgon kun dga' blo gros zung nas gdan sa chen po 'di nyid kyi bstan srung gras su mnga'
gsol bar mdzad de/ gsol mchod rgyas par gnang yang/ snyigs dus rgyal ba'i bstan pa srung ba la/ /rgyal chen khyed las lhag pa'i mthu rtsal ni/ /bdag gi lan brgyar btsal
kyang ma rnyed pas/ /zhes sogs gsung pa'i rgyu mtshan yang/ 'phags mchog thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs 'di nyid ni/ rgyal kun brtse chen thugs rje'i rang gzugs/ 'gro
ba sems can kun gyi phan bde sgrub pa la ma ltar lhag par brtse gdung che ba zhig yin na/ 'di yi mtshan thos pa dang gzungs sngags thos pa tsam gyis kyang ngan song gsum
gyi sdug bsngal las sgrol bar gsungs pa sogs phan yon tshad med grangs med pa mdo rgyud rin po che du ma las gsungs pa rnams/ 'dir tshang ma 'brir la langs pas mtshon pa
tsam dang/ gzhan yang de skabs sa lugs kyi bstan 'dzin 'gran zla bral ba rmor chen rdo rje 'chang dang/ rdo rje brag rig 'dzin chen po/ gnas sar 'jam mgon kun dga' legs
'byung sogs nas kyang bstan srung mnga' gsol gyi bsngags brjod kyi me tog yang yang 'thor bar mdzad pa dang/ de skabs kyi gnas

chung chos skyong chen pos kyang/ 'di la mtho 'tsham byed mi nyan rdo rje shugs ldan rtsal bya ba yin gsungs pa sogs spyan ras gzigs kyi sprul pa yin pa la sus kyang bsnyon
du med pa ma zad/ bdag chen mangga'i mtshan can de nyid nas thugs mnyam 'od gsal lha bla'i lung bstan gang yin yang gong du brjod pa bzhin da lta'i bar la gsar btsugs mdzad
pa sa mchod du grags pa/ dge ldan lnga mchod bzhin gyi pho brang lho byang/ bla khag chos sde khyim bdag dang kha ba can gyi mchod me'i phreng ba tshar du dngar ba dang/
pho brang rnams kyi rtse nas dung rgya gling rnga zlum bsur rna sogs sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba du mas mchod pa dang/ snga dus lha chen lcags ri khar dge 'dun bgres gzhon
med nas gdung shugs drag po dang bcas/ rje btsun brtse ba chen po kun dga' snying po de nyid kyi gsol 'debs 'ur 'don du ma gdangs dang bcas mdzad srol mchis pa rnams
kyi byin mthus ring po ma lon par yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid yum gyi mngal du phebs par/ de nyid kyi rnam 'phrul la ni 'chug pa med la/ dus phyis yab rje rdo rje 'chang
rang nas kyang ngos thang stong rgyal po dang gnyis med yin zhes nyams ldan gyi tshul du zhal gyis bzhes pa rnams kyang/ sprul gzhi 'phags mchog pad dkar bzung ba kho
na ru nges pa rnyed pa dang/ de yang yab rje padma'i mtshan can gyi lung bstan stsol skabs yum gyi lhums su ma zhugs gong du yin 'dug pa ltar phyis 'khrungs tsam nas da lta'i
bar

mgul yang cung zad 'dzer nyams che ba sogs sngon rgyal chen 'di nyid mkhas grub chen por bzhugs par gzhan gyis phrag dog gis bkrong skabs mgul du dar rdzong phul ba sogs kyi
mtshon byed yin pa kun gyis brjod pa sogs dang/ don du slob dpon rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bIr ba pa dang/ gong gi thugs sras sa skya pa chen po kun dga' snying po grub
chen thang stong rgyal po rnams thugs rgyud gcig pa yin pa lung gis kyang grub ste/ de yang bla ma sa chen 'di nyid bltams nas ring por ma lon pa/ bla ma gnam kha'u pa
de nyid kyi sku pang du bzhes shing 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sprul pa nges pa yin cing rnal 'byor dbang phyug nyid du'ang mi 'gal ba yin no/ /zhes gsungs pa 'di
yis grub pa dang/ de rnams dang grub pa'i dbang phyug thang stong rgyal po dang thugs rgyud gcig pa ni grub chen nyid kyis bzhes pa'i gter lung las/ zhi ba thugs rje chen
po dang/ /drag po khro rgyal dbang chen gnyis/ /dbyer med gcig tu 'khrul pa las/ /sku yi cha lugs zhi ma khro/ /zhes sogs gsungs par grub pas na dpal kye rdo rje'i bshad
rgyud saM bhu Ta las/ gar mkhan dag dang ri mo bzang ltar snang/ /gang zhig drug pa zhes pa'i sangs rgyas de/ /gcig pu nyid ni du ma'i gar mdzad do/ /zhes pa ltar/ rgyal
ba khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang nyid kyi brtse chen thugs rje rang gzugs su shar ba ni/ rgyal sras sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi tshul bzung ba gang nyid dus snyigs ma lnga bdo
bas kyang cher bdo ba'i

dus su rmu rgod kyi sems can shin tu 'dul dka' ba rgyal ba gzhan gyis gzigs pa cung zad lhod par gyur pa na/ 'phags mchog phyag na pad dkar 'chang ba nyid snying stobs lhag
par bskyed de/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i drung du tsog pur 'dug nas/ phyag thal mo sbyar te dpa' bo snying stobs chen po dus gsum du/ /gshegs rnams rnam
thar bdag nyid kho na'i bzlum/ /sras bcas rgyal bas yal bar dor ba yi/ /rmu rgod ma dul bdag gis 'dul bar shog /ces gsungs pa'i thugs bskyed dam bca' btsan pos nye bar drangs
re/ bsam bzhin skye ba bzhes pa yin pa la sus kyang bsnyon du med de/ deng dus skye bo 'ga' zhig gis kyang gang zag che ge mo 'ga' zhig la rgyu mtshan gang yang med
bzhin du sangs rgyas byang sems sam bla ma gong ma 'di dang/ 'di'i rnam 'phrul lo zhes u tshugs kyis long ba 'khar 'dzugs kyi rnam thar skyong ba rnams la ni snying po gang
yang med cing rang gi de nyid bstan par zad do/ / de ltar lung bstan pa bzhin 'di bzhin lhums su zhugs te/ rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i nang tshan thung mong zhes pa lcags
pho khyi lo'i gro bzhin zla ba'i tshes gsum gyi nam langs la sgrol ma phun tshogs dpal 'bar gyi bla brang du ngo mtshar ba'i ltas dang sku bltams 'phral yab rje rdo rje 'chang
bkra shis rin chen dpal bzang po mchog nas yum sras zung la bkra shis pa'i lha gos dang / phyag g.yas sras kyi dbu gtsug tu bzhag nas a u bhruM zhes thugs smon dang

bcas gsung zhing / de nas gsang rgya sogs yun ring mdzad nas gza' tshes dang bstun/ rje btsun sa skya pa'i yab chos grub pa'i slob dpon chen po dze ta ri'i lugs kyi rgyal ba
tshe dpag med lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba zab par mdzad/ de nas bkra shis rdzas brgyad rgyal srid sna bdun rnams gdung rgyud rin po che'i sku pang du 'grem
par mdzad de bsngags gsol dang shis brjod rnams rgyas par mdzad pa dang / yab rje mchog nas brtan bzhugs gsar rtsom mdzad de/ de nyin gdung sras tshogs phebs rnams dang /
ban tshang pa sde tshogs kyis 'khrungs bsangs rgyas pa'i sa dang / chos sde lho tshogs yongs nas mang ja'i thog bcas par bsgrigs 'don mdzad do/ /gdung sras 'khrungs pa'i
dga' ston du 'go zla'i nang du dus mdos zab mo sogs sngon lam bzhin rgyas par mdzad/ de lta bu'i gzhon nu de nyid dbu gdugs ltar phub pa/ dpral ba dbyes che ba/ spyan zim
bur gzigs pa la sogs pa mtshan dpe'i cha mthun gyis spras shing / byis skad sogs cher mi gsungs shing thugs rgyud shin tu dul ba bcas/ de skabs kyi zhabs 'bring pa rnams
kyang bla ma 'dis bdag skyid du bcug ces bsngags brjod kyi me tog 'thor ba byung skad dang / de nas dgung grangs

bzhi lnga tsam la yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas sku tshe 'dir phung khams skye mched sogs gsar du brnyes pa'i tshul bstan pa rnams/ lha'i ngo bor gdod ma nas gnas pa gsal btab
pa sogs rgyud ma smin pa yongs su smin par byed pa'i thog mar bla na med pa'i gnyis med rgyud dpal kyai rdo rje dang / ma rgyud badzra ki la ya sogs kyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil
'khor du 'jug par mdzad de/ zab gsal gnyis med kyi dbang gis smin par mdzad pa dang / 'jam mgon sa paN gyi thugs dam gyi rten 'jam dbyangs rtsod rgyal ma sogs kyi drung
du mchod tshogs dang bcas/ yab rje mchog nas 'jam dbyangs smra seng gi rjes gnang bstsal te/ thu mi sam bho Tas/ bslab pa kun gyi gzhi 'dzin cing / /rig byed smra ba
rnams kyi rgyu/ /ming tshig brjod pa kun gyi gzhi/ /yi ge'i sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ yon tan gyi phyi mo gser bris gong ma rim byon gyi phyag dpe de
nyid la brda sprod par mdzad pa tsam gyis dgongs shing / de nas yongs 'dzin dmigs sman grong pa'i drung rams pa grags pa rab rgyas bsko bzhag bstsal te rim bzhin chos spyod
rab gsal/ rgyud 'debs chen mo/ rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis sogs thugs 'dzin rim par mdzad thog dgung grangs bdun tsam la yab rje mchog dang chos byang las tshan rnams kyi sar
brtag gnyis rgyugs 'bul gnang ste/ sngar lam bzhin rgyud 'don zab ma'i tshogs dbur phebs shing / de nas dgyes rdor dang rdo rje phur pa/ bde gsang 'jigs

gsum rgyugs sprod rim mdzad kyis so sor tshogs dbu dang / khyad par dgung grangs dgu par phur sgrub zab ma'i tshogs dbu sngon lam bzhin thog mar phebs te/ phyag len sogs kun
gyi yid kyi padmo dbang med du bzhad par mdzad pa dang / nyid nas 'byor ba'i grangs ldan gyi dgung grangs du son pa'i yab rje mchog dang / yum mchog rje nyid dang gcung
po gsang ba'i bdag po dgung grangs thabs shes kyi grangs su phebs pa dang / rje btsun skal bzang chos sgron bcas sa mo lug gi lo gtso cher gong sa thams cad mkhyen par mjal
phyag gis mtshon dbus phyogs gnas rten mjal bar chibs bsgyur tshul rnams gong yab rje bkra shis rin chen gyi rnam thar skabs bzhin dang dbus phebs chibs bgrod bde ldan
gyis 'khor zin nas/ yab rje mchog nas kyai rdo rje'i bshad rgyud gur nas gsungs pa'i las rgyas pa'i lha gsum gyi nang tshan phyag na rdo rje 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rjes
gnang dang / gur lha brgyad zhal bzhi bsnyen dus/ dur bdag pu tra'i zur bka'/ dkar bdud kyi rjes gnang sogs bstsal te/ 'byung po 'dul byed kyi bsnyen pa zla gcig lhag tsam
dang bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bcas mdzad pa dang / de nas yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas gzhi thog tshoms dmar du/ rje nyid dang / rje btsun a lce drung skal bzang chos
sgron sogs sku ngo rnams dang / chos sde lho byang nang chen/ ri khud zur sbug lha 'bri ba/ bka' bzhi pa/ rta nag thub bstan pa/ chos lhun pa

sogs 'dus pa'i tshogs la 'jigs bral dpal ldan chos skyong gi bzhed gzhung gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa 'di la tshogs slob gnyis las tshogs bshad kyi nyams
khrid snang gsum skabs bla ma brgyud pa'i rnam thar phal che ba/ brgyud pa'i khyad par gnyis ldan gyi sems bskyed slob ma rjes 'dzin/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid ljags
bsnyen kha gso zhag bdun dang / de ring slob mas bsags sbyang / skyabs sems yig brgya maNDal bcas thun bzhir bcad pa'i nyams bzhes dang / de nas dbang gi mngon par rtogs
pa brgyad dang ldan pas rgyu dus rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba mchod chas zab ma chog grwa dang bcas pa mdzad/ de nas rgyud gsum gyi nyams khrid sngon 'gro
rnam gsum dang / bla ma'i rnal 'byor/ dngos gzhi lta khrid dbang bzhi so sor lam lta ba/ grub mtha' mda' kha ma/ bar do 'bras bu dang bcas/ mthar thug sku lnga mngon du
gyur tshul bar mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags kyi yig steng nas gsan cing / de skabs rnams su thos bsam gyi sgro 'dogs gcod pa dang / des mdzad pa'i snang gsum skabs chos
byung tshul dang / lam gyi khog phub rnam bshad sogs dang / rgyud gsum skabs dam tshig rnam bshad/ bum dbang gi lam phyi nang bskyed rim skabs phyi dkyil rnam bshad gsang
chen bstan pa'i 'od phreng nas dang / nang dkyil dbur rdo rje slob dpon gyi zab mo lus kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba da lta lam dbang du grags pa bcas

gsan/ lam 'dus thun gnyis chag med mdzad cing/ gsang dbang gi lam gyi sngon 'gror bdag med ma'i byin rlabs/ gzhan yang lam 'bras cha lag lam zab phyi ma'am thun mong ba dang
/ lam zab nang ma'am thun mong ma yin pa'i byin rlabs rnam 'joms bir lugs kyi byin rlabs/ rten 'brel srung ba'i byin rlabs/ sgrub pa lung sbyin/ gsang bcu'i rgyas gdab/
mgon rkyang rjes gnang bcas gsan/ gzhan yang lam 'bras skabs der rjes gnang dang / byin rlabs sogs gsan gras/ grub chen brgyad cu'i byin rlabs gnang skabs grub chen so so'i
snang brnyan grangs chen bla brang nas slob bu rnams kyi re skong du gdan drangs te byin rlabs so sor 'grig gnang mdzad par grags shing / gzhan yang yab rje rdo rje 'chang
de nyid las snga phyir gsan pa rnams phyogs gcig tu brjod na/ spyi bka' sgrub thabs brgya rtsa/ jo lugs dang bla med sgrol ma nyer gcig gnyan sgrol yan lag drug pa/
ri khrod ma ser mo/ 'jam dpal dmar ser/ 'jam dkar/ 'jam dbyangs smra seng / gang blo ma'i rig gtad/ sa 'jam sbags sgrub/ dbyangs can dkar mo/ bcu gcig zhal gtso rkyang /
seng ge sgra/ phyag rdor u tsya/ phyag rdor gtum po/ rta mgrin skyer sgang lugs/ thub dbang gnas brtan bcu drug rnam 'joms ba ri lugs/ gser chos mkha' spyod skor gsum/ dmar
po skor gsum/ dmar chung skor gsum/ 'jam dpal nag po gnad bcu gcig gi sgom lung dang

bcas pa/ seng gdong sngon mo/ rdo rje khyung khra/ dzam dmar srog sgrub rnams dang / mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu sogs kyi rjes gnang dang / dpal chen rdo rje phur pa'i stod
las byang chub sgrub dbang dang / smad las drag po sgrol dbang / nyang lugs gu ru drag dmar gyi byin rlabs/ 'khor lo bde mchog spyod pa'i rdo rje lugs kyi dbang chen/ dril
bu lus dkyil gyi dbang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud thams cad rig pa'i dbang / phyag rdor 'chi bdag 'joms pa lha bcu gsum gyi dbang / phyag rdor gos sngon can gyi rjes gnang
sogs dang / gur gyi mgon po'i khro bcu thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang sngon 'gro'i rdo rje'i brag rdzong ma/ phyi nang gsang gsum gyi nyams khrid/ gsang khrid lha dgu'i
rjes gnang sngon 'gro/ de'i rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga la brten pa'i nyams khrid/ gzhan yang gur lha brgyad thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa gnyis/ lha bcu gnyis thun min
gnyis/ lcam dral lha gsum/ pu Ta'i zur bka'/ dud sol phyi sgrub dang gsang sgrub/ zangs gri skor gsum/ tshar lugs zhal bzhi bsnyen dus/ dkar po tshe 'phel rnams kyi rjes
gnang / tshe dbang mda' 'phel ma dang / tshe rta zung 'brel gyi dbang / byad grol gser lde chos dbang gter ma drang srong log 'dra'i pa la'i rig gtad/ gnod sbyin rtsi'u
dmar po'i srog gtad sogs mang du gsan/ lcags bya lo yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid lha ldan du/ dga' 'bras drung gsum dang / ser byes rwa

sgreng sogs nang 'khrugs skor la bar sdum du chibs bsgyur skabs dang / rje nyid nas dbyar dgun chos thog phur mdos sgrub mchod sogs la rtag par phebs shing / dgung grangs bcu
gsum pa'i tshe kyai rdo rje'i gzhi bsnyen zla ba drug lhag tsam dang bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bcas mthar phyin par mdzad skabs thugs nyams 'od gsal sogs la bla ma dang lhag
pa'i lha dbyer med pa'i byin rlabs dang / grub brnyes kyi rtags mtshan mngon du gyur pa gdon mi za zhing / tshur mthong gdul bya rnams kyi snang ngor yang / snga dro zhig
skya ga 'dra ba'i bya zhig gis da lta sku drag rim pa bzhi pa'i rgyag byed mu men gyi tog zhig khyer te/ dpyad rgya khang gi skar khung gi khra ma'i steng bzhag song ba'i
brda tshig dpyad dka' yang don du mu men ni rin po che'i rigs te/ des na bem dngos gang la yang tog gi mtshan pa ni mdzes pa'i rgyan dang / de'i rigs su mtshon byed yin
pa bzhin des na 'dod 'byung rin po che sngon po ni/ sbyang gzhi tha mal pa'i zhe sdang dag pa mi bskyod pa'i rigs su gsung pa bzhin/ don du dges pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i
rigs dang rigs bdag tha mi dad pa'i mchog thun gyi dngos grub brnyes pa'i brdar mkha' 'gro ma 'phur 'gro'i gzugs kyis dngos grub sgo skyel du byung ba ni/ shin tu ngo
mtshar ba'i rnam thar du nges so/ /de lta'i tog 'khrul med de ni sa mdzod tshe bkras la yod tshul gsungs 'dug sku mtshams bcad rgya grol nas bsnyen song rgyugs sprod du
grags pa/ gsang

'dus mchod sprin rgya mtsho bdag med ma'i mngon dkyil nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub dkyil sogs dang / rdo rje phur pa chos skyong gur zhal rnams kyi gtor gzhung / bskang ba
'gos lugs bstod snying rnams kyi rgyugs sprod sngar bzhin gnang ste so so'i tshogs dbur phebs par mdzad cing / de nas nyid kyi dgung grangs bco lngar phebs pa shing byi gro
bzhin zla ba'i nang / nyid kyi yum mchog bsod nams dpal sgron bu khrid sku gshegs par/ yab sras zhal rgyas te gshegs rdzogs rnams rgyas par mdzad cing / khyad par dbu
rtser lho byang tshogs yongs nas/ thams cad rigs pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod sogs mdzad tshul rnams yab rje mangga'i mtshan can gyi rnam thar bzhin dang /
'di tsam zhig la yin nam/ tshe rta zung 'brel gyi bsnyen sgrub mdzad tshod 'dug thugs nyams 'od gsal lta bu'i snang ba 'di kun khang khyim ri sogs 'dus byas bcas kyis ma
bsgribs pa stong pa nyid lta bu/ yab rje padma'i mtshan can gyi dges rdor gzhis bsnyen skabs kyi gzigs snang lta bu'i mur grub chen thang stong rgyal po phebs byams 'dra
mor phebs pa gzigs snyam dang / yang skabs re mdun gyi nam mkhar grub chen thang rgyal nyid la sangs rgyas byang sems kyis bskor ba'i gzigs snang sogs du ma byung ba yab
rje mchog la zhu gnang mdzad par/ da lan bsnyen mtshams gzhan dang mi 'dra ba byung ba sku tshe ring po yong ba 'dug ces gsungs/ 'di lo phur sgrub skabs tshogs dbus su dge
'dun zhal

zas kyi rnal 'byor la rol skabs sngon lam bzhin 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi rdo rje phur pa'i rnam bshad sogs kyi steng nas dag gsal snyan gsum gyi sgo nas gsung bshad legs par
phul grub te dga' ston gyi rim pa rnams zin to/ /bstan rim gur mgon khro bcu dang drug cu ma'i zor 'dzin mdzad rgyu'i brag rdzong ma'i dus grangs mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa
mthar phyin pa sbyin sreg dang bcas pa zin nas/ gong de dag gi zor 'dzin mdzad de bsgral ba'i zhing bcu tshang ba rnams skad cig nyid la rdul phran bzhin du thal bar brlag
ste/ rnam par shes pa rgyal ba mi bskyod pa'i thugs kyi dbyings su bstim par mdzad/ shing glang lo 'dir 'char 'phar gyi thugs brel ci rigs thog yab sras sku mched rnams
rta nag sgrol phug sogs su phebs skor rnams yin 'dra ba dang / gdan sar phebs nas gsang sngags rnying ma'i bla ma zhig la dbang chos ci rigs gsan tshul sogs yang yab sras
gnyis cha'i gsan tho ma 'khod pa gang yin cha ma 'tshal pa de 'dra snga phyir mang du yod 'dra/ lo 'di'i zla ba dgu pa tsam nas zhabs lhor rje nyid dpal chen badzra ki
la yi bsnyen mtshams la bzhugs skabs dang / yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid snyigs dus snang tshul la thugs skyo bas ca zing gi lung pa las ne gseng gis spras pa'i spang ljongs
sogs bas mtha' zhig tu skye ba blangs pa drag sogs yang yang gsungs te/ sgo rum steng 'og sogs la bskang 'phrin dang chos srung rnams la gdan sa 'di nyid srung zhing
gnyer gtad bka' bsgo mdzad

thog nang gso gro nas zhabs lhor phebs par/ de skabs snyung gzhi gang yang med tshod 'dug kyang / rgyun gtan kyang gnang ba'i zhabs rim lta bu'i mkha' 'gro bsun bzlog zhig
yod skad 'dug pa bud med rnams chas gos gyon te/ sku bcar sogs zhus zin nas thog khar phebs te/ de nyin gyi mkha' 'gro ma de rnams gang yin/ mi tsho mkha' 'gro'i gar 'cham
zhes 'di 'dra rgyag pa red zhes sku 'cham yang mang gnang gi mthar zhabs lham 'ja' chen phud de dbyug gnang gis de yang mi dgos dgos cha bgyis sogs gsungs nas gzim chung
du phebs te/ sku bcar gsol gzim sogs la'ang de nyin dal bor sdod slar mi shes gsungs pa sogs dang / de'i sang hor zla bcu pa'i nyer gcig la/ dbu cung zad snyung tshul gsungs
te rdor sems bsgom bzlas sogs thugs dam la bzhugs mur/ 'di snang gi gsung 'phros gang yang ma gnang bar nyi zla'i rlung dhu tir sdud pa sogs mdzad nas/ 'da' kha ma'i
rnal 'byor zab mos dgongs pa chos dbyings su gzigs par/ de 'phral rigs myug zhabs 'bring pa rnams ci bya bral ba'i mya ngan gyis non kyang / yab rje nyid bcad rgyar bzhugs
par zhag shas zhu ma nus shing / de'i sang nyin tho rangs khar yab rje nyid thugs dam la bzhugs pa'i gzigs snang du/ gong gi yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid rus pa'i rgyan
drug dang stag sham sogs he ru ka'i chas can/ phyag na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa zhig dngos su mdun mkhar yun ring gzigs

shing / rjes bzung lung bstan sogs gnang ba gzhir grub kyang / dmigs gsal 'di gsungs bka' bstsal ba ma thos shing / de lta'i gzigs snang ji lta ba'i snang brnyan da lta de
nyid kyi gdung rten gyi bum sgo'i nang bzhugs pa 'di bzhin yin 'dug pa bcas shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rnam par thar pa yin pa yang / spyir bsnyen sgrub dang /
yang dgos dgongs pa rdzogs khar dngos mjal gnang ma thub kyang yab rje lhag pa'i lha dang dbyer med yin las gsol ba btab na nga dang 'du 'bral med par rjes su bzung ngo
gsung rgyu yin 'dug pa ni kun gyis go nus/ de dus a lce drung rje btsun skal bzang chos sgron nyid dgung grangs bcu dgu dang / yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid dgung grangs bcu
drug pa dang / tshe lha dbang mo dgung lo bcu gsum/ padma dbang mo dgung lo dgu tsam/ gcung po gsang ba'i bdag po de nyid dgung grangs brgyad dang / yum ni de'i sngon du
zhal ma bzhugs pa bcas/ 'jig rten phal skad ltar na byi phrug thang bskyur gyi rnam thar 'dra mo byung tshod 'dug kyang / legs par bshad pa rin po che'i gter las/ /dam
pa re zhig rgud gyur kyang / /zla ba bzhin du yar ngo 'byung / /dman pa lan gcig rgud gyur na/ /mar me bzhin du mnal bar 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar/ rje btsun skal bzang
chos nam bla dwags su sgo spel a lce mar 'bod pa de nyid lugs gnyis gang la yang mkhyen yangs che ba zhig byung tshod 'dug pa de nyid zhal bzhugs dus su'ang

a lce lags zhes kun gyis cha 'jog byed pa de nyid dang / de skabs su phan gnod sna tshogs byed pa'i zhabs 'bring drag gras rnams dang bcas go sdur gyis dgongs rdzogs rnams
sgrub par mdzad tshul sogs gong yab rje de nyid kyi rnam thar bzhin dang / gang cir da lta'i bar la gong 'phel 'gro ba 'di bzhin byung ngo / /de nas ljags bsnyen dus grangs
mtshan bsnyen rnams mthar phyin te sku rim chen mo'i zor 'dzin dang / de nas mgon mdos ljags bsnyen kha gso'i skabs gzigs snang lta bur gzim khri'i 'khris der mi zhig
nas nyid kyi mgul la 'chang ste/ mgul rgyan gcod par rtsom pa na sku rgyab nas lag pa nag po gri gug thogs pa zhig gis tho 'tsham byed pa'i mi de'i lag pa bcad song ba/ lag
pa gri dang bcas pa gzim khri'i nang du lhung ba dum tsam nas yal ba mngon sum gzigs tshul bka' las dngos su thos pa ni 'di lo yab sras rnams la sku gegs shin tu che ba'i
bar du gcod pa de nyid rdo rje nag po chen pos tshar bcad nas/ da bzod rtags mtshan mngon du gyur ram snyam/ de nas rta mgrin yang gsang dang gnod sbyin rtsi dmar mched
bdun zung 'brel gyi bsnyen pa zhag bdun sngon 'gro'i bsam yas mdo sde mchod pa dang bstun dus mchod gnod sbyin chen po'i gtor bzlog zor 'phen sogs mdzad cing / de nas
gdung rten gsar bzhengs gzungs 'bul rab gnas rje nyid nas zhag bdun/ hor zla drug pa'i nang du bdag chen kun dga' bsod nams nas rgyas par mdzad tshul/

gzhan yang dgongs rdzogs spyi dang bye brag mdzad tshul rnams rags tsam mangga mtshan can gang gi rnam thar bzhin dang / skabs 'di sogs snga phyir yab rje rdo rje 'chang de
nyid las gsan bzhes ma grub pa'i/ dam pa rnams las snga phyi gsan bsam mdzad pa rnams sdeb gcig tu bkod na khu dbon rin po che bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams las/ dges rdor
rgyu lam gyi dbang dang / rta mgrin yang gsang / mgon po'i dbang chen lnga / mgon po me 'bar kha skong / snyan brgyud/ yang skong dud sod sogs kyi lung sogs dang / a Ni
drung rje btsun grub mchog skal bzang chos nyid ma la/ tshe dbang lcags sdong ma/ grub rgyal ma/ tshe rta zung 'brel/ 'jigs byed rwa lugs lha bcu gsum gyi dbang khrid/ rwa
pod rnams kyi lung dang / las gshin rigs gsum rjes gnang / dug dbang / las gshin lha bcu gsum gyi rjes gnang sogs chos skor yongs rdzogs/ gser chos mkha' spyod skor gsum
gyi byin rlabs dang / nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i nyams khrid sogs chos nyid dngos bstan gyi byin rlabs/ be'u bum lung sogs chos skor yongs rdzogs gsan/ dpal ldan shangs pa
bka' brgyud pa'i zab lam ni gu chos drug gi byin rlabs khrid bka' rgyab chos bcas chos skor yongs rdzogs gsan/ zur bka' gsan gras bde mchog dril bu phyi dkyil dang / dri
med rnam gnyis/ srung ba lha lnga bcu rtsa gcig mi 'khrugs lha dgu/ 'chi med rnga sgra lha bcu gsum/ thams cad rig pa/ gsang

'dus mi bskyod pa/ 'jigs byed ro langs brgyad bskor rwa lugs/ gshed dmar lha lnga/ kyai rdor bka' babs bzhi/ rig byed ma lha lnga rnams kyi dbang chen/ rjes gnang gsan gras/
rnam rgyal lha dgu/ sgrol dkar bka' babs dgu ldan/ sman bla mched bdun/ don zhags lha lnga / thugs chen phyag chen zung 'jug bcu gcig zhal dpal mo lugs/ klu pa'i gser chos
seng sgra/ bka' gdams lha bzhi/ rta nag lcags ral can/ 'byung 'dul sems dpa' sum brtsegs/ phyag rdor u tsya/ dus 'khor nas gsungs pa'i las rgyas pa'i lha gsum/ gtsug
tor 'bar ba/ gnyan sgrol yan lag drug pa/ sgrol ma dmar mo rnams kyi rjes gnang lung bcas/ mkha' lding rdo rje khyung khra man ngag lugs/ khyung dmar/ khyung nag rnams kyi
rjes gnang yig lung bcas/ seng gdong ma'i rjes gnang / las tshogs pod lung / seng gdong dmar mo'i rjes gnang / rig byed ma dang tshogs bdag dmar chen phyag bcu gnyis thun
mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / tshogs bdag phyag rdor/ jo lugs tshogs bdag dkar po/ nor rgyun ma ser mo/ mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu/ dzam ser nag/ grwa mngon dzam dmar/
gser chos dzam dmar srog sgrub/ jo lugs dzam dkar/ beg rtse 'khor mang dang / lcam sring / dmag zor ma legs ldan stag zhon/ tshe ring mched lnga rnams kyi rjes gnang / sems
tsam lugs kyi sems bskyed/ zhen pa bzhi bral kyi nyams khrid yig lung bcas/

lam 'bras kyi cha lag gras/ bla ma rin 'byung / bir srung thun min gnyis/ tshar gsum khug pa/ sgrub pa lung sbyin rnams dang / glegs bam pod ser ma'i lung / mgon pod kyi ljang
pod/ dur bdag be'u sogs kyi lung / chos spyod rab gsal/ rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis/ rgyud 'debs chen mo/ phur chen/ phur dkyil/ phur chung / gtor bsngo chen mo/ gur drag
'phrin gzhung / de'i dbang chog gtor bzlog phur bzlog phur srung bskul bzlog rgya gar sher bsangs/ dmag zor ma'i dgos bskang / cha klu/ bum sgrub/ seng sgra'i gdon grol/
ri khrod ma'i bum chog rnams lha thil spar steng nas dang / klu dbang lha lnga'i char 'bebs/ sgrol ma'i rmi brtag kun bkras gsur bsngo rnams kyi lung / gzhan yang so thar
gyi mdo/ tshad ma kun btus phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa/ byams chos sde lnga'i nang tshan mngon rtogs rgyan rnams kyi lung / gsang chen rnying ma'i gras/ byang gter byin
rlabs thugs dbang 'bring po/ thugs chen 'khor ba dong sprugs rnams kyi dbang sogs rgya chen gsan/ rje btsun a lce drung skal bzang chos kyi sgron me las/ gsang 'dus ye
shes zhabs lugs bka' babs drug ldan kyi dbang chen gsan pa dang / mkhan chen rdo rje 'chang bkra shis chos 'phel las bya rgyud gdugs dkar lha nyer bdun ma'i dbang chen gsan
cing / dpon slob bzod pa phun tshogs las/ dges rdor rgyud lam gyi dbang dang zhal bzhi rnam 'gyur bcu bdun gyi rjes

gnang / tshe sgrub gur bdun ma dang / gsang khrid zhal pod sogs zhal bzhi pa'i chos skor yongs rdzogs gsan/ dpon slob shes rab phun tshogs las rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i
rjes gnang sogs gsan pa rnams bsam byung gis sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad nas/ bsgom pas thugs nyams su bzhes tshul rnam thar 'di nyid kyi gong 'og snga phyir gsal ba bzhin
dang / lo 'dir gong las rim gro zhal bzhi bsnyen sgrub las gsum rnams phyi lor mdzad rgyu/ 'di lo bse khrab/ phun pho/ lha mo rje khol sogs kyis rdor slob sogs gnang zhing
/ de nas 'di skabs tsam la yin nam snyam/ dbus nas lho byang sogs la khyug tsam chibs bskyod gnang tshod kyi gzhan pa'i lo rgyus zin tho sogs ma rnyed/ lha ldan du bzhugs
mtsher rdo ring du bzhugs shing gong sa rgyal dbang mchog sogs rtse shod kyi mjal phyag grub nas/ bsam yas su phebs skabs chos skyong sku phebs zhu dgos gsungs pa/ mkhan
chos dang / bsam lcog las sne rnams nas rgyal khab nas thong 'dzin med pa sku phebs zhu srol med lugs zhus rkyen/ rje nyid cung zad thugs 'ur nyams kyis gdon 'dre dngos
dang 'phrad pa zhig bstan 'gro spyi bye brag gi don du ma bgyis mthu med yin yang / gzhung sa nas thong 'dzin/ phebs srol med na da ka red blo bsad bgyis chog gsungs pa/
dum tsam nas mkhan chas sku chas sogs bzhes long med par chos skyong phebs byon te/ sa skya gdung sras da lta gdan drangs na de yin/ de

min kun la mi legs pa yong nges gsungs pa/ lcogs mgron gnyer/ mkhan tshang sde pa sogs kha btags dang bcas rgyugs te da lta phebs rogs gnang zhus yod tshod kyang / rje nyid
nas da ci gnas tshul rnams cung zad bka' bkyon ring la chos skyong bzhugs gnas su shar bskyod kyis dbu btud de bka' bsgo sogs zhus tshul dang / gang bsgo ba'i las 'dug 'dres
sgrub chog gsungs tshul de skabs kyi ban tshang pa sogs zhabs 'bring rdzun mi zer ba dag gi ngag las yang yang thos pa/ 'di ni chos skyong gnod sbyin chen po 'di nyid
yab rje grub pa'i dbang phyug 'di nyid la shin tu dga' bas go re lan gyi zhabs tog sgrub pa'i tshul du snang / de nas lho gnas rnams la phyag mchod sbyin bdag dad can gyi
re skong rnams grub nas/ gdan sar me yos lo tsam la sngon du yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid bzhugs skabs phal cher sgrigs tshoms grub pa bzhin/ rje btsun a lce drung sogs
zhal mol gyis bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags de nyid gang gi gzung mar sngon srol bzhin gsang stabs kyis phebs te/ gza' tshes dang bstun rgyal ba tshe mtha' yas pa'i dkyil
'khor du dbang bskur ba bstsal te/ 'chi med tshe dbang rig 'dzin dpal gyi bu khrid ces mtshan gyi mnga' gsol mdzad/ 'di nyid kyi rigs rus ni lha ri rtse pa zhes sngon dus
rgyal ba tsong kha pa'i yab kyi rigs rus/ mdo smad ngos nas gyar ba zhig yin par gsung rgyun du snang ngo/ /'di lo dpon slob bzod pa phun tshogs las gnyan mgon zhal

gyi chos skor rnams gsan tshul gong bzhin la/ dpon slob de nyid nas ngos kyi rmi lam du ngos rang gi bla ma sngags 'chang kun dga' rin chen de nyid nas/ khyi nag snying dkar
chen po zhig la gzungs so bgyis pa yin gsungs nas/ dar tshon sna lnga mang du sgron par mdzad pa'i snang ba byung bas/ da lam bka' chos phul rgyu 'di la bar chad med cing
legs par 'ong gsungs te/ gnang tshul dang / grol nyin tshogs 'khor rgyas pa gnang bar dpon slob de nyid bzhes mchod khrung thal sogs kyis bkang te bzhes mur ma legs de
nyid nas chibs rgod ma zhig la rte'u skyes pa ming dang nyes skyon yod min sogs zhu gnang la phyag mdzub sogs a log gos pa'i phreng mo mdzad tshul gyis ming la bsam grub
gyis dpe lta bu yong gsungs shing / de kho na byung tshul gsungs/ de nas yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid zhabs lha'i gzim chung mgon khang du gnyan mgon gyi bcad rgyar bzhugs
par nyin gcig ma legs de nyid kyi mnal lam lta bur mi a tsa ra 'dra ba zhig nas thu ba'i khud du nyor nyor zhig khur nas bcad rgya khang la 'gro grab bgyid pa yum nyid
nas gang red gsungs pas thu ba kha phyes te bstan byung ba/ bcad ma thag pa'i sha khrag glo snying sogs su snang bar sgo phye nas mtshams khang rang la song gsungs pa sogs
drag po'i rtags mtshan brnyes tshul yang mang du snang ba bcas/ mtshan dus grangs kyi bsnyen sgrub mthar phyin nas/ dpal mgon zhal gyi zor 'dzin dang / nag zla'i nang dam
tshig bskang gso'i slob

dpon sngar lam bzhin mdzad/ de nas 'brug lo'i nang phur sgrub slob dpon thog mar mdzad/ sbrul lo'i dbyar gsung ngag rin po che lam 'bras thog mar gnang ba'i chos zhu ba'i gtso
bo gang gi gcung po gsang bdag dpal chen 'od po dang / sku mched rje btsun padma dbang mo/ ma lags dam pa 'chi med rig 'dzin dpal gyi bu khrid bcas dang / chos sde lho
byang bgres gzhon gras dang / khams khul sa dgon khag sogs zhal grangs bzhi bcu skor la bstsal ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ni/ 'og tu khu dbon rin po che nyid kyi rnam thar
skabs bzhin dang / 'di skabs/ gro bzhin zla nang / nam rgod drag char sogs cher babs rkyen dpal chen pho brang ngos nas 'byung po mi min gyi cho 'phrul lta bu'i shwa log
drag pos chu rags rnams kyang tshang ma chus khyer/ sgrol ma gtsug lag pho brang dang bcas par shin tu nyen cher gyur par/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid thog khar phebs
te yi dam gyi nga rgyal drag pos lta stangs sdigs mdzub sogs mdzad pa tsam gyis chu log nub ngos su shad kyis bsgyur zhing / phyag nas sogs 'thor gnang gis sgrol lha pho
brang bcas par nyes skyon ma byung yang / lcang ra klu lding sogs 'dam dang rdzab kyis non par/ nged rang dran nas kyang sing ma rtsa sogs med pa lo shas bsdad song ba sogs
la gzhigs na/ chu chen po yo lang zhig rgyas tshod 'dug slob dpon 'jigs bral rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyid slar yang byon pa lta bu tshang mas mthong tshod 'dug lcags
rta

lo nang yab rje mchog dang ma lags de nyid ban tshang pa sogs ston 'khor gang 'tsham dang bcas/ gangs ti si dang mtsho ma pham pa sogs la bskor ba dang gnas mjal sogs la phebs
cing / zhar la gu ge chos rgyal dang / stod sgar dpon sogs nas kyang zhabs tog cher sgrub tshod 'dug ti si 'di rje btsun mi la bzhad pa rdo rjes yul nyer bzhi dang /
gnas so gnyis mtha' dag tshang ba'i 'khor lo sdom pa'i rang byung gi pho brang shin tu byin rlabs che ba yin gsungs shing / yang bla ma gong ma 'ga' zhig gis bzhed par yul
nyer bzhi'i nang tshan hi ma la ya zhes pa gangs chen gyi skad dod de bzhin yin par gsungs pa sogs sna tshogs yod kyang / sa chen gong ma lnga sogs kyi bzhed srol la ma
mo gnas 'di rnams bod kyi skyes chen grub thob mang pos byin gyis rlabs shing sangs rgyas pa'i gnas yin la byin rlabs shin tu che yang / rgyal bas mdo rgyud nas gsungs pa'i
gnas chen yul nyer bzhi'i nang tshan/ ri bo gangs can dang / mtsho ma dros sogs ni min/ yin na dus 'khor mngon pa mdzod sogs nas gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid ma tshang tshul
gsungs pa yin te/ rab dbye las/ gangs ri gser gyi bya skyibs dang / /'dzam bu'i shing dang sa srung bu/ /glang chen lnga brgyas bskor ba dang / /dgra bcom lnga brgya bzhugs
pa'i yul/ /da lta'i ti si 'di ma yin/ /ma dros rgya mtsho ma pham min/ /zhes sogs gsal bar gsungs pas shes so/ /de nas zla ba bcu pa'i nang tsam la

chibs 'grul 'khor te/ dus mdos sogs tshogs phebs rnams la rtag par phebs la de skabs dgun bzhugs kyang dus mchod rtser gnang tshod 'dug 'di skabs tsam la dga' ldan dpon slob
sangs rgyas bkra shis sogs nas gsol btab kyis/ kyai rdor sgrub mchod gang na gang yod kyi slob dpon rgyun du mdzad skad 'dug lcags lug chu stod zla ba'i tshes bcu bdun
la kho bo btsas pa'i lo rgyus rnams rang mtshang rjen par ston pa'i skabs su brjod rgyu las/ gnas skabs bskyur ba'o/ /'di lo bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams mchog phur sgrub/
dus mdos sogs kyi slob dpon skabs re ma gtogs lo ltar mdzad/ lcags lug bdag khri yab sras dbus phebs su chibs bsgyur gyis chu sprel zla ba bdun brgyad tsam la yab rje mchog
nas khri tshab gnang ste sgrig lam kun spyod sogs gang ci skor la bka' khyab kyi 'thus shor med pa mdzad/ chu bya lo nang byang gnam ru mtsho lnga sogs nas gdan zhus
kyis gdul bya gang la gang 'dul gyi 'gro don/ re skong rnams zin nas/ zla ba bcu pa tsam la gnas 'dir phebs kyi tshogs phebs mdzad/ shing khyi lo ma lags nas sngon du drung
rams pa sang gzhon gnas slob tu bsten gnang dang / 'byung 'dul bsnyen mtshams dang / de nas gtor bsngo bskang gsar steng dmag beg sbyar ba bcas rtag par gnang / byang
gter thugs sgrub bstan srung yongs rdzogs mchod phrin gsol 'debs le bdun bcas bdag chen mangga'i mtshan can gyi

phyag len ltar gdangs dbyangs rol mo sogs dang bcas tshes bcu'i mchod pa mang du yab rje mchog dang lhan du rtag par gnang skabs tsam la/ rje btsun padma 'phrin las 'khrungs
pa mtshan yang rdor brag rig 'dzin sogs kyi mtshan zur yin lugs gsungs/ shing phag lo nang chos sde lho byang mdar grang chen pa zur sbug/ ri khud/ ka bzhi dgon/ lha 'bri
ba sogs chos zhu ba mang bar lam 'bras bstsal bar/ chos kyi rnam grangs rnams phal cher sngon ma dang 'dra bar bstsal/ grang chen pa rnams nas zhus ngor rwa lugs 'jigs
byed bcu gsum ma dang / rta mgrin yang gsang gi dbang chen sogs 'ga' re phar bstsal zhing / kho bos kyang smin byed kyi thog ma rdo rje phur pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'di dus
thob par cung zad dran tshor 'dug smad las kyang gnang song ba thob/ me byi'i dbyar nang so 'di bzhin zangs khang zhes pa gzhung nang zhig yin 'dug rtse shod du snyan seng
