mdzad de/ dgun bzhugs gnang sar ar las mdzad de bzhugs thabs phebs par/ thog spang dman zhing thog pa srab ya snyogs zhal las med par/ deng sang byas na theb chag zhig
yin 'dug par dgun bzhugs gnang zhing / 'di lo zla ba brgyad pa'i nang gdung sras ngag dbang lhun grub rgyal mtshan 'khrungs shing / bde skyid dngos grub dpal 'bar gyi skye
sprul yin gsungs pa las rgyu mtshan gang yod ni shes tshor ma byung /

'di lor dge zur nub la ra spel ba'i bka' 'gyur tshang ma glegs shing glegs thag bcas cha tshang 'di bzhin spus gzigs kyis/ me glang dbyar lha chen drung rams pa 'ga' zhig nas
spos sna dang bcas gdan zhus kyis sngon gyi mjal lhar mchod tshogs dang bcas bzhugs su gsol zhing / bka' 'gyur mtshal spar 'di bzhin rtsa ba ni sde dge nas sa skyar spar
phud du phul tshul dang / de nas ra spel ba'i mdzod pa zhig byung bar gsol bstsal lam spus zhus gang rung zhig yin tshul gleng / me byi'i ston yab rje mchog nas 'jam dbyangs
rtsod rgyal ma gdan zhus ngos rang gnas slob kha lug chos bstan 'dzin bcas la smra seng rjes gnang bstsal/ ka dpe gser bris ma'i steng nas yi ge'i ma mo slob gnang
mdzad/ me glang dbyar 'di gar sngon dus sde yang phyi ma de nyid kyang ljon shing gis gang ba'i dbus/ bdag khri bkra shis rin chen de nyid rtsa rlung 'phrul 'khor la mnga'
brnyes pa byung tshod kyis 'phrul 'khor lha khang zhes pa sogs/ zhig ral gyi da lta'i sde yang de bzhin du gtong gnang gis nub 'khyud bka' 'gyur tshogs pa 'og khang ka
ba nyi shu rtsa grangs kyi sa/ phun pho bzhin gsar bskrun dang byang 'khyud 'dir 'cham sogs thon pa sa tshogs bzhin dang / gzigs khra khang bcas bzo gnang gis sa stag nas
bzung 'cham gzigs bka' 'gyur gsung sgrogs/ gtor bzlog gar 'cham bcas sgrol pho rang du stabs bde bas gnang rgyu'i dgongs bzhed ltar tshon rtsi sogs lam zin gyis sa stag
zla ba gsum pa'i

nang thog mar tshugs pa/ de skabs zor 'dzin sogs slob dpon ni khu bo rin po che mchog nas mdzad cing / bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams mchog kyang tshogs phebs mdzad cing zor
'phen nyin lnga thog tshogs phebs dang / de nas gzigs khra khang du bzhugs te ngos rang phru gur song bas 'bag 'cham rnams la re re bzhin 'di dang 'di bzhin red gsungs pa
dran tshor gsal ba dang / tshogs gur dang 'bag khang cung zad 'gyangs ches pa lta bu'i skyon las gzhan tshang ma gang legs byung tshul gleng / sa yos lo yi dpyid rdo rje
tsher ma'i nad rim gyis lha chen drung rams pa yang nyin gnyis tsam nyor sbug tu phebs dgos kyi rkyen 'das sogs tshang ma 'jigs shing ya nga ba zhig byung skabs dang / ngos
rang nas rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis rgyugs sprod phul te/ rgyud 'don zab ma sogs la tshogs skyed dang / 'di lo kyai rdo rje sgrub mchod gtor bsngo chen mo sogs rgyugs sprod
las tshan par phul ba las/ nad chen stabs sku ngo bzhes mkhan ma byung ba/ tshogs skyed bla ma dam pa la byas pa yin nam snyam dran tshor gsal ba mi 'dug yos lor phur
sgrub zab ma ngos rang thog mar bskyod skabs rdo rje slob dpon yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched nas mdzad cing / 'di'i sngon tsam bdag khrir snyung gzhi gdug pa can zhig
bzhes te tshogs phebs sogs phyir phebs cher ma gnang / 'brug lo gnam rgyu sgar dpon nas gdan zhus kyis chibs bsgyur te lho rtsa khog 'grig sogs 'go yul stod gsum ngos dang
/ rgyal

rtse sogs brgyud byang phebs gnang ngam snyam zhing / phebs 'grul snga phyir gnam ru sgar dpon rtam tshing zhes pas dad 'dun rtse gcig pas nor brgya 'bul sogs phul tshul gleng
/ zla ba bcu pa'i nang chibs 'khor te 'di lo dgun bzhugs sgrol phor gnang / chu rta'i dpyid gong dkar sprul skus zhus ngor/ rje btsun TA ki gtso mo skal bzang chos kyi
nyi mas spyi bka' rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang gnang bar/ yab rje mchog dang ngos gnyis char yod kyang sked tsam nas/ bka' dbang zhu mi'i khrod na 'ga' re nad ngan zhig yod
tshul gsan thos la chos zab bdud kyi dper song ste/ dbang 'phros zhu gnang mdzad ma song / de grol nas gong sprul nas gsol btab kyis ngos dang sring mo padma 'phrin las/
gong sprul/ gu rNa sprul sku/ dpon slob blo chos phu ri bla ma bcas la yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas mgon po'i chos skor khro bcu thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang srung 'khor
rdo rje brag rdzong ma phyi nang gsang gsum gyi nyams khrid gur lha brgyad thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa lha bcu gnyis ma thun min gnyis pu tra'i zur bka'/ bran
bdud thun min gnyis/ ber nag/ rtser bu rnams gyi rjes gnang / gsang khrid lha dgu'i rjes gnang / rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga la brten pa'i nyams khrid/ mgon pod snyan brgyud
glegs bam gyi lung / dud sol phyi sgrub dang / gsang sgrub gyi rjes gnang sogs bstsal ba gsang khrid skabs kha lug mkhan po yang phebs/ lo de'i zla ba bzhi pa'i tshes lnga
la bdag khri

kun dga' bsod nams dag zhing du phebs/ yab rje mchog mchod tshogs dang / yum sras rnams la thugs gsol 'bul bar phebs par gang ci bka' bkod mdzad tshul gnang / de nas sku spur
phebs skyel sogs la'ang phebs/ zla ba lnga pa'i nang phun phor dgongs rdzogs kyai rdo rje sgrub mchod kyi slob dpon zla ba brgyad pa'i nang du gdung rten rab gnas rab
ston/ gos sku zhal phye phyi skor me tog bcas par yang yab rje rdo rje 'chang mchog nas mdzad/ zla ba bcu pa'i nang 'di lor dgun bzhugs zhabs lhar gnang / sa skya paNDi ta'i
dus chen dang bstun ngos rang sdom gsum rab dbye thog mar 'gro skabs dang / lug lo zla ba dang po'i nang gza' tshes dge bar yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched ma lags ngos
rang rigs sras mched rnams dang / gsol gzim phyag gnyer drung rigs sogs gzhi thog tu phebs par/ phyag gnyer nas gdan yol lcog rtse sogs gang 'tsham gsar bzo las rnying
gras rnams ni phun pho'i sgo nas shag phan chad bsdu gsog mdzad tshul gleng ba/ gsang 'dus kyi gzhal yas khang dang 'dra bar snang / gser phrar phyag gnyer sogs nas ja
'bras thog pa mdzod bsam brling lte ba'i chos dpal nas rgyu rkyen zhig kyang snyan phul song ba/ yab rje mchog nas bka' lan kyang mang du gnang song bar ji yin ma nges/ zla
ba gnyis pa'i nang sgo spel a lce la zhing brjes par yab rje sku mched ma lags bcas nas zhabs lhar phebs te dgongs rdzogs sogs mdzad/ de nas sgrol phor phebs te

'cham gzigs sogs gnang / 'di lo phur sgrub slob dpon g.yul thang 'ong spung la dar 'dzugs dang / lo dus kyi dus mdos 'gyangs nas de tshab phyad byang du dmar chen gtor bzlog
sgrub zhag dang / byang pa tshogs phyed kyi tshogs chen du dpal mgon zhal gyi gtor bzlog rgyun bzhin/ nyer dgu'i nyin mor dmar chen gtor bzlog gzhi thog nang bzhugs 'cham
mgon sogs dang bcas phal cher dus mdos bzhin dang / mtshan mo dpal mgon zhal gyi zor 'phen bcas rgyun bzhin/ gnam gang la gtang rag bskang gso brgya tshar dang / rgyal
zla'i tshes gcig la gzhi thog rtser lha bsangs rgyas pa dang / lo gsar bzhugs gral rgyun bzhin/ de nas rgyal zla'i mjug mdos zab 'cham rgyugs/ chog sgrigs/ gnyen chas/ grong
chas/ zor 'phen gnam gang la bskang ba brgya tshar/ rgyal po lo gsar bzhugs gral chen mo sogs 'jam mgon kun dga' blo gros kyi phyag deb dang / phal cher chu yos lo skyabs
mchod rdo rje rin chen sku mched gsum khri phebs kyi lam ltar mdzad/ 'di skabs sngon lam la sku mched gnyis gsum phebs lam ltar dus phyis sa gzhung mkhos zhan la brten
sku ngo lnga dus gcig tu khri phebs zhus chog pa zhes rgyal khab tu snyan seng phul don/ shing sprel hor zla dang po'i gza' tshes dge bar sngar lam bzhin sa tshogs su/
gzhis byes kyi dge 'dun brgya phrag lnga tsam long ba 'dus zin nas tshogs tshar ba dang / lho byang chos khrims pa rgan gzhon gtso thab pa sogs thil

ba'i las tshan rnams gzab mchor dang gzhi thog tu phebs bsu bcar ba dang mnyam/ brtse chen thugs rje'i rang gzugs phyag na pad dkar 'chang ba'i ngo bo yab rje rdo rje 'chang
kun dga' snying po mchog dang / gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang gzugs gsang bdag dpal chen 'od po'am mtshan gzhan byams pa kun tu bzang po/ phyag na utpal sngo ldan
zur phud lnga pa'i ngo bor 'khon gdung 'dzam gling dbang sdud dam drag shul yon tan rgya mtsho/ 'jam dpal dngos grub rgya mtsho/ yon tan gyi dri mas dben kyang 'khon gyi
rigs tsam du gyur pa kho bo ngag dbang drag shul 'phrinalas rin chen te/ ngos rnams gzab gyon steng chos gos me long ma sa zhwa lag rkyangs rnams nas gzhi thog nas phebs
pa nye logs rnams su mdzod pa sogs drung rigs phyag 'degs pa dang / gding ba dang / spos phor/ gdugs sogs lag 'khyer gras grangs med pa rnams kyis mtha' bskor ba'i mjug rje
btsun ma yum sku zhang gras mkhan po khri gdan zur pa rnams dang / ban tshang pa gzhon gras maNDal blos blang rgya gling sogs lag 'khyer yod med rnams dang bcas/ ji ltar
de bzhin gshegs pa ser skya'i grong khyer sogs su ljongs rgyu ba'am/ ma ga dha bzang mo dang gzugs can snying po sogs kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang bcas gdan
drangs pa bzhin/ dal bus bag phebs par rim bzhin phebs te shar sgo'i nang du yab rje rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs g.yas bteg pa dang chabs cig dung mkhan brtson 'grus

bkra shis nas chos dung rin po che/ gsung gyen du 'bud pa stabs mtshungs dgos pa gong ma'i bla dung grags pa sogs/ tshogs mtha'i khri chen mdun thad sku phyag grub nas nub
kyi sgo chung brgyud 'jam dbyangs sa paN gyi chos gsungs pa'i bzhugs khri 'khor lo gsum ldan nam/ mkhas pa zil gnon nam/ thang mo cher grags pa mtshan mchog gsum ldan gyi
chos kyi khrir zhabs sor 'khod zin nas/ tshogs kyi chos spyod mtshams bzhag pa dang / yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung rab dri ma med pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /gsungs pa dang tshogs pa'i mdo klog pa shes snying bzlog pa bsngo smon mdor bsdus grub nas/ ban tshang pa rnams bzhugs khri'i mdun du dbu byed che bas bskul
la tshogs pa dang bcas pas maNDal tshom bu so bdun ma dbu ches spos reng btsugs te 'bul tshig dang bstun tshom bu rnams so sor ngo sprad la/ gang gi mchod rdzas ma gdangs
ma shin tu dal ba bcas tshar ba dang / yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas sems bskyed gsal 'debs par mdzad de/ chos gsan pa'i kun slong dang bstan bcos rtsom pa po'i sku che
ba'i yon tan sogs jeng 'dren par mdzad de/ dpal ldan sa skya paNDi tas dbus gtsang khams gsum tshogs chos su gsungs pa'i bstan bcos chen po thub pa'i dgongs pa rab tu gsal
ba'i dbu nas bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i phar phyin yan chad bstsal ba/ mtshams rnams su ja mchod dang ja rgyab gong stod/ zhabs brtan sogs chos sde dbu mdzad

dang / bde gling dbu mdzad bcas tshogs dbus su bzhengs nas bskul ba rgyun bzhin de skabs ja 'bras sogs kyi thog rgyal khab chen po'i mi sna rtse drung ched mngags nas gong
sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' yig phul ba yab rje mchog khri steng bzhengs nas gus 'dud dang bcas bzhes te/ bzhugs nas maNDal rten gsum 'gyogs dar nang mdzod/
de skabs sngon lam mchod sdong tshab tu dngul gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ma/ da lta gdung rten shar na yod pa 'di bzhin thog mar phul ba ni/ bdag cag gi ston pa la lha tshangs
pas gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan pa phul nas chos 'khor bskor bar gsol ba btab pa lta bu/ rten 'brel ngo mtshar can dang / gzhan tshan grangs so bdun tsam gyis
mtshon so sor gser dngul gos dar bzang gos kyis gtsos pa'i gnang skyes spam mtho ba dang / rgyal mtshan mthon po nas kyang maNDal rten gsum 'gyogs dar kha btags nyin
bde ma tshan pa bcu gnyis tsam gyi so so'i thog gser dngul thum bzang ja sogs kyis gtsos pa'i khri 'bul sogs btab cing / de nas bka' chos 'phros stsol grub nas sgo chung
shar brgyud gzhi thog tu phebs tshul gong bzhin/ nyin gnyis bar gzhi thog nas phebs tshul sogs mdzad sgo phal cher gong dang 'dra ba las yab rje mchog nas sems bskyed gsal
'debs nas tsam sku gsum ye shes kyi rnam bzhag yan bar skabs rnams su 'di ga sa gzhung bla brang khag mkhan phyag gnyer gsum/ chos sde lho byang las

sne dang bsgrigs pa yan spyi dang / byang pa ban tshang bsnyen song spyi/ stod smad bla khag drung rigs ser skya/ gsol gzim sogs so so nas sngon lam deb gsal bzhin gyi khri
'bul tshan grangs sogs/ sngon du deb sher dang mtshan dod sogs kyi ljags bkod dang / mdos zab skabs kyi gyon bsher sogs khu bo rin po che de nyid nas mdzad song ba dang
/ de skabs 'bul ba rnams sgo chung shar nas bzhugs te/ bzhugs khri bdun nas gsang sgo brgyud mdzod pa sogs bzhugs khri'i mdun du lang ste 'bul len phal cher khrom dbang bzhin/
nyin gsum par gzhi thog nas phebs lugs chos gsung tshul rnams gong bzhin la/ khri 'bul ba sku zhang dwags po lcang ra ba'i ngo tshab zhabs lho rje btsun tshe lha dbang
mo de nyid dang / sku zhang snying ri ba dang / lha ri rtse pa so so'i sku ngo rnams gzab mchor dang ldan pas khri 'bul rgya che bar bteg cing / gzhan yang nyin sngon
ma rnams su ma byung ba'i nye 'khor sa dgon khag mang sogs mang dag tshang mas mjug tu/ mkhan zur bkra shis chos 'phel de nyid nas 'phar du ja 'bras thog zhabs brtan rdo
rje'i re kha maNDal rten gsum 'gyogs dar kha btags nyin bde ma/ gzhan yang sku ngo rnams la rten dod 'go dar/ 'dus tshogs la dar 'gyed/ gzhung 'bul da lta zab rol gras mkhan
bkras chung ba 'dis mtshon tshan pa zangs rkyen nyi shu tham par kha btags gnyis re btags pa/ gzhan yang ja 'khor rnam rigs gser dngul sogs 'di kha

lcog spel gyi shag chas phran tsam ma gtogs phal cher 'bul gnang mdzad tshul mkhan chen de nyid kyi rnam thar nang gsal ba bzhin spam mtho bar 'bul bar mdzad/ de nyin bka'
chos sngar 'phros nas sbyar byang bar yongs su rdzogs par grub nas rgya mtsho dpon slob kyis mol gtam rdzogs nas khu bo sku mched gsum dang ngos rang bcas bzhi khri nas babs
gnang gis/ bzhugs gdan steng tsog pur bzhugs khri steng nas yab rje rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs bsngo rgyas pa bstsal grub pa'i gung seng la rgya las ban tshang pa rnams
gzhi thog tu phebs/ sku gsung thugs yon tan gyi rten dang / bkra shis rdzas brgyad rgyal srid sna bdun rol sil sa pur sogs bzhes te/ gung seng 'dus nas mkhan po khri gdan
zur zung bdag khri'i sku 'dun dang lho byang las tshan dang gzhan ban tshang pa rnams bzhugs khri'i mtha' bskor du 'khod de/ bsangs sbyangs sngon 'gro'i yab rje sku mched
rnam snang mi bskyod pa 'jam dbang sku mched rin 'byung 'od dpag med/ ngos la don grub tu bskyed chog mdzad nas maNDal rten gsum/ yon tan gyi rten du gser bum/ 'phrin
las kyi rten du zhabs stegs rdo rje'i re kha/ chos dung rin po che/ rol sil rnams phyag tu phul tsam re dang / de nas rgyal srid sna bdun/ bkra shis rdzas brgyad rnams tshe
chog bzhin mjug tu shis brjod rgyas pa'i mjug nyin bde ma'i rol chen rdzogs nas/ sngon lam gtso thab pas zhwa g.yab dang / ki sgra de nas mchod phreng drung 'khor kong

gzhas pa'i phebs bsu dang bcas shar sgo nas rim phebs kyis gzhi thog bskor te mdun skas brgyud de nas tshoms dmar du rgyan 'grem dkar spro bcas yod par phebs te/ bla chen 'phags
pa rin po che'i chos srid zung 'brel gyi bzhugs khri padma can du grags par yab rje rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang 'jigs med dbang rgyal rdo rje 'chang kun dga' snying po
nyid mnga' gsol te/ sa gzhung dang gang gi sku mched gcung po/ gdung sras rnams dang / rje btsun yum/ mkhan mdzod gnyer gsum/ lho byang las tshan drung rigs gtor zan bcas
nas sngar lam mjal dar phul te/ dpal ldan sa skya pa'i lugs gnyis kyi 'phrin las dbyar mtsho ltar dpal yon phun sum tshogs pa/ thams cad dus gcig tu 'grig par gyur to/
/de nas gser phrar phebs nas mkhan chen bkra shis chos 'phel nas sku sger du'ang sku ngo tshang mar mgul dar sogs zab rgyas gsung bshad bcas bstabs par mdzad song ba g.yang
rtse kha yi yar sgron gyur/ 'di skabs yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched lha chen mkhan po khri gdan zur/ mdos zab bskor rnams de skabs kyi ban tshang dbu byed che ba chos
bzang lags bcas nas sngon gyi deb khag dang / chu yos sogs kyi lam rnams go bsdur gyis bsgrig gnang mdzad cing / sngon lam rnam thar rnams su grol nyin phyag mdzod nas/
lha khang khag la mchod tshogs rgya che/ mgon khang rnams la spyan gzigs 'bul mtshon rnams khro khang thog nas dpon yig pa'i bsher te

gtong dgos pa dang / gnyer tshang nas tshogs pa dang mnga' zhabs/ dbul phongs bcas par 'bru 'gyed/ de snga gnyer dpon dge yar skabs kyang 'bru 'gyed brgyab ste 'bor lhag bsdu
skad du grags pa sogs byung yang / de skabs nged rang na tshod phra bas ma shes pa yin nam mthong thos shes tshor ni ma byung zhing / 'di skabs gzhi ma gra sgrig legs

ngos cag slob ma

dang / dngos gzhi lta khrid skabs dam tshig rnam bshad phyi bskyed rim skabs rnam bshad gsang chen bstan pa'i 'od phreng steng nas thos bsam gyis sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad/

sgro 'dogs gcod pa rnam bshad kyi steng nas/ gsang dbang 'gor bdag med ma'i byin rlabs 'dus pa thog mtha' bar gsum gyi nyams khrid bcas gong 'og tshang ma mkhan chen thams
