gsum sogs 'phar du gnang / sa byi rta zla'i tshes nyer lnga'i nyin gdung sras gcung po grags pa blo gros 'khrungs pa rim bzhin 'khrungs ston sogs gnang / lo 'dir ngos rang
phur sgrub bshad las bgyis rgyur/ sngar lam bzhin ril sgrub lha mchod phur sgrub bcas zab ma mdzad/ 'di lo ril sgrub phur sgrub sogs kyi slob dpon yab rje mchog dang /
slob dpon gzhon pa phun phos gnang / de nas bstan rim mgon po drug cu pa sogs kyi zor 'dzin bgyis rgyur yab rje rdo rje 'chang gi sku drung nas sngon thob zin/ slar yang
dam tshig gso byed sogs su lam dbang gur mgon khro bcu thun mong ma yin pa/ gur lha brgyad/ bran bdud/ pu tra'i zur bka' sogs zhus bstsal byung zhing / 'di lo zla ba gnyis
pa'i nang tsam nas bod phyi g.yul 'khrug 'go tshugs te/ bka' gung lha klu dmag brgyab tu gro mo ngos la phebs pa sogs la bka'

yig 'tshams zhu phul bar gzim zur 'jam dbyangs thon te/ ston chab skabs phyir 'khor gzhung sa nas dmag bzlog zhabs brtan du drang srong log tri'i gtor bzlog gdugs dkar bzlog
mdos mgon mdos mgon khang khag la bskang 'phrin sogs yab rje zung dang ban tshang pa bcas nas mdzad cing / lhag par rje rig byed lha mo'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum yab rje
rdo rje 'chang sku mched phun pho gdung sras 'jam dbang / lha chen mkhan po bcas so so nas rtags thon dgos rgyur bka' phebs bzhin yab rje mchog nas rje tshar chen gyi gnad
yig ganggA'i chu rgyun ji lta ba bzhin sde dge sa dbang bla mas nag 'gros su mdzad pa/ srid gsum ji lta ba bsnyen pa rtsa sngags 'bum phrag brgyad kha skong sbyin sreg
sgrub pa las sbyor bcas mthar phyin pa mdzad nas/ de'i sngon zla ba bzhi pa'i nang bse mgon yid bzhin nor bu'i drung du sku rkyang gis gur mgon khro bcu'i bsnyen pa bdun
gcig sogs mdzad skabs/ 'od gsal gyi ngang du lcags kyi hom khung gru gsum nang khar stabs rgya bdun can du ma tshogs pa'i gzigs snang dang / snga dro zhig mi ras gos gyon
pa kha shas nged tshos las byas pa don med du song zer ba sogs byung tshul ring min nas chings 'grig ste rgyal khams bde 'jags su gyur par brtag gam snyam/ gzhan yang lha
mo rig byed ma'i skor la dngos nyams su grub mtshan du ma yong tshul gsungs pa las dngos su gsungs pa bka' ma grol bas bzhag 'di lor dbyar kho bos gsol btab

bzhin rta mgrin yang gsang dbang chen dang gnod sbyin rtsi'u dmar po'i srog gtad sogs bstsal/ de nas dpyid chab sogs la phebs skabs dmag skad kyang phal cher chag de'i dgun
lo ngos la phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi rjes gnang sngon 'gro'i rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i rjes gnang drag po'i bka' btad bcas bstsal/ sa glang lo 'jam dpal dngos
grub rgya mtsho dang / ngos rang zung nas phur sgrub slob dpon thog mar bgyid rgyur/ ril sgrub/ lha mchod/ phur sgrub zab ma sogs kyi tshogs dbur yab rje mchog kyang rtag
par phebs/ lcags stag zla ba dang po'i nang bdag gi bla ma mam tri ratna bha drar/ tshe dpag med lha dgu sogs dbang byin rlabs 'ga' zhig mdzad/ lo de'i ston chab 'khor
nas sring mo rje btsun dngos grub dbang mo 'khrungs/ ngos rang la zhal bzhi sgrub dus thun mong ma yin pa'i rjes gnang / tshe sgrub gur bdun ma'i lung sogs sngon du yongs
rdzogs thob kyang / slar dam tshig gso byed du zhus ngos nas sgrol phor zla ba gsum zhal bzhi'i sgrub bsnyen la sdod skabs dang / dus mdos slob dpon yab rje rdo rje 'chang
nas mdzad/ lcags yos lo nas bzung sgrol pho'i ar zug tshugs shing / ngos rang tsha gzhis sogs la bskyod skabs dang / 'di lor phur sgrub slob dpon yab rje mchog nas mdzad/
dgun lor kun gzigs rin po che khri phebs kyis gtsang khul brel zing lang / 'di'i skabs gong ma'i sku tshab bod bzhugs blon chen srin am ban dang / bod

kyi srid skyong de mo hu thog thu sogs gtsang phebs la/ 'di nas kyang sngar lam yab rje sku mched lhan rgyas dang / sku 'khor mdzod pa bsam lte ba/ gnyer tshab gzim zur 'jam
dbyangs/ ban tshang gsol gzim sogs ston 'khor rnams rgyal zla'i nyer dgu la 'di nas chibs rdog thon te/ gar phur bzhugs zhag de nas gzhis rtse bar gyi mdzad sgo rnams phal
cher dbus phebs bzhin la/ 'di lo gangs can/ snar thang rnams gnas gzigs la phebs skad 'dug de nas gzhis rtser bla brang bkra shis lhun po bas phebs bsu thab bsu sogs
phal cher dbus phebs bzhin bzhugs mtsher o rdor du mdzad/ de nas gnang brda snyan seng 'bul gnang gis/ paN chen blo bzang thub bstan chos kyi nyi mas mjal phyag mdzad de/
maNDal rten gsum 'gyogs dar nang mdzod kyis mtshon 'bul tshan rnams phul te/ ja 'bras gsol ston bstsal grub nas dum tsam zhig gzim chung du 'khyil tsam mdzad/ de nas gnas
sngar gyi de nyid du srid skyong mjal phyag la 'bul tshan sogs bstar grub nas gzhung gnas nas gsol ston sogs bstsal/ de nas rang gnas su phebs/ am ban sar phebs rtsis la
wang zhu mdzad par bla ma gang 'dra red zhes zhib dris kyis bla ma sa skya pa yin tshul dang / deng skabs gong ma chen mo'i sku tshab dang / gong sa yab gzhis sogs la mjal
phyag tu phebs lugs brjod pa sa skya paN chen gyi rigs rgyud ngo ma e yin zhes zhib dris kyis/ de ltar na tshur phebs mi dgos/ ngos rang phar

yong tshul brjod pa yab rje sku mched nas gzhan dag la bka' 'dri gnang bas rgya mis de bzhin zer ba kho rang tsho'i lugs srol red/ slar yang am ban chen po tshur chibs bsgyur
sku las che bas ngos mched phar zhabs bcar zhus chog pa zhes/ wang zhu mdzad par sngon zhus bzhin sa skya bla ma zhes pa gnam bskos gong ma chen mo'i mchod yon snying
khung mtshan che ba zhig yin snang bas ngos pha gar sang nyin slebs yong brjod par brten/ rkub khri'u dang / dral ban dral skyags sogs mang du gra 'grigs ang gsar mdzad de/
sleb rang mi yong ngam gsungs mur/ am ban rang dang / rgya mi dpon khag g.yog 'khor sogs mang du yong bar/ o rdor gyi khang pa de bzhin mun srang dang / skas brtsegs thang
po rang med pa sha stag yod tshod 'dug par/ gzhung sne shan dang o drung sogs rgyugs te thams cad kyi lag du me sgron 'khyer bas/ steng du thogs med du 'ong ste/ rgya
lugs phyag 'tshal sogs zhus/ am ban rang dang / dpon khag kha shas rkub bkyag byas te bsdad/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched kyang khyel bzhugs dang / sa zhwa bzhes te
bzhugs thog kho bor yag po bltas te/ bla ma gang 'dra yin/ dgon pa dang / chos lugs sogs gang yin sogs zhib dris kyi lan rnams gsungs pas thal mo ya gcig slongs te/ de ltar
na bla ma rnying ma zhig yin pa red zer zhing dal bar sdod/ 'bul mtshon kyang che ba phul/ phar gnang skyes dngos po sogs bstsal kyang ma zhus pa/ dbu

nan gyis 'bul gnang mdzad/ byin rten bdud rtsi ril bu khri rdo brgya stong dbu ljon na bza' sogs dgos tshul nan zhus kyis bstsal bar dgyes dgyes byed cing / phyir log yod tshod
'dug am ban 'di bzhin dbang shugs shin tu btsan pas tshang mar nyes 'gel mang zhing bkras lhun la yang khri phebs go sgrigs ang gsar la/ ngos 'di lo gro mo dmag 'jug
las don byed dgos khri phebs mi yong tshul brjod pa/ 'di lo srid skyong gtsang phebs gra sgrigs tshang ma tshar bas zhus chog pa/ zhes dngul Tam rdo brgya tsam skyel dgos
byung lugs brjod pa dang / 'ga' re nas sa skya pa la yang / nyes pa bkal rkyen/ mi shes pa byung bas am ban rang phyir slog tu phyin pa sogs gtam 'chal du ma gleng tshod
'dug de nas khri phebs dngos gzhi sogs la phebs/ 'phros mi gnang gzhung bla brang gi gsol ston sogs la gdan zhus kyis gnam bskos gong ma chen mo'i sku tshab am ban ma slebs
par sngar lam paN chen rin po che dang / bod kyi srid skyong de mo gnyis char bzhugs khrir phebs mi chog pa gsham du khri shing la khyel bzhugs mdzad nas/ sgug sdod
gnang dgos yod 'dug pa ltar/ um ring mdzad dgos byung ba gang 'tsham zhig la kho slebs/ phyogs gang la yang bltas te/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched mthong ma thag mi mang
dbus nas tshur yong ste/ rgya lugs ching ngar sogs dang mjal dar phul bas der yod skya ser tshang mas bla ma sa skya pa 'di gzhan 'gran ma mchis pa red

ces kun ngo mtshar du gyur skad/ gsol ston grol nas am ban nas drung yig kun byang mgon po la rim bzhi'i go gnas tog sgrom/ rtse phyag zhabs shar tshe bkras la rim lnga'i go
gnas tog sgrom sogs sprad/ rgya lugs dang mthun pa'i thugs rje che zhus sogs bstsal zhing / gzhan yang 'di skabs bzhugs mtsher du gzhung bla brang gi sku drag dang / dbus
gtsang byang 'brog pa khams sogs kyi mi phal cher 'dus pa sogs/ mjal kha zhu mkhan shin tu mang ba zam ma chad pa snga dgong thugs dam nyams bzhes gsol tshigs sogs kyi
ring khyug tsam las/ gzhan bzhugs long ye nas med pa gdul bya rnams gang la gang 'dul gyi thugs dam brtag pa/ bka' bsgo/ byab khrus/ tshe dbang / chos 'brel/ gsung bsngo
/ sbyang chog sbyin sreg bgegs sprod sogs gang dgos kyi re ba bskangs grub nas/ kun gzigs rin po cher thon phyag zhu gnang gis slog sogs zab par phul/ srid skyong mchog
nas yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched gnyis char gsol tshigs nang mar gdan zhus kyis lhod bzhugs thog bstan srid skor gyi bka' mol mang bar byung tshod kyang zhib par ma nges/
thon phyag sogs zhu gnang mdzad pa slog sogs kyang zab par bstsal/ de nas ring min gzhis rtse nas phebs skyel thab skyel sogs sngar bzhin gyis/ snar thang sogs la bla
brang sku tshab ched mngags kyis sngon 'gro mgon chos rgyal 'phags pas gnas brtan bcu drug gdan drangs pa dngos su phebs te phyag mchod mdzad skabs

kyi gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs lham gsol sder zhes mchod sogs bla brang mchog gi dam sbyar ma rnams gzigs shing byin rlabs zhu bar mdzad/ de nas gangs chen shab sogs mdzad
sgo rnams dbus phebs bzhin gyis gar phur bzhugs zhag dang / de'i sang nyin zla ba gnyis pa'i tshes gcig la gdan sa chen por phebs/ thab bsu sar kho bo rang phebs bsur bskyod
cing / de nas chu khar mar chos sde lho byang nas ser phreng rgyas pa pu tra'i bzhugs khang du drung rigs rje btsun rnams kyi mjal dar/ mdun skas gsham gyi rdo skas 'gor
sku gdung rnams kyi mjal dar bzhes te rtser shar phebs mdzad/ 'di lo ngos dbus gtsang byang rigs khul sogs phyogs bskyod zhu dgos bka' 'brel zhus te/ ngos 'khor rnams
la thon khar bka' bsgo byin rlabs thon phyag gang ci bka' slob sogs zhus te zla tshes la thon/ 'di lor gsol dbyar khongs sgrol pho sngon dus nas lho bskyed gzim chung chen
mo ka ba brgyad kyi sa g.yas g.yon du gzim sbug rdo gcal shag bskor steng shod/ bkra shis dpal rgyas shar nub/ skrum khang rtse thab sogs dang / de'i phyir sde yangs/
snga dus kyi 'bag 'cham pa thon sa dang / bka' 'gyur gsung sgrogs khang chabs cig nub tu spo gnang bcas phu mda' tshang ma shing cha legs shing / rdo shing a 'u phal cher
rtse gdong par gzhung las lta bu ma yin pa bla lto sogs kyang sku sger nas yid tshim nges gdan shoms gnang ste bkod legs phugs 'pher 'di bzhin zhal

ba tshon rtsi bcas phal cher grub zin te/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched nas rdo rje phur pa'i sgo nas rab gnas rgyas pa zhi rgyas kyi sbyin sreg rab ston sogs rgyas par
gnang ste/ dga' ston du sa skya lha mo ba dang skyor mo lung pa sogs nas chos rgyal dri med kun ldan/ 'gro ba bzang mo/ padma 'od 'bar sogs 'khrab skyor mo lung pa a phyogs
dwangs seng zhes pa sogs 'khrab tshul glu gdangs/ skyed bsgyur sogs ha cang dod pas ltad mo chen mo byung tshul kyang gleng/ lo phyi nang 'di rnams su sog po tho rgod
dpon mo sogs/ dad sbyin mang po'i mjal kha dbang chos sogs 'ga' re zhus tshod bcas/ gser dngul bzang gos 'bul spam tshan che bar phul/ chu sbrul dbyar gtsang mda' khar tsho
ba'i bu rgyal po srog rlung lta bus smyo bar yab rje sku mched gnyis char nas/ byad grol/ rta mgrin gyi dbang sogs mdzad pas nad las grol bar byung 'dug 'di lo ngos rang
'grul nas 'khor bar thab bsu 'tshams dar/ rta bsu ser phreng sogs zab rgyas bstsal te sgrol phor sleb gdong yab rje sku mched ma yum bcas par phyag dang mjal dar phul
te gzhis byes skor gyi bka' phebs kyang lhug par bstsal/ de lo dgun bzhugs gzhi thog tu mdzad/ sog po bla grwa 'ga' zhig la dpal sa skya'i gser chos mkha' spyod skor gsum
gyi chos skor sogs bstsal song ba dang / shing rta dbyar sgrol phor bzhugs/ sa ga zla bar ril sgrub kyi slob dpon dang / lha mchod sogs la phebs mur/ khu bo rin

po che nyid chab bsags sogs mtha' ma'i snyun gzhi'i 'go zug cing / de sngon nas bzung zhabs rim rgya che bar gnang / yab rje mchog nas kyang rkyen sel bka' dbang ljags bsgo
sogs ji ltar bstsal rung drag skyed gtan nas ma bzhes pa'i la gyis dgung grangs so bdun pa chu stod zla ba'i tshes drug gi srod chen khar zhing brjes/ tshang ma hon 'thor
te bya thabs bral ba bla sman pa kun byang drung che mgon po dang / gzim zur 'jam dbyangs sogs nas/ yab rje mchog la ma legs thugs gso zab brling snyan phul song ba sogs/
gnas skabs thugs gso'i gsol 'debs ljags rtsom dang dgongs rdzogs zhal bkod rnams rim bzhin gnang song ba/ ji ltar sgrub tshul rnams rgyas pa 'og tu gsal zhing / tshes
la spur mchod nyin yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas snying po kyai rdo rje'i gsung chog rgyas pa rje btsun rin po che'i dus mtha'i cho ga bzhin gyis byang bu sreg byang lam ston
sogs bka' drin bskyangs shing / zhag shas nas rdo rje phur pa'i rdul tshon la brten sgrub mchod slob dpon yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas mdzad cing / chog grwa ngos rang ban
tshang pa tshogs yongs bcas nas gzim cher zhag bdun dang / byang gter thugs sgrub tshogs mchod phyag cha bsnyen bkur zab ma bcas mdzad cing / 'di lo'i phur sgrub slob dpon
kyang mdzad/ dngos gzhi thog tshes drug la sna lnga'i brgya mchod mang thug 'gyed sogs kyi thog skyabs mchog de nyid la mchod bsngo rgyas par mdzad cing/ de nas dgun
bzhugs

byang du phebs thog ngos rang bka' 'brel shab bskyod bgyis te/ Ta rngi/ dge sding bcas kyi mgon khang rnams su bskang 'phrin sogs bgyis te/ dus mdos skabs gdan sar 'byor/ rgyal
zla'i tshes 'gor bzhugs thab sgrol phor spo gnang gis tshes nyer lnga la da lta'i bdag yum 'di bzhin dang / mdo sras bsod nams stobs rgyal mchog sogs dpon 'khor rags
'dus sngon lam lung shes nas re sa bskor te/ lha rtse nas sa khong mthong smon du zhag dang / de nas 'di gar nam langs gong du gsang stabs kyis phebs te/ 'di ga shing bzo
ba'i shag tu bzhugs/ tshes nyer brgyad la gzim cher phebs te/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang mchog nas 'phags yul gyi slob dpon chen po dzeA ta ri'i thugs bcud rgyal ba tshe mtha'
yas pa lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba bstsal te/ mtshan 'chi med kun dga' sgrol ma rigs 'dzin dpal bzang mo zhes 'dogs gnang mdzad/ rgyal srid sna bdun bkra
shis rdzas brgyad sogs kyi mnga' gsol shis brjod rgyas pa thugs smon zab pa bcas stsol grub nas ngos rnams la mgul dar zab pa re bstsal/ gsang khongs su yod pa'i sa mdzod
bsam lte ba/ gsol gzim sogs nas legs dar phul ba sogs zhib tshul zur du gsal/ 'di lo dbyar skyabs mchog de nyid kyi dgongs rdzogs su khyams byang du lha khang zur bcad mdzad
nas/ slob dpon padma sam bha ba'i snang brnyan rin po che gnyis pa las grub pa dang / rgyab yol pad stong rnams gser zangs

las skrun pa bzo khyad ngo mtshar can 'di nyid kyi nang zhugs su thil g.yab rten gras 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi sman sku ngo mtshar can rgyun du zhal mdangs sna tshogs ston
pa de nyid gtso bor bzhugs/ dam pa de nyid kyi gdung 'dam las spar ba'i rtsa gsum snang brnyan spyi dang / gser chos dbang lha sku gsum gyi snang brnyan shin tu mang ba
bzhugs pa dang / phyir gtsug lag khang rang gi mthong yangs rnams kyi tshon rtsi zhal ba bcas lam tsam grub ste/ zla ba bdun pa'i nang yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid nas
rdo rje phur pa'i sgo nas rab gnas rgyas pa/ phyi bskor la me tog 'thor ba gos sku zhal phye sna lnga'i mchod sprin rgyas pa thang ston du grags pa sogs rgyas par mdzad/
slob dpon padma'i rnam thar gyang ris 'di rnams mjug la rim bzhin 'phar/ de skabs byang gter thugs sgrub kyi gtor gzhi sogs 'dzugs gnang gis ma yum nyid chog grwa bcas dang
/ skabs 'ga' re la ban tshang pa dang bcas tshes bcu'i mchod pa kho na la brtson par mdzad gnang dang / me sprel lor da lta phur sgrub kyi 'cham phod mo 'don sngon po
'ja' dmar ser mthong 'jug ljang khu byas pa 'di rnams gsar bskrun mdzad de/ thog mar 'don gnang la phur sgrub zab ma dang / khrums zla'i tshes gcig la phur khang rang du
yab rje rdo rje 'chang mchog la 'di ga'i sku ngo rnams dang / gdong sna phogs dpon sku ngo mchog sras bgres gzhon bcas kyang phebs yod pa rnams dang / 'di ga'i mkhan phyag
gnyer gsum rgya

las lho byang las sne drung rigs bcas nas legs 'bul mdzad chen bzhin phul song / me bya lo rgyal zla'i nang slar dbus phyogs gnas len phebs bzhed kyis lam yig sogs zhu gnang
gis mgon khang khag gi lam gtor phal cher me phag lo bzhin mdzad de/ zla de'i tshes bcu dgu la yab rje rdo rje 'chang dang / gdung sras 'jam dbyangs bzang po ma yum mchog
dang / sring mo rje btsun dngos dbang ma bcas dang / mdzod pa bsam lte ba/ gnyer tshab gzim zur 'jam dbyangs/ rtse phyag tshe bkras gsol che mang byam/ gzim che kun byang
/ yongs 'dzin phra mar bstan rin/ dbu che bsod bzang sogs ban tshang pa/ phyag gnyer drung rigs rags 'dus bcas gzhi thog nas chibs bsgyur ba bdag 'dir yod/ gdung rigs
rnams nas sngon lam bzhin phebs skyel mjal dar/ pu tra'i bzhugs khang du sku ngo byings dang 'dir yod phyag tshab drung che sgo shar ba dang / kun byang drung che mgon po
zung gis mtshon drung rigs sogs nas phebs skyel mjal dar dang / thab skyel dang bar lam gyi mdzad sgo rnams phal che me phag lo bzhin mdzad de/ rta zla'i tshes 'gor lha
ldan du phebs par/ de skabs gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa blo bzang thub bstan rgya mtsho mchog nas lugs gnyis thugs 'gan bzhes te/ bod 'bangs rnams bde skyid
kyi dga' ston la ci dgar longs spyad chog skabs yin pas/ sngon lam thab bsu dang drung rigs nas phebs bsu sogs zab rgyas mdzad/ de

skabs bzhugs mtsher rdo ring du mdzad/ sne shan du rdo ring sras bka' mgron dang / rtse mgron dkon mchog zla grags zung mngags par mdzad/ de nas gzhes brda snyan seng dang
'brel mjal phyag me phag lo bzhin mdzad de/ maNDal rten gsum 'gyogs dar nang mdzod 'bul tshan sogs zab du 'bul gnang dang / yum sras zung nas kyang rten gsum 'gyogs dar sogs
'bul lam mdzad cing / de nas gsol ja bzhes 'bras sogs phebs grub nas phyir phebs te/ lung rtogs rgya mtsho'i gser gdung 'gag tu/ bzhugs gdan thab bcas gsol ja phebs thog
gsol ston rgyas par bstsal/ de nas gnas gzigs mdzad yod dam snyam/ de nas dgu gtor chen mo dang / dgung gsar gsol ston sogs la brda thor 'god gnang gis dpon 'khor tshang
ma phebs/ smon lam chen mo'i skabs skyabs mgon rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa chen po bla brang thog khar bzhugs pas/ rang res dgong mo'i snyan seng dung rgya btang dus
snyan seng zhu gnang la/ bka'i gnang ba thob thog rgya gling gang snyan gtong dgos rgyu'i bka' bsgyur kyang phebs/ de nas smon lam rta rgyugs byams pa gdan 'dren sogs kyi
gzigs cha la yang bka' shag sogs nas brda tho bstsal te phebs skad 'dug pa dang / zla ba gnyis par tshogs mchod ser phreng sogs la'ang gdung sras gcung po phebs skad kyi
gzigs ja so sor yang / rtse shod so so nas gsol ja bzhes 'bras dkar spro/ sder kha bcas 'char chen phebs par thugs rje

che zhus a shes mtshams ltabs can re 'bul dgos sogs lugs srol rnams ma 'jol bar mdzad do/ /gzhan yang gzhung sa mchog nas snga phyir zur chas gya nom par bstsal zhing / bstan
srid zhabs brtan du gdugs dkar bzlog mdos dang / drang srong log tri pa la'i gtor bzlog gur mgon khro bcu'i gtor bzlog dbyar gsol lha mo rig byed ma'i char 'bebs sogs
gnang ba dang / gong gdugs dkar zor gtor rnams las khrag rgyun nar mar babs shing / zor 'phen skabs rlung nag 'tshub cing 'khyil ba/ zor bkra legs pa sogs bstan srid la ha
cang dge yang yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid rgyun gtan snyun ba mi shes kyang / 'di lo lha ldan du zhabs phran bu snyun tshul bzhes pa dang / 'di ga sa skyar gzhung gi bka'
'gyur skabs khams grwa bod grwa rnams phyogs langs kyis 'khrug shor che tsam byung song / dbus gtsang sogs su'ang sa g.yo yom tsam nyin re che chung thengs kha shas bstud
mar byung song / 'go zla'i gnam gang nyin nyi dkyil yongs rdzogs bsgrigs pa sogs don du yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid lo shas las zhabs mi brtan pa'i rtags su mngon pas
phran chung nas gong gsal than ltas de dag dmigs med du zhi ba'i srung bzlog gang shes zhus kyang don 'bras che ba rang ma byung ngo / /de nas bar skabs bstan gling srid
zur mjal 'phrad kyis gnang skyes rnams bstar zhing / yab sras gnyis char gdan zhus kyis gur zhal khang du bskang 'phrin bdun gcig tsam dang / rgyal khang du gsol kha

srid zur mchog dang / 'dus tshogs bcas nas tshe dbang sogs zhus tshod dang / gzhan yang yab gzhi glang mdun pa/ yab gzhi phun khang / lha klu dga' tshal ba/ dag bhrum sogs
nas gdan zhus kyis tshe dbang / byad 'grol/ khrus gsol rab gnas sogs thugs bzhed skong bar mdzad skad 'dug 'di lo sku gegs lta bus mdzod pa bsam lte ba/ gzim zur 'jam dbyangs/
rtse phyag tshe bkras/ phu shar em chi rnams rim par nad mnar gyis/ mdzod pa bsam lte ba/ chos dpal/ phu shar bla sman pa bcas lha ldan du dus chos su gyur ba dang
/ gzim zur 'jam dbyangs zla ba drug pa'i nang 'dir 'byor byung yang / ring po ma song bar dus las yol ba sku gegs bsgyur ba'i yab rje mchog dang gzim tshe bkras bcas snyun
las seng dwangs byung 'dug de nas gzhung zhabs pho brang dang / rgya dpon am ban lhan drung sogs kyi sar phebs yod dam snyam/ zla ba der de mo sku 'cham gzigs char/ gdan
zhu gnang bar phebs skad dang / nor gling du zhu don lha mo ba sogs kyi gzigs cha dang / de skabs sogs snga phyi gang rung zhig la rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzim
chung du mjal phyag sogs kyang mdzad skad 'dug 'di lor rgyal khab nas sa skya bar gzhis ga bstsal rgyur phyis gting gzhung gron che bas mi khrol kyang / mchod rgyun zhig
gso sogs kyi gtong snon du Tam rdo nyis brgya tham pa lo gsum skyed med du gsol ras bstsal ba sogs/ khar gdong

sna bas zhus te lo ltar gyi dngul skyed sa skya bar rtsis zhu ba sogs gzhung sa mchog gi thugs rje dang bka' drin ni bsam las 'das/ de nas ring po ma yin par thon phyag sogs
zhu gdan gyis gzhung sa nas phebs skyel ba sngar bzhin gyi brag yer pa/ tshal gung thang sogs gnas gzigs bsam yas sogs lho gnas mchod 'bul gnas mjal dang / gdul bya rnams
thar lam la 'god bzhin par/ gam pa la nas dpal bde/ sna dkar rtse/ yar 'brog thar chos/ rgyal rtse gur pa grwa tshang / pa rnam/ gzhis rtser bla brang nas thab bsu phebs
bsu 'tshams dar bstar ba sogs sngar lam bzhin/ de nas bzhugs mtsher yab gzhis/ kun gzigs mjal phyag sogs mdzad/ bkras lhun nas thab skyel phebs skyel sogs grub nas/ snar
thang gangs can shab dge sding / tsha gzhis bcas kyi mdzad sgo rnams phal cher me phag dbus phebs lam bzhin mdzad nas/ sa khyi rta zla'i tshes la ga dar bkra shis dar
rgyas su mdo sngags chos sde nyi zla zung 'brel gyi mkhan chen dpal bzang 'phrin las mdzod sgog shar drung che bsam gtan/ kun byang drung che mgon po/ gnyer tshab bde shar
kun bzang / rgya las lho byang las sne/ bla khag las byed/ 'dir yod phyag gnyer drung rigs rnams gzab mchor dang ldan pas phebs bsu mjal dar de nub phyir log ste/ de'i
sang nyin snga bar a krol la rtser bsangs rgyas pa/ thab bsu'i sar gdung sras ngag dbang lhun grub rgyal mtshan phebs yod dam

snyam/ chu kha ma'i steng mgon nub 'cham mgon brgyad/ sgrol pho'i gnod sbyin chen po/ rgyal po rnams ser phreng bcas zab rgyas rnams kyis mdun nas bstar de pu tri'i bzhugs
khang dang / mdun skas gsham sogs su/ phyag gnyer drung rigs/ bla khag gzhi thog nang khul pa phyag gnyer drung rigs dang sku ngo byings bdag cag gdung brgyud rnams kyis
mjal dar sngar lam bzhin phul te/ tshoms dmar du gzhung sne shan rtse drung bcas bzhugs gral ja 'bras legs 'bul/ dkar spro sogs me phag bzhin gnang nas rtser phebs/ de nas
rim bzhin mgon khang khag gi gtang rag sogs mdzad nas/ lo de'i dpyid ka'i zla ba bzhi pa'i nang nya ra'i chab dmar kha ma dro 'di bzhin dgos lugs gsungs pa/ chab tshan
bzang zhan ji ltar yang gtsang po dang khad nye bas lding po mi yong lugs sogs 'go byed rnams nas nan zhu byas kyang / dgongs bzhed ji ltar yin rung ye nas ma gsan par/ be
shar gnyer zur kun bzang dang / slob khang khang dpon zung nas zug rgyab bgyis te/ sa chog ma rgan bstan rin nas bgyis yod dam snyam/ rtsig pa yar tsam longs skabs rtsig
steng du sngags pa zhig phur bu sgril gyin bsdad pa mig mthong mkhan gyis mthong tshul/ de nas gnyer zur rkang 'bam gyi nad mnar ba sogs dang / 'di lo phur sgrub slob dpon
yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid nas mdzad/ tshes bco lnga yan la sku khams dwangs shing gsung bsngo rnams la bsngo bshad dang bla ma so so'i rnam thar

gsungs pa sogs rgyas bshad/ rgyun par gnang ba bzhin yod pa de bzhin mdzad nas/ bco lnga'i gsung bsngo grub nas sku seng dwangs po'i skabs snyun gzhi glo bur ba zhig bzhes
tshul gyis sku yom zhing thugs kyang dran med du phebs tshad la de skabs phun pho'i 'jam dpal ma de nyid kyang yod pa bcas ngos rnams ni/ ci bya gtol med du gyur/ kun byang
drung yig mgon po sogs nas phyag rtsa bltas te o rgyan lha khang du 'gag pa rgyam bla bstan 'dzin gyi sku rgyab tu gdan drangs te phebs bzhugs kyis gsol sman sogs zhus
pas dgong khar cung drag tu phebs tshul dang / lha chen mkhan khri dang / ma rgan bstan rin sogs nas sku glud rdzong chog sogs bcos kha re byas song / yang ji bzhin ma nges/
bcu drug tho rangs khar 'gag pa'i rgyab tu sngar bzhin gdan drangs te sgrol phor phebs/ phur sgrub slob dpon 'phro de skabs kyi slob dpon gzhon pa phran rang yin steng
sku tshab byas te nyis lcogs bgyis/ de skabs 'ga' re nas steng gdon gyi snyun gzhi 'dra mo yin tshul byas song yang / de 'dra ma red/ drung yig mgon po nas zer na sku
rlung khyab byed 'khrul pa lta bu yin lugs brjod pa gang ltar zla mjug la rim bzhin sku seng dwangs su gyur/ de nas sngar gyi chab dmar kha ma dro der ston chab gnang ba
chab tshan kyang dro 'jam las med thog sngar gyi zhabs ro yang cung zad 'phar ba sogs chab gsar 'di sngar gzhis rtser sde pa gtsang pas chos sde gsar bzhengs bzhin mi shis
pa kho na

byung ba zhig yin/ dgun thog gzhi thog tu bzhugs skabs gter ston bsod rgyal phebs par/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid mjal zhus kyis lung bstan 'ga' zhig phul yod 'dug pa dang
/ gzhung sa nas kyang bkur bzos che bar dgongs sam snyam/ 'di gar yang gtor bzlog sogs zhabs brtan 'ga' zhig kyang mdzad song la gang gi sgo nas yin min ni ma shes so/ /de
yan gyi lo khams so so'i mdzad sgo rnams rags tsam sgro skur dang bral bar brjod zin nas zhib par rnam thar zin tho sogs gang yang med stabs brjod par rngo ma thogs shing
/ gong gsal de rnams dam pa'i yon tan drug gam dgur bsdus pa las/ de yang bsdus na/ bstan pa'i bya ba thos bsam sgom gsum dang / mkhas pa'i bya ba 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum
du bsdus par gsungs pas/ dang por thos bsam ji ltar mdzad tshul ni/ dam pa rnams la dbang chos gsan tshul rnams zhib par bkod bzhin dang / de ltar gsan pa rnams kyang
ming rkyang tsam du ma lus par bsam pas sgro 'dogs chod cing / bsgoms pas nyams su bzhes tshul sogs ni/ bdag cag rnams kyi yab rje rdo rje 'chang de nyid ni dus rgyun du
sku gsung thugs rang bzhin drang por bzhugs pa las phyogs lhung dri ma can gyi chags sdang gi 'phros pa sogs gsungs pa ni sus kyang thos ma myong zhing / khyad par 'gro
ba mgon med pa dang nyam thag pa rnams gzigs pa na lhag par thugs brtse bas ngos rnams khri steng bza' btung skyid pos 'tsho

ba la 'di rnams snying rje bas ji ltar 'dod pa sbyin zhes yang yang gsungs shing / bstan pa bstan 'dzin dang bcas pa rnams la'ang dad gus lhag par mdzad tshul/ sa byi bod phyi
dmag 'khrug skabs/ 'di ga gdan sa nas kyang spyi 'gre'i ser dmag grabs gshom gyis nye 'khor gyi grwa rigs rnams grwa chas bzhag phu lung ma gyon rgyal sgang mgron gnyer
nas me mda' rgyag lugs sogs slob sbyong byed par gzigs pa na/ kye ma bstan pa'i gzhi ma dge 'dun gyi sde rnams 'di bzhin byed pa bstan pa nyams dman gsungs shing / mi
bzod pa'i thugs khral chen po mdzad pa ngos rnams kyis kyang mthong zhing / kyai rdo rje phur pa rig byed ma/ mgon dkar gur mgon zhal bzhi rnams kyi bsnyen sgrub mthar phyin
pa mdzad cing / rgyun gtan kyang ngag gi thugs dam nyams bzhes chag med dang / bla ma gong ma'i rnam thar chos 'byung/ rnam bshad sogs la gzigs rtog dang / lhag par sgrub
mchod dbang lung khrid gsum sogs kyi bsam bya rnams la zhib gzigs kyis deng sang gi bla chen/ ma shes kyang shes tshul byed cing dris na yin lugs ci yang smra rgyu med
pa rnams dang mi 'dra bar/ gsang sngags rnying ma rdo rje phur pa sogs bdag mdun tha mi thad dang / slar phye ste bdag 'jug len pa dang / gur rgyud drag dmar sogs bskyed
tshig gcig nyid kyis bdag mdun bum gsum so sor gsal 'debs dgos pa dang / kyai rdo rje sogs la bdag bskyed mdun bskyed bsre lugs kyi mdun bsre dgos tshul rnams ma 'dres
par

mkhyen cing zhib par gsungs pa kho bos kyang thos shing / de bzhin dbang rjes gnang bka' gtad byin rlabs sogs gang gnang yang gzhung de rang nas gang bshad rnams ma chad ma
lhag par nan tan du gnang srol dang / rgyun gtan gsol zas sogs gang gnang bla ma yi dam 'ga' zhig gi mtshan nas brjod de phud gtor dang sku lus gdan gsum tshang ba'i ngo
bor dgongs te/ kha zas kyi rnal 'byor rgyud sde nas bshad pa bzhin mdzad par spyan dmigs bzang mdzad pa yang yang mthong thos byung ba 'di la dpag na/ 'dod yon lam 'khyer
dgongs pas mnyes pa dang lung ma bstan dang bag med kyi dbang du cung zad kyang 'gro mi srid dam snyam mo/ /'chad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdul bya'i don mdzad tshul ni
gong du bshad pa bzhin snga phyir sa skya pa'i yab chos gsung ngag lam 'bras tshogs bshad thengs bzhi dang / gur mgon gyi chos skor thengs gnyis/ gser chos bcu gsum/ nA
ro mkha' spyod sogs lan gcig gzhan dbang rjes gnang gi rigs sogs grangs mang gnang ba'i zhal slob kyi gtso bo ni/ gang gi sku mched gcung po ngag dbang gsang ba'i bdag po
dpal chen 'od po bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po mchog dang / gang gi rigs dang chos kyi slob bur gyur pa kho bo 'khon rigs ngag dbang drag shul 'phrin las
rin chen dpal bzang po zhes 'bod pa bdag dang / 'khon gdung gcung po ngag dbang lhun grub rgyal mtshan/ 'jam dbyangs thub bstan

bzang po/ ngag dbang kun dga' grags pa blo gros/ rje btsun padma 'phrin las dang dngos grub dbang mo zung dang / rgyal ba skyed pa'i yum mchog 'chi med tshe dbang rig 'dzin
dpal bzang mo/ bdag yum 'chi med kun dga' sgrol ma/ mdo sngags chos sde nyi zla zung 'brel gyi mkhan rin po che bkra shis chos 'phel/ byams pa chos bstan 'dzin sogs dang
/ ngor e waM chos ldan gyi mkhan rin po che ngag dbang blo gros snying po/ 'jam dpal phan bde'i snying po zung sogs/ de dus kyi mkhan zhabs phal che ba/ yar klungs dbon
sprul rin po che/ nA landra'i bco brgyad khri chen ngag dbang kun dga' mkhyen rab sogs rang lugs kyi bstan 'dzin mtshan nas bgrangs su rung ba du ma dang gzhan 'dir ma 'dus
pa mang du yod pa dang / gzhan yang grwa sa khag gi sprul sku dang / sde dge sa spyod pa dang / gzhung sa chen po dang bla brang sku drag mi chen du ma sogs rgyal bstan
rin po che la phan pa rgya chen po bsgrubs par mdzad pa dang / rtsod pa rdo rje'i me chen gyis log rtog tshang tshing ji ltar bsreg pa'i tshul dang / rtsom pa sdebs legs
tshig gi me tog gis rgyal bstan mdzes par mdzad tshul rnams sdeb gcig tu brjod na/ spyir bdag nyid chen po deng sang dus snyigs ma dmu rgod la dgongs rtsod pa dngos su
mdzad pa ma mthong zhing / de bzhin ljags rtsom yang yab mes gong mas mdzad pa rnams byin che bas rgyun 'gag pa la dgongs/ gsol 'debs brtan bzhugs phran bu las ma mdzad kyang
/

don du rtsod rtsom gnyis char dus mdos phur sgrub sogs kyi gsung bsngor/ bsngo rgyu bsngo bya tha dad mi thad rnam dbye gsung ngag rang nas mang du bshad par mdzad pa rnams
don gyi mkhas pa'i bya bar 'gro'am snyam mo/ /de ltar bstan pa dang sems can gyi don rgya che bar mdzad nas/ bdag cag la sogs pa gdul bya rtag 'dzin can rnams chos la bskul
ba dang / zhing khams gzhan du 'gro don rgya che ba la dgongs nas gzugs sku'i dkyil 'khor chos dbyings su bsdus pa'i tshul ni/ sa phag hor zla bzhi par bde mchog du zhabs
la skrang sbos che bar sman pa rnams kyis zhabs babs bar 'khrul nas/ Ta sman mang ba'i rkyen lta bu chab gzhi sogs kyi snyun 'go zug kyang bar skabs cung dwangs skyed
bzhes par tshang mas rim 'khrul nas dwangs yong mur zla ba bcu pa'i nang ngos rang zhabs lhar bsnyen sgrub zhig la bsdad yod pa/ ma yum mchog nas rje btsun padma 'phrin
las gtong gnang gis chab bsags kyi snyun che ba yod lugs mtshams thon te yong dgos tshul bka' phebs zhus te/ gzhi thog tu bcar ba sku dang phyag zhabs sbos skrang che yang
/ gsol ba zhabs 'chag sogs gnang bar de tsam sku ngal che ba med cing / zhal khrol sogs gnang rgyun gtan las kyang bde nyams che bar mdzad par/ tshang mas dga' mo yong
shag mur 'go zla'i bcu gcig tsam nas sku gzugs shugs je zhan je chag gis zhabs 'chag kyang gnang mi thub cing / gsol zas kyang bzhes dka' ba bcas nyer dgu bar bzhugs

shing / 'on kyang thugs dam rgyun par gnang ba rnams las sngar las rgyun ring ba gnang ba dang / gnam gang nyin kho bos bskang gso brgya tshar sogs phyin nyin phyed yan gsar
'gyur med kyang / de nas ljags dbugs brel phebs bcas kho bo bskang sa brda lon byung 'phral phyin pa yin yang drung mgon spag tsha mo dbur bsgron te rlung bcos zhu khul
dang / ngos rang la gzigs tsam 'dra mo gnang ste/ ngos rang lag bstar dung chos su sku 'phel gdung byin chen sbyar ba sogs phul bzhes kyis dgung grangs lnga bcur phebs pa
sa phag hor zla bcu gcig pa'i tshes gnam gang gi nyin phyed khar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs sems nyid ngal gso'i bzhugs stangs lta bus gzugs sku'i dkyil 'khor chos dbyings
su bsdu ba'i tshul bstan to/ /ma yum mchog dang bdag cag rnams 'di bya 'di byed dang bral ba'i ngang tshul gyis sems khong du chud kyang dran bskyed de ngos rang nas gsol
'debs gsar rtsom dang / phun phor yang zhu gnang gis sngon lam de 'phral gshegs ja'i thog 'don dgos sogs dang / ngos rang rnams gsol 'debs 'bad brtson dang / mkhan khri
dang / dbu byed bstan rin sogs nas sku spur chas bzhugs byas song ba/ sngon gyi bla ma gong ma rnams la thugs dam ma grol bar 'gul bskyod mi rung ba dang / thugs dam grol
ltas byung bstun spur chas rigs lnga rdo rje dril bu sogs phul tshul rgyud sde dgongs pa rma med pa yin yang bar skabs shig nas sla chos 'di bzhin

byung 'dra bas/ deng skabs bshad la phyin na/ tsi ta'i yul du phyin pa na/ /rkang gnyis pa la mir mi brtsi/ /zhes mched zlar 'gro dogs bzhag go /de nas sku spur bzhugs ring
phyag gnyer bla khag sogs nas sngar lam khyad byang bla ma lha khang du btang song / de nas bcu gcig la sku gdung rin po che ngos sogs sku ngo bgres gzhon tshang ma stod
smad bla khag sogs spos bsu dang / 'dus tshogs nas ser phreng bcas gzhi thog nas phur khang bar phebs byams la mchod tshogs dang bcas pas gdan drangs te/ spur mchod pa mkhan
khri dpal bzang 'phrin las nas/ rgyud sde nas gsungs pa'i dus mtha'i cho ga'i sgo nas spur mchod phul ba mgyogs myur bzhes grub/ de nyin spur khang rgyas btab/ de'i
sang nyin bshig ste/ gdung rus rnams ser phreng bcas gzhi thog tu gdan drangs/ 'di nyin lha chen gtsug lag khang dang ngo mtshar rten bzhi sogs lha khang rnams su sna lnga'i
stong mchod/ dge 'dun rnams la mang 'gyed bsnyen bkur sogs dang gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa/ paN chen rin po che sogs la gshegs rdzong bsngo rten rgya spam
che ba/ 'di kha'i bla khag rnams dang phyogs kyi bla sprul khag dgon khag ris med phal che ba sogs la bsngo rten rnam bzhag zur 'bul 'os pa rnams dang / byings la mang
'gyed/ 'di gar sku tshigs ring nyin ltar lho byang 'dus tshogs nas thams cad rig pa'i chog gar bsnyen 'gyed bcas sogs/ gzhi thog dbang khang du ngos

rang nas slob dpon bgyis ban tshang pa sogs nas rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod zhag bdun/ sku tshigs rnams dang / zhe dgu rdzogs pa'i dgongs rdzogs rnams la sna lnga'i mchod
pa tshogs chen 'gyed mu stos bar sbyin gtong rgya cher mdzad do/ /de skabs a mdo bla ma dge 'dun dang / a li chos rje sogs 'byor te rgya dngul mang du gzhung 'bul zhus pa/
sger gzhung bsdoms pas rgya rdo brgya skor byung ba sogs gdung rten gyi rgyur gtang chog byung ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs mthar mo 'gal bus tsan dan phul ba bzhin
so so'i thugs bskyed smon lam las grub pa'o/ /de nas phun phor sngar lam bzhin khri ba'i las mjug gnang 'thus stsal gyis lcags byi dbyar lo rtse zangs bzo dbu mang rnams
nas byang chub mchod rten bum pa bang rim can rin po che gnyis pa las grub pa la khri gdan chos 'khor gser zangs las grub pa/ bum sgor yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin
bzhengs pa bcas/ o rgyan lha khang gi shar ngos su bzhugs la nang gdung rus btul ba'i bla ma/ yi dam/ sangs rgyas byang sems chos srung nor lha'i sku grangs mang gis mtshon
ring bsrel rnam bzhi spyi dang bye brag nang rten byin can grangs mang gis bkang ba bcas gro bzhin zla nang pher zin te/ phun pho 'jam dbang chog gra dang bcas pas dges
pa rdo rje'i rgyas pa bdun pa'i ser tshogs zhabs bskor dang chabs cig phyi bskor me tog 'thor ba mus gos sku zhal phye sogs/ sngon lam bzhin mdzad do/ /lo dus

dgongs rdzogs su sa gzhung dang sger bcas nas rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod tshugs grol bsdoms nyin lnga/ bla mchod dus chen nyin ser 'du'i zhabs bskor mchod phreng 'gran bral
bdun tshan bcas da lta bar dgongs rdzogs rnams 'di bzhin bcas kyis/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang 'jigs med rgyal dbang rdo rje kun snying bsam 'phel nor bu'i rnam
thar mdo tsam bshad zin to/ /3 gsang bdag dpal chen 'od po/de nas de nyid kyi sku mched gcung po gsang bdag dpal chen 'od po ni/ yab rje theg chen bkra shis rin chen dgung
grangs so lngar phebs pa/ yum mchog bsod nams dpal sgron bu khrid nyid kyi sras su sa pho rta yi lo hor zla bzhi pa'i tshes bcu gcig la ngo mtshar ba'i ltas du ma dang
bcas gzhi thog pho brang du sku bltams/ yab rje mchog nas mtshan gsang bdag dpal chen 'od po bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang por gsol bar mdzad cing / don du
yab rje padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gang gi yang srid 'khrul med myur du 'byon par gdung shugs drag pos gsol 'debs chos srung rnams la bka' bsgo 'phrin bcol sogs nan tar
mdzad pa las/ da bzod 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur ba gsungs pa'ang / yab rje theg dbang nyid nas mdzad pa'i gsol 'debs brtan bzhugs sogs las/

yab rje gdod ma'i mgon po nyid kyis rnam mkhyen mi mngon pa'i dbyings gzigs zhes dang / gsang bdag yab rje padma'i thugs dam che sogs gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas nar son
nas dpon slob grags pa rab rgyal nas 'bri klog phul bas tshegs med du mkhyen/ mngon byung 'ga' zhig kyang gsal bar gsungs/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang mangga'i mtshan can de nyid
nas rdo rje phur pa dang / kyai rdo rje'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du thog ma'i smin byed kyi dbang zab rgyas gnang zhing rgyud brtag pa gnyis pa/ kyai rdo rje/ phur
pa/ gsang bde 'jigs byed/ bdag med ma rnams kyi rgyugs sprod gang gi yab rje mchog dang / chos byang las tshan rnams kyi sar mthar phyin par mdzad/ cho ga phyag len dbyangs
rol gar 'cham rnams kyang dpyis phyin sbyong brdar mdzad de/ dgung grangs bdun par rgyud 'don zab ma dang / dgu par phur sgrub tshogs dbus gar 'cham sogs mdzad pas gdul
bya rnams kyi yid 'phrog par mdzad cing / bar yab rje mchog la gang gi rigs sras gcung po 'di nyid rta nag sgrol ma sbug gi bla sprul sgrol ston 'jam dbyangs chos rgyal
mtshan gyi yang srid du ngos 'dzin zhus bstsal byung ba ni/ brtag gnyis las/ 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga / /rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga / /'jig rten ston pa bsgrub
bya nga / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa nga / /zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar gong du yab rje padma'i mtshan can gyi skye srid dang / yang 'dir rta las babs te bong bu

la bzhon pa'i dpe bzhin sgrol phug bla ma'i yang srid sogs ngos 'dzin gnang ba 'gal bar mi sems te/ sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang bcu dang sprul bsgyur la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir/
'jig rten khams la lar sangs rgyas pa dang / 'ga' zhig tu chos 'khor bskor ba dang / la lar bltams pa la sogs pa dus gcig tu mdzad pa yin te/ yang dag sbyor ba'i rgyud
las/ gar mkhan dag tu ri mo bzang ltar snang / /gang du sprul pa zhes kyi sangs rgyas nyid/ /gcig pu nyid ni du ma gar mdzad do/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar ro/ /de nas dgon
pa rtsis bzhes khri ston sogs yab sras lhan du phebs te/ dge sding nas dmigs ko sa nas rta nag sgrol mgon du phebs te/ rigs sras dam pa gsang bdag dpal chen 'od po nyid gsang
chen rnying ma ba'i ring lugs sgrol ston 'jam dbyangs chos kyi rgyal mtshan sogs kyi chos khrir mnga' gsol bar mdzad nas/ dgon gyi rten gsum dang / mchod gzhis 'o rlon
grwa rigs sbyin bdag dang bcas pa mi nyams gong 'phel dgos rgyu'i bka' gdams dang / skyabs mchog nyid kyang gdan sa lte ba bzhugs te/ chos dus dbang 'chad nyan rnams la
yar mar phebs rgyu sogs bka' bkod mthar phyin par gnang nas/ yab sras rnams gdan sar phebs cing rje nyid dgung lo brgyad du phebs bar/ shing glang zla ba bcu par yab mangga'i
mtshan can nyid gdul bya rnams kyi bsod nams dus gcig tu zad de/ gzhan don dgongs pa gtad tshul gong

mangga'i mtshan can nyid kyi rnam thar bzhin dang / de nas dgung grangs bcu phrag gcig dang nyag ma bse ru'i steng du phebs pa/ rnam 'byung zhes pa sa pho 'brug gi lo gang
gi gcen po rigs brgya'i khyab bdag ngag dbang 'jigs med dbang rgyal rdo rje kun snying bsam 'phel nor bu'i zhal snga nas/ 'phags bod kyi paN grub kun gyi thugs nyams su bzhes
pas yan lag bdun ldan gyi go 'phang bde blag tu brnyes pa'i shul lam/ bod yul bstan pa'i mnga' bdag rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras rnams kyi gdams pa thun mong ma yin
pa gsung ngag lam 'bras tshogs bshad thog mar gsung bar/ gsan pa po gcung po khu bo rin po che nyid dang / rje btsun padma dbang mo/ bdag cag yum mchog shes rab kyi pha
rol phyin ma'am/ rgyal yum rdo rje bdag med ma'i ngo bor bzhugs pa bka' drin can de nyid bcas dang / chos sde lho byang / chos lhun pa rta nag thub bstan/ ri khud lha 'bri/
bka' bzhi ba sogs zhal grangs drug cu bskor la bstsal ba/ tshes nyin lo gyon ma'i rjes gnang sngon 'gro'i snang rgyud khrid yig mkhan chen ngag dbang chos grags yig cha'i
thog nas dang / snang gsum grol nas brgyud pa'i khyad par nyis ldan gyi sems bskyed chen mo/ de nas gcen po mchog nas bsnyen pa zhag bdun de'i slob ma'i bsags sbyangs/
de nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du rgyu dbang zab/ de'i sang nas rgyud gsum tshul sngon 'gro rnams dang / lta khrid/ phyi nang bskyed rim lam dbang / bdag med ma'i byin
rlabs

'dus pa thog mtha' bar gsum gyi khrid chos byung khog phub dam tshig phyi nang / bskyed rim rnam bshad rnams mkhan chen ngag chos kyi gsung rnams kyis zur brgyan te/ thos bsam
gyi sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang lam 'bras dang 'brel ba'i byin rlabs sogs nyi shu skor nas/ lam zab phyi nang / rten 'brel srung ba'i byin rlabs bcas
gsan pa dang / snang gsum rgyab chos lam 'bras bla ma brgyud pa phal che ba'i rnam thar gyi lung dang gzhan yang rjes gnang spyi bka' sgrub thabs brgya rtsa rjes gnang
dngos bdun cu don gnyis/ jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang / grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi/ sa 'jam sbags sgrub rnams kyi byin rlabs zur bka'/ 'jam dpal dkar nag
'jam dbyangs dmar ser/ smra ba'i seng ge gnas brtan bcu drug rta phyag khyung gsum/ seng gdong sngon mo/ seng sgra/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can/ 'byung 'dul rnams kyi
rjes gnang / gur mgon khro bcu/ lha brgyad/ zhal bzhi bsnyen dus/ dur bdag pu tra'i zur bka'/ dkar bdud/ mgon dkar/ 'jam dkar 'brug zhon/ tshogs bdag khyad par ba/ dzam dmar
srog sgrub rnams kyi rjes gnang / gzhan yang snga phyi gsan pa rnams phyogs gcig tu brjod na/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i stod las/ smad las gnyis kyi dbang chen/ bde mchog nag
po lugs/ nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i byin rlabs thams cad rig pa/ tshe dpag med lha dgu rnams kyi dbang chen

gsan/ lung skor la phur pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa phur chen du grags pa dang / phur dkyil gtor bsngo bskang ba 'go lugs chos nyid ma/ bsangs dpe chen mo/ dmag zor ma'i dgos
skong / tshe rta zung 'brel gyi dbang sogs dang / gur mgon chos skor dbang chen lnga/ khro bcu lha brgyad/ lha bcu gnyis ma/ pu tra/ bran bdud rnams thun min gnyis/ zangs
gri rnam gnyis/ dud sol phyi gsang gnyis rnams kyi rjes gnang / phyi khrid brag rdzong ma phyi nang gsang gsum dang / rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga la brten pa'i gsang khrid/
gser chos dmar po skor gsum ngor lugs kyi rjes gnang / dmar chung skor gsum rjes gnang / gnod sbyin rtsi'u dmar po'i srog gtad sogs gsan/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang theg chen
bkra shis rin chen gyi drung nas/ phur dbang kyai rdo rje dbang sogs gsan tshul gong bzhin dang / gzhan yang nyang gter gu drag dang / tshe rta bla ma zhi khro snubs lugs
byad grol/ mi g.yo ba dkar sngon rjes gnang sogs gsan/ sa skya pa mgon po dngos grub dpal 'bar drung nas tshe rta zung 'brel gyi dbang yab rje sku mched gnyis char/ bdag
khri kun dga' bsod nams drung nas rta mgrin yang gsang dbang chen gyi lnga gzas gdong gi bka' gtad tshe yi rdzong chung bcas dang mgon pod me 'bar kha skong / snyan brgyud
yang skong / dud pod sogs kyi lung dang / tshe dbang lcags sdong ma/ gtsug gtor 'bar ba/ thugs chen 'khor ba

dong sprug phyag chen zung 'jug gnyan sgrol/ dus 'khor las gsungs pa'i thun mong las sgrub pa'i lha gsum gyi rjes gnang sogs gsan no/ /gzhan yang snga phyi dam pa 'ga' zhig
las gsan pa rnams phyogs gcig tu bkod na/ rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nyid tha mal ba'i tshul bzung ba rta mgrin dbang mo'i drung nas/ byang gter tshe dbang lcags sdong
ma/ gsang 'dus 'phags lugs dang yes zhabs lugs/ gshed dmar lha lnga/ 'jigs byed ro langs brgyad skor/ 'jigs byed rwa lugs lha bcu gsum ma/ gdugs dkar nyer bdun ma/ ku
ru ku lle lha lnga/ mi 'khrugs lha dgu/ slob dpon dzAe ta ra'i lugs tshe dpag med lha dgu rnams kyi dbang chen/ tshe dbang mda' 'phel ma/ grub rgyal ma rnams kyi dbang /
gser chos tshe dpag med sprul sku/ thugs rje chen po gtso 'khor gsum khyung nag khyung dmar/ sgrol ma dmar mo/ bka' gdams lha bzhi klu dbang lha lnga/ tshe dpag med dkar
po/ sgrol dkar bka' babs dgu ldan khro mo sme brtsegs/ sme brtsegs dud kha/ sman bla mched bdun rnams kyi rjes gnang sogs dang / sa skya pa'i gser chos mkha' spyod skor
gyi byin rlabs/ nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i nyams khrid chos nyid dngos bstan gyi byin rlabs/ rmor mdzad mkha' spyod skor gsum gyi pod lung / rje btsun rig ma phyi sgrub dang
/ tshar chen yig steng thun min rjes gnang / gsang sgrub lha lnga'i byin rlabs/ tshogs bdag dmar chen thun

min dang / jo phyag bzhi pa/ chags rdo rje/ 'dod rgyal gsang sngags sgra rnams kyi rjes gnang / dbang pod rnams kyi lung / ni gu chos drug gi chos skor cha tshang / zhen pa
bzhi bral gyi khrid dang / yig skor lung / lam 'bras dang 'brel ba'i byin rlabs sogs gsan skor la/ bir srung phyi nang / bla ma rin 'byung / tshar gsum khug pa brda don
gsal ba/ brda tshig brgyud/ lam sbas bshad/ rnam 'joms bir lugs/ sgrub pa lung sbyin/ gsang bcu'i rgyas 'debs sogs kyi byin rlabs/ lung skor/ lha chen chos spyod rab gsal/
phur chung du grags pa bsnyen sgrub gsal byed sa los mdzad pa/ a mes zhabs kyi kyai rdo rje/ bde mchog bdag med ma/ nA ro mkha' spyod rnams kyi mngon dkyil dang / kun rig
dang tshe chog seng sgra'i 'don sgrol sogs kyi lung / kun blo'i brgyud 'debs chen mo/ ri khrod ma'i bum chog brgya bzhi/ 'byung bzhi gtor ma/ gtor ma brgya rtsa/ sman
bla'i mdo chog 'dod dgu yongs 'khyil/ dam tshig rdo rje'i sgom bzlas/ kun bkras gsur bsngo/ dbang snying bstan pa gsol chog sogs/ sa lo'i mgon po drug cu ma/ kun bkras zhabs
kyi gtor bzlog bsam don kun 'grub sogs lung gi rigs bcas rgya cher gsan/ dpon slob bzod pa phun tshogs las kyai rdo rje rgyu lam gyi dbang dang / mgon po zhal bzhi pa'i
rjes gnang rigs khrid lung yod rigs bcas cha tshang gsan/ dpon slob shes rab phun tshogs las rnam sras

rigs can bco lnga'i rjes gnang sogs gsan/ lcam phu sgrol mgon zhabs las byang gter sgrub skor gsum gyi dbang dang chos tshan nyer lnga'i lung sogs gsan/ mkhas dbang lha chen
mkhan zur chos bstan 'dzin las dbyangs can sgra mdo'i sa ris/ sgra sgrub phyag len dang / snyan ngag me long ma/ sum cu pa dang / rtags 'jug sdeb sbyor rin 'byung gi phyag
khrid sogs gsan/ gzhan yang sman rtsis skor rnams kyang de la sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa dag las gsan bsam sogs rgya cher mdzad nas/ rgyun du phyag bzhes kyang mdzad do/ /gsan
pa de dag kyang ming rkyang tsam du ma lus pa bsnyen pa dang bsgom sgrub nyams bzhes 'chad spel sogs kyi sgo nas bstan pa'i bya ba thos bsam sgom gsum/ mkhas pa'i bya
ba 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum gyi sgo nas rgyal bstan ji ltar spel tshul rnams rim bzhin brjod na/ lha chen mkhan chen bkra shis chos 'phel las dge tshul gyi bslab pa mnos
par mdzad nas/ lo de'i mjug zhabs brtan lha khang dge legs rgya mtsho'i 'byung gnas pho brang du bzhugs te phyag na rdo rje 'byung po 'dul byed/ dges mdzad rdo rje/ dpal
chen rdo rje gzhon nu/ rdo rje gur gyi mgon po rnams kyi gzhi bsnyen rnams mthar phyin par mdzad skabs/ rta nag sgrol phug sogs su phebs te dbang lung gnang ba sgrig lam
kun spyod 'debs pa sogs mdzad skad dang / nyid kyi dgung grangs bcu phrag gcig dang nyag ma bzang po'i grangs ldan du phebs pa tsam nas bzung gdan sa 'di nyid kyi

sngon byon bla ma gong ma'i bzhed srol nyams med kyi rgyun ltar/ dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod tshogs dbus su dpal gyi mgul las 'phrul gyi ljags brkyangs
te/ legs bshad kyi dga' ston rmad du byung ba bstsal ba dang / de nas rim bzhin bstan rim/ rdo rje gur gyi mgon po/ dpal chen badzra kI la ya/ dus mchod gnod sbyin chen
po'i gtor bzlog rnams sngon lo sgrub/ kha gso bdun re bcas zor 'phen mdzad pa/ phyi lor de 'phros rgyal chen bse khrab pa dang / dpal ldan dmag zor rgyal mo'i gtor sgrub
zor 'phen/ bsam brling lha mo rje 'khor ma'i mchod mdos sgrub 'bul sogs/ lcags rta lo mgon po zhal bzhi pa'i sgrub bsnyen zla ba gnyis lhag tsam/ rgyal zla'i mjug gnyan
mgon zhal bzhi pa'i sgo nas bstan rim gtor sgrub zor 'phen/ nag zlar dam tshig bskang gso bcas 'char chen bstan rim rnams slob dpon sngon lam bzhin mdzad/ byi glang stag
gsum la rgyun gyi tshogs phebs phal che dang / ban tshang pa'i tshes mchod byang gter thugs sgrub kyi tshes bcu la yang rje nyid dang rje btsun rta mgrin dbang mo bcas
rtag par phebs shing / lo de rnams gang rigs la phur sgrub slob dpon thog ma gnang zhing / mdzad sgo rnams sngar lam bzhin dang / dus mdos dang / chog mang dang / 'go zla'i
'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi dgongs rdzogs bde mchog sgrub mchod dang / snron zlar sa chen kun blo'i dgongs rdzogs 'jigs byed

rwa lugs lha bcu gsum ma rnams kyi sgrub mchod kyi slob dpon mdzad nas cho ga phyag len sogs phul phyin mdzad 'dug pa dang / de mtshams rta nag sgrol phug tu phebs te bzhugs
skabs shig tu char shin tu dkon pa zhig byung yod pa/ gzim zur 'jam dbyangs nas 'o cag 'dug se bzhugs nas 'grig song ngam/ char 'bebs zhig ma gnang na/ gzhan par ngo yang
tsha po byed mkhan red zhus tshod la de ltar na gnod sbyin chen po rtsi dmar la gsol kha'i yo byad rnams ma tshang ba med par sgrigs shig gsungs te/ rgyal gsol 'khrul
bral zhal bzang zhig gnang ba tshugs steng nas sprin nag 'dus te drag char zhig 'bebs par mdzad pa nas bzung zhag bdun tsam bstun nas babs pa de phyogs kyi skya ser rnams
dga' ste yi rang ba mdzad pa dang / de bzhin sa skyar bzhugs skabs kyang dus mchod du char 'bebs gnang rim gyis babs pa sogs byung tshul gleng ba sogs byung 'dug lcags yos
lo zhabs brtan lha khang gnas bcur/ chos sde lho byang sgrigs gzhon gzhi grwa rnams dang / khams grwa/ ri khud lha 'bri ba/ rgya kag pa sogs dang / phu ri bla ma dge slong
sogs chos nyan pa bcu phrag lnga tsam la 'jigs bral dpal ldan chos skyong gi bzhed gzhung / rgyal gsung mdo rgyud rgya mtsho'i snying po gsung ngag rin po che tshogs
bshad thog mar bstsal ba la bar snang gsum skabs lo gyon ma'i rjes gnang / bla ma brgyud pa phal che ba'i rnam thar gyi ljags lung / sems

bskyed chen mo lha chen phur khang du gos sku gos yol sogs sngon lam bzhin zab ma slob ma rjes 'dzin ljags bsnyen kha gso slob mas bsags sbyangs/ de nas rdul tshon gyi dkyil
'khor du rgyu dbang zab ma/ sngon 'gro rnams dang / dngos gzhi rgyud gsum lta khrid phyi dkyil lam dbang / nang dkyil/ bdag med ma'i byin rlabs/ dbang gong ma gsum gyi
nyams khrid gzhan yang grub chen brgyad cu/ sgrub thabs brgya rtsa sogs dang / zur bka' rjes gnang mang ba/ gur mgon khro bcu lha brgyad/ zhal bzhi bsnyen dus/ dur bdag pu
tra'i zur bka'/ dkar bdud sogs kyi rjes gnang / grol nyin tshe dbang sogs lung mar rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub thabs bklags pas don 'grub/ phur dkyil/ gtor bsngo dang / bsangs
dpe chen mo/ bskang gso 'go lugs chos nyid ma sogs kyi lung sogs bstsal/ lam 'bras grol nas dpal chen rdo rje phur pa'i stod las byang chub sgrub dbang dang / smad las
drag po sgrol dbang / gur drag dbang chen/ kun rig gi dbang sogs stsal bar gur drag nyin gro bzhin zla ba'i gur drag grol te byang pa tshur phebs pa dang / 'di nas dbang
grol ma kha thag la/ lam 'bras pa khams grwa tsho gcig dang / tshur yong phrad nas bsam dbon kun dpal zhes pa chos byang gi skar me'i skor la 'khrug shor gyis rgyag res
kyang phran bu thug pa/ sang nyin chos byang las tshan par thugs khrims drang min byung ba lta bus/ khams grwa rgya skeg chong

gzi sogs/ gsum bzhi zhig gri bton te ki sgra bton rkyen rgyal sgo sogs mnan te/ khams grwa rnams lcags ri steng shor ba mdun 'khor nas/ dmag bskul te lcags ri phyogs g.yas
g.yon nas bcur bas/ khams grwa gcig lcags ri kha nas mchongs/ mi lngas rdo 'phangs rkyen dus chos su gyur ba dang / gzhan rnams bzung bkyigs kyis rgyal khrims ra bar tshud
pa ni/ phur sgrub bdag khri kun bsod mchog nas gnang ba'i rjes lo der rang / 'di lo nad chen kyang byung lo bcas/ lam 'bras thog ma gnang ba po cung zad 'tshub nyams byung
ba ni/ rjes su gnyis char la sku 'tshor bar chad kyi rtags su mngon pa 'dra'o/ /lcags 'brug lo kho bo rang lo bcu par phur sgrub thog mar skyod skabs phur sgrub zab ma'i
slob dpon yab rje sku mched gnyis nas mdzad skabs dang / lcags sbrul dbyar lo rta nag sgrol phug phyogs phebs zhor byang phebs kyis g.yag pa dang / nag tshang tsho drug
sogs kyis gdan zhus kyis gdul bya rnams kyi re ba skong bar mdzad cing / phyogs der shel tsha rgyal mangs mar grags pa sngon sa skya pa'i ring rus kyi thog mar rigs gsum
mgon po'i rnam 'phrul gnam lha mched gsum nam mkha' nas gangs de nyid kyi rtse mor babs par gsungs pa dang / de nas rim bzhin rigs g.ya' spang skyes bzhugs gnas la/ deng
sang yang g.ya' spang skyes su grags pa chos skyong dkar bdud lcam dral gnas pa sogs la khrus gsol rab gnas bsangs gsol gser skyems rtse

mor chos srid dar rgyas rten 'brel du dar chen bsgreng ba sogs/ g.ya' spang bla mtshor sa bcud bum gter sbas pa sogs mdzad cing / gzhan yang bod kyi gangs chen bzhi rta sgo
btsan gyi gangs sogs gnas rnams la khrus gsol rab gnas sogs mdzad pas/ de nas bzung khul de rnams su mi phyugs la nad mug 'khrug rtsod med cing / phyugs 'phel ba sogs bde
ldan du gyur ba byung 'dug de skabs yin nam snyam pa shangs khul slob dpon chen po'i sgrub gnas zab phu dang / sog po'i gnas rten rnams gzigs shing / tshes bcu'i mchod
pa dang tshogs brgya sogs kyang zab tu mdzad skad 'dug lo de'i zla ba dgu pa'i zla mjug der phebs thab bsu ser phreng sogs kyang zab par bgyis so/ /lcags sbrul lo sogs de'i
sngon tsam nas bzung 'cham gzigs zab gsol chen mo'i slob dpon rtag par gnang zhing / de skabs ngos la skabs re rma shu sogs mang tsam zhig yod pa/ mkhan chen bkra shis
chos 'phel nyid nas 'byung 'dul gyi bsnyen pa zhig gnang na nges par drag go /gsungs pa bzhin/ sngar lo skyabs rje nyid phebs 'grul phebs gong ngos la phyag na rdo rje 'byung
'dul gyi rjes gnang lung bcas/ gur lha brgyad/ zhal bzhi bsnyen dus/ dur bdag dkar bdud rjes gnang sogs bstsal te/ mtshams thon pa nas bzung mkhan chen gyi lung bstan
thog tu babs/ 'di lo lha ldan smon lam chen mor 'khrug 'dzings che tsam gyis bal po'i tshong khang gtor ba sogs kyi

rkyen pas bal po tshang ma rang yul du phyir log gzhung sa nas sa dbang lha klu phebs pa sogs bal bod zing gzhi yong rgyur phal cher thag chod skabs/ mkhan zur byams pa bkra
shis chos 'phel de nyid nas dmag mi yong ba ngos kyis khag theg de las skyabs rtse phun pho dang / sgo spe gnyis la sku gegs shin tu che bar 'dug pas zhabs brtan gnang
zhus shig khong tsho la gnang rgyu med pa ni mi 'dug ces ngos nas zer ba zhus/ zhes sku mdun du mi byung tshad la gsungs 'dug kyang zhabs brtan rang gi skabs mtshams ma gtogs
byung tshod du mi 'dug ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ bal bod gnyis chings sgrig gis dmag ma byung zhing / phun phor bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams chu rta sa ga zla ba'i nang
dgongs pa rdzogs shing / sgo spe khu dbon rin po che de nyid kyang de'i rjes tsam la sngags 'chang dge bsnyen rdo rje 'dzin pa'i skur bzhengs par sku gegs kyi rnam pa
lta bur gsung rgyur 'dug kyang / rkyen ni de skabs khri thog gong ma gshegs pas yab rje rdo rje 'chang nyid la thugs 'gan bzhes mtshams su slebs par brten/ phyag rogs lta
bur lha bla'i lung bstan nam 'od gsal du shar ba gang yin yang snga dus nas bzung sa gzhung 'di bzhin 'thus shor gyis stobs 'byor dman zhing / dus dbang gis mig ltos ngan
'gran kho nas bstan srid kyang tshags su tshud min sogs la brten/ gnas tshul 'di bzhin gnang ba thugs 'gan bzhes pa

nas bzung sa gzhung rang stobs mkhos sogs cung drag tu song ba tshang mas shes tshod yin stabs/ des na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge slong la/ /gzhan don gyur na ltung ba med/
/zhes sogs dang / theg chen gzhan gyi don yod na/ /'dod chen ltung ba med ces gsungs/ /zhes gsungs pa ltar theg pa chen po sor thar rigs bdun gang yin yang rang 'dod kyi
'khri ba med par gzhan don rgyal sras kyi spyod par gyur na/ pham ltung ma 'byung ba'i khar bskal pa mang po'i tshogs bsdum par gsungs pas so/ /gang ltar 'di lo zhabs ltar
zhig lhar bzhugs te/ chu lug rgyal zla'i tshes 'gor gzhi thog tu phebs tshul sogs phal cher gong yab rje bzhin dang / 'di lo dbo zla'i nang sku mched a lce drung rje btsun
skal bzang chos sgron zhal ma bzhugs par snyun skabs dang dgongs rdzogs sogs sgrub par zhabs lhar phebs shing / de nas 'cham gzigs skabs sgrol phor phebs bzhugs bka'
drin bskyangs te/ yab rje mchog nas kho bo sogs la gur mgon chos skor sogs gnang skabs/ gcung po khu dbon rin po che nyid nas 'di lo dus mdos chen mo zab res dang / khri
phebs sogs snga phyi'i deb rnying rnams dang / nye dus bdag khri gong ma rdo rje rin chen sogs sku mched gsum phebs skabs lam deb sogs go sgrig gis thugs brel dang / dbu
che chos bzang nas sngon dus gong dkar rdo rje gdan pa kun dga' rnam rgyal gyi gzigs snang du 'khrungs pa'i 'cham tshul rnams kyi 'cham yig rnying ma

dang / rjes su sngags 'chang chen po dang / 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi 'cham yig le tshan gyi dgongs don bzhin/ sku 'cham rnams yab rje sku mched sogs la phul bzhes dang / dgun
gzhi thog tu phebs te/ mdos zab chog sgrig gnyen chas sogs kyi sngar gyon bsher gyi go lor gong dam dang / 'cham chas phur khang sgrig tho bcas dang / khri phebs zhabs
brtan mtshan po sogs kyi sdud sdom sogs khu dbon rin po che de nyid nas mdzad cing / dngos gzhi mdos zab/ shing sprel rta zla gza' tshes dge ba nas khri phebs gnang tshul
sogs gong gcen po kun dga' snying po'i rnam thar rtogs brjod skabs bzhin dang / de nas shing sprel zla ba gsum pa'i zla mjug khu dbon rin po che nyid dang / gzim zur 'jam
dbyangs ban tshang pa rags bsdus rta nag sgrol phug ngos su chibs bsgyur mdzad rgyur mgon khang rang 'dus la lam gtor gnang chibs bsgyur te/ sgrol phug dang / rtse gdong
sogs su zhag shas bzhugs thog thob rgyal/ 'o yug la rgan nas/ mar rkyang/ na ga dpal ldan byang yangs pa can zam gsar nas/ 'dam gzhung sogs 'gro don gang la gang 'dul
gyis rim par mdzad nas/ g.yag ra 'khor chen nas rwa sgreng stag lung gnas gzigs gnang ba so so nas bsnyen bkur 'bul nor zab tu zhus shing / lhag par stag lung ma sprul mchog
nas/ thab bsu phebs bsu sku ngo rnams phebs pa sogs zab rgyas zhu gnang gis phur dbang / byad grol/ phur bzlog sri gnon sogs zhabs rim

kyang zhu gnang gis stag lung ma sprul rin po che de nyid tshur mthong gdul bya'i snang ngo yang mdo smad 'jam mgon rnam gnyis sogs kyi zhabs la gtug cing / dngos slob tu gyur
pa sogs sku yon che bas/ de skabs rje nyid la rdo rje phur pa'i sgrol dbang dang phur bzlog skor gyi gnad tho bcu gnyis dang / tshe lung khrus lung sogs dgongs pa rnam
gsum gyi dmigs gnad rnams bka' 'dri zhu gnang la/ sa skya pa'i gdung 'di rnams gzhan 'gran ma mchis stabs bka' lan yang thogs med du 'di bzhin gsungs byung zhes ngos rang
la 'grul bskyod thog ma'i skabs ma sprul rin po che nyid nas gsungs byung ba dang / de skabs nam brod phyi mo'i bar du ma sprul mchog dang gsung mol du 'gor ba snang gsal
gyi 'od sogs la stabs re sku gzugs kyi grib ma mi gsal ba sa lam mthon por phebs rtags yin 'dug gsungs pa'ang ma sprul mchog gi gsung las thos/ gzhan yang dbang rjes
gnang sogs mang du gnang ba stag lung bla brang 'di bzhin stobs 'byor che bas 'bul tshan sogs zab rgyas mdzad skad dang / de nas chag la dang / 'phan po khul brgyud rang
re'i kun mkhyen rong ston chen po'i gdan sa nA lendra'am bod skad du dpal rgyun gyi dbang po'i chos grwar phebs bsu ser phreng sogs zab rgyas dang bcas phebs te/ bco brgyad
bla brang du bzhugs te/ gnas gzigs mang 'gyed sogs dang / tshogs chen dang / gzim 'og grwa tshang / khams tshan so so nas gdan zhus kyis/

tshe dbang rjes gnang / khrus gsol rab gnas sogs/ bla brang yas mas sogs kyi re skong la so so nas dngos 'bul kyang zab bar byung / lha ldan du gzhung sa chen por 'tshams 'bul
ba gtong gnang mdzad pa/ rgyal khab chen po nas gzigs bzos thug med kyis mtsher khang / sne shan sogs bkas bsgyur/ 'phan po sgo la brgyud de phebs pa lha ldan dang nye
bar sne shan rtsa drung dkon mchog zla grags phebs bsur 'byor zhing / de nas mtsher khang dga' ldan khang gsar du phebs bzhugs kyis/ de skabs gong sa rgyal dbang thams
cad mkhyen pa thub bstan rgya mtsho mchog sku gzhon nu'i dus dang / srid skyong yongs 'dzin rta tshag hu thog thu bcas mjal phyag tu phebs te/ maNDal rten gsum 'bul dngos
sogs rgya gang che 'bul gnang dang / gdan thob gsol ja bzhes 'bras sogs phebs pa dang / mgron khang du gsol ston dkar spro sogs bstsal/ de mtshams rgyal khab nas bstan srid
zhabs brtan gnang dgos bka' bsgyur phebs pa bzhin/ pho brang chen po po tA la'i tshoms chen du badzra ku ma ra'i gtor zlog sgrub 'phen zhag bdun pa'i thog 'dab las kyis
lingga sgrol chog skabs/ zhing bcu'i dgra bgegs kyi rnam par shes pa dngos su 'gugs bstim mdzad pa'i rtags su/ gdan sa 'di nyid kyi phyag srol thun mong ma yin pa bzhin
dgra gzugs lingga'i mgo bo bcad 'phral po tA la'i lho phyogs rgyal sgo'i 'og gi hom nang du 'jug par gtong skabs/ ling mgo bcad pa'i snod nang du khrag nyil

nyil du 'khyil ba ma zad/ mgo bo'i bcad mtshams nas khrag chim chim du thon pas skyel mi kho pa rnam rtog dang / ya mtshan ha las par gyur te sa der ling mgo snod bcas tab
tab tu bor bas de'i sar/ khrom pa skya ser mi mang phal mo che 'dus pa kun gyis mngon sum mthong snang du grub pas/ thams cad ya mtshan ha las kyis grags pa yongs la khyab
cing / de 'phral zhabs brtan do dam lhan rgyas nas gong sa mchod yon gyi snyan lam du gnang phul sogs dgongs babs che ba sgrub skabs sogs su gong sa thams cad mkhyen pa
mchog nas ljags smin bzhes spro shing 'bras sogs/ rtse mgron brgyud yang yang phebs skad 'dug cing / gzhung zhabs khag rnams grol nas kun gling nas gdan zhus kyis srid skyong
mchog la tshe dbang / byad grol sogs dang / gzhan zhabs brtan 'ga' zhig kyang zhu gnang sogs bkur bzos che cher mdzad pa/ gzhan de skabs sog po bla ma tshoms khang
ho thog thu zhes pa phebs pa dad 'dun rtse gcig pas/ dbang sogs mang du zhus zhing 'bul tshan kyang che ba phul/ lhag par sngon dga' 'bras shugs che skabs tsha ba zha rar
grags pa de skabs kun gling dza sag phyag mdzod nas/ rang gnas seng ge shag tu gdan zhus kyis tshe dbang byad grol sogs mang zhus kyis shag tshang grwa rigs bcas nas dad
'dun rtse gcig pas gser byi'i phreng ba che legs rgyan ldan sogs spus nam rtsar 'bul tshan mang du phul ba dang / de bzhin yab gzhis lha klu dga' tshal du'ang gdan zhus
shing /

gzhan tshong pa rang kha ba sogs kyis gdan zhus dbang sogs mjal mang slob mi 'khyud pa byung skad/ gzhung gnas snga phyir zur gsol sogs khyon che ba dang / yar lam lho gnas
brgyud phebs rgyu'i rta khal sogs kyang phon mi chung ba bstsal/ de nas ring min gong sa mchog dang / srid skyong bcas par thon phyag zhu gnang gis/ yer pa dang / tshal
gung thang sogs gnas gzigs kyis rgod ka la brgyud bsam yas su mkhan po sogs nas bsu ba ser phreng rgyas pa dang / rab grwar dbang sogs gang dgos gnang / lha tshes dang bstun
chos skyong chen po spyan 'dren sku phebs la rgyal bstan spyi sgos srung skyob sogs kyis bka' bgo bar mdzad par/ ji ltar gsung ba bzhin tha tshig kyang phul zhing / phyag
mdung zhig kyang 'bral med srung skyob kyi rten du phul/ de nas bsam yas mching phu g.ya' ma lung snga dus bla chen dgongs pa rab gsal gyi sdom phrug dbus gtsang mi
bdun gras/ klu mes tshul khrims shes rab kyi sku gdung bzhugs par grags pa'i glo bo ron steng zhes pa dang / rtse thang 'bras gling / yar klung rten gsum gnas gsum pa dgon
bkra shis chos sde/ de nas rim bzhin gra phyi nang / mdo chos/ rnam rab/ ra smad/ gong dkar/ de nas gam la brgyud nas yar 'brog thar chos/ rgyal rtse gur gra rnams la gnas
gzigs mchod tshogs/ mang 'gyed sogs rim gnang / rgyal rtse rdzong 'du nas dmag zlog gtor bzlog mang zhus kyis rta zla'i mjug tsam la spa nam gzhis rtse shab sogs

brgyud/ shing bya dbo zla'i nang thab bsu gzhung sger nas 'tshams 'bul bar/ ngos rang sogs bka' 'brel bzhin zhabs bcar zhus/ sgrol pho dang nye bar ser phreng / rtse nas/ dung
/ rgya gling / drung rigs rnams kyis mjal dar sogs sngon lam bzhin phul nas/ gcen po rigs brgya'i khyab bdag mchog gis spyan sngar mjal dar dang bar lam sogs kyi bka'
mol gyis dus 'da' ba'i skabs so/ /'di lam 'cham gzigs skabs gnod sbyin chen por gtang rag stag dong gzig shub gsar bskrun 'di bzhin bstsal zhing / dbyar thog yar klungs
dbon sprul mchog la gser chos skor sogs kyi dbang lung mang du bstsal te/ khul 'dir mo rim char 'bebs rab gnas sogs thugs gzhol/ me khyi lo ngos rang nas khral 'jal gsung
ngag bka' bzhin thog mar byed skabs/ de skor gyi phyag len rnams yab sku mched gnyis char nas slob gnang sogs dang / me phag dbus phebs su yab rje sku mched gnyis char chibs
bsgyur bskyangs tshul/ gong yab rje mchog gi rnam thar du zhib par song bzhin dang / sa byi lo gzhung gnas nas bstan srid zhabs brtan du 'di ga yab rje sku mched gnyis
cha la lha mo rig byed dbang sgrub gnang dgos phebs pa bzhin rje nyid nas dwags po paNDi tas chos skor dngos grub 'byung gnas bzhin/ sngon dngos rjes gsum tshang bar gnang
/ 'di skabs sde dge sa spyod dpon 'khor rnams 'dier phebs/ sngar dus mdos zab mang rje nyid bcad rgyar bzhugs pas tshogs

phebs sogs ma gnang zhing yab rje mchog phyag rol dang / gzhan rnams phebs mkhan med stabs/ ngos rang nas dus mdos slob dpon thog ma bgyid skabs snyems chas gyon chas sogs
kyi 'cham gyi 'gan yang khel byung / 'di lo khu dbon rin po che nyid mang yul byams sprin gzhung pa'i zhabs rim dmag bzlog sogs 'grul phebs dgos pa'i gser gyi bka' yig rta
khal phebs sgrigs lam yig bcas phebs par zla ba lnga par phyag mdzod 'jam dbyangs/ rgya dpon sogs ban tshang pa rags 'dus bcas chibs bsgyur te/ yar lam ding ra'i bzhugs
mda' sogs kyis zhus ngor phur bzlog sri gnon sogs mang gnang gis mnyal lam sogs nas skyid rong gi mang yul byams sprin zhes/ sngon chos rgyal srong btsan sgam pos btab pa'ii
bod kyi ru gnon gyi gtsug lag khang de nyid du gdugs dkar mdos chen phur bzlog sri gnon sogs/ zhabs rim mang dag dgos pa gnad smin grub nas/ skyid rong jo bo gla gar
rtsib ring sogs la yang gnas gzigs kyis mtsho sgo nas rim bzhin rma gzhis nas 'di gar zla ba brgyad pa'i nang phebs/ dgun bzhugs gzhi thog tu gnang ste lha mo rig byed kyi
bsnyen sgrub kyi 'jug las sbyor rigs rnams mdzad de/ nag zlar yongs rdzogs grub te/ yab rje sku mched gnyis gzhi thog rtser lha bsangs dang / ngos nas zhabs brtan 'bul
bar phyin/ 'di skabs ngos rang sku rim chen mo'i zor 'dzin/ ma yum mchog rtse phyag tu bzhugs song / de nas sgrol phor phebs/ ngos

rang dgon mdos zab ma'i zor 'dzin bgyid skabs/ mdos bsham skor/ 'cham chas gra sgrig 'cham rgyugs dngos gzhi 'bag rgyab tu phebs thugs 'gan che bzhes bka' drin bskyangs/ yab
rje mchog de dus bde chen bzhugs g.yab tu rje btsun rig byed ma'i bsnyen pa'i zhal sbyin sreg mdzad mus dang/ ril sgrub slob dpon kho bos bgyis te byin rgyab tu rje nyid
phebs/ 'di lo ngos phur sgrub slob dpon thog mar byed rgyur/ ril sgrub/ lha mchod sngar lam bzhin zab ma mdzad skabs dang / rje nyid nas dgun lo shangs lugs mgon dkar gyi
bsnyen sgrub sbyin sreg sogs mdzad song zhing / lcags stag dbyar mjug rje btsun ku ru ku lle'i don kun 'grub pa'i ril sgrub sogs mdzad cing / yos lo'i dpyid nas sgrol
pho'i ar po tshugs shing / dbyar ngos rang drung mgon bcas tsha byang phur ri sogs la bskyod skabs dang / zla ba bcu gcig pa'i nang sog po mang sleb kyis chu tshod byi'u
ma gser bye phreng ba rgya dngul rta rmig ma g.yang tri'i spyad pa sogs mang du phul zhing / dbang bka' rjes gnang gi rigs kyang mang du bstsal/ chu 'brug ngos rang phyag
zur 'jam dbang bcas bka' 'brel dbus bya rigs khul sogs la bskyod skabs dang / de skabs sgrol pho'i ar las zhal ba tshon rtsi phal cher zin rab gnas rab ston sogs gnang tshul
gong yab rje'i rtogs brjod skabs bzhin/ 'di lo skyor mo lung ba deng seng sogs nas lha mo 'khrab par/ 'gro ba bzang mo/ lhag par

pangma 'od 'bar zhes slob dpon chen mo'i 'dra tshad pa/ rgyal po sdig can gyis gson po mer sreg btang ba/ zhag shas nas pad sdong las sku 'khrungs pa sogs rgyun par med stabs/
mig 'phrul lta bur tshang ma ltad mo che ba byung lugs zer yang/ brtags na rtsed bkra 'di bzhin gang 'tsham zhig yin par mngon no/ /chu sbrul dgun lo ngos 'grul nas 'khor
nas kyang gzhi thog sa skyar lha mo tshar gcig 'khrab song / de lta bu'i bdag cag gi bla ma khu dbon rin po che 'di nyid kyis sku gzhon nu'i dus nas bzung / yi dam 'byung
po 'dul byed dang / dges pa rdo rje/ rdo rje phur pa/ rje btsun rig byed ma/ mgon dkar yid bzhin nor bu/ rdo rje gur gyi mgon po/ gnyan mgon zhal bzhi pa dus grangs
kyi bsnyen pa mthar phyin par mdzad cing / mtshan ma'i bsnyen rtags ngo mtshar can yang yong ba gzhir grub kyang / rnam thar zin bris sogs med stabs 'bri rgyus phongs shing
/ khyad par gnyan mgon zhal bzhi pa'i bsnyen sgrub mdzad skabs/ 'gro mgon dbang sdud snying po'i rnam thar bzhin thog dang 'ja' tshon dang / rbab bskul ba lta bu'i ldir
sgra dang gzim khang yom pa lta bu gzhung nas bshad pa'i chos skyong 'go ba'i rgyun gtan byung ba dang / steng du a lce bzhugs pa la cho 'phrul cher byung ba 'di la gtor
gdugs phul na 'phrin las 'grub 'ong / mnal lam du grwa pa zhig nas sku mtshams khang du'ang gtor gdugs 'bul gnang dam bskang skabs gtor gdugs grul rtse sna lngas phul

ba mdzad tshul zer/ gzhan gyi rtags mnal lam 'od gsal sogs su yang gzigs snang mang du byung ba gzhir grub kyang / gsal bar mi gsungs pa rgyun du sbas tshul kho na gnang zhing
/ de lta bu'i bsnyen mtshams thon ring gi mngon rtogs bdag bskyed bzlas pa sogs rgyun par nam phyi mo'i bar du thugs dam nyams bzhes chag med gnang / yi dam chos srung
rnams la gtor bsngo bskang 'phrin sogs rgyun par rang ma grub kyang / brgyad gnyis bcu bzhi gnyis sogs la chag med gnang srol dang / gzhan gdul bya rnams gang la gang gdul/
phyag mo/ srung ba/ rkyen sel dbang/ bka' bsgo/ byin rlabs sogs dang / dbyar dus char 'bebs/ rtsa sad 'bu srung / rlung gnon gang la dgos pa de rnams/ dngos 'bul sogs
la mi gzigs par zhus ma thag par gnang ba sogs/ phyag mo gang gsungs phal cher tshad mar 'ong zhing / char 'bebs sogs gong du yang cung zad song ba dang / lha ldan du char
'bebs gnang bar klu sbug sogs su phebs dgos pa/ rgya dpon am ban nas kyang klu khang sogs la lcags thag g.yogs te/ char 'bebs yin khul byed par dbus phebs sogs kyi sa
skya pa phebs min kyang non gyi phebs pa shes na kho yang 'gro ba char mi babs pa mi srid cing mar phebs skabs/ chibs steng char brdung re ma byung ba med pa lta bu brjod
pa sogs gdon gdug pa can gyis zin pa mang po yang de las grol ba'i lo rgyus mang du yod pa/ mdor na mkhyen nus sems can

re re'i rgyud la thar pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa bon btab ste thams cad kyang mngon mtho nges legs la 'god par mdzad nas mthar gzugs sku chos dbyings su bsdus tshul/
shing rta dbo zla'i nang sgrol phor bzhugs thab phebs nas sgrol dkar bka' babs dgu ldan gyi rjes gnang zhig las gsan thor med kyang / sgrol dkar 'od zer drug sbrags tshar
lugs kyi bsnyen sgrub zhig gnang bar sku mtshams ma grol bar la zhabs 'bam dang chab chu sogs mtha' ma'i snyun gzhi 'go zug cing / de nas zhabs brtan sku rim rgya cher
gnang song yang / sems can las ngan spyod pa la/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang ci byar yod/ /gsungs pa lta bu'i dus dbang sems can rnams bsod nams dman zhing / sa bstan 'di nyid
rang gi sku gegs bzlog med kyi rnam pas/ nyid kyi dgung grangs sum cu so bdun pa chu stod zla ba'i tshes drug srod yol tsam la/ nyi zla'i rlung nghu tir 'dus te 'da' kha
ma'i rnam 'byor gyi dpa' bo'i tshogs dpon du ngo mtshar ba'i ltas du ma dang bcas yud kyis gshegs pa/ tshang ma sems mya ngan gyi khung bur tshud de 'di bya 'di byed bral
yang yab rje mchog sogs nas gang gi gsol 'debs dgongs rdzogs skor bka' bkod dang / thugs dam gsal 'debs pa lha chen mkhan khri dpal bzang 'phrin las/ chos lho 'dus tshogs
re mos kyis bla mchod pa bzhi grwa sogs dgung zhag nam rdzogs bar gnang zhing / tshes bcu gnyis la sku gdung spur khang du ser phreng mchod tshogs rgyas pa dang

bcas/ gdan drangs/ mkhan khri nas dus mtha'i cho ga'i sgo nas spur zhu dang / de nub rgyas btab/ zhag shas nas gdung rus rnams bsdus te sgrol phor ser phreng mchod phreng mchod
tshogs bcas sngar bzhin gdan drangs te/ mchod tshogs dbus su bzhugs te bla mchod sogs sngar bzhin dang / gong spur mchod nyid gdan sa 'di nyid kyi mchod khang rnams
su sna lnga'i stong mchod tshogs chen la mang thug 'gyed bcas dang / mu to bar sbyin gtong sogs rgya che bar mdzad/ gzhan yang dgung nam ma rdzogs bar la lho byang tshogs
yongs nas zhogs ltar re bzhin thams cad rig pa'i cho ga gnang bar bsnyen bkur 'gyed bcas gya nom dang / sku tshigs bzhi pa dang / dgung rdzogs nyin rnams la stong mchod
gong bzhin dang / chu stod zla nang sgrol phor yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas slob dpon mdzad pa'i ban tshang pa sde tshogs nas rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod zhag bdun byang
gter tshes bcu'i mchod tshogs brgya bcas pa/ gong sku spur phebs nyin yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas gang gi mtshan byang sreg sbyangs dang yab rje bkra shis rin chen gyis sku
gdung drung de bzhin mdzad po dpon slob dang / gzhan yang gong sa yas phyin sogs phyogs kyi che chung khag ris med dgon sde bcas par bsngo rten mang 'gyed sa lugs rnams
la cung zab pa bcas dang / shing lug de nyid kyi nang rten du gu ru rin po che'i snang brnyan byin rlabs kyi gzi 'od 'bar ba rin po che dang gnyis la grub pa lha khang rten
brten pa gsar bskrun/

de nyid kyi nang bzhugs gtso bo thil g.yab steng 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi sman sku ngo mtshar can gtso bor bzhugs shing / de nyid kyi gdung rus btul ma'i rtsa gsum gyi lha
tshogs dbang lha skor gsum gyi spar sku rnams la gser mtshal gyi na bza' can sogs ring bsrel rnam bzhi gzungs kyis bkang ba bcas legs zin gyis/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang mchog
nas rdo rje phur pa'i sgo nas rab gnas/ rab ston gos sku zhal phye sogs zab rgyas mdzad cing / lo dus kyi mchod du rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod ser 'du bcas lo shas
gnang dus phyis mchod phreng sogs rtse chos su dgon der sgrub mchod bskyangs tshul bcas kyis khu dbon rin po che dpal chen gsang ba'i bdag po'i rnam thar sgro skur gyis dben
pa cung zad brjod zin no/ /yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched kyi a lce drung sgo dpe rje btsun dam pa'am sgo spe a lce mar grags pa sngon dus sku yon sogs la brtson pa
dang / mdo smad phyogs kyi 'jam mgon mkhyen brtse sogs la gsan bsams kyang ci rigs mdzad cing dus phyis sku rlung lta bu'i snyun gyis zin pas dgung grangs sum cur gshegs
pa'i nang rten dbu rtser lam 'bras bla rgyud zhal skong / theg chen bkra shis rin chen gyi snang brnyan rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa 'di nyid dang / sku mched sring mo
bgres pa tshe lha dbang mo zhu ba zhabs lhor bzhugs shing nyams bzhes la brtson pa de nyid kyi nang rten du sgrol steng nas bzhengs pa'i sa paN gyi dngul sku zhabs lho rang
na bzhugs/ sku sring

mo chung ba padma dbang mo zhabs byang rje btsun bzhin ras kyang phag gdong dngos dang 'dra ba/ sku rgyab ltag par phag ze yod pa sogs yab rje theg chen bkra shis rin chen
mchog nas rdo rje phag mo'i rnam 'phrul yin par gsungs shing / rgyun chos srid gang yang mi mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis sbas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis thugs dam nyams bzhes la brtson
pa/ gshegs pa'i tshe nye 'khor du dri bzang pos khyab pa dang / bud med lta bu'i glu dbyangs sil lil snyan pa'i sgra sna tshogs thos pa sogs/ ltas ngo mtshar bcas te zhing
brjes pa zhabs 'jug dgongs rdzogs sogs gang yong zhus te/ nang rten du tA re dkar mo'i snang brnyan rin chen gnyis pa las grub pa/ pad gdan dar lhug rnams gser zangs
dang / nor rigs kyi phra rgyan dang sku rgyan du tshar ba ngos rang nas rab gnas zhus te sgrol phor bzhugs pa bcas/ gcung po khu dbon rin po che nyid bcas sku thog 'dir
gtsug lag khang nyams bzo gnang gras shag gtsang shar nub/ mngon bde/ mthong don/ 'khon sku 'bum rnams kyi skya shing gsar brjes spen pad gsar brje sogs dang / lha chen dpon

khang gsar bskrun

la gser zangs kyi bzhugs khri rgyab yol/ 'khor sgrol ma zung gser zangs sngon bzhin sogs dus phyis yum gyi nang rten sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad skyobs gser zangs las grub pa

mar sgrol ma sogs bzhugs tshod dang / rnam rgyal snga mo'i mchod rten dang rgya khub rtsi lha khang sgo mchor sogs gsar bskrun dang / dbu rtser yum gyi na bza' sogs kyi thog

ming che yang

de mtshungs par med pa'i gyi na bdag gi byung tshul cung zad gsham du 'byung zhing / mched zla gdung sras gsum dang / rje btsun gnyis las/ dang po gdung sras ngag dbang lhun

lo gyon ma ser mo/

'jam dbyangs dmar ser/ 'jam dkar/ smra seng / gser chos 'jam nag gnad bcu gcig gi lung dang bcas pa/ rta nag lcags ral can/ jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig rta phyag khyung gsum/

rtag par phebs/ bar lam rtse ger gzhi sdod bcas kha 'dzin zhu gnang gis gnyer zur kun bzang bcas shing lug lo nas rtsis bzhes kyis phal cher rtse blar bzhugs thog byang gter

su/ sngon dus rtse bla sog por shor te dpon mo chos skyid nas bzung skabs jun gar thon skabs/ slob dpon dang gsang sngags rnying ma la kho rnams shin tu sdang zug che
