nyid sna lnga'i stong mchod dang / tshogs chen la mang thug 'gyed/ ngan slong sbyin gtong dgung zhag nam rdzogs bar lho byang tshogs yongs nas thams cad rig pa'i cho ga dgung
zhag rdzogs nyin gong

'dra sogs dang / gzhan yang gong sa yas byin/ 'di ga'i bla khag sogs la bsngo rten spam mtho ba/ phyogs dgon ris med kyi sde rnams su mang bskol sogs dang / nang rten sgrol
ma 'jigs pa brgyad skyob kyi snang brnyan gser zangs las grub pa gsar bzhengs sogs/ zhib par de skabs kyi dgongs rdzogs sgrub tho zur yod 'dug pa las ngos rang la ni go
bsdur sogs gang yang gnang ma byung bas rgyus mnga' dang the tshogs gang yang med cing / gzhan yang dgongs rdzogs sgrub par dbus nang ngos la rje btsun dngos dbang la phebs
cing / me sbrul lo nang gdung sras mchog dang btsun mo bcas gnyis char/ rgya gar phyogs la phebs te/ rdo rje gdan/ rtswa mchog grong / bya rgod phung po'i ri sogs la mchod
'bul dang gnas bskor bcas par phebs song / gzhan yang lo khams ma nges pa lho rong gzhung 'brug spa gror ngos dang / 'go yul stod gsum ngos tshar kha shas gdan zhus
kyis 'gro don sogs la byon par/ lha rten dang mtsho sogs la bsangs gsol khrus gsol rab gnas sogs mdzad pa nas bzung / mtsho rnams lud cing rgyas te/ lo phyugs legs pa sogs
snyan pa'i grags pas khyab pa byung zhing / gzhan yang 'dar grags can sogs su'ang lam 'bras slob bshad dbang chos mang du gnang zhing / gnas gsar 'gur lang pa'i mkhan zur
las shangs chos ni gu chos drug sogs gsan pa dang / ngor e waM chos ldan du khang gsar mkhan po sku mched dang / klu lding rgyal

sras sogs nas bde mchog lu nag dril gsum/ bong zhal gsang 'dus lugs gnyis/ kyai rdo rje bka' babs bzhi sogs dbang ka dang / lung yang mang du gsan pa de dag kyang gsan lo tsam
du ma lus par/ rang don thos bsam sgom gsum dang / gzhan don 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum gyi sgo nas rgyal bstan rin po che phyogs brgyar spel bar mdzad pa'i dang po thos
bsam ji ltar mdzad tshul gong gseb tshags rnams su rim par song zhing / sgom sgrub ji ltar yin pa ni/ kyai rdo rje/ rdo rje phur pa/ gur zhal rnams kyi bsnyen pa mthar phyin
par mdzad cing / gzhan yang ma cig grub pa'i rgyal mo'i lugs kyi tshe dpag med dang / rje btsun rig byed ma sogs kyi bsnyen sgrub dang / rgyun du yang gong gsal de rnams
kyi bskyed rdzogs kyi nyams len bzlas brjod bcas chag med gnang ba dang / yi dam chos srung rnams kyi gtor bsngo bskang 'phrin sogs/ mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus sogs la ma
chag pa dang / gzhan gdul bya don gnyer rnams la chos 'chad dbang lung nyams khrid sogs dang / de lta bu med pa'i dus dpe gzigs sogs kyi phal cher dus 'da' zhing / gzhan
don 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum las/ 'chad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis gdul bya rnams kyi blo gros gsal te/ rgyal bstan padmo'i tshal rab tu rgyas par mdzad pa'i tshul yang / snga
phyir gsung ngag lam 'bras tshogs bshad thengs gsum dang / gsang chen slob bshad thengs gnyis tsam gsungs par grags pa dang / gzhan yang sa skya pa'i

gser chos bcu gsum/ khyad par mkha' spyod skor gsum/ nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i gur mgon gyi chos skor rnams kyang thengs kha shas gnang tshod dang / gzhan yang bde mchog lu nag
dril gsum/ gsang 'dus lugs gnyis/ thams cad rig pa/ mi 'khrugs pa/ tshe dpag med lha dgu sogs kyi dbang chen rjes gnang spyi bka' sgrub thabs brgya rtsa/ zur bka'i rigs
rjes gnang sogs mang ba/ tshe rta zung 'brel/ grub rgyal ma/ lcags sdong ma sogs/ tshe dbang / snubs lugs byad grol sogs shin tu mang ba gnang / gtsang sar sprul sku sogs
la/ rwa lugs rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi chos skor yongs rdzogs gnang zhing / rtsod pa rdo rje'i me chen gyis rgyal bstan la smod pa'i log rtog bsal tshul yang / deng skabs
snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i dus la dgongs/ rtsod pa dngos su ma mdzad/ 'on kyang brtsams chos mdzad pa rnams su dgag sgrub rnam bzhag cung zad mdzad pa rnams don du nges don
gyi rtsod par song ba dang / rtsom pa bde legs kyi phreng bas rgyal bstan mdzes par mdzad pa yang / yab rje sku mched sogs nyid kyi dbu bla rnams kyi gsol 'debs rigs dang
/ brgyud 'debs sogs kyi zhal skong / sgrub dkyil dbang rjes gnang chog khrigs nag 'gros skor/ bka' srung rnams kyi gsol kha gser skyems mdos chog sogs mang ba/ sa spos sman
spos sbyar tshul lag len byas chog ma sogs/ gsung ngag slob bshad kyi 'chad thabs/ dpal sa skya'i gdung rabs byon tshul tshigs bcad

ma sogs/ gzhan yang chab shog sogs kyi skor/ gsung 'bum pod gnyis tsam long nges bcas kyis mkhas tshul dgur bshad pa ltar na mkhas pa'i yon tan dang / gnyis pa btsun pa'i yon
tan ni/ lhag pa tshul khims kyi bslab pa rin po che mig 'bras ltar bsrung sdom tshul bzhin mdzad par gang bzhugs rnams dang na bza' rnams la dri bzang gis khyab pa dang
/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'ang sku tshe du mar goms pa'i shugs kyis/ byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems lhag par sbyangs shing / rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa ni snang
grag rig gsum thams cad lha sngags ye shes kyi rol par 'char ba sogs kyang skyes sbyang gi shes rab las rang bzhin du grub pa bcas dang / gsum pa bzang po'i yon tan ni
de ltar lam dus su rtag pa dang / sbyor ba la brtson pas lung dang rtogs pa'i ye shes la dbang bsgyur ba rnams/ gong gi gseb tshags rnams su'ang cung zad song zhing / gzhan
yang nang gso mgon khang du bstan rim zhabs brtan zhig snang skabs gtor rlangs las khrag rgyun nar nar zag pa dang / ka la la phyi mgon du phebs skabs/ de'i gzhi bdag
gis bsu ba gzigs pa dang / phyogs der gu ru rin po che'i gser zangs kyi rdo rje 'chang gi snang brnyan che legs dang / lam 'bras bla brgyud 'jim grub sogs rten bzhengs mang
mdzad la rab gnas rgyas pa'i chos skyong bsgo ba'i skabs/ gur zhal la gnyer gtad mdzad pas de sngon bya rog med kyang / de skabs bya nag khyu chen po 'khor ba nas bzung
bya

nag nam rgyun kyang sdod pa byung / jo mo lha ri ma'i rten mdos de nyid rang gi phyag bzo'i sku brnyan bcas 'dzugs skabs kyang jo mo gzigs snang du byung tshul sogs/ mang du
gnang ba rnams kyis mtshon pas shes par bya zhing / gzhan pa'i mngon shes grub rtags sogs ni the'u rang grub pa las kyang byung bar gsungs pa yod pas de tsam gyis chog
cing / mthar gzugs sku chos dbyings su bsdus pa'i tshul ni/ sa 'brug lor gtsang sar sprul sku sogs la bka' chos du ma gnang skabs ngos rang gi rmi lam du sgrol steng gi gser
'phru/ rgyal mtshan/ dar lcog thog kha nas dus gcig du lhung ba sogs yang yang rmis pa/ gtsang sar sprul sku la lan bskul gyis zhabs rim rgya cher 'bad 'bungs mdzad na
ma gtogs brtag dpyad yag po med 'dug zhus par/ brtag pa bgyid dgos gsungs pa'ang sku gegs che bas rgyab rim mang phebs zhus pa yin yang / tshe sgrub bla bslu/ phur bzlog
sri gnon sogs 'ga' zhig gnang ba dang / bla sman pa yang sdod mus bcas yin yang bstan gegs bzlog med kyis/ de sngon nas kyang snyun gzhi lci ba'i khar 'phral du bka' chos
sogs kyis 'khrul rkyen rnam pas je zhan je sdug gis bka' chos kyang bshol te/ nyin shas gzim sbug tu thugs dam sogs la brtson par bzhugs te/ nyid kyi dgung grangs zhe
bzhir phebs pa chu stod tshes nyer gnyis nyi dros khar nyi zla'i rlung nghu tir bsdus te rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid dang / mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba

chen po'i dbyings su gzugs sku'i bkod pa bsdus 'phral/ ngos rang la yang yong dgos tshul brjod pa de 'phral phyin kyang sku yi bkod pa bsdus zin pas/ bya thabs bral bas ngos
rang nas 'da' kha ma gang yong gsal 'debs kyis 'bul khul byas shing / de nas mched zla rje btsun dngos dbang lags dang mdzod pa bcas nas dgongs rdzogs skor sogs kyi mi
shes bslab 'don dang rogs byed dgos tshul gsungs pa bzhin/ ngos rang gsol 'debs tshigs bcad ma sogs gsar rtsom dang / de nyin tshogs su mang ja'i thog sku spur longs sku'i
chas kyis sprad pa'i sku mdun du thugs dam 'dzin mi mchod tshogs dang bcas/ bla mchod pa tshes gnam gang nyin dbu rtser chos sde lho byang dang / 'di ga'i gdung sras sku
gzhon rje rnams nas/ ser phreng mchod tshogs kyis sku gdung rin po che 'gyogs byams la gdan zhus kyis lha chen mkhan po sogs nas dus mtha'i gzhung nas bshad pa bzhin spur
sbyong mdzad grub pa de nyin tshogs skor rgyas btab ste/ nyin shas nas bshig pa gdung rus yig 'bru sogs kyi rang byon mang 'khrungs bcas gdung rus rnams bsdus te/ sngar
ltar mchod tshogs ser phreng dang bcas sgrol steng du gdan zhus mchod tshogs dbus de bzhin bzhugs su gsol zhing / gong sku spur phebs nyin lha chen ngo mtshar rten bzhis
mtshon gtsug lag khang rnams su sna lnga'i mchod pa stong tshar/ rten gtso rnams la snyan dar tshon sna rnams la ngos rang nas gsar rtsom gyis dgongs rdzogs 'dod

gsol sbyar ba/ dam pa de nyid kyi mkhan po rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen gzigs chen por bsngo rten na bza' u ru su'i rgya ser gyi stod 'gag sogs lus gang cha tshang rgya ser
gyi chab lhug bzang gos kyi rnam sbyar/ gser sga sogs chibs chas cha ching babs pa rgya spre'u bcas/ de 'og nas ngos rang la/ byang rten na bza' cha tshang sogs dang / 'di
khul bla khag gdung sras rje btsun ma sogs dang / zur bzhi bla khag sogs la bsngo rten na bza' sne re/ tshogs chen la bzhes thug mang ja snyan 'gyed lam dkar zho gsum
re phyi tshogs la lam re/ mu to ba stong phrag brgal ba la zho re sogs dang / dgung zhag ring lho byang tshogs yongs nas kun rig cho ga bsnyen bkur zab pa'i 'gyed nyin rer
lam re zho re spel ma/ skabs rer ja 'gyed sku tshigs bzhi pa dang / zhe dgu rdzogs nyin stong mchod sogs gong bzhin gzhan yang chos lhun/ mdar grangs chen/ rtse chos gong
'og ka la phyi sogs la sna lnga'i mchod pa bsnyen bkur nyin 'khyongs gsum re 'gyed bcas/ chos lhun du tshes bcu tshogs brgyad song dang / gzhan yang gtsang dbus kyi sa
dgon rnams gtsor bzung gis ris su ma phyed pa'i dgon sde phal che bar mang bskol 'gyed bcas dang / zur 'bul 'os pa rnams la bsngo rten sogs dang / lha ldan jo shAka rnam
gnyis la stong mchod sogs 'bul bar bla sman dpal rtse pa thon pa bcas dang / 'di gar sgrol steng 'jam dpal lha khang du gdung sras ngag dbang kun dga'

rin chen nas slob dpon gnang ba'i chog gra bco lnga skor nas dgongs rdzogs rdo rje phur pa'i sgrub mchod zhag bdun dang / mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur zab ma bcas shing rta lo
khu dbon rin po che dgongs rdzogs sgrub gzhung ji lta ba deng skabs dngul khyad sogs brtsis pa'i lhag pa bcas bsgrugs pa zhib par gzhung tho zur yod bzhin dang / nang rten
du rgyal ba tshe mtha' yas kyi snang brnyan khri gdan pad sdong rgyab yol bzo khyad ngo mtshar ba/ gser zangs las grub pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi phra rgyan dang sku
rgyan can/ nang gzungs su/ rje btsun rin po che grags pa rgyal mtshan gyi sku brnyan de nyid rang gi phyag nas ma gtso bor bzhugs shing / de nyid rang gi gdung rus btul
pa las spar ba'i bla ma yi dam/ sangs rgyas/ byang sems/ chos srung nor lha'i sku mang du bzhugs pa la gzungs chen sde bzhi sogs dbu zhabs bar gsum gyi dpe gzungs ma tshang
med pa/ gnod sbyin pho mo'i 'khor los mtha' brtan pa phul te/ ngos rang nas rab gnas rgyas par bgyis te sgrol ma lha khang gi tshe lha 'og tu sgo dang mchod khri sogs
cung zad bsgyur pa'i dbus su zhal lho bstan du mchod tshogs dang bcas bzhugs su gsol ba/ de rnams kyis gcung po 'jam dbyangs thub bstan bzang po 'jigs bral bdud 'dul dbang
gi rgyal po'i rnam thar mdo tsam sgro skur dang bral ba brjod zin to/ /

6 kun dga' grags pa blo gros/de nas de nyid kyi gcung po gdung sras kun dga' grags pa blo gros ni/ yab rje rdo rje 'chang dgung grangs so dgur phebs pa kun 'dzin gyi lo cho
'phrul zla ba'i dmar phyogs mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dus nyi shu lnga la bltams shing / yab rje rdo rje 'chang nas 'khrungs bsangs rgyas pa ngag dbang kun dga' grags pa blo gros
su mtshan gsol bar mdzad/ brtan bzhugs bcas bstsal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyai rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du smin byed bstsal/ dpon slob 'bri klog sogs nas rim bzhin yab mes gong
ma'i phyag srol/ rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis sogs rim gnang gis rgyun 'don phur sgrub sogs la phebs shing / bar skabs ma yum mchog dang lhan gcig lha ldan phyogs la phebs
te/ lo gcig lhag tsam bzhugs/ slar gdan sar phebs te/ bka' 'brel ngos rang lam 'bras 'chad pa thengs drug pa'i skabs gdung sras gcung po nyid dang chos sde lho byang / khams
pa grwa rgyun bzhi bcu skor la sgrol phor dpal rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po birWa pa dang / rje btsun sa skya pa yab sras rnams kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i gdams
pa bsod nams dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi rtogs dka' ba/ mdo rgyud bstan bcos thams cad kyi yang snying gsung ngag rin po che snang rgyud khrid yig mkhan chen ngag chos kyis
mdzad pa'i gzhung dang / rgyas

bshad dgos pa rnams kyang de nyid kyis mdzad pa'i chos 'byung dang / lam rim gyi khog phub/ dam tshig phyi nang bskyed rim rnam bshad sogs kyi sgro 'dogs bcad de btang zhing
sems bskyed chen mo/ rgyud lam gyi dbang / bdag med ma'i byin rlabs/ snang gsum skabs 'jam mgon a mes zhabs yan gyi rnam thar dang / gsung ngag chos 'byung legs bshad 'dus
pa'i rgya mtsho rnams kyi lung phul ba dang / gzhan yang sgrub thabs brgya rtsa'i khrod nas nye mkho'i rigs rnams dang / jo lugs sgrol ma nyer gcig gi rjes gnang / rnam
sras rigs can bco lnga byung ma song zhing / de byings dbang rjes gnang lung dang bcas pa gcen po 'jam dbyangs thub bstan bzang por phul ba ji bzhin byung song / de skabs
bzhugs gnas zhabs lhor yod pa/ de nas rim bzhin/ dges rdor gzhi bsnyen bsnyen song rgyugs sprod rigs dang / phur sgrub gsung bshad las rim rnams dang bcas pa gsung ngag
cung mi bde tsam snang yang las 'phral chos 'phral phyag len rnams zhal 'don bcas thogs med gnang song zhing / 'di gar zab gsol slob dpon kyang lo mang du gnang / gur
zhal sogs dbang lung rnams gcen po dang lhan cig gsan nam snyam pa bcas/ de nas ma yum bka' bzhin khams phyogs la phebs rgyur kong po ngos nas rgya dmag gi zar zir gyis phebs
ma thub par/ dbyar thog byang ngos nag chu tsho lnga sogs kyi 'gro don re skong rnams grub nas/ ston mtshams lha ldan du phebs thog bstan

gling du bzhugs/ de skabs bar rta ngos su mi rnams dar shi kho na dang / shi 'phos nas gshin 'drer skyes te/ mi nor phyugs bcas la gnod 'tshab che ba gnod rkyen ci yin sogs
brtag zhus la/ do nub rmi brtag bgyis te sang nyin lan gsal yong lugs gsungs pa bzhin/ de nub mnal ltas su grwa gzugs zhig gi mjug tu mi skya shar 'brog lcang lo mtheb sprad
btums te mgo la dkris byung ba rnams phyag dang bcas/ bdag cag rnams 'di nas byang shar mtshams ri snying 'dra ba'i ngos la gnas pa/ de nas mtsho zhig kyang mthong tshul
brjod pa bzhin ban tshang pa rnams la gsungs te/ blta bar phyin pas ji gsung bzhin ri dang mtsho sogs 'dug tshul zhus pa bzhin brtag lan bstsal te/ sbyin sreg sogs mdzad
pas/ de nas bzung mi shi sogs rgyun chad pa'i ngo mtshar yang byung 'dug cing / rgyun gtan rnal lam sogs gnod sbyin rtsi dmar ba 'di chas sogs zab tu byung nas sleb
byung gsungs na lam 'gro yong ba dang / re 'gar dor kyang mar sleb na cung lam mi 'gro ba sogs yong tshul zhabs 'bring pa rnams nas brjod pa sogs mang dag yod tshod 'dug
de nas lha gdan nas rong sogs brgyud 'dir phebs kyis sis rim sogs kyi 'phros dang phur sgrub dang dus mdos kyi slob dpon snga phyir tshar kha shas mdzad do/ /gzhan yang ngos
dang / gcen po 'jam dbyangs thub bstan bzang po/ gu Na sprul sku/ la mar dpon slob bstan pa rin chen/ bde gling dbu mdzad/ dharma lakShi sogs

dbang rjes gnang khrid lung mang du gsan pa/ lam dus rtag sbyor gus pas bsgom pa dang bzlas brjod sogs la brtson pa sogs kyi 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur pa sogs mdor bsdus tsam
bstan zin nas/ sa lug zla ba brgyad pa'i sgang cung zad snyun pa/ zhabs rim sman bcos sogs mdzad kyang phan skyed ma bzhes pas/ dgung grangs so gnyis pa sa lug zla ba dgu
pa'i tshes bcu drug la zhing khams gzhan gyi gdul bya rgya che bar gzigs te/ ngo mtshar ltas dang bcas gshegs so/ /de 'phral 'di nas shes 'phral thugs dam bla mchod sogs
zhus te/ de skabs khul der nad rims mang ba sogs sku spur mchod tshogs ser phreng bcas nas gdan zhus zhag shas brjod pa sogs nas zer don spur khang du mchod tshogs bcas
bzhugs dgos byung / de nas dus mtha'i cho ga'i sgo nas spur zhu zhus te/ de nub rgyas btab de'i sang nyin gdung rus bsdus te/ mchod tshogs ser phreng bcas zhabs lhar gdan
drangs/ ngos gdung rus rnams btul te/ bla ma yi dam sangs rgyas byang sems/ chos srung nor lha sogs kyi sku spar mang btab mchod tshogs dbus su bzhugs shing / gong sku
spur phebs nyin sna lnga'i mchod tshogs sogs rgya che ba dang / tshogs chen du mang ja bzhes thug bsnyen bkur zab ma 'gyed bcas bsgrubs pa dang / ngan sprang rnams la sbyin
gtong sku tshigs rnams la lho byang tshogs yongs nas kun rig gsung chog dang ngos rang sogs sku ngo rnams la bsngo rten/ dgon sde 'ga' re

la 'gyed sogs sku chas phran yod kyis btang zhing / phyi lo ngos rang dbus 'grul 'khor nas nang rten du dbu rtse lam 'bras bla brgyud zhal bskang du/ gser zangs sogs las grub
pa'i yab rje rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang kun dga' snying po'i snang brnyan mi tshad tsam gdan khri rgyab yol sku mdun du mchod rdzas bcas/ de nyid dus bzang sogs la ngos
rang nas rab gnas rgyas par zhus pa bcas/ de rnams kyis mched zla gcung po ngag dbang kun dga' grags pa blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i rnam thar mdor bsdus sgro skur
dang bral ba cung zad bkod zin to/ /7 drag shul 'phrin las rin chen/de nas gong ma de thams cad kyis gras mthar 'khod pa ngos rang ni/ dam pa'i rigs su skyes pa tsam
las skyon gyi rnam pa nyi zer gyi rdul ltar bgrang du med cing / yon tan gyi tshogs ni nam mkha'i padmo dang ri bong gi rwa ltar dben pas 'bri ba dang brjod par rngo ma thogs
kyang sa bcad 'gengs phyir padma'i snal ma ltar phra ba 'ga' zhig mdor bsdus kyi tshul du brjod na/ kho bo lcags sprel lor dbus bskyod kyis khri mjal skabs gong sa rgyal
dbang phyag na padmo 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa chen pos gdan sa 'di nyid kyi bstan rim mgon po khro bcu'i gtong snon ma dngul stsal ba'i 'go mchan sbug
dam sbyar ma'i bka' brjod du/ da lta'i

bdag khri ngag dbang drag shul 'phrin las rin chen 'di'ang gong ma rnams las gsan bsam dang mdzad pa mi dman zhing / gsungs pa 'di bzhin bka' shag sogs kyi 'char 'bul la srub
mdzad kyi phyag rtags mang rang phebs 'dug pa gtso bor bzung zhing / bdag khri mes po kun dga' bsod nams kyis mdzad pa'i ngos rang gi ring 'tsho'i bden tshig tu/ 'od gsal
lha rigs rin chen sprul pa'i sku/ zhes sogs gsungs pa 'di ngos rang sprul pa'i sku lta bu zhig yin par gsung zhing / 'on kyang de skabs theg chen bkra shis rin chen dang
/ rdo rje rin chen gnyis char lo khyad kha re las dus mnyam lta bur gshegs skabs yin 'dug pas/ de gnyis gang rung zhig yin pa gsung rgyu 'dra mor snang ba dang / yab
rje rdo rje 'chang sogs de skabs phal che bas theg chen bkra shis rin chen gyi skye sprul lta bur ngos 'dzin gnang ba/ de ni yab rje dbang sdud snying po'i rnam sprul yin
pa gong du brjod pa ltar lung tshad mas grub cing / dbang gi mtshan can de nyid ni rgya bod kyi mkhas grub du mar 'khrungs tshul gong du brjod pa bzhin dang / yang bkra
shis rin chen ni slob dpon rin po che las can dag pa'i 'khor lnga'i gras phur pa'i grub chen zhang sna nam rdo rje bdud 'joms kyi yang srid 'khrul med yin par mdo smad 'jam
mgon rnam gnyis dang / gter ston mchog gyur gling pa rnams kyi lung gis zin cing / 'gro mgon dbang sdud snying po dang / rdo rje rin chen gnyis kyang sprul gzhi rdo rje
bdud 'joms

yin pa gter lung mang por gsal lung gsungs pas na/ kho bo lta bu la ni de 'dra yin pa'i spar bkab ga la yong yang dam pa rnams ni dman pa la brtse ba chos nyid yin pas dbugs
dbyung gzengs bstod lta bu gsungs par zad do/ /gang ltar kho bo ma yum mngal na gnas skabs bya rog gnyis gzim phug phur pa phug gi sge khung khar gtan sdod byed pa dang
/ ma skyes tsam la gzugs mi snang ba/ mi skad sbom po zhig nas/ drag rtags phyis yong ngo brjod pa zhig byung 'dug de nas yab rdo rje 'chang nyid dgung grangs nyer gnyis
dang / ma yum nyid dgung grags nyi shu pa skyes bdag gi lo chu stod zla ba'i tshes bcu bdun gyi zla dkar shar tsam la/ sgrol phor snga dus kyi gzim chung phur pa phug tu
kho bo btsas skad/ de nas gro bzhin zla ba'i phur sgrub slob dpon bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams mchog nas gnang skabs tshes bzhi sta gon nyin/ ngos rang gi ming dang ring
'tsho'i bden tshig sogs zhu gnang la/ de nyin gnang yod dam yang na de'i sang dngos gzhi'i thog tu gnang ji ltar yin rung ring 'tsho'i sbyar byang las/ dpal chen rdo rje
gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams dang 'chi med tshe yi lha tshogs rnams la gsol ba btab ste mdzad tshul gsungs pa bzhin/ ngos rang gi ming la yang rdo rje phur
pa'i mtshan zur gyis brgyan par mdzad nas/ ngag dbang drag shul 'phrin las rin chen bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po zhes bstsal 'dug pa dang / dus phyis sa
bya lo stag

lung ma sprul rin po che las kho bos byang gter thugs sgrub kyi dbang rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum dang / bka' brgyad sogs kyi dbang chen zhu skabs/ ngos rang gis dkyil 'khor la
me tog 'thor skabs phur pa kho na rkyang la phog pa/ ma sprul rin po che nas kyang kho bo'i tshe rabs du ma'i lhag lha yin par lung bstan pa dang 'brel ba'i/ padma 'od gsal
mdo sngags gling pa'i dgongs gter rdo rje phur pa'i gnad tig dbang lung yang bstsal te/ de gsham karma'i ming can la sogs pas/ mtha' ma'i bstan pa gso bar byed pa sogs
gsal ba yang / ngos rang yin tshul gsungs pa bcas gong 'og gi 'phros skad 'di rnams thos pa ni gcig tu mthun no/ /de nas cung zad nar son nas rang lo lnga par yab rje rdo
rje 'chang nas smin byed dbang gi thog mar dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i stod las byang chub sgrub dbang dang / smad las drag po sgrol dbang bcas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor
bstsal ba rnams cung zad dran zhing / rang lo drug pa la yab rje mchog nas/ 'jam dbyangs rtsod rgyal ma gdan drangs te/ 'jam dbyangs smra ba'i seng ge'i rjes gnang bstsal/
ka dpe gser bris ma'i klog cung zad slob gnang dang / de nas dpon slob chos bstan 'dzin nas sbyor klog steb sogs bslab/ rang lo bdun par rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis sbyangs
nas bdag kun bsod kyi sku 'gram du rgyugs 'bul zhus te/ rgyun 'don sogs la phyin/ rang lo brgyad pa kyai rdo rje mngon dkyil gtor bsngo che mo/ bskang gso

'go dbyangs sogs rgyugs 'bul gong 'dra zhus te kyai rdo rje'i rgyugs/ rang lo dgu par phur chen sbyong skabs 'ga' zhig ma bslab par sngon sbyangs lta bus skyor phyin yod gsungs
pa bden min brtag gar 'cham rnams kyang bslabs te rgyugs sprod dang / 'cham rgyugs bcas gong bzhin phul te phur sgrub rgyugs/ rang lo bcu par 'byung 'dul bsnyen pa zla
gcig bcu cha'i sbyin sreg sogs bgyis/ rwa lugs 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma dang / gsang 'dus 'phags lugs/ bdag med ma/ bde mchog nag po lugs/ nA ro mkha' spyod/ gsang 'dus
mchod sprin rgya mtsho rnams kyi rgyugs sprod rnams rim bzhin phul/ snga phyi yab rje rdo rje 'chang sku mched/ rje btsun rnal 'byor dbang mo skal bzang chos kyi nyi ma/
e waM chos ldan gyi mkhan rin po che ngag dbang blo gros snying po/ grub pa'i dbang phyug badzra dha ra ratna bha dra/ gu Na sprul sku byams pa phyogs las rnam rgyal/ stag
lung ma sprul rin po che ngag dbang bstan pa'i nyi ma/ rdo rje brag rig 'dzin chen po thub bstan mnyam nyid rdo rje sogs las lam tshogs slob/ gser chos bcu gsum sogs mnos
pa las mkha' spyod skor gsum gyi byin rlabs dang / gzhung pod lung nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i khrid dmar po dbang lung tshang ma/ bstan srung gur zhal gnyis kyi chos skor
yongs rdzogs dud sol/ beg rtse/ dur bdag rnams kyi chos skor tshang ma/ rjes gnang spyi bka' sgrub thabs brgya rtsa dang zur bka'i gras mang du thob cing / dus phyis khang

gsar ba ngag dbang blo gros snying po las sgrub thabs kun btus cha tshang thob cing / der ma 'dus pa rnam sras rigs can bco lnga'i rjes gnang sogs thob/ rwa lugs rdo rje 'jigs
byed dbang lung cha tshang / las gshin rigs gsum rjes gnang du ma dbang bcas thob/ gzhan yang bya rgyud rigs gsum spyi/ gdugs dkar nyer bdun/ mi 'khrugs lha dgu/ tshe
dpag lha dgu/ rnal 'byor rgyud kun rig bla med 'dus gdugs gnyis 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma dang ro langs brgyad skor/ gshed dmar lha lnga/ ma rgyud bde mchog lu nag dril gsum/
ril bu lus dkyil bdag lha dgu/ rdo rje phur pa/ gur drag ku ru ku lle lha lnga/ gnyis med rgyud kyai rdo rje yab yum rnams kyi dbang chen rnams thob/ lung sa skya bka'
'bum cha tshang / gdan sa 'di nyid na bzhugs pa'i chos spyod sgrub dkyil/ gtor bsngo bskang gso bstod snying/ gtor bzlog rnams kyi lung sogs dang/ gtor ma brgya rtsa/ brgya
bzhi/ 'byung bzhi sogs/ gtor ma'i nye mkho phal cher gyi lung mnos pa dang / rnying ma'i skor la/ rta mgrin yang gsang / byang gter thugs sgrub kyi dbang rgyas 'bring
bsdus gsum/ bka' brgyad shar/ bstan srung bka' gtad/ thang lha'i srog gtad bcas dang / chos dbang log tri pa la/ sku lnga'i srog gtad/ mnga' ras paN chen zab gter/ rtsi
dmar srog gtad/ gter gsar thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel/ 'phags ma'i snying thig

rdo rje phur pa'i gnad tig rnams kyi dbang thob cing / dges pa rdo rje/ rdo rje phur pa/ nA ro mkha' spyod ma/ rje btsun rig byed ma/ tA re dkar mo/ ma cig grub rgyal lugs/
tshe dpag med/ tshe rta zung 'brel/ gur zhal rnams kyi bsnyen sgrub grangs dus/ 'ga' re la tshad ma'i bsnyen pa bcas mthar phyin zhing / yid ches pa grangs kyang lan mang
du song / rgyun tu yang lhag pa'i lha de dag gi bskyed rim sgom bzlas bgyid mus la dus thun gnyis ma 'di/ rje btsun rta mgrin dbang mo zhing ma brje tsam/ me sprel lo nang
lam dbang zhus pa nas chag ma myong / rtsa sngags sogs grangs sna tshogs dang yig brgya phreng 'khor re da bar chag med/ lo de nas chos srung rnams la yang dam rdzas
thun mong ma yin pa'i gtor ma rgyun 'dzugs kyis bskang gso ma khom yang gtor bsngo chog/ khyad par tshes brgyad/ bcu gsum/ nyer gsum/ nyer dgu bcas par da bar chag ma myong
/ rang lo bco brgyad par phur sgrub bshad las pa dang / de nas las rim rnams bsnyen pa kha gso nas bzung shar sbyong rang ma yin pa rnam bshad sogs la lta rtog dang /
phyag len rnams kyang gang zhig bgyid khul byas te/ mgon po khro bcu nas/ lha mo rje khol/ dam bskang mar tshang mar dang dod gang chen bgyis pa yin/ sa byi lor sde dge sa
spyod phebs skabs dus mdos zab ma'i slob dpon bgyis pa nas dus mdos kho na'i slob dpon thengs bcu gsum bgyis pa yin/ sa glang lor 'jam dpal dngos grub

rgya mtsho dang mnyam du phur sgrub slob dpon thog mar bgyis pa nas/ rang lo lcags bya lo bar la phur sgrub slob dpon kyang thengs bcu gsum lhag tsam song / me khyi lo rang
lo bcu drug par lam 'bras thog mar bgyis pa nas/ shing stag lo bar la lam 'bras tshogs bshad lan dgu dang / me stag lo gsang chen slob bshad tshar gcig 'di ga'i gdung sku
mched rje btsun mched rnams la bgyis pa yin/ gzhan yang dbang rjes gnang khrid lung la sogs pa rang gi gang thob tshang ma gdung srang ngag dbang kun dga' rin chen sku
mched sogs dang / gzhan yang gzhis byes chos don gnyer can rnams so so'i ngor thengs du ma byas shing / tha na'ang lan re 'chad spel ma byas pa med pa lta bu yin/ de ltar
bgyis pa'i slob ma yang sa chen kun blo'i gsungs las/ gzhon dus brtson khul slob ma bstan phan dang / /btang snyoms dam nyams gsogs pa grangs med yod/ /gsungs pa ltar gyi
slob ma sa skya pa'i gdung rgyud dang / ngor pa'i mkhan zhabs phyogs kyi bla sprul khag la sogs pa che phra du ma yod pa 'ga' re ni spyi bye brag gi bstan 'gro la phan
pa yang du ma mchis/ phal cher ba ni/ ci yang med pa'i sgom chen gyis/ /phyin yang phan gnod gang yang med/ /gsungs pa de ltar yang mang po yod/ rnying ma'i rgyud zhig na
dam med slob ma bsten pas be sbrel g.yang du lhung zhes byung ba de 'dra yang mang du yod nges pa bcas dang / de snga chu 'brug lo yab yum bka' 'brel lcam khra 'jam dbang
nas mdzod

bgyis te/ dbyar thog byang rigs nag chu khul dang / dgun lo lha ldan/ dpyid gsos dbus lho kha dang / dbyar byang gnam ru khul sogs la bskyod pa dang / chu stag lor 'di'i las
byed mthong dkyil dge bzang nas mdzod pa bgyis pa byang gnam ru khul sogs khyug tsam phyin pa dang / sa bya lor gong sa rgyal dbang thams cad mkhyen pa chen po rgya nag
nas bod 'dir gdan zhus skor sogs la/ chos sding pa thub bstan thub dbang nas mdzod pa bgyis te dbus dang byang rigs sogs la khyug tsam phyin pa rnams la gzhung sa mchog
nas rta khal mi gsum sogs kyi mthong 'dzin lam yig dang bcas skyong ba kho na ma gtogs med pa la yod tshul sogs byed ma myong / de nas shing yos lor phun pho nas khri 'dzin
dgongs zhus mdzad pa 'di lha sde mi sde bcas kyis gsar 'os char/ ngos rang ming thog phyag rtags phebs dgongs bzhin/ rgyal zla'i tshes thor ngos rnams gzhi thog tu bskyod
de mdos zab sogs snga lam bzhin dang / 'jam dbyangs sa paN gyi chos khrir sngar nas khri 'don zin par brten gzhi thog tshoms dmar du 'gro mgon chos rgyal 'phags pa'i
chos srid zung gi chos khrir 'dzegs te/ mkhan khri sogs khri 'don bsngags gsol sogs shis pa brjod zin nas rgyal khab mchog nas mi sna rtse drung ched mngags mdzad de/ ngos
la bka' yig mdud dar can/ maNDal rten gsum 'gyogs dar nang mdzod sogs gnang skyes spam mtho ba bshams/ 'di ga'i rtse gzhung bla khag lho byang las sne/ drung

rigs ser skya/ mi sde'i tsho dpon gzhis khag lha mi sde bcas kyi legs 'bul khri dar sogs btang ba dang / de nas ring po ma yin pa lcags sprel lor ngos rang khri mjal dbus bskyod
kyis 'di gar lam gtor thon lugs dang / lam bar gyi bgyis pa rnams sngon lam bzhin bgyis thog lha ldan du sngon nas sa mtshams 'bul btang ba bzhin snye thang du sne
shan rtse drung rtse gnyer 'bum thang pa phebs 'byor gyis mnyes spro le tshan shing 'bras ras thum che ba 'dod yon gyi grangs ldan sogs phebs pa dang / skyid tshal klu lding
du bsu bar/ drung rigs ser skya bsdoms pas sum cu/ ser mo rnams rgyun chas bse theb dang / skya bo rnams rgya lu chas/ rtse shod bka' bcas so so nas mgron gnyer 'tshams
dar gsol ja bzhes 'bras sogs nas nor gling dang / rtse pho brang sku mdun/ lcang gseb shar 'gram nas/ lha sa thil/ byang ngos bar bskor lam nas tshong khang bkra shis
khang gsar du shar bskyod gnas shan phyag 'brel mi dpon chab spel ba nas/ mjal dar/ de nas gzhes brda snyan seng sogs phul/ snron zla'i tshes ngos rang mched gdung sras bdag
yum bcas dpon g.yog tshang ma mjal phyag tu bcar ba ma zhol rtse rnam gra'i gling khar gang 'tsham phebs sgugs zhus nas bka' gsal phebs 'phral bskyod de nor gling du
rgyal sgo tshang ma rta babs kyis phyin par/ rgyal sgo'i nang zhugs tsam rim bzhin rtse phyag nang zan dang / rtse drung dkyus gras dang / las tshan pa ban mas nas yar

gral rim gyis bzhengs te sbrang ban mdzad nas so so'i go gnas kyi mjal dar bstsal zhing / bar sgor zhugs nas/ mkhan sde che chung sogs mjal dar gong 'dra la rang res phar mdud
pa yang sprod lam 'dug de nas mgron khang du cung zad gsol ja phebs/ de nas yang gsal phebs byung ba dang yar bcar te/ ngos la sa mgron phyag gdan gding phyag 'tshal
zhus te/ ngos rang nas maNDal rten gsum 'gyogs dar nang mdzod sogs phul nas stan la bsdad cing / mdzod pa sogs nas 'bul tshan rnams bstar/ sras yum so sos 'bul tshan phul
nas bsdad tshar ba dang / gsol jar phebs pa ngos rang la rang re gsol chas btang srol bcas dang / de nas sa mdzod nas dug sel zhus te bzhes 'bras mnyes spro le tshan rnams
phebs grub nas/ gzim 'gag sogs nas lang brda byung ba dang / ngos 'khor rnams phyir 'gros kyis ga ler thon te mgron khang du sngar bzhin gsol ja'i thog dkar spro sogs
sder kha rgyas pa gnang ste dgongs zhus kyis rang gnas su slebs/ khri mjal dngos gzhir gzhes brda snyan seng gong 'dra zhus te/ ngos rang las ngo ma gzhan med dang / g.yog
'khor gzhan gong bzhin bcas phebs sgug bcar lugs sogs gong 'dra bgyis/ de nyin drung rigs mjal dar sogs gong bzhin 'dug pa/ tshang ma phyir slog zhus/ de nas mgron khang
yar bcar ngos rang mjug ban tshang pa rnams bsgrigs/ phyag sogs gong bzhin maNDal rten gsum/ bkra shis rdzas

brgyad/ rgyal srid sna bdun/ zhabs brtan rdo rje'i re kha rnams 'bul tshig gdangs sogs dang bcas/ zhwa gyon te phul nas shis brjod zin pa dang / 'di lo sngar nas 'bul chag
bstsal ba sogs kyang snyed min phul/ gser dngul tshan pa sogs khri mjal chen mo nang bzhin phul/ gsham la bsdad nas/ gsol ja bzhes 'bras mnyes spro sogs gong bzhin/ de nas
mgron khang du slebs nas/ gsol ja'i thog sder kha rgyas pa sogs kyang sngar bzhin bstsal/ de nas rang nas gong sa mchog gi bka' 'brel/ lha mo rig byed ma'i bsnyen sgrub
las gsum sogs kyi dbang lung dang / de skabs char dkon pas char 'bebs sogs zhu dgos sogs dang / bla brang thog kha'i shod gzim chung du bsdad de/ tshoms chen du sri gnon
dang phur bzlog sogs sgrub zhag gis nyin sngon ma sri gnon nyin gong sa mchog bla brang thog khar chibs bsgyur gyis ngos rang shod gzim chung na bsdad yod pa gong sa rgyal
dbang mchog ngos rnams kyi sar thon phebs kyis ngos rang nas phyag dang byin rlabs sogs zhus/ gzhung zhabs rnams kyi bka' bkod dang bcas gang tsam bzhugs song zhing /
de nas sri gnon chu tshod sogs phyag rtags khungs so sor mnan pa dang / de'i sang phur bzlog nyin yang bla brang thog rtser phebs te gzigs rtog gnang song ba bcas/ de skabs
zhabs sgrub rnams la bla phyag 'phral bde sogs las khungs khag gtor gzhi rnams cung nyung skyon lta bu byung ba yin nam gang ltar yang / de rjes/

rtse phod byang du bdun gcig ring chog gra rang re'i rgya dpon/ yongs 'dzin kun rab zung dang / rtse rnam gra ba bgres pa lnga bcas/ rje btsun rig byed ma'i bsnyen sgrub dag
sa paN gyi chos skor dngos grub 'byung gnas bzhin zhu dgos dang / bdun gcig tshoms chen du phur bzlog bdun gcig rnams la mchod rdzas dang / ngos rang chog gra sogs kyi
dgos chas sogs tshang ma rtse yig tshang nas do dam/ rtse drung gnyis zur bskos kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur ja thug spro zas sogs thugs spro lta bu dang yon sogs kyang
shin tu zab par bstsal/ de skabs gtso gtor zhabs nas bdud rtsi 'dra ba mngon sum du mang du zag cing / zor 'phen skabs rlung ltas kyang shin tu dge ba byung song / de
skabs rgyal khab nas 'di ga bstan rim khro bcu'i gtong gnon ma dngul Tam rdo bzhi bcu skor gtan 'jags bstsal ba dang / de snga rgyal dbang sku phreng rim byon dang / srid
skyong rim byon bcas nas bascal ba'i sa skya'i gtan tshigs khag gi rgyab gnon can dmigs che ba gsol bstsal sogs bka' drin bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ bsam pa'i yul las 'das/
de nas sku drag khag sogs sger sbyin spang mda' tshang gi re skong rnams zin nas/ spang mda' yon ja dngul sogs grangs las 'das pa dang / lhag par nyams gso dge rgyun sogs
gang skabs blos bcad bya rgyur Tam rdor sum brgya tham pa 'bul 'byor byung ba bstsal/ legs dar byin sne sbar dar gang yong sogs bgyis/ 'di lo zla ba brgyad par zhu don
lha mo

ba/ 'gyang gar ba/ shangs pa/ ri che/ skyor lung pa rnams gzigs mo sogs la yong dgos bka' bsgyur bzhin ngos rnams tshang ma phyin/ yang de rjes rme ru spro seng gzigs cha sogs
tshar bar gsol ja bzhes 'bras/ gsol tshigs sder kha dkar spro bcas phebs pa dang / de rjes bar seng rnams su gzim chung 'gol mjal kyang lan gnyis tsam gnang ba sogs gsol
ja dkar spro sogs bstsal/ de skabs lha ldan du dus bde zhod 'jags pa sogs bzang dga' ston gyi dpal la longs spyad nas dbyug zlar gzhes brda snyan seng 'bul thon phyag
gong 'byor phyag cig zhus te thon gnang gis gnang skyes zab par bstsal ba/ de nyin 'gro khar phyag 'bul sogs dang / de nas skyel drung ser skya thab skyel gong sa mchog
nas 'tshams dar tshe mdud bcas dang / srid blon bka' shag sogs nas gong 'dra bcas de nub tshal gung thang dang / de nas rgod la brgyud bsam yas su bsu ba ser phreng 'cham
mgon rgyas pa bcas sngon lam jo khang du khri 'khod maNDal rten gsum sogs dang / sna bdun sogs kyi shis brjod bcas pa dgon tshang mar de bzhin tshes bcu chen mo'i 'cham
gzigs pa rang res dar 'gyed/ rab grwa sogs la mang 'gyed/ mching phu gnas mjal chos skyong sku phebs thengs gnyis la sku chas btsan zhags sogs phul zhing bka' bsgo dang /
bzhin 'grub zer ba'i lung bstan lha mdung bcas sprad byung / de nas gru thon nas rtse thang / khra 'brug yar lung bkra shis chos grwa phyi nang / mdo

chos/ rnam rab/ ra smad/ mthar chos/ rgyal rtse gur gra so sor mang 'gyed/ nyams gso'i rten so sor ja 'khor dngul thum sogs sprad/ jo shAka rnam gnyis kyis mtshon dbus lho
byang gi gnas rten phal cher mjal zhing / lha ldan du sna lnga'i stong mchod 'bring pa tshar kha shas gzhan du brgya mchod sogs dang / smon 'dun can gyi snyan dar yang tshang
mar phul/ de nas rgyal zla'i tshes bcu gnyis la gdan sar 'byor pa/ byed sgo sngar lam gzhir bzhag bgyis gdan sa 'dir ngos rang dus la gtso bo gzhung sa chen po nas lo
ltar ar dod bstsal ba sogs kyi bdag rkyen sogs la brten/ shing cha gzhung sger nas nyo sgrub kyis da phan la sa gnas lha khang sum cu skor la nyams gso zin pa/ de nas dbu
rtse rgya phibs sogs la shing cha tshang ma zangs leb bdun ngos phal cher gsar brjes la gser ljang Tam rdo brgya phrag kha shas song ba dang / de yang byang gling kha
dbang la do dam mdzad skabs nyis tho khel rkyen la shar mgron che de nyid nas/ de rigs tshang ma nyis brgal mdzad skabs gang 'tsham nyis skor sgrub dgos byung ba dang / gong
spang mda'i 'bul dngul la smad gos tshon khra tshos mdog sna tshogs nyo sgrub kyis bla ma gong ma'i thugs dam ma 'cham mgon byin can rnams bar skabs nyams gso ma byung
bas ha cang hrul skyon che ba tshang ma dang / phur sgrub zab phod rnams kyang rnying nyams che ba sogs tshang ma gsar bzo bgyis te rnying pa rnams kyang zur bzhag bgyis
yod pa dang / ngos rang sngon lo na

so gzhon dus/ chos lhor rdo rje gsum gzhung skyor/ dbyar dgun chos bus/ rig bya sogs la mang du phyin cing / de bzhin gong brjod bzhin phur sgrub dus mdos sogs kyi slob dpon
grangs mang bgyis pa dang/ gzhan yang / dges rdor/ rdo rje phur pa/ 'jigs byed bcu gsum ma/ bde mchog nag po lugs sogs kyi sgrub mchod slob dpon grangs mang bgyis/ gzhan
yang sgrub mchod gtor bzlog dus gtor gtor spod sogs la tshogs bskyod nar mar bgyis shing/ de skabs sogs la na lo mtho ba dang / sa gzhung rgya che khu ma 'dus kyi khur
che bar brten rgyun 'gro ma khom yang / lo ltar phur sgrub/ dus mdos/ lha mchod/ ril sgrub sogs la ngo bskyod byed bzhin 'di dang/ ngos rang gi bsam gtan khang bur lo thams
rig pa dang/ thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel dang/ phur pa'i gnad tig sogs kyi sgrub mchod zla gcig tsam re bgyis mus dang/ zla rer zla stod tshes gsum/ tshes bzhi/ tshes
brgyad rnams la rim bzhin gnod sbyin yang le ser/ rnam sras/ dmar po skor gsum sogs kyi gtor bsngo sogs dang/ tshes bcu gcig la slob dpon bsod nams rtse mo'i dus chen nas
rgyud sde spyi'i rnam bzhag gi bsdus don tshul gsum gsal rgyan dang/ bcu gnyis rje btsun grags rgyan gyi dus chen la mngon rtogs ljon shing gi bsdus don ljon shing mdzes
rgyan bcas ngor chen dkon mchog lhun grub kyis mdzad pa dang/ bcu bzhi sa paN dus chen la sdom gsum rab

dbye/ nyer gcig kun mkhyen dus chen la kha skong bdud rtsi snying thig bcas pa nyer gnyis 'gro mgon chos rgyal 'phags pa'i dus chen la des mdzad pa'i rgyal bu mangga laM la
gtam du bya ba bkra shis kyi phreng ba/ nyer gsum birWa pa dang sa chen dus chen zung 'brel la lam 'bras rdo rje'i tshig rkang dang sa chen gyi lam 'bras don bsdus ma/ rje
btsun gyi lta khrid rtsa ba/ grwa ston zhus lan rnams kyi gzhung rnams ngag 'don dang/ bla ma so so'i sku bstod tshigs bcad brgya tshar re dang/ rgyas pa rnams lan re
thog mtha' du skyabs sems bsngo smon gyis brgyan pa/ nyer lnga la nA ro mkha' spyod ma'i sgrub mchod/ gnam gang la rtsa rgyud brtag gnyis gzhung 'don bcas chag med bgyis
pa dang / gzhung rnams kyi go don yang cung zad rtogs shing/ gzhan yang brgyud 'debs dang/ bla ma gong ma'i sku bstod sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya sogs mtshams mtshams su 'don
pa dang/ nyin re bzhin/ lam dus rgyas 'bring / bir srung lam zab/ nA ro mkha' spyod bcas dpal sa skya'i thugs dam chag med rnam bzhir grags pa dang/ gzhan yang tshe lha
rnam gsum/ rje btsun ma ku ru ku lle/ rdo rje phur pa/ tshe sgrub gur bdun ma/ srung 'khor rdo rje'i brag rdzong ma/ slob dpon gsol 'debs 'phags pa 'jigs rten dbang phyug
gi gzungs brgya re/ byang chub ltung bshags gsum dang/ 'jam mgon mkhyen brtse rin po ches mdzad pa'i yan lag bdun pa tshigs bcad bzhi bcu tsam snang ba ngag 'don ring phyag
'tshal/

bzang spyod/ bde smon/ byams smon rin bskor ba bcas chag med bgyis bzhin pa rnams kyi byin rlabs lta bu yin nam/ da phan ni ngos rang yang ring du 'tsho zhing nad na tsha sogs
med pa dang/ gang byed rnams kyang lam 'gro yag mo byung ba sogs kun gyis mthong chos dang/ mdor na thos bsam sgom gsum mam/ 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum mam/ mkhas btsun bzang
gsum mam/ 'khor lo gsum la sogs pa gang zer yang ngos rang gi bya byed lam tsam de bzhin yin cing / gzhan yang sngon gyi dge bshes bka' gdams pa rnams kyi gsung rgyun
du/ rkang rjes dang lag rjes kyi grub rtags med/ sku rjes kyi sngo lo 'phyar ma myong gsungs pa bzhin yod 'dug bla ma gong ma rnams kyi zhabs la thi'u ma btags shing sngo
lo ma phyar tsam zhig gi re 'dun yod pa tshang mas shes tshor bcas kyi/ ngos rang da lta rang lo bcu phrag drug dang/ nyag ma thabs shes kyi grangs kyi grangs ldan du
slebs pa phan gyi byung tshul mdor bsdus rags tsam cung zad brjod pa yin/ngos rang rnams kyi mched zla sring mo rje btsun padma 'phrin las ni dpon slob blo gter dbang po
sogs kyis rjes su bzung bas dbang lung sogs gsan rgya dga' rab yod kyang/ da lta 'chad spel sogs ni mi mdzad par btang snyoms su bzhugs pa 'di nyid dang/ rje btsun dngos
grub dbang mo bcas ngos rang sku mched drug dang/ ngos rang dang bdag yum 'chi med kun dga' sgrol ma'i gdung sras ngag dbang kun dga' rin chen bkra shis

grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po dang/ gcung po ngag dbang kun dga' bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po mched zla rje btsun rnams dang/ zhang rje bon grong pa'i bdag mo
bcas tshang ma da lta 'tsho zhing bsdad pa ngos rang rnams rigs rgyud mang du 'phel nas/ gdan sa chen po 'di nyid kyi gdung brgyud rnams 'khor ba ma stong bar du gnas par
gyur cig de rnams kyi sgrol ma pho brang ngam/ phun tshogs dpal 'bar bla brang gi gsung rab byon tshul bshad zin to/ /'dir smras pa/ phun tshogs 'chi med yid du 'ong ba'i
tshal/ /ngo mtshar dpal 'bar bsti gnas nyams dga' ba/ /g.yu lo bkod pa'i zhing mtshungs dpal yon can/ /'di la sgrol ma pho brang grags min nam/ /zhes pa'ang bar skabs
kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /de rnams kyis 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i dpal sa skya'i gdung rabs byon tshul la/ 'od gsal lha yi gdung rabs bshad pa/ dri med 'khon
gyi gdung rabs bshad pa/ lha rigs 'khon sa skya pa'i gdung rabs bshad pa/ de las gyes pa'i bla brang rnam bzhi'i gdung rabs bshad pa/ skabs su bab pa'i don bshad pa ste
sa bcad lngar mdzad pa'i nang nas/ bzhi pa de las gyes pa'i bla brang rnam bzhi'i gdung rabs rnams las/ gzhan gsum gyi gdung rabs snga dus nas rdzogs shing / phyi ma dus
mchod bla brang gi gdung rabs gras rtse gdong gdung rabs phyis byon rnams dang/ 'di

ga gdan sa gong gi gdung rabs/ sgar chen mthu stobs dbang phyug yan chad/ 'jam mgon kun blo'i gdung rabs zhal skong rin chen 'dzad med bzhin dang/ de mtshams sa chen rdo rje
'chang kun dga' blo gros nas deng sang gi bar kho bos sbyar ba'i gdung rabs 'di nang bzhin/ gong a mes zhabs kyi gdung rabs sa bcad bzhin bla brang rnam bzhi'i gdung rabs
rnams kyi nang nas/ dus mchod bla brang pa'i gdung rabs da lta bar byon pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa na 'byon par 'gyur ba'i tshul bcas legs par bstan zin nas/ 'dir smras pa/
ngo mtshar dus su ngoms pa'i gdung rigs rnams/ /ngo mtshar mdzad 'phrin du ma ston bzhin du/ /ngo mtshar bstan dang 'gro ba'i dpal gyur pa/ /ngo mtshar phul byung de las
gzhan du ci/ /khyad par nor bu'i dbus na dgos 'dod 'byung / /rkang gnyis dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa ltar/ /kun gyi nang na rgyal mtshan ltar mdzes pa/ /sa chen kun blo'i
rnam thar bsam gyin dad/ /gzhan yang 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan can sogs/ /bsam bzhin rnam 'phrul bgrangs yas ston mdzad nas/ /rgyal bstan rin chen phyogs brgyar spel mdzad
pa/ /kun la bdag yid dad pas lag pad zum/ /snyigs ma'i dus 'dir rgyal bstan 'dzin pa dkon/ /dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod pa'i gang zag mang/ /mang por bdud kyi mda' lngas
snying la bsnun/ /bsnun pa phal cher zog po'i rdzun gyis bslus/ /drang po'i zol gyis gnas rnams yid pham pham/ /

zog rdzun mgo bo skor mkhan lam 'gro 'gro/ /sgrin po spyang grung can rnams bde khyug khyug /snyigs ma'i rang mdangs nyin bzhin je gsal gsal/ /zhes kyang smras so/ /

bzhi pa/ skabs su bab pa'i don bshad pa/de nas rtsa ba'i sa bcad lnga pa skabs su bab pa'i don bshad pa ni/ gdan sa 'di nyid kyi khur 'dzin mdzad po gdan rabs bshad pa 'di
la yang mdor bstan dang rgyas bshad gnyis mdzad pa las/ gdan sa 'di nyid thog mar 'debs mdzad 'khon dkon mchog rgyal po nas/ 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi gcen po sku 'bring
kun dga' dbang rgyal yan ni gdung rabs chen mor gsal zhing / de man gyi zhal skong rnams sa chen kun blos mdzad pa'i gdung rabs rnam thar zhal skong gi zhabs nas cung zad
mdzad pa'i 'phror lus pa lta bus mi gsal ba/ de'i tshul rnams brjod pa la tshigs bcad kyi sgo nas mdor bstan pa dang/ de'i don rgyas par bshad pa gnyis las/ dang po ni/
'jam mgon a mes zhabs dang bsod nams dbang / /kun dga' bkra shis bsod nams rin chen dang / /sa chen kun blo 'gro mgon dbang gi mtshan/ /yab rje pad 'dul rdo rje rin chen
dang/ /theg chen dbang sdud kun dga' bsod nams dang / /kun snying 'jam dbang karma'i ming can pa/ /zhes pa'o/ /gnyis pa de'i don rgyas par bshad pa ni/ 'jam mgon a mes zhabs

kyi rab byung bcu pa'i lcags sprel lor gdan sa mdzad nas lo bcu song ba/ rab byung bcu gcig pa'i sa sbrul lor gdung rabs chen mo 'di nyid gsar rtsom gnang ba dang/ de 'phros
sa phag mgo zla'i tshes bcu bar lo grangs sum cu tham pa gdan sa mdzad cing / de nas sa phag lor 'jam dbyangs bsod nams dbang phyug dgung grangs nyer gnyis su phebs pa
sa phag mgo zla nas bzung dgung grangs zhe brgyad pa/ shing glang zla ba brgyad pa'i nyer lnga bar lo grangs nyer bdun gdan sa mdzad/ de nas sngags 'chang kun dga' bkra shis
dgung grangs so gnyis pa rab byung bcu gnyis pa shar mtshams/ shing glang zla ba brgyad pa'i nyer lnga nas lcags yos gro bzhin zla ba'i tshes bcu dgu bar lo nyer bdun
gdan sa mdzad/ de sras yab rje bsod nams rin chen dgung grangs bdun du phebs pa lcags yos gro bzhin bcu dgu nas dgung grangs so bdun pa sa bya snron zla nyer brgyad par
lo sum cu gdan sa mdzad/ sa chen rdoo rje 'chang kun dga' blo gros dgung grangs bcu gsum du phebs pa sa bya chu zla'i tshes nyer brgyad nas rab byung bcu gsum pa'i chu yos
snron zla'i tshes gnyis bar gdan sa mdzad nas bstan pa dar rgyas su spel/ de sras 'gro mgon dpal ldan chos skyong gis gong 'phros chu yos sa zla nas me stag rgyal zla bar
lo nyer gnyis gdan sa mdzad/ me stag nas rab byung bcu bzhi pa'i chu stag rgyal zla'i bar/ yab rje padma bdud 'dul dbang phyug gis khri thog lo so bdun

mdzad/ chu yos rgyal zla nas de sras rdo rje rin chen gyis khri thog lo gsum mdzad/ me rta rgyal zla nas shing glang zla ba bcu pa'i bar lo grangs nyi shu tham pa theg chen
bkra shis rin chen gyis bdag khri mdzad/ me stag rgyal zla nas rab byung bco lnga pa'i chu rta zla ba bzhi pa'i bar lo bcu bdun bdag khri kun dga' bsod nams kyis mdzad pas
mjug lo gcig cung med/ chu lug rgyal zla nas sa phag zla ba bcu gcig pa'i bar lo grangs bcu bdun bdag khri yab rje rdo rje 'chang kun dga' snying pos mdzad pas mjug lo
gcig cung ma tshang / lcags glang rgyal zla nas shing yos zla ba bcu pa'i bar lo grangs bco lnga bdag khri 'jam dbang nas mdzad/ de nas dgongs zhu mdzad nas shing yos rgyal
zla nas/ da lta rab byung bcu drug pa'i chu sprel snron zla phyi ma'i tshes gcig 'di yan la ngos rang nas sa bstan 'khur 'dzin bgyis nas lo grangs bcu bdun dang/ shing
yos 'go zla nas brtsis na lo grangs bco brgyad ma song tsam du slebs pa bcas kyi sa bcad lnga pa skabs kyi don gdan sa chen po'i 'di nyid du da phan gdan rabs ji ltar byung
tshul gyi zhal skong bshad zin to/ /yang smras pa/ phun tshogs rigs gsum mgon po'i rnam sprul pa/ /phun tshogs mtshan gsum gdung rigs ngo mtshar can/ /phun tshogs gdan
rabs ji ltar byung ba'i tshul/ /phun tshogs gang gis smra de sa gsum rgyal/ /zhes kyang smras so/ /de rnams kyi dpal sa skya'i gdung rabs rin po che byon tshul rin chen

bang mdzod dgos 'dod kun 'byung zhes bya ba sku phreng du mar/ 'phags bod kyi mkhas grub du mar bsam bzhin du skye ba bzhes te/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che ches cher gsal
bar mdzad cing/ sku tshe 'di nyid du'ang shes bya rig pa'i gnas lnga sogs la blo gros kyi 'jug pa ches mtho bas rgyal gsung mdo rgyud rab 'byams rang dbang du 'grel nus
pa/ dpal sa skya pa chen po 'jam mgon a mes zhabs ngag dbang kun dga' bsod nams bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa/ de'i zhal skong phyis byon rtse
gdong gdung brgyud dang/ gcung po mthu stobs dbang phyug yan gyi gdan sa chen po 'di nyid kyi gdung rabs rnam thar lo rgyus ngo mtshar rin chen 'dzad med srid zhi'i yon tan
lhun grub ces bya ba/ skye rabs gong ma rnams su rgya bod rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtsug rgyan du mar 'khrungs pas/ mkhyen brtse nus gsum sogs kyi yon tan gzhal du med pa la
dbang 'byor ba/ dpal sa skya pa chen po 'jam mgon ngag dbang kun dga' blo gros sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos mdzad pa bcas kyi zhal skong gdung rabs
rin chen kun 'phel srid zhi'i dpal 'byor lhun grub zhes bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bstan zin to/ /

lnga pa/ mjug bsngo ba'i tshigs bcad dang mdzad byang/phul byung rgya mtsho'i gos can rgya mtsho'i mtha' klas sa chen 'di na ches mtho ba/ /phul byung ri bo mchog rab ri bdun
rol mtsho gling bzhir nyi zla'i 'od snang bzhin/ /phul byung 'dzam gling byang phyogs 'dzam gling mkhas grub yongs kyis ches cher rab bsngags pa'i/ /phul byung mtshan
mchog gsum ldan mtshan bzang ji snyed byon rnams spyi bos gus pas 'dud/ /de lta'i dpal yon rnams la dbang bsgyur ba'i/ /mtshungs bral sa skya'i rje btsun mchog rnams dang
/ /sngags 'chang yab sras a mes zhabs la sogs/ /sa chen kun blo yab sras phyag gi gnas/ /rjes 'brang bstan 'dzin ngor rdzong gong dkar ba/ /

g.yag rong go shaka gsum gzhon bla ma sogs/ /mtshungs med 'gran bral mkhas dang grub pa'i tshogs/ /ji snyed byon la phyag gis ba gam brtsegs/ /kun bzang mchod sprin lta bus
rab mchod cing / /skye 'phags dge ba kun la rjes yi rang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor bzhin rtag bzhugs gsol/ /nongs kun mkha' mnyam sdig dang lhan cig bshags/ /'di ltar bgyis
pa'i legs byas rnam dkar tshogs/ /ji snyed mchis rnams 'khor gsum yongs dag pas/ /mkha' mnyam 'gro kun dge dang lhan cig par/ /bstan 'gror phan dang bde ba'i rgyu ru bsngo/
/rgyal ba nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bstan pa mchog /spyi dang 'jam dbyangs bdun brgyud bzhed srol kun/ /mi nyams rab tu yun ring gnas pa dang / /phyogs brgyar dar zhing rgyas
pa'i rgyur gyur cig /mtshungs med bstan pa 'dzin pa'i skyes chen rnams/ /bskal brgyar zhabs brtan mdzad pa 'phrin las rnams/ /

thugs kyi dgongs pa ji bzhin lhun grub ste/ /'gro ba kun gyi dpal du 'gyur bar shog /yangs pa'i rgyal khams kun tu lo phyugs 'phel/ /nad mug 'khrug rtsod ming yang mi grags
shing / /chos ldan rgyal po'i bzhed srol rma med pas/ /'gro kun bde skyid dpal la spyod par shog /bdag kyang yun ring tshe dang ldan gyur te/ /chos mthun dpal dang 'byor
pas yongs 'tsho zhiing/ /lung rtogs yon tan yar ngo'i zla ba bzhin/ /'phel zhing rgyas te bsam don kun 'grub shog /nam zhig 'dir gnas snang ba nub pa'i tshe/ /sdug bsngal
'tsho ba mtha' dag yongs spangs nas/ /bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' der/ /thogs med skad cig yud kyis bgrod par shog /mdor na mchog gsum bla ma'i byin rlabs dang
/ /yi dam chos srung nor lha'i mthu rtsal dang / /rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa'i bden stobs kyis/ /

smon lam ji ltar btab pa 'grub gyur cig /bla ma'i bkra shis phyogs kun byin rlabs snang ba thibs se thib/ /yi dam bkra shis phyogs kun grub gnyis zil tshar thul le ba/ /chos
srung bkra shis phyogs kun bskal pa'i me 'od lham me ba/ /mchog gsum bkra shis phyogs kun phun tshogs kun tu shis gyur cig /ces pa 'di'ang 'khon rigs theg pa mchog gi rnal
'byor pa sa skya'i khri thog so bzhi pa/ ngag dbang drag shul 'phrin las rin chen bkra shis grags pa rgyal mtshan dpal bzang por 'bod pa gdung rigs ngag dbang kun dga'
rin chen dang / ngag dbang kun dga' bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nas 'di bzhin dgos tshul yun ring po'i dus nas bskul ma gnang ba dang gzhung gnas sku drag 'ga' nas kyang 'di
la zhal skong zhig nges par dgos tshul gsungs pa bzhin/ gdan sa 'di nyid 'khon ston dkon mchog rgyal po rgyal bstan lnga brgya pa phrag bcur gnas pa/ lung dus lnga brgya
pa phrag bdun pa/ mngon pa'i dus nas lo nyis brgya dang bdun lon pa/ bod

du dus 'khor dar ba dang dus mnyam rab byung me yos sogs drug cu skor brtsis pa'i rab byung dang po'i chu glang lo/ dpal ldan sa skya'i thog ma sgo rum gzim spyi dkar po btab
pa nas/ lo grangs brgyad brgya dang lnga bcu dgu lon zhing rab byung bzhi pa'i sa 'brug lo/ /sprul pa'i gha nho la lha chen btab nas lo grangs bdun brgya dang nyer bdun
song zhing/ slar yang sngags 'chang ngag dbang kun dga' rin chen gyis rab byung dgu pa'i nang sa bstan me ro rmang nas gsol bar mdzad nas lo grangs bzhii brgya dang gsum
song / deng skabs bstan pa lung gi dus mngon pa mdo sde spyod pa'i dus rnams song nas 'dul ba'i dus nas kyang lo drug cu re lnga song zin nas/ re drug pa'i steng du son
pa/ rab lo bcu drug pa'i nang tshan/ rgya gar legs sbyar gyi skad du angki ra zhes bya zhing/ stod 'grel bod kyi skad du gong bzhin dang/ rgya nag pa rnams zhin shing zhes
'bod cing nag rtsis pa rnams dbang thang dang bstun pa chu pho spre'u'i lo hor zla lnga pa phyi ma'i tshes gcig nyin res gza' zla ba dang/ rgyu skar lag 'phrad pa'i bdud
rtsi'i sbyor ba/ nyin stag rten 'brel tshor ba spar kha kham/ sme ba gcig dkar dbyangs la gsal byed/ 'dod yon gzugs/ dus tshod bdud rtsa thun mtshams nyi shar snga char/
sa tshogs kyi dar po che gser zangs kyi rgyal mtshan bcas nyams gso gsar bzhengs lta bur zhus pa'i rab gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzugs chog sogs zhal bro'i dga' ston phun sum
tshogs pa'i nyin

gzhi thog pho brang gi yang steng / 'jam mgon a mes zhabs kyi gzim chung / 'chi med rdo rje'i pho brang e waM byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas su/ legs par grub par bgyis pa 'di
la gong ma rnams kyi rnam thar so sor gsal ba dang/ deng dus rnams rang blor nges pa dang / dus mtshungs lo rgyus tshang ma brjod pa sogs sgro skur med pa sbyar ba 'di la
nongs pa'i rigs med snyam yang/ gal te ji bzhin ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog pa sogs kyi nyes skyon srid na mchog gsum dam can rgya mtsho'i spyan sngar mkha' mnyam 'gro
